hanzi: 新娘穿一身白色的礼服.
pinyin: xīn niáng chuān yī shēn bái sè de lǐ fú.

english: A response in speech or writing.

english: He worked in community welfare department.

pinyin: wù bì bǎ zhè xie dōng xi fàng duì dì fāng.
english: Be sure to place them correctly.

pinyin: bù yào zhù zhǎng hái zi de huài xí guàn.
english: Don't encourage bad habits in a child.

english: He is endowed with a gift in music by nature.

pinyin: xià yī táng kè wǒ yào jiǎng xiǎo shù.
english: I'll deal with decimals in the next lesson.

pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi jīng cháng qīng lǐ fáng jiān。
english: You should always clean up the room.

pinyin: tā zhǐ gù zì jǐ,  bù guān xīn wǒ men.
english: He's too self-absorbed to care about us.

english: He's always out of sorts early in the morning.

pinyin: wǒ xiǎng qí yī qí nà liàng zì xíng chē。
english: I want to have a ride of that bike.

pinyin: tā cóng xiǎo jiù xiǎng dàng yǎn yuán.
english: She's wanted to go on the stage from an early age.

pinyin: bǎ tā de míng zi zòng míng dān shàng huà qù。
english: Strike his name off the list.

hanzi: 他坐在风口上，着凉了。
pinyin: tā zuò zài fēng kǒu shàng， zháo liáng le。
english: He sat in a draught and catch a cold.

pinyin: wǒ ài jí zuò de zhōng děng shú de jī ròu。
english: I like my chicken medium well do.

pinyin: máng zhòng yǒu cuò shì hěn cháng jiàn de。
english: Haste makes waste, as is often the case.

hanzi: 我不知道他的意图是什么。

english: I do not know what his intention is.

hanzi: 这些种子应在四月播种。
pinyin: zhè xie zhǒng zi yìng zài sì yuè bō zhǒng。
english: These seeds should be sown in April.

pinyin: wǒ yù jì wǒ kuài zài zhōu rì huí lai de。
english: I expect I will be back on Sunday.

pinyin: wǒ men kāi shǐ zhǐ yǒu liù gè huì yuán。
english: We have only six members to start with.

english: He feels that they are his equals.

english: Stick down your names on the list.

pinyin: zhè běn shū shì wǒ tè yì wèi nǐ mǎi de。
english: I bought the book especially for you.

pinyin: tā de yāo qiú wán quán hé qíng hé lǐ.

english: I am banking upon you to help me with arrangements.

english: She spent the whole of the year in hospital.

pinyin: tā zài kuài shàng bù diǎn míng de pī píng nǐ。
english: He talked at you at the meeting.

hanzi: 小男孩在点名时不见了。
pinyin: xiǎo nán hái zài diǎn míng shí bù jiàn le。
english: The boy turned up missing at roll call.

hanzi: 为了和平我们做出了让步.
pinyin: wèi le hé píng wǒ men zuò chū le ràng bù.
english: We made concessions for the sake of peace.

hanzi: 那间办公室又明亮又通风.
pinyin: nà jiàn bàn gōng shì yòu míng liàng yòu tōng fēng.
english: The office was light and airy.

hanzi: 他对新老板一见就反感.
pinyin: tā duì xīn lǎo bǎn yī xiàn jiù fǎn gǎn.
english: He took an immediate aversion to his new boss.

hanzi: 这家医院没有像样的设备.
pinyin: zhè jiā yī yuàn méi yǒu xiàng yàng de shè bèi.
english: The hospital has no decent equipment.

hanzi: 那数字是以百分比表示的.
pinyin: nà shù zì shì yǐ bǎi fēn bǐ biǎo shì de.
english: The figure is expressed as a percentage.

hanzi: 在我家里, 咖啡取代了茶。
pinyin: zài wǒ jiā lǐ,  kā fēi qǔ dài le chá。
english: Coffee has taken the place of tea in my home.

hanzi: 那两组交通灯不同步。
pinyin: nà liǎng zǔ jiāo tōng dēng bù tóng bù。
english: The two sets of traffic lights were out of phase.

hanzi: 我们去年有一次难忘的旅行。
pinyin: wǒ men qù nián yǒu yī cì nán wàng de lu:3 xíng。
english: We had a memorable trip last year.

hanzi: 真是的，这叫人非常不便。
pinyin: zhēn shì de， zhè jiào rén fēi cháng bù biàn。
english: Well, this is most inconvenient.

hanzi: 这使我们遇到种种困难。
pinyin: zhè shǐ wǒ men yù dào zhǒng zhǒng kùn nan。
english: That got us into all kinds of difficulties.

hanzi: 请把这个问题给我讲解一下.
pinyin: qǐng bǎ zhè gè wèn tí jǐ wǒ jiǎng jiě yī xià.
english: Please explain this problem to me.

hanzi: 孩子们正在学习读书写字.
pinyin: hái zi men zhèng zài xué xí dú shū xiě zì.
english: The children are learning to read and write.

hanzi: 我坚信我们最后会胜利。
pinyin: wǒ jiān xìn wǒ men zuì hòu kuài shèng lì。
english: I fervently believe in our eventual victory.

hanzi: 有人给你留下这张条子.
pinyin: yǒu rén jǐ nǐ liú xià zhè zhāng tiáo zi.
english: Someone left you this note/left this note for you.

hanzi: 这个国家一直治理得不错。
pinyin: zhè gè guó jiā yī zhí zhì lǐ de bù cuò。
english: The country has always had fair government.

hanzi: 我过去相信你是有见识的人。
pinyin: wǒ guò qu xiāng xìn nǐ shì yǒu jiàn shi de rén。
english: I gave you credit for more sense.

hanzi: 这个月，我将作你的译员。
pinyin: zhèi gè yuè， wǒ jiàng zuò nǐ de yì yuán。
english: I will be your interpreter in this month.

hanzi: 今天我处理了一大批信件.
pinyin: jīn tiān wǒ chǔ lǐ le yī dà pī xìn jiàn.
english: I've got through a lot of correspondence today.

hanzi: 有的人一面读书一面做注解。
pinyin: yǒu de rén yī miàn dú shū yī miàn zuò zhù jiě。
english: Some people annotate as they read.

hanzi: 现在房屋大多用电照明.
pinyin: xiàn zài fáng wū dà duō yòng diàn zhào míng.
english: Nowadays, houses are mostly lit by electricity.

hanzi: 他说天长地久永远爱她。
pinyin: tā shuō Tiān cháng de jiǔ yǒng yuǎn ài tā。
english: He said he'd love her to the end of time.

hanzi: 这条路笔直有好几英里长。
pinyin: zhè tiáo lù bǐ zhí yǒu hǎo jǐ yīng lǐ zhǎng。
english: The road ran straight for several miles.

hanzi: 他来看我时，我幸好好在家。
pinyin: tā lái kàn wǒ shí， wǒ xìng hǎo hǎo zài jiā。
english: Luckily I was at home when he called.

hanzi: 我步行一个来回用一小时。
pinyin: wǒ bù xíng yī gè lái huí yòng yī xiǎo shí。
english: It takes me an hour to walk there and back.

hanzi: 多数旧电影片都是黑白的.
pinyin: duō shù jiù diàn yǐng piàn dōu shì hēi bái de.
english: Most old films were made in black and white.

hanzi: 该报认为不宜发表我的信.
pinyin: gāi bào rèn wéi bù yí fā biǎo wǒ de xìn.
english: The newspaper did not see fit to publish my letter.

hanzi: 在你们姐妹中，我最心疼你。
pinyin: zài nǐ men jiě mèi zhòng， wǒ zuì xīn téng nǐ。
english: Of all your sisters, I love you best.

hanzi: 他没有在指定的时间在那里。
pinyin: tā méi yǒu zài zhǐ dìng de shí jiān zài nà li。
english: He wasn't there at the appointed time.

hanzi: 在对流中热气流向上运动.
pinyin: zài duì liú zhòng rè qì liú xiàng shàng yùn dòng.
english: In convection, hot currents flow upwards.

hanzi: 这是我特意为你生日而做的。
pinyin: zhè shì wǒ tè yì wèi nǐ shēng rì ér zuò de。
english: I made this specially for your birthday.

hanzi: 他非常挂念他有病的母亲。
pinyin: tā fēi cháng guà niàn tā yǒu bìng de mǔ qīn。
english: He is full of concern about his sick mother.

hanzi: 我想用加急电报把它发出。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng yòng jiā jí diàn bào bǎ tā fā chū。
english: I want to have it send by an urgent telegram.

hanzi: 他的父亲打那个不听话的男孩。
pinyin: tā de fù qīn dǎ nèi gè bù tīng huà de nán hái。
english: His father beat the disobedient boy.

hanzi: 这个孩子是提早五周生下来的。
pinyin: zhè gè hái zi shì tí zǎo wǔ zhōu shēng xia lai de。
english: The baby was five weeks premature.

hanzi: 到那儿去，步行比坐车容易。
pinyin: dào nà r qù， bù xíng bì zuò jū róng yì。
english: It's easier to get there on foot than by car.

hanzi: 我十分乐意为你做任何事情。
pinyin: wǒ shí fēn lè yì wèi nǐ zuò rèn hé shì qing。
english: I am quite willing to do anything for you.

hanzi: 直到现在还没有像样的夏天.
pinyin: zhí dào xiàn zài huán méi yǒu xiàng yàng de xià tiān.
english: We've not had any summer to speak of.

hanzi: 他们正在了解房屋的布局。
pinyin: tā men zhèng zài liǎo jiě fáng wū de bù jú。
english: They are getting to know the geographical house.

hanzi: 我报了名的学院已经录取我了.
pinyin: wǒ bào le míng de xué yuàn yǐ jīng lù qǔ wǒ le.
english: The college I applied to has accepted me.

hanzi: 我们对房子进行了一些改建.
pinyin: wǒ men duì fáng zi jìn xíng le yī xiē gǎi jiàn.
english: We are making a few alterations to the house.

hanzi: 我们迟早会查明事实真相。
pinyin: wǒ men chí zǎo kuài chá míng shì shí zhēn xiàng。
english: We shall find out the truth early or late.

hanzi: 他总是大清早给我打电话.
pinyin: tā zǒng shì dà qīng zǎo jǐ wǒ dǎ diàn huà.
english: He's eternally telephoning me early in the morning.

hanzi: 我们迟早会查明事实真相。
pinyin: wǒ men chí zǎo kuài chá míng shì shí zhēn xiàng。
english: We shall find out the truth early or late.

hanzi: 你今年的预算数字十分准确.
pinyin: nǐ jīn nián de yù suàn shù zì shí fēn zhǔn què.
english: Your budget figures were bang on this year.

hanzi: 改变了的已经被更改或变更了的
pinyin: gǎi biàn le de yǐ jīng bèi gēng gǎi huò biàn gēng le de
english: Having been modified or altered.

hanzi: 别为我操心，我一切都好。
pinyin: biè wèi wǒ cāo xīn， wǒ yī qiè dōu hào。
english: Don't bother yourself about me; I am doing quite well.

hanzi: 老师正在评定学生的作业。
pinyin: lǎo shī zhèng zài píng dìng xué sheng de zuò yè。
english: The teacher is appraising the students' work.

hanzi: 我希望他在新的工作中万事如意.
pinyin: wǒ xī wàng tā zài xīn de gōng zuò zhòng wàn shì rú yì.
english: I wish him well in his new job.

hanzi: 物理和数学都是我喜欢的科目.
pinyin: wù lǐ huò shù xué dōu shì wǒ xǐ huan de kē mù.
english: Physics and maths are my favourite subjects.

hanzi: 她使她的手指和我的手指交错。
pinyin: tā shǐ tā de shǒu zhǐ huò wǒ de shǒu zhǐ jiāo cuò。
english: She interlaced her fingers with mine.

hanzi: 来访者在中午前一会儿离开了。
pinyin: lái fǎng zhě zài zhōng wǔ qián yī huìr lí kāi le。
english: The visitor left a little before noon.

hanzi: 她认为你的书面作业不太好.
pinyin: tā rèn wéi nǐ de shū miàn zuò yè bù tài hào.
english: She has a rather poor opinion of your written work.

hanzi: 我们可以相信他会准时到来。
pinyin: wǒ men kě yǐ xiāng xìn tā kuài zhǔn shí dào lái。
english: We can depend on his arriving here on time.

hanzi: 总的来说，我很喜欢这本书。
pinyin: zǒng de lái shuō， wǒ hěn xǐ huan zhè běn shū。
english: On the whole, I like the book very much.

hanzi: 他经常给当地报纸写文章。
pinyin: tā jīng cháng jǐ dāng dì bào zhǐ xiě wén zhāng。
english: He constantly writes articles for the local paper.

hanzi: 这本书是原始民族神话集。
pinyin: zhè běn shū shì yuán shǐ mín zú shén huà jí。
english: The book is about the mythologies of primitive races.

hanzi: 这条新跑道将近六英里长.
pinyin: zhè tiáo xīn pǎo dào jiāng jìn liù yīng lǐ zhǎng.
english: The new race track is nearly six miles in extent.

hanzi: 这个男孩做不出这道代数题。
pinyin: zhè gè nán hái zuò bù chū zhè dào dài shù tí。
english: The boy can't figure out the algebra problems.

hanzi: 共产主义是以马克思主义为基础.
pinyin: gòng chǎn zhǔ yì shì yǐ Mǎ kè sī zhǔ yì wèi jī chǔ.
english: Communism is based on Marxism.

hanzi: 应该看报以便  解时事.
pinyin: yīng gāi kàn bào yǐ biàn   xiè shí shì.
english: You should read the newspapers to keep abreast of current affairs.

hanzi: 每人都有自己的长处和短处。
pinyin: měi rén dōu yǒu zì jǐ de cháng chù huò duǎn chù。
english: Everyone has his own strong and weak points.

hanzi: 他现已从中风病完全康复了。
pinyin: tā xiàn yǐ cóng zhōng fēng bìng wán quán kāng fù le。
english: He's now fully recovered from his stroke.

hanzi: 像片上新娘照得很好.
pinyin: xiàng piàn shàng xīn niáng zhào de hěn hào.
english: The bride comes out well (ie looks attractive) in the photographs.

hanzi: 她参加了百米赛跑和跳远.
pinyin: tā cān jiā le bǎi mǐ sài pǎo huò tiào yuǎn.
english: She's put herself in for the 100 metres and the long jump.

hanzi: 他对女儿的新男友极为反感。
pinyin: tā duì nu:3 ér de xīn nán yǒu jí wéi fǎn gǎn。
english: He took a scunner at his daughter's new boyfriend.

hanzi: 我们应该更注重心理健康。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi gèng zhù zhòng xīn lǐ jiàn kāng。
english: We should pay more attention to our mental health.

hanzi: 这家商店里的人们大都是游客。
pinyin: zhè jiā shāng diàn lǐ de rén men dà dōu shì yóu kè。
english: People in this shop are mainly tourists.

hanzi: 他生前做的好事将永留人世。
pinyin: tā shēng qián zuò de hǎo shì jiàng yǒng liú rén shì。
english: The good which he did will live after him.

hanzi: 这个学生学习上进步很快。
pinyin: zhè gè xué sheng xué xí shàng jìn bù hěn kuài。
english: The student is showing rapid progress in his studies.

hanzi: 他们两人是在同一天来看我的。
pinyin: tā men liǎng rén shì zài tóng yī tiān lái kàn wǒ de。
english: They came to see me on the self-same day.

hanzi: 他站起身给自己又倒了点咖啡。
pinyin: tā zhàn qǐ shēn jǐ zì jǐ yòu dào le diǎn kā fēi。
english: He got up and helped himself to more coffee.

hanzi: 那家工厂不久就要重新开工了。
pinyin: nà jiā gōng chǎng bù jiǔ jiù yào chóng xīn kāi gōng le。
english: That factory will soon start up again.

hanzi: 有些学校极注重语言学习.
pinyin: yǒu xiē xué xiào jí zhù zhòng yǔ yán xué xí.
english: Some schools put/lay/place great emphasis on language study.

hanzi: 我有了新工作和一班新同事。
pinyin: wǒ yǒu le xīn gōng zuò huò yī bān xīn tóng shì。
english: I got a new job and a new set of work associations.

hanzi: 试从不同的角度来看这件事。
pinyin: shì cóng bù tóng de jiǎo dù lái kàn zhè jiàn shì。
english: Try looking at the affair from a different angle.

hanzi: 新图书馆建在校园的中心。
pinyin: xīn tú shū guǎn jiàn zài xiào yuán de zhōng xīn。
english: The new library was built in the centre of the campus.

hanzi: 学生们正在解一道数学习题。
pinyin: xué sheng men zhèng zài xiè yī dào shù xué xí tí。
english: The students are working on a mathematical problem.

hanzi: 这种感觉一年一年地加深了。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng gǎn jué yī nián yī nián de jiā shēn le。
english: The feeling deepened with the passing of the years.

hanzi: 我们希望早日收到你的支票.
pinyin: wǒ men xī wàng zǎo rì shōu dào nǐ de zhī piào.
english: We trust to receive a cheque at your earliest convenience.

hanzi: 她在学习以提高自己的代数水平。
pinyin: tā zài xué xí yǐ tí gāo zì jǐ de dài shù shuǐ píng。
english: She was studying to build up her algebra.

hanzi: 那位公主赢得了全体国民的心。
pinyin: nà wèi gōng zhǔ yíng dé le quán tǐ guó mín de xīn。
english: The princess captured the hearts of the nation.

hanzi: 你做的本年度预算数字十分准确.
pinyin: nǐ zuò de běn nián dù yù suàn shù zì shí fēn zhǔn què.
english: Your budget figures were spot-on this year.

hanzi: 这两个花样我都不喜欢。
pinyin: zhè liǎng gè huā yàng wǒ dōu bù xǐ huan。
english: I like neither of the designs. (=I don't like either of the designs.)

hanzi: 目前的情况不得再继续下去了.
pinyin: mù qián de qíng kuàng bù dé zài jì xù xià qu le.
english: The present state of affairs cannot be allowed to go on.

hanzi: 她的心思完全集中在工作上了。
pinyin: tā de xīn si wán quán jí zhōng zài gōng zuò shàng le。
english: She was completely absorbed in her task [work].

hanzi: 每一种教条都必定自有其得意之时。
pinyin: měi yī zhòng jiào tiáo dōu bì dìng zì yǒu qí dé yì zhī shí。
english: Every dogma must have its day.

hanzi: 和服是日本民族服装的一部分。
pinyin: hé fú shì Rì běn mín zú fú zhuāng de yī bù fen。
english: The kimono is part of the national costume of Japan.

hanzi: 我将在这星期或下星期出差。
pinyin: wǒ jiàng zài zhè xīng qī huò xià xīng qī chū chāi。
english: I will go on business either this week or next week.

hanzi: 他一生都是教会的热心支持者。
pinyin: tā yī shēng dōu shì jiào huì de rè xīn zhī chí zhě。
english: He has been a pillar of the Church all his life.

hanzi: 他试图在名单上找到自己的名字。
pinyin: tā shì tú zài míng dān shàng zhǎo dào zì jǐ de míng zi。
english: He tried to find in the list his own name.

hanzi: 他上学迟到已是家常便饭了。
pinyin: tā shàng xué chí dào yǐ shì jiā cháng biàn fàn le。
english: He was late for school, as was often the case with him.

hanzi: 他把表上的所有单词都记在心里了。
pinyin: tā bǎ biǎo shàng de suǒ yǒu dān cí dōu jì zài xīn lǐ le。
english: He memorized all the words on the list.

hanzi: 有许许多多人需要新的住房.
pinyin: yǒu xǔ xǔ duō duō rén xū yào xīn de zhù fáng.
english: There are hundreds (of people) (ie very many) who need new housing.

hanzi: 出门前你应该把房间收拾整齐。
pinyin: chū mén qián nǐ yīng gāi bǎ fáng jiān shōu shi zhěng qí。
english: You should straighten up your room before going out.

hanzi: 信息产业在我国是新兴产业。
pinyin: xìn xī chǎn yè zài wǒ guó shì xīn xīng chǎn yè。
english: The information industry is an infant industry in our country.

hanzi: 当然可以，只要邮局不在意就行。
pinyin: dāng rán kě yǐ， zhǐ yào yóu jú bù zài yì jiù xìng。
english: Certainly, as long as the post office do not care.

hanzi: 在集市上，我闻到了东方的气息。
pinyin: zài jí shì shàng， wǒ wén dào le dōng fāng de qì xī。
english: In the market, I breathed the smells of the Orient.

hanzi: 我的历史成绩不错, 但算术不太好.
pinyin: wǒ de lì shǐ chéng jī bù cuò,  dàn suàn shù bù tài hào.
english: I'm good at history but not so hot at arithmetic.

hanzi: 批发商店大的，常从事批发业务的商店
pinyin: pī fā shāng diàn dà de， cháng cóng shì pī fā yè wù de shāng diàn
english: A large, usually wholesale shop.

hanzi: 整个城市到处都在兴建新楼房。
pinyin: zhěng gè chéng shì dào chù dōu zài xīng jiàn xīn lóu fáng。
english: New buildings are sprouting up all over the city.

hanzi: 本事不是天生的，是锻炼出来的。
pinyin: běn shì bú shì tiān shēng de， shì duàn liàn chū lai de。
english: Ability is not innate, but comes through practice.

hanzi: 虽然汤药很苦，我还是不得不喝了。
pinyin: suī rán tāng yào hěn kǔ， wǒ hái shì bù dé bù hè le。
english: I had to take the herb tea although it's bitter.

hanzi: 音调的调整在音调和音高上的变化
pinyin: yīn diào de tiáo zhěng zài yīn diào huò yīn gāo shàng de biàn huà
english: Alteration in pitch or tone of the voice.

hanzi: 为我的播音，我必须学点音乐史。
pinyin: wèi wǒ de bō yīn， wǒ bì xū xué diǎn yīn yuè shǐ。
english: I have to work up the history of music for my broadcast.

hanzi: 他在国外的旅行中游览了许多地方。
pinyin: tā zài guó wài de lu:3 xíng zhōng yóu lǎn le xǔ duō dì fang。
english: He visited a lot of place on his trip abroad.

hanzi: 这张卡片正好能装进那个信封里.
pinyin: zhè zhāng kǎ piàn zhèng hǎo néng zhuāng jìn nèi gè xìn fēng lǐ.
english: This card just fits nicely into that envelope.

hanzi: 我这里一切都好，不用挂念。
pinyin: wǒ zhè lǐ yī qiè dōu hào， bù yòng guà niàn。
english: Everything is fine with me; there is no need for you to be concerned.

hanzi: 机器出了毛病, 工作便停顿下来.
pinyin: jī qì chū le máo bìng,  gōng zuò pián tíng dùn xia lai.
english: Work was brought/came to a halt when the machine broke down.

hanzi: 我们大家比以往更需要努力工作。
pinyin: wǒ men dà jiā bì yǐ wǎng gèng xū yào nǔ lì gōng zuò。
english: It is more necessary than ever for all of us to work hard.

hanzi: 大会代表中有来自海外的代表.
pinyin: dà huì dài biǎo zhòng yǒu lái zì hǎi wài de dài biǎo.
english: The conference delegates included representatives from abroad.

hanzi: 你应该多到各地走走以增广见识.
pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi duō dào gè dì zǒu zǒu yǐ zēng guǎng jiàn shi.
english: You should broaden your experience by travelling more.

hanzi: 我不会以各种各样的名义做这件事。
pinyin: wǒ bù huì yǐ gè zhǒng gè yàng de míng yì zuò zhè jiàn shì。
english: I will never do this under all sorts of names.

hanzi: 我们把能想到的各种组合都试了一遍.
pinyin: wǒ men bǎ néng xiǎng dào de gè zhǒng zǔ hé dōu shì le yī biàn.
english: We tried it in every conceivable combination.

hanzi: 回顾过去就很容易明白我们的错处了.
pinyin: huí gù guò qu jiù hěn róng yì míng bai wǒ men de cuò chù le.
english: In retrospect, it's easy to see why we were wrong.

hanzi: 这种新邮票是我在发行当天买到的。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng xīn yóu piào shì wǒ zài fā xíng dàng tiān mǎi dào de。
english: I bought the new stamp the day of its issue.

hanzi: 他预见到做这件工作需要很长时间.
pinyin: tā yù jiàn dào zuò zhè jiàn gōng zuò xū yào hěn zhǎng shí jiān.
english: He foresaw that the job would take a long time.

hanzi: 少数民族音乐会持续了两个小时。
pinyin: shǎo shù mín zú yīn yuè huì chí xù le liǎng gè xiǎo shí。
english: The minority nationality concert lasted two hours.

hanzi: 等我们检查完你的文件就退还给你.
pinyin: děng wǒ men jiǎn chá wán nǐ de wén jiàn jiù tuì huán jǐ nǐ.
english: You can have your files back after we've checked them.

hanzi: 国民大会已对这一危机进行了讨论.
pinyin: guó mín dà huì yǐ duì zhè yī wēi jī jìn xíng le tǎo lùn.
english: The national assembly has/have met to discuss the crisis.

hanzi: 早晨清新的空气使我感到十分愉快。
pinyin: zǎo chén qīng xīn de kōng qì shǐ wǒ gǎn dào shí fēn yú kuài。
english: The morning fresh air makes me feel quite frisky.

hanzi: 他跳高时试跳了几次才跳过去.
pinyin: tā tiào gāo shí shì tiào le jǐ cì cái tiào guò qu.
english: He had several goes at the high jump before he succeeded in clearing it.

hanzi: 那些游客大多没把坏天气放在心上。
pinyin: nà xiē yóu kè dà duō mò bǎ huài tiān qì fàng zài xīn shàng。
english: Most tourists were unconcerned at the poor weather.

hanzi: 我们精打细算就能买辆新汽车了.
pinyin: wǒ men jīng dǎ xì suàn jiù néng mǎi liàng xīn qì chē le.
english: If we budget carefully, we'll be able to afford a new car.

hanzi: 当他平静下来时，我开始告诉他实情。
pinyin: dàng tā píng jìng xia lai shí， wǒ kāi shǐ gào su tā shí qíng。
english: When he quieted down, I began to tell him the truth.

hanzi: 她预见到母亲的一切需要而事先做好安排.
pinyin: tā yù jiàn dào mǔ qīn de yī qiè xū yào ér shì xiān zuò hào ān pái.
english: She anticipates all her mother's needs.

hanzi: 这位神父可听取用英语和法语的告解.
pinyin: zhè wèi shén fù kě tīng qǔ yòng Yīng yǔ huò fǎ yǔ de gào xiè.
english: The priest will hear confessions in English and French.

hanzi: 那个有毛病的电灯开关把我电了一下.
pinyin: nèi gè yǒu máo bìng de diàn dēng kāi guān bǎ wǒ diàn le yī xià.
english: I got an electric shock from that faulty light switch.

hanzi: 现在我不会唱歌了，但我年轻的时候会。
pinyin: xiàn zài wǒ bù huì chàng gē le， dàn wǒ nián qīng de shí hou kuài。
english: I can't sing now, but I could when I was young.

hanzi: 她不得不低下头才能穿过低矮的门口。
pinyin: tā bù dé bù dī xià tou cái néng chuān guò dī ǎi de mén kǒu。
english: She had to duck her head to get through the low doorway.

hanzi: 我要求你必须立刻收回那些过头的话.
pinyin: wǒ yāo qiú nǐ bì xū lì kè shōu huí nà xiē guò tou de huà.
english: I insist that you withdraw your offensive remarks immediately.

hanzi: 帮助人们生活得好些是教会的责任。
pinyin: bāng zhù rén men shēng huó de hǎo xiē shì jiào huì de zé rèn。
english: It's the job of the church to help people lead better lives.

hanzi: 同其他车辆相比，汽车确实很方便。
pinyin: tóng qí tā chē liàng xiāng bǐ， qì chē què shí hěn fāng biàn。
english: Compare to other vehicle, car is really quite convenient.

hanzi: 我问起他那新女友, 他就满脸通红.
pinyin: wǒ wèn qǐ tā nà xīn nu:3 yǒu,  tā jiù mǎn liǎn tōng hóng.
english: He went as red as a beetroot when I asked about his new girl-friend.

hanzi: 操练了好半天之后，他让这个班解散了。
pinyin: cāo liàn le hào bàn tiān zhī hòu， tā ràng zhè gè bān jiě sàn le。
english: After a long drill he told the squad to fall out.

hanzi: 他一做家务事就装成舍生取义的样子.
pinyin: tā yī zuò jiā wù shì jiù zhuāng chéng shè shēng qǔ yì de yàng zi.
english: He always acts the martyr when he has to do the housework.

hanzi: 我们应该向理事会提交计划以求批准。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi xiàng lǐ shì huì tí jiāo jì huà yǐ qiú pī zhǔn。
english: We should submit our plans to the council for approval.

hanzi: 现在吃或是等一会儿再吃对我来说都一样.
pinyin: xiàn zài jí huò shì děng yī huìr zài jí duì wǒ lái shuō dōu yí yàng.
english: It's all one to me whether we eat now or later.

hanzi: 二十世纪六十年代出现了许多新兴国家。
pinyin: èr shí shì jì liù shí nián dài chū xiàn le xǔ duō xīn xīng guó jiā。
english: The 1960s saw the emergence of many new nations.

hanzi: 她的来访给孩子们的生活带来了欢乐。
pinyin: tā de lái fǎng jǐ hái zi men de shēng huó dài lái le huān lè。
english: Her visit brought a ray of sunshine into the children's lives.

hanzi: 我不敢去想她知道真相后会怎么样。
pinyin: wǒ bù gǎn qù xiǎng tā zhī dào zhēn xiàng hòu kuài zěn me yàng。
english: I dread to think what will happen if she finds out the truth.

hanzi: 我除了要通过考试之外，没有别的心愿。
pinyin: wǒ chú le yào tōng guò kǎo shì zhī wài， méi yǒu bié de xīn yuàn。
english: I have no other wish except to pass the examination.

hanzi: 他讲话中时而不自觉地冒出地方方言。
pinyin: tā jiǎng huà zhòng shí ér bù zì jué de mào chū dì fang fāng yán。
english: Every now and then he would lapse into the local dialect.

hanzi: 这个女演员的第一部电影使她一举成名。
pinyin: zhè gè nu:3 yǎn yuán de dì yī bù diàn yǐng shǐ tā yī jǔ chéng míng。
english: The actress won overnight fame with her first film.

hanzi: 他的书法不错，但是很难和你的相比。
pinyin: tā de shū fǎ bù cuò， dàn shì hěn nàn huò nǐ de xiāng bǐ。
english: His handwriting is not bad, but it's hardly comparable with yours.

hanzi: 现在很多小孩都可以说是少年老成了。
pinyin: xiàn zài hěn duō xiǎo hái dōu kě yǐ shuō shì shào nián lǎo chéng le。
english: Now many children can be called young but experienced.

hanzi: 现今人们旅行都坐汽车，而不使用马车。
pinyin: xiàn jīn rén men lu:3 xíng dōu zuò qì chē， ér bù shǐ yòng mǎ chē。
english: Nowadays people travel in cars rather than carriages.

hanzi: 我不知不觉被拉来参加了这次远足旅行。
pinyin: wǒ bù zhī bù jué bèi lā lái cān jiā le zhè cì yuǎn zú lu:3 xíng。
english: I was roped in for this excursion before I knew it.

hanzi: 我们两国被共同关切的问题连结在一起。
pinyin: wǒ men liǎng guó bèi gòng tóng guān qiè de wèn tí lián jié zài yī qǐ。
english: Our two nations are knit together by common concerns.

hanzi: 他没有回答，只是继续一点一点地吃东西。
pinyin: tā méi yǒu huí dá， zhǐ shì jì xù yī diǎn yī diǎn de jí dōng xi。
english: He didn't answer, but just continued to nibble at his food.

hanzi: 点名时，孩子们听到自己的名子一一答应。
pinyin: diǎn míng shí， hái zi men tīng dào zì jǐ de míng zi yī yī dā ying。
english: At the roll-call the children answered up to their names.

hanzi: 那位年轻的老师很难让孩子们听话。
pinyin: nà wèi nián qīng de lǎo shī hěn nàn ràng hái zi men tīng huà。
english: The young teacher had difficulty in holding the children under her girdle.

hanzi: 他的行为很快就使她明白了他的真实意图.
pinyin: tā de xíng wéi hěn kuài jiù shǐ tā míng bai le tā de zhēn shí yì tú.
english: His behaviour soon undeceived her as to his true intentions.

hanzi: 我一看到她的反应就意识到我说话不当.
pinyin: wǒ yī kàn dào tā de fǎn yìng jiù yì shí dào wǒ shuō huà bù dàng.
english: I realized that I had said the wrong thing when I saw her reaction.

hanzi: 希望你喜欢这件东西, 这是我亲手做的.
pinyin: xī wàng nǐ xǐ huan zhè jiàn dōng xi,  zhè shì wǒ qīn shǒu zuò de.
english: I hope you'll appreciate this: it's all done by my/mine own fair hand.

hanzi: 重要的是，我们必须全心全意为人民服务。
pinyin: zhòng yào de shì， wǒ men bì xū quán xīn quán yì wèi rén mín fú wù。
english: Above all, we must serve the people whole-heartedly.

hanzi: 我一进办公室，立刻就感到事情不对头。
pinyin: wǒ yī jìn bàn gōng shì， lì kè jiù gǎn dào shì qing bù duì tou。
english: As I entered the office I knew right away that something was wrong.

hanzi: 她的房间十分杂乱，她不好意思请我进去。
pinyin: tā de fáng jiān shí fēn zá luàn， tā bù hǎo yì si qǐng wǒ jìn qù。
english: Her room is in such a litter that she is ashamed to ask me in.

hanzi: 旅游可以使人增长见闻，尤其对年轻人。
pinyin: lu:3 yóu kě yǐ shǐ rén zēng zhǎng jiàn wén， yóu qí duì nián qīng rén。
english: Travel is an edifying experience, especially for young people.

hanzi: 如果他老是这样喝酒，他迟早要丢饭碗的。
pinyin: rú guǒ tā lǎo shi zhè yàng hē jiǔ， tā chí zǎo yào diū fàn wǎn de。
english: If he continues drinking, sooner or later he will lose his job.

hanzi: 大多数孩子都喜欢吃糖果，但也有一些例外。
pinyin: dà duō shù hái zi dōu xǐ huan jí táng guǒ， dàn yě yǒu yī xiē lì wài。
english: Most children like sweets, but there are some exceptions.

hanzi: 我们正在使用的计算机大多数是数字计算机。
pinyin: wǒ men zhèng zài shǐ yòng de jì suàn jī dà duō shù shì shù zì jì suàn jī。
english: Most of the computers we are using are digital computers.

hanzi: 不到两天，我就收到了经理写来的录取信。
pinyin: bù dào liǎng tiān， wǒ jiù shōu dào le jīng lǐ xiě lái de lù qǔ xìn。
english: Within two days I received a letter of acceptance from the manager.

hanzi: 到了这里一个月以后，学生们开始想家了。
pinyin: dào le zhè lǐ yī gè yuè yǐ hòu， xué sheng men kāi shǐ xiǎng jiā le。
english: The students began to feel homesick after they had been here for a month.

hanzi: 他有钱是事实，但他必须知道钱不是一切。
pinyin: tā yǒu qián shì shì shí， dàn tā bì xū zhī dào qián bú shì yī qiè。
english: It is true that he is rich, but he must know money is not everything.

hanzi: 她这个人不好说话，我想她不会答应我们的。
pinyin: tā zhè gè rén bù hǎo shuō huà， wǒ xiǎng tā bù huì dā ying wǒ men de。
english: She is a hard nut(to crack);I don't think she will give us permission.

hanzi: 他上学迟到，但这对他而言已是家常便饭了。
pinyin: tā shàng xué chí dào， dàn zhè duì tā ér yán yǐ shì jiā cháng biàn fàn le。
english: He was late for school, as (which) was often the case with him.

hanzi: 如果我们要克服困难，我们就要有进取精神。
pinyin: rú guǒ wǒ men yào kè fú kùn nan， wǒ men jiù yào yǒu jìn qǔ jīng shén。
english: We need a spirit of enterprise if we are to overcome our difficulties.

hanzi: 我父亲刚出去散步，但半个钟点后就要回来。
pinyin: wǒ fù qīn gāng chū qù sàn bù， dàn bàn gè zhōng diǎn hòu jiù yào huí lai。
english: My father has just gone for a walk, but he'll be back in half an hour.

hanzi: 谈到批改我们的作业，老师总是让我们自己改。
pinyin: tán dào pī gǎi wǒ men de zuò yè， lǎo shī zǒng shì ràng wǒ men zì jǐ gǎi。
english: As to correct our homework, the teacher always make us do it ourselves.

hanzi: 在出访外国之前要做好许多准备工作。
pinyin: zài chū fǎng wài guó zhī qián yào zuò hào xǔ duō zhǔn bèi gōng zuò。
english: There are a lot of preliminaries to be gone through before you can visit a foreign country.

hanzi: 当了名人的麻烦之一是在街上被人指指点点。
pinyin: dàng le míng rén de má fan zhī yī shì zài jiē shàng bèi rén zhǐ zhǐ diǎn diǎn。
english: One of the penalties of fame is that people point at you on the street.

hanzi: 科学家正在设想一种新的利用太阳能的方法。
pinyin: kē xué jiā zhèng zài shè xiǎng yī zhòng xīn de lì yòng tài yáng néng de fāng fǎ。
english: The scientist is thinking of a new way of tapping the solar energy.

hanzi: 机器使人们有可能用较小的气力做较多的工作。
pinyin: jī qì shǐ rén men yǒu kě néng yòng jiào xiǎo de qì lì zuò jiào duō de gōng zuò。
english: Machines make it possible that people do more work with less energy.

hanzi: 他动不动就发火，可是过后又把它当笑话说。
pinyin: tā dòng bù dòng jiù fā huǒ， kě shì guò hòu yòu bǎ tā dàng xiào huà shuō。
english: He often carries the short fuse in his pocket and joke about it afterwards.

hanzi: 从她的学习成绩单可看出她算术和生物成绩差.
pinyin: zòng tā de xué xí chéng jī shàn kě kàn chū tā suàn shù huò shēng wù chéng jī cī.
english: Her school report shows that she is weak at/in arithmetic and biology.

hanzi: 他将钟表里的发条取了出来，可现在装上不了。
pinyin: tā jiàng zhōng biǎo lǐ de fà tiáo qǔ le chū lai， kě xiàn zài zhuāng shàng bù liǎo。
english: He took the spring out of the clock but now he can't get it back.

hanzi: 新闻广播员正在为八点钟的播音节目作好准备。
pinyin: xīn wén guǎng bō yuán zhèng zài wèi bā diǎn zhōng de bō yīn jié mù zuò hào zhǔn bèi。
english: The news announcer is standing by for the broadcast program at8.

hanzi: 他把大部分东西都搬走了，只留下一些零星杂物。
pinyin: tā bǎ dà bù fen dōng xi dōu bān zǒu le， zhǐ liú xià yī xiē líng xīng zá wù。
english: He's moved most of his stuff, there are just a few odds and ends left.

hanzi: 我知道火车已经停了，但我觉得火车在倒退。
pinyin: wǒ zhī dào huǒ chē yǐ jīng tíng le， dàn wǒ jué de huǒ chē zài dào tuì。
english: I knew the train had stopped, but I had the sensation that it was moving backwards.

hanzi: 她答应在孩子们的妈妈上夜班时照顾这些孩子。
pinyin: tā dā ying zài hái zi men de mā ma shàng yè bān shí zhào gu zhè xie hái zi。
english: She promised to see after the children when their mother were on the night shift.

hanzi: 理事们花了大半个钟头反复认真讨论了这个问题。
pinyin: lǐ shì men huā le dà bàn gè zhōng tóu fǎn fù rèn zhēn tǎo lùn le zhè gè wèn tí。
english: The trustees spent the best part of an hour chewing the matter over.

hanzi: 导游在旅游车的前部向游客作连续的现场解说。
pinyin: dǎo yóu zài lu:3 yóu jū de qián bù xiàng yóu kè zuò lián xù de xiàn chǎng jiě shuō。
english: The tour guide give a running commentary from the front of the coach.

hanzi: 你要想看那场时装表演的话，就得早点儿定座位。
pinyin: nǐ yào xiǎng kàn nà chǎng shí zhuāng biǎo yǎn de huà， jiù de zǎo diǎn er dìng zuò wèi。
english: You'll have to book early if you want to see that fashion show.

hanzi: 我听懂了他们谈话的大意，但没有听懂其中的细节。
pinyin: wǒ tìng dǒng le tā men tán huà de dà yì， dàn méi yǒu tìng dǒng qí zhōng de xì jié。
english: I understood the tenor of their conversation but not the details.

hanzi: 预计需求会有很大增长, 我们应该开足马力生产。
pinyin: yù jì xū qiú kuài yǒu hěn dà zēng zhǎng,  wǒ men yīng gāi kāi zú mǎ lì shēng chǎn。
english: In prospect of increase in demand, we should operate at full capacity.

hanzi: 请在纸的正反两面书写, 但不要写在四周的边上.
pinyin: qǐng zài zhǐ de zhèng fǎn liǎng miàn shū xiě,  dàn bù yào xiě zài sì zhōu de biān shàng.
english: Please write on both sides of the paper, and don't write in the margin.

hanzi: 附言，续篇如一本书或一篇文章正文后的附加信息
pinyin: fù yán， xù piān rú yī běn shū huò yī piān wén zhāng zhēng wén hòu de fù jiā xìn xī
english: Additional information appended to the manuscript, as of a book or an article.

hanzi: 只有知道如何生活的人们, 才会开始认识自己和人生。
pinyin: zhǐ yǒu zhī dào rú hé shēng huó de rén men,  cái kuài kāi shǐ rèn shi zì jǐ huò rén shēng。
english: Only those who learn how to live can come to know themselves and life.

hanzi: 那老汉把他早年在父亲农场上度过的日子看作理想的岁月。

hanzi: 法官否决了以前的判决。

english: The judge overruled the previous decision.

hanzi: 那风景美丽得无法形容。
pinyin: nà fēng jǐng měi lì de wú fǎ xíng róng。
english: The scenery was beautiful beyond expression.

hanzi: 猫的眼睛在黑暗中发亮。
pinyin: māo de yǎn jīng zài hēi àn zhòng fā liàng。
english: The cat's eyes glowed in the darkness.

hanzi: 二月是一年的第二个月份.
pinyin: èr yuè shì yī nián de dì èr gè yuè fèn.
english: February is the second month of the year.

hanzi: 祝愿你来年一切顺利.
pinyin: zhù yuàn nǐ lái nián yī qiè shùn lì.
english: Here's wishing you all the best in the coming year.

hanzi: 这种植物终年常青。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng zhí wù zhōng nián cháng qīng。
english: This plant has green leaves throughout the year.

hanzi: 他解除了和她的婚姻。
pinyin: tā jiě chú le huò tā de hūn yīn。
english: He obtained the dissolution of his marriage with her.

hanzi: 我们用词句来表达思想。
pinyin: wǒ men yòng cí jù lái biǎo dá sī xiǎng。
english: We express our thought by means of words.

hanzi: 一到春天市场就活跃了。
pinyin: yī dào chūn tiān shì chǎng jiù huó yuè le。
english: The market always picks up in the spring.

hanzi: 写给他的信件由律师转交.
pinyin: xiě jǐ tā de xìn jiàn yóu lu:4 shī zhuǎn jiāo.
english: Write to him care of his solicitor.

hanzi: 公司给我配备了一名秘书.
pinyin: gōng sī jǐ wǒ pèi bèi le yī míng mì shū.
english: The firm put a secretary at my disposal.

hanzi: 香味从厨房飘了出来.
pinyin: xiāng wèi zòng chú fáng piāo le chū lai.
english: Delicious smells were emanating from the kitchen.

hanzi: 她觉得自己的工作毫无乐趣。
pinyin: tā jué de zì jǐ de gōng zuò háo wú lè qù。
english: She took no pleasure in her work.

hanzi: 电影使亿万人获得乐趣。
pinyin: diàn yǐng shǐ yì wàn rén huò dé lè qù。
english: Movies give delight to millions of people.

hanzi: 入侵者打败了土著居民.
pinyin: rù qīn zhě dǎ bài le tǔ zhù jū mín.
english: The invaders prevailed over the native population.

hanzi: 社会已分化成两个阶级。
pinyin: shè huì yǐ fēn huà chéng liǎng gè jiē jí。
english: Society has polarized into two classes.

hanzi: 这场比赛我们务必获胜.
pinyin: zhè chǎng bǐ sài wǒ men wù bì huò shèng.
english: We desperately need a result from this match.

hanzi: 他女儿是一个调皮的假小子。
pinyin: tā nu:3 ér shì yī gè tiáo pí de jià xiǎo zi。
english: His daughter is a saucy tomboy.

hanzi: 这所学校保证立见成效。
pinyin: zhè suǒ xué xiào bǎo zhèng lì xiàn chéng xiào。
english: The school promised rapid results.

hanzi: 批改试卷的确是个苦事。
pinyin: pī gǎi shì juàn dí què shì gè kǔ shì。
english: Marking examination papers is a real grind.

hanzi: 他向老板提交了一份报告。
pinyin: tā xiàng lǎo bǎn tí jiāo le yī fèn bào gào。
english: He submitted a report to his boss.

hanzi: 我把汽车彻底检修了一遍。
pinyin: wǒ bǎ qì chē chè dǐ jiǎn xiū le yī biàn。
english: I gave the car a thorough going-over.

hanzi: 她露出天真愉快的神态。
pinyin: tā lù chū tiān zhēn yú kuài de shén tài。
english: She shows a spontaneous gaiety of manner.

hanzi: 这个计划被普遍地接受了。
pinyin: zhè gè jì huà bèi pǔ biàn de jiē shòu le。
english: The plan has been generally accepted.

hanzi: 签名册亲笔签名组成的册子
pinyin: qiān míng cè qīn bǐ qiān míng zǔ chéng de cè zi
english: Autographs considered as a group.

hanzi: 他对人生抱有崇高的理想。
pinyin: tā duì rén shēng bào yǒu chóng gāo de lǐ xiǎng。
english: He has lofty ideals about life.

hanzi: 教师的作用是传授知识。
pinyin: jiào shī de zuò yòng shì chuán shòu zhī shi。
english: A teacher's aim is to impart knowledge.

hanzi: 有五个国家实施这种体制.
pinyin: yǒu wǔ gè guó jiā shí shī zhè zhǒng tǐ zhì.
english: The system operates in five countries.

hanzi: 我队已有资格进入半决赛.
pinyin: wǒ duì yǐ yǒu zī gé jìn rù bàn jué sài.
english: Our team has qualified for the semi-final.

hanzi: 我们担保你在一日内收到.
pinyin: wǒ men dān bǎo nǐ zài yī rì nèi shōu dào.
english: We guarantee you delivery within one day.

hanzi: 我开支票提出一百万美元。
pinyin: wǒ kāi zhī piào tí chū yī bǎi wàn měi yuán。
english: I checked out one million dollars.

hanzi: 这所房子有一段奇怪的来历.
pinyin: zhè suǒ fáng zi yǒu yī duàn qí guài de lái lì.
english: This house has a strange history.

hanzi: 对方合用电话线路的用户
pinyin: duì fāng hé yòng diàn huà xiàn lù de yòng hù
english: A subscriber to a telephone party line.

hanzi: 我出了一趟远门，很疲乏。
pinyin: wǒ chū le yī tàng yuǎn mén， hěn pí fá。
english: I'm tired out. I've had a long journey.

hanzi: 飞机撞上了山而破碎。
pinyin: fēi jī zhuàng shàng le shān ér pò suì。
english: The plane struck on the hill and went to pieces.

hanzi: 我弄不明白他为什么缺席。
pinyin: wǒ nòng bù míng bái tā wèi shén me quē xí。
english: I can't figure out why he is absent.

hanzi: 他们是一群早期的航海家。
pinyin: tā men shì yī qún zǎo qī de háng hǎi jiā。
english: They were a group of early navigators.

hanzi: 这条河从这里转向北方。
pinyin: zhè tiáo hé zòng zhè lǐ zhuǎn xiàng běi fāng。
english: The river turns north at this point.

hanzi: 投资者为这一风险而担心.
pinyin: tóu zī zhě wèi zhè yī fēng xiǎn ér dān xīn.
english: Investors were unhappy about the risk.

hanzi: 明天我们将进行历史测验。
pinyin: míng tiān wǒ men jiàng jìn xíng lì shǐ cè yàn。
english: Tomorrow we'll have a history test.

hanzi: 这是美国作家写的剧本。
pinyin: zhè shì Měi guó zuò jiā xiě de jù běn。
english: This is a play written by an American author.

hanzi: 他们采访各行各业的人.
pinyin: tā men cǎi fǎng gè xìng gè yè de rén.
english: They interview people from all walks of life.

hanzi: 研究总统声明的含义.
pinyin: yán jiū zǒng tǒng shēng míng de hán yì.
english: Study the implications of the president's statement.

hanzi: 我盼望她很快会恢复健康。
pinyin: wǒ pàn wàng tā hěn kuài kuài huī fù jiàn kāng。
english: I trust (that) she'll recover soon.

hanzi: 他按定量发水给水手们。
pinyin: tā àn dìng liàng fà shuǐ jǐ shuǐ shǒu men。
english: He rationed out the water to the sailors.

hanzi: 无数想法划过她的心头。
pinyin: wú shù xiǎng fǎ huà guò tā de xīn tóu。
english: A myriad of thoughts passed through her mind.

hanzi: 我一直期待着和您见面。
pinyin: wǒ yī zhí qī dài zhuó huò nín jiàn miàn。
english: I have been looking forward to seeing you.

hanzi: 第五在一系列或次序上第五个
pinyin: dì wǔ zài yī xì liè huò cì xù shàng dì wǔ gè
english: The fifth in a set or sequence.

hanzi: 不开心是他生病的根源。
pinyin: bù kāi xīn shì tā shēng bìng de gēn yuán。
english: Unhappiness is the root cause of his illness.

hanzi: 她一演唱剧院就满座.
pinyin: tā yī yǎn chàng jù yuàn jiù mǎn zuò.
english: Opera houses were packed out whenever she was singing.

hanzi: 海报上的字体非常醒目.
pinyin: hǎi bào shàng de zì tǐ fēi cháng Xǐng mù.
english: The lettering on the poster is very eye-catching.

hanzi: 他给了她一个简短生硬的回答.
pinyin: tā jǐ le tā yī gè jiǎn duǎn shēng yìng de huí dá.
english: He gave her a short answer.

hanzi: 他说话带着美国英语口音。
pinyin: tā shuō huà dài zhuó Měi guó Yīng yǔ kǒu yīn。
english: He spoke with an American accent.

hanzi: 自燃的在空气中自发地燃烧的
pinyin: zì rán de zài kōng qì zhòng zì fā de rán shāo de
english: Spontaneously igniting in air.

hanzi: 犯人趁着天黑逃跑了。
pinyin: fàn rén chèn zhuó tiān hēi táo pǎo le。
english: The criminal escaped under the cover of darkness.

hanzi: 他的邻居是一个乘务员领班。
pinyin: tā de lín jū shì yī gè chéng wù yuán lǐng bān。
english: His neighbor is a chief steward.

hanzi: 我挤过了堆满货物的集市。
pinyin: wǒ jǐ guò le duī mǎn huò wù de jí shì。
english: I poked though a bazaar crammed with good.

hanzi: 我们预料需求可能增加.
pinyin: wǒ men yù liào xū qiú kě néng zēng jiā.
english: We anticipate that demand is likely to increase.

hanzi: 英语现在通用于全世界。
pinyin: Yīng yǔ xiàn zài tōng yòng yú quán shì jiè。
english: English is spoken all over the world today.

hanzi: 你用圆珠笔或铅笔书写均可.
pinyin: nǐ yòng yuán zhū bǐ huò qiān bǐ shū xiě jūn kě.
english: You may write in biro or pencil.

hanzi: 这严重地伤害了她的自尊心。
pinyin: zhè yán zhòng de shāng hài le tā de zì zūn xīn。
english: It was a severe hurt to her pride.

hanzi: 我希望这件事尽快做好.
pinyin: wǒ xī wàng zhè jiàn shì jǐn kuài zuò hào.
english: I want it (to be) done as quickly as possible.

hanzi: 他的死标志著一个时代的结束.
pinyin: tā de sǐ biāo zhì著 yī gè shí dài de jié shù.
english: His death marked the end of an era.

hanzi: 他将于四月三日来看你。
pinyin: tā jiàng yú sì yuè sān rì lái kàn nǐ。
english: He will come to see you on the third of April.

hanzi: 他们已经在油菜地里播了种。
pinyin: tā men yǐ jīng zài yóu cài de lǐ bō le zhòng。
english: They seeded in the field of rape.

hanzi: 要把球接住, 不要让它落地.
pinyin: yào bǎ qiú jiē zhù,  bù yào ràng tā luò dì.
english: Try to catch the ball before it lands.

hanzi: 他向门口走去, 企图逃跑。
pinyin: tā xiàng mén kǒu zǒu qù,  qǐ tú táo pǎo。
english: He made for the door and tried to escape.

hanzi: 和平是大会的首要议题。
pinyin: hé píng shì dà huì de shǒu yào yì tí。
english: Peace was the dominant theme of the conference.

hanzi: 教育体制要作许多改革。
pinyin: jiào yù tǐ zhì yào zuò xǔ duō gǎi gé。
english: Many reforms must be made to the education system.

hanzi: 尖的，尖锐的有尖点或尖端的
pinyin: jiān de， jiān ruì de yǒu jiān diǎn huò jiān duān de
english: Having a sharp point or tip.

hanzi: 登山队员在半山腰扎营.
pinyin: dēng shān duì yuán zài bàn shān yāo zā yíng.
english: The climbers made camp half-way up the peak.

hanzi: 排长叫他的士兵向后转。
pinyin: pái zhǎng jiào tā de shì bīng xiàng hòu zhuàn。
english: The platoon leader faced his men about.

hanzi: 一月份生产率达到最高点。
pinyin: yī yuè fèn shēng chǎn lu:4 dá dào zuì gāo diǎn。
english: Productivity peaked in January.

hanzi: 李先生显然是要移民了。
pinyin: lǐ xiān sheng xiǎn ran shì yào yí mín le。
english: To all appearance, Mr. Li is going to migrate.

hanzi: 参加马拉松长跑要有耐力.
pinyin: cān jiā mǎ lá sōng zhǎng pǎo yào yǒu nài lì.
english: Marathon runners need plenty of stamina.

hanzi: 这样的是没有不摔跟头的。
pinyin: zhè yàng de shì méi yǒu bù shuāi gēn tou de。
english: Such people are bound to trip and fall.

hanzi: 把这些次货退还给厂家.
pinyin: bǎ zhè xie cì huò tuì huán jǐ chǎng jiā.
english: Send these faulty goods back to the manufacturer.

hanzi: 她对着镜子作出各种面容。
pinyin: tā duì zhuó jìng zi zuò chū gè zhǒng miàn róng。
english: She was making faces in the glass.

hanzi: 这个房间是供妇女专用的。
pinyin: zhè gè fáng jiān shì gòng fù nu:3 zhuān yòng de。
english: This room is exclusively for women.

hanzi: 他们出动军队包围了该城.
pinyin: tā men chū dòng jūn duì bāo wéi le gāi chéng.
english: They have surrounded the town with troops.

hanzi: 不开心是他生病的根源。
pinyin: bù kāi xīn shì tā shēng bìng de gēn yuán。
english: Unhappiness is the root cause of his illness.

hanzi: 这个问题又以新的形式出现。
pinyin: zhè gè wèn tí yòu yǐ xīn de xíng shì chū xiàn。
english: The problem has assumed a new form.

hanzi: 这个问题又以新的形式出现。
pinyin: zhè gè wèn tí yòu yǐ xīn de xíng shì chū xiàn。
english: The problem has assumed a new form.

hanzi: 我们谈话时她老是插嘴.
pinyin: wǒ men tán huà shí tā lǎo shi chā zuǐ.
english: She kept cutting in on/cutting into our conversation.

hanzi: 所有的植物都需要水和阳光。
pinyin: suǒ yǒu de zhí wù dōu xū yào shuǐ huò yáng guāng。
english: All plants need water and light.

hanzi: 法官将于明天做出判决。
pinyin: fǎ guān jiàng yú míng tiān zuò chū pàn jué。
english: The judge will give his decision tomorrow.

hanzi: 她示范最有效的自卫方法.
pinyin: tā shì fàn zuì yǒu xiào de zì wèi fāng fǎ.
english: She demonstrated how best to defend oneself.

hanzi: 他显示了对阿拉伯语的精通。
pinyin: tā xiǎn shì le duì ē lā bó yù de jīng tōng。
english: He demonstrated a mastery of Arabic.

hanzi: 这场战争的结局难以预料.
pinyin: zhè chǎng zhàn zhēng de jié jú nán yǐ yù liào.
english: You can't foretell how the war will end.

hanzi: 反对该议案的人举手。
pinyin: fǎn duì gāi yì àn de rén jǔ shǒu。
english: Those who are in opposition to the bill put up your hand.

hanzi: 汽车的声音消失在远方.
pinyin: qì chē de shēng yīn xiāo shī zài yuǎn fāng.
english: The noise of the car died away in the distance.

hanzi: 我们的信在邮寄途中错过去了.
pinyin: wǒ men de xìn zài yóu jì tú zhōng cuò guò qù le.
english: Our letters crossed in the post.

hanzi: 我认为大量阅读是必要的。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi dà liàng yuè dú shì bì yào de。
english: I think it's necessary for us to read a lot.

hanzi: 兵马未动, 粮草先行。
pinyin: bīng mǎ wèi dòng,  liáng cǎo xiān xíng。
english: Food and fodder should go ahead of troops and horses.

hanzi: 他们让犯人与原告对质。
pinyin: tā men ràng fàn rén yù yuán gào duì zhì。
english: They confronted the prisoner with his accusers.

hanzi: 人们叫喊著为选手打气.
pinyin: rén men jiào hǎn著 wèi xuǎn shǒu dǎ qì.
english: The crowd yelled (out) encouragement at the players.

hanzi: 他似乎不太合乎我们的要求.
pinyin: tā sì hu bù tài hé hū wǒ men de yāo qiú.
english: He doesn't seem equal to meeting our demands.

hanzi: 只应在同类事物中作比较.
pinyin: zhǐ yìng zài tóng lèi shì wù zhòng zuò bǐ jiào.
english: You should only compare like with like.

hanzi: 出版商们总吹捧他们的新书
pinyin: chū bǎn shāng men zǒng chuī pěng tā men de xīn shū
english: Publishers who puff their new books.

hanzi: 南看台上响起一片欢呼声.
pinyin: nán kàn tái shàng xiǎng qǐ yī piàn huān hū shēng.
english: A cheer rose from the south stand(s).

hanzi: 许多旧的制度都已经失效。
pinyin: xǔ duō jiù de zhì dù dōu yǐ jīng shī xiào。
english: Many old rules are not in force any more.

hanzi: 他用手指摸到了灯的开关.
pinyin: tā yòng shǒu zhǐ mó dào le dēng de kāi guān.
english: His questing fingers found the light switch.

hanzi: 那个标志误人，它使我迷了路。
pinyin: nèi gè biāo zhì wù rén， tā shǐ wǒ mí le lù。
english: The misleading sign led me astray.

hanzi: 他父亲打发他到他叔父家去。
pinyin: tā fù qīn dǎ fa tā dào tā shū fù jiā qù。
english: His father sent him off to his uncle's.

hanzi: 晚餐吃剩的东西被收去了。
pinyin: wǎn cān jí shèng de dōng xi bèi shōu qù le。
english: The remains of the supper were taken away.

hanzi: 警方查获了各种书和磁带.
pinyin: jǐng fāng chá huò le gè zhǒng shū huò cí dài.
english: The police seized various books and tapes.

hanzi: 这个地区过去大量种棉花。
pinyin: zhè gè dì qū guò qu dà liàng zhòng mián hua。
english: This district grew cotton on a large scale.

hanzi: 她用步子测量了房间的长度.
pinyin: tā yòng bù zi cè liàng le fáng jiān de cháng dù.
english: She paced out the length of the room.

hanzi: 那个孩子紧抓着他的玩具不放。
pinyin: nèi gè hái zi jǐn zhuā zhuó tā de wán jù bù fàng。
english: The child clutched his toy.

hanzi: 我对现状根本不满意。
pinyin: wǒ duì xiàn zhuàng gēn běn bù mǎn yì。
english: I am not at all satisfied with the present situation.

hanzi: 她美妙的声音把他们迷住了。
pinyin: tā měi miào de shēng yīn bǎ tā men mí zhù le。
english: Her beautiful voice fascinated them.

hanzi: 他先在脸盆里倒了一些水。
pinyin: tā xiān zài liǎn pén lǐ dào le yī xiē shuǐ。
english: He first poured some water in the basin.

hanzi: 这机器一触即可停止或开动.
pinyin: zhè jī qì yī chù jí kě tíng zhǐ huò kāi dòng.
english: The machine stops and starts at a touch.

hanzi: 人们叫喊著为选手打气.
pinyin: rén men jiào hǎn著 wèi xuǎn shǒu dǎ qì.
english: The crowd yelled (out) encouragement at the players.

hanzi: 英语现在通用于全世界。
pinyin: Yīng yǔ xiàn zài tōng yòng yú quán shì jiè。
english: English is spoken all over the world today.

hanzi: 这里的邮政服务很不可靠。
pinyin: zhè lǐ de yóu zhèng fú wù hěn bù kě kào。
english: The postal service here is very unreliable.

hanzi: 印度是大象和老虎的产地。
pinyin: Yìn dù shì dà xiàng huò lǎo hǔ de chǎn dì。
english: India is the home of elephants and tigers.

hanzi: 他已经激发了全民的同情.
pinyin: tā yǐ jīng jī fā le quán mín de tóng qíng.
english: He succeeded in arousing the nation's sympathy.

hanzi: 医生献身于医治病人。
pinyin: yī shēng xiàn shēn yú yī zhì bìng rén。
english: A doctor's life is consecrated to curing sick people.

hanzi: 他就是那个多处受伤的人。
pinyin: tā jiù shì nèi gè duō chù shòu shāng de rén。
english: He is the person with multiple injuries.

hanzi: 她想方设法惹我发脾气。
pinyin: tā xiǎng fāng shè fǎ rě wǒ fà pí qì。
english: She tried to needle me into losing my temper.

hanzi: 房东正在逼她搬家.
pinyin: fáng dōng zhèng zài bī tā bān jiā.
english: The landlord's putting the screws on to get her out of the house.

hanzi: 我的支出受我的收入限制。
pinyin: wǒ de zhī chū shòu wǒ de shōu rù xiàn zhì。
english: My expenditure is conditioned by my income.

hanzi: 日光的照射使颜色变淡了。
pinyin: rì guāng de zhào shè shǐ yán sè biàn dàn le。
english: The sunlight has bleached the colour out.

hanzi: 早日举行大选确有可能.
pinyin: zǎo rì jǔ xíng dà xuǎn què yǒu kě néng.
english: An early general election is certainly on the cards.

hanzi: 他们把他替换下来真不错。
pinyin: tā men bǎ tā tì huàn xia lai zhēn bù cuò。
english: Good job they have get a replacement for him.

hanzi: 留心那级台阶，它有点松动了。
pinyin: liú xīn nà jí tái jiē， tā yǒu diǎn sōng dòng le。
english: Mind that step; it's loose!

hanzi: 那个疲乏的人渴望能休息一会。
pinyin: nèi gè pí fá de rén kě wàng néng xiū xi yī huì。
english: The tired man craved for rest.

hanzi: 他的邻居是一个乘务员领班。
pinyin: tā de lín jū shì yī gè chéng wù yuán lǐng bān。
english: His neighbor is a chief steward.

hanzi: 他们为促进世界和平而努力.
pinyin: tā men wèi cù jìn shì jiè hé píng ér nǔ lì.
english: They worked for the promotion of world peace.

hanzi: 今年的农产品很丰富。
pinyin: jīn nián de nóng chǎn pǐn hěn fēng fù。
english: The agricultural commodities are abundant this year.

hanzi: 换质法推导一个命题的方法
pinyin: huàn zhì fǎ tuī dǎo yī gè mìng tí de fāng fǎ
english: Inference of the obverse of a proposition.

hanzi: 他尽其所能去赢得他的好感。
pinyin: tā jìn qí suǒ néng qù yíng dé tā de hǎo gǎn。
english: He did all he could to win his favor.

hanzi: 她预测情况将继续好转.
pinyin: tā yù cè qíng kuàng jiàng jì xù hǎo zhuǎn.
english: She predicted that the improvement would continue.

hanzi: 我的房东让我月底搬走.
pinyin: wǒ de fáng dōng ràng wǒ yuè dǐ bān zǒu.
english: My landlord is turning me out at the end of the month.

hanzi: 这儿是共和主义运动的据点。
pinyin: zhèr shì gòng hé zhǔ yì yùn dòng de jù diǎn。
english: Here is a stronghold of republicanism.

hanzi: 风景不如你描述的那么好。
pinyin: fēng jǐng bù rú nǐ miáo shù de nà me hào。
english: The scene is nothing like what you described.

hanzi: 有两座新房子正在修建。
pinyin: yǒu liǎng zuò xīn fáng zi zhèng zài xiū jiàn。
english: There are two new houses under construction.

hanzi: 我们被美丽的景色迷住了。
pinyin: wǒ men bèi měi lì de jǐng sè mí zhù le。
english: The beauty of the scene filled us with enchantment.

hanzi: 证人是一名在现场的记者。
pinyin: zhèng ren shì yī míng zài xiàn chǎng de jì zhě。
english: The witness is an on-the-spot reporter.

hanzi: 我们应该接受用户的建议。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi jiē shòu yòng hù de jiàn yì。
english: We should adopt the consumers' suggestion.

hanzi: 政府已经建了两个难民营。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ yǐ jīng jiàn le liǎng gè nàn mín yíng。
english: The government has set two refugee camps.

hanzi: 所有的提议现在均已落实。
pinyin: suǒ yǒu de tí yì xiàn zài jūn yǐ luò shí。
english: All the proposals have now been carried out.

hanzi: 她预测情况将继续好转.
pinyin: tā yù cè qíng kuàng jiàng jì xù hǎo zhuǎn.
english: She predicted that the improvement would continue.

hanzi: 现在，我们应乘机反攻。
pinyin: xiàn zài， wǒ men yìng chéng jī fǎn gōng。
english: We should seize the opportunity to counterattack.

hanzi: 她步子很轻, 以免惊醒孩子.
pinyin: tā bù zi hěn qīng,  yǐ miǎn jīng xǐng hái zi.
english: She trod lightly so as not to wake the baby.

hanzi: 大量众多的状态或者特性
pinyin: dà liàng zhòng duō de zhuàng tài huò zhě tè xìng
english: The condition or quality of being numerous.

hanzi: 这儿的气候和台北非常相似。
pinyin: zhèr de qì hòu huò Tái běi fēi cháng xiāng sì。
english: The climate here is like that of Taipei.

hanzi: 效能有功效的特征或性质
pinyin: xiào néng yǒu gōng xiào de tè zhēng huò xìng zhì
english: The quality or property of being efficient.

hanzi: 他十分勇敢, 勇于面对危险。
pinyin: tā shí fēn yǒng gǎn,  yǒng yú miàn duì wēi xiǎn。
english: He is brave enough to face dangers.

hanzi: 现在，我们应乘机反攻。
pinyin: xiàn zài， wǒ men yìng chéng jī fǎn gōng。
english: We should seize the opportunity to counterattack.

hanzi: 别为我担心，只管进行下去。
pinyin: biè wèi wǒ dān xīn， zhǐ guǎn jìn xíng xià qu。
english: Don't worry about me. Just carry on.

hanzi: 讲这个故事的时候配有图片.
pinyin: jiǎng zhè gè gù shì de shí hou pèi yǒu tú piàn.
english: The story is told in words and pictures.

hanzi: 战争因军火不足而失败。
pinyin: zhàn zhēng yīn jūn huǒ bù zú ér shī bài。
english: The war was lost because of a shortage of munitions.

hanzi: 那个胆小鬼被团里开除了。
pinyin: nèi gè dǎn xiǎo guǐ bèi tuán lǐ kāi chú le。
english: The coward was drummed out of the regiment.

hanzi: 他的工作符合了我们的期望。
pinyin: tā de gōng zuò fú hé le wǒ men de qī wàng。
english: His work comes up to what we expect of him.

hanzi: 他的本性与弄虚作假格格不入.
pinyin: tā de běn xìng yù nòng xū zuò jià gé gé bù rù.
english: Dishonesty is foreign to his nature.

hanzi: 在这种地方保密是不可能的。
pinyin: zài zhè zhǒng dì fang bǎo mì shì bù kě néng de。
english: In this place privacy is impossible.

hanzi: 连结，连系有连系的系列或群体
pinyin: lián jié， lián xì yǒu lián xì de xì liè huò qún tǐ
english: A connected series or group.

hanzi: 他用肩膀用力顶那房门.
pinyin: tā yòng jiān bǎng yòng lì dǐng nà fáng mén.
english: He pushed hard against the door with his shoulder.

hanzi: 照片背面衬上了一层纸板.
pinyin: zhào piàn bèi miàn chèn shàng le yī céng zhǐ bǎn.
english: The photograph was backed with cardboard.

hanzi: 反英宣传触犯了众怒.
pinyin: fǎn yīng xuān chuán chù fàn le zhòng nù.
english: The anti-British propaganda gave (ie caused) much offence.

hanzi: 他真心诚意地愿意帮助我们。
pinyin: tā zhēn xīn chéng yì de yuàn yì bāng zhù wǒ men。
english: He has a genuine desire to help us.

hanzi: 她想创造跳高世界纪录.
pinyin: tā xiǎng chuàng zào tiào gāo shì jiè jì lù.
english: She's going for the world record in the high jump.

hanzi: 我们与本地人的交往有限。
pinyin: wǒ men yù běn dì rén de jiāo wǎng yǒu xiàn。
english: We had only limited communion with the natives.

hanzi: 大家的反应如何难以估计。
pinyin: dà jiā de fǎn yìng rú hé nán yǐ gū jì。
english: It was difficult to gauge how people would respond.

hanzi: 他指挥分发食物给难民。
pinyin: tā zhǐ huī fēn fā shí wù jǐ nàn mín。
english: He directed the dispensation of food to the refugees.

hanzi: 他虽有体验却无长进.
pinyin: tā suī yǒu tǐ yàn què wú zhǎng jìn.
english: He hasn't benefited from (ie become wiser with) the experience.

hanzi: 他在布告板上贴了一张公告。
pinyin: tā zài bù gào bǎn shàng tiē le yī zhāng gōng gào。
english: He posted a bulletin on the board.

hanzi: 在网球赛中，他们是对手。
pinyin: zài wǎng qiú sài zhòng， tā men shì duì shǒu。
english: They were adversaries in the tennis match.

hanzi: 她做出决定后立即感到后悔。
pinyin: tā zuò chū jué dìng hòu lì jí gǎn dào hòu huǐ。
english: She immediately regretted her decision.

hanzi: 他企图收买警察放他一马。
pinyin: tā qǐ tú shōu mǎi jǐng chá fàng tā yī mǎ。
english: He tried to bribe the police into connivance.

hanzi: 你可以看到夜空中的星群。
pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ kàn dào yè kōng zhōng de xīng qún。
english: You can see stars in clusters in the night sky.

hanzi: 一种有极限或界限的量值。
pinyin: yī zhòng yǒu jí xiàn huò jiè xiàn de liàng zhí。
english: A quantity that has a limit or boundary.

hanzi: 这个淡水湖里有许多种鱼。
pinyin: zhè gè dàn shuǐ hú lǐ yǒu xǔ duō zhòng yú。
english: There are many fish in this freshwater lake.

hanzi: 无人能否认火能燃烧的事实.
pinyin: wú rén néng fǒu rèn huǒ néng rán shāo de shì shí.
english: No one can deny the fact that fire burns.

hanzi: 她具备做一个优秀教师的素质
pinyin: tā jù bèi zuò yī gè yōu xiù jiào shī de sù zhì
english: She has the makings of a fine teacher.

hanzi: 我总是由他联想到高速汽车.
pinyin: wǒ zǒng shì yóu tā lián xiǎng dào gāo sù qì chē.
english: I always associate him with fast cars.

hanzi: 他对这个地区进行了多次视察。
pinyin: tā duì zhè gè dì qū jìn xíng le duō cì shì chá。
english: He made a number of inspections.

hanzi: 夜间的寒气使他感到冰冷彻骨。
pinyin: yè jiān de hán qì shǐ tā gǎn dào bīng lěng chè gǔ。
english: The night air chilled his bones.

hanzi: 我找到几个助手散发传单.
pinyin: wǒ zhǎo dào jǐ ge zhù shǒu sàn fā chuán dān.
english: I rustled up a few helpers to hand out leaflets.

hanzi: 我伸手到桌子那端去拿果酱.
pinyin: wǒ shēn shǒu dào zhuō zi nà duān qù ná guǒ jiàng.
english: I reached across the table for the jam.

hanzi: 医院进口了一些外科器械。
pinyin: yī yuàn jìn kǒu le yī xiē wài kē qì xiè。
english: The hospital imported some surgical instruments.

hanzi: 这建筑物的外观很不起眼.
pinyin: zhè jiàn zhù wù de wài guān hěn bù qǐ yǎn.
english: The exterior of the building is very unattractive.

hanzi: 克林顿就职美国总统。
pinyin: kè Lín dùn jiù zhí Měi guó zǒng tǒng。
english: Mr. Clinton was inaugurated as the President of the U.S.A.

hanzi: 他庄重地保证把事情办好。
pinyin: tā zhuāng zhòng de bǎo zhèng bǎ shì qing bàn hào。
english: He gave his solemn promise to do better.

hanzi: 我找到几个助手散发传单.
pinyin: wǒ zhǎo dào jǐ ge zhù shǒu sàn fā chuán dān.
english: I rustled up a few helpers to hand out leaflets.

hanzi: 他们用机枪扫射进攻的敌军.
pinyin: tā men yòng jī qiāng sào shè jìn gōng de dí jūn.
english: They machine-gunned the advancing troops.

hanzi: 我迫不及待地想听到这个消息。
pinyin: wǒ pò bù jí dài de xiǎng tīng dào zhè gè xiāo xi。
english: I can hardly wait to hear the news.

hanzi: 在度假淡季，度假费用较低。
pinyin: zài dù jià dàn jì， dù jià fèi yòng jiào dī。
english: Holiday prices are lower out of season.

hanzi: 由于湿度高，工作很困难。
pinyin: yóu yú shī dù gāo， gōng zuò hěn kùn nan。
english: It's difficult to work because of the humidity.

hanzi: 他很真诚, 不由得我不信任他.
pinyin: tā hěn zhēn chéng,  bù yóu de wǒ bù xìn rèn tā.
english: His sincerity inclines me to trust him.

hanzi: 警方正在忙着捕捉逃犯。
pinyin: jǐng fāng zhèng zài máng zhuó bǔ zhuō táo fàn。
english: The police are on the run to catch the murderer.

hanzi: 士兵离开营房得登记签字.
pinyin: shì bīng lí kāi yíng fáng de dēng jì qiān zì.
english: Soldiers sign out when they leave the barracks.

hanzi: 我对电脑的维修保养很在行。
pinyin: wǒ duì diàn nǎo de wéi xiū bǎo yǎng hěn zài xìng。
english: Maintenance of PC is in my element.

hanzi: 我要是不戴眼镜十分近视。
pinyin: wǒ yào shì bù dài yǎn jìng shí fēn jìn shì。
english: I'm very near-sighted without my glasses on.

hanzi: 该领事馆已升格为大使馆.
pinyin: gāi lǐng shì guǎn yǐ shēng gé wèi dà shǐ guǎn.
english: The consulate was upgraded to embassy status.

hanzi: 中国是一个原油丰富的国家。
pinyin: Zhōng guó shì yī gè yuán yóu fēng fù de guó jiā。
english: China is a country rich in crude oil.

hanzi: 这是他最不可能做的尝试。
pinyin: zhè shì tā zuì bù kě néng zuò de cháng shì。
english: This is the last attempt (that) he would make.

hanzi: 我妻子把一切都交给我掌管。
pinyin: wǒ qī zi bǎ yī qiè dōu jiāo gěi wǒ zhǎng guǎn。
english: My wife put everything under my charge.

hanzi: 许多人排队等著看那部电影.
pinyin: xǔ duō rén pái duì děng著 kàn nà bù diàn yǐng.
english: A lot of people were queuing for the film.

hanzi: 我确信他是个可靠的接班人。
pinyin: wǒ què xìn tā shì gè kě kào de jiē bān rén。
english: I am sure that he is a reliable successor.

hanzi: 他们的案件现在正在讨论中。
pinyin: tā men de àn jiàn xiàn zài zhèng zài tǎo lùn zhòng。
english: Their case is now under discussion.

hanzi: 她用步子量出了花园的长度。
pinyin: tā yòng bù zi liàng chū le huā yuán de cháng dù。
english: She paced out the length of the garden.

hanzi: 新的法规已得到国王的批准。
pinyin: xīn de fǎ guī yǐ dé dào guó wáng de pī zhǔn。
english: The new law has received the royal assent.

hanzi: 水手很利落地把绳子放出去了.
pinyin: shuǐ shǒu hěn lì luò dì bǎ shéng zi fàng chū qù le.
english: The sailor ran the line out neatly.

hanzi: 她渐渐出落成美丽的姑娘。
pinyin: tā jiàn jiàn chū luò chéng měi lì de gū niang。
english: She is growing into a beautiful young woman.

hanzi: 没有人敢把视线离开地面。
pinyin: méi yǒu rén gǎn bǎ shì xiàn lí kāi dì miàn。
english: Nobody dared lift their eyes from the ground.

hanzi: 近年来她写的书质量下降了.
pinyin: jìn nián lái tā xiě de shū zhì liàng xià jiàng le.
english: Her books have gone off in recent years.

hanzi: 他的传记就是一部科研记实.
pinyin: tā de zhuàn jì jiù shì yī bù kē yán jì shí.
english: His biography is a saga of scientific research.

hanzi: 我们必须促进与邻国的贸易.
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū cù jìn yù lín guó de mào yì.
english: We must promote commerce with neighbouring countries.

hanzi: 我觉得她非常冷淡, 不好相处.
pinyin: wǒ jué de tā fēi cháng lěng dàn,  bù hǎo xiāng chǔ.
english: I find her very aloof and unfriendly.

hanzi: 新石器新石器时代的石头器具
pinyin: xīn shí qì xīn shí qì shí dài de shí tou qì jù
english: A stone implement of the Neolithic Period.

hanzi: 老师对于我的迟到并不在意。
pinyin: lǎo shī duì yú wǒ de chí dào bìng bù zài yì。
english: Our teacher didn't mind my coming in late.

hanzi: 医生开处方给病人配药。
pinyin: yī shēng kāi chǔ fāng jǐ bìng rén pèi yào。
english: The doctor dispensed a prescription to his patient.

hanzi: 有所得也可能有所失.
pinyin: yǒu suǒ de yě kě néng yǒu suǒ shī.
english: What you gain on the swings you'll probably lose on the roundabouts.

hanzi: 那会议自始至终十分无聊.
pinyin: nà huì yì zì shǐ zhì zhōng shí fēn wú liáo.
english: The meeting was one big yawn from start to finish.

hanzi: 过量喝酒对你的身体有害。
pinyin: guò liàng hē jiǔ duì nǐ de shēn tǐ yǒu hài。
english: It is harmful to your health to drink too much.

hanzi: 我确信某一天他会成功的。
pinyin: wǒ què xìn mǒu yī tiān tā kuài chéng gōng de。
english: I am sure he will succeed one day or another.

hanzi: 你对那段距离的判断十分精确.
pinyin: nǐ duì nà duàn jù lí de pàn duàn shí fēn jīng què.
english: You judged the distance to a nicety.

hanzi: 结果证明一切都是场骗局。
pinyin: jié guǒ zhèng míng yī qiè dōu shì chǎng piàn jú。
english: It proved that everything was a mare's nest.

hanzi: 我的计算机里有很多软件。
pinyin: wǒ de jì suàn jī lǐ yǒu hěn duō ruǎn jiàn。
english: There are many sorts of software in my computer.

hanzi: 谈判取得了良好的进展.
pinyin: tán pàn qǔ dé le liáng hǎo de jìn zhǎn.
english: Positive progress has been achieved during the negotiations.

hanzi: 我把这本书从头到尾看完了。
pinyin: wǒ bǎ zhè běn shū cóng tóu dào wěi kàn wán le。
english: I've read the book from beginning to end.

hanzi: 有学生向路人散发传单.
pinyin: yǒu xué sheng xiàng lù rén sàn fā chuán dān.
english: There were students dishing out leaflets to passers-by.

hanzi: 她对我的态度有点儿冷淡.
pinyin: tā duì wǒ de tài du yǒu diǎn er lěng dàn.
english: There was a certain coldness in her attitude towards me.

hanzi: 漏斗状物外形象漏斗的物体
pinyin: lòu dǒu zhuàng wù wài xíng xiàng lòu dǒu de wù tǐ
english: Something resembling this utensil in shape.

hanzi: 英国队和意大利队并列第二.
pinyin: Yīng guó duì huò yì dà lì duì bìng liè dì èr.
english: Britain are tied with Italy for second place.

pinyin: wèi shēng dāng jú zhèng diào chá zhè jiàn shì.
english: The health authorities are investigating the matter.

pinyin: zhè lu:4 shī miǎn fèi chéng bàn nèi gè àn jiàn。
english: The lawyer undertook the case without a fee.

pinyin: zhè wèi cān yì yuán tóu piào zhī chí zǒng tǒng。
english: The senator voted to support the president.

pinyin: jǐng fāng zhèng zài máng zhuó bǔ zhuō táo fàn。
english: The police are on the run to catch the murderer.

pinyin: tā jí lì fǎn duì bié rén shuō tā shì lì yǎn.
english: She protested strongly at being called a snob.

pinyin: tā jí lì qiáng diào gāi jì huà de hǎo chu.

pinyin: tā yǐ yī gè shēn qíng de yōng bào lái yíng jiē tā。

english: Interest rate generally fluctuates in a cyclical manner.

pinyin: nà yī dài hǎi àn méi yǒu ān quán de dēng lù chù.
english: There is no safe landing on that coast.

english: A line that establishes or marks a border.

pinyin: wǒ xū yào de bù guò shì yī jiàn yàng pǐn ér yǐ。

english: Flowers are often fertilized by bees as they gather nectar.

english: The mess has ordered some new furniture.

english: A tramp come to the door and ask for food.

pinyin: zài léi yǔ qī jiān bù yào zhàn zài shù xià。

english: Oil from these fields is priced in dollars.

pinyin: liù diǎn zhōng wǒ men zhàn hào duì zhǔn bèi cāo liàn。

pinyin: tā zhēn yǒu dǎn liàng,  jìng gǎn duì kàng shàng si.
english: It was courageous of her to opposeher boss.

hanzi: 易腐烂的食物要尽快吃掉.
pinyin: yì fǔ làn de shí wù yào jǐn kuài jí diào.
english: Perishables need to be consumed as quickly as possible.

hanzi: 言语是他那一行必不可少的工具。
pinyin: yán yǔ shì tā nà yī xíng bì bù kě shào de gōng jù。
english: Words are the tools of his trade.

english: I've got two tickets for the Cup Final.

pinyin: nǐ duì dì wèi zhēn shì yī diǎnr yě bù zài hu。
english: You don't really care a fig about status.

pinyin: zhè yī shì gù bǎ qì chē sǔn huài de hěn lì hai.
english: The accident did a lot of damage to the car.

pinyin: zhè zhǒng shì qing zhǐ néng sī xià chǔ lǐ。
english: This sort of business can only be transacted in private.

hanzi: 利率常以周期方式浮动。
pinyin: lì lu:4 cháng yǐ zhōu qī fāng shì fú dòng。
english: Interest rate generally fluctuates in a cyclical manner.

english: The best conductor is silver. Copper comes next.

english: The delays put the whole schedule out of joint.

pinyin: zhè cì hǎi zhàn yǐ wǒ men de shèng lì ér gào zhōng。

pinyin: qiè gē bù fen zòng zhǔ tǐ shàng qiè gē xia lai de bù fen
english: A part cut off from a main body.

english: They've closed the road because of an accident.

pinyin: zài rì guāng xià kàn,  yán sè xiǎn de bù tóng.
english: The colours look different when viewed in daylight.

pinyin: wǒ men zài hǎi biān dù guò le yú kuài de shí guāng。

english: Powers tried to throw the sword into the scale.

english: He is expected to win the game with ease.

pinyin: tā rèn wéi dàng jiào shì shì zì jǐ de shǐ mìng.
english: He believes it is his calling to become a priest.

pinyin: huà rù xìn yòng kǎ de qián kě yǐ suí shí zhī qǔ。
english: Money put into the credit cards is at call.

pinyin: běn hé tong liǎng zhòng wén běn tóng děng yǒu xiào。
english: Both texts of the contract are equally valid.

pinyin: zhè gè gōng sī yòu yǒu xīn rén yuán jiā rù。
english: Several new members have come into this corporation.

pinyin: yī gè rén de yì著 kě fǎn yìng chū qí gè xìng.
english: Your clothes are a reflection of your personality.

pinyin: wǒ zhú bù gòu xiǎng chū xiǎo shuō de qíng jié.
english: The plot for the novel gradually developed in my mind.

pinyin: zhēng yuè shì yī nián dāng zhōng zuì lěng de yuè fèn。
english: January is the coldest month in a year.

pinyin: tā huí dá de tài jiǎn duǎn,  jǐ jiǎn le fèn.
english: She was marked down because her answers were too short.

pinyin: guó wáng jù jué píng lùn xuǎn jǔ de jié guǒ。
english: The king refuses to comment on the election results.

pinyin: tā men zhàn zài nà， hù xiāng nù shì zhuó duì fāng。
english: They stood there, glaring at each other.

pinyin: wǒ men de gōng sī shí xíng gòng tóng zé rèn zhì.
english: Our business is a joint/shared responsibility.

hanzi: 我已经准备好与你较量力气。
pinyin: wǒ yǐ jīng zhǔn bèi hào yù nǐ jiào liàng lì qi。
english: I'm ready to match my strength against yours.

hanzi: 别把镜头弄脏了, 我刚刚擦过.
pinyin: biè bǎ jìng tóu nòng zāng le,  wǒ gāng gang cā guò.
english: Don't smear the lens; I've just polished it.

pinyin: bǎ zhè xie zì àn zì mǔ biǎo shùn xù pái liè qǐ lai.
english: Put these words in alphabetical order.

pinyin: tā men de yǒu yì gēn yǐ wǎng yí yàng qīn mì。
english: Their friendship was as close as ever it had been.

hanzi: 请把这份文件依次传递给他人。
pinyin: qǐng bǎ zhè fèn wén jiàn yī cì chuán dì jǐ tā rén。
english: Please hand on the document to others.

hanzi: 请把这份文件依次传递给他人。
pinyin: qǐng bǎ zhè fèn wén jiàn yī cì chuán dì jǐ tā rén。
english: Please hand on the document to others.

hanzi: 那几笔款子加起来总数很可观。
pinyin: nà jǐ bǐ kuǎn zi jiā qǐ lai zǒng shù hěn kě guān。
english: The sums reached to a considerable total.

hanzi: 通电时线圈就会有磁性。
pinyin: tōng diàn shí xiàn quān jiù kuài yǒu cí xìng。
english: The loop becomes magnetic when the current is switched on.

hanzi: 无意义的事没有意义或情理的事物
pinyin: wú yì yì de shì méi yǒu yì yì huò qíng lǐ de shì wù
english: Something empty of meaning or sense.

hanzi: 他们拣拾木柴以补充煤的不足.
pinyin: tā men jiǎn shí mù chái yǐ bǔ chōng méi de bù zú.
english: They eked out their coal by collecting firewood.

hanzi: 艺术家巧妙地捕捉住她的笑容.
pinyin: yì shù jiā qiǎo miào de bǔ zhuō zhù tā de xiào róng.
english: The artist has caught her smile perfectly.

hanzi: 警察用探照灯照射这所房子.
pinyin: jǐng chá yòng tàn zhào dēng zhào shè zhè suǒ fáng zi.
english: The police shone a searchlight on the house.

hanzi: 这些机器需要经常保养维修。
pinyin: zhè xie jī qì xū yào jīng cháng bǎo yǎng wéi xiū。
english: The machinery requires constant maintenance.

hanzi: 沙漠一直伸展到视线的尽头.
pinyin: shā mò yī zhí shēn zhǎn dào shì xiàn de jìn tóu.
english: The desert continued as far as the eye could see.

pinyin: jì zhu nǐ gào su wǒ de huà bìng bù róng yì。
english: It is not easy to keep in mind what you have told me.

pinyin: tā de xíng wéi mò dá dào gōng rèn de biāo zhǔn。
english: His behaviour falls short of accepted standards.

hanzi: 主考者评定半数应试者不及格.
pinyin: zhǔ kǎo zhě píng dìng bàn shù yìng shì zhě bù jí gé.
english: The examiners failed half the candidates.

hanzi: 时刻尤指关键时刻，危急关头
pinyin: shí kè yóu zhǐ guān jiàn shí kè， wēi jí guān tóu
english: A point in time, especially a critical point.

hanzi: 我得修改图表. 我出了点儿错.
pinyin: wǒ de xiū gǎi tú biǎo.  wǒ chū le diǎn er cuò.
english: I'll have to alter the diagram. I've made a mistake.

hanzi: 每张床的尾端放有备用毛毯.
pinyin: měi zhāng chuáng de wěi duān fàng yǒu bèi yòng máo tǎn.
english: Spare blankets lay at the foot of each bed.

hanzi: 他们已经在一个农场里定居下来。
pinyin: tā men yǐ jīng zài yī gè nóng chǎng lǐ dìng jū xia lai。
english: They have settled down on a farm.

hanzi: 时日在无穷的展望中延展着。
pinyin: shí rì zài wú qióng de zhǎn wàng zhòng yán zhǎn zhuó。

pinyin: zhè wèi shì yì yuán shòu dào shì mín de jìng zhòng。
english: The alderman was respected by the citizens.

hanzi: 这样浪费，真叫人看了心疼。
pinyin: zhè yàng làng fèi， zhēn jiào rén kàn le xīn téng。
english: It makes one's heart ache to see such waste.

hanzi: 这房间给人非常温暖舒适的感觉。
pinyin: zhè fáng jiān jǐ rén fēi cháng wēn nuǎn shū shì de gǎn jué。
english: The room has a nice cosy feel.

hanzi: 森林火灾造成了巨大的损失。
pinyin: sēn lín huǒ zāi zào chéng le jù dà de sǔn shī。
english: The combustion in the forest generated great damage.

hanzi: 时日在无穷的展望中延展着。
pinyin: shí rì zài wú qióng de zhǎn wàng zhòng yán zhǎn zhuó。
english: The days stretch out in an endless vista.

hanzi: 黑暗中我看不清那东西是什么。
pinyin: hēi àn zhòng wǒ kàn bù qīng nà dōng xi shì shén me。
english: I couldn't tell what it was in the dark.

hanzi: 现在已经过了退课的最后期限了。
pinyin: xiàn zài yǐ jīng guò le tuì kè de zuì hòu qī xiàn le。
english: It's past the deadline to withdraw.

pinyin: zhèng fǔ fā chū le yù fáng shuǐ zāi de jǐng gào。
english: The government put out a warning against flood.

hanzi: 法官劝告他改变生活方式。
pinyin: fǎ guān quàn gào tā gǎi biàn shēng huó fāng shì。
english: The judge advised him to amend his way of living.

pinyin: tā yòng líng qiǎo de shǒu zhǐ jiě kāi le jīn shǔ xiàn.
english: With deft fingers she untangled the wire.

hanzi: 这个国家有丰富的矿产资源。
pinyin: zhè gè guó jiā yǒu fēng fù de kuàng chǎn zī yuán。
english: The country possesses rich mineral resources.

hanzi: 我们只经营硬件而不经营软件.
pinyin: wǒ men zhǐ jīng yíng yìng jiàn ér bù jīng yíng ruǎn jiàn.
english: We deal in hardware but not software.

pinyin: nóng mín men zhèng zài tián yě lǐ shōu gē dào zi。
english: The peasants are harvesting rice in the field.

pinyin: zài míng nián de zhòng xuǎn zhòng tā cān jiā jìng xuǎn。
english: She comes up for re-election next year.

pinyin: zài dì tú shàng,  shí zì fú hào dài biǎo jiào táng.
english: On maps, a cross is the symbol for a church.

pinyin: biè shuō le,  yào bu nǐ bǎ wǒ quán gǎo hú tu le.
english: Stop talking, or you'll muddle me (up) completely.

pinyin: zhè liǎng zhòng yuán sù yǐ jīng huà xué hé chéng.
english: The two elements are synthesized by a chemical process.

pinyin: zá huò shāng yǒu zhǒng lèi fán duō de cún huò。
english: The grocer's has plenty varieties of goods in stock.

pinyin: zhè běn xiǎo shuō hěn kě néng chéng wéi jīng diǎn著 zuò.
english: This novel may well become a classic.

hanzi: 她认定自己受到了迫害.
pinyin: tā rèn dìng zì jǐ shòu dào le pò hài.
english: She persists in the belief/in believing that she is being persecuted.

hanzi: 她已签字把房子转让给女儿了.
pinyin: tā yǐ qiān zì bǎ fáng zi zhuǎn ràng jǐ nu:3 ér le.
english: She has signed her house over to her daughter.

hanzi: 我们只经营硬件而不经营软件.
pinyin: wǒ men zhǐ jīng yíng yìng jiàn ér bù jīng yíng ruǎn jiàn.
english: We deal in hardware but not software.

hanzi: 我认为这两个选手不相上下。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi zhè liǎng gè xuǎn shǒu bù xiàng shàng xià。
english: I'd say the two players are pretty even.

pinyin: zhè xiàng tōng gào zhèng míng le wǒ de cāi yí shǔ shí.
english: The announcement confirmed my suspicions.

pinyin: wǒ zhǔn bèi huā duō shao qián shì yǒu xiàn dù de.
english: There's a limit to how much I'm prepared to spend.

pinyin: yào yù cè chū shéi jiàng huò shèng shì bù kě néng de.
english: It is impossible to predict who will win.

pinyin: tā shuō rén men de zhǐ kòng shì bù gōng zhèng de。
english: He said that the people's accusation was unjust.

pinyin: wǒ yīn wèi yán hán mò chū qù kàn diàn yǐng。
english: I did not go to the cinema because of the intense cold.

pinyin: dà shì jù yǒu zhòng yào yì yì de shì jiàn huò shì biàn
english: A significant occurrence or happening.

pinyin: zhè fèn diào chá shì zhēn zhèng nèi háng rén zuò de.
english: This survey is the work of a real professional.

english: My passport is due to expire in two months.

pinyin: tā de jiǎng huà yíng dé le tīng zhòng de zhǎng shēng。
english: His speech won the applause of the audience.

pinyin: zài suǒ yǒu sì jì dāng zhōng， xià tiān zuì rè。
english: Of all the four seasons, summer is the hottest.

pinyin: tā zài jù zhòng bàn yǎn le yī gè cì yào de jué sè。
english: She acted as a minor role in the play.

pinyin: zhè lǐ de wú xiàn diàn jiē shōu qíng kuàng bù tài hào。
english: Radio reception isn't very good here.

pinyin: tuī cè jié guǒ shì jìng xuǎn kě néng kuài shī bài。
english: The presumable result is an election defeat.

pinyin: jiù yìng bì yǐ jīng shōu huí bù zài liú tōng le.
english: The old coins have been withdrawn from circulation.

pinyin: wǒ men wèi tā men de xiàn shēn jīng shén suǒ gǎn dòng。
english: We were deeply moved by their devotion.

pinyin: tā zhǐ shì duǎn qī wài chū-- zhì duō yī zhōu.
english: He's only away for short periods a week at the longest.

pinyin: xué sheng yī cì lǎng dú tā men gè zi de zuò yè。
english: The pupils took turns in reading out their work.

pinyin: jiù zài zuó tiān， tā dòng shēn qián wǎng Měi guó。

english: The horse finished up nowhere in the race.

english: Parents for the most part are concerned for their children.

pinyin: dāng dì zhèng fǔ yī wèi guān yuán lái kàn tā。
english: An official of the local government called to see him.

pinyin: wǒ bù xiāng xìn tā kuài rú yuē qián lái fǎng wèn。

pinyin: nà tiáo xiāo xi shǐ gōng rén huò dé xīn de huó lì。
english: The news infused the workers with new life.

pinyin: tā yòng pí dài bǎ nèi gè hái zi zháo shí dǎ le yī dùn。

pinyin: rén rén wèi zì jǐ de lì yì zhuó xiǎng huò xìng shì。

english: One of the principal divisions of a long poem.

pinyin: yù huì zhě tài duō,  huì chǎng kuò dà dào jiē shàng le.
english: The meeting overflowed into the streets.

pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi tā shì jiàn měi ér bú shì mào měi.

english: The President had lost the support of the congress.

pinyin: yè wǎn xìng jū bù kāi liàng tou dēng shì wéi fǎ de.
english: Driving without headlights at night is illegal.

pinyin: jiàn jiàn de,  zhè zhǒng huò bì bù zài tōng yòng。

pinyin: Hóng Jūn cháng zhēng shí zǒu le èr wàn wǔ qiān lǐ。
english: The Red Army covered25000 li on the Long March.

pinyin: tā zhè gè rén,  tìng tā jiǎng huà jiù shì jí dà de lè qù.
english: He is a great joy to listen to.

pinyin: zhè xie bái xiàn bǎ sài qū fēn chéng gè ge bù fen.
english: White lines divide the playing area into sections.

pinyin: rén mìng yù luó bo yī rán shì duō ér qiě pián yi。
english: Human life and turnip remain cheap and plentiful.

pinyin: tā shì yī wèi míng fù qí shí de hào lǐng xiù。
english: He is a good leader in deed as well as in name.

pinyin: kāi wàng Shàng hǎi de lún chuán xīng qī sān qǐ chéng。
english: The steamers for Shanghai leave on Wednesday.

hanzi: 喜讯传遍了祖国的每个角落。
pinyin: xǐ xùn chuán biàn le zǔ guó de měi gè jiǎo luò。
english: The good news spread to every corner of the country.

hanzi: 关于那件事, 我没什么好说的。
pinyin: guān yú nà jiàn shì,  wǒ mò shén me hǎo shuō de。
english: I have nothing to say in relation to that matter.

hanzi: 她知道金属为什么是好的导体。
pinyin: tā zhī dào jīn shǔ wèi shén me shì hǎo de dǎo tǐ。
english: She knows why the metal is the good conductor.

pinyin: tā de yì jiàn huò wǒ de yì jiàn mò duō dà chā yì。
english: His opinion doesn't differ much from mine.

pinyin: yī fú yì hū xún cháng de huà yǐn qǐ le tā de zhù yì.
english: An unusual painting arrested his attention.

pinyin: tā jǐn zhāng de zuò zhuó， zhěng lǐ zhuó tā de sī xù。
english: He sat nervously, marshal his thought.

pinyin: shǒu yì rén shú liàn shǐ yòng mǒu zhǒng shǒu yì de rén
english: A man who practices a craft with great skill.

hanzi: 他对他扮演的角色理解得细微之至。
pinyin: tā duì tā bàn yǎn de jué sè lǐ jiě de xì wēi zhī zhì。
english: He understands his part to a miracle.

hanzi: 我国每四年一次人口普查。
pinyin: wǒ guó měi sì nián yī cì rén kǒu pǔ chá。
english: The census is taken one time every four years in our country.

hanzi: 一个模糊的身影从黑暗中闪过。
pinyin: yī gè mó hu de shēn yǐng zòng hēi àn zhòng shǎn guò。
english: A shadowy figure went past in the darkness.

hanzi: 我们的复印机经常需要检修.
pinyin: wǒ men de fù yìn jī jīng cháng xū yào jiǎn xiū.
english: Our photocopier is in continual need of running repairs.

hanzi: 讲解员要我们注意另一幅画.
pinyin: jiǎng jiě yuán yào wǒ men zhù yì lìng yī fú huà.
english: The guide directed our attention to the other picture.

hanzi: 卡车突然转向以免撞著那孩子.
pinyin: kǎ chē tū rán zhuǎn xiàng yǐ miǎn zhuàng著 nà hái zi.
english: The lorry swerved sharply to avoid the child.

hanzi: 你要把这些书按字母顺序排好.
pinyin: nǐ yào bǎ zhè xie shū àn zì mǔ shùn xù pǎi hào.
english: You must arrange these books in alphabetical order.

hanzi: 人类经数千年才文明开化.
pinyin: rén lèi jīng shuò qiān nián cái wén míng kāi huà.
english: The civilization of mankind has taken thousands of years.

hanzi: 她以自我牺牲精神救了我们的性命.
pinyin: tā yǐ zì wǒ xī shēng jīng shén jiù le wǒ men de xìng mìng.
english: Her self-sacrifice saved our lives.

hanzi: 你最好不要冒险投资这么多。
pinyin: nǐ zuì hǎo bù yào mào xiǎn tóu zī zhè me duō。
english: You had better not invest so much money at your peril.

hanzi: 我们得给我们的新房子买些家具。
pinyin: wǒ men de jǐ wǒ men de xīn fáng zi mǎi xiē jiā jù。
english: We will buy some furniture for our new house.

hanzi: 他以一张欠条代替现金付给我们。
pinyin: tā yǐ yī zhāng qiàn tiáo dài tì xiàn jīn fù jǐ wǒ men。
english: He gave us an I.O.U. in lieu of cash.

hanzi: 你必须留心脚下才不会跌下去。
pinyin: nǐ bì xū liú xīn jué xià cái bù huì diē xià qu。
english: You must watch your step so as not to fall down.

hanzi: 矿石，矿藏确实的或可能的矿藏
pinyin: kuàng shí， kuàng cáng què shí de huò kě néng de kuàng cáng
english: An actual or probable mineral deposit.

hanzi: 破碎打碎成碎片的动作或过程
pinyin: pò suì dǎ suì chéng suì piàn de dòng zuò huò guò chéng
english: The act or process of breaking into fragments.

hanzi: 她的政治活动触犯了法律.
pinyin: tā de zhèng zhì huó dòng chù fàn le fǎ lu:4.
english: Her political activities brought her into collision with the law.

hanzi: 食物尽管不好，但起码很便宜。
pinyin: shí wù jǐn guǎn bù hǎo， dàn qǐ mǎ hěn pián yi。
english: The food wasn't good, but at least it was cheap.

hanzi: 她一直在鼓吹新鲜空气的好处。
pinyin: tā yī zhí zài gǔ chuī xīn xiān kōng qì de hǎo chu。
english: She's always preaching the value of fresh air.

hanzi: 我认为这两个选手不相上下。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi zhè liǎng gè xuǎn shǒu bù xiàng shàng xià。
english: I'd say the two players are pretty even.

hanzi: 将军向胜利者办理了移交手续。
pinyin: jiāng jūn xiàng shèng lì zhē bàn lǐ le yí jiāo shǒu xù。
english: The general handed over to the conqueror.

hanzi: 他被任命为那所中学的校长。
pinyin: tā bèi rèn mìng wèi nà suǒ zhōng xué de xiào zhǎng。
english: He was appointed the rector of the middle school.

hanzi: 许多伤员死在去医院的途中了.
pinyin: xǔ duō shāng yuán sǐ zài qù yī yuàn de tú zhōng le.
english: Many of the wounded died on their way to hospital.

hanzi: 她已被提名为总统候选人。
pinyin: tā yǐ bèi tí míng wèi zǒng tǒng hòu xuǎn rén。
english: She had been nominated as candidate for the presidency.

hanzi: 入境时，我的提包受到了检查。
pinyin: rù jìng shí， wǒ de tí bāo shòu dào le jiǎn chá。
english: My bags were examined when I entered the country.

hanzi: 这家工厂将原油加工成汽油。
pinyin: zhè jiā gōng chǎng jiàng yuán yóu jiā gōng chéng qì yóu。
english: The plant converts crude oil into gasoline.

hanzi: 他多处受伤，其中三处骨折。
pinyin: tā duō chù shòu shāng， qí zhōng sān chù gǔ zhé。
english: He had several injuries, including three fractures.

pinyin: shī qù jiàn kāng cái zhī dào jiàn kāng de kě guì。
english: We do not know the value of health till we lose it.

hanzi: 他没有意识到处境的有趣方面.
pinyin: tā méi yǒu yì shí dào chù jìng de yǒu qù fāng miàn.
english: He didn't appreciate the comedy of the situation.

hanzi: 要仔细听才能听懂老师讲的课。
pinyin: yào zǐ xì tìng cái néng tìng dǒng lǎo shī jiǎng de kè。
english: Listen carefully so as to follow the teacher.

pinyin: xiǎo nán hái de shǒu zhǐ ràng mò shuǐ jǐ rǎn zàng le。
english: The little boy stained his fingers with ink.

hanzi: 整个下午断断续续地下着阵雨。
pinyin: zhěng gè xià wǔ duàn duàn xù xù dì xià zhuó zhèn yǔ。
english: It showered off and on all afternoon.

hanzi: 公众作为一个整体的社会或民众
pinyin: gōng zhòng zuò wéi yī gè zhěng tǐ de shè huì huò mín zhòng
english: The community or the people as a whole.

hanzi: 他用一则有趣的笑话结束了演讲。
pinyin: tā yòng yī zé yǒu qù de xiào huà jié shù le yǎn jiǎng。
english: He closed his speech with a funny joke.

hanzi: 这本字典的新版本还未通行。
pinyin: zhè běn zì diǎn de xīn bǎn běn huán wèi tōng xíng。
english: The new version of this dictionary is not in use yet.

hanzi: 再重建这座建筑物是不可能的。
pinyin: zài chóng jiàn zhè zuò jiàn zhù wù shì bù kě néng de。
english: Reconstruction of that building is impossible.

hanzi: 中国菜在每一方面都是精美的。
pinyin: Zhōng guó cài zài měi yī fāng miàn dōu shì jīng měi de。
english: Everything about Chinese food is refined.

pinyin: zhè tái jì suàn jī yǒu biāo zhǔn de Yīng wén jiàn pán。
english: The computer has a normal qwerty keyboard.

hanzi: 除此之外，她还有五顶别的帽子。
pinyin: chú cǐ zhī wài， tā hái yǒu wǔ dǐng bié de mào zi。
english: She has five other hats besides this.

english: Passions ran high as the election approached.

pinyin: zhè lǐ de bái zhǒng rén bù yù tǔ rén jiāo wǎng.
english: The white people here don't mix socially with the natives.

english: The two brothers have entirely different temperaments.

pinyin: zhè yī gōng yuē bìng méi yǒu cù jìn guó jì hé píng。
english: That pact didn't advance peace among nations.

pinyin: nóng chǎng lǐ de láo dòng lì zài bù duàn jiǎn shǎo。
english: The farm labour force is running down steadily.

pinyin: wèn tí shì wǒ men zěn yàng dé dào yuán cái liào。
english: The problem is how we are to get the raw material.

pinyin: shì mín kě yǐ miǎn fèi shǐ yòng zhè gè tú shū guǎn。
english: Citizens may have free access to the library.

english: With luck, she will get the job.

pinyin: zhè jiā shāng xíng wéi liǎng míng hé huǒ rén suǒ yōng yǒu。
english: The business is owned by two partners.

english: This non sequitur invalidates his argument.
