pinyin: zhè chǎng shì gù fā shēng zài dào lù de guǎi wān chù。
english: The accident happened at the twist in the road.

hanzi: 他不根据前提推理因而论证无效.
pinyin: tā bù gēn jù qián tí tuī lǐ yīn ér lùn zhèng wú xiào.
english: This non sequitur invalidates his argument.

pinyin: gēng gǎi xiǎo xiǎo de gǎi biàn， tiáo zhèng huò xiàn zhì
english: A small alteration, adjustment, or limitation.

hanzi: 强盗们在警察到来之前逃走了。
pinyin: qiáng dào men zài jǐng chá dào lái zhī qián táo zǒu le。
english: The robbers escaped before the police arrived.

pinyin: kàng gāo xuè yā de jiǎn qīng huò kòng zhì gāo xuè yā de
english: Reducing or controlling high blood pressure.

hanzi: 他不根据前提推理因而论证无效.
pinyin: tā bù gēn jù qián tí tuī lǐ yīn ér lùn zhèng wú xiào.
english: This non sequitur invalidates his argument.

hanzi: 他买了那个新产品想试用一下。
pinyin: tā mǎi le nèi gè xīn chǎn pǐn xiǎng shì yòng yī xià。
english: He bought the new product to give it a trial.

english: Located or used at a military front.

english: An early form of cannon that fired stone balls.

pinyin: zhè gè diàn lù lǐ miàn shǐ yòng le liǎng gè duàn lù qì。

pinyin: yī qiè shēng wù jūn kě àn děng jí fēn lèi.
english: There is a hierarchy in the classification of all living creatures.

pinyin: zhè xie chuāng hu cǎi guāng jí tōng fēng xìng néng liáng hǎo.

pinyin: wǒ men hěn nàn guān chá yuè liàng de lìng yī biān。
english: The far side of the moon is difficult for us to observe.

pinyin: kāi piān dì yī zhāng shì duì zhǔ tí de gài shù.
english: The opening chapter gives a general overview of the subject.

hanzi: 许多伤员死在去医院的途中了。
pinyin: xǔ duō shāng yuán sǐ zài qù yī yuàn de tú zhōng le。
english: Many of the wounded die on their way to hospital.

pinyin: jué cè de zhòng rèn quán luò zài tā de jiān shàng le。
english: The full weight of decision-making falls on her.

pinyin: yǒu chuán yán shuō zhè xīng qī jiàng yǒu tái fēng。
english: It is in the air that there will be a typhoon this week.

pinyin: wǒ men gé bì zhù著 lái zì Měi guó de yī duì fū fù.

pinyin: tā men bù dé bù yǐ jí shào de dàn yào yìng zhàn.
english: They had to meet the attack with very little ammunition.

pinyin: nà hái zi jiàn jiàn lǐng wù dào yīn yuè de lè qù。
english: The child has a gradual awakening to the joy of music.

pinyin: wǒ men de lu:4 shī quàn gào bù yào qǐ sù fáng dōng。
english: Our lawyer have advise against suing the landlord.

english: Your maternal instincts go deeper than you think.

pinyin: tā de zhòng gōng yè yǒu guǎng fàn jiān shí de jī chǔ。
english: Her heavy industry rests on a broad and firm base.

pinyin: bǎ miàn fěn huò yè tǐ hùn hé dào shì dàng de nóng dù.
english: Mix flour and liquid to the right consistency.

pinyin: shì bīng men zuì zhōng wán chéng le nài lì cè yàn。
english: The soldiers eventually completed the endurance tests.

pinyin: zhì zào chǎng shāng de míng chēng zài pán zi bèi miàn.
english: The manufacturer's name is on the bottom of the plate.

english: We can't approve of this sort of thing/these sorts of things/things of this sort.

pinyin: wǒ yòng zhè zhāng tōng xíng zhèng zuò huǒ chē bàn jià.

pinyin: tā yǐ jiē huò duì tā cāo xíng de shū miàn jǐng gào.
english: She has received a written warning about her conduct.

english: The prairies stretch on all sides as far as the eye can see.

pinyin: kǎ chē yán zhòng sǔn huài， yǐ wú xiū fù de xī wàng。
english: The lorry was damaged beyond hope of repair.

pinyin: yǐ jīng jué dìng zhè běn shū yào chóng xīn xiū dìng。
english: It has been decided that the book shall be revised.

pinyin: shì bīng men zhuāng bèi hào le wǔ qì huò dàn yào.
english: The soldiers were well equipped with weapons and ammunition.

hanzi: 总的来说, 公司对我一直很好.
pinyin: zǒng de lái shuō,  gōng sī duì wǒ yī zhí hěn hǎo.
english: By and large, the company's been pretty good to me.

hanzi: 叫他保持冷静，不要操之过急。
pinyin: jiào tā bǎo chí lěng jìng， bù yào cāo zhī guò jí。
english: Tell him to keep calm and not to crowd the mourners.

hanzi: 这位教士受到所有村民的尊敬。
pinyin: zhè wèi jiào shì shòu dào suǒ yǒu cūn mín de zūn jìng。
english: This clergyman is respected by all the villagers.

hanzi: 她上学时总觉得和大家格格不入.
pinyin: tā shàng xué shí zǒng jué de huò dà jiā gé gé bù rù.
english: At school she always felt the odd one out.

hanzi: 那家航运公司为此而赔了不少钱。
pinyin: nà jiā háng yùn gōng sī wèi cǐ ér péi le bù shǎo qián。
english: The shipping line lost considerably by it.

hanzi: 路面结冰了，今晚要格外小心。
pinyin: lù miàn jié bīng le， jīn wǎn yào gé wài xiǎo xīn。
english: Take special care tonight because the road is icy.

hanzi: 街道十分拥挤, 汽车无法通行.
pinyin: jiē dào shí fēn yōng jǐ,  qì chē wú fǎ tōng xíng.
english: The street was so crowded that cars were unable to pass.

hanzi: 抗高血压的减轻或控制高血压的
pinyin: kàng gāo xuè yā de jiǎn qīng huò kòng zhì gāo xuè yā de
english: Reducing or controlling high blood pressure.

hanzi: 今晨发布的政府公报宣称....
pinyin: jīn chén fā bù de zhèng fǔ gōng bào xuān chēng....
english: A government communique, issued this morning, states that...

hanzi: 窗户四周泥的油灰密封效果很好.
pinyin: chuāng hu sì zhōu nì de yóu huī mì fēng xiào guǒ hěn hǎo.
english: The putty gives a good seal round the window.

hanzi: 他为竞选国会议员席位进行游说。
pinyin: tā wèi jìng xuǎn guó huì yì yuán xí wèi jìn xíng yóu shuì。
english: He canvassed for a seat in Parliament.

hanzi: 她明确表示反对此提案.
pinyin: tā míng què biǎo shì fǎn duì cǐ tí àn.
english: She made clear her objections/made it clear that she objected to the proposal.

hanzi: 她打著平等的旗号参加了竞选.
pinyin: tā dǎ著 píng děng de qí hào cān jiā le jìng xuǎn.
english: She fought the election under the banner of equal rights.

hanzi: 这场纠纷根本不可能获得解决.
pinyin: zhè chǎng jiū fēn gēn běn bù kě néng huò dé jiě jué.
english: There is no prospect of a settlement of the dispute.

hanzi: 为致富而牺牲原则是不值得的.
pinyin: wèi zhì fù ér xī shēng yuán zé shì bù zhí de de.
english: Getting rich isn't worth the sacrifice of your principles.

pinyin: xià yī duàn xíng chéng wǒ men jiù yào jìn shān qū le.
english: The next lap of our trip takes us into the mountains.

pinyin: wú lùn rú hé wǒ yě bù tóng tā diào huàn dì fang。
english: I would not change places with him for all the world.

hanzi: 委员会建议著手起草新法规.
pinyin: wěi yuán huì jiàn yì著 shǒu qǐ cǎo xīn fǎ guī.
english: The committee proposed that new legislation should be drafted.

hanzi: 英军的阵线被迫后退一段距离。
pinyin: yīng jūn de zhèn xiàn bèi pò hòu tuì yī duàn jù lí。
english: The British line was forced back a short distance.

hanzi: 再加点油，你就可以到达顶端了。
pinyin: zài jiā diǎn yóu， nǐ jiù kě yǐ dào dá dǐng duān le。
english: One more effort, and you will get to the top.

hanzi: 这些手套是为严寒地区制造的。
pinyin: zhè xie shǒu tào shì wèi yán hán dì qū zhì zào de。
english: The gloves were designed for extremely cold climates.

hanzi: 无所事事的享乐很快就使人厌烦了。
pinyin: wú suǒ shì shì de xiǎng lè hěn kuài jiù shǐ rén yàn fán le。
english: The pleasures of idleness soon cloy.

hanzi: 她父亲永不会同意她和你结婚。
pinyin: tā fù qīn yǒng bù huì tóng yì tā huò nǐ jié hūn。
english: Her father will never approve of her marriage to you.

hanzi: 她一反常态, 向他愤怒地叫喊.
pinyin: tā yī fǎn cháng tài,  xiàng tā fèn nù de jiào hǎn.
english: She lost her usual equilibrium and shouted at him angrily.

hanzi: 极好的某种东西出奇地好或奇妙的
pinyin: jí hǎo de mǒu zhǒng dōng xi chū qí de hào huò qí miào de
english: Something exceptionally exciting or wonderful.

hanzi: 他被暗杀者的近距离开枪打死。
pinyin: tā bèi àn shā zhě de jìn jù lí kāi qiāng dǎ sǐ。
english: He was mowed down by the assassin at point-blank range.

hanzi: 律师必须了解案情的所有细节。
pinyin: lu:4 shī bì xū liǎo jiě àn qíng de suǒ yǒu xì jié。
english: The lawyer must know all the particulars of the case.

hanzi: 这片建筑还只是仅有主梁的骨架.
pinyin: zhè piàn jiàn zhù huán zhǐ shì jǐn yǒu zhǔ liáng de gǔ jià.
english: The block is still just a skeleton of girders.

hanzi: 此时很难预料公司的前景.
pinyin: cǐ shí hěn nàn yù liào gōng sī de qián jǐng.
english: It is very difficult at this juncture to predict the company's future.

hanzi: 咱们进行议事日程的下一个项目吧.
pinyin: zán men jìn xíng yì shì rì chéng de xià yī gè xiàng mù ba.
english: Let's pass on to the next item on the agenda.

hanzi: 听到这消息，很多人都来订货。
pinyin: tīng dào zhè xiāo xi， hěn duō rén dōu lái dìng huò。
english: Many people put in orders when they heard of this.

hanzi: 他们向我们订购了三架新飞机.
pinyin: tā men xiàng wǒ men dìng gòu le sān jià xīn fēi jī.
english: They have placed an order with us for three new aircraft.

hanzi: 她一遍又一遍地不断哼唱那支歌。
pinyin: tā yī biàn yòu yī biàn dì bù duàn hng chàng nà zhī gē。
english: She continued to hum the song over and over.

hanzi: 他抓住我的领子把我拉倒他面前。
pinyin: tā zhuā zhù wǒ de lǐng zi bǎ wǒ lā dào tā miàn qián。
english: He grabbed my collar and pulled me towards him.

hanzi: 这种肉已宣布不适宜人们食用.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng ròu yǐ xuān bù bù shì yí rén men shí yòng.
english: The meat was condemned as unfit for human consumption.

hanzi: 她坐在角落里注视著我的一举一动.
pinyin: tā zuò zài jiǎo luò lǐ zhù shì著 wǒ de yī jǔ yī dòng.
english: She sat in the corner, watching my every move.

hanzi: 他们设下圈套, 他果然落入其中.
pinyin: tā men shè xià juān tào,  tā guǒ rán luò rù qí zhōng.
english: They set a trap for him and he walked right into it.

hanzi: 文件每日存取, 使之不断更新.
pinyin: wén jiàn měi rì cún qǔ,  shǐ zhī bù duàn gēng xīn.
english: The files were accessed every day to keep them up to date.

hanzi: 空气是气体的混合物，不是化合物。
pinyin: kōng qì shì qì tǐ de hùn hé wù， bú shì huà hé wù。
english: Air is a mixture, not a compound of gases.

hanzi: 军队正在进行沙漠作战演习.
pinyin: jūn duì zhèng zài jìn xíng shā mò zuò zhàn yǎn xí.
english: The army is on (ie taking part in) manoeuvres in the desert.

hanzi: 他对事业的热情激励著他的追随者.
pinyin: tā duì shì yè de rè qíng jī lì著 tā de zhuī suí zhě.
english: His ardour for the cause inspired his followers.

hanzi: 在所有高山当中，玉山为最高。
pinyin: zài suǒ yǒu gāo shān dāng zhōng， Yù shān wèi zuì gāo。
english: Of all the high mountains, Mt. Jade is the highest.

hanzi: 男子玩弄女子的情感是不对的。
pinyin: nán zǐ wán nòng nu:3 zǐ de qíng gǎn shì bù duì de。
english: It's wrong for a man to play with a woman's affections.

hanzi: 我这条裤子要是不系皮带就往下掉.
pinyin: wǒ zhè tiáo kù zi yào shì bù xì pí dài jiù wàng xià diào.
english: My trousers only stay up if I wear a belt.

hanzi: 公社社员们正忙着收割庄稼。
pinyin: gōng shè shè yuán men zhèng máng zhuó shōu gē zhuāng jia。
english: The commune members were busy getting in the crops.

hanzi: 只有少吃多锻炼才能健美.
pinyin: zhǐ yǒu shào jí duō duàn liàn cái néng jiàn měi.
english: You'll never be in shape until you eat less and take more exercise.

hanzi: 年龄的大小往往与发病率有关.
pinyin: nián líng de dà xiǎo wǎng wǎng yù fā bìng lu:4 yǒu guān.
english: We can often correlate age with frequency of illness.

hanzi: 现在是我方炮兵回击敌人的时候了。
pinyin: xiàn zài shì wǒ fāng pào bīng huí jī dí rén de shí hou le。
english: It's time for our artillery to hit back.

hanzi: 这懒小子一整天一点事都没干。
pinyin: zhè lǎn xiǎo zi yī zhěng tiān yī diǎn shì dōu mò gàn。
english: The lazy boy has not done a stroke of work all day.

hanzi: 他偷看我的论文时，我当场抓住了他。
pinyin: tā tōu kàn wǒ de lùn wén shí， wǒ dāng chǎng zhuā zhù le tā。
english: I caught him peeping at my paper.

hanzi: 他没有向我们透露他的意图.
pinyin: tā méi yǒu xiàng wǒ men tòu lù tā de yì tú.
english: He has given us no intimation of his intentions/what he intends to do.

hanzi: 望远镜和显微镜是光学仪器。
pinyin: wàng yuǎn jìng huò xiǎn wēi jìng shì guāng xué yí qì。
english: Microscopes and telescopes are optical instruments.

hanzi: 他太穷了，买不起天文望远镜。
pinyin: tā tài qióng le， mǎi bù qǐ tiān wén wàng yuǎn jìng。
english: He was too poor to buy an astronomical telescope.

hanzi: 望远镜和显微镜是光学仪器。
pinyin: wàng yuǎn jìng huò xiǎn wēi jìng shì guāng xué yí qì。
english: Microscopes and telescopes are optical instruments.

hanzi: 他来时，我正巧忙着写信。
pinyin: tā lái shí， wǒ zhèng qiǎo máng zhuó xiě xìn。
english: It happened/chanced that I was busy writing a letter when he came.

hanzi: 球迷一看见他都激动得大喊大叫.
pinyin: qiú mí yī kàn jiàn tā dōu jī dòng de dà hǎn dà jiào.
english: The fans screamed with excitement when they saw him.

hanzi: 他讲话感人足以赢得听众同情.
pinyin: tā jiǎng huà gǎn rén zú yǐ yíng dé tīng zhòng tóng qíng.
english: His moving speech was enough to carry the audience.

hanzi: 我登台演出前总要温习一下台词.
pinyin: wǒ dēng tái yǎn chū qián zǒng yào wēn xí yī xià tái cí.
english: I always run over my lines before going on stage.

hanzi: 任职时间最长的官员事事优先.
pinyin: rèn zhí shí jiān zuì cháng de guān yuán shì shì yōu xiān.
english: The longest-serving officer always takes precedence.

hanzi: 多数美国人有银行签发的信用卡。
pinyin: duō shù měi guó rén yǒu yín háng qiān fā de xìn yòng kǎ。
english: Most Americans have bank-issued credit cards.

hanzi: 政府派警方出动恢复治安.
pinyin: zhèng fǔ pài jǐng fāng chū dòng huī fù zhì ān.
english: The government ordered the police out to restore order in the streets.

hanzi: 她不服判决而向高等法院上诉。
pinyin: tā bù fú pàn jué ér xiàng gāo děng fǎ yuàn shàng sù。
english: She appealed to the high court against her sentence.

hanzi: 他们穿著那种制服看起来怪模怪样的.
pinyin: tā men chuān著 nà zhòng zhì fù kàn qǐ lai guài mó guài yàng de.
english: That uniform makes them look absurd.

hanzi: 如果是加急电报，费用将加倍。
pinyin: rú guǒ shì jiā jí diàn bào， fèi yòng jiàng jiā bèi。
english: If your cable were urgent, the rate will be doubled.

hanzi: 修筑一条铁路要花费许多劳动力。
pinyin: xiū zhù yī tiáo tiě lù yào huā fèi xǔ duō láo dòng lì。
english: It takes a lot of labor to build a railway.

hanzi: 这两项实验的结果合并在一起了.
pinyin: zhè liǎng xiàng shí yàn de jié guǒ hé bìng zài yī qǐ le.
english: The results of the two experiments were conflated.

hanzi: 她的理论被人引用而未向她致谢.
pinyin: tā de lǐ lùn bèi rén yǐn yòng ér wèi xiàng tā zhì xiè.
english: Her theory was quoted without (an) acknowledgement.

hanzi: 小说家塑造人物并设计作品的情节.
pinyin: xiǎo shuō jiā sù zào rén wù bìng shè jì zuò pǐn de qíng jié.
english: A novelist creates characters and a plot.

hanzi: 把担子换到另一肩上可其管用。
pinyin: bǎ dàn zi huàn dào lìng yī jiān shàng kě qí guǎn yòng。
english: It works to shifted the load to the other shoulder.

hanzi: 他总是把时间花在毫无意义的事上。
pinyin: tā zǒng shì bǎ shí jiān huā zài háo wú yì yì de shì shàng。
english: He always spend his time to no purpose.

hanzi: 政府派警方出动恢复治安.
pinyin: zhèng fǔ pài jǐng fāng chū dòng huī fù zhì ān.
english: The government ordered the police out to restore order in the streets.

hanzi: 在短暂的休息之后他们继续锻炼。
pinyin: zài duǎn zàn de xiū xi zhī hòu tā men jì xù duàn liàn。
english: They carried on the exercise after a short break.

hanzi: 多数美国人有银行签发的信用卡。
pinyin: duō shù měi guó rén yǒu yín háng qiān fā de xìn yòng kǎ。
english: Most Americans have bank-issued credit cards.

hanzi: 飞机没有沿通常的商业航线飞。
pinyin: fēi jī méi yǒu yàn tōng cháng de shāng yè háng xiàn fēi。
english: The plane did not fly the usual commercial route.

hanzi: 她谈的是计算机软件的开发问题。
pinyin: tā tán de shì jì suàn jī ruǎn jiàn de kāi fā wèn tí。
english: Her talk ran on developments in computer software.

hanzi: 我向委员会报告了我们的进展情况.
pinyin: wǒ xiàng wěi yuán huì bào gào le wǒ men de jìn zhǎn qíng kuàng.
english: I updated the committee on our progress.

hanzi: 该国对邻国的征服已经完成。
pinyin: gāi guó duì lín guó de zhēng fú yǐ jīng wán chéng。
english: The country's subjection of its neighbor has been finished.

hanzi: 他喜欢读伟人传记来提高自己。
pinyin: tā xǐ huan dú wěi rén zhuàn jì lái tí gāo zì jǐ。
english: He likes to read biographies of great men to promote himself.

hanzi: 我们必须为穷苦人提供适当的住房.
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū wèi qióng kǔ rén tí gōng shì dàng de zhù fáng.
english: We must provide decent housing for the poor.

hanzi: 每一种规则都有例外。
pinyin: měi yī zhòng guī zé dōu yǒu lì wài。
english: There is no rule but has exceptions. (=There is no rule that doesn't have exceptions.)

hanzi: 土星是依次离太阳的第六颗行星。
pinyin: tǔ xīng shì yī cì lí tài yáng de dì liù kē xíng xīng。
english: Saturn is the planet sixth in order from the sun.

hanzi: 她只要醒著就一直为工作发愁。
pinyin: tā zhǐ yào xǐng著 jiù yī zhí wèi gōng zuò fā chóu。
english: She spends all her waking hours worrying about her job.

hanzi: 国会制定法律，总统执行法律。
pinyin: guó huì zhì dìng fǎ lu:4， zǒng tǒng zhí xíng fǎ lu:4。
english: Congress makes the laws; the President executes them.

hanzi: 他们结为夫妇共同生活了很多年.
pinyin: tā men jié wèi fū fù gòng tóng shēng huó le hěn duō nián.
english: They lived together as husband and wife for years.

hanzi: 这个水壶上的开关按下时卡不住了。
pinyin: zhè gè shuǐ hú shàng de kāi guān àn xià shí qiǎ bú zhù le。
english: The switch on the kettle won't stay down.

hanzi: 他悟性差, 没有意识到存在的危险.
pinyin: tā wù xìng cī,  méi yǒu yì shí dào cún zài de wēi xiǎn.
english: He hadn't the wits/wit enough to realize the danger.

hanzi: 他想扩充自己在这一行业的知识。
pinyin: tā xiǎng kuò chōng zì jǐ zài zhè yī xíng yè de zhī shi。
english: He wants to widen his knowledge of the industry.

hanzi: 这幅画给人总的印象是很有气势.
pinyin: zhè fú huà jǐ rén zǒng de yìn xiàng shì hěn yǒu qì shì.
english: The general effect of the painting is overwhelming.

hanzi: 左边的人物有损于画面的效果。
pinyin: zuǒ biān de rén wù yǒu sǔn yú huà miàn de xiào guǒ。
english: The figure on the left spoils the unity of the painting.

hanzi: 这家商店供应各种野营用品。
pinyin: zhè jiā shāng diàn gōng yìng gè zhǒng yě yíng yòng pǐn。
english: The shop furnishes everything that is needed for camping.

hanzi: 她的女儿出落成一个漂亮的女孩。
pinyin: tā de nu:3 ér chū luò chéng yī gè piào liang de nu:3 hái。
english: Her daughter is blossoming into a beautiful girl.

hanzi: 那位发言者遭到了连珠炮般的追问。
pinyin: nà wèi fā yán zhě zāo dào le lián zhū pào bān de zhuī wèn。
english: The speaker was bombarded with questions.

hanzi: 请把我的名字加入你们的邮寄名单中.
pinyin: qǐng bǎ wǒ de míng zi jiā rù nǐ men de yóu jì míng dān zhòng.
english: Please add my name to your mailing list.

hanzi: 曾经认识，他的面容让人永生难忘
pinyin: céng jīng rèn shi， tā de miàn róng ràng rén yǒng shēng nán wàng
english: Once known, his face is never forgotten.

hanzi: 他请求他母亲答应他去看马戏。
pinyin: tā qǐng qiú tā mǔ qīn dā ying tā qù kàn mǎ xì。
english: He pleaded with his mother to allow him to go to the circus.

hanzi: 惯例符合习俗的社会行为举止之准则
pinyin: guàn lì fú hé xí sú de shè huì xíng wéi jǔ zhǐ zhī zhǔn zé
english: The rules of conventional social behavior.

hanzi: 一个官方使团被派去解决争端。
pinyin: yī gè guān fāng shǐ tuán bèi pài qù jiě jué zhēng duān。
english: An official mission was sent to settle the dispute.

hanzi: 你应该体谅他, 因为他一直病著.
pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi tǐ liàng tā,  yīn wèi tā yī zhí bìng著.
english: You must make allowances for him because he has been ill.

hanzi: 他的父母决不会答应这门婚事。
pinyin: tā de fù mǔ jué bù kuài dā ying zhè mén hūn shì。
english: Her parents will never take acquiescence of such a marriage.

hanzi: 他们的产品总是包装得非常精美.
pinyin: tā men de chǎn pǐn zǒng shì bāo zhuāng de fēi cháng jīng měi.
english: Their products are always attractively packaged.

hanzi: 和我妹妹不同，我是一个糟糕的厨师。
pinyin: huò wǒ mèi mei bù tóng， wǒ shì yī gè zāo gāo de chú shī。
english: Unlike my sister, I am a terrible cook.

hanzi: 回音测深仪一种声音测深仪的商标
pinyin: huí yīn cè shēn yí yī zhòng shēng yīn cè shēn yí de shāng biāo
english: A trademark used for a sonic depth finder.

hanzi: 生日那天，我收到一套园艺工具。
pinyin: shēng rì nà tiān， wǒ shōu dào yī tào yuán yì gōng jù。
english: I received a set of gardening tools on my birthday.

hanzi: 公司需要多找些有你这种才干的人.
pinyin: gōng sī xū yào duō zhǎo xiē yǒu nǐ zhè zhǒng cái gàn de rén.
english: The firm needs more people of your calibre.

hanzi: 这个问题不在我们探讨的范围之内.
pinyin: zhè gè wèn tí bù zài wǒ men tàn tǎo de fàn wéi zhī nèi.
english: This subject is outside the scope of our inquiry.

hanzi: 我再也不会容忍他的无理要求了。
pinyin: wǒ zài yě bù kuài róng rěn tā de wú lǐ yāo qiú le。
english: I won't stand for his unreasonable demands any longer.

hanzi: 房间是用深浅不一的蓝色粉刷的。
pinyin: fáng jiān shì yòng shēn qiǎn bù yī de lán sè fěn shuà de。
english: The room was painted in various shades of blue.

hanzi: 他妻子的去世使他的生活变得空虚。
pinyin: tā qī zi de qù shì shǐ tā de shēng huó biàn de kōng xū。
english: His wife's death left him a vacuum in his life.

hanzi: 我大部分时间都用在观光游览上了.
pinyin: wǒ dà bù fen shí jiān dōu yòng zài guān guāng yóu lǎn shàng le.
english: I spent most of my time (in) sightseeing.

hanzi: 一页版面为在一面印刷的版面设置
pinyin: yī yè bǎn miàn wèi zài yī miàn yìn shuà de bǎn miàn shè zhì
english: The type set for printing one side of a leaf.

hanzi: 从这家到那家的路程要用一小时。
pinyin: zòng zhè jiā dào nà jiā de lù chéng yào yòng yī xiǎo shí。
english: The journey takes about an hour, door to door.

hanzi: 你一直睡著, 这场雷雨都没把你吵醒.
pinyin: nǐ yī zhí shuì著,  zhè chǎng léi yǔ dōu mò bǎ nǐ chǎo xǐng.
english: You slept right through the thunderstorm.

hanzi: 你的车子使用高级汽油可以增大马力。
pinyin: nǐ de jū zi shǐ yòng gāo jí qì yóu kě yǐ zēng dà mǎ lì。
english: High-test gasoline will soup up your car.

hanzi: 我一直坐在地板上, 脚都麻木了.
pinyin: wǒ yī zhí zuò zài dì bǎn shàng,  jué dōu má mù le.
english: I've been sitting on the floor and my foot's gone to sleep.

hanzi: 我认为你没有意识到局势的严重.
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi nǐ méi yǒu yì shí dào jú shì de yán zhòng.
english: I don't think you realize the gravity of the situation.

hanzi: 我脑中有一闪念, 以为他要拒绝了.
pinyin: wǒ nǎo zhòng yǒu yī shǎn niàn,  yǐ wéi tā yào jù jué le.
english: Just for an instant I thought he was going to refuse.

hanzi: 失败的消息夺走了我们所有的斗志。
pinyin: shī bài de xiāo xi duó zǒu le wǒ men suǒ yǒu de dòu zhì。
english: The news of defeat took all the fight out of us.

hanzi: 湿度是空气内含水分多少的量度.
pinyin: shī dù shì kōng qì nèi hán shuǐ fèn duō shao de liáng dù.
english: Humidity is a measure of moisture in the atmosphere.

hanzi: 婚姻是大多数社会早已确立的制度。
pinyin: hūn yīn shì dà duō shù shè huì zǎo yǐ què lì de zhì dù。
english: Marriage is an institution in most societies.

hanzi: 移民到这个国家有严格的限制。
pinyin: yí mín dào zhè gè guó jiā yǒu yán gé de xiàn zhì。
english: There are strict controls on immigration into this country.

hanzi: 新规章对我们大家都会大有好处.
pinyin: xīn guī zhāng duì wǒ men dà jiā dū huì dà yǒu hǎo chu.
english: The new regulations will be of great benefit to us all.

hanzi: 这所中学附属于一所师范院校。
pinyin: zhè suǒ zhōng xué fù shǔ yú yī suǒ shī fàn yuàn xiào。
english: This middle school is attached to a teachers' college.

hanzi: 随着进口的增加, 需求已经减少。
pinyin: suí zhe jìn kǒu de zēng jiā,  xū qiú yǐ jīng jiǎn shǎo。
english: Demand has been brought down by increase in imports.

hanzi: 这场火把城市上空映得一片通红。
pinyin: zhè chǎng huǒ bǎ chéng shì shàng kōng yìng de yī piàn tōng hóng。
english: The fire cast a ruddy glow over the city.

hanzi: 她保持着长距离游泳的世界纪录。
pinyin: tā bǎo chí zhuó zhǎng jù lí yóu yǒng de shì jiè jì lù。
english: She holds the world record for long distance swimming.

hanzi: 那两个国家再次终止了交往。
pinyin: nà liǎng gè guó jiā zài cì zhōng zhǐ le jiāo wǎng。
english: Those two countries have broken off diplomatic relations again.

hanzi: 目前正将医药用品空投到灾区.
pinyin: mù qián zhèng jiàng yī yào yòng pǐn kòng tóu dào zāi qū.
english: Medical supplies are being dropped to the stricken area.

hanzi: 他以自己的名义支持这一崇高的事业。
pinyin: tā yǐ zì jǐ de míng yì zhī chí zhè yī chóng gāo de shì yè。
english: He has lent his name to the lofty cause.

hanzi: 这块湿地不够坚实, 不能在上面走.
pinyin: zhè kuài shī dì bù gòu jiān shí,  bù néng zài shàng mian zǒu.
english: This wet ground is not firm enough to walk on.

hanzi: 村庄零零落落地散布在山脚下。
pinyin: cūn zhuāng líng líng luò luò dì sàn bù zài shān jiǎo xià。
english: Small villages scatter at the foot of the mountain.

hanzi: 他在选举中失去了议会中的席位。
pinyin: tā zài xuǎn jǔ zhòng shī qù le yì huì zhòng dì xí wèi。
english: He lost his seat in the Parliament at the election.

hanzi: 读一本好书可以带来心灵的净化。
pinyin: dú yī běn hào shū kě yǐ dài lái xīn líng de jìng huà。
english: Reading a good book may bring purification to souls.

hanzi: 这次考试之难出乎我的意料之外。
pinyin: zhè cì kǎo shì zhī nàn chū hū wǒ de yì liào zhī wài。
english: The exam is more difficult than I have bargained for.

hanzi: 她把自己收藏的画借给了美术馆。
pinyin: tā bǎ zì jǐ shōu cáng de huà jiè jǐ le měi shù guǎn。
english: She loaned her collection of paintings to the gallery.

hanzi: 近来差不多样样东西都涨价。
pinyin: jìn lái cī bù duō yàng yàng dōng xi dōu zhàng jià。
english: In recent times the price of just about everything has gone up.

hanzi: 我们的足球队取得了压倒性的胜利。
pinyin: wǒ men de zú qiú duì qǔ dé le yā dào xìng de shèng lì。
english: Our football team has won an overwhelming victory.

hanzi: 汽车轮一脱落, 我就想我算完了.
pinyin: qì chē lún yī tuō luò,  wǒ jiù xiǎng wǒ suàn wán le.
english: When the wheel came off the car I thought my number was up!

hanzi: 作为水手获得了航海的实践经验
pinyin: zuò wéi shuǐ shǒu huò dé le háng hǎi de shí jiàn jīng yàn
english: Gained practical experience of sailing as a deck hand.

hanzi: 喜讯传来，人们顿时欢呼起来。
pinyin: xǐ xùn zhuàn lái， rén men dùn shí huān hū qǐ lai。
english: People broke into cheers at once when they heard the good news.

hanzi: 他对我们提出的反对意见一概置之不理。
pinyin: tā duì wǒ men tí chū de fǎn duì yì jiàn yī gài zhì zhī bù lǐ。
english: He waved aside all out objections.

hanzi: 别为了丢失一支笔就这样大惊小怪。
pinyin: biè wèi le diū shī yī zhī bǐ jiù zhè yàng dà jīng xiǎo guài。
english: Don't make so much fuss over losing a pen.

hanzi: 中等的中等的或一般的数量或范围的
pinyin: zhōng děng de zhōng děng de huò yì bān de shù liàng huò fàn wéi de
english: Of medium or average quantity or extent.

hanzi: 我们经常思考人生的美丽与复杂。
pinyin: wǒ men jīng cháng sī kǎo rén shēng de měi lì yù fù zá。
english: I often reflect on the beauty and complexity of life.

hanzi: 我们不知道这些鸟如何找到它们的路。
pinyin: wǒ men bù zhī dào zhè xie niǎo rú hé zhǎo dào tā men de lù。
english: We have no idea how the birds find their way.

hanzi: 药物有时具有令人不快的副作用。
pinyin: yào wù yǒu shí jù yǒu lìng rén bù kuài de fù zuò yòng。
english: Medicines sometimes have unpleasant side effects.

hanzi: 我愿本周加班工作以示诚意.
pinyin: wǒ yuàn běn zhōu jiā bān gōng zuò yǐ shì chéng yì.
english: As an earnest of my good intentions I will work overtime this week.

hanzi: 在演讲开头主席开了一个玩笑。
pinyin: zài yǎn jiǎng kāi tóu zhǔ xí kāi le yī gè wán xiào。
english: At the beginning of the speech the chairman cracked a joke.

hanzi: 这种坏事不是一下能扫除干净的。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng huài shì bú shì yī xià néng sǎo chú gān jìng de。
english: Such evil practice cannot be swept away at once.

hanzi: 总统的讲话激励国民更加努力.
pinyin: zǒng tǒng de jiǎng huà jī lì guó mín gèng jiā nǔ lì.
english: The President's speech impelled the nation to greater efforts.

hanzi: 由重重的行走或行军产生的声音
pinyin: yóu chóng chóng de xíng zǒu huò xíng jūn chǎn shēng de shēng yīn
english: The sound produced by heavy walking or marching.

hanzi: 他们的研究项目实用价值很有限。
pinyin: tā men de yán jiū xiàng mù shí yòng jià zhí hěn yǒu xiàn。
english: Their research project has limited practical utility.

hanzi: 我对是否接受那项工作顾虑重重。
pinyin: wǒ duì shì fǒu jiē shòu nà xiàng gōng zuò gù lu:4 chóng chóng。
english: I have many misgivings about taking the job.

hanzi: 他为晚会安排了一支充满活力的乐队。
pinyin: tā wèi wǎn huì ān pái le yī zhī chōng mǎn huó lì de yuè duì。
english: He's lined up a live band for the party.

hanzi: 他把公报送来，我仔细看了一遍。
pinyin: tā bǎ gōng bào sòng lái， wǒ zǐ xì kàn le yī biàn。
english: He sent me the communique.I looked it through thoroughly.

hanzi: 在这个工业地区兴起一座新城市。
pinyin: zài zhè gè gōng yè dì qū xīng qǐ yī zuò xīn chéng shì。
english: A new city has grown up in this industrial district.

hanzi: 那强盗以刀刺穿了那旅客的胸部。
pinyin: nà qiáng dào yǐ dāo cì chuān le nà lu:3 kè de xiōng bù。
english: The robber thrust his sword through the traveler's bosom.

hanzi: 压缩周期上述机器压缩过程的周期
pinyin: yā suō zhōu qī shàng shù jī qì yā suō guò chéng de zhōu qī
english: The engine cycle during which this process occurs.

hanzi: 他把旧汽车折价添钱买了辆新型号的。
pinyin: tā bǎ jiù qì chē zhé jie tiān qián mǎi le liàng xīn xíng hào de。
english: He traded in his car for a new model.

hanzi: 低气压区大气压低于正常值的地区
pinyin: dī qì yā qū dà qì yā dī yú zhèng cháng zhí de dì qū
english: A region of atmospheric pressure that is below normal.

hanzi: 敌人在一场决定性的战斗中被击败.
pinyin: dí rén zài yī chǎng jué dìng xìng de zhàn dòu zhòng bèi jī bài.
english: The enemy was defeated in a decisive battle.

hanzi: 这位老师给他的学生们定下高标准。
pinyin: zhè wèi lǎo shī jǐ tā de xué sheng men dìng xià gāo biāo zhǔn。
english: The teacher sets high standard for his pupils.

hanzi: 急需将食物和衣服送给灾民。
pinyin: jí xū jiàng shí wù huò yī fu sòng jǐ zāi mín。
english: It is urgent that food and clothing (should) be sent to the sufferers.

hanzi: 这本书是他以前写的剧本的扩充。
pinyin: zhè běn shū shì tā yǐ qián xiě de jù běn de kuò chōng。
english: This book is an expansion of the play he wrote before.

hanzi: 他总是把话头引到他得意的话题上去。
pinyin: tā zǒng shì bǎ huà tou yǐn dào tā dé yì de huà tí shàng qù。
english: He always leads up to his favorite topic.

hanzi: 据说总统已经秘密逃往边境了。
pinyin: jù shuō zǒng tǒng yǐ jīng mì mì táo wàng biān jìng le。
english: It is said President has escaped to the border in secret.

hanzi: 随着时间的推移，听众越来越多了。
pinyin: suí zhe shí jiān de tuī yí， tīng zhòng yuè lái yuè duō le。
english: The hearers increased quickly as time went on.

hanzi: 贵宾们在大餐厅参加一个宴会。
pinyin: guì bīn men zài dà cān tīng cān jiā yī gè yàn huì。
english: The guests partook of a luxurious repast in the banqueting hall.

hanzi: 军官用无线电向士兵下达命令.
pinyin: jūn guān yòng wú xiàn diàn xiàng shì bīng xià dá mìng lìng.
english: The officer communicated his orders to the men by radio.

hanzi: 我的车轮子在汽车比赛中途脱掉了。
pinyin: wǒ de jū lún zi zài qì chē bǐ sài zhōng tú tuō diào le。
english: My wheel twisted off in the middle of the car race.

hanzi: 这一项宣布引起了热烈的欢呼声.
pinyin: zhè yí xiàng xuān bù yǐn qǐ le rè liè de huān hū shēng.
english: The announcement was greeted with much hilarity and mirth.

hanzi: 喜讯传来，人们顿时欢呼起来。
pinyin: xǐ xùn zhuàn lái， rén men dùn shí huān hū qǐ lai。
english: People broke into cheers at once when they heard the good news.

hanzi: 今天的天气已露出了一丝秋天的气息。
pinyin: jīn tiān de tiān qì yǐ lù chū le yī sī qiū tiān de qì xī。
english: There is a breath of autumn in the air today.

hanzi: 近来对古典音乐的兴趣又浓厚起来。
pinyin: jìn lái duì gǔ diǎn yīn yuè de xìng qu yòu nóng hòu qǐ lai。
english: Interest in classic music has revived recently.

hanzi: 那件混纺的确良衬衣花了我九块钱。
pinyin: nà jiàn hùn fǎng dí què liáng chèn yī huā le wǒ jiǔ kuài qián。
english: That mixed dacron shirt cost me nine yuan.

hanzi: 她不是一个能容忍别人玩弄的女子。
pinyin: tā bú shì yī gè néng róng rěn bié rén wán nòng de nu:3 zǐ。
english: She's not a woman to tolerate being played with

hanzi: 有关各符号的意义请见左边附表.
pinyin: yǒu guān gè fú hào de yì yì qǐng xiàn zuǒ biān fù biǎo.
english: For an explanationof the symbols see the key, inset left.

hanzi: 机器人逐渐代替了装配线上的工人.
pinyin: jī qì rén zhú jiàn dài tì le zhuāng pèi xiàn shàng de gōng rén.
english: Robots are replacing people on assembly lines.

hanzi: 得到她丈夫的死讯, 她神经错乱了。
pinyin: dé dào tā zhàng fu de sǐ xùn,  tā shén jīng cuò luàn le。
english: At the news of her husband's death, she went to pieces.

hanzi: 我们不能责怪他, 他已尽力而为了.
pinyin: wǒ men bù néng zé guài tā,  tā yǐ jìn lì ér wèi le.
english: We can't blame him: he did his best according to his lights.

hanzi: 她把连衣裙放在床上以保持平整。
pinyin: tā bǎ lián yì qún fàng zài chuáng shàng yǐ bǎo chí píng zhěng。
english: She laid her dress on the bed to keep it neat.

hanzi: 这家公司关心它自身的法人形象。
pinyin: zhè jiā gōng sī guān xīn tā zì shēn de fǎ rén xíng xiàng。
english: This company is concerned about its corporate image.

hanzi: 国王是一个王国中最重要的人物。
pinyin: guó wáng shì yī gè wáng guó zhòng zuì zhòng yào de rén wù。
english: The king is the most important person in a kingdom.

hanzi: 这只母象比小象重一百倍。
pinyin: zhè zhǐ mǔ xiàng bì xiǎo xiàng zhòng yī bǎi bèi。
english: The mother elephant is one hundred times heavier than the baby elephant.

hanzi: 一花独放不是春，百花齐放春满园。
pinyin: yī huā dú fàng bú shì chūn， bǎi huā qí fàng chūn mǎn yuán。
english: A single flower does not make a spring.

hanzi: 那个地方在地图上以十字形记号标出.
pinyin: nèi gè dì fang zài dì tú shàng yǐ shí zì xíng jì hao biāo chū.
english: The place is marked on the map with a cross.

hanzi: 他的跳远成绩盖过了所有的选手。
pinyin: tā de tiào yuǎn chéng jī gě guò le suǒ yǒu de xuǎn shǒu。
english: He excelled all the other contestants in the long jump.

hanzi: 那场争论已演变成过分的人身攻击了.
pinyin: nà chǎng zhēng lùn yǐ yǎn biàn chéng guò fèn de rén shēn gōng jī le.
english: The argument was becoming too personal.

hanzi: 那些犯人被警察轻而易举地制服了。
pinyin: nà xiē fàn rén bèi jǐng chá qīng ér yì jǔ de zhì fù le。
english: The criminals were easily overpowered by the police.

hanzi: 那种工作不可能做到十全十美.
pinyin: nà zhòng gōng zuò bù kě néng zuò dào shí quán shí měi.
english: Perfection is impossible to achieve in that kind of work.

hanzi: 并非所有外宾均符合入境规定.
pinyin: bìng fēi suǒ yǒu wài bīn jūn fú hé rù jìng guī dìng.
english: Not all foreign visitors satisfy/fulfil legal entry requirements.

hanzi: 你忽略了火车或许迟到的可能性。
pinyin: nǐ hū lu:è le huǒ chē huò xǔ chí dào de kě néng xìng。
english: You left out the possibility that the train might be late.

hanzi: 我经常读报来尽量了解时事.
pinyin: wǒ jīng cháng dú bào lái jìn liàng liǎo jiě shí shì.
english: I try to keep in touch with current events by reading the newspapers.

hanzi: 这人养成了服用有害麻醉品的习惯。
pinyin: zhè rén yǎng chéng le fú yòng yǒu hài má zuì pǐn de xí guàn。
english: The man formed a habit of taking harmful drugs.

hanzi: 观众起立向那位歌手鼓掌达十分钟.
pinyin: guān zhòng qǐ lì xiàng nà wèi gē shǒu gǔ zhǎng dá shí fēn zhōng.
english: The singer got a ten-minute standing ovation.

hanzi: 你未得许可就把汽车开走是不应该的.
pinyin: nǐ wèi de xǔ kě jiù bǎ qì chē kāi zǒu shì bù yīng gāi de.
english: You were wrong to take the car without permission.

hanzi: 他的律师决定向高一级法院上诉。
pinyin: tā de lu:4 shī jué dìng xiàng gāo yī jí fǎ yuàn shàng sù。
english: His lawyer decided to take an appeal to a higher court.

hanzi: 他被对手击败后，我尽力安慰他。
pinyin: tā bèi duì shǒu jī bài hòu， wǒ jìn lì ān wèi tā。
english: I tried to comfort him after he was defeated by his opponent.

hanzi: 那所房子燃烧了数小时火才扑灭。
pinyin: nà suǒ fáng zi rán shāo le shuò xiǎo shí huǒ cái pū miè。
english: The house burned for hours before the blaze was put out.

hanzi: 这个剧作家受到了本国人民的尊敬。
pinyin: zhè gè jù zuò jiā shòu dào le běn guó rén mín de zūn jìng。
english: The dramatist was respected by people in his country.

hanzi: 我留下了张条子以便与她取得联系。
pinyin: wǒ liú xià le zhāng tiáo zi yǐ biàn yù tā qǔ dé lián xì。
english: I left a message so as to be sure of contacting her.

hanzi: 旅馆工作人员等到淡季再休假.
pinyin: lu:3 guǎn gōng zuò rén yuán děng dào dàn jì zài xiū jià.
english: Hotel workers wait until the off-season to take their holidays.

hanzi: 那件混纺的确良衬衣花了我九块钱。
pinyin: nà jiàn hùn fǎng dí què liáng chèn yī huā le wǒ jiǔ kuài qián。
english: That mixed dacron shirt cost me nine yuan.

hanzi: 这些都是与社会福利有关的问题。
pinyin: zhè xie dōu shì yù shè huì fú lì yǒu guān de wèn tí。
english: These are matters that bear on the welfare of the community.

hanzi: 资方在与工人谈判中作出了让步.
pinyin: zī fāng zài yù gōng rén tán pàn zhòng zuò chū le ràng bù.
english: Employers made concessions to the workers in negotiations.

hanzi: 我所有的业余时间都用在诗歌阅读上。
pinyin: wǒ suǒ yǒu de yè yú shí jiān dōu yòng zài shī gē yuè dú shàng。
english: I spent all my spare time reading poetry.

hanzi: 给她一次警告就足以制止她做那件事了.
pinyin: jǐ tā yī cì jǐng gào jiù zú yǐ zhì zhǐ tā zuò nà jiàn shì le.
english: One warning sufficed to stop her doing it.

hanzi: 联合国大会是一种世界性的集会。
pinyin: lián hé guó dà huì shì yī zhòng shì jiè xìng de jí huì。
english: The United Nations assembly is a cosmopolitan gathering.

hanzi: 词典中的词是按字母顺序排列的.
pinyin: cí diǎn zhòng dì cí shì àn zì mǔ shùn xù pái liè de.
english: The words in the dictionary are arranged in alphabetical order.

hanzi: 造反派领袖与警察首领秘密会见。
pinyin: zào fǎn pài lǐng xiù yù jǐng chá shǒu lǐng mì mì huì jiàn。
english: The rebel leader meet the chief of police in secret.

hanzi: 我们闻到厨房里的香味直流口水.
pinyin: wǒ men wén dào chú fáng lǐ de xiāng wèi zhí liú kǒu shuǐ.
english: The delicious smell from the kitchen made our mouths water.

hanzi: 医生无法解释高烧何以持久不退。
pinyin: yī shēng wú fǎ jiě shì gāo shāo hé yǐ chí jiǔ bù tuì。
english: The doctor couldn't explain the persistence of the fever.

hanzi: 这所房子不时进行扩建.
pinyin: zhè suǒ fáng zi bù shí jìn xíng kuò jiàn.
english: The house has been added to (ie New rooms, etc have been built on to it) from time to time.

hanzi: 强迫的由强迫或压制所引起或制约的
pinyin: qiǎng pò de yóu qiǎng pò huò yā zhì suǒ yǐn qǐ huò zhì yuē de
english: Caused or conditioned by compulsion or obsession.

hanzi: 未经委员会批准，我们不能动工。
pinyin: wèi jīng wěi yuán huì pī zhǔn， wǒ men bù néng dòng gōng。
english: We can't start building without the council's approval.

hanzi: 我即便听了他的解释, 仍然不明白.
pinyin: wǒ jí biàn tìng le tā de jiě shì,  réng rán bù míng bái.
english: Even after listening to his explanation I'm none the wiser.

hanzi: 古人认为勇敢是美德的主要成分。
pinyin: gǔ rén rèn wéi yǒng gǎn shì měi dé de zhǔ yào chéng fèn。
english: The ancients counted courage as the main part of virtue.

hanzi: 这座红色的建筑物有着丰富的历史经历。
pinyin: zhè zuò hóng sè de jiàn zhù wù yǒu zhe fēng fù de lì shǐ jīng lì。
english: This red building is steeped in history.

hanzi: 他的作品中含有真正引人入胜的东西。
pinyin: tā de zuò pǐn zhòng hán yǒu zhēn zhèng yǐn rén rù shèng de dōng xi。
english: His writing contains some real goodies.

hanzi: 这孩子品行不好，说明家教不严。
pinyin: zhè hái zi pǐn xíng bù hǎo， shuō míng jiā jiào bù yán。
english: That child's bad behaviour reflects on his home training.

hanzi: 我队要求暂停，以便商讨新的对策。
pinyin: wǒ duì yāo qiú zàn tíng， yǐ biàn shāng tǎo xīn de duì cè。
english: Our team asked for time out to discuss a new plan.

hanzi: 这个国家最优秀的人才在不断外流。
pinyin: zhè gè guó jiā zuì yōu xiù de rén cái zài bù duàn wài liú。
english: This country is being drained of its best talents.

hanzi: 他脸上安详的微笑使我们都冷静下来。
pinyin: tā liǎn shàng ān xiáng de wēi xiào shǐ wǒ men dōu lěng jìng xia lai。
english: His serene smile calmed all of us down.

hanzi: 我队要求暂停，以便商讨新的对策。
pinyin: wǒ duì yāo qiú zàn tíng， yǐ biàn shāng tǎo xīn de duì cè。
english: Our team asked for time out to discuss a new plan.

hanzi: 创造就业机会是政府必须做的事。
pinyin: chuàng zào jiù yè jī huì shì zhèng fǔ bì xū zuò de shì。
english: Job creation has become an imperative for the government.

hanzi: 什么也动摇不了他要当律师的决心。
pinyin: shén me yě dòng yáo bù liǎo tā yào dàng lu:4 shī de jué xīn。
english: Nothing can weaken his resolve to become a lawyer.

hanzi: 这所房子不时进行扩建.
pinyin: zhè suǒ fáng zi bù shí jìn xíng kuò jiàn.
english: The house has been added to (ie New rooms, etc have been built on to it) from time to time.

hanzi: 她公开声称她的抱负是要当政治家.
pinyin: tā gōng kāi shēng chēng tā de bào fù shì yào dàng zhèng zhì jiā.
english: Her declared ambition is to become a politician.

hanzi: 我一时心软同意了支付她度假的费用.
pinyin: wǒ yī shí xīn ruǎn tóng yì le zhī fù tā dù jià de fèi yòng.
english: In a weak moment, I agreed to pay for her holiday.

hanzi: 她要他清理好他弄得乱七八糟的东西。
pinyin: tā yào tā qīng lǐ hào tā nòng de luàn qī bā zāo de dōng xi。
english: She tell him to clear up the mess he have make.

hanzi: 你的这一班机是英国航空公司的飞机.
pinyin: nǐ de zhè yī bān jī shì Yīng guó háng kōng gōng sī de fēi jī.
english: Your carrier for this flight is British Airways.

hanzi: 管理部门正在设法提高生产率.
pinyin: guǎn lǐ bù mén zhèng zài shè fǎ tí gāo shēng chǎn lu:4.
english: The management are looking for ways of improving productivity.

hanzi: 稻子是大多数南方省份的主要作物。
pinyin: dào zi shì dà duō shù nán fāng shěng fèn de zhǔ yào zuò wù。
english: Rice is the chief crop in most southern provinces.

hanzi: 这种新材料是航天工业的副产品.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng xīn cái liào shì háng tiān gōng yè de fù chǎn pǐn.
english: This new material is a spin-off from the space industry.

hanzi: 那孩子翻著跟头从体育馆这头翻到那头.
pinyin: nà hái zi fān著 gēn tou zòng tǐ yù guǎn zhè tou fān dào nà tou.
english: The child somersaulted across the gymnasium.

hanzi: 新征召的军人刚配备好个人装具。
pinyin: xīn zhēng zhào de jūn rén gāng pèi bèi hào gè rén zhuāng jù。
english: The new intake of soldiers has just been kitted out.

hanzi: 把门关上，不然亮光能使底片发灰。
pinyin: bǎ mén guān shàng， bù rán liàng guāng néng shǐ dǐ piàn fà huī。
english: Shut the door or the light will fog the film.

hanzi: 全体会员都被要求出席这次晚会。
pinyin: quán tǐ huì yuán dōu bèi yāo qiú chū xí zhè cì wǎn huì。
english: It is requested that all members be present at the party.

hanzi: 在这个问题上公众的意见已两极分化.
pinyin: zài zhè gè wèn tí shàng gōng zhòng de yì jiàn yǐ liǎng jí fēn huà.
english: Public opinion has polarized on this issue.

hanzi: 诗人写这首诗时一定非常年轻。
pinyin: shī rén xiě zhè shǒu shī shí yī dìng fēi cháng nián qīng。
english: The poet must have been very young when he wrote this poem.

hanzi: 我总是每天一早就仔细查阅我的邮件.
pinyin: wǒ zǒng shì měi tiān yī zǎo jiù zǐ xì chá yuè wǒ de yóu jiàn.
english: I always start the day by going through my mail.

hanzi: 那个地方在地图上以十字形记号标出。
pinyin: nèi gè dì fang zài dì tú shàng yǐ shí zì xíng jì hao biāo chū。
english: The place is marked on the map with a crossing.

hanzi: 繁重的工作量迫使我取消去露营。
pinyin: fán zhòng de gōng zuò liàng pò shǐ wǒ qǔ xiāo qù lù yíng。
english: The heavy workload forced me to cancel the camping trip.

hanzi: 繁重的工作量迫使我取消去露营。
pinyin: fán zhòng de gōng zuò liàng pò shǐ wǒ qǔ xiāo qù lù yíng。
english: The heavy workload forced me to cancel the camping trip.

hanzi: 超出费用实际费用超过预计费用量
pinyin: chāo chū fèi yòng shí jì fèi yòng chāo guò yù jì fèi yòng liàng
english: The amount by which actual costs exceed estimates.

hanzi: 这样的便服不宜在正式的场合穿.
pinyin: zhè yàng de biàn fú bù yí zài zhèng shì de chǎng hé chuān.
english: Such casual dress would not be correct for a formal occasion.

hanzi: 我有许多著名足球运动员的亲笔签名.
pinyin: wǒ yǒu xǔ duō著 míng zú qiú yùn dòng yuán de qīn bǐ qiān míng.
english: I've got lots of famous footballers' autographs.

hanzi: 他出名是靠他的戏剧, 并不是靠小说.
pinyin: tā chū míng shì kào tā de xì jù,  bìng bù shì kào xiǎo shuō.
english: His fame rests more on his plays than on his novels.

hanzi: 命名者命名的人。如在科学分类中
pinyin: mìng míng zhě mìng míng de rén。 rú zài kē xué fēn lèi zhòng
english: One who assigns names, as in scientific classification.

hanzi: 他的病较医生原来以为的更严重。
pinyin: tā de bìng jiào yī shēng yuán lái yǐ wéi de gèng yán zhòng。
english: His illness was more serious than the doctor first thought.

hanzi: 她被选定在这部影片中扮演女主角。
pinyin: tā bèi xuǎn dìng zài zhè bù yǐng piàn zhòng bàn yǎn nu:3 zhǔ jué。
english: She was chosen to play the heroine in this film.

hanzi: 法律的精神比它的具体条文更重要。
pinyin: fǎ lu:4 de jīng shén bì tā de jù tǐ tiáo wén gèng zhòng yào。
english: The spirit of a law is more important than its word.

hanzi: 你如果不会签名，画一个十字也可以。
pinyin: nǐ rú guǒ bù huì qiān míng， huà yī gè shí zì yě kě yǐ。
english: If you can't sign your name, make a cross instead.

hanzi: 他们试图预测这场足球比赛的结果。
pinyin: tā men shì tú yù cè zhè chǎng zú qiú bǐ sài de jié guǒ。
english: They tried to forecast the result of the football match.

hanzi: 本议程将成为下次会议的中心议题.
pinyin: běn yì chéng jiàng chéng wéi xià cì huì yì de zhōng xīn yì tí.
english: This agenda will form the basis of our next meeting.

hanzi: 夺得金牌是她又一值得骄傲的成就.
pinyin: duó dé jīn pái shì tā yòu yī zhí de jiāo ào de chéng jiù.
english: Winning the gold medal was yet another feather in her cap.

hanzi: 做工作不能白做，这是明摆著的事。
pinyin: zuò gōng zuò bù néng bái zuò， zhè shì míng bǎi著 de shì。
english: It stands to reason that nobody will work without pay.

hanzi: 我是最不可能去尝试回答这个问题。
pinyin: wǒ shì zuì bù kě néng qù cháng shì huí dá zhè gè wèn tí。
english: I would be the last to attempt to answer the question.

hanzi: 他演讲的神态还显出有点缺乏自信.
pinyin: tā yǎn jiǎng de shén tài huán xiǎn chū yǒu diǎn quē fá zì xìn.
english: His public speaking manner is still not very assured.

hanzi: 因此他们经受不住任何严重的考验。
pinyin: yīn cǐ tā men jīng shòu bú zhù rèn hé yán zhòng de kǎo yàn。
english: That is why they cannot stand up to any serious test.

hanzi: 我叔叔给了我一些钱让我开始经商。
pinyin: wǒ shū shu jǐ le wǒ yī xiē qián ràng wǒ kāi shǐ jīng shāng。
english: My uncle gave me some money to start me out in trade.

hanzi: 他真有胆量，穿着那身衣服去工作。
pinyin: tā zhēn yǒu dǎn liàng， chuān zhuó nà shēn yī fu qù gōng zuò。
english: He's got a nerve, going to work dressed like that.

hanzi: 开会时间将由班长自行决定。
pinyin: kāi huì shí jiān jiàng yóu bān zhǎng zì xíng jué dìng。
english: The hours of the meetings will be fixed at the monitor's discretion.

hanzi: 她和母亲坐着轻便双轮马车去购物。
pinyin: tā huò mǔ qīn zuò zhuó qīng biàn shuāng lún mǎ chē qù gòu wù。
english: She and her mother got on the gig to go shopping.

hanzi: 复合构词法将单个字组成复合词的形式
pinyin: fù hé gòu cí fǎ jiàng shàn gè zì zǔ chéng fù hé cí de xíng shì
english: The formation of compounds from separate words.

hanzi: 比率虽有下降, 但微不足道.
pinyin: bǐ lu:4 suī yǒu xià jiàng,  dàn wēi bù zú dào.
english: The rate has fallen by an insignificant (ie too small to be important) amount.

hanzi: 我们或是寻求供货，或者自己制造。
pinyin: wǒ men huò shì xún qiú gòng huò， huò zhě zì jǐ zhì zào。
english: Either we will find a supply, or we will make the goods.

hanzi: 每年都要花费大量金钱在烟草上。
pinyin: měi nián dōu yào huā fèi dà liàng jīn qián zài yān cǎo shàng。
english: A high amount of money is spent on tobacco every year.

hanzi: 请将你方现有目录尽速寄来为盼.
pinyin: qǐng jiàng nǐ fāng xiàn yǒu mù lù jìn sù jì lái wèi pàn.
english: Please rush me (ie send me immediately) your current catalogue.

hanzi: 他面带恳求的神态跪在皇帝面前。
pinyin: tā miàn dài kěn qiú de shén tài guì zài huáng dì miàn qián。
english: He knelt in front of the emperor with a look of entreaty.

hanzi: 我们的邮政系统临时出了一点小问题.
pinyin: wǒ men de yóu zhèng xì tǒng lín shí chū le yī diǎn xiǎo wèn tí.
english: There's been a slight hiccup in our mailing system.

hanzi: 在法国，时新的式样都是演员们首创的。
pinyin: zài fǎ guó， shí xīn de shì yàng dōu shì yǎn yuán men shǒu chuàng de。
english: The actors set the fashion in France.

hanzi: 与会的人大都反对此项提议.
pinyin: yù huì de rén dà dōu fǎn duì cǐ xiàng tí yì.
english: The feeling of the meeting (ie The opinion of the majority) was against the proposal.

hanzi: 我并没有从那本小说里得到多少乐趣。
pinyin: wǒ bìng méi yǒu zòng nà běn xiǎo shuō lǐ dé dào duō shao lè qù。
english: I didn't get much enjoyment out of that novel.

hanzi: 小云块，碎云小云彩或与之相象的某物
pinyin: xiǎo yún kuài， suì yún xiǎo yún cai huò yù zhī xiàng xiàng de mǒu wù
english: A small cloud or something resembling one.

hanzi: 她沉住气没发脾气，这是值得称赞的。
pinyin: tā chén zhù qì mò fà pí qì， zhè shì zhí de chēng zàn de。
english: It do her credit that she manage not to get angry.

hanzi: 我已经把我所有的希望都寄托在你身上了。
pinyin: wǒ yǐ jīng bǎ wǒ suǒ yǒu de xī wàng dōu jì tuō zài nǐ shēn shàng le。
english: I have staked all my hopes on you.

hanzi: 困扰我的不是他的工作，而是他的态度。
pinyin: kùn rǎo wǒ de bú shì tā de gōng zuò， ér shì tā de tài du。
english: It's not his work that bothers me; it's his attitude.

hanzi: 老矿区的六十多个矿井正在扩建。
pinyin: lǎo kuàng qū de liù shí duō gè kuàng jǐng zhèng zài kuò jiàn。
english: More than60 pits in old mining areas are being extended.

hanzi: 即使涨价后石油的消费仍在增长。
pinyin: jí shǐ zhàng jià hòu shí yóu de xiāo fèi réng zài zēng zhǎng。
english: Consumption of oil increase even after it rise in price.

hanzi: 老矿区的六十多个矿井正在扩建。
pinyin: lǎo kuàng qū de liù shí duō gè kuàng jǐng zhèng zài kuò jiàn。
english: More than60 pits in old mining areas are being extended.

hanzi: 比赛中的马临近终点时拉开了距离。
pinyin: bǐ sài zhòng dì mǎ lín jìn zhōng diǎn shí lā kāi le jù lí。
english: The horse is stringing out towards the end of the race.

hanzi: 我刚站起身，他就挥手让我坐着。
pinyin: wǒ gāng zhàn qǐ shēn， tā jiù huī shǒu ràng wǒ zuò zhuó。
english: I had no sooner stood up than he waved me to remain sitting.

hanzi: 他全神注视着这片金黄色的景色。
pinyin: tā quán shén zhù shì zhuó zhè piàn jīn huáng shǎi de jǐng sè。
english: On this golden prospect all his attention was now fixed.

hanzi: 他声称创造了新纪录, 那可大有争议.
pinyin: tā shēng chēng chuàng zào le xīn jì lù,  nà kě dà yǒu zhēng yì.
english: He made some very disputable claims about his record.

hanzi: 最近的事态发展使我们受到很大的鼓舞.
pinyin: zuì jìn de shì tài fā zhǎn shǐ wǒ men shòu dào hěn dà de gǔ wǔ.
english: We are much heartened by the latest developments.

hanzi: 她通过与几位诗人的交往而出名了.
pinyin: tā tōng guò yù jǐ wèi shī rén de jiāo wǎng ér chū míng le.
english: She became famous through her association with several poets.

hanzi: 她的美貌使她与其他女孩相比占了优势。
pinyin: tā de měi mào shǐ tā yǔ qí tā nu:3 hái xiāng bǐ zhàn le yōu shì。
english: Her good look gave her a pull over other girls.

hanzi: 你仔细考虑过之后，请用传真相告。
pinyin: nǐ zǐ xì kǎo lu:4 guò zhī hòu， qǐng yòng chuán zhēn xiàng gào。
english: After you think it over, please let me know by fax.

hanzi: 他们为自己的产品找到了一些新的市场。
pinyin: tā men wèi zì jǐ de chǎn pǐn zhǎo dào le yī xiē xīn de shì chǎng。
english: They found some new outlets for their products.

hanzi: 接收节目前，你应该先装天线。
pinyin: jiē shōu jié mù qián， nǐ yīng gāi xiān zhuāng tiān xiàn。
english: You should fix the television antenna before receiving programs.

hanzi: 客队实力太强了--把我们打得一败涂地.
pinyin: kè duì shí lì tài qiáng le-- bǎ wǒ men dǎ de yī bài tú de.
english: The visiting team was too strong they walked all over us.

hanzi: 她很崇拜他, 听不进别人对他的批评.
pinyin: tā hěn chóng bài tā,  tìng bù jìn bié rén duì tā de pī píng.
english: She worshipped him and refused to listen to his critics.

hanzi: 副排长叫士兵们从右首开始报数。
pinyin: fù pái zhǎng jiào shì bīng men zòng yòu shǒu kāi shǐ bào shù。
english: The platoon sergeant numbered his men off from the right.

hanzi: 接收节目前，你应该先装天线。
pinyin: jiē shōu jié mù qián， nǐ yīng gāi xiān zhuāng tiān xiàn。
english: You should fix the television antenna before receiving programs.

hanzi: 政府设法干扰游击队的无线电通讯.
pinyin: zhèng fǔ shè fǎ gān rǎo yóu jī duì de wú xiàn diàn tōng xùn.
english: The government tried to jam the guerrillas' transmissions.

hanzi: 他们看着电视里的快步舞并且试图模仿。
pinyin: tā men kàn zhuó diàn shì lǐ de kuài bù wǔ bìng qiě shì tú mó fǎng。
english: They watched jig on TV and tried to imitate.

hanzi: 我国的对外贸易近年来已有极大发展.
pinyin: wǒ guó de duì wài mào yì jìn nián lái yǐ yǒu jí dà fā zhǎn.
english: Our foreign trade has expanded greatly in recent years.

hanzi: 在晚会上，他和他的密友亲密交谈。
pinyin: zài wǎn huì shàng， tā huò tā de mì yǒu qīn mì jiāo tán。
english: He exchanged intimacies with his bosom friend at the party.

hanzi: 有道理，我认为那是非常公道的价格。
pinyin: yǒu dào lǐ， wǒ rèn wéi nà shì fēi cháng gōng dao de jià gé。
english: Fair enough, I think that's a very reasonable price.

hanzi: 那位穿军装的人恐怕就是团长了。
pinyin: nà wèi chuān jūn zhuāng de rén kǒng pà jiù shì tuán zhǎng le。
english: The man in the army uniform will be the regiment commander.

hanzi: 我愿意以朋友的名义给你一些建议。
pinyin: wǒ yuàn yì yǐ péng you de míng yì jǐ nǐ yī xiē jiàn yì。
english: I would like to give you some advice in the name of a friend.

hanzi: 他固执己见，什么也不能让他改变。
pinyin: tā gù zhí jǐ xiàn， shén me yě bù néng ràng tā gǎi biàn。
english: He is wedded to his own opinion and nothing can change him.

hanzi: 把你的名字填写在每页上端的括号内。
pinyin: bǎ nǐ de míng zi tián xiě zài měi yè shàng duān de kuò hào nèi。
english: Put your name in brackets at the top of each page.

hanzi: 她在报告中探讨了帝国主义的本性。
pinyin: tā zài bào gào zhòng tàn tǎo le dì guó zhǔ yì de běn xìng。
english: In her talk she went into the nature of imperialism.

hanzi: 除技术法则和实践艺术外的所有知识
pinyin: chú jì shù fǎ zé huò shí jiàn yì shù wài de suǒ yǒu zhī shi
english: All learning except technical precepts and practical arts.

hanzi: 这位著名的经济学家给我们做了一次演讲。
pinyin: zhè wèi著 míng de jīng jì xué jiā jǐ wǒ men zuò le yī cì yǎn jiǎng。
english: The famous economist gave us a speech.

hanzi: 这个组织是在世界银行的赞助下办的。
pinyin: zhè gè zǔ zhī shì zài shì jiè yín háng de zàn zhù xià bàn de。
english: The association is under the auspices of Word Bank.

hanzi: 她的印度之行成了她一生的转折点。
pinyin: tā de Yìn dù zhī xìng chéng le tā yī shēng de zhuǎn zhé diǎn。
english: Her visit to India proved to be a watershed in her life.

hanzi: 他好想入非非, 觉得自己赢了一块金牌.
pinyin: tā hào xiǎng rù fēi fēi,  jué de zì jǐ yíng le yī kuài jīn pái.
english: He liked to fantasize that he had won a gold medal.

hanzi: 民间音乐是一代一代地流传下来的。
pinyin: mín jiān yīn yuè shì yī dài yī dài de liú chuán xia lai de。
english: Folk music has been passed down from one generation to another.

hanzi: 我们用电脑取代了老式的加法计算器。
pinyin: wǒ men yòng diàn nǎo qǔ dài le lǎo shì de jiā fǎ jì suàn qì。
english: We've replaced the old adding machine with a computer.

hanzi: 他历史考试不及格，其他科目都通过了。
pinyin: tā lì shǐ kǎo shì bù jí gé， qí tā kē mù dōu tōng guò le。
english: He got a fail in history and passes in other subjects.

hanzi: 这家商店因公平交易而获好名声。
pinyin: zhè jiā shāng diàn yīn gōng píng jiāo yì ér huò hào míng shēng。
english: This store has an excellent reputation for fair dealing.

hanzi: 再者, 我们还要考虑到法律方面的含义.
pinyin: zài zhě,  wǒ men huán yào kǎo lu:4 dào fǎ lu:4 fāng miàn de hán yì.
english: Again, we have to consider the legal implications.

hanzi: 这个小孩以他父亲的名字而命名。
pinyin: zhè gè xiǎo hái yǐ tā fù qīn de míng zi ér mìng míng。
english: The child was named after its father, given its father's first name.

hanzi: 用旧公共汽车应急来安置难民.
pinyin: yòng jiù gōng gòng qì chē yìng jí Lái ān zhì nàn mín.
english: Old buses were pressed into service as emergency housing for the refugees.

hanzi: 那消息给加了花边，使之更加引人注目。
pinyin: nà xiāo xi jǐ jiā le huā biān， shǐ zhī gèng jiā yǐn rén zhù mù。
english: The news was boxed in to draw more attention.

hanzi: 他晚年独居，从不欢迎来访者。
pinyin: tā wǎn nián dú jū， cóng bù huān yíng lái fǎng zhě。
english: In the latter years of his life he lived alone and never welcomed visitors.

hanzi: 现行的教育制度和现实并不一致。
pinyin: xiàn xíng de jiào yù zhì dù huò xiàn shí bìng bù yī zhì。
english: The current education system is not in concert with the reality.

hanzi: 预算中的最大一项照例是国防费用.
pinyin: yù suàn zhòng dì zuì dà yí xiàng zhào lì shì guó fáng fèi yòng.
english: As usual, the lion's share of the budget is for defence.

hanzi: 有关环境的会议将在下周一举行。
pinyin: yǒu guān huán jìng de huì yì jiàng zài xià zhōu yī jǔ xíng。
english: The convocation about environment will be held on next Monday.

hanzi: 高级军官和下级军官的房间是分著的.
pinyin: gāo jí jūn guān huò xià jí jūn guān de fáng jiān shì fèn著 de.
english: There are separate rooms for senior and junior officers.

hanzi: 她要进入名牌大学学习的梦想实现了。
pinyin: tā yào jìn rù míng pái dà xué xué xí de mèng xiǎng shí xiàn le。
english: Her dream to enter the famous university came true.

hanzi: 我看到雪激动得连寒冷都不在乎了。
pinyin: wǒ kàn dào xuě jī dòng de lián hán lěng dōu bù zài hū le。
english: I was so excited to see snow that I was indifferent to the cold.

hanzi: 他一干预使他们的口角达到最激烈程度.
pinyin: tā yī gān yù shǐ tā men de kǒu jiǎo dá dào zuì jī liè chéng dù.
english: His intervention brought their quarrel to a climax.

hanzi: 她在一阵悔恨之中把情人的信都烧了.
pinyin: tā zài yī zhèn huǐ hèn zhī zhōng bǎ qíng rén de xìn dōu shāo le.
english: In a fit of remorse she burnt all her lover's letters.

hanzi: 副排长命令部下在营房广场集合。
pinyin: fù pái zhǎng mìng lìng bù xià zài yíng fáng guǎng chǎng jí hé。
english: Platoon sergeants fell their men in on the barrack square.

hanzi: 船长在航海日志中描述了这次事故。
pinyin: chuán zhǎng zài háng hǎi rì zhì zhòng miáo shù le zhè cì shì gù。
english: The captain described the accident in the ship's log.

hanzi: 她简化了指令以便于儿童理解。
pinyin: tā jiǎn huà le zhǐ lìng yǐ biàn yú ér tóng lǐ jiě。
english: She simplified the instructions so that the children could understand them.

hanzi: 广告多通过启发人的联想力而发挥作用.
pinyin: guǎng gào duō tōng guò qǐ fā rén de lián xiǎng lì ér fā huī zuò yòng.
english: Most advertisements work through suggestion.

hanzi: 船长在航海日志中描述了这次事故。
pinyin: chuán zhǎng zài háng hǎi rì zhì zhòng miáo shù le zhè cì shì gù。
english: The captain described the accident in the ship's log.

hanzi: 有规章规定建筑材料的某些标准.
pinyin: yǒu guī zhāng guī dìng jiàn zhù cái liào de mǒu xiē biāo zhǔn.
english: Regulations prescribe certain standards for building materials.

hanzi: 如果你在雾天去爬山，你是在自讨苦吃。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ zài wù tiān qù pá shān， nǐ shì zài zì tǎo kǔ jí。
english: If you climb mountain in fog, you are asking for it.

hanzi: 我不能帮你，这事是你自己一手造成的。
pinyin: wǒ bù néng bāng nǐ， zhè shì shì nǐ zì jǐ yī shǒu zào chéng de。
english: I can't help you. You brought this on yourself.

hanzi: 这是我们所有产品中最受欢迎的型号.
pinyin: zhè shì wǒ men suǒ yǒu chǎn pǐn zhòng zuì shòu huān yíng de xíng hào.
english: This is the most popular model in our whole range.

hanzi: 她读着这个文件时，脸色顿时开朗起来。
pinyin: tā dú zhuó zhè gè wén jiàn shí， liǎn sè dùn shí kāi lǎng qǐ lai。
english: Her face cleared up as she read the document.

hanzi: 这所学校每年招收六十名男女新生.
pinyin: zhè suǒ xué xiào měi nián zhāo shōu liù shí míng nán nu:3 xīn shēng.
english: The school admits sixty new boys and girls every year.

hanzi: 这是个特殊的案件，应该获得特殊处理。
pinyin: zhè shì gè tè shū de àn jiàn， yīng gāi huò dé tè shū chǔ lǐ。
english: This is a special case, deserving special treatment.

hanzi: 油料作物的产量也有了明显的增长。
pinyin: yóu liào zuò wù de chǎn liàng yě yǒu le míng xiǎn de zēng zhǎng。
english: Oil-bearing crops have also registered marked increases.

hanzi: 我们整星期一直工作, 没有片刻空闲.
pinyin: wǒ men zhěng xīng qī yī zhí gōng zuò,  méi yǒu piàn kè kòng xián.
english: We've been working all week without a moment's leisure.

hanzi: 他们为远航的船只准备了食品和必需品。
pinyin: tā men wèi yuǎn háng de chuán zhī zhǔn bèi le shí pǐn huò bì xū pǐn。
english: They provisioned the ship for a long voyage.

hanzi: 他在本地汽车制造厂装配线上工作.
pinyin: tā zài běn dì qì chē zhì zào chǎng zhuāng pèi xiàn shàng gōng zuò.
english: He works on the assembly line at the local car factory.

hanzi: 为了我们理解，老师列举了很多事例。
pinyin: wèi le wǒ men lǐ jiě， lǎo shī liè jǔ le hěn duō shì lì。
english: The teacher enumerated many examples to us for understanding.

hanzi: 他的迅速康复是由于他的健全的体质。
pinyin: tā de xùn sù kāng fù shì yóu yú tā de jiàn quán de tǐ zhì。
english: His quick recovery is ascribable to his sound constitution.

hanzi: 某数值偏离参考值的一种系统偏差。
pinyin: mǒu shuò zhí piān lí cān kǎo zhí de yī zhòng xì tǒng piān chā。
english: A systematic deviation of a value from a reference value.

hanzi: 为了我们理解，老师列举了很多事例。
pinyin: wèi le wǒ men lǐ jiě， lǎo shī liè jǔ le hěn duō shì lì。
english: The teacher enumerated many examples to us for understanding.

hanzi: 他为我们介绍了花园中对称的布局。
pinyin: tā wèi wǒ men jiè shào le huā yuán zhòng duì chèn de bù jú。
english: He introduced to us the symmetrical arrangement of the garden.

hanzi: 粉刷天花板用了将近一整天的时间。
pinyin: fěn shuà tiān huā bǎn yòng le jiāng jìn yī zhěng tiān de shí jiān。
english: It took more or less a whole day to paint the ceiling.

hanzi: 民主党希望在下次大选中重新执政。
pinyin: mín zhǔ dǎng xī wàng zài xià cì dà xuǎn zhòng chóng xīn zhí zhèng。
english: The democrats hope to get back at the next election.

hanzi: 你的拜访对我来说是一种光荣。
pinyin: nǐ de bài fǎng duì wǒ lái shuō shì yī zhòng guāng róng。
english: The meaning of your visit was translated to me as a sign of your affection.

hanzi: 她对购买生日礼品的事非常在行.
pinyin: tā duì gòu mǎi shēng rì lǐ pǐn de shì fēi cháng zài xìng.
english: She's got the business of buying birthday presents down to a fine art.

hanzi: 如果要避开市中心，请从这里向右转弯。
pinyin: rú guǒ yào bì kāi shì zhōng xīn， qǐng zòng zhè lǐ xiàng yòu zhuǎn wān。
english: To avoid the city center, turn right here.

hanzi: 天渐渐黑了，我看不见字，无法再阅读了。
pinyin: tiān jiàn jiàn hēi le， wǒ kàn bù jiàn zì， wú fǎ zài yuè dú le。
english: It was getting dark and I couldn't see to read.

hanzi: 借助现代技术, 这个目标已经达到.
pinyin: jiè zhù xiàn dài jì shù,  zhè gè mù biāo yǐ jīng dá dào.
english: It was achieved with the benefit (ie help, aid) of modern technology.

hanzi: 这些蔬菜中的营养部分全都给煮掉了。
pinyin: zhè xie shū cài zhòng dì yíng yǎng bù fen quán dōu jǐ zhǔ diào le。
english: All the goodness has been boiled off the vegetables.

hanzi: 我看到雪激动得连寒冷都不在乎了。
pinyin: wǒ kàn dào xuě jī dòng de lián hán lěng dōu bù zài hū le。
english: I was so excited to see snow that I was indifferent to the cold.

hanzi: 她当时看起来好像什么事都没发生似的。
pinyin: tā dāng shí kàn qǐ lai hǎo xiàng shén me shì dōu mò fā shēng sì de。
english: She looks as if nothing had happened to her.

hanzi: 我真诚地希望他能接受别人的批评。
pinyin: wǒ zhēn chéng de xī wàng tā néng jiē shòu bié rén de pī píng。
english: I sincerely hope that he can accept the criticism of others.

hanzi: 使我感到极其好笑的是他的假胡子掉下来了.
pinyin: shǐ wǒ gǎn dào jí qí hǎo xiào de shì tā de jià hú zi diào xia lai le.
english: To my great amusement his false beard fell off.

hanzi: 这就是我们从小汽车换乘公共汽车的地方.
pinyin: zhè jiù shì wǒ men cóng xiǎo qì chē huàn chéng gōng gòng qì chē de dì fang.
english: This is where we change from car to bus.

hanzi: 算命先生预言我会同一位医生结婚。
pinyin: suàn mìng xiān sheng yù yán wǒ huì tóng yī wèi yī shēng jié hūn。
english: The fortune-teller predicted that I would marry a doctor.

hanzi: 完全同意你兴办一家新公司的想法。
pinyin: wán quán tóng yì nǐ xīng bàn yī jiā xīn gōng sī de xiǎng fǎ。
english: I go all the way with your idea for setting up a new company.

hanzi: 如果我通过了升学考试我将去上大学。
pinyin: rú guǒ wǒ tōng guò le shēng xué kǎo shì wǒ jiàng qù shàng dà xué。
english: I'll go to college if I pass the Matriculation Exam.

hanzi: 我从不后悔参军，我认为自己做得对。
pinyin: wǒ cóng bù hòu huǐ cān jūn， wǒ rèn wéi zì jǐ zuò de duì。
english: I never regretted joining up. I think I did the right thing.

hanzi: 我的时间很宝贵，我只能见你几分钟。
pinyin: wǒ de shí jiān hěn bǎo guì， wǒ zhǐ néng xiàn nǐ jǐ fēn zhōng。
english: My time is precious; I can only give you a few minutes.

hanzi: 我们国家的复兴要靠我们年轻的一代。
pinyin: wǒ men guó jiā de fù xīng yào kào wǒ men nián qīng de yī dài。
english: The revival of our country depends on our young generation.

hanzi: 委员会主要由教师和学生家长组成.
pinyin: wěi yuán huì zhǔ yào yóu jiào shī huò xué sheng jiā zhǎng zǔ chéng.
english: The committee was composed mainly of teachers and parents.

hanzi: 这种新的传染病对抗菌素有抗药性。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng xīn de chuán rǎn bìng duì kàng jùn sù yǒu kàng yào xìng。
english: This new type of infection is resistant to antibiotics.

hanzi: 小商店受到大型超级市场不断排挤.
pinyin: xiǎo shāng diàn shòu dào dà xíng chāo jí shì chǎng bù duàn pái jǐ.
english: Small shops are being crowded out by the big supermarkets.

hanzi: 植物从泥土中吸收矿物质和其他养料.
pinyin: zhí wù zòng ní tǔ zhòng xī shōu kuàng wù zhì huò qí tā yǎng liào.
english: Plants draw minerals and other nutrients from the soil.

hanzi: 精确预言未来的事实际上是办不到的.
pinyin: jīng què yù yán wèi lái de shì shí jì shàng shì bàn bù dào de.
english: It is virtually impossible to predict the future accurately.

hanzi: 一如既往，我们将继续每星期四开会。
pinyin: yī rú jì wàng， wǒ men jiàng jì xù měi xīng qī sì kāi huì。
english: We will continue to hold meetings on Thursdays, as heretofore.

hanzi: 我听说你又要结婚了，你这个老家伙。
pinyin: wǒ tīng shuō nǐ yòu yào jié hūn le， nǐ zhè gè lǎo jiā huǒ。
english: I hear you're getting married again, you old son of a gun.

hanzi: 算命先生预言我会同一位医生结婚。
pinyin: suàn mìng xiān sheng yù yán wǒ huì tóng yī wèi yī shēng jié hūn。
english: The fortune-teller predicted that I would marry a doctor.

hanzi: 这些别有风味的小蛋糕是该地的特产。
pinyin: zhè xie biè yǒu fēng wèi de xiǎo dàn gāo shì gāi de de tè chǎn。
english: These small spiced cakes are a peculiarity of the region.

hanzi: 医生在他受伤的腿中植入了一块钢板。
pinyin: yī shēng zài tā shòu shāng de tuǐ zhòng zhí rù le yī kuài gāng bǎn。
english: The doctor inserted a steel plate into his damaged leg.

hanzi: 这价格是合情合理的，因为质量极好。
pinyin: zhè jià gé shì hé qíng hé lǐ de， yīn wèi zhì liàng jí hǎo。
english: The price is reasonable because the quality is super.

hanzi: 他们因那个孩子有说服力的理由相信了他。
pinyin: tā men yīn nèi gè hái zi yǒu shuō fú lì de lǐ yóu xiāng xìn le tā。
english: They believed the child by his persuasive reasons.

hanzi: 照片之间夹杂着新闻兴评论的文章。
pinyin: zhào piàn zhī jiān jiā zá zhuó xīn wén xìng píng lùn de wén zhāng。
english: The photographs are intermingled with news and articles.

hanzi: 有个孩子常常能使年轻的父母安稳下来。
pinyin: yǒu gè hái zi cháng cháng néng shǐ nián qīng de fù mǔ ān wěn xia lai。
english: Having a baby often steadies young parents down.

hanzi: 各公司应邀投标承建新高速公路.
pinyin: gè gōng sī yìng yāo tóu biāo chéng jiàn xīn gāo sù gōng lù.
english: Firms were invited to tender for the construction of the new motorway.

hanzi: 政府设法干扰游击队的无线电通讯。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ shè fǎ gān rǎo yóu jī duì de wú xiàn diàn tōng xùn。
english: The government tried to jam the guerrillas' telecommunication.

hanzi: 那老太太想开录像机, 但是越搞越糊涂.
pinyin: nà lǎo tài tai xiǎng kāi lù xiàng jī,  dàn shì yuè gǎo yuè hú tu.
english: The old lady gets in(to) a muddle trying to work the video.

hanzi: 每年都要花费大量金钱在广告上。
pinyin: měi nián dōu yào huā fèi dà liàng jīn qián zài guǎng gào shàng。
english: A large amount of money is spent on advertisements every year.

hanzi: 公社的一部分土地转让给了那家工厂。
pinyin: gōng shè de yī bù fen tǔ dì zhuǎn ràng jǐ le nà jiā gōng chǎng。
english: Some of the commune's land was made over to that factory.

hanzi: 他的微笑加深了，但他没有打算要回答。
pinyin: tā de wēi xiào jiā shēn le， dàn tā méi yǒu dǎ suàn yào huí dá。
english: His smile deepened, but he made no attempt to answer.

hanzi: 他最好发奋图强，否则会失去工作。
pinyin: tā zuì hǎo fà fèn tú qiáng， fǒu zé kuài shī qù gōng zuò。
english: He had better clean up his act, or he will be out of a job.

hanzi: 在我受到攻击时, 幸好有个警察经过.
pinyin: zài wǒ shòu dào gōng jī shí,  xìng hǎo yǒu gè jǐng chá jīng guò.
english: By a happy chance a policeman was passing as I was attacked.

hanzi: 她看到我们走进来时，面色顿时开朗起来。
pinyin: tā kàn dào wǒ men zǒu jìn lái shí， miàn shǎi dùn shí kāi lǎng qǐ lai。
english: Her face lighted up when she saw us enter.

hanzi: 他们恋爱那时国家正进行著战争.
pinyin: tā men liàn ài nà shí guó jiā zhèng jìn xíng著 zhàn zhēng.
english: Their love affair was played out against the background of a country at war.

hanzi: 警察让我描述一下这事是怎样发生的。
pinyin: jǐng chá ràng wǒ miáo shù yī xià zhè shì shì zěn yàng fā shēng de。
english: The police asked me to describe exactly how it happened.

hanzi: 贵公司的样品已收到，现已转给用户。
pinyin: guì gōng sī de yàng pǐn yǐ shōu dào， xiàn yǐ zhuàn jǐ yòng hù。
english: Receiving your sample, we have show them to their buyer.

hanzi: 贵公司的样品已收到，现已转给用户。
pinyin: guì gōng sī de yàng pǐn yǐ shōu dào， xiàn yǐ zhuàn jǐ yòng hù。
english: Receiving your sample, we have show them to their buyer.

hanzi: 人类已经学会如何从生铁制出磁铁。
pinyin: rén lèi yǐ jīng xué huì rú hé zòng shēng tiě zhì chū cí tiě。
english: Human beings have learned out how to make magnet of cast iron.

hanzi: 他一觉醒来发现房子里只剩下他一个人了.
pinyin: tā yī jué xǐng lái fā xiàn fáng zi lǐ zhǐ shèng xià tā yī gè rén le.
english: He woke (up) to find himself alone in the house.

hanzi: 对全体学生的功课作出连贯性的评定。
pinyin: duì quán tǐ xué sheng de gōng kè zuò chū lián guàn xìng de píng dìng。
english: Continuous assessment is made of all students' work.

hanzi: 在自然界, 一切动物都是野生的, 自由自在的.
pinyin: zài zì rán jiè,  yī qiè dòng wù dōu shì yě shēng de,  zì yóu zì zài de.
english: In nature, all animals are wild and free.

hanzi: 在海上航行了三天，我们终于看见了大陆。
pinyin: zài hǎi shàng háng xíng le sān tiān， wǒ men zhōng yú kàn jiàn le dà lù。
english: After three days at sea we sighted the land.

hanzi: 这个国家缺少一个能起作用的中立党派.
pinyin: zhè gè guó jiā quē shǎo yī gè néng qǐ zuò yòng de zhōng lì dǎng pài.
english: This country lacks an effective party of the centre.

hanzi: 她和姐姐合作写父亲的传记.
pinyin: tā huò jiě jie hé zuò xiě fù qīn de zhuàn jì.
english: She collaborated with her sister/She and her sister collaborated on a biography of their father.

hanzi: 进步党人的政见进步党人的原则和作法
pinyin: jìn bù dǎng rén de zhèng jiàn jìn bù dǎng rén de yuán zé huò zuò fǎ
english: The principles and practices of political progressives.

hanzi: 政府需动用更多经费重建旧城区.
pinyin: zhèng fǔ xū dòng yòng gèng duō jīng fèi chóng jiàn jiù chéng qū.
english: More government money needs to go into rebuilding the inner cities.

hanzi: 回答这个问题使她不得不做周密的思考。
pinyin: huí dá zhè gè wèn tí shǐ tā bù dé bù zuò zhōu mì de sī kǎo。
english: The answer to the question cost her much careful thought.

hanzi: 他用绳子打个圈，套在这头小公牛的角上。
pinyin: tā yòng shéng zi dǎ gè quān， tào zài zhè tou xiǎo gōng niú de jué shàng。
english: He looped the rope around the steer's horns.

hanzi: 律师在离开办公室时被记者拦住了。
pinyin: lu:4 shī zài lí kāi bàn gōng shì shí bèi jì zhě lán zhù le。
english: The lawyer was collared by some journalists as he left his office.

hanzi: 不管他工作多努力, 他就是得不到提升。
pinyin: bù guǎn tā gōng zuò duō nǔ lì,  tā jiù shì de bù dào tí shēng。
english: No matter how hard he works, he can not get a promotion.

hanzi: 他一听到这个消息就果断地采取了行动。
pinyin: tā yī tīng dào zhè gè xiāo xi jiù guǒ duàn de cǎi qǔ le xíng dòng。
english: He acted with decision as soon as he heard the news.

hanzi: 如果其他手段均告失败，我们将诉之武力。
pinyin: rú guǒ qí tā shǒu duàn jūn gào shī bài， wǒ men jiàng sù zhī wǔ lì。
english: If other means fail we shall resort to force.

hanzi: 我们很高兴，我们的足球队获得了胜利。
pinyin: wǒ men hěn gāo xìng， wǒ men de zú qiú duì huò dé le shèng lì。
english: It was a happy day when our football team was victorious.

hanzi: 他找了个站不住脚的理由来解释缺席的原因。
pinyin: tā zhǎo le gè zhàn bú zhù jué de lǐ yóu lái jiě shì quē xí de yuán yīn。
english: He gave a lame excuse for being absent.

hanzi: 一下起雨来, 观众就纷纷找地方躲避.
pinyin: yī xià qǐ yǔ lái,  guān zhòng jiù fēn fēn zhǎo dì fang duǒ bì.
english: The spectators scurried for shelter as soon as it began to rain.

hanzi: 一下起雨来，观众就纷纷找地方躲避。
pinyin: yī xià qǐ yǔ lái， guān zhòng jiù fēn fēn zhǎo dì fang duǒ bì。
english: The spectators scuttled for shelter when it began to rain.

hanzi: 警方用了几天时间追查到案中目标。
pinyin: jǐng fāng yòng le jǐ tiān shí jiān zhuī chá dào àn zhòng mù biāo。
english: It took the police several days to track down their quarry.

hanzi: 你最好不要碰这些衣服，好避免传染病。
pinyin: nǐ zuì hǎo bù yào pèng zhè xie yī fu， hào bì miǎn chuán rǎn bìng。
english: You'd better not touch these coats to avoid contagion.

hanzi: 我们为你在普拉扎旅馆预订了两夜的房间.
pinyin: wǒ men wèi nǐ zài Pǔ lā zhá lu:3 guǎn yù dìng le liǎng yè de fáng jiān.
english: We've booked you in at the Plaza for two nights.

hanzi: 在过去十年里，医学取得了巨大的进步。
pinyin: zài guò qu shí nián lǐ， yī xué qǔ dé le jù dà de jìn bù。
english: There have been great advances in medicine in the last ten years.

hanzi: 我把希望寄托在我们昨天得到的好消息上.
pinyin: wǒ bǎ xī wàng jì tuō zài wǒ men zuó tiān dé dào de hào xiāo xi shàng.
english: I base my hopes on the good news we had yesterday.

hanzi: 本阅览室的参考书不得私自带出。
pinyin: běn yuè lǎn shì de cān kǎo shū bù dé sī zì dài chū。
english: No reference books are to be taken out of the reading room without permission.

hanzi: 她负责采购电视系列片所用的道具.
pinyin: tā fù zé cǎi gòu diàn shì xì liè piān suǒ yòng de dào jù.
english: She was responsible for buying the properties for the television series.

hanzi: 引座小姐带领我沿著通道到我的座位上去.
pinyin: yǐn zuò xiǎo jie dài lǐng wǒ yàn著 tōng dào dào wǒ de zuò wèi shàng qù.
english: The girl ushered me along the aisle to my seat.

hanzi: 那首领拿一些玻璃块替换了那些钻石。
pinyin: nà shǒu lǐng ná yī xiē bō li kuài tì huàn le nà xiē zuàn shí。
english: The chief interchanged the diamond with some pieces of glass.

hanzi: 那首领拿一些玻璃块替换了那些钻石。
pinyin: nà shǒu lǐng ná yī xiē bō li kuài tì huàn le nà xiē zuàn shí。
english: The chief interchanged the diamond with some pieces of glass.

hanzi: 这种费用是根据收入高低滑动折算的.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng fèi yòng shì gēn jù shōu rù gāo dī huá dòng zhé suàn de.
english: Fees are calculated on a sliding scale according to income.

hanzi: 他损失了所有的钱, 只好再从头做起.
pinyin: tā sǔn shī le suǒ yǒu de qián,  zhǐ hǎo zài cóng tóu zuò qǐ.
english: He lost all his money and had to start again completely from scratch.

hanzi: 利息一下降给公司带来了一个新的问题。
pinyin: lì xi yī xià xiáng jǐ gōng sī dài lái le yī gè xīn de wèn tí。
english: Falling interest rates present the firm with a new problem.

hanzi: 我再一考虑，反倒觉得可能还是她对。
pinyin: wǒ zài yī kǎo lu:4， fǎn dào jué de kě néng hái shì tā duì。
english: On further reflection, I saw that she might be right, after all.

hanzi: 我们在一个星期内已经见到两件合并的事了.
pinyin: wǒ men zài yī gè xīng qī nèi yǐ jīng xiàn dào liǎng jiàn hé bìng de shì le.
english: We've seen two amalgamations in one week.

hanzi: 流体运动由重力等外力引起的流体运动
pinyin: liú tǐ yùn dòng yóu zhòng lì děng wài lì yǐn qǐ de liú tǐ yùn dòng
english: Fluid motion caused by an external force such as gravity.

hanzi: 所有的艺术品中, 我最喜欢那幅油画。
pinyin: suǒ yǒu de yì shù pǐn zhòng,  wǒ zuì xǐ huan nà fú yóu huà。
english: Of all these works of art, the thing I like most is that painting.

hanzi: 她拿自己的力量和危险的敌手进行较量
pinyin: tā ná zì jǐ de lì liang huò wēi xiǎn de dí shǒu jìn xíng jiào liàng
english: She measured her power with that of a dangerous adversary.

hanzi: 首相在其助手陪同下访问我国。
pinyin: shǒu xiàng zài qí zhù shǒu péi tóng xià fǎng wèn wǒ guó。
english: The Prime Minister came to visit our country in the company of his assistant.

hanzi: 古时认为一般金属能变成黄金.
pinyin: gǔ shí rèn wéi yì bān jīn shǔ néng biàn chéng huáng jīn.
english: In former times it was thought that ordinary metal could be transmuted into gold.

hanzi: 我认为这些有趣的旧习俗应该保存下去。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi zhè xie yǒu qù de jiù xí sú yīng gāi bǎo cún xià qu。
english: I think these interesting old customs should be preserved.

hanzi: 如果我碰上他，一定向他解释那件事。
pinyin: rú guǒ wǒ pèng shàng tā， yī dìng xiàng tā jiě shì nà jiàn shì。
english: I'll certainly explain it to him, if I can lay hold on him.

hanzi: 这个新兴的国家需要有现代头脑之统治者。
pinyin: zhè gè xīn xīng de guó jiā xū yào yǒu xiàn dài tóu nǎo zhī tǒng zhì zhē。
english: The new nation needs a modern-minded ruler.

hanzi: 我们只好等等看, 现在无能为力.
pinyin: wǒ men zhǐ hǎo děng děng kàn,  xiàn zài wú néng wèi lì.
english: We shall just have to wait and see; there's nothing we can do at the moment.

hanzi: 注意间隔, 否则这个标题一行排不下.
pinyin: zhù yì jiàn gé,  fǒu zé zhè gè biāo tí yī xíng pǎi bù xià.
english: Be careful with your spacing or you won't get the heading on one line.

hanzi: 这项发展对我们的生活有深远的影响。
pinyin: zhè xiàng fā zhǎn duì wǒ men de shēng huó yǒu shēn yuǎn de yǐng xiǎng。
english: The development had a profound effect on all our lives.

hanzi: 一定要先看清小号字体印刷部分再签字.
pinyin: yī dìng yào xiān kàn qīng xiǎo hào zì tǐ yìn shuà bù fen zài qiān zì.
english: Make sure you read all the small print before signing.

hanzi: 老人给我们讲述了一个口头流传的故事。
pinyin: lǎo rén jǐ wǒ men jiǎng shù le yī gè kǒu tóu liú chuán de gù shì。
english: The old man told us a story passed on by oral tradition.

hanzi: 他把赢得的钱全都压在最后一场赛马上了。
pinyin: tā bǎ yíng dé de qián quán dōu yà zài zuì hòu yī chǎng sài mǎ shàng le。
english: He gambled all his winnings on the last race.

hanzi: 在这一测验中你与专家较量一下技巧吧。
pinyin: zài zhè yī cè yàn zhòng nǐ yù zhuān jiā jiào liàng yī xià jì qiǎo ba。
english: Match your skill against the experts in this quiz.

hanzi: 广播剧中那场战斗的音响效果很好.
pinyin: guǎng bō jù zhòng nà chǎng zhàn dòu de yīn xiǎng xiào guǒ hěn hǎo.
english: The sound effects of the fight were very good in that radio play.

hanzi: 那问题我向他解释多次, 他似无所悟.
pinyin: nà wèn tí wǒ xiàng tā jiě shì duō cì,  tā sì wú suǒ wù.
english: I explained the problem to him several times but it didn't seem to penetrate.

hanzi: 他的经济政策为工业的扩展铺平了道路.
pinyin: tā de jīng jì zhèng cè wèi gōng yè de kuò zhǎn pū píng le dào lù.
english: His economic policies paved the way for industrial expansion.

hanzi: 移动物体的力与该物体的质量成正比。
pinyin: yí dòng wù tǐ de lì yù gāi wù tǐ de zhì liàng chéng zhèng bǐ。
english: The force moving a body is proportional to the mass of the body.

hanzi: 法庭上原告和被告双方都有各自的律师。
pinyin: fǎ tíng shàng yuán gào huò bèi gào shuāng fāng dōu yǒu gè zi de lu:4 shī。
english: Each side of a case in court has its own counsel.

hanzi: 在防空演习时对一切灯火都实行管制。
pinyin: zài fáng kōng yǎn xí shí duì yī qiè dēng huǒ dōu shí xíng guǎn zhì。
english: All lights are blacked out during air defence exercises.

hanzi: 我试图使思想集中起来，但是我太激动了。
pinyin: wǒ shì tú shǐ sī xiǎng jí zhōng qǐ lai， dàn shì wǒ tài jī dòng le。
english: I tried to collect my thoughts but I was too excited.

hanzi: 观众静得连别针落地的声音也能听见.
pinyin: guān zhòng jìng de lián bié zhēn luò dì de shēng yīn yě néng tīng jiàn.
english: The audience was so quiet you could have heard a pin drop.

hanzi: 提供虚假资料可能导致合同失效.
pinyin: tí gōng xū jiǎ zī liào kě néng dǎo zhì hé tong shī xiào.
english: The making of false statements could result in the invalidation of the contract.

hanzi: 这个评估很有道理，可能相当正确。
pinyin: zhè gè píng gū hěn yǒu dào lǐ， kě néng xiāng dāng zhèng què。
english: It was a shrewd assessment and probably pretty close to the truth.

hanzi: 我因为追赶公共汽车，弄得上气不接下气。
pinyin: wǒ yīn wèi zhuī gǎn gōng gòng qì chē， nòng de shàng qì bù jiē xià qì。
english: I was out of breath after running for the bus.

hanzi: 她把与顾客讨价还价看作自己的专长.
pinyin: tā bǎ yù gù kè tǎo jie huán jie kàn zuò zì jǐ de zhuān cháng.
english: She regards negotiating prices with customers as her special preserve.

hanzi: 他对于保健食品有他自己的一套奇怪的看法。
pinyin: tā duì yú bǎo jiàn shí pǐn yǒu tā zì jǐ de yī tào qí guài de kàn fǎ。
english: He has a bee in his bonnet about health foods.

hanzi: 一只生日蛋糕将被厨师放到桌子上。
pinyin: yī zhǐ shēng rì dàn gāo jiàng bèi chú shī fàng dào zhuō zi shàng。
english: A birthday cake is going to be brought to the table by the cook.

hanzi: 我们不可排除这孩子离家出走的可能性.
pinyin: wǒ men bù kě pái chú zhè hái zi lí jiā chū zǒu de kě néng xìng.
english: We must not exclude the possibility that the child has run away.

hanzi: 对投资期限较长者可获百分之二的奖励.
pinyin: duì tóu zī qī xiàn jiào zhǎng zhě kě huò bǎi fēn zhī èr de jiǎng lì.
english: A premium of 2 per cent is paid on long-term investments.

hanzi: 加入的液体太多，混合液的浓度就不够。
pinyin: jiā rù de yè tǐ tài duō， hùn hé yè de nóng dù jiù bù gòu。
english: If you add too much liquid the mixture will not be thick enough.

hanzi: 我也不相信我们的相关力量正在增长。
pinyin: wǒ yě bù xiāng xìn wǒ men de xiāng guān lì liang zhèng zài zēng zhǎng。
english: I don't believe that our relative strength is increasing.

hanzi: 这种书桌的高低可以按照你的需要调节。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng shū zhuō de gāo dī kě yǐ àn zhào nǐ de xū yào tiáo jié。
english: This kind of desk can be adjusted to the height you need.

hanzi: 他们的党一上台，他们就开始修改法律。
pinyin: tā men de dǎng yī shàng tái， tā men jiù kāi shǐ xiū gǎi fǎ lu:4。
english: As soon as their party came into power they changed the law.

hanzi: 房价稳定了几个月, 现在又上涨了.
pinyin: fáng jie wěn dìng le jǐ ge yuè,  xiàn zài yòu shàng zhǎng le.
english: House prices, which have been static for several months, are now rising again.

hanzi: 上星期我正在度假, 没收到你们的传真。
pinyin: shàng xīng qī wǒ zhèng zài dù jià,  mò shōu dào nǐ men de chuán zhēn。
english: I was on vacation last week and didn't receive your fax.

hanzi: 他体重减了很多, 比以前轻了三公斤.
pinyin: tā tǐ zhòng jiǎn le hěn duō,  bì yǐ qián qīng le sān gōng jīn.
english: He's lost a lot of weight: he's three kilos lighter than he used to be.

hanzi: 政府为到访的元首派出了武装卫队.
pinyin: zhèng fǔ wèi dào fǎng de yuán shǒu pài chū le wǔ zhuāng wèi duì.
english: The government provided an armed escort for the visiting head of State.

hanzi: 他们大多数人是解放战争期间出世的。
pinyin: tā men dà duō shù rén shì jiě fàng zhàn zhēng qī jiān chū shì de。
english: Most of them came into the world during the War of Liberation.

hanzi: 他在医学会议上宣读了他的研究论文.
pinyin: tā zài yī xué huì yì shàng xuān dú le tā de yán jiū lùn wén.
english: He read a paper at a medical conference on the results of his research.

hanzi: 在这种时候应大力反对如此浪费金钱。
pinyin: zài zhè zhǒng shí hou yìng dà lì fǎn duì rú cǐ làng fèi jīn qián。
english: Such waste of money should be deprecated at a time like this.

hanzi: 她的讲话在众议院激起一片抗议声.
pinyin: tā de jiǎng huà zài zhòng yì yuàn jī qǐ yī piàn kàng yì shēng.
english: Her speech threw the House (ie of Commons) into a tumult (of protest).

hanzi: 基金无法从一部门转移至另一部门.
pinyin: jī jīn wú fǎ zòng yī bù mén zhuǎn yí zhì lìng yī bù mén.
english: There are no mechanisms for transferring funds from one department to another.

hanzi: 这些式样均可改动以适应个人不同的爱好.
pinyin: zhè xie shì yàng jūn kě gǎi dòng yǐ shì yìng gè rén bù tóng de ài hào.
english: These styles can be adapted to suit individual tastes.

hanzi: 为抢救那些即将饿死的人而分秒必争。
pinyin: wèi qiǎng jiù nà xiē jí jiāng è sǐ de rén ér fèn miǎo bì zhēng。
english: It was a race against time to stop people dying from starvation.

hanzi: 这个案件中的动机与效果很难联系起来。
pinyin: zhè gè àn jiàn zhòng dì dòng jī yù xiào guǒ hěn nàn lián xì qǐ lai。
english: It is difficult to relate cause and effect in this case.

hanzi: 注重尊严的人都会轻视那种行为。
pinyin: zhù zhòng zūn yán de rén dū huì qīng shì nà zhòng xíng wéi。
english: All people with a sense of decency will look down upon such conduct as that.

hanzi: 不是一切形式的物质都具有相同的特性的。
pinyin: bú shì yī qiè xíng shì de wù zhì dōu jù yǒu xiāng tóng de tè xìng de。
english: All forms of matter do not have the same properties.

hanzi: 我们的视野受到了那座高层建筑物的限制。
pinyin: wǒ men de shì yě shòu dào le nà zuò gāo céng jiàn zhù wù de xiàn zhì。
english: Our field of vision is limited by that tall building.

hanzi: 我们听他们讲述撒哈拉沙漠的生活经历。
pinyin: wǒ men tìng tā men jiǎng shù sǎ hǎ lā shā mò de shēng huó jīng lì。
english: We listened to their tales about life in the Sahara Desert.

hanzi: 我们的教授要求他就这个课题写篇论文。
pinyin: wǒ men de jiào shòu yāo qiú tā jiù zhè gè kè tí xiě piān lùn wén。
english: Our professor asked him to write a treatise on the subject.

hanzi: 人们挖开半个路面以铺设新的煤气管道。
pinyin: rén men wā kāi bàn gè lù miàn yǐ pū shè xīn de méi qì guǎn dào。
english: Half the road surface is being taken up to lay new gas pipes.

hanzi: 此案已由上诉法庭转给下级法庭处理.
pinyin: cǐ àn yǐ yóu shàng sù fǎ tíng zhuàn jǐ xià jí fǎ tíng chǔ lǐ.
english: The case has been remitted from the appeal court to a lesser tribunal.

hanzi: 她的论文的主题是由历史观点贯穿起来的.
pinyin: tā de lùn wén de zhǔ tí shì yóu lì shǐ guān diǎn guàn chuān qǐ lai de.
english: The historical aspect formed the main theme of her essay.

hanzi: 石油输出国家组织冻结石油输出，价格看涨。
pinyin: shí yóu shū chū guó jiā zǔ zhī dòng jié shí yóu shū chū， jià gé kàn zhàng。
english: OPEC freezes output, sees prices easing.

hanzi: 从高处往下看, 那些农田像是几何图案.
pinyin: zòng gāo chù wàng xià kàn,  nà xiē nóng tián xiàng shì jǐ hé tú àn.
english: Seen from above, the fields looked like a geometrical pattern.

hanzi: 你应该签个合同使你任职合乎规定手续.
pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi qiān gè hé tong shǐ nǐ rèn zhí hé hū guī dìng shǒu xù.
english: You should sign a contract to make your job situation regular.

hanzi: 他们就建立合资公司的事和我们签了合约。
pinyin: tā men jiù jiàn lì hé zī gōng sī de shì huò wǒ men qiān le hé yuē。
english: They covenanted with us for establishing a joint venture.

hanzi: 他发现任何一种学习都是名副其实的苦差使。
pinyin: tā fā xiàn rèn hé yī zhòng xué xí dōu shì míng fù qí shí de kǔ cī shǐ。
