english: He finds any kind of study a real grind.

hanzi: 从高处往下看, 那些农田像是几何图案.
pinyin: zòng gāo chù wàng xià kàn,  nà xiē nóng tián xiàng shì jǐ hé tú àn.
english: Seen from above, the fields looked like a geometrical pattern.

hanzi: 政府援引国家机密保密法以禁该书.
pinyin: zhèng fǔ yuán yǐn guó jiā jī mì bǎo mì fǎ yǐ jìn gāi shū.
english: The government has invoked the Official Secrets Act in having the book banned.

hanzi: 那地点用一堆堆成金字塔形状的石头作了标记。
pinyin: nà dì diǎn yòng yī duī duī chéng jīn zì tǎ xíng zhuàng de shí tou zuò le biāo jì。
english: A pyramid of stones marked the spot.

hanzi: 军方声称如内乱不平息将实行军管.
pinyin: jūn fāng shēng chēng rú nèi luàn bù píng xī jiàng shí xíng jūn guǎn.
english: The army is/are threatening to take over if civil unrest continues.

hanzi: 有一天我在去我叔叔家的路上迷失了方向。
pinyin: yǒu yī tiān wǒ zài qù wǒ shū shu jiā de lù shang mí shī le fāng xiàng。
english: One day I lost myself on the way to my uncle's house.

hanzi: 这次会议上的讨论只限于议程上的项目。
pinyin: zhè cì huì yì shàng de tǎo lùn zhǐ xiàn yú yì chéng shàng de xiàng mù。
english: Discussion at the meeting was restricted to the agenda.

hanzi: 他们的观点同我们看问题的方法格格不入。
pinyin: tā men de guān diǎn tóng wǒ men kàn wèn tí de fāng fǎ gé gé bù rù。
english: Their ideas are quite alien to our ways of thinking.

hanzi: 我装着没有注意到他已经变得多么沉静了。
pinyin: wǒ zhuāng zhuó méi yǒu zhù yì dào tā yǐ jīng biàn de duō me chén jìng le。
english: I pretended not to notice how quiet he had become.

hanzi: 目前计算机是很多公司不可或缺的用具。
pinyin: mù qián jì suàn jī shì hěn duō gōng sī bù kě huò quē de yòng jù。
english: The computer is now an indispensable tool in many businesses.

hanzi: 合同中有一条款禁止承租人转租房屋。
pinyin: hé tong zhòng yǒu yī tiáo kuǎn jìn zhǐ chéng zū rén zhuàn zū fáng wū。
english: There is a clause in the contract forbidding tenants to sublet.

hanzi: 她追问那小孩让其说出把包放到了何处。
pinyin: tā zhuī wèn nà xiǎo hái ràng qí shuō chū bǎ bāo fàng dào le hé chù。
english: She pumped out of the little boy where he had put the bag.

hanzi: 在野外郊游时老师常看护着班上的学生。
pinyin: zài yě wài jiāo yóu shí lǎo shī cháng kàn hù zhuó bān shàng de xué sheng。
english: Teachers often chaperon their classes on field trips.

hanzi: 今天早上这一行人收拾行李下乡去了。
pinyin: jīn tiān zǎo shang zhè yī xíng rén shōu shi xíng li xià xiāng qù le。
english: The party picked up and started for the countryside this morning.

hanzi: 喜爱保健食品的人总爱劝别人都吃保健食品.
pinyin: xǐ ài bǎo jiàn shí pǐn de rén zǒng ài quàn bié rén dōu jí bǎo jiàn shí pǐn.
english: Health food supporters are always evangelizing.

hanzi: 他与世隔绝一个月，力图把功课赶上去。
pinyin: tā yù shì gé jué yī gè yuè， lì tú bǎ gōng kè gǎn shàng qù。
english: He shut himself away for a month to catch up on his academic work.

hanzi: 原油已经取代咖啡成为我们的主要出口货物。
pinyin: yuán yóu yǐ jīng qǔ dài kā fēi chéng wéi wǒ men de zhǔ yào chū kǒu huò wù。
english: Oil has supplanted coffee as our main export.

hanzi: 我们的外交政策是和其它国家和平共处。
pinyin: wǒ men de wài jiāo zhèng cè shì huò qí tā guó jiā hé píng gòng chǔ。
english: Our foreign policy is to coexist with other countries.

hanzi: 放大率图像的尺寸和实物尺寸之间的比率
pinyin: fàng dà shuài tú xiàng de chǐ cun huò shí wù chǐ cun zhī jiān de bǐ lu:4
english: The ratio of the size of an image to the size of an object.

hanzi: 去年他被推选出席了先进工作者会议。
pinyin: qù nián tā bèi tuī xuǎn chū xí le xiān jìn gōng zuò zhě huì yì。
english: Last year he was chosen to attend a conference of advanced workers.

hanzi: 现有大量关于第一次世界大战的文献。
pinyin: xiàn yǒu dà liàng guān yú dì yī cì shì jiè dà zhàn de wén xiàn。
english: There is now extensive literature dealing with the First World War.

hanzi: 这儿草到了尽头，脚下是松软件的沙土。
pinyin: zhèr cǎo dào le jìn tóu， jué xià shì sōng ruǎn jiàn de shā tǔ。
english: Here the grass ended and there was a loose sandy soil under foot.

hanzi: 你要么自己来，要么就托人办理这件事。
pinyin: nǐ yào me zì jǐ lái， yào me jiù tuō rén bàn lǐ zhè jiàn shì。
english: Either you come in person, or you entrust someone with the matter.

hanzi: 我不计较价钱，只要车很好用就行了。
pinyin: wǒ bù jì jiào jià qian， zhǐ yào jū hěn hǎo yòng jiù xìng le。
english: I don't care about the price, so long as the car is in good condition.

hanzi: 将数据恢复到先前已知或规定的状态。
pinyin: jiàng shù jù huī fù dào xiān qián yǐ zhī huò guī dìng de zhuàng tài。
english: The restoration of data to a previously known or defined state.

hanzi: 那个士兵告诉我们哪儿是步枪的击发装置。
pinyin: nèi gè shì bīng gào su wǒ men nǎ r shì bù qiāng de jī fà zhuāng zhì。
english: The soldier told us where the firing mechanism of a rifle is.

hanzi: 随著新主席的到来, 公司也开始有了起色.
pinyin: suí著 xīn zhǔ xí de dào lái,  gōng sī yě kāi shǐ yǒu le qǐ shǎi.
english: With the advent of the new chairman, the company began to prosper.

hanzi: 参议院已经投票支持总统的防卫计划。
pinyin: cān yì yuàn yǐ jīng tóu piào zhī chí zǒng tǒng de fáng wèi jì huà。
english: The Senate has voted to support the President's defense plans.

hanzi: 他以自己的名字命名的冷冻食品成了名牌。
pinyin: tā yǐ zì jǐ de míng zi mìng míng de lěng dòng shí pǐn chéng le míng pái。
english: He gave his name to a well-known brand of frozen food.

hanzi: 他以自己的名字命名的冷冻食品成了名牌。
pinyin: tā yǐ zì jǐ de míng zi mìng míng de lěng dòng shí pǐn chéng le míng pái。
english: He gave his name to a well-known brand of frozen food.

hanzi: 他经常用充满爱意的语言谈论他的女朋友。
pinyin: tā jīng cháng yòng chōng mǎn ài yì de yǔ yán tán lùn tā de nu:3 péng you。
english: He often talks about his girlfriend in terms of love.

hanzi: 无结果的，无成效的不产生商品或有用结果的
pinyin: wú jié guǒ de， wú chéng xiào de bù chǎn shēng shāng pǐn huò yǒu yòng jié guǒ de
english: Not productive of a good or useful result.

hanzi: 总统生病时, 其职务交由副总统代理.
pinyin: zǒng tǒng shēng bìng shí,  qí zhí wù jiāo yóu fù zǒng tǒng dài lǐ.
english: When the President is ill, his duties devolve upon the Vice-President.

hanzi: 她把与顾客讨价还价看作自己的专长.
pinyin: tā bǎ yù gù kè tǎo jie huán jie kàn zuò zì jǐ de zhuān cháng.
english: She regards negotiating prices with customers as her special preserve.

hanzi: 我因有约在先, 所以只好谢绝你的邀请.
pinyin: wǒ yīn yǒu yuē zài xiān,  suǒ yǐ zhǐ hǎo xiè jué nǐ de yāo qǐng.
english: I shall have to refuse your invitation because of a prior engagement.

hanzi: 她对我们的警告充耳不闻，结果迷失了方向。
pinyin: tā duì wǒ men de jǐng gào chōng ěr bù wén， jié guǒ mí shī le fāng xiàng。
english: She turn a deaf ear to our warning and get lose.

hanzi: 把我们的零碎东西收拾起来，出租车快来了。
pinyin: bǎ wǒ men de líng suì dōng xi shōu shi qǐ lai， chū zū chē kuài lái le。
english: Get our bits and pieces together. The taxi is coming.

hanzi: 谈判双方正寻求和平解决争端的办法.
pinyin: tán pàn shuāng fāng zhèng xún qiú hé píng jiě jué zhēng duān de bàn fǎ.
english: Negotiators are looking for a peaceful settlement to the dispute.

hanzi: 一种需要经过放大才可阅读的微小图象。
pinyin: yī zhòng xū yào jīng guò fàng dà cái kě yuè dú de wēi xiǎo tú xiàng。
english: An image that is too small to be read without magnification.

hanzi: 随着复活节的来临，冬天结束而春天来了。
pinyin: suí zhe Fù huó jié de lái lín， dōng tiān jié shù ér chūn tiān lái le。
english: With the coming of Easter, winter ends and spring comes.

hanzi: 老板因我不能找出差错而痛骂了我一顿。
pinyin: lǎo bǎn yīn wǒ bù néng zhǎo chū chāi cuò ér tòng mà le wǒ yī dùn。
english: The boss rapped me on knuckles for failing to spot the mistake.

hanzi: 我们虽算不上关系密切, 但还常见面.
pinyin: wǒ men suī suàn bù shàng guān xi mì qiè,  dàn huán cháng jiàn miàn.
english: We're not exactly on intimate terms, but we see each other fairly often.

hanzi: 运动和身体的关系，如同思考和头脑的关系。
pinyin: yùn dòng huò shēn tǐ de guān xi， rú tóng sī kǎo huò tóu nǎo de guān xi。
english: Exercise is to the body what thinking is to the brain.

hanzi: 要闹清楚每个习惯用语的意思是不容易的。
pinyin: yào nào qīng chu měi gè xí guàn yòng yǔ de yì si shì bù róng yì de。
english: It is no easy thing to get at the meaning of every idiom.

hanzi: 推断由实际情况或证据而作出推理的行为
pinyin: tuī duàn yóu shí jì qíng kuàng huò zhèng jù ér zuò chū tuī lǐ de xíng wéi
english: The act of reasoning from factual knowledge or evidence.

hanzi: 我要尽力避免在晚年时成为孩子们的负担。
pinyin: wǒ yào jìn lì bì miǎn zài wǎn nián shí chéng wéi hái zi men de fù dān。
english: I will try to avoid come upon my children in my old age.

hanzi: 随着复活节的来临，冬天结束而春天来了。
pinyin: suí zhe Fù huó jié de lái lín， dōng tiān jié shù ér chūn tiān lái le。
english: With the coming of Easter, winter ends and spring comes.

hanzi: 解放以后，我们肃清了一批反革命分子。
pinyin: jiě fàng yǐ hòu， wǒ men sù qīng le yī pī fǎn gé mìng fèn zǐ。
english: After liberation, we rooted out a number of counter-revolutionaries.

hanzi: 完成这个工程花费了他们十亿多美元。
pinyin: wán chéng zhè gè gōng chéng huā fèi le tā men shí yì duō měi yuán。
english: It took them more than one billion dollars to complete the project.

hanzi: 我们的现货中没有那种颜色--这是最近似的.
pinyin: wǒ men de xiàn huò zhòng méi yǒu nà zhòng yán sè-- zhè shì zuì jìn sì de.
english: We don't have that colour in stock this is the nearest.

hanzi: 该地区的中立国为结束战争作出了努力。
pinyin: gāi dì qū de zhōng lì guó wèi jié shù zhàn zhēng zuò chū le nǔ lì。
english: Neutral state in the area have tried to bring an end to the war.

hanzi: 汽车展览会上展出了今年所有的新型号。
pinyin: qì chē zhǎn lǎn huì shàng zhǎn chū le jīn nián suǒ yǒu de xīn xíng hào。
english: All this year's new models are displayed at the motor show.

hanzi: 信任一切与不信任任何人，同样是弱点。
pinyin: xìn rèn yī qiè yù bù xìn rèn rèn hé rén， tóng yàng shì ruò diǎn。
english: It is an equal failing to trust everybody, and to trust nobody.

hanzi: 文化交流是国与国之间建立联系的桥梁.
pinyin: wén huà jiāo liú shì guó yù guó zhī jiān jiàn lì lián xì de qiáo liáng.
english: Cultural exchanges are a way of building bridges between nations.

hanzi: 他们在请愿书上签名，支持工人的请求。
pinyin: tā men zài qǐng yuàn shū shàng qiān míng， zhī chí gōng rén de qǐng qiú。
english: They signed a petition in support of the workers' demands.

hanzi: 他们在请愿书上签名，支持工人的请求。
pinyin: tā men zài qǐng yuàn shū shàng qiān míng， zhī chí gōng rén de qǐng qiú。
english: They signed a petition in support of the workers' demands.

hanzi: 你要是现在走, 可能正赶上交通拥挤的时刻.
pinyin: nǐ yào shì xiàn zài zǒu,  kě néng zhèng gǎn shàng jiāo tōng yōng jǐ de shí kè.
english: If you go now, you're likely to hit the rush hour.

hanzi: 一位体育界的著名人士被邀请为决赛开球。
pinyin: yī wèi tǐ yù jiè de著 míng rén shì bèi yāo qǐng wèi jué sài kāi qiú。
english: A sports personality was invited to kick off at die final.

hanzi: 报界把那个新运动员吹捧成为超级明星。
pinyin: bào jiè bǎ nèi gè xīn yùn dòng yuán chuī pěng chéng wéi chāo jí míng xīng。
english: The newspaper puff up that new athlete into a superstar

hanzi: 警方急切地想弄清这一神秘事件的真相。
pinyin: jǐng fāng jí qiè de xiǎng nòng qīng zhè yī shén mì shì jiàn de zhēn xiàng。
english: The police is eager to get to the bottom of this mystery.

hanzi: 人们一桶又一桶传递著水以便把火扑灭。
pinyin: rén men yī tǒng yòu yī tǒng chuán dì著 shuǐ yǐ biàn bǎ huǒ pū miè。
english: Bucket of water is passed from hand to hand to put the fire out.

hanzi: 别担心，已经有人告诉了我他们所有的鬼把戏。
pinyin: biè dān xīn， yǐ jīng yǒu rén gào su le wǒ tā men suǒ yǒu de guǐ bǎ xì。
english: Don't worry. I've been put up to all their tricks.

hanzi: 桌子上堆满了一堆堆杂乱无章的文件。
pinyin: zhuō zi shàng duī mǎn le yī duī duī zá luàn wú zhāng de wén jiàn。
english: There are piles of papers all over the desk with no semblance of order.

hanzi: 你需要消除偏见, 才能在这里获得成功.
pinyin: nǐ xū yào xiāo chú piān jiàn,  cái néng zài zhè lǐ huò dé chéng gōng.
english: In order to succeed here you will need to overcome your prejudices.

hanzi: 在内战期间成千上万的人逃离了这个国家.
pinyin: zài nèi zhàn qī jiān chéng qiān shàng wàn de rén táo lí le zhè gè guó jiā.
english: During the civil war thousands of people fled the country.

hanzi: 解放以后，我们肃清了一批反革命分子。
pinyin: jiě fàng yǐ hòu， wǒ men sù qīng le yī pī fǎn gé mìng fèn zǐ。
english: After liberation, we rooted out a number of counter-revolutionaries.

hanzi: 你应该会发现这本书的结尾比开头好。
pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi kuài fā xiàn zhè běn shū de jié wěi bì kāi tóu hào。
english: You may well find that the end of the book is better than the beginning.

hanzi: 民意测验表明拥护社会党的情绪高涨.
pinyin: mín yì cè yàn biǎo míng yōng hù shè huì dǎng de qíng xù gāo zhǎng.
english: Opinion polls have detected a ground swell of support for the Socialists.

hanzi: 改革是否改善了现状, 这问题仍有争议.
pinyin: gǎi gé shì fǒu gǎi shàn le xiàn zhuàng,  zhè wèn tí réng yǒu zhēng yì.
english: It's debatable whether or not the reforms have improved conditions.

hanzi: 每个星期五下班后，他去看望年迈的父母。
pinyin: měi gè xīng qī wǔ xià bān hòu， tā qù kàn wàng nián mài de fù mǔ。
english: He comes to visit his aged parents after work on every Friday.

hanzi: 那项政策经修改后才获得委员会同意。
pinyin: nà xiàng zhèng cè jīng xiū gǎi hòu cái huò dé wěi yuán huì tóng yì。
english: The policy was agreed by the committee, but only in a modified form.

hanzi: 无产阶级专政是共产主义的目标之一.
pinyin: wú chǎn jiē jí zhuān zhèng shì gòng chǎn zhǔ yì de mù biāo zhī yī.
english: The dictatorship of the proletariat is one of the aims of Communism.

hanzi: 这套程序是经理人员制订计划的可贵的工具。
pinyin: zhè tào chéng xù shì jīng lǐ rén yuán zhì dìng jì huà de kě guì de gōng jù。
english: This program gives managers a valuable planning tool.

hanzi: 她自称精通计算机，其实她是假充内行。
pinyin: tā zì chēng jīng tōng jì suàn jī， qí shí tā shì jià chōng nèi háng。
english: She claims to know all about computers but really she's a sham.

hanzi: 她看上去信心十足，实际上很缺乏信心。
pinyin: tā kàn shàng qù xìn xīn shí zú， shí jì shàng hěn quē fá xìn xīn。
english: Beneath her self-confident surface, she's quite unsure of herself.

hanzi: 外科医生们正在日夜工作以抢救他的生命。
pinyin: wài kē yī shēng men zhèng zài rì yè gōng zuò yǐ qiǎng jiù tā de shēng mìng。
english: Surgeons are working round the clock to save his life.

hanzi: 纪念馆址已选定在加拿大作为永久的纪念.
pinyin: jì niàn guǎn zhǐ yǐ xuǎn dìng zài jiā ná dà zuò wéi yǒng jiǔ de jì niàn.
english: The site of the memorial is granted in perpetuity to Canada.

hanzi: 这些终端设备都和我们的计算机主机相连。
pinyin: zhè xie zhōng duān shè bèi dōu huò wǒ men de jì suàn jī zhǔ jī xiāng lián。
english: These terminals are connected to our mainframe computer.

hanzi: 试用照相机斜著照, 照出来的相片更有意思.
pinyin: shì yòng zhào xiàng jī xié著 zhào,  zhào chū lai de xiàng piàn gèng yǒu yì si.
english: Try angling the camera for a more interesting picture.

hanzi: 青春期对人的性格形成是非常重要的。
pinyin: qīng chūn qī duì rén de xìng gé xíng chéng shì fēi cháng zhòng yào de。
english: The period of adolescence is very important in forming one's character.

hanzi: 这个国家的经济在很大程度上依靠其旅游业。
pinyin: zhè gè guó jiā de jīng jì zài hěn dà chéng dù shàng yī kào qí lu:3 yóu yè。
english: The country depends heavily on its tourist trade.

hanzi: 有几家公司在投标争取承包建桥工程。
pinyin: yǒu jǐ jiā gōng sī zài tóu biāo zhēng qǔ chéng bāo jiàn qiáo gōng chéng。
english: Several companies are bidding for the contract to build the bridge.

hanzi: 救济品很快被送到遭受火灾的灾民手中。
pinyin: jiù jì pǐn hěn kuài bèi sòng dào zāo shòu huǒ zāi de zāi mín shǒu zhòng。
english: Relief was quickly sent to the sufferers from the great fire.

hanzi: 新制度已对生产力造成了灾难性的影响。
pinyin: xīn zhì dù yǐ duì shēng chǎn lì zào chéng le zāi nàn xìng de yǐng xiǎng。
english: The new system has had a disastrous effect on productivity.

hanzi: 那球被正站在边界线内的守场员接住了.
pinyin: nà qiú bèi zhèng zhàn zài biān jiè xiàn nèi de shǒu chǎng yuán jiē zhù le.
english: The ball was caught by a fielder standing just inside the boundary.

hanzi: 你如果把工作坚持下去，最终会取得成功的。
pinyin: nǐ rú guǒ bǎ gōng zuò jiān chí xià qu， zuì zhōng kuài qǔ dé chéng gōng de。
english: If you persevere with work, you'll succeed in the end.

hanzi: 要到国外读书, 你最起码要掌握那种语言。
pinyin: yào dào guó wài dú shū,  nǐ zuì qǐ mǎ yào zhǎng wò nà zhòng yǔ yán。
english: To go abroad to study, you should at least master the language.

hanzi: 这两个国家因为外交争端即将开战。
pinyin: zhè liǎng gè guó jiā yīn wèi wài jiāo zhēng duān jí jiāng kāi zhàn。
english: The two countries were on the point of war due to the diplomatic disputes.

hanzi: 漠不关心的，冷淡的看上去漠不关心的或冷淡的
pinyin: mò bù guān xīn de， lěng dàn de kàn shàng qù mò bù guān xīn de huò lěng dàn de
english: Seeming to be coolly unconcerned or indifferent.

hanzi: 拿这个处方到药房，他们就会给你配药了。
pinyin: ná zhè gè chǔ fāng dào yào fáng， tā men jiù kuài jǐ nǐ pèi yào le。
english: Take the prescription to the dispensary and they'll make it out.

hanzi: 这一发现为生物学家展示了新的研究前景.
pinyin: zhè yī fā xiàn wéi shēng wù xué jiā zhǎn shì le xīn de yán jiū qián jǐng.
english: This discovery opens up new vistas of research for biologists.

hanzi: 这座发电站的燃料是通过公路运送的.
pinyin: zhè zuò fā diàn zhàn de rán liào shì tōng guò gōng lù yùn sòng de.
english: The power station is serviced (ie Fuel is delivered to it) by road transport.

hanzi: 他们正在努力研制尽善尽美的新颜料配方.
pinyin: tā men zhèng zài nǔ lì yán zhì jìn shàn jìn měi de xīn yán liào pèi fāng.
english: They are working on the perfection of their new paint formula.

hanzi: 就算你对，可你要论证这一点却非易事。
pinyin: jiù suàn nǐ duì， kě nǐ yào lùn zhèng zhè yī diǎn què fēi yì shì。
english: Grant that you are correct, you may find it hard to prove your point.

hanzi: 如果他们拒绝收支票，我们将不得不付现金。
pinyin: rú guǒ tā men jù jué shōu zhī piào， wǒ men jiàng bù dé bù fù xiàn jīn。
english: If they refuse to accept a cheese we'll have to pay cash.

hanzi: 能为之献身的最崇高的理想是共产主义。
pinyin: néng wèi zhī xiàn shēn de zuì chóng gāo de lǐ xiǎng shì gòng chǎn zhǔ yì。
english: The noblest ideal to which one can devote oneself is Communism.

hanzi: 设备必须从公司认可的供应商那里购买。
pinyin: shè bèi bì xū zòng gōng sī rèn kě de gōng yìng shāng nà li gòu mǎi。
english: The equipment must be bought from a supplier approved by the company.

hanzi: 新政府上台后，我们有几个计划被砍掉了。
pinyin: xīn zhèng fǔ shàng tái hòu， wǒ men yǒu jǐ ge jì huà bèi kǎn diào le。
english: Several of our plans got the axe when the new government came in.

hanzi: 我书面考试已经及格了, 下一个难关是面试.
pinyin: wǒ shū miàn kǎo shì yǐ jīng jí gé le,  xià yī gè nán guān shì miàn shì.
english: I've passed the written test; the interview is the next hurdle.

hanzi: 他们体谅她缺乏经验, 允许她获得些帮助.
pinyin: tā men tǐ liàng tā quē fá jīng yàn,  yǔn xǔ tā huò dé xiē bāng zhù.
english: As a concession to her inexperience they allowed her to have some help.

hanzi: 有几家公司在投标争取承包建桥工程。
pinyin: yǒu jǐ jiā gōng sī zài tóu biāo zhēng qǔ chéng bāo jiàn qiáo gōng chéng。
english: Several companies are bidding for the contract to build the bridge.

hanzi: 咖啡馆人手不够, 所以我们不得不排队等候。
pinyin: kā fēi guǎn rén shǒu bù gòu,  suǒ yǐ wǒ men bù dé bù pái duì děng hòu。
english: The cafeteria is short handed so we'll have to wait in line.

hanzi: 我们探望母亲很不是时候--她家里已经来了客人.
pinyin: wǒ men tàn wàng mǔ qīn hěn bù shì shí hou-- tā jiā lǐ yǐ jīng lái le kè ren.
english: Our visit was ill-timed my mother had guests already.

hanzi: 我军收复了该市，但为此付出了沉重代价。
pinyin: wǒ jūn shōu fù le gāi shì， dàn wèi cǐ fù chū le chén zhòng dài jià。
english: Our troops recapture the city, but they pay a heavy price for it.

hanzi: 天气晴朗时, 从塔顶上能看到很远的地方.
pinyin: tiān qì qíng lǎng shí,  zòng tǎ dǐng shàng néng kàn dào hěn yuǎn de dì fang.
english: On a clear day you can see for miles from the top of the tower.

hanzi: 她给我们作示范，说明怎样操作这部机器。
pinyin: tā jǐ wǒ men zuò shì fàn， shuō míng zěn yàng cāo zuò zhè bù jī qì。
english: She gave us a demonstration of the machine to show how it worked.

hanzi: 他把男读者和女读者硬是人为地区分开来.
pinyin: tā bǎ nán dú zhě huò nu:3 dú zhě yìng shì rén wéi dì qū fēn kāi lái.
english: He drew a quite artificial distinction between men and women readers.

hanzi: 他们装出信心十足的样子却欺骗不了任何人。
pinyin: tā men zhuāng chū xìn xīn shí zú de yàng zi què qī piàn bù liǎo rèn hé rén。
english: Their assumptions of an air of confidence fooled nobody.

hanzi: 如果我们想准时到达那里，我们最好加快速度。
pinyin: rú guǒ wǒ men xiǎng zhǔn shí dào dá nà li， wǒ men zuì hǎo jiā kuài sù dù。
english: We'd better speed up if we want to get there in time.

hanzi: 高明的律师也许能找到回避那一条款的办法.
pinyin: gāo míng de lu:4 shī yě xǔ néng zhǎo dào huí bì nà yī tiáo kuǎn de bàn fǎ.
english: A clever lawyer might find ways of getting round that clause.

hanzi: 果断些，确切地告诉他们你认为应该怎么做。
pinyin: guǒ duàn xiē， què qiè de gào su tā men nǐ rèn wéi yīng gāi zěn me zuò。
english: Be decisive, tell them exactly what you think should be done.

hanzi: 她觉察到他的论点有几处略微有些自相矛盾.
pinyin: tā jué chá dào tā de lùn diǎn yǒu jǐ chù lu:è wēi yǒu xiē zì xiàng máo dùn.
english: She noticed several minor inconsistencies in his argument.

hanzi: 传送的指通过导管或管道传送下来的或输送的
pinyin: chuán sòng de zhǐ tōng guò dǎo guǎn huò guǎn dào chuán sòng xia lai de huò shū sòng de
english: Carrying down or away. Used of a duct or vessel.

hanzi: 高明的律师也许能找到回避那一条款的办法.
pinyin: gāo míng de lu:4 shī yě xǔ néng zhǎo dào huí bì nà yī tiáo kuǎn de bàn fǎ.
english: A clever lawyer might find ways of getting round that clause.

hanzi: 请用传真机把新目录的版面编排图样传送给我.
pinyin: qǐng yòng chuán zhēn jī bǎ xīn mù lù de bǎn miàn biān pái tú yàng chuán sòng jǐ wǒ.
english: Please fax me the layout for the new catalogue.

hanzi: 我有个随和的汽车修理工, 他把我的车保养得很好.
pinyin: wǒ yǒu gè suí he de qì chē xiū lǐ gōng,  tā bǎ wǒ de jū bǎo yǎng de hěn hào.
english: I've got a tame mechanic who keeps my car in order.

hanzi: 这本书将为读者展现经济思想的新远景。
pinyin: zhè běn shū jiàng wèi dú zhě zhǎn xiàn jīng jì sī xiǎng de xīn yuǎn jǐng。
english: The book will open up to readers new vistas on economic thinking.

hanzi: 请用传真机把新目录的版面编排图样传送给我.
pinyin: qǐng yòng chuán zhēn jī bǎ xīn mù lù de bǎn miàn biān pái tú yàng chuán sòng jǐ wǒ.
english: Please fax me the layout for the new catalogue.

hanzi: 这个交响乐团是在政府赞助下成立的。
pinyin: zhè gè jiāo xiǎng yuè tuán shì zài zhèng fǔ zàn zhù xià chéng lì de。
english: This orchestra has been established under the patronage of the government.

hanzi: 这本书将为读者展现经济思想的新远景。
pinyin: zhè běn shū jiàng wèi dú zhě zhǎn xiàn jīng jì sī xiǎng de xīn yuǎn jǐng。
english: The book will open up to readers new vistas on economic thinking.

hanzi: 千百万观众非常著迷地收看这部电视连续剧.
pinyin: qiān bǎi wàn guān zhòng fēi cháng著 mí de shōu kàn zhè bù diàn shì lián xù jù.
english: Millions of fans follow the TV soap operas devotedly.

hanzi: 公主光彩照人地穿着一身雪白的新礼服来了。
pinyin: gōng zhǔ guāng cǎi zhào rén de chuān zhuó yī shēn xuě bái de xīn lǐ fú lái le。
english: The princess arrived, resplendent in a new white dress.

hanzi: 世代相传的历代都出现的，历代都有此特征的
pinyin: shì dài xiāng chuán de lì dài dōu chū xiàn de， lì dài dōu yǒu cǐ tè zhēng de
english: Appearing in or characteristic of successive generations.

hanzi: 根据法律规定青年人年满十八岁必须参军。
pinyin: gēn jù fǎ lu:4 guī dìng qīng nián rén nián mǎn shí bā suì bì xū cān jūn。
english: "According to the law, a young man should enlist when he is18."

hanzi: 她只顾埋头工作, 没意识到天已经很晚了.
pinyin: tā zhǐ gù mái tóu gōng zuò,  mò yì shí dào tiān yǐ jīng hěn wǎn le.
english: She was so wrapped up in her work that she didn't realize how late it was.

hanzi: 因为外资的引进, 该地区会发生很大变化。
pinyin: yīn wèi wài zī de yǐn jìn,  gāi dì qū kuài fā shēng hěn dà biàn huà。
english: Great changes are in prospect in this area due to foreign investment.

hanzi: 他和我有过两次约会，但两次他都失约了。
pinyin: tā huò wǒ yǒu guò liǎng cì yuē huì， dàn liǎng cì tā dōu shī yuē le。
english: He had two appointments with me, but let me down on both occasions.

hanzi: 由于进行大扫除，屋里的一切弄得乱七八糟。
pinyin: yóu yú jìn xíng dà sǎo chú， wū lǐ de yī qiè nòng de luàn qī bā zāo。
english: Everything in the house was turned upside down for the cleaning.

hanzi: 不管有什么困难，他都要继续推行他的计划。
pinyin: bù guǎn yǒu shén me kùn nan， tā dōu yào jì xù tuī xíng tā de jì huà。
english: He'll push on with his project whatever the difficulties may be.

hanzi: 不同的礼节程度决定所需的确切表达方式。
pinyin: bù tóng de lǐ jié chéng dù jué dìng suǒ xū dí què qiè biǎo dá fāng shì。
english: The level of formality determine the precise mode of expression.

hanzi: 这种材料的生产是航天工业发展的结果.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng cái liào de shēng chǎn shì háng tiān gōng yè fā zhǎn de jié guǒ.
english: The manufactureof this material is an outgrowth of the space industry.

hanzi: 我以为你想见我, 显然完全是我误解了.
pinyin: wǒ yǐ wéi nǐ xiǎng xiàn wǒ,  xiǎn ran wán quán shì wǒ wù jiě le.
english: I thought you wanted to see me but I was clearly under a complete misapprehension.

hanzi: 公主光彩照人地穿着一身雪白的新礼服来了。
pinyin: gōng zhǔ guāng cǎi zhào rén de chuān zhuó yī shēn xuě bái de xīn lǐ fú lái le。
english: The princess arrived, resplendent in a new white dress.

hanzi: 我认为他侵占我的停车位肯定是有意和我作对。
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi tā qīn zhàn wǒ de tíng chē wèi kěn dìng shì yǒu yì huò wǒ zuò duì。
english: I'm sure he took my parking space just to spite me.

hanzi: 这件事的两种说法有很大出入.
pinyin: zhè jiàn shì de liǎng zhòng shuō fa yǒu hěn dà chū rù.
english: There is (a) considerable discrepancy/There were many discrepancies between the two versions of the affair.

hanzi: 如果你不能用现金购房, 也可以分期付款。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ bù néng yòng xiàn jīn gòu fáng,  yě kě yǐ fēn qī fù kuǎn。
english: If you can't pay for the house in cash, you can buy it on installment.

hanzi: 如果你不能用现金购房, 也可以分期付款。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ bù néng yòng xiàn jīn gòu fáng,  yě kě yǐ fēn qī fù kuǎn。
english: If you can't pay for the house in cash, you can buy it on installment.

hanzi: 他们出示了一些统计数字来支持他们的论点。
pinyin: tā men chū shì le yī xiē tǒng jì shù zì lái zhī chí tā men de lùn diǎn。
english: They showed some statistical evidence to support their argument.

hanzi: 他的书对这一问题的论述是最好的，仅次于我的书。
pinyin: tā de shū duì zhè yī wèn tí de lùn shù shì zuì hǎo de， jǐn cì yú wǒ de shū。
english: His book is the best on the subject after mine.

hanzi: 我们决定绕远路来, 为的是看看野外的景色.
pinyin: wǒ men jué dìng rào yuǎn lù lái,  wèi de shì kàn kan yě wài de jǐng sè.
english: We decided to come the long way round in order to see the countryside.

hanzi: 总的来说，合资企业比国有企业更吸引我。
pinyin: zǒng de lái shuō， hé zī qǐ yè bì guó yǒu qǐ yè gèng xī yǐn wǒ。
english: On balance, joint ventures appeal to me more than state-owned enterprises.

hanzi: 他的著作描述了一个原始社会的开化过程。
pinyin: tā de著 zuò miáo shù le yī gè yuán shǐ shè huì de kāi huà guò chéng。
english: His book describe the march of the civilization of a primitive society.

hanzi: 他的用意很好，但他做起来却不令人满意。
pinyin: tā de yòng yì hěn hǎo， dàn tā zuò qǐ lai què bù lìng rén mǎn yì。
english: His intention was good, but his execution of the plan was unsatisfactory.

hanzi: 参观的人成千上万, 把台阶踩得不像样子了.
pinyin: cān guān de rén chéng qiān shàng wàn,  bǎ tái jiē cǎi de bù xiàng yàng zi le.
english: The steps had been worn away by the feet of thousands of visitors.

hanzi: 在那些岁月里，有才干的青年常常被埋没。
pinyin: zài nà xiē suì yuè lǐ， yǒu cái gàn de qīng nián cháng cháng bèi mái mò。
english: In those days talented young people were too often ploughed under.

hanzi: 有个机警的店员准确记得那个男子的穿著.
pinyin: yǒu gè jī jǐng de diàn yuán zhǔn què jì de nèi gè nán zǐ de chuān著.
english: An observant shop assistant had remembered exactly what the man was wearing.

hanzi: 民意测验预示保守党有获得压倒性多数票的可能.
pinyin: mín yì cè yàn yù shì bǎo shǒu dǎng yǒu huò dé yā dào xìng duō shù piào de kě néng.
english: Opinion polls forecast a Conservative landslide.

hanzi: 充分利用自然资源的愿望终究会实现。
pinyin: chōng fèn lì yòng zì rán zī yuán de yuàn wàng zhōng jiū kuài shí xiàn。
english: The wish of fully utilizing the natural resources will eventually come true.

hanzi: 重工业的稳固发展为这些进展打下了基础.
pinyin: zhòng gōng yè de wěn gù fā zhǎn wèi zhè xie jìn zhǎn dǎ xià le jī chǔ.
english: These developments are underpinned by solid progress in heavy industry.

hanzi: 我会尽力帮忙，但我所能做的也是有限度的。
pinyin: wǒ kuài jìn lì bāng máng， dàn wǒ suǒ néng zuò de yě shì yǒu xiàn dù de。
english: I'll help as much as I can, but there is a limit to what I can do.

hanzi: 所有的学生毫无例外，都必须参加英语考试。
pinyin: suǒ yǒu de xué sheng háo wú lì wài， dōu bì xū cān jiā Yīng yǔ kǎo shì。
english: All students without exception must take the English examination.

hanzi: 法官免除了他们在这些事上的所有责任和义务。
pinyin: fǎ guān miǎn chú le tā men zài zhè xie shì shàng de suǒ yǒu zé rèn huò yì wù。
english: The judge exempted them from all liability in these matters.

hanzi: 只要你得到我们主管的好感，她就一切好说。
pinyin: zhǐ yào nǐ dé dào wǒ men zhǔ guǎn de hǎo gǎn， tā jiù yī qiè hǎo shuō。
english: Our supervisor is all right as long as you keep in her good books.

hanzi: 该饭店展示了一些具有代表性的本地特产。
pinyin: gāi fàn diàn zhǎn shì le yī xiē jù yǒu dài biǎo xìng de běn dì tè chǎn。
english: The hotel displays a representative selection of lovely make product.

hanzi: 他讲述了牛顿的引力定律，给人以深刻的印象。
pinyin: tā jiǎng shù le niú dùn de yǐn lì dìng lu:4， jǐ rén yǐ shēn kè de yìn xiàng。
english: He discoursed impressively on Newton's theory of gravity.

hanzi: 后台传来的响声把南希吓坏了，她忘记了台词。
pinyin: hòu tái zhuàn lái de xiǎng shēng bǎ Nán xī xià huài le， tā wàng jì le tái cí。
english: The noise backstage scared Nancy and she blew her lines.

hanzi: 他们虽然没有得到官方的支持, 但仍继续奋斗.
pinyin: tā men suī rán méi yǒu dé dào guān fāng de zhī chí,  dàn réng jì xù fèn dòu.
english: Though they lack official support they continue their struggle.

hanzi: 这部小说的情节多靠巧合安排而无真实感。
pinyin: zhè bù xiǎo shuō de qíng jié duō kào qiǎo hé ān pái ér wú zhēn shí gǎn。
english: The plot of the novel relies too much on coincidence to be realistic.

hanzi: 只有这家旅店提供免费乘车去机场的服务。

english: A free bus to the airport is a facility offered only by this hotel.

hanzi: 流行病通常是和不良的卫生条件有关的。
pinyin: liú xíng bìng tōng cháng shì huò bù liáng de wèi shēng tiáo jiàn yǒu guān de。
english: Epidemic disease is often in connection with bad sanitary conditions.

hanzi: 当然这一点必须优先考虑--这是成败的关键.
pinyin: dāng rán zhè yī diǎn bì xū yōu xiān kǎo lu:4-- zhè shì chéng bài de guān jiàn.
english: Of course this must have priority it's a matter of life and death.

hanzi: 在午饭时间, 值班教师负责维持校内秩序.
pinyin: zài wǔ fàn shí jiān,  zhí bān jiào shī fù zé wéi chí xiào nèi zhì xù.
english: The teachers on duty are policing the school buildings during the lunch hour.

hanzi: 我决不背离我已经宣布的在这个问题上的政策。
pinyin: wǒ jué bù bèi lí wǒ yǐ jīng xuān bù de zài zhè gè wèn tí shàng de zhèng cè。
english: I will never swerve from my declared policy on this matter.

hanzi: 这幅画的照片绝妙地再现了原作的色彩。
pinyin: zhè fú huà de zhào piàn jué miào de zài xiàn le yuán zuò de sè cǎi。
english: The photograph of the painting reproduces the colors of the original extremely well.

hanzi: 演讲者激发了我们的情感而不是启发我们的思考.
pinyin: yǎn jiǎng zhě jī fā le wǒ men de qíng gǎn ér bú shì qǐ fā wǒ men de sī kǎo.
english: The speaker appealed to our emotions rather than to our minds.

hanzi: 消防队员需用呼吸器械才能进入燃烧著的房屋.
pinyin: xiāo fáng duì yuán xū yòng hū xī qì xiè cái néng jìn rù rán shāo著 de fáng wū.
english: Firemen needed breathing apparatus to enter the burning house.

hanzi: 我被教会三角形两个边的和大于第三个边。
pinyin: wǒ bèi jiào huì sān jiǎo xíng liǎng gè biān de huò dà yú dì sān gè biān。
english: I was taught that two sides of a triangle were greater than the third.

hanzi: 词语的定义不应比所解释的词语更难理解.
pinyin: cí yǔ de dìng yì bù yìng bì suǒ jiě shì de cí yǔ gèng nàn lǐ jiě.

english: Now the building has been started, it is too late to back off.

hanzi: 不要替我操心床铺的事。我就睡在地板上好了。
pinyin: bù yào tì wǒ cāo xīn chuáng pù de shì。 wǒ jiù shuì zài dì bǎn shàng hào le。
english: Don't worry about a bed for me, I can kip down on the floor.

hanzi: 总编将他的采访记者所写的文章加以修改。
pinyin: zǒng biān jiàng tā de cǎi fǎng jì zhě suǒ xiě de wén zhāng jiā yǐ xiū gǎi。

hanzi: 你最好把我的书给我，否则我的测验将要不及格了。
pinyin: nǐ zuì hǎo bǎ wǒ de shū jǐ wǒ， fǒu zé wǒ de cè yàn jiāng yào bù jí gé le。
english: You'd better give me my book, otherwise I'll fail my test.

hanzi: 高温化学的有关或表明高温下的化学活动的
pinyin: gāo wēn huà xué de yǒu guān huò biǎo míng gāo wēn xià de huà xué huó dòng de
english: Relating to or designating chemical activity at elevated temperatures.

hanzi: 这次旅行使我们了解了其他土地上的风土人情。
pinyin: zhè cì lu:3 xíng shǐ wǒ men liǎo jiě le qí tā tǔ dì shàng de fēng tǔ rén qíng。
english: The travel has acquainted us with the customs of other lands.

hanzi: 那个会计向营业部的职员介绍了自己的工作情况.
pinyin: nèi gè kuài jì xiàng yíng yè bù de zhí yuán jiè shào le zì jǐ de gōng zuò qíng kuàng.
english: The accountant described his work to the sales staff.

hanzi: 这个国家很大程度上依靠农产品的出口。
pinyin: zhè gè guó jiā hěn dà chéng dù shàng yī kào nóng chǎn pǐn de chū kǒu。
english: The country is heavily dependent on its exports of agricultural commodities.

hanzi: 消防队员需用呼吸器械才能进入燃烧著的房屋.
pinyin: xiāo fáng duì yuán xū yòng hū xī qì xiè cái néng jìn rù rán shāo著 de fáng wū.
english: Firemen needed breathing apparatus to enter the burning house.

pinyin: yī wèi gōng chéng shī zuò le yī cì guān yú zhè gè qí miào zhuāng zhì de bào gào。

english: A place of worship that is smaller than and subordinate to a church.

pinyin: tā zài shuǐ lóng tóu xià mian chōng xǐ chá hú,  yǐ biàn bǎ chá yè chòng diào.

english: The act or process of furnishing critical commentary or explanatory notes.

hanzi: 注解，注释，评注评注或注解的行为或过程
pinyin: zhù jiě， zhù shì， píng zhù píng zhù huò zhù jiě de xíng wéi huò guò chéng
english: The act or process of furnishing critical commentary or explanatory notes.

hanzi: 他那语重心长的话语终于使对方说出了实情。

hanzi: 他给这本日记写了序言，简述日记发现的经过。
pinyin: tā jǐ zhè běn rì jì xiě le xù yán， jiǎn shù rì jì fā xiàn de jīng guò。
english: He prefaced the diary with a short account of how they were discovered.

hanzi: 相应特点相互联系的，尤指具有相应特点的
pinyin: xiāng yìng tè diǎn xiāng hù lián xì de， yóu zhǐ jù yǒu xiāng yìng tè diǎn de

hanzi: 作为交易方式, 支票已经很大程度地取代了现金。

hanzi: 太阳能电池能把阳光的能量转化为电能。

pinyin: dì zhí xué zài cǐ bǎ rén lèi lì shǐ de yán xù yí jiāo jǐ kǎo gǔ xué。
english: Geology here passes over the continuation of the history of man to Archeology.

hanzi: 作为交易方式, 支票已经很大程度地取代了现金。
pinyin: zuò wéi jiāo yì fāng shì,  zhī piào yǐ jīng hěn dà chéng dù de qǔ dài le xiàn jīn。
english: Cheques have largely replaced money as a means of exchange.

hanzi: 此后不久，她便成为一名全国闻名的流行歌手。
pinyin: cǐ hòu bù jiǔ， tā pián chéng wéi yī míng quán guó wén míng de liú xíng gē shǒu。
english: Not long after that, she made a national name as a pop singer.

hanzi: 开关一种用来控制电路中电流量的电流器件
pinyin: kāi guān yī zhòng yòng lái kòng zhì diàn lù zhòng diàn liú liàng de diàn liú qì jiàn
english: An electrical relay used to control the flow of power in a circuit.

hanzi: 紫禁城对外国旅游者来说是个有巨大吸引力的地方。
pinyin: zǐ jìn chéng duì wài guó lu:3 yóu zhě lái shuō shì gè yǒu jù dà xī yǐn lì de dì fang。
english: Forbidden City is a great magnet for foreign tourists.

hanzi: 看起来他似乎很喜欢大城市的热闹繁忙的生活。
pinyin: kàn qǐ lai tā sì hu hěn xǐ huan dà chéng shì de rè nao fán máng de shēng huó。
english: It seems that he enjoys the hustle and bustle of life in the big city.

hanzi: 地质学在此把人类历史的延续移交给考古学。
pinyin: dì zhí xué zài cǐ bǎ rén lèi lì shǐ de yán xù yí jiāo jǐ kǎo gǔ xué。
english: Geology here passes over the continuation of the history of man to Archeology.

hanzi: 在热闹的都市里骑自行车往往比坐汽车方便得多.
pinyin: zài rè nao de dū shì lǐ qí zì xíng chē wǎng wǎng bì zuò qì chē fāng biàn de duō.
english: A bicycle's often far more convenient than a car in busy cities.

hanzi: 他的谈判技巧使他赢得了精明战略家的名声。
pinyin: tā de tán pàn jì qiǎo shǐ tā yíng dé le jīng míng zhàn lu:è jiā de míng shēng。
english: His skill in negotiating earned him a reputation as a shrewd tactician.

hanzi: 他们很高兴能离开海船，回到坚实的陆地上。
pinyin: tā men hěn gāo xìng néng lí kāi hǎi chuán， huí dào jiān shí de lù dì shàng。
english: They were glad to leave the boat and put their feet on the solid ground.

hanzi: 我们要想一想买新房子的事了，时机即将来临。
pinyin: wǒ men yào xiǎng yī xiǎng mǎi xīn fáng zi de shì le， shí jī jí jiāng lái lín。
english: The time is approaching when we must think about buying a new house.

hanzi: 矿藏底石位于一个矿中金属矿藏之下的大量石头
pinyin: kuàng cáng dǐ shí wèi yú yī gè kuàng zhòng jīn shǔ kuàng cáng zhī xià de dà liàng shí tou
english: The mass of rock underlying a mineral deposit in a mine.

hanzi: 他人极聪明，毫无诚意的花言巧语骗不了他。

hanzi: 您既然不能降价，那这笔交易不如就拉倒吧。
pinyin: nín jì rán bù néng jiàng jià， nà zhè bǐ jiāo yì bù rú jiù lā dào ba。
english: Since you cannot reduce the price, we may call off the deal(business) as well.

hanzi: 在现实生活中, 要划分好人和坏人并非易事.
pinyin: zài xiàn shí shēng huó zhòng,  yào huà fēn hào rén huò huài rén bìng fēi yì shì.
english: In real life, it's not so easy to divide people into goodies and baddies.

hanzi: 即便是在管理最好的家庭，事故有时也会发生的。
pinyin: jí biàn shì zài guǎn lǐ zuì hǎo de jiā tíng， shì gù yǒu shí yě kuài fā shēng de。
english: Accidents sometimes happen even in the best regulated families.

hanzi: 那个傻孩子从来不做事，只是整天游手好闲。
pinyin: nèi gè shǎ hái zi cóng lái bù zuò shì， zhǐ shì zhěng tiān yóu shǒu hào xián。
english: That silly child never does anything; he just fools about all day long.

hanzi: 这次试验的结果与以往试验的结果毫不相干.
pinyin: zhè cì shì yàn de jié guǒ yù yǐ wǎng shì yàn de jié guǒ háo bú xiàng gàn.
english: The results of this experiment do not correlate with the results of earlier ones.

hanzi: 他们试图利用更好的方法和工具来增加生产力。
pinyin: tā men shì tú lì yòng gèng hǎo de fāng fǎ huò gōng jù lái zēng jiā shēng chǎn lì。
english: They tried to increase production by using better methods and tools.

hanzi: 处理这类案件的常规做法是请求法院发出指令。
pinyin: chǔ lǐ zhè lèi àn jiàn de cháng guī zuò fǎ shì qǐng qiú fǎ yuàn fā chū zhǐ lìng。
english: The general practice in such cases is to apply for a court order.

hanzi: 处理这类案件的常规做法是请求法院发出指令。
pinyin: chǔ lǐ zhè lèi àn jiàn de cháng guī zuò fǎ shì qǐng qiú fǎ yuàn fā chū zhǐ lìng。
english: The general practice in such cases is to apply for a court order.

hanzi: 搬运器一种用以传送或传导物品的机械或装置
pinyin: bān yùn qì yī zhòng yòng yǐ chuán sòng huò zhuàn dǎo wù pǐn de jī xiè huò zhuāng zhì
english: A mechanism or device by which something is conveyed or conducted.

hanzi: 反对党领袖答应提供一个有效力的政治体制。
pinyin: fǎn duì dǎng lǐng xiù dā ying tí gōng yī gè yǒu xiào lì de zhèng zhì tǐ zhì。
english: The leader of the opposition is promising to provide effective government.

hanzi: 我们的机枪扫倒了向前推进的一排排敌方步兵。
pinyin: wǒ men de jī qiāng sào dào le xiàng qián tuī jìn de yī pái pǎi dí fāng bù bīng。
english: Our machineguns mowed down the advancing lines of enemy infantry men.

hanzi: 处理这类案件的常规做法是请求法院发出指令。
pinyin: chǔ lǐ zhè lèi àn jiàn de cháng guī zuò fǎ shì qǐng qiú fǎ yuàn fā chū zhǐ lìng。
english: The general practice in such cases is to apply for a court order.

hanzi: 水源污染已经达到危及居民健康的程度。
pinyin: shuǐ yuán wū rǎn yǐ jīng dá dào wēi jí jū mín jiàn kāng de chéng dù。
english: Pollution of the water supply reached a level pernicious to the health of the population.

hanzi: 公司正在联合几家海外合伙人制造新产品.
pinyin: gōng sī zhèng zài lián hé jǐ jiā hǎi wài hé huǒ rén zhì zào xīn chǎn pǐn.
english: The firm is working on a new product in combination with several overseas partners.

hanzi: 我的书法很好，但与我父亲的相比，我的就很差了。
pinyin: wǒ de shū fǎ hěn hǎo， dàn yù wǒ fù qīn de xiāng bǐ， wǒ de jiù hěn cī le。
english: My handwriting is good, but it is poor as compared to my father's.

hanzi: 上诉人要求对她生活费的命令的条件进行变更。
pinyin: shàng sù rén yāo qiú duì tā shēng huó fèi de mìng lìng de tiáo jiàn jìn xíng biàn gēng。
english: The petitioner ask for a variation in her maintenance order.

hanzi: 如果货物品质不好，则理应向制造商提出控诉。
pinyin: rú guǒ huò wù pǐn zhì bù hǎo， zé lǐ yīng xiàng zhì zào shāng tí chū kòng sù。
english: If goods were not well made, you shall complain to the manufacturer.

hanzi: 首次订购时，本人将提供信用照会资料给您。
pinyin: shǒu cì dìng gòu shí， běn rén jiàng tí gōng xìn yòng zhào huì zī liào jǐ nín。
english: My credit references will be provided if you can make an initial order.

hanzi: 这个官员对穷人的需求表现出完全漠视的态度。
pinyin: zhè gè guān yuán duì qióng rén de xū qiú biǎo xiàn chū wán quán mò shì de tài du。
english: The official has shown a total disregard for the needs of the poor.

hanzi: 即便是在管理最好的家庭，事故有时也会发生的。
pinyin: jí biàn shì zài guǎn lǐ zuì hǎo de jiā tíng， shì gù yǒu shí yě kuài fā shēng de。
english: Accidents sometimes happen even in the best regulated families.

hanzi: 演出中有一次中场休息，让听众们稍事休息。
pinyin: yǎn chū zhòng yǒu yī cì zhōng cháng xiū xi， ràng tīng zhòng men shāo shì xiū xi。
english: There is a break during the performance for the audience to take a rest.

hanzi: 我常引用自己说过的话，那会使我的谈话增添情趣。
pinyin: wǒ cháng yǐn yòng zì jǐ shuō guò de huà， nà kuài shǐ wǒ de tán huà zēng tiān qíng qù。
english: I often quote myself; it add spice to my conversation.

hanzi: 今年的稻米产量高于往年平均产量的百分之十五。
pinyin: jīn nián de dào mǐ chǎn liàng gāo yú wǎng nián píng jūn chǎn liàng de bǎi fēn zhī shí wǔ。
english: The rice crop this year is15 percent above the average.

hanzi: 这篇文章很短, 只能对这一问题作肤浅的探讨.
pinyin: zhè piān wén zhāng hěn duǎn,  zhǐ néng duì zhè yī wèn tí zuò fū qiǎn de tàn tǎo.
english: This essay is so short that it can only scratch the surface of the topic.

hanzi: 新的管理章程为劳资关系确定了基本的原则.
pinyin: xīn de guǎn lǐ zhāng chéng wèi láo zī guān xi què dìng le jī běn de yuán zé.
english: The new code of conduct lays down the ground rules for management-union relations.

hanzi: 请允许我对你们剧团的成功表示最热烈的祝贺。
pinyin: qǐng yǔn xǔ wǒ duì nǐ men jù tuán de chéng gōng biǎo shì zuì rè liè de zhù hè。
english: Allow me to offer my warm congratulations on the success of your troupe.

hanzi: 照我的和大多数人的看法，这是很可靠的投资。
pinyin: zhào wǒ de huò dà duō shù rén de kàn fǎ， zhè shì hěn kě kào de tóu zī。
english: In my opinion and in the opinion of most people, it is a very sound investment.

hanzi: 如果太阳光不照射到月球上，那就没有月光了。
pinyin: rú guǒ tài yáng guāng bù zhào shè dào yuè qiú shàng， nà jiù méi yǒu yuè guāng le。
english: If the sun does not shine on the moon, there will be no moonlight.

hanzi: 我们的钱省著花要是能富余出来，我倒是很想去度假。
pinyin: wǒ men de qián xǐng著 huā yào shì néng fù yu chū lai， wǒ dào shì hěn xiǎng qù dù jià。
english: I'd love a holiday if our money will stretch that far.

hanzi: 那发言者讲话结结巴巴的, 有时得由主席提示.
pinyin: nà fā yán zhě jiǎng huà jié jié bā bā de,  yǒu shí de yóu zhǔ xí tí shì.
english: The speaker was rather hesitant and had to be prompted occasionally by the chairman.

hanzi: 她穿著黑色连衣裙, 在这种欢乐的场合未免太素了.
pinyin: tā chuān著 hēi sè lián yì qún,  zài zhè zhǒng huān lè de chǎng hé wèi miǎn tài sù le.
english: Her plain black dress was too severe for such a cheerful occasion.

hanzi: 我在公共汽车上, 一边一个胖子把我夹在中间不能动.
pinyin: wǒ zài gōng gòng qì chē shàng,  yī biān yī gè pàng zi bǎ wǒ jiá zài zhōng jiān bù néng dòng.
english: I sandwiched myself between two fat men on the bus.

hanzi: 违犯，违背违反的动作或实例，或被违反的状态
pinyin: wéi fàn， wéi bèi wéi fǎn de dòng zuò huò shí lì， huò bèi wéi fǎn de zhuàng tài
english: The act or an instance of violating or the condition of being violated.

hanzi: 工会领袖号召抗议那天全体会员积极参加.
pinyin: gōng huì lǐng xiù hào zhào kàng yì nà Tiān quán tǐ huì yuán jī jí cān jiā.
english: Union leaders called for the active participation of all members in the day of protest.

hanzi: 如果我后悔什么事情，那很可能是我的良好品行。
pinyin: rú guǒ wǒ hòu huǐ shén me shì qing， nà hěn kě néng shì wǒ de liáng hǎo pǐn xíng。
english: If I repent of anything, it is very likely to be my good behaviour.

hanzi: 我刚才只是主张应该外出就餐，以节省时间。
pinyin: wǒ gāng cái zhǐ shì zhǔ zhāng yīng gāi wài chū jiù cān， yǐ jié shěng shí jiān。
english: I am merely putt forward toe opinion(that) we shall dine out to save time.

hanzi: 他对资本的精明投放已使他的生活发生巨变。
pinyin: tā duì zī běn de jīng míng tóu fàng yǐ shǐ tā de shēng huó fā shēng jù biàn。
english: His wise investment of his capital have bring about a great change in his life.

hanzi: 我们的机枪扫倒了向前推进的一排排敌人的步兵。
pinyin: wǒ men de jī qiāng sào dào le xiàng qián tuī jìn de yī pái pǎi dí rén de bù bīng。
english: Our machine-guns moved down the advancing lines of enemy infantrymen.

hanzi: 一切情况都可依据现行章程的结构加以考虑。
pinyin: yī qiè qíng kuàng dōu kě yī jù xiàn xíng zhāng chéng de jié gòu jiā yǐ kǎo lu:4。
english: All the cases can be considered within the framework of the existing rules.

hanzi: 这封信是一种试探，看看他如何看待这种运动。
pinyin: zhè fēng xìn shì yī zhòng shì tàn， kàn kan tā rú hé kàn dài zhè zhǒng yùn dòng。
english: The letter was a feeler to see how he would look upon such a movement.

hanzi: 他本来能买那辆车的，但没多久他的公司就倒闭了。
pinyin: tā běn lái néng mǎi nà liàng jū de， dàn mò duō jiǔ tā de gōng sī jiù dǎo bì le。
english: He could have bought the car, but soon his company went bankrupt.

hanzi: 扩张主义一个国家领土或经济扩张的政策或实践
pinyin: kuò zhāng zhǔ yì yī gè guó jiā lǐng tǔ huò jīng jì kuò zhāng de zhèng cè huò shí jiàn
english: A nation's practice or policy of territorial or economic expansion.

hanzi: 这位即将退休的矿工把风钻移交给他的接班人。
pinyin: zhè wèi jí jiāng tuì xiū de kuàng gōng bǎ fēng zuàn yí jiāo jǐ tā de jiē bān rén。
english: The retiring miner delivered his pneumatic drill over to his successor.

hanzi: 农民们春季播种玉米，现在是他们收获的季节。
pinyin: nóng mín men chūn jì bō zhǒng yù mǐ， xiàn zài shì tā men shōu huò de jì jié。
english: It is a season that peasants reap the corn from what they planted in spring.

hanzi: 我们的首席代表的退场被看作是一种抗议的表示。
pinyin: wǒ men de shǒu xí dài biǎo de tuì chǎng bèi kàn zuò shì yī zhòng kàng yì de biǎo shì。
english: Our chief representative's withdrawal was construed as a protest.

hanzi: 这两兄弟仅外表相似，本性却很不一样。
pinyin: zhè liǎng xiōng dì jǐn wài biǎo xiāng sì， běn xìng què hěn bù yí yàng。
english: There is only a formal likeness between the two brothers, for their natures are very different.

hanzi: 我们为之奋斗的最可贵的事物--世界和平--已指日可待.
pinyin: wǒ men wèi zhī fèn dòu de zuì kě guì de shì wù-- shì jiè hé píng-- yǐ zhǐ rì kě dài.
english: The greatest prize of all world peace is now within our grasp.

hanzi: 矿工们下决心等到他们的要求得到满足后再复工。
pinyin: kuàng gōng men xià jué xīn děng dào tā men de yāo qiú dé dào mǎn zú hòu zài fù gōng。
english: The miners are determined to stop out until their demands are met.

hanzi: 这一会议可视为两党走向进一步联合的第一步.
pinyin: zhè yī huì yì kě shì wéi liǎng dǎng zǒu xiàng jìn yí bù lián hé de dì yī bù.
english: The meeting is seen as the first step towards greater unity between the parties.

hanzi: 乡村风光太美了，以致于他决定再多呆一星期。
pinyin: xiāng cūn fēng guāng tài měi le， yǐ zhì yú tā jué dìng zài duō dāi yī xīng qī。
english: The rural scenery was so beautiful that he decided to stay one more week.

hanzi: 把这份报告中的有关事项提交委员会讨论。
pinyin: bǎ zhè fèn bào gào zhòng dì yǒu guān shì xiàng tí jiāo wěi yuán huì tǎo lùn。
english: The relative items in this report will be submitted to the committee for discussion.

hanzi: 正做出努力来宣扬总统在解决危机中的作用。
pinyin: zhèng zuò chū nǔ lì lái xuān yáng zǒng tǒng zài jiě jué wēi jī zhòng dì zuò yòng。
english: An attempt was made to play up the president's role in settling the crisis.

hanzi: 把这份报告中的有关事项提交委员会讨论。
pinyin: bǎ zhè fèn bào gào zhòng dì yǒu guān shì xiàng tí jiāo wěi yuán huì tǎo lùn。
english: The relative items in this report will be submitted to the committee for discussion.

hanzi: 因为他懂得如何讨好老板，所以一再得到提拔。
pinyin: yīn wèi tā dǒng de rú hé tǎo hào lǎo bǎn， suǒ yǐ yī zài dé dào tí bá。
english: He was promoted again and again because he knew how the rub his boss the right way.

hanzi: 两个小男孩和一条狗成了街头艺人仅有的观众.
pinyin: liǎng gè xiǎo nán hái huò yī tiáo gǒu chéng le jiē tóu yì rén jǐn yǒu de guān zhòng.
english: Two small boys and a dog comprised the street entertainer's only audience.

hanzi: 变异的从标准变化来的，通常只是一些轻微的不同
pinyin: biàn yì de zòng biāo zhǔn biàn huà lái de， tōng cháng zhǐ shì yī xiē qīng wéi de bù tóng
english: Deviating from a standard, usually by only a slight difference.

hanzi: 根据社会工作者的建议把那孩子与其父母隔离了.
pinyin: gēn jù shè huì gōng zuò zhě de jiàn yì bǎ nà hái zi yǔ qí fù mǔ gé lí le.
english: The child was taken away from its parents on the recommendation of social workers.

hanzi: 理想主义，是按和问题的距离成正比例而增大的。
pinyin: lǐ xiǎng zhǔ yì， shì àn huò wèn tí de jù lí chéng zhèng bǐ lì ér zēng dà de。
english: Idealism increase in direct proportion to one's distance from the problem.

hanzi: 使者被派去代表另一个人的利益完成某使命的人
pinyin: shǐ zhě bèi pài qù dài biǎo lìng yī gè rén de lì yì wán chéng mǒu shǐ mìng de rén
english: An agent sent on a mission to represent or advance the interests of another.

hanzi: 母亲打发孩子们赶快去上学，然后就开始干起活来。
pinyin: mǔ qīn dǎ fa hái zi men gǎn kuài qù shàng xué， rán hòu jiù kāi shǐ gàn qǐ huó lái。
english: The mother hustled the children off to school and started working.

hanzi: 在一个雨夜，那个警察正巧碰上了一伙走私犯。
pinyin: zài yī gè yǔ yè， nèi gè jǐng chá zhèng qiǎo pèng shàng le yī huǒ zǒu sī fàn。
english: One rainy night the policeman had a chance encounter with a gang of smugglers.

hanzi: 除了远处的零星的小冲突之外，这个地区是和平的。
pinyin: chú le yuǎn chù de líng xīng de xiǎo chōng tū zhī wài， zhè gè dì qū shì hé píng de。
english: This area is peaceful except for a few skirmishes in the distance.

hanzi: 我八点钟就到医院了，但是九点钟我才去值班。
pinyin: wǒ bā diǎn zhōng jiù dào yī yuàn le， dàn shì jiǔ diǎn zhōng wǒ cái qù zhí bān。
english: I arrive at the hospital at eight o'clock, but I don't go on duty until nine.

hanzi: 你可以以这种眼光看待事物, 但是社会可不会跟你一样。
pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ yǐ zhè zhǒng yǎn guāng kàn dài shì wù,  dàn shì shè huì kě bù huì gēn nǐ yí yàng。
english: You may look at things that way, but society won't.

hanzi: 在自由市场上，那个男人卖给我坏鸡蛋骗了我。
pinyin: zài zì yóu shì chǎng shàng， nèi gè nán rén mài jǐ wǒ huài jī dàn piàn le wǒ。
english: That man in the free market put it across me by selling me some bad eggs.

hanzi: 今年我们忙得要命--我需要有一段假期放松一下.
pinyin: jīn nián wǒ men máng de yào mìng-- wǒ xū yào yǒu yī duàn jià qī fàng sōng yī xià.
english: This year has been frantically busy for us I need a holiday just to wind down.

hanzi: 我们先把这件事仔细研究一下，再把它列入议事日程。
pinyin: wǒ men xiān bǎ zhè jiàn shì zǐ xì yán jiū yī xià， zài bǎ tā liè rù yì shì rì chéng。
english: Let's thrash the matter over before putting it on the agenda.

hanzi: 该委员会需要彻底改组，去除某些不合格的成员。
pinyin: gāi wěi yuán huì xū yào chè dǐ gǎi zǔ， qù chú mǒu xiē bù hé gé de chéng yuán。
english: The committee needs to be shaken out to get rid of some unqualified members.

hanzi: 合并两个或多个商业上的利益集团或法人团体的合并
pinyin: hé bìng liǎng gè huò duō gè shāng yè shàng de lì yì jí tuán huò fǎ rén tuán tǐ de hé bìng
english: The merger of two or more commercial interests or corporations.

hanzi: 保龄球道供保龄球滚动的木制表面的通道或球道
pinyin: bǎo líng qiú dào gòng bǎo líng qiú gǔn dòng de mù zhì biǎo miàn de tōng dào huò qiú dào
english: A wood-surfaced passageway or alley along which a bowling ball is rolled.

hanzi: 纸张盒，文具盒一种用于装文具和其它书写用具的盒子
pinyin: zhǐ zhāng hé， wén jù hé yī zhòng yòng yú zhuāng wén jù huò qí tā shū xiě yòng jù de hé zi
english: A box used to hold stationery and other writing materials.

hanzi: 他似乎比较像一个军官，而不像一个商业行政主管。
pinyin: tā sì hu bǐ jiào xiàng yī gè jūn guān， ér bù xiàng yī gè shāng yè xíng zhèng zhǔ guǎn。
english: He seems more like a military officer than a business executive.

hanzi: 汽车型号，汽车牌子制成品的型号或牌子，尤指汽车
pinyin: qì chē xíng hào， qì chē pái zi zhì chéng pǐn de xíng hào huò pái zi， yóu zhǐ qì chē
english: A model or brand of a manufactured product, especially an automobile.

hanzi: 但我必须指出，我们的厂家手头上的过期订单很多。
pinyin: dàn wǒ bì xū zhǐ chū， wǒ men de chǎng jiā shǒu tou shàng de guò qī dìng dān hěn duō。
english: But I must point out that our factory has a lot of back order on hand.

hanzi: 双方并非在每一点上意见都一致, 但已达成和解.
pinyin: shuāng fāng bìng fēi zài měi yī diǎn shàng yì jiàn dōu yī zhì,  dàn yǐ dá chéng hé jiě.
english: The two sides failed to agree on every point but came to an accommodation.

hanzi: 真空般状态压强明显比大气压强低得多的空间
pinyin: zhēn kōng bān zhuàng tài yā qiáng míng xiǎn bì dà qì yā qiáng dī de duō de kōng jiān
english: A space in which the pressure is significantly lower than atmospheric pressure.

hanzi: 我正在成人学校补习法语，到时好让他们大吃一惊。
pinyin: wǒ zhèng zài chéng rén xué xiào bǔ xí fǎ yǔ， dào shí hào ràng tā men dà chī yī jīng。
english: I'm brushing up on my French at adult school just to surprise them.

hanzi: 她的结婚礼服是由一位非常著名的时装设计师制作的。
pinyin: tā de jié hūn lǐ fú shì yóu yī wèi fēi cháng著 míng de shí zhuāng shè jì shī zhì zuò de。
english: Her wedding apparel is made by a very famous fashion designer.

hanzi: 他摆出一幅笑脸，不过这似乎让他使尽了全身的气力。
pinyin: tā bǎi chū yī fú xiào liǎn， bù guò zhè sì hu ràng tā shǐ jìn le quán shēn de qì lì。
english: He summoned up a smile, though it seemed to take all his strength.

hanzi: 他们的动机很快就能看出, 完全是自私自利.
pinyin: tā men de dòng jī hěn kuài jiù néng kàn chū,  wán quán shì zì sī zì lì.
english: Their motives, as will soon become apparent (ie as you will soon see), are completely selfish.

hanzi: 她真心实意地在信上签了字, 没意识到其中另有含义.
pinyin: tā zhēn xīn shí yì de zài xìn shàng qiān le zì,  mò yì shí dào qí zhōng lìng yǒu hán yì.
english: She signed the letter in good faith, not realizing its implications.

hanzi: 资本主义国家不得不与社会主义国家和平共处。
pinyin: zī běn zhǔ yì guó jiā bù dé bù yù shè huì zhǔ yì guó jiā hé píng gòng chǔ。
english: The capitalist countries have to coexist with the socialist countries peacefully.

hanzi: 那位新近走红的男演员在这部新影片中扮演重要角色。
pinyin: nà wèi xīn jìn zǒu hóng de nán yǎn yuán zài zhè bù xīn yǐng piàn zhòng bàn yǎn zhòng yào jué sè。
english: The latest popular actor is featured in this new film.

hanzi: 她的社会主义信念来自她对社会上不公平现象的痛恨。
pinyin: tā de shè huì zhǔ yì xìn niàn lái zì tā duì shè huì shàng bù gōng píng xiàn xiàng de tòng hèn。
english: Her socialist beliefs were born of a hatred of injustice.

hanzi: 指定，预定为了某种特定的目的指定或设置某物的行为
pinyin: zhǐ dìng， yù dìng wèi le mǒu zhǒng tè dìng de mù dì zhǐ dìng huò shè zhì mǒu wù de xíng wéi
english: An act of appointing or setting aside for a specific purpose.

hanzi: 分支指令由这种控制传递方式的结果而执行的指令
pinyin: fēn zhī zhǐ lìng yóu zhè zhǒng kòng zhì chuán dì fāng shì de jié guǒ ér zhí xíng de zhǐ lìng
english: The instructions executed as the result of such a passing of control.

hanzi: 以提高功效为依据可以证明采取这种措施是正确的。
pinyin: yǐ tí gāo gōng xiào wèi yī jù kě yǐ zhèng míng cǎi qǔ zhè zhǒng cuò shī shì zhèng què de。
english: Such action can be justified on the grounds of greater efficiency.

hanzi: 当我们到达山顶时，美丽景色展现在我们的眼前。
pinyin: dàng wǒ men dào dá shān dǐng shí， měi lì jǐng sè zhǎn xiàn zài wǒ men de yǎn qián。
english: The beautiful scenery was set out before us as we reached the top of the hill.

hanzi: 我想一家有六个孩子对他们的父母就意味着许多操劳。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng yī jiā yǒu liù gè hái zi duì tā men de fù mǔ jiù yì wèi zhe xǔ duō cāo láo。
english: I reckon six children in a family means a lot of work for the parents.

hanzi: 大多数人熟悉一切物质都是由原子组成的这一概念。
pinyin: dà duō shù rén shú xī yī qiè wù zhì dōu shì yóu yuán zǐ zǔ chéng de zhè yī gài niàn。
english: Most people are familiar with the idea that all matter consist of atoms.

hanzi: 我上星期天打电话到你办公室去, 但他们说你不值班。
pinyin: wǒ shàng xīng qī tiān dǎ diàn huà dào nǐ bàn gōng shì qù,  dàn tā men shuō nǐ bù zhí bān。
english: I called your office last Sunday but they said you were off duty.

hanzi: 流动工人为了寻找工作从一个城市移居到另一个城市。
pinyin: liú dòng gōng rén wèi le xún zhǎo gōng zuò zòng yī gè chéng shì yí jū dào lìng yī gè chéng shì。
english: Migrant workers move from city to city in search of work.

hanzi: 他那些怪话使我们心中生疑，不知他精神是否正常。
pinyin: tā nà xiē guài huà shǐ wǒ men xīn zhōng shēng yí， bù zhī tā jīng shén shì fǒu zhèng cháng。
english: His strange remarks planted doubts in our minds about his sanity.

hanzi: 待议事项待做的事，尤指项目或目录清单上的一个项目
pinyin: dài yì shì xiàng dài zuò de shì， yóu zhǐ xiàng mù huò mù lù qīng dān shàng de yī gè xiàng mù
english: Something to be done, especially an item on a program or list.

hanzi: 人性就是这样，所以在场的每个人都感动得流下眼泪。
pinyin: rén xìng jiù shì zhè yàng， suǒ yǐ zài chǎng de měi gè rén dōu gǎn dòng de liú xià yǎn lèi。
english: Such is human nature that everybody present was moved to tears.

hanzi: 不断增长的失业大军引起了这名经济学家的关注。
pinyin: bù duàn zēng zhǎng de shī yè dà jūn yǐn qǐ le zhè míng jīng jì xué jiā de guān zhù。
english: The increasing army of the unemployed has attracted the attention of the economist.

hanzi: 他一向是不厌其烦地尝试各种播种农作物的方法。
pinyin: tā yí xiàng shì bù yàn qí fán de cháng shì gè zhǒng bō zhǒng nóng zuò wù de fāng fǎ。
english: He was never weary of experimenting with different ways of planting his crops.

hanzi: 晚上在照明很差的路上行走, 应该穿显眼的衣物.
pinyin: wǎn shang zài zhào míng hěn cī de lù shang xíng zǒu,  yīng gāi chuān xiǎn yǎn de yì wù.
english: If you're walking along a badly-lit road at night you should wear conspicuous clothes.

hanzi: 构思这本书只用了五分钟，但写这本书却花了一年。
pinyin: gòu sī zhè běn shū zhǐ yòng le wǔ fēn zhōng， dàn xiě zhè běn shū què huā le yī nián。
english: The conception of the book took five minutes, but writing it took a year.

hanzi: 称号的与称号有关的，有称号性质的或构成一个称号的
pinyin: chēng hào de yù chēng hào yǒu guān de， yǒu chēng hào xìng zhì de huò gòu chéng yī gè chēng hào de
english: Relating to, having the nature of, or constituting a title.

hanzi: 他不顾朋友们的反对，继续他建造飞行器的计划。
pinyin: tā bù gù péng you men de fǎn duì， jì xù tā jiàn zào fēi xíng qì de jì huà。
english: He continued with his plan to build a flying machine, in spite of the mockery of his friends.

hanzi: 奖品，奖状称赞的某事，特别是官方的奖品或奖状
pinyin: jiǎng pǐn， jiǎng zhuàng chēng zàn de mǒu shì， tè bié shì guān fāng de jiǎng pǐn huò jiǎng zhuàng
english: Something, especially an official award or citation, that commends.

hanzi: 对自己的错误后悔到不致重犯的程度是真正的后悔。
pinyin: duì zì jǐ de cuò wù hòu huǐ dào bù zhì zhòng fàn de chéng dù shì zhēn zhèng de hòu huǐ。
english: To regret one's errors to the point of not repeating them is true repentance.

hanzi: 他们利用自己的实践经验，设计了一台气冷柴油机。
pinyin: tā men lì yòng zì jǐ de shí jiàn jīng yàn， shè jì le yī tái qì lěng chái yóu jī。
english: Drawing on their practical experience, they designed an air-cooled diesel motor.

hanzi: 这座工厂排出的化学物质改变了整个地区的生态.
pinyin: zhè zuò gōng chǎng pái chū de huà xué wù zhì gǎi biàn le zhěng gè dì qū de shēng tài.
english: Chemicals in the factory's sewage system have changed the ecology of the whole area.

hanzi: 附属物，辅助物附加于他物的处于附属或从属地位的物品
pinyin: fù shǔ wù， fǔ zhù wù fù jiā yú tā wù de chǔ yú fù shǔ huò cóng shǔ dì wèi de wù pǐn
english: Something attached to another in a dependent or subordinate position.

hanzi: 请试试这个巧克力。有三种不同风味的巧克力供应。
pinyin: qǐng shì shì zhè gè qiǎo kè lì。 yǒu sān zhòng bù tóng fēng wèi de qiǎo kè lì gōng yìng。
english: Please try this chocolate. There are three different flavors available.

hanzi: 晚上在照明很差的路上行走, 应该穿显眼的衣物.
pinyin: wǎn shang zài zhào míng hěn cī de lù shang xíng zǒu,  yīng gāi chuān xiǎn yǎn de yì wù.
english: If you're walking along a badly-lit road at night you should wear conspicuous clothes.

hanzi: 薄脆饼干一种通常由不含糖的生面团做成的薄脆饼干
pinyin: bò cuì bǐng gān yī zhòng tōng cháng yóu bù hán táng de shēng miàn tuán zuò chéng de bò cuì bǐng gān
english: A thin, crisp wafer or biscuit, usually made of unsweetened dough.

hanzi: 与此同时，我的舌头忙着寻找我拔掉牙的那个洞。
pinyin: yù cǐ tóng shí， wǒ de shé tóu máng zhuó xún zhǎo wǒ bá diào yá de nèi gè dòng。
english: Meanwhile, my tongue was busy searching out of the hole where the tooth had been.

hanzi: 出名所付出的代价是不管你走到哪里，都会被人认出来。
pinyin: chū míng suǒ fù chū de dài jià shì bù guǎn nǐ zǒu dào nǎ li， dū huì bèi rén rèn chū lái。
english: Be recognized wherever you go is the price you pay for is famous.

hanzi: 原子能应该为了和平的目的而使用，这是合乎情理的。
pinyin: yuán zǐ néng yīng gāi wèi le hé píng de mù dì ér shǐ yòng， zhè shì hé hū qíng lǐ de。
english: It is desirable that atomic energy should be used for peaceful purpose.

hanzi: 她经验更丰富，这是她得到那份工作的决定性因素。
pinyin: tā jīng yàn gèng fēng fù， zhè shì tā dé dào nà fèn gōng zuò de jué dìng xìng yīn sù。
english: Her greater experience tipped the balance in her favour and she got the job.

hanzi: 委员会开始讨论之前，先宣读了上次的会议记录。
pinyin: wěi yuán huì kāi shǐ tǎo lùn zhī qián， xiān xuān dú le shàng cì de huì yì jì lù。
english: Before the committee started its work, the minutes of the last meeting were read out.

hanzi: 行医道德有规定, 禁止医生与病人谈恋爱.
pinyin: xìng Yī dào dé yǒu guī dìng,  jìn zhǐ yī shēng yù bìng rén tán liàn ài.
english: Medical ethics (ie those observed by the medical profession) forbid a doctor to have a love affair with a patient.

hanzi: 查阅与物品搭配用的确切量词，请参考有关词条。
pinyin: chá yuè yù wù pǐn dā pèi yòng dí què qiè liàng cí， qǐng cān kǎo yǒu guān cí tiáo。
english: Please consult the relevant entry to find the correct word for the item concerned.

hanzi: 团体，帮一群组合在一起的青少年，尤指一群少年犯
pinyin: tuán tǐ， bāng yī qún zǔ hé zài yī qǐ de qīng shào nián， yóu zhǐ yī qún shào nián fàn
english: A group of adolescents who band together, especially a group of delinquents.

hanzi: 那记者虽然有点累，但他那天晚上却连夜写文章。
pinyin: nà jì zhě suī rán yǒu diǎn lèi， dàn tā nà tiān wǎn shang què lián yè xiě wén zhāng。
english: The journalist chucked out ink throughout that night although he was a bit tired.

hanzi: 这工作的附加福利包括一辆小汽车和免费健康保险。
pinyin: zhè gōng zuò de fù jiā fú lì bāo kuò yī liàng xiǎo qì chē huò miǎn fèi jiàn kāng bǎo xiǎn。
english: The fringe benefits of this job include a car and free health insurance.

hanzi: 一晚放映三个同一主题的访问记实, 真是小题大做.
pinyin: yī wǎn fàng yìng sān gè tóng yī zhǔ tí de fǎng wèn jì shí,  zhēn shì xiǎo tí dà zuò.
english: It was surely overkill to screen three interviews on the same subject in one evening.

hanzi: 评估对人及事物的质量，价值，重要性或量的识别
pinyin: píng gū duì rén jí shì wù de zhì liàng， jià zhí， zhòng yào xìng huò liàng de shí bié
english: Recognition of the quality, value, significance, or magnitude of people and things.

hanzi: 他的工作不仅要处理难题而且也要应付突来的挑战。
pinyin: tā de gōng zuò bù jǐn yào chǔ lǐ nán tí ér qiě yě yào yìng fu tū lái de tiǎo zhàn。
english: His job is not only to dispose of problems but (also) to meet unexpected challenges.

hanzi: 在天气干燥时把点燃的香烟扔进树林可能会引起火灾。
pinyin: zài tiān qì gān zào shí bǎ diǎn rán de xiāng yān rēng jìn shù lín kě néng kuài yǐn qǐ huǒ zāi。
english: A cigarette thrown into the woods in dry weather may start a fire.

hanzi: 我要是不受约束就好了，可是我的合同还要约束我三年
pinyin: wǒ yào shì bù shòu yuē shù jiù hào le， kě shì wǒ de hé tong huán yào yuē shù wǒ sān nián
english: I wish I were a free agent, but my contract binds me for three more years.

hanzi: 明明规格变了，他还不知道，因此经理训了他一顿。
pinyin: míng míng guī gé biàn le， tā huán bù zhī dào， yīn cǐ jīng lǐ xùn le tā yī dùn。
english: The director chewed him out for not knowing that the specifications had been changed.

hanzi: 理事会成员们意见相左，分成自由和保守两个阵营
pinyin: lǐ shì huì chéng yuán men yì jiàn xiàng zuǒ， fèn chéng zì yóu huò bǎo shǒu liǎng gè zhèn yíng
english: The council members disagreed, falling into liberal and conservative camps.

hanzi: 亿万人的收入增加了，这是他们自己做梦也想不到的。
pinyin: yì wàn rén de shōu rù zēng jiā le， zhè shì tā men zì jǐ zuò mèng yě xiǎng bù dào de。
english: Incomes of millions upon millions of people have increased beyond their dreams.

hanzi: 装填物为了增加重量或尺寸或填满空余而加进去的物质
pinyin: zhuāng tián wù wèi le zēng jiā zhòng liàng huò chǐ cun huò tián mǎn kòng yú ér jiā jìn qù de wù zhì
english: Something added in order to augment weight or size or fill space.

hanzi: 航空公司因有几架飞机暂时不能使用而正在赔钱.
pinyin: háng kōng gōng sī yīn yǒu jǐ jià fēi jī zàn shí bù néng shǐ yòng ér zhèng zài péi qián.
english: With several of their planes temporarily out of commission, the airline is losing money.

hanzi: 如果你不积极进取，更加努力学习，你就会考不及格的。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ bù jī jí jìn qǔ， gèng jiā nǔ lì xué xí， nǐ jiù kuài kǎo bù jí gé de。
english: If you don't get on the ball and start studying harder, you're going to flunk.

hanzi: 今晚大家似乎喝酒喝得太多了，当然在座的各位除外。
pinyin: jīn wǎn dà jiā sì hu hē jiǔ hè de tài duō le， dāng rán zài zuò de gè wèi chú wài。
english: People seem to have drunk far too much tonight, present company excepted of course.

hanzi: 个位在阿拉伯数字系统中紧靠在小数点左边的数字
pinyin: gè wèi zài ē lā bó shù zì xì tǒng zhòng jǐn kào zài xiǎo shù diǎn zuǒ biān de shù zì
english: The number immediately to the left of the decimal point in the Arabic numeral system.

hanzi: 听他那没完没了的连篇空话对我的耐心真是一大考验。
pinyin: tìng tā nà mò wán mò le de lián piān kōng huà duì wǒ de nài xīn zhēn shì yī dà kǎo yàn。
english: Listening to his continuous stream of empty chatter really tested my patience.

hanzi: 我累得做不了饭了--咱们从中国外卖餐馆买些东西来吃吧.
pinyin: wǒ lèi de zuò bù liǎo fàn le-- zán men cóng zhōng guó wài mài cān guǎn mǎi xiē dōng xi lái jí ba.
english: I'm too tired to cook let's get something from the Chinese take-away.

hanzi: 虽然我非常希望增加体重，但我仍然像以前一样的瘦。
pinyin: suī rán wǒ fēi cháng xī wàng zēng jiā tǐ zhòng， dàn wǒ réng rán xiàng yǐ qián yí yàng de shòu。
english: Much as I hope I may gain weight, (yet) I am still as thin as before.

hanzi: 第一个问题既然已经讨论完毕，我们就进行第二个吧。
pinyin: dì yī gè wèn tí jì rán yǐ jīng tǎo lùn wán bì， wǒ men jiù jìn xíng dì èr gè ba。
english: Now that we have finished discussing the first problem, we may pass on to the second.

hanzi: 把这两个计划仔细地加以对比就可以看出一些关键性的差异.
pinyin: bǎ zhè liǎng gè jì huà zǐ xì de jiā yǐ duì bǐ jiù kě yǐ kàn chū yī xiē guān jiàn xìng de chā yì.
english: Careful contrast of the two plans shows up some key differences.

hanzi: 政府对国营和私营部门的就业情况作了一次调查。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ duì guó yíng huò sī yíng bù mén de jiù yè qíng kuàng zuò le yī cì diào chá。
english: The government made an investigation of the employment in the public and private sectors.

hanzi: 我们在穿越这个地区的旅途中，看到了不少美丽的景色。
pinyin: wǒ men zài chuān yuè zhè gè dì qū de lu:3 tú zhòng， kàn dào le bù shǎo měi lì de jǐng sè。
english: We passed through some beautiful scenery on our journey through this district.

hanzi: 在我完全不了解的情况下, 她已先行办好了度假的预订手续.
pinyin: zài wǒ wán quán bù liǎo xiè de qíng kuàng xià,  tā yǐ xiān xíng bàn hào le dù jià de yù dìng shǒu xù.
english: Quite unknown to me, she'd gone ahead and booked the holiday.

hanzi: 没有一件事比我儿子幸能通过入学考试更使我高兴。
pinyin: méi yǒu yī jiàn shì bì wǒ ér zi xìng néng tōng guò rù xué kǎo shì gèng shǐ wǒ gāo xìng。
english: Nothing would please me more than that my son should pass the entrance examination.

hanzi: 每次创建或更改一个条目时，会自动按字母顺序排列。
pinyin: měi cì chuàng jiàn huò gēng gǎi yī gè tiáo mù shí， kuài zì dòng àn zì mǔ shùn xù pái liè。
english: It is automatically alphabetized every time an entry is created or changed.

hanzi: 这位著名的戏剧演员即便是在死后，也仍受到人们的喜爱。
pinyin: zhè wèi著 míng de xì jù yǎn yuán jí biàn shì zài sǐ hòu， yě réng shòu dào rén men de xǐ ài。
english: This famous comic actor is loved by the people even after his death.

hanzi: 她是个好演员，但仍需要时间去熟悉她要扮演的角色。
pinyin: tā shì gè hào yǎn yuán， dàn réng xū yào shí jiān qù shú xī tā yào bàn yǎn de jué sè。
english: She is a good actress, but still needs time to grow into the part she is playing.

hanzi: 在我们的城市，许多社会服务仍然是有志愿团体提供的。
pinyin: zài wǒ men de chéng shì， xǔ duō shè huì fú wù réng rán shì yǒu zhì yuàn tuán tǐ tí gōng de。
english: Many social services are still provided by voluntary societies in our city.

hanzi: 那个聪明的男孩把他老师所能教他的所有的知识都吸收了。
pinyin: nèi gè cōng míng de nán hái bǎ tā lǎo shī suǒ néng jiào tā de suǒ yǒu de zhī shi dōu xī shōu le。
english: The clever boy absorbed all the knowledge his teacher could give him.

hanzi: 他原本能按预定进度做完这件事的，但不知怎地却落后了。
pinyin: tā yuán běn néng àn yù dìng jìn dù zuò wán zhè jiàn shì de， dàn bù zhī zěn de què luò hòu le。
english: He could have finished it on schedule, but somehow he fell behind.

hanzi: 在我完全不了解的情况下, 她已先行办好了度假的预订手续.
pinyin: zài wǒ wán quán bù liǎo xiè de qíng kuàng xià,  tā yǐ xiān xíng bàn hào le dù jià de yù dìng shǒu xù.
english: Quite unknown to me, she'd gone ahead and booked the holiday.

hanzi: 角距离，是由一定点到两物体之间所量度的夹角。
pinyin: jué jù lí， shì yóu yī dìng diǎn dào liǎng wù tǐ zhī jiān suǒ liáng dù de jiá jué。
english: Angular distance is the distance between two objects measured as an angle from a given point.

hanzi: 为了度量物质，我们必须有重量，容积和长度的单位。
pinyin: wèi le dù liàng wù zhì， wǒ men bì xū yǒu zhòng liàng， róng jī huò cháng dù de dān wèi。
english: For the tolerance substance, we must have weight, volume and the units of length.

hanzi: 没有比时间更贵重的东西，但也没有比它更受轻视的东西。
pinyin: méi yǒu bì shí jiān gèng guì zhòng de dōng xi， dàn yě méi yǒu bì tā gèng shòu qīng shì de dōng xi。
english: Nothing is more valuable than time, but nothing is less valued.

hanzi: 他拒绝接受选举结果，起身怒气冲冲地离开了会场。
pinyin: tā jù jué jiē shòu xuǎn jǔ jié guǒ， qǐ shēn nù qì chòng chòng de lí kāi le huì chǎng。
english: Refusing to accept the decision of the vote, he got up and stormed out of the meeting.

hanzi: 对一组使用新药, 对另一组则使用旧药以资对照.
pinyin: duì yī zǔ shǐ yòng xīn yào,  duì lìng yī zǔ zé shǐ yòng jiù yào yǐ zī duì zhào.
english: One group was treated with the new drug, and a second group was treated with the old one as a control.

hanzi: 心理记录表一种个人或群体的性格特征的图示或图表
pinyin: xīn lǐ jì lù biǎo yī zhòng gè rén huò qún tǐ de xìng gé tè zhēng de tú shì huò tú biǎo
english: A graphic representation or chart of the personality traits of an individual or a group.

hanzi: 随着生产量的增长, 需要原材料的供应也不断增长。
pinyin: suí zhe shēng chǎn liàng de zēng zhǎng,  xū yào yuán cái liào de gōng yìng yě bù duàn zēng zhǎng。
english: With the production going up, an increasing supply of raw materials is needed.

hanzi: 由于这对已婚夫妇无法生育，他们领养了一个私生子。
pinyin: yóu yú zhè duì yǐ hūn fū fù wú fǎ shēng yù， tā men lǐng yǎng le yī gè sī shēng zi。
english: As the married couple can't have children, they have adopted a child born out of wedlock.

hanzi: 我警告过你不要同已婚女子胡来，那样总是会惹麻烦的。
pinyin: wǒ jǐng gào guò nǐ bù yào tóng yǐ hūn nu:3 zǐ hú lái， nà yàng zǒng shì kuài rě má fan de。
english: I have warned you not to meddle with married women, it always leads to trouble.

hanzi: 假如查出你向该国走私货物，你的货物可能会被没收。
pinyin: jiǎ rú chá chū nǐ xiàng gāi guó zǒu sī huò wù， nǐ de huò wù kě néng kuài bèi mò shōu。
english: If you are caught smuggling goods into the country, they will probably be confiscated.

hanzi: 仅仅经过几天的训练，她的打字技术就达到极其出色的程度。
pinyin: jǐn jǐn jīng guò jǐ tiān de xùn liàn， tā de dǎ zì jì shù jiù dá dào jí qí chū sè de chéng dù。
english: After only a few day's instruction, she got typing off to a fine art.

hanzi: 国与国之间的边界未明确划定时，通常会发生纠纷。
pinyin: guó yù guó zhī jiān de biān jiè wèi míng què huá dìng shí， tōng cháng kuài fā shēng jiū fēn。
english: When boundaries between countries are not clearly defined, there is usually trouble.

hanzi: 情况很可怕，可是还一个劲儿地议论让人觉得更可怕。
pinyin: qíng kuàng hěn kě pà， kě shì huán yī gè jìng er de yì lùn ràng rén jué de gèng kě pà。
english: The situation is frightful, but it's just piling on the agony to keep discussing it.

hanzi: 制造多级火箭的一种方法是把各级火箭并排放在底部。
pinyin: zhì zào duō jí huǒ jiàn de yī zhòng fāng fǎ shì bǎ gè jí huǒ jiàn bìng pái fàng zài dǐ bù。
english: One of the ways to make step rockets is to put the stages side by side at the bottom.

hanzi: 他渴望当演员, 你就得容他时间让他施展自己的抱负.
pinyin: tā kě wàng dàng yǎn yuán,  nǐ jiù de róng tā shí jiān ràng tā shī zhǎn zì jǐ de bào fù.
english: He desperately wants to be an actor, so you'll have to give him time to get it out of his system.

hanzi: 那位父亲不能以身作则，更不用说做孩子的榜样了。
pinyin: nà wèi fù qīn bù néng yǐ shēn zuò zé， gèng bù yòng shuō zuò hái zi de bǎng yàng le。
english: That father can't discipline himself, much less set a good example for his children to follow.

hanzi: 父亲说我可以上大学，因此我认为我要准备入学考试。
pinyin: fù qīn shuō wǒ kě yǐ shàng dà xué， yīn cǐ wǒ rèn wéi wǒ yào zhǔn bèi rù xué kǎo shì。
english: Father say I may enter a university, so I think I will prepare for the entrance examination.

hanzi: 他放弃了一份安定的工作而自己创业，表现出了极大的勇气。
pinyin: tā fàng qì le yī fèn ān dìng de gōng zuò ér zì jǐ chuàng yè， biǎo xiàn chū le jí dà de yǒng qì。
english: He showed a lot of pluck to leave a safe job and set up his own business.

hanzi: 律师对那个要求提出异议，并力图证明它是一种无理的要求。
pinyin: lu:4 shī duì nèi gè yāo qiú tí chū yì yì， bìng lì tú zhèng míng tā shì yī zhòng wú lǐ de yāo qiú。
english: The lawyer contested the claim, and tried to prove that it was false.

hanzi: 今年的春季会较往年来得晚，因为天气一直还这么冷。
pinyin: jīn nián de chūn jì kuài jiào wǎng nián lái de wǎn， yīn wèi tiān qì yī zhí huán zhè me lěng。
english: Spring will be a backward season this year, for the weather has all along been so cold.

hanzi: 日本的确是个美丽的国家，但最近日本的大都市已被污染。
pinyin: Rì běn dí què shì gè měi lì de guó jiā， dàn zuì jìn Rì běn de dà dū shì yǐ bèi wū rǎn。
english: It is true that Japan is a beautiful country, but its big cities are lately polluted.

hanzi: 那对新婚夫妇因缺乏坚实的经济基础决定实行计划生育。
pinyin: nà duì xīn hūn fū fù yīn quē fá jiān shí de jīng jì jī chǔ jué dìng shí xíng jì huà shēng yù。
english: The newlyweds decided to conduct family planning for lack of a sound economic base.

hanzi: 统治人民十分严格的政府，它不允许任何人反对其决策。
pinyin: tǒng zhì rén mín shí fēn yán gé de zhèng fǔ， tā bù yǔn xǔ rèn hé rén fǎn duì qí jué cè。
english: Government which rules its people strictly and do not allow anyone to oppose its decision.

hanzi: 形而上学，等于为我们本能地相信的东西找寻无谓的理由。
pinyin: xíng ér shàng xué， děng yú wèi wǒ men běn néng de xiāng xìn de dōng xi zhǎo xún wú wèi de lǐ yóu。
english: Metaphysics is the finding of bad reasons for what we believe on instinct.

hanzi: 理查德和戴维极力想把问题列入议程, 但遭多数票否决.
pinyin: lǐ zhā dé huò Dài wéi jí lì xiǎng bǎ wèn tí liè rù yì chéng,  dàn zāo duō shù piào fǒu jué.
english: Richard and David tried to get the question put on the agenda but they were heavily outvoted.

hanzi: 假设已知一个物体的重量和比重，我们就能算出它的体积。
pinyin: jiǎ shè yǐ zhī yī gè wù tǐ de zhòng liàng huò bǐ zhòng， wǒ men jiù néng suàn chū tā de tǐ jī。
english: Granted the weight and the specific gravity of a body, we can calculate its volume.

hanzi: 半场某些体育比赛被划分成两个阶段，其中之一被称为半场
pinyin: bàn chǎng mǒu xiē tǐ yù bǐ sài bèi huà fēn chéng liǎng gè jiē duàn， qí zhōng zhī yī bèi chēng wéi bàn chǎng
english: One of the two playing periods into which certain games are divided.

hanzi: 热处理的目的在于使钢材更好地适用于某一特定的用途。
pinyin: rè chǔ lǐ de mù dì zài yú shǐ gāng cái gèng hǎo de shì yòng yú mǒu yī tè dìng de yòng tú。
english: The object of heat treatment is to make the steel better suited for some specific application.

hanzi: 这些领导可能会走出来，打出自己的旗号，并向群众大会演说。
pinyin: zhè xie lǐng dǎo kě néng kuài zǒu chū lái， dǎ chū zì jǐ de qí hào， bìng xiàng qún zhòng dà huì yǎn shuō。
english: The leaders may go out to show the flag and address mass rallies.

hanzi: 我可不知道在这地球上有什么东西比七厘利息更无情的。
pinyin: wǒ kě bù zhī dào zài zhè dì qiú shàng yǒu shén me dōng xi bì qī lí lì xi gèng wú qíng de。
english: I do not know of anything more remorseless on the face of the earth than seven per cent interest.

hanzi: 某个具体事件发生次数的累计总数，作为事实记录保存。
pinyin: mǒu gè jù tǐ shì jiàn fā shēng cì shù de lěi jì zǒng shù， zuò wéi shì shí jì lù bǎo cún。
english: The cumulative total of the number of times a specific event occurs, kept as a factual record.

hanzi: 我无法引用确切的原文, 但是我可以告诉你作者所述的要点.
pinyin: wǒ wú fǎ yǐn yòng què qiè de yuán wén,  dàn shì wǒ kě yǐ gào su nǐ zuó zhě suǒ shù de yào diǎn.
english: I can't quote chapter and verse but I can give you the main points the author was making.

hanzi: 这位部长在她的讲话中表示不同意对现行法律作任何更改。
pinyin: zhè wèi bù zhǎng zài tā de jiǎng huà zhòng biǎo shì bù tóng yì duì xiàn xíng fǎ lu:4 zuò rèn hé gēng gǎi。
english: In her speech, the Minister came out against any change to the existing law.

hanzi: 如果你不喜欢分配给你的任务，干脆不要做，而不要草率从事。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ bù xǐ huan fēn pèi jǐ nǐ de rèn wu， gān cuì bù yào zuò， ér bù yào cǎo shuài cóng shì。
english: If you do not like the assignment, just do not do them, but do not scamp them.

hanzi: 只有当演员把台词背得滚瓜烂熟时，我们排戏才会有成效。
pinyin: zhǐ yǒu dàng yǎn yuán bǎ tái cí bèi de gǔn guā làn shú shí， wǒ men pǎi xì cái kuài yǒu chéng xiào。
english: Only when the actors have their lines(down) pat can we practice the play effectively.

hanzi: 印字宽度的单位，以一英寸直线距离上能安置的字符数计。
pinyin: yìn zì kuān dù de dān wèi， yǐ yī yīng cùn zhí xiàn jù lí shàng néng ān zhì de zì fú shuò jì。
english: A unit of type width based on the number of times a character can be set in one linear inch.

hanzi: 这位教师停下手中批改的试卷，伸手去拿香烟和火柴。
pinyin: zhè wèi jiào shī tíng xià shǒu zhòng pī gǎi de shì juàn， shēn shǒu qù ná xiāng yān huò huǒ chái。
english: The teacher set the papers he was marking on one side and reach for his cigarettes and matches.

hanzi: 他为人诚实，不计较面子，对于别人的批评一点也不在乎。
pinyin: tā wèi rén chéng shí， bù jì jiào miàn zi， duì yú bié rén de pī píng yī diǎn yě bù zài hu。
english: He has an honest nature and a thick skin, and never cares a bit about other people's criticisms.

hanzi: 两极相通。最激烈的无政府主义者，居然成了最露骨的变节者。
pinyin: liǎng jí xiāng tōng。 zuì jī liè de wú zhèng fǔ zhǔ yì zhě， jū rán chéng le zuì lù gǔ de biàn jié zhě。
english: Extremes meet. the most furious anarchist become the most barefaced apostate.

hanzi: 由于这位母亲为儿子照顾得无微不至，把他弄得没什么出息了。
pinyin: yóu yú zhè wèi mǔ qīn wèi ér zi zhào gu de wú wēi bù zhì， bǎ tā nòng de mò shén me chū xī le。
english: The mother took so much care of her son, that she has make him be good for nothing.

hanzi: 但是我们不必象对待其他矿藏那样把人送下去将油取出。
pinyin: dàn shì wǒ men bù bì xiàng duì dài qí tā kuàng cáng nà yàng bǎ rén sòng xià qu jiàng yóu qǔ chū。
english: But we do not need to send men down to get the oil out, as we must with other mineral deposits.

hanzi: 女士们喜欢在自由市场呆上很长时间，同货主们讨价还价。
pinyin: nu:3 shì men xǐ huan zài zì yóu shì chǎng dāi shàng hěn zhǎng shí jiān， tóng huò zhǔ men tǎo jie huán jie。
english: The ladies like to spend hours in the free market, bargaining about the goods.

hanzi: 预赛，选拔赛确定比赛资格的预备竞赛或测试，如在体育运动中
pinyin: yù sài， xuǎn bá sài què dìng bǐ sài zī gé de yù bèi jìng sài huò cè shì， rú zài tǐ yù yùn dòng zhòng
english: A preliminary competition or test to determine qualifications, as in a sport.

hanzi: 让我们更紧密地团结在党中央的周围，去争取更大的胜利。
pinyin: ràng wǒ men gèng jǐn mì de tuán jié zài dǎng zhōng yāng de zhōu wéi， qù zhēng qǔ gèng dà de shèng lì。
english: Let us rally closer round the Party Central Committee to win still greater victories.

hanzi: 有些人在戏院附近留恋不去，希望看一看他们喜爱的演员。
pinyin: yǒu xiē rén zài xì yuàn fù jìn liú liàn bù qù， xī wàng kàn yī kàn tā men xǐ ài de yǎn yuán。
english: Some people lingered about near the theatre, hoping to get a glimpse of their memory lingers on.

hanzi: 习惯性行为一种固定的行动模式，能引起神经失常或造成人格
pinyin: xí guàn xìng xíng wéi yī zhòng gù dìng de xíng dòng mó shì， néng yǐn qǐ shén jīng shī cháng huò zào chéng rén gé
english: A pattern of behavior constituting a mental disorder or personality type.

hanzi: 一个用太阳能的电冰箱已由两位以色列的工程师发展成功了。
pinyin: yī gè yòng tài yáng néng de diàn bīng xiāng yǐ yóu liǎng wèi yǐ shǎi liè de gōng chéng shī fā zhǎn chéng gōng le。
english: A sun-powered refrigerator has been developed by two Israeli engineers.

hanzi: 我想了解一下贵方是否继续引进先进技术和成套工厂设备。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng liǎo jiě yī xià guì fāng shì fǒu jì xù yǐn jìn xiān jìn jì shù huò chéng tào gōng chǎng shè bèi。
english: I wonder whether you will go on import some advanced technology and complete plant.

hanzi: 我不住地看手表，他却一个劲儿地讲个没完，他不能领会暗示。
pinyin: wǒ bú zhù de kàn shǒu biǎo， tā què yī gè jìng er de jiǎng gè mò wán， tā bù néng lǐng huì àn shì。
english: I kept looking at my watch, but he just continued talking: he can't take a hint.

hanzi: 一些人相信，高等教育的扩大招生已经降低了大学的标准。
pinyin: yī xiē rén xiāng xìn， gāo děng jiào yù de kuò dà zhāo shēng yǐ jīng jiàng dī le dà xué de biāo zhǔn。
english: Some believe that the extension for higher education has leveled down university standards.

hanzi: 他只不过是名义上的经理，而实际上是他的助手掌管这里的一切。
pinyin: tā zhǐ bù guò shì míng yì shàng de jīng lǐ， ér shí jì shàng shì tā de zhù shǒu zhǎng guǎn zhè lǐ de yī qiè。
english: He's manager in name only, it's his assistant who really runs the place.

hanzi: 上流社会的上流社会的或适合于上流社会的，尤其是在语言用法上
pinyin: shàng liú shè huì de shàng liú shè huì de huò shì hé yú shàng liú shè huì de， yóu qí shì zài yǔ yán yòng fǎ shàng
english: Of or appropriate to the upper class, especially in language usage.

hanzi: 尽管被众人质问，但是这位领导人仍然表现出神气十足的样子。
pinyin: jǐn guǎn bèi zhòng rén zhì wèn， dàn shì zhè wèi lǐng dǎo rén réng rán biǎo xiàn chū shén qì shí zú de yàng zi。
english: Despite being heckled by the crowd, the leader bore himself with dignity.

hanzi: 她接待他时始终准确地把握好分寸，看似冷淡，却不失礼。
pinyin: tā jiē dài tā shí shǐ zhōng zhǔn què de bǎ wò hào fēn cùn， kàn sì lěng dàn， què bù shī lǐ。
english: The manner in which she received him was calculated to a nicety to seem cool without being uncivil.

hanzi: 本公司认为，您所展示的已婚妇女服装最适合我们的市场需求。
pinyin: běn gōng sī rèn wéi， nín suǒ zhǎn shì de yǐ hūn fù nu:3 fú zhuāng zuì shì hé wǒ men de shì chǎng xū qiú。
english: The lines you showed for the married women would be most suitable for our market.

hanzi: 整形术的，还原成形术有关对身体缺失部分进行还原的外科手术的
pinyin: zhěng xíng zhú de， huán yuán chéng xíng zhú yǒu guān duì shēn tǐ quē shī bù fen jìn xíng huán yuán de wài kē shǒu shù de
english: Relating to the surgical restoration of a lost or absent part.

hanzi: 我希望我们之间的贸易将在平等互利的基础上进一步发展。
pinyin: wǒ xī wàng wǒ men zhī jiān de mào yì jiàng zài píng děng hù lì de jī chǔ shàng jìn yí bù fā zhǎn。
english: I hope the trade between us will be further developed on the basis of equality and mutual benefit.

hanzi: 要射中飞行中的小鸟，尤其是高空飞行的小鸟，非常困难。
pinyin: yào shè zhòng fēi xíng zhòng dì xiǎo niǎo， yóu qí shì gāo kōng fēi xíng de xiǎo niǎo， fēi cháng kùn nan。
english: It is difficult to shoot a flying bird, especially a small bird flying high up in the sky.

hanzi: 这样，这架飞机才能升高，并在距山头四百英尺的高度飞越山顶。
pinyin: zhè yàng， zhè jià fēi jī cái néng shēng gāo， bìng zài jù shān tóu sì bǎi yīng chǐ de gāo dù fēi yuè shān dǐng。
english: The plane was then able to rise and it cleared the mountains by400 feet.

hanzi: 他带我到他的藏书室，里面的藏书虽然杂乱无章，数量却相当可观。
pinyin: tā dài wǒ dào tā de zàng shū shì， lǐ miàn de zàng shū suī rán zá luàn wú zhāng， shù liàng què xiāng dāng kě guān。
english: He took me into his library, a littery but considerable collection.

hanzi: 我们对入侵之敌采取牵制的方针, 以备组织好兵力将之击退.
pinyin: wǒ men duì rù qīn zhī dí cǎi qǔ qiān zhì de fāng zhēn,  yǐ bèi zǔ zhī hào bīng lì jiàng zhī jī tuì.
english: Until we'd built up sufficient forces to drive the invaders back, we pursued a policy of containment.

hanzi: 关于包装问题，我方将与厂商联系，要求他们对此引起重视。
pinyin: guān yú bāo zhuāng wèn tí， wǒ fāng jiàng yù chǎng shāng lián xì， yāo qiú tā men duì cǐ yǐn qǐ zhòng shì。
english: About packing, we will contact our manufacturers and call their attention to the matter.

hanzi: 他忍受对自己人品的攻击而不发火，表现出巨大的自我控制能力。
pinyin: tā rěn shòu duì zì jǐ rén pǐn de gōng jī ér bù fā huǒ， biǎo xiàn chū jù dà de zì wǒ kòng zhì néng lì。
english: He showed great moderation in not responding angrily to the attacks on his character.

hanzi: 鼓舞使人的心灵或情感受到刺激而达到更高层次情感和行动的东西
