pinyin: gǔ wǔ shǐ rén de xīn líng huò qíng gǎn shòu dào cì jī ér dá dào gèng gāo céng cì qíng gǎn huò xíng dòng de dōng xi
english: Stimulation of the mind or emotions to a high level of feeling or activity.

hanzi: 如果他们拒绝很快地作出诚心诚意的道歉，我们只好起诉了。
pinyin: rú guǒ tā men jù jué hěn kuài de zuò chū chéng xīn chéng yì de dào qiàn， wǒ men zhǐ hǎo qǐ sù le。
english: If they refuse to make heart-felt apologies soon we will have to bring an action against them.

hanzi: 计算机性能和价格关系的法则，即性能与价格的平方大体上相等。
pinyin: jì suàn jī xìng néng huò jià gé guān xi de fǎ zé， jí xìng néng yù jià gé de píng fāng dà tǐ shàng xiāng děng。
english: A theory that the power of a computer is equivalent roughly to its cost squared.

hanzi: 虽然很多人反对他的计划，他仍能巧妙地设法使它最后获得通过。
pinyin: suī rán hěn duō rén fǎn duì tā de jì huà， tā réng néng qiǎo miào de shè fǎ shǐ tā zuì hòu huò dé tōng guò。
english: Although many people opposed his plan, he engineered it through to final approval.

hanzi: 因你一直工作到如此晚的时间，今天不计较那迟到的五分钟了。
pinyin: yīn nǐ yī zhí gōng zuò dào rú cǐ wǎn de shí jiān， jīn tiān bù jì jiào nà chí dào de wǔ fēn zhōng le。
english: As you were kept working so late, you will be excused from being late for five minutes today.

hanzi: 我曾经犯过不少错误，但从未犯过宣称自己未犯过错误的错误。
pinyin: wǒ céng jīng fàn guò bù shǎo cuò wù， dàn zòng wèi fàn guò xuān chēng zì jǐ wèi fàn guò cuò wù de cuò wù。
english: I have made mistakes, but I have never made the mistake of claiming that I never made one.

hanzi: 总统派出他的高级助手去组织安排对立派别之间的和平谈判。
pinyin: zǒng tǒng pài chū tā de gāo jí zhù shǒu qù zǔ zhī ān pái duì lì pài bié zhī jiān de hé píng tán pàn。
english: The president has sent his top aide to master-mind peace negotiations between the opposing factions.

hanzi: 你们如果能采取必要的措施追查并找回这架像机我将十分感激。
pinyin: nǐ men rú guǒ néng cǎi qǔ bì yào de cuò shī zhuī chá bìng zhǎo huí zhè jià xiàng jī wǒ jiàng shí fēn gǎn jī。
english: I shall be grateful if you will take necessary measures to trace and recover the camera.

hanzi: 这些附件及专用工具的费用应包括在该品目的基本价格之中。
pinyin: zhè xie fù jiàn jí zhuān yòng gōng jù de fèi yòng yìng bāo kuò zài gāi pǐn mù dì jī běn jià gé zhī zhōng。
english: The cost of these accessories and special tools shall be included in the basic price of the item.

hanzi: 这罐头起子号称是一项非常好的发明，但实际上它很不好用。
pinyin: zhè guàn tou qǐ zi hào chēng shì yí xiàng fēi cháng hǎo de fā míng， dàn shí jì shàng tā hěn bù hào yòng。
english: It is claimed that this tin-opener is a very good invention, but in practice it's not easy to use.

hanzi: 原始人，未开化的人被其他民族或群体视为拥有原始文化的人
pinyin: yuán shǐ rén， wèi kāi huà de rén bèi qí tā mín zú huò qún tǐ shì wéi yōng yǒu yuán shǐ wén huà de rén
english: A member of a people considered by those of another nation or group to have a primitive civilization.

hanzi: 史前生物化学对生物化学以及生物化学过程的发展和演变的研究
pinyin: shǐ qián shēng wù huà xué duì shēng wù huà xué yǐ jí shēng wù huà xué guò chéng de fā zhǎn huò yǎn biàn de yán jiū
english: The study of the development and evolution of biochemicals and biochemical processes.

hanzi: 原始人，未开化的人被其他民族或群体视为拥有原始文化的人
pinyin: yuán shǐ rén， wèi kāi huà de rén bèi qí tā mín zú huò qún tǐ shì wéi yōng yǒu yuán shǐ wén huà de rén
english: A member of a people considered by those of another nation or group to have a primitive civilization.

hanzi: 即使要通报紧急请求，不经允许闯到国王面前也是危险的。
pinyin: jí shǐ yào tōng bào jǐn jí qǐng qiú， bù jīng yǔn xǔ chuǎng dào guó wáng miàn qián yě shì wēi xiǎn de。
english: It is dangerous to intrude into the King's presence without permission, even to make an urgent request.

hanzi: 敌人冲破了前线，但被我们的骑兵部队毫不留情地从高地击退。
pinyin: dí rén chōng pò le qián xiàn， dàn bèi wǒ men de qí bīng bù duì háo bú liú qíng de zòng gāo dì jī tuì。
english: The enemy broke through the front line, but were firmly repulsed from the higher ground by cavalry.

hanzi: 如果你把这台精密仪器置于高温之下，仪器将会受到严重损坏。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ bǎ zhè tái jīng mì yí qì zhì yú gāo wēn zhī xià， yí qì jiāng huì shòu dào yán zhòng sǔn huài。
english: If you subject this precision instrument to a high temperature, it will be seriously damaged.

hanzi: 如果你把这台精密仪器置于高温之下，仪器将会受到严重损坏。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ bǎ zhè tái jīng mì yí qì zhì yú gāo wēn zhī xià， yí qì jiāng huì shòu dào yán zhòng sǔn huài。
english: If you subject this precision instrument to a high temperature, it will be seriously damaged.

hanzi: 在春天，我们通常将钟表向前拔一小时，以利用夏天的日光。
pinyin: zài chūn tiān， wǒ men tōng cháng jiàng zhōng biǎo xiàng qián bá yī xiǎo shí， yǐ lì yòng xià tiān de rì guāng。
english: In spring, we usually set the clock ahead one hour, to take advantage of the summer daylight.

hanzi: 我们必须知道别的国家的习俗，免得他们会认为我们是没有礼貌的。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū zhī dào bié de guó jiā de xí sú， miǎn de tā men kuài rèn wéi wǒ men shì méi yǒu lǐ mào de。
english: We must find out the customs of other countries, so that they will not think us ill mannered.

hanzi: 和美国家庭的这种爱同时并存的是自强及独立的文化价值观。
pinyin: huò Měi guó jiā tíng de zhè zhǒng ài tóng shí bìng cún de shì zì qiáng jí dú lì de wén huà jià zhí guān。
english: Coexisting with such love in the American family are cultural values of self-reliance and independence.

hanzi: 当地一家商店的老板担心新开张的超级市场会抢走他的饭碗。
pinyin: dāng dì yī jiā shāng diàn de lǎo bǎn dān xīn xīn kāi zhāng de chāo jí shì chǎng kuài qiǎng zǒu tā de fàn wǎn。
english: The man in the local shop is worried that the new supermarket will take the bread out of his mouth.

hanzi: 执行者通过执行特定的命令或起特定作用而充当他人的代理人的人
pinyin: zhí xíng zhě tōng guò zhí xíng tè dìng de mìng lìng huò qǐ tè dìng zuò yòng ér chōng dāng tā rén de dài lǐ rén de rén
english: A person serving as an agent for another by carrying out specified orders or functions.

hanzi: 尽管几位名角演出都很出色，却未曾想竟让一名新秀抢尽风头。
pinyin: jǐn guǎn jǐ wèi míng jué yǎn chū dōu hěn chū sè， què wèi zēng xiǎng jìng ràng yī míng xīn xiù qiǎng jìn fēng tou。
english: Despite fine acting by several well-known stars it was a young newcomer who stole the show.

hanzi: 厂家已在试验制造，完全符合所要求的规格，可望在两周内完成。
pinyin: chǎng jiā yǐ zài shì yàn zhì zào， wán quán fú hé suǒ yāo qiú de guī gé， kě wàng zài liǎng zhōu nèi wán chéng。
english: Maker make trial product exactly conform specification expect completion within fortnight.

hanzi: 人类通过自动化扩展了人类神经系统的功能思维和决断的才能。
pinyin: rén lèi tōng guò zì dòng huà kuò zhǎn le rén lèi shén jīng xì tǒng de gōng néng sī wéi huò jué duàn de cái néng。
english: He extends his nervous system and his thinking and decision-making faculties through automation.

hanzi: 在计算机安全学中，一种对存取受到控制的实体的特征的描述。
pinyin: zài jì suàn jī ān quán xué zhòng， yī zhòng duì cún qǔ shòu dào kòng zhì de shí tǐ de tè zhēng de miáo shù。
english: In computer security, a description of the characteristics of an entity to which access is controlled.

hanzi: 安慰的话，宽心的话某些没有内在补救作用的东西，仅仅用来安慰他人
pinyin: ān wèi de huà， kuān xīn de huà mǒu xiē méi yǒu nèi zài bǔ jiù zuò yòng de dōng xi， jǐn jǐn yòng Lái ān wèi tā rén
english: Something of no intrinsic remedial value that is used to appease or reassure another.

hanzi: 安慰的话，宽心的话某些没有内在补救作用的东西，仅仅用来安慰他人
pinyin: ān wèi de huà， kuān xīn de huà mǒu xiē méi yǒu nèi zài bǔ jiù zuò yòng de dōng xi， jǐn jǐn yòng Lái ān wèi tā rén
english: Something of no intrinsic remedial value that is used to appease or reassure another.

hanzi: 资产阶级政客们为了要在自己政党内确立有利地位而钻营策划。
pinyin: zī chǎn jiē jí zhèng kè men wèi le yào zài zì jǐ zhèng dǎng nèi què lì yǒu lì dì wèi ér zuàn yíng cè huà。
english: The bourgeois politicians jockeyed about in order to establish advantageous positions within their party.

hanzi: 他是个经验非常丰富的导演，不至于为批评家们的议论而担心。
pinyin: tā shì gè jīng yàn fēi cháng fēng fù de dǎo yǎn， bù zhì yú wèi pī píng jiā men de yì lùn ér dān xīn。
english: He is the director whose experience is very rich, and can't go so far as worried about the comment of critics.

hanzi: 现在父亲已去世，我们一定要经得起痛苦的打击，并学会忍受艰难困苦。
pinyin: xiàn zài fù qīn yǐ qù shì， wǒ men yī dìng yào jīng de qǐ tòng kǔ de dǎ jī， bìng xué huì rěn shòu jiān nán kùn kǔ。
english: Now that Father is dead, we must bits the bullet and learn to put up with hardship.

hanzi: 公式计算语言的简称，应用不太广泛的一种高级程序设计语言。
pinyin: gōng shì jì suàn yǔ yán de jiǎn chēng， yìng yòng bù tài guǎng fàn de yī zhòng gāo jí chéng xù shè jì yǔ yán。
english: An abbreviation for formula calculation language, a high-level programming language not too widely used.

hanzi: 优越的位置提供广泛全面的观点或看法的位置，如一个地方或一种情形
pinyin: yōu yuè de wèi zhi tí gōng guǎng fàn quán miàn de guān diǎn huò kàn fǎ de wèi zhi， rú yī gè dì fang huò yī zhòng qíng xing
english: A position that affords a broad overall view or perspective, as of a place or situation.

hanzi: 计步器，步程器一种通过记录所行步数来估测步行近似距离的仪器
pinyin: jì bù qì， bù chéng qì yī zhòng tōng guò jì lù suǒ xìng bù shuò lái gù cè bù xíng jìn sì jù lí de yí qì
english: An instrument that gauges the approximate distance traveled on foot by registering the number of steps taken.

hanzi: 每个阶级或等级上的人有为比它高一级的阶级或高一层次的人尽责任的社会。
pinyin: měi gè jiē jí huò děng jí shàng de rén yǒu wèi bì tā gāo yī jí de jiē jí huò gāo yī céng cì de rén jìn zé rèn de shè huì。
english: Society where each class or level have a duty to serve the class above it.

hanzi: 活页文选小短文或专题论文，常关于一个流行的题目，出版时未经装订
pinyin: huó yè wén xuǎn xiǎo duǎn wén huò zhuān tí lùn wén， cháng guān yú yī gè liú xíng de tí mù， chū bǎn shí wèi jīng zhuāng dìng
english: A short essay or treatise, usually on a current topic, published without a binding.

hanzi: 我们调查证实过了。恐怕我将不得不取消这笔生意，除非您降价。
pinyin: wǒ men diào chá zhèng shí guò le。 kǒng pà wǒ jiàng bù dé bù qǔ xiāo zhè bǐ shēng yi， chú fēi nín jiàng jià。
english: That has been confirmed by our survey. I'm afraid I'll have to cancel the deal unless you reduce your price.

hanzi: 人事经理发起了一个全面性的运动，使工作人员星期五下午都上班。
pinyin: rén shì jīng lǐ fā qǐ le yī gè quán miàn xìng de yùn dòng， shǐ gōng zuò rén yuán xīng qī wǔ xià wǔ dōu shàng bān。
english: The personnel manager have launch an all-out campaign to get the staff to work on Friday afternoon.

hanzi: 有些年我们获得大丰收，有些年则收成很坏，但好坏你都得接受。
pinyin: yǒu xiē nián wǒ men huò dé Dà fēng shōu， yǒu xiē nián zé shōu cheng hěn huài， dàn hǎo huài nǐ dōu de jiē shòu。
english: Some years we have a plentiful harvest, others a very poor one, but you have to take the good with the bad.

hanzi: 有些年我们获得大丰收，有些年则收成很坏，但好坏你都得接受。
pinyin: yǒu xiē nián wǒ men huò dé Dà fēng shōu， yǒu xiē nián zé shōu cheng hěn huài， dàn hǎo huài nǐ dōu de jiē shòu。
english: Some years we have a plentiful harvest, others a very poor one, but you have to take the good with the bad.

hanzi: 平面规，测平仪在精密金属加工中用于测定平面表面精度的金属平板
pinyin: píng miàn guī， cè píng yí zài jīng mì jīn shǔ jiā gōng zhòng yòng yú cè dìng píng miàn biǎo miàn jīng dù de jīn shǔ píng bǎn
english: A flat metal plate for gauging the accuracy of a plane surface in precision metalworking.

hanzi: 指一个其价格已包含在计算机或产品的价格中的软件或硬件产品。
pinyin: zhǐ yī gè qí jià gé yǐ bāo hán zài jì suàn jī huò chǎn pǐn de jià gé zhòng dì ruǎn jiàn huò yìng jiàn chǎn pǐn。
english: Pertaining to a software or hardware product that is included in the price of a computer system or product.

hanzi: 特写一种简要但有戏剧性的重要演员的出场，如动作画面的单一场景
pinyin: tè xiě yī zhòng jiǎn yào dàn yǒu xì jù xìng de zhòng yào yǎn yuán de chū chǎng， rú dòng zuò huà miàn de dān yī chǎng jǐng
english: A brief but dramatic appearance of a prominent actor, as in a single scene of a motion picture.

hanzi: 据说由于原材料市场上升且捉摸不定，制革商们不愿报出实盘。
pinyin: jù shuō yóu yú yuán cái liào shì chǎng shàng shēng qiě zhuō mó bù dìng， zhì gé shāng men bù yuàn bào chū shí pán。
english: The tanner is said to be reluctant to quote firm price because of a rising and uncertain raw material market.

hanzi: 总的来说，这篇文章写得不坏，但是有些小错，因此显得美中不足。
pinyin: zǒng de lái shuō， zhè piān wén zhāng xiě de bù huài， dàn shì yǒu xiē xiǎo cuò， yīn cǐ xiǎn de měi zhōng bù zú。
english: The essay is well-done on the whole. It is, however, marred here and there by slight inaccuracies.

hanzi: 在写这本书时，作者查阅了许多与此同类题材的著作，从中得益非浅。
pinyin: zài xiě zhè běn shū shí， zuó zhě chá yuè le xǔ duō yù cǐ tóng lèi tí cái de著 zuò， cóng zhōng de yì fēi qiǎn。
english: In writing this book, the author has greatly profited from consulting many works on the same subjects.

hanzi: 无色的无色的，因零饱和度而没有颜色，如中性灰色，白色，或黑色
pinyin: wú shǎi de wú shǎi de， yīn líng bǎo hé dù ér méi yǒu yán sè， rú zhōng xìng huī sè， bái sè， huò hēi sè
english: Designating color perceived to have zero saturation and therefore no hue, such as neutral grays, white, or black.

hanzi: 如果我们采取措施在互利的基础上恢复业务关系，对我们都是有利的。
pinyin: rú guǒ wǒ men cǎi qǔ cuò shī zài hù lì de jī chǔ shàng huī fù yè wù guān xi， duì wǒ men dōu shì yǒu lì de。
english: It will be advantageous if steps are taken to resume our business relationship on the basis of mutual benefit.

hanzi: 据说由于原材料市场上升且捉摸不定，制革商们不愿报出实盘。
pinyin: jù shuō yóu yú yuán cái liào shì chǎng shàng shēng qiě zhuō mó bù dìng， zhì gé shāng men bù yuàn bào chū shí pán。
english: The tanner is said to be reluctant to quote firm price because of a rising and uncertain raw material market.

hanzi: 平常的地下火车接近车站时，发出的声音可能是最大声的喷射机的两倍。
pinyin: píng cháng de dì xià huǒ chē jiē jìn chē zhàn shí， fā chū de shēng yīn kě néng shì zuì dà shēng de pēn shè jī de liǎng bèi。
english: An ordinary subway train, approaching the station, can be twice as loud as the loudest jet.

hanzi: 当你不再仅仅限于文字和静止图片时，网上生活会丰富多彩得多。
pinyin: dàng nǐ bù zài jǐn jǐn xiàn yú wén zì Hé jìng zhǐ tú piàn shí， wǎng shàng shēng huó kuài fēng fù duō cǎi de duō。
english: Life on-line can be a much richer experience when you aren't restricted to just written words and still pictures.

hanzi: 我知道你不喜欢他，但你至少要照顾一下面子去参加他公司的开典仪式。
pinyin: wǒ zhī dào nǐ bù xǐ huan tā， dàn nǐ zhì shǎo yào zhào gu yī xià miàn zi qù cān jiā tā gōng sī de kāi diǎn yí shì。
english: I know you didn't like him, but at least have the decency to go to his opening ceremony of the company.

hanzi: 当一束光线穿进暗淡的房间时，我们可以看到空气中有许多小颗粒在飞舞。
pinyin: dàng yī shù guāng xiàn chuān jìn àn dàn de fáng jiān shí， wǒ men kě yǐ kàn dào kōng qì zhòng yǒu xǔ duō xiǎo kē lì zài fēi wǔ。
english: We can see many molecules flying in the air when a sunbeam penetrated the dark room.

hanzi: 我一整天都在家里等候你们的电视修理员来取电视机，但他失约了。
pinyin: wǒ yī zhěng tiān dōu zài jiā lǐ děng hòu nǐ men de diàn shì xiū lǐ yuán lái qǔ diàn shì jī， dàn tā shī yuē le。
english: I've been waiting in all day for your television repair man to collect the set, but he didn't come as he promised.

hanzi: 他企图将这种酒假冒成法国酒，而事实上此酒来自共同市场以外的地方。
pinyin: tā qǐ tú jiàng zhè zhǒng jiǔ jiǎ mào chéng fǎ guó jiǔ， ér shì shí shàng cǐ jiǔ lái zì gòng tóng shì chǎng yǐ wài de dì fang。
english: He tried to pass off the wine as french, when in fact it come from outside the common market.

hanzi: 微调装置精密仪器上被设计用以增进精密校准或测量的一个辅助装置
pinyin: wēi tiáo zhuāng zhì jīng mì yí qì shàng bèi shè jì yòng yǐ zēng jìn jīng mì jiào zhǔn huò cè liàng de yī gè fǔ zhù zhuāng zhì
english: An auxiliary device designed to facilitate fine adjustments or measurements on precision instruments.

hanzi: 根据牛顿第一定律，如果不对物体施加力的话，静止物体会一直保持静止。
pinyin: gēn jù niú dùn dì yī dìng lu:4， rú guǒ bù duì wù tǐ shī jiā lì de huà， jìng zhǐ wù tǐ kuài yī zhí bǎo chí jìng zhǐ。
english: According to Newton's first law, a body at rest will remain at rest until a force is applied to it.

hanzi: 随着逐渐成熟，许多年轻的激进分子对 生活和社会渐持较为宽容的态度。
pinyin: suí zhe zhú jiàn chéng shú， xǔ duō nián qīng de jī jìn fèn zǐ duì  shēng huó huò shè huì jiàn chí jiào wèi kuān róng de tài du。
english: As they mature, many young radicals mellow into a more tolerant attitude towards life and society.

hanzi: 一种认为所有的知识都来自于最初的神的启示并由口传方式传播的体系
pinyin: yī zhòng rèn wéi suǒ yǒu de zhī shi dōu lái zì yú zuì chū de shén de qǐ shì bìng yóu kǒu zhuàn fāng shì chuán bō de tǐ xì
english: A system holding that all knowledge is derived from original divine revelation and is transmitted by tradition.

hanzi: 照今天看来，我会说，当初太草率，如果再有机会，我一定不会那样做。
pinyin: zhào jīn tiān kàn lai， wǒ kuài shuō， dāng chū tài cǎo shuài， rú guǒ zài yǒu jī kuài， wǒ yī dìng bù huì nà yàng zuò。
english: From today's perspective I'd say I was too hasty and would love to have the chance to do it differently.

hanzi: 我告诉孩子们必须遵守家规，要不他们就会失去目前享有的某些自由。
pinyin: wǒ gào su hái zi men bì xū zūn shǒu jiā guī， yào bu tā men jiù kuài shī qù mù qián xiǎng yǒu de mǒu xiē zì yóu。
english: I've told my children they must toe the line with regard to house rules or lose some of the freedom they presently enjoy.

hanzi: 在最近的这次危机中，没有一家银行能帮助那些处于困境的公司渡过难关。
pinyin: zài zuì jìn de zhè cì wēi jī zhòng， méi yǒu yī jiā yín háng néng bāng zhù nà xiē chǔ yú kùn jìng de gōng sī dù guò nán guān。
english: In the recent crisis no banks could manage to bail out the companies feeling financial pressure.

hanzi: 在战争前那些美好的岁月里，似乎没有任何东西能打破我们平静的生活进程。
pinyin: zài zhàn zhēng qián nà xiē měi hǎo de suì yuè lǐ， sì hu méi yǒu rèn hé dōng xi néng dǎ pò wǒ men píng jìng de shēng huó jìn chéng。
english: It seemed nothing could disturb the even tenor of our existence in those happy prewar days.

hanzi: 磁化使一个物体具有暂时或永久性磁性的过程，例如把一个物体放入磁物中
pinyin: cí huà shǐ yī gè wù tǐ jù yǒu zàn shí huò yǒng jiǔ xìng cí xìng de guò chéng， lì rú bǎ yī gè wù tǐ fàng rù cí wù zhòng
english: The process of making a substance temporarily or permanently magnetic, as by insertion in a magnetic field.

hanzi: 在战争前那些美好的岁月里，似乎没有任何东西能打破我们平静的生活进程。
pinyin: zài zhàn zhēng qián nà xiē měi hǎo de suì yuè lǐ， sì hu méi yǒu rèn hé dōng xi néng dǎ pò wǒ men píng jìng de shēng huó jìn chéng。
english: It seemed nothing could disturb the even tenor of our existence in those happy prewar days.

hanzi: 临床生物医学应用于临床医学的自然科学原理，尤指生物学与生理学
pinyin: lín chuáng shēng wù yī xué yìng yòng yú lín chuáng yī xué de zì rán kē xué yuán lǐ， yóu zhǐ shēng wù xué yù shēng lǐ xué
english: The application of the principles of the natural sciences, especially biology and physiology, to clinical medicine.

hanzi: 正如公报中所说，两国同意在未来的一年中扩大两国之间的贸易关系。
pinyin: zhèng rú gōng bào zhòng suǒ shuō， liǎng guó tóng yì zài wèi lái de yī nián zhòng kuò dà liǎng guó zhī jiān de mào yì guān xi。
english: As spelled out in the communique, the two countries agreed to expand their trade relations in the coming year.

hanzi: 小汽车的优点是能够在其它车辆间穿行，并且常常比大客车先到达。
pinyin: xiǎo qì chē de yōu diǎn shì néng gòu zài qí tā chē liàng jiàn chuān xìng， bìng qiě cháng cháng bì dà kè chē xiān dào dá。
english: The advantage of a little car is that it can weave through the traffic and often get there faster than the big buses.

hanzi: 事情到了两群人马各坐在教堂里相对的两边，隔着通道怒目相视的地步。
pinyin: shì qing dào le liǎng qún rén mǎ gè zuò zài jiào táng lǐ xiāng duì de liǎng biān， gé zhuó tōng dào nù mù xiàng shì de dì bù。
english: Things reached the point where the two groups sat on opposite sides of the church, glaring across the aisle.

hanzi: 他几次报名应征，但都不合标准，先是由于年纪太小，而后又由于长得太瘦。
pinyin: tā jǐ cì bào míng yìng zhēng， dàn dōu bù hé biāo zhǔn， xiān shì yóu yú nián jì tài xiǎo， ér hòu yòu yóu yú zhǎng de tài shòu。
english: He tried several times to enlist, but first he was too young, then too thin, to make the grade.

hanzi: 分子扩散运动两种或更多种物质的分子由于随机的热运动自发混合在一起
pinyin: fèn zǐ kuò sàn yùn dòng liǎng zhòng huò gèng duō zhòng wù zhì de fèn zǐ yóu yú suí jī de rè yùn dòng zì fā hùn hé zài yī qǐ
english: The spontaneous intermingling of the particles of two or more substances as a result of random thermal motion.

hanzi: 对如此大数量的订购，本公司希望以比价目表内所订价格为低的批发折扣来采购。
pinyin: duì rú cǐ Dà shù liàng de dìng gòu， běn gōng sī xī wàng yǐ bǐ jià mù biǎo nèi suǒ dìng jià gé wèi dī de pī fā zhé kòu lái cǎi gòu。
english: For an order of this large quantity we expect a wholesale discount off your price-list.

hanzi: 如果放入冰箱的话，这种农产品可以保存更长的时间。我需要一辆经久耐用的汽车
pinyin: rú guǒ fàng rù bīng xiāng de huà， zhè zhǒng nóng chǎn pǐn kě yǐ bǎo cún gèng zhǎng de shí jiān。 wǒ xū yào yī liàng jīng jiǔ nài yòng de qì chē
english: Produce lasts longer if it is refrigerated. I wanted a car that would last.

hanzi: 本体感受由身体本身的内部刺激引起的对于运动和空间定向的不自觉的感受
pinyin: běn tǐ gǎn shòu yóu shēn tǐ běn shēn de nèi bù cì jī yǐn qǐ de duì yú yùn dòng huò kōng jiān dìng xiàng de bù zì jué de gǎn shòu
english: The unconscious perception of movement and spatial orientation arising from stimuli within the body itself.

hanzi: 在打印机或显示器中，一种用于控制打印或显示信息的布局或位置的控制字符。
pinyin: zài dǎ yìn jī huò xiǎn shì qì zhòng， yī zhòng yòng yú kòng zhì dǎ yìn huò xiǎn shì xìn xī de bù jú huò wèi zhi de kòng zhì zì fú。
english: In a printer or display, a control character used to control the layout or location of information.

hanzi: 应召显贵法国革命前要员议会的一员，在紧急时刻被召到大会进行商讨
pinyin: yìng zhào xiǎn guì fǎ guó gé mìng qián yào yuán yì huì de yī yuán， zài jǐn jí shí kè bèi zhào dào dà huì jìn xíng shāng tǎo
english: One of a council of prominent persons in pre-Revolutionary France called into assembly to deliberate at times of emergency.

hanzi: 里程碑，里程标路边所设立的石制标志，以英里指示从给定的一点到该路标的距离
pinyin: lǐ chéng bēi， lǐ chéng biāo lù biān suǒ shè lì de shí zhì biāo zhì， yǐ yīng lǐ zhǐ shì zòng jǐ dìng de yī diǎn dào gāi lù biāo de jù lí
english: A stone marker set up on a roadside to indicate the distance in miles from a given point.

hanzi: 自从她在学校里获奖以来，她就一直目中无人，不愿与别的女孩子说话。
pinyin: zì cóng tā zài xué xiào lǐ huò jiǎng yǐ lái， tā jiù yī zhí mù zhòng wú rén， bù yuàn yù bié de nu:3 hái zi shuō huà。
english: Since she won a prize at school she's been going about with her nose in the air and refusing to talk to the other girls.

hanzi: 应召显贵法国革命前要员议会的一员，在紧急时刻被召到大会进行商讨
pinyin: yìng zhào xiǎn guì fǎ guó gé mìng qián yào yuán yì huì de yī yuán， zài jǐn jí shí kè bèi zhào dào dà huì jìn xíng shāng tǎo
english: One of a council of prominent persons in pre-Revolutionary France called into assembly to deliberate at times of emergency.

hanzi: 护理人员，医务辅助人员一种受过进行紧急医务护理或辅助专职医护人员训练的人
pinyin: hù lǐ rén yuán， yī wù fǔ zhù rén yuán yī zhòng shòu guò jìn xíng jǐn jí yī wù hù lǐ huò fǔ zhù zhuān zhí yī hù rén yuán xùn liàn de rén
english: A person who is trained to give emergency medical treatment or assist medical professionals.

hanzi: 当我们查明何时有货，价格多少时，将立即通知贵公司，以什么价格可以成交。
pinyin: dàng wǒ men chá míng hé shí yǒu huò， jià gé duō shao shí， jiàng lì jí tōng zhī guì gōng sī， yǐ shén me jià gé kě yǐ chéng jiāo。
english: As soon as the purchase is made, and the price ascertain, I will inform you at what they will be invoiced.

hanzi: 当我们查明何时有货，价格多少时，将立即通知贵公司，以什么价格可以成交。
pinyin: dàng wǒ men chá míng hé shí yǒu huò， jià gé duō shao shí， jiàng lì jí tōng zhī guì gōng sī， yǐ shén me jià gé kě yǐ chéng jiāo。
english: As soon as the purchase is made, and the price ascertain, I will inform you at what they will be invoiced.

hanzi: 人难得生病，可是旁观者们却以为他势将必死，并因这一线希望而精神百倍起来。
pinyin: rén nán dé shēng bìng， kě shì páng guān zhě men què yǐ wéi tā shì jiàng bì sǐ， bìng yīn zhè yī xiàn xī wàng ér jīng shén bǎi bèi qǐ lai。
english: A person seldom falls sick, but the bystander is animated with a faint hope that he will die.

hanzi: 她断定那笔钱用得不是地方，而我们在经济上遇到的困难却也似乎说明她言之有理。
pinyin: tā duàn dìng nà bǐ qián yòng de bú shì dì fang， ér wǒ men zài jīng jì shàng yù dào de kùn nan què yě sì hu shuō míng tā yán zhī yǒu lǐ。
english: She claimed that money had been wasted and our financial difficulties seemed to prove her point.

hanzi: 机构一个已成立的组织或基金，特别是指为教育，公共服务或文化的目的而设立的
pinyin: jī gòu yī gè yǐ chéng lì de zǔ zhī huò jī jīn， tè bié shì zhǐ wèi jiào yù， gōng gòng fú wù huò wén huà de mù dì ér shè lì de
english: An established organization or foundation, especially one dedicated to education, public service, or culture.

hanzi: 国旗挂于船只或飞机上的国旗，常带有部队分队或部队单位的特殊识别标记
pinyin: guó qí guà yú chuán zhī huò fēi jī shàng de guó qí， cháng dài yǒu bù duì fēn duì huò bù duì dān wèi de tè shū shí bié biāo jì
english: A national flag displayed on ships and aircraft, often with the special insignia of a branch or unit of the armed forces.

hanzi: 英国人在任何动乱的年代都要重温战争时期的日子，那时人们都友好互助。
pinyin: Yīng guó rén zài rèn hé dòng luàn de nián dài dōu yào zhòng wēn zhàn zhēng shí qī de rì zi， nà shí rén men dōu yǒu hǎo hù zhù。
english: In any troubled times, the British tend to hark back to wartime days, when people helped each other in a friendly spirit.

hanzi: 彩色插图书的整页图解，经常为彩色，印刷在与印刷正文页材料不同的纸张上
pinyin: cǎi sè chā tú shū de zhěng yè tú xiè， jīng cháng wèi cǎi sè， yìn shuà zài yù yìn shuà zhēng wén yè cái liào bù tóng de zhǐ zhāng shàng
english: A full-page book illustration, often in color and printed on paper different from that used on the text pages.

hanzi: 粉红色色彩中略带红色的颜色中的一组，亮度中到高等，彩度饱和度从低到中等
pinyin: fěn hóng sè sè cǎi zhòng lu:è dài hóng sè de yán sè zhòng dì yī zǔ， liàng dù zhòng dào gāo děng， cǎi dù bǎo hé dù zòng dī dào zhōng děng
english: Any of a group of colors reddish in hue, of medium to high lightness, and of low to moderate saturation.

hanzi: 数据通信中，由接收方向发送方传送应答字符作为肯定回答的传输过程。
pinyin: shù jù tōng xìn zhòng， yóu jiē shōu fāng xiàng fā sòng fāng chuán sòng yìng dá zì fú zuò wéi kěn dìng huí dá de chuán shū guò chéng。
english: In data communications, the transmission by a receiver of acknowledge characters as an affirmative response to a sender.

hanzi: 从属地位的人或物组织的从属组成部分，实行必要的但通常是次要的或常规的功能
pinyin: cóng shǔ dì wèi de rén huò wù zǔ zhī de cóng shǔ zǔ chéng bù fen， shí xíng bì yào de dàn tōng cháng shì cì yào de huò cháng guī de gōng néng
english: A subordinate member of an organization who performs necessary but usually minor or routine functions.

hanzi: 儿子，别担心，作不出来就算了。告诉你老师，别忘了诗人是天生的，不是教出来的。
pinyin: ér zi， biè dān xīn， zuò bù chū lai jiù suàn le。 gào su nǐ lǎo shī， biè wàng le shī rén shì tiān shēng de， bú shì jiào chū lai de。
english: Stop worrying if you can't do it, son, and tell your teacher to remember that poets are born, not made.

hanzi: 这里您可以看到两名工人，他们刚刚割好三大马车金黄色的通心粉小麦杆。
pinyin: zhè lǐ nín kě yǐ kàn dào liǎng míng gōng rén， tā men gāng gang gē hào sān dà mǎ chē jīn huáng shǎi de tōng xīn fěn xiǎo mài gǎn。
english: Here you can see two workers who, between them, have just finished cutting three cart-loads of golden brown macaroni stalks.

hanzi: 那天早些时候迫使敌人放弃给我军的阵地现在需要布置起来，对付那必然的反攻。
pinyin: nà tiān zǎo xiē shí hou pò shǐ dí rén fàng qì jǐ wǒ jūn de zhèn dì xiàn zài xū yào bù zhì qǐ lai， duì fu nà bì rán de fǎn gōng。
english: Positions surrendered to our troops earlier in the day had now to be prepared against the inevitable counter-attack.

hanzi: 他与顾客的关系是事务性的，理所当然不可能跟他们之间有多少个人感情。
pinyin: tā yù gù kè de guān xi shì shì wù xìng de， lǐ suǒ dāng rán bù kě néng gēn tā men zhī jiān yǒu duō shao gè rén gǎn qíng。
english: His relations with his clients were also cut and dried, very little personal feeling could in the nature of things come into them.

hanzi: 一组卡片，通常是一叠完整的穿孔卡片，它具有确定的服务对象和明确的用途。
pinyin: yī zǔ kǎ piàn， tōng cháng shì yī dié wán zhěng de chuān kǒng kǎ piàn， tā jù yǒu què dìng de fú wù duì xiàng huò míng què de yòng tú。
english: A collection of cards, commonly a complete set of cards which have been punched for a definite service or purpose.

hanzi: 在英国，一些反对党的领袖是政府成员，有人建议美国也采用类似的作法。
pinyin: zài Yīng guó， yī xiē fǎn duì dǎng de lǐng xiù shì zhèng fǔ chéng yuán， yǒu rén jiàn yì Měi guó yě cǎi yòng lèi sì de zuò fǎ。
english: In Britain, some opposition party leaders are members of the government, and some say that a similar device should be adopted here.

hanzi: 交错书写方法一种古代的书写方法，其中每一行交替地自右至左和自左至右书写
pinyin: jiāo cuò shū xiě fāng fǎ yī zhòng gǔ dài de shū xiě fāng fǎ， qí zhōng měi yī xìng jiāo tì de zì yòu zhì zuǒ huò zì zuǒ zhì yòu shū xiě
english: An ancient method of writing in which the lines are inscribed alternately from right to left and from left to right.

hanzi: 如果你朋友再来指手画脚，教育我们如何教育子女，那我就要叫他别多管闲事。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ péng you zài lái zhǐ shǒu huà jué， jiào yù wǒ men rú hé jiào yù zǐ nu:3， nà wǒ jiù yào jiào tā biè duō guǎn xián shì。
english: If your friend comes here with any more criticism about how we bring the children up, I'll tell him to go about his business.

hanzi: 因我们订购的是季节性商品，贵方务必于十月前装运，不然我们就赶不上季节了。
pinyin: yīn wǒ men dìng gòu de shì jì jié xìng shāng pǐn， guì fāng wù bì yú shí yuè qián zhuāng yùn， bù rán wǒ men jiù gǎn bù shàng jì jié le。
english: Be sure to ship the goods before October as what we ordered is seasonal goods. Otherwise we will not be able to catch the season.

hanzi: 一种低速输入设备，它将图形和图象数据转换成用于数字计算机的二进制数值输入。
pinyin: yī zhòng dī sù shū rù shè bèi， tā jiàng tú xíng huò tú xiàng shù jù zhuǎn huàn chéng yòng yú shù zì jì suàn jī de èr jìn zhì shuò zhí shū rù。
english: A low-speed input device that converts graphic and pictorial data into binary, numeric inputs for a digital computer.

hanzi: 花园城市设计能提供具有低密度建筑和开阔公共土地的宜人环境的居民区或居住地
pinyin: huā yuán chéng shì shè jì néng tí gōng jù yǒu dī mì dù jiàn zhù huò kāi kuò gōng gòng tǔ dì de yí rén huán jìng de jū mín qū huò jū zhù de
english: A residential suburb or community planned so as to provide a pleasant environment with low-density housing and open public land.

hanzi: 一种低速输入设备，它将图形和图象数据转换成用于数字计算机的二进制数值输入。
pinyin: yī zhòng dī sù shū rù shè bèi， tā jiàng tú xíng huò tú xiàng shù jù zhuǎn huàn chéng yòng yú shù zì jì suàn jī de èr jìn zhì shuò zhí shū rù。
english: A low-speed input device that converts graphic and pictorial data into binary, numeric inputs for a digital computer.

hanzi: 由终端操作员或计算机发送的字符或其它的短报文，用以指出已经收到前一报文。
pinyin: yóu zhōng duān cāo zuò yuán huò jì suàn jī fā sòng de zì fú huò qí tā de duǎn bào wén， yòng yǐ zhǐ chū yǐ jīng shōu dào qián yī bào wén。
english: By a terminal operator or computer;to send a character or other message to indicate that the previous message has been received.

hanzi: 在结构分析中，研究形状和格式的科学。此处指对模块层次和组织的结构的研究。
pinyin: zài jié gòu fēn xī zhòng， yán jiū xíng zhuàng huò gé shì de kē xué。 cǐ chù zhǐ duì mó kuài céng cì huò zǔ zhī de jié gòu de yán jiū。
english: In structured analysis, the study of shapes and forms, herein with respect to the structure of modular hierarchies and organizations.

hanzi: 向导们把我气死了，所以嘛，我今天杀掉了其中一个，还叫人给做成标本摆在我们的纪念品室。
pinyin: xiàng dǎo men bǎ wǒ qì sǐ le， suǒ yǐ ma， wǒ jīn tiān shā diào le qí zhōng yī gè， huán jiào rén jǐ zuò chéng biāo běn bǎi zài wǒ men de jì niàn pǐn shì。
english: Guides have annoyed me so, that today I kill one and am had him stuffed for our trophy rooms.

hanzi: 在计算机图形学中，以常数值乘以图象的坐标来放大或缩小全部或部分显示图象。
pinyin: zài jì suàn jī tú xíng xué zhòng， yǐ cháng shù zhí chéng yǐ tú xiàng de zuò biāo lái fàng dà huò suō xiǎo quán bù huò bù fen xiǎn shì tú xiàng。
english: In computer graphics, to enlarge or reduce all or part of a display image by multiplying their coordinate by constant values.

hanzi: 条件作用某一对象逐步将渴望的行为和先前无关的刺激因素联系起来的行为改变过程
pinyin: tiáo jiàn zuò yòng mǒu yī duì xiàng zhú bù jiàng kě wàng de xíng wéi huò xiān qián wú guān de cì jī yīn sù lián xì qǐ lai de xíng wéi gǎi biàn guò chéng
english: A process of behavior modification by which a subject comes to associate a desired behavior with a previously unrelated stimulus.

hanzi: 她一定要孩子们穿得暖暖的，他们有点小毛小病便提心吊胆，她对他们实在关心得太过分了。
pinyin: tā yī dìng yào hái zi men chuān de nuǎn nuǎn de， tā men yǒu diǎn xiǎo máo xiǎo bìng pián tí xīn diào dǎn， tā duì tā men shí zài guān xīn de tài guò fèn le。
english: She does fuss the children about so-making sure they're well wrapped up, and worrying about minor illnesses.

hanzi: 靠自己刻苦奋斗而后成功的人，其所完成的工作，没有一个好到令女性不想给他稍加修改的程度。
pinyin: kào zì jǐ kè kǔ fèn dòu ér hòu chéng gōng de rén， qí suǒ wán chéng de gōng zuò， méi yǒu yī gè hào dào lìng nu:3 xìng bù xiǎng jǐ tā shāo jiā xiū gǎi de chéng dù。
english: No self-making man ever do such a good job that some woman do not want to make a few alteration.

hanzi: 资方准备谈判工资问题，并且充分利用谈判带给他们的机会，提出劳动生产率的问题。
pinyin: zī fāng zhǔn bèi tán pàn gōng zī wèn tí， bìng qiě chōng fèn lì yòng tán pàn dài jǐ tā men de jī huì， tí chū láo dòng shēng chǎn lu:4 de wèn tí。
english: The employers were prepared to discuss wages, and they pressed home the advantage this gave them by raising the matter of productivity.

hanzi: 超文本一种计算机的文本查寻系统，此系统能够给使用者提供与某一特定文本相关的信息
pinyin: chāo wén běn yī zhòng jì suàn jī de wén běn zhā xún xì tǒng， cǐ xì tǒng néng gòu jǐ shǐ yòng zhě tí gōng yù mǒu yī tè dìng wén běn xiāng guān de xìn xī
english: A computer-based text retrieval system that enables the user to provide access to or gain information related to a particular text.

hanzi: 我姐姐在假日里对孩子们放任不管，以至于有一段时间闹得很厉害，使邻居都感到厌烦。
pinyin: wǒ jiě jie zài jià rì lǐ duì hái zi men fàng rèn bù guǎn， yǐ zhì yú yǒu yī duàn shí jiān nào de hěn lì hai， shǐ lín jū dōu gǎn dào yàn fán。
english: My sister left her children so much to themselves during the holidays that for a time they ran wild and became a nuisance to the neighbourhood.

hanzi: 综合命题由和或其符号所连接的子句组成的复合命题，只有当所有子句为真时，该句才为真
pinyin: zōng hé mìng tí yóu huò huò qí fú hào suǒ lián jiē de zi jù zǔ chéng de fù hé mìng tí， zhǐ yǒu dàng suǒ yǒu zi jù wèi zhēn shí， gāi jù cái wèi zhēn
english: A compound proposition that has components joined by the word and or its symbol and is true only if both or all the components are true.

hanzi: 我了解你提出的这个计划的所有优越性，但是现在首要的问题是我们没钱投入，再说也没用。
pinyin: wǒ liǎo jiě nǐ tí chū de zhè gè jì huà de suǒ yǒu yōu yuè xìng， dàn shì xiàn zài shǒu yào de wèn tí shì wǒ men mò qián tóu rù， zài shuō yě méi yòng。
english: I am aware of all the advantages of the scheme you propose, but we haven't the money to put down in the first place, and there's an end of it.

hanzi: 假如他们在十年或十五年以前来到这我儿的话，他们就可以在许多生意上获得与创办人同等的利益了。
pinyin: jiǎ rú tā men zài shí nián huò shí wǔ nián yǐ qián lái dào zhè wǒ er de huà， tā men jiù kě yǐ zài xǔ duō shēng yi shàng huò dé yù chuàng bàn rén tóng děng de lì yì le。
english: If they have come along here ten or fifteen years ago they might have been let in on the ground floor of a lot of things.

hanzi: 我希望时光能够倒退回去，我可以重新去过学生时代的生活。我后悔当初不够努力，没有通过更多的考试。
pinyin: wǒ xī wàng shí guāng néng gòu dào tuì huí qu， wǒ kě yǐ chóng xīn qù guò xué sheng shí dài de shēng huó。 wǒ hòu huǐ dāng chū bù gòu nǔ lì， méi yǒu tōng guò gèng duō de kǎo shì。
english: I wish I could put the clock back and relive my schooldays; I regret not having tried harder and passed more exams.

hanzi: 第二天早上我与妻子离别之时，我已经走出门外几步，她叫我回来，小声地对我说要多加小心。
pinyin: dì èr tiān zǎo shang wǒ yù qī zi lí bié zhī shí， wǒ yǐ jīng zǒu chū mén wài jǐ bù， tā jiào wǒ huí lai， xiǎo shēng de duì wǒ shuō yào duō jiā xiǎo xīn。
english: My wife, however, next morning, at parting, after I had gone some paces from the door, called me back, to advise me, in a whisper, to have all my eyes about me.

hanzi: 平价制度为保证在选定的基期内农民具有相同的购买力而主要由政府支持的农产品价格水平
pinyin: píng jie zhì dù wèi bǎo zhèng zài xuǎn dìng de jī qī nèi nóng mín jù yǒu xiāng tóng de gòu mǎi lì ér zhǔ yào yóu zhèng fǔ zhī chí de nóng chǎn pǐn jià gé shuǐ píng
english: A level for farm-product prices maintained by governmental support and intended to give farmers the same purchasing power they had during a chosen base period.

hanzi: 对任何一件东西都要以正确的名称来称呼的人，几乎不可能走过马路而不被人作为共同的敌人来打倒的吧。
pinyin: duì rèn hé yī jiàn dōng xi dōu yào yǐ zhèng què de míng chēng lái chēng hu de rén， jī hū bù kě néng zǒu guò mǎ lù ér bù bèi rén zuò wéi gòng tóng de dí rén lái dǎ dǎo de ba。
english: A man that should call everything by its right name, would hardly pass the streets without being knocked down as a common enemy.

hanzi: 在计算机程序设计中，一种高级语言的语句或指令，其功能是将一个值放到程序指定的内存地址单元内。
pinyin: zài jì suàn jī chéng xù shè jì zhòng， yī zhòng gāo jí yǔ yán de yù jù huò zhǐ lìng， qí gōng néng shì jiàng yī gè zhí fàng dào chéng xù zhǐ dìng de nèi cún dì zhǐ dān yuán nèi。
english: In computer programming, a high level language instruction that places a value in a program specified memory address, location.

hanzi: 在二进制浮点数中，一种带有符号的特定值，其量值大于一台计算机所能表达的任何二进制浮点数。
pinyin: zài èr jìn zhì fú diǎn shù zhòng， yī zhòng dài yǒu fú hào de tè dìng zhí， qí liàng zhí dà yú yī tái jì suàn jī suǒ néng biǎo dá de rèn hé èr jìn zhì fú diǎn shù。
english: In binary floating-point concepts, a value with an associated sign which is mathematically greater in magnitude than any binary floating-point number.

hanzi: 假牙师一种牙科技术师，其专长在于制造和安装假牙，他可以直接为公众服务，而不必通过有执照的牙科医生
pinyin: jià yá shī yī zhòng yá kē jì zhú shī， qí zhuān cháng zài yú zhì zào huò ān zhuāng jià yá， tā kě yǐ zhí jiē wèi gōng zhòng fú wù， ér bù bì tōng guò yǒu zhí zhào de yá kē yī shēng
english: A dental technician specializing in making and fitting dentures as a direct service to the public rather than through a licensed dentist.

hanzi: 如果一项促进和平的安排开始进行，沙特阿拉伯将直接参与有关航运及污染等地区性问题的多边谈判。
pinyin: rú guǒ yí xiàng cù jìn hé píng de ān pái kāi shǐ jìn xíng， shā tè ē lā bó jiàng zhí jiē cān yù yǒu guān háng yùn jí wū rǎn děng dì qū xìng wèn tí de duō biān tán pàn。
english: If a peace process got under way, Saudi Arabia would participate directly in multilateral talks about such problems of regional concern as shipping and pollution.

hanzi: 密码一种密码系统，其中固定长度的明文里的单元，通常为字母，被任意倒置或按事先确定的符号系统替换
pinyin: mì mǎ yī zhòng mì mǎ xì tǒng， qí zhōng gù dìng cháng dù de míng wén lǐ de dān yuán， tōng cháng wèi zì mǔ， bèi rèn yì dǎo zhì huò àn shì xiān què dìng de fú hào xì tǒng tì huàn
english: A cryptographic system in which units of plain text of regular length, usually letters, are arbitrarily transposed or substituted according to a predetermined code.

hanzi: 在字符识别中，字符阅读器所使用的一种系统，在这里输入的文件以预定的和不变的速率被发送给文件传送装置。
pinyin: zài zì fú shí bié zhòng， zì fú yuè dú qì suǒ shǐ yòng de yī zhòng xì tǒng， zài zhè lǐ shū rù de wén jiàn yǐ yù dìng de huò bù biàn de sù lu:4 bèi fā sòng jǐ wén jiàn chuán sòng zhuāng zhì。
english: A system used by character readers in character recognition where each input document is issued to the document transport at a predetermined and fixed rate.

hanzi: 在系统中等待处理的一组或一队列新信息，主调度程序对该队列及其它队列进行扫描，使之顺序进入处理状态。
pinyin: zài xì tǒng zhōng děng dài chǔ lǐ de yī zǔ huò yī duì liè xīn xìn xī， zhǔ diào dù chéng xù duì gāi duì liè jí qí tā duì liè jìn xíng sǎo miáo， shǐ zhī shùn xù jìn rù chǔ lǐ zhuàng tài。
english: A queue of new messages(or a group) within a system that are awaiting processing. The main scheduling routine will scan them along with other queues and order them into processing in order.

hanzi: 指实现后台处理。所谓后台处理是指非联机处理，或者说不是直接和计算机连接起来而进行联机操作。优先级高的程序先于特定的后台作业执行。
pinyin: zhǐ shí xiàn hòu tái chǔ lǐ。 suǒ wèi hòu tái chǔ lǐ shì zhǐ fēi lián jī chǔ lǐ， huò zhě shuō bú shì zhí jiē huò jì suàn jī lián jiē qǐ lai ér jìn xíng lián jī cāo zuò。 yōu xiān jí gāo de chéng xù xiān yú tè dìng de hòu tái zuò yè zhí xíng。
english: Performing background processing which is not on-line or directly connected to the computer for on-line operation. High priority programs take precedence over specific background jobs.

hanzi: 本届政府并没有显示出应有的远见，应有的常识，不能看出这些人民正以伟大的战争来换取自由。换取更好的生活水平，过上好日子。
pinyin: běn jiè zhèng fǔ bìng méi yǒu xiǎn shì chū yīng yǒu de yuǎn xiàn， yīng yǒu de cháng shí， bù néng kàn chū zhè xie rén mín zhèng yǐ wěi dà de zhàn zhēng lái huàn qǔ zì yóu。 huàn qǔ gèng hǎo de shēng huó shuǐ píng， guò shàng hào rì zi。
english: I don't think this Administration has shown the foresight, has shown the knowledge, has been identified with the great fight which these people are waging to be free, to get a better standard of living, to live better.

hanzi: 软件保护中，把不能复制的标记或签名存放在软盘上的方法，用一个特殊测试程序来检测签名是否存在，如不存在，则被保护的程序不能运行。
pinyin: ruǎn jiàn bǎo hù zhòng， bǎ bù néng fù zhì de biāo jì huò qiān míng cún fàng zài ruǎn pán shàng de fāng fǎ， yòng yī gè tè shū cè shì chéng xù lái jiǎn cè qiān míng shì fǒu cún zài， rú bù cún zài， zé bèi bǎo hù de chéng xù bù néng yùn xíng。
english: In software protection, a method of giving a mark, or signature, that cannot be duplicated, to a floppy disk. A special test routine detects if a signature is present, and if it is not found the protected program will be disabled.

hanzi: 他连自己的五分钟时间都不愿拿出，证明他对这一个解决问题的方法不感兴趣，与前一段统计中不赞成这一同样用法的比率百分之九十三相比，没有什么大的差别
pinyin: tā lián zì jǐ de wǔ fēn zhōng shí jiān dōu bù yuàn ná chū， zhèng míng tā duì zhè yī gè jiě jué wèn tí de fāng fǎ bù gǎn xìng qu， yù qián yī duàn tǒng jì zhòng bù zàn chéng zhè yī tóng yàng yòng fǎ de bǐ lu:4 bǎi fēn zhī jiǔ shí sān xiāng bǐ， méi yǒu shén me dà de chā bié
english: His unwillingness to give five minutes of his time proves that he is disinterested in finding a solution to the problem, a proportion that is not significantly different from the93 percent who disapproved of the same usage in an earlier survey.

hanzi: 烦躁不安的人
pinyin: fán zào bù ān de rén
english: One that fidgets.

hanzi: 不恰当的举动
pinyin: bù qià dàng de jǔ dòng
english: An improper act.

hanzi: 水能溶解盐.
pinyin: shuǐ néng róng jiě yán.
english: Water dissolves salt.

hanzi: 水能溶解盐.
pinyin: shuǐ néng róng jiě yán.
english: Water dissolves salt.

hanzi: 他沉默寡言。
pinyin: tā chén mò guǎ yán。
english: He is scanty with words.

hanzi: 狗有敏锐的觉
pinyin: gǒu yǒu mǐn ruì de jué
english: Dogs have a keen scent.

hanzi: 国王勃然大怒。
pinyin: guó wáng bó rán dà nù。
english: The king went wroth.

hanzi: 他不辞而别。
pinyin: tā bù cí ér biè。
english: He left without notice.

hanzi: 一切都毁灭了.
pinyin: yī qiè dōu huǐ miè le.
english: Everything was destroyed.

hanzi: 公牛怒吼起来.
pinyin: gōng niú nù hǒu qǐ lai.
english: The bull bellowed angrily.

hanzi: 这个把柄松了.
pinyin: zhè gè bǎ bǐng sōng le.
english: The handle has come loose.

hanzi: 她指甲鲜红.
pinyin: tā zhī jia xiǎn hóng.
english: Her finger-nails were blood-red.

hanzi: 炸药是爆炸物.
pinyin: zhà yào shì bào zhà wù.
english: Dynamite is an explosive.

hanzi: 细绳上悬的珠子
pinyin: xì shéng shàng xuán de zhū zi
english: Beads on a string.

hanzi: 她指甲鲜红.
pinyin: tā zhī jia xiǎn hóng.
english: Her finger-nails were blood-red.

hanzi: 变形形状扭曲

pinyin: gōng jù yòng yú xié zhù gōng zuò de qì jù

pinyin: shī shì de huǒ chē hèng zài tiě guǐ shàng.
english: The wrecked train lay aslant the track.

english: The entry of all expenditure is necessary.

pinyin: biāo qiāng zài kōng zhōng yàn qū xiàn yùn dòng.

pinyin: jià shǐ yuán shǐ fēi jī ān quán jiàng luò。

english: She does her utmost to please her parents.

pinyin: tā fēn bié shěn chá měi yī zhèng jù。

english: The crowds concentrated round the palace.

english: Flood water covered the fields by the river.

english: He spared no expense in helping us.

pinyin: wǔ tái shè jì chéng láo fáng de yàng zi.

pinyin: xié yì duì shuāng fāng jù yǒu yuē shù lì。

pinyin: tā yǐ jīng chāo chū fǎ yuàn de quán xiàn。

pinyin: zǒng tǒng fǒu jué le xuē jiǎn shuì shōu de yì àn.
english: The President vetoed the tax cuts.

pinyin: tā de zì pōu shì yǒng yú miàn duì xiàn shí de。
english: His self-analysis was unblinking.

hanzi: 总统否决了削减税收的议案.
pinyin: zǒng tǒng fǒu jué le xuē jiǎn shuì shōu de yì àn.
english: The President vetoed the tax cuts.

english: He plays the violin for the fun of it.

english: We're having trouble with our new car.

pinyin: jǐng fāng zhèng jìn yí bù xún zhǎo xiàn suǒ.

pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi jì xù bǎo liú著 shí yóu gǔ fèn.

english: The salesman refused to bargain over the price.

pinyin: yáng guāng tòu guò chuāng lián yìng le jìn lái。

pinyin: wén máng， shēng huó zhòng dì yán zhòng zhàng ài
english: Illiteracy, a serious handicap in life.

hanzi: 搅动混合物而使粉末溶化.
pinyin: jiǎo dǒng hùn hé wù ér shǐ fěn mò róng huà.
english: Agitate the mixture to dissolve the powder.

pinyin: wǒ shì zhuó bǎ nèi gè rì qī láo jì zài xīn。
english: I tried to fix the date in my mind.

pinyin: nà dǐng mào zi shàng shì yǒu cǎi sè zhū zi。
english: The hat was decorated with colored beads.

hanzi: 一股巨浪从甲板上卷了过去。
pinyin: yī gǔ jù làng zòng jiǎ bǎn shàng juàn le guò qu。
english: A huge wave swept over the deck.

hanzi: 我常在周末去看望我姑母。
pinyin: wǒ cháng zài zhōu mò qù kàn wàng wǒ gū mǔ。
english: I often go to visit my aunt at weekends.

hanzi: 搅动混合物而使粉末溶化.
pinyin: jiǎo dǒng hùn hé wù ér shǐ fěn mò róng huà.
english: Agitate the mixture to dissolve the powder.

pinyin: tā de cháng shòu lìng tā de jì chéng rén men bù kuài
english: His longevity vexed his heirs.

pinyin: xǔ duō shì bīng zài nèi zhàn zhòng zhèn wáng。
english: Many soldiers went under in the Civil War.

pinyin: tā jiù cái chǎn yù tā men jìn xíng shāng yì。
english: He bargained with them for the property.

pinyin: zhí wù de yòu miáo cháng yīn yán hán ér dòng sǐ.

pinyin: yóu huà bù shàng mǎn shì tú mǒ de yán liào.

pinyin: jì suàn jī bìng dú de yī zhòng zhǔ yào tè xìng。

pinyin: máng rén zài hěn dà chéng dù shàng yī kào chù jué.

pinyin: tā shén sè jǐn zhāng,  xiǎn chū yǒu zuì de yàng zi.
english: His nervous looks condemned him.

hanzi: 有根鱼骨头卡在我的喉咙里。
pinyin: yǒu gēn yú gú tou qiǎ zài wǒ de hóu lóng lǐ。
english: I've got a fish bone stuck in my throat.

pinyin: gāo dàng jiā jù zǒng shì hěn chàng xiāo.
english: There's always a ready sale for high-quality furniture.

pinyin: wǒ xiǎng bǎ zhè gè bāo guǒ mǎ shàng jiāo yóu。
english: I want to get this package off at once.

hanzi: 把它记在我的信用卡的帐号里。
pinyin: bǎ tā jì zài wǒ de xìn yòng kǎ de zhàng hào lǐ。
english: Have it charged to my credit card.

pinyin: shèng zhě yǒu xuǎn zé jiǎng pǐn de yōu xiān quán.
english: The winner has first pick of the prizes.

hanzi: 渡船摇摇晃晃, 他感到恶心.
pinyin: dù chuán yáo yáo huàng huàng,  tā gǎn dào è xīn.
english: The sway of the ferry made him feel sick.

hanzi: 她对服装有很好的审美眼光。
pinyin: tā duì fú zhuāng yǒu hěn hǎo de shěn měi yǎn guāng。
english: She has good taste in clothes.

pinyin: nà fàn rén zài láo fáng lǐ lái huí de zǒu著.
english: The prisoner paced the floor of his cell.

pinyin: nèi gè zhàn shì zì gào fèn yǒng qù zhàn gǎng。
english: The soldier volunteered for guard duty.

pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi mì qiè zhù yì cái wù wèn tí.
english: We must take a hard look at our finances.

pinyin: nu:3 rén bì nán rén de yù qī shòu mìng zhǎng.
english: Women have a higher life expectancy than men.

pinyin: tā chuí xià shuāng mù yǐ bì miǎn duì shì。
english: She cast her eyes down to avoid direct eye contact.

pinyin: dū shì lǒng zhào zài jiàn àn de tiān sè zhī zhōng。
english: Dusk was settling over the city.

pinyin: zhè tiáo gǒu shǐ zhōng zhōng yú tā de zhǔ rén。
english: The dog remained faithful to his master.

pinyin: wǒ men de zhài wù zǒng jì wèi wǔ qiān měi yuán。
english: We have debts totaling 5000 dollars.

pinyin: wǒ men yǒu quán sōu chá zhè zuò jiàn zhù wù.
english: We have the authority to search this building.

hanzi: 协议的细节尚未公布。
pinyin: xié yì de xì jié shàng wèi gōng bù。
english: The full details of the agreement haven't been made public.

hanzi: 恐怖分子越过边境逃走了.
pinyin: kǒng bù fèn zǐ yuè guò biān jìng táo zǒu le.
english: The terrorists escaped across/over the border.

pinyin: zhè zhǒng yào gào néng zhì liáo qīng wéi shāo shāng。
english: The salve will heal slight burns.

hanzi: 恐怖分子越过边境逃走了.
pinyin: kǒng bù fèn zǐ yuè guò biān jìng táo zǒu le.
english: The terrorists escaped across/over the border.

hanzi: 恐怖分子越过边境逃走了.
pinyin: kǒng bù fèn zǐ yuè guò biān jìng táo zǒu le.
english: The terrorists escaped across/over the border.

hanzi: 我很不喜欢住在闭塞的乡村。

english: I hate being shut away in the country.

pinyin: wǒ men yòng xí zhǐ bāo zhuāng yǐ bǎo chí yuán wèi.
english: Our foil packets seal the flavour in.

pinyin: shào bīng zhā wèn zài mén kǒu de mò shēng rén.
english: The sentry challenged the stranger at the gates.

pinyin: sǔn hào， jiǎn sǔn sǔn hào de xíng wéi huò guò chéng
english: The act or process of depleting.

pinyin: jǐng fāng dào chù sōu chá táo fàn。
english: The police searched every nook and corner for the escaped criminal.

pinyin: gāi àn yīn zhèng jù bù zú ér chè xiāo.
english: The case was dismissed because of insufficient evidence.

pinyin: tā de yǎn lǐ liú lù chū shòu wěi qū de shén qíng.
english: Her eyes took on a hurt expression.

english: Her eyes kindled with excitement.

pinyin: tā jī qíng yǐ shì,  wú cóng xīn huí yì zhuàn.
english: Nothing could rekindle her extinct passion.

pinyin: dà làng zài dī shàng chòng chū yī gè quē kǒu.
english: The huge waves made a breach in the sea wall.

english: She talked to us with a defiant manner.

english: There are many needy families in our village.

pinyin: tā men wèi suǒ fā shēng de shì jìn xíng le biàn jiě.
english: They explained what had happened.

pinyin: shuǐ shǎi bǎo shí de tòu míng dù jí guāng jié dù
english: The transparency and luster of a gem.

pinyin: yǔ zhòu fēi chuán lǐ yǒu wǔ gè fēi xíng yuán。
english: There are five spacemen in the spaceship.

pinyin: tā chuān zhuó zhěng jié de zhì fù qù yuē huì。
english: He wore an immaculate uniform for the date.

pinyin: yǔ qí shuō tā cōng míng dào bù rú shuō tā qín fèn。
english: He is not so clever as diligent.

pinyin: tā shòu dào de chǔ fá shì zuì yǒu yīng dé。
english: He richly deserved the punishment he received.

pinyin: gāi fǎ yuàn méi yǒu shěn lǐ gāi àn de zī gé。
english: The court is not competent to try the case.

pinyin: tā de rèn wu shì gǎn huà guò qu de zuì fàn。
english: Her mission was to reclaim former criminals.

pinyin: liǎng gè gùn bàng xiāng hù mó cā néng qǐ huǒ.
english: Friction between two sticks can create a fire.

pinyin: yǐ chè xiāo tā dài biǎo rén mín de zī gé.
english: He has forfeited the right to represent the people.

english: Crimes committed under cover of patriotism.

pinyin: tā men jiù zhè gè àn zi biàn lùn le jǐ ge xiǎo shí。
english: They argued the case for hours.

hanzi: 渡船摇摇晃晃, 他感到恶心.
pinyin: dù chuán yáo yáo huàng huàng,  tā gǎn dào è xīn.
english: The sway of the ferry made him feel sick.

pinyin: wǒ men yòng guàn mù cóng zhē dàng著 huàn yī fu.

english: The cat whined at the door, asking to be let out.

english: The country acknowledged his claim to the throne.

pinyin: tā yīn chāo sù kāi chē ér bèi fá kuǎn。
english: She was fined for driving above the regulation speed.

pinyin: jǐng fāng zhèng zài shěn xùn liǎng gè xián yí fàn.
english: The police are interrogating two suspects.

hanzi: 警方正在审讯两个嫌疑犯.
pinyin: jǐng fāng zhèng zài shěn xùn liǎng gè xián yí fàn.
english: The police are interrogating two suspects.

pinyin: shí zhōng míng xiǎng shēng dǎ pò le jì jìng.
english: The silence was succeeded by the striking of a clock.

pinyin: dǎo yóu dài lǐng yóu kè cān guān bó wù guǎn.
english: A guide conducted the visitors round the museum.

pinyin: xún wèn jiù cān zhě shì fǒu zhǔn bèi diǎn cài le。
english: Asking if a diner is ready to order.

pinyin: jiù shì nà niàn tou bǎ wǒ nòng de tou hūn nǎo zhàng.
english: The very idea sets my head reeling.

pinyin: duì wén máng de jiào yù fú wù xiàng mù kuò dà
english: An educational outreach to illiterate adults.

pinyin: tā shǐ yòng de cí yǔ wèi miǎn tài chén jiù le。

english: This concept is at the very core of her theory.

pinyin: tā yī shēng xiàn shēn yú yán jiū wǔ dǎo。
english: Her whole life has been given to the study of dance.

pinyin: shuǐ zhēng qì bǎ yù shì lǐ de jìng zi zhē zhù le。
english: Steam has fogged the bathroom mirror.

hanzi: 她使用的词语未免太陈旧了。
pinyin: tā shǐ yòng de cí yǔ wèi miǎn tài chén jiù le。
english: She uses rather dated words and phrases.

pinyin: shì wēi zhě xiàng xíng rén fēn fā chuán dān.
english: The demonstrators distributed leaflets to passers-by.

pinyin: nà kuài shí tou jī zhòng tā tóu bù de cè miàn.
english: The stone caught him on the side of the head.

pinyin: wǒ men zuò zhuó qīng tīng hǎi làng de shēng yīn。
english: We sat listening to the sound of the waves.

pinyin: léi míng bān de zhǎng shēng dǎ pò le jì jìng。
english: The stillness was rent by thunderous applause.

pinyin: gù zhǔ jiě gù gōng rén dǎo zhì le bà gōng shì jiàn。

pinyin: zài gōng gòng qì chē shàng yào jǐn fáng pá shǒu。

pinyin: wǒ men zài jǐ xué yuàn de bàng qiú duì jiā yóu.

english: The company's results show a huge jump in profits.

pinyin: bèi gào zhòng yǒu shuò rén bèi pàn dìng yǒu zuì。

pinyin: tā de chén shù cù shǐ tā men qù diào chá。

english: The company decided to appoint a new treasurer.

pinyin: shāng xìng shēng yi shuāi tuì， zuì hòu dǎo bì le。
english: The business faltered and then failed.

pinyin: tā bǎ yī jiàn wū zi gǎi jiàn chéng le wò shì。
english: He altered one of the rooms into a bedroom.

hanzi: 历史记载历代重要的事件。
pinyin: lì shǐ jì zǎi lì dài zhòng yào de shì jiàn。
english: History chronicles important events of the past.

hanzi: 我得把墙上的那条裂缝填补好.
pinyin: wǒ de bǎ qiáng shàng de nà tiáo liè fèng tián bǔ hào.
english: I must fill that crack in the wall.

hanzi: 窗帘的颜色和地毯相近。
pinyin: chuāng lián de yán sè huò dì tǎn xiāng jìn。
english: The color of the curtains approximates that of the rug.

hanzi: 这些柱子支撑著屋顶的重量.
pinyin: zhè xie zhù zi zhī chēng著 wū dǐng de zhòng liàng.
english: These pillars carry the weight of the roof.

hanzi: 他把一间屋子改建成了卧室。
pinyin: tā bǎ yī jiàn wū zi gǎi jiàn chéng le wò shì。
english: He altered one of the rooms into a bedroom.

hanzi: 昨天有两名游客惨遭杀害。
pinyin: zuó tiān yǒu liǎng míng yóu kè cǎn zāo shā hài。
english: Two visitors were brutally slain yesterday.

hanzi: 沙滩上挤满了作日光浴的人们.
pinyin: shā tān shàng jǐ mǎn le zuò rì guāng yù de rén men.
english: The beach was crowded with sunbathers.

hanzi: 这项裁决并非对每人都公正.
pinyin: zhè xiàng cái jué bìng fēi duì měi rén dōu gōng zhèng.
english: The ruling was not fair to everyone.

hanzi: 那猫轻轻一跃就够到了树枝.
pinyin: nà māo qīng qīng yī yuè jiù gòu dào le shù zhī.
english: With an easy spring the cat reached the branch.

hanzi: 她是个勇敢的选手, 从不屈服.
pinyin: tā shì gè yǒng gǎn de xuǎn shǒu,  cóng bù qū fú.
english: She's a gutsy player, she never gives in.

hanzi: 有一货轮的钢材在海上遗失了。
pinyin: yǒu yī huò lún de gāng cái zài hǎi shàng yí shī le。
english: A cargo of steel was lost at sea.

hanzi: 我们横渡时风浪一定很大。
pinyin: wǒ men hèng dù shí fēng làng yī dìng hěn dà。
english: Storm when we transverse is certainly very big.

hanzi: 这宗事故是人为过失造成的。
pinyin: zhè zōng shì gù shì rén wéi guò shī zào chéng de。
english: The accident was caused by human error.

hanzi: 她写了一本关于巴黎公社的书。
pinyin: tā xiě le yī běn guān yú Bā lí gōng shè de shū。
english: She wrote a book on the Paris Commune.

hanzi: 她否认参与了这一密谋.
pinyin: tā fǒu rèn cān yù le zhè yī mì móu.
english: She disavows any part (ie says she was not involved) in the plot.

pinyin: gēn jù Yīng guó fǎ lu:4， hǎ pāi tè wú zuì。
english: According to English law, Hubert is innocent.

hanzi: 这个地区有两种类型的岩石。
pinyin: zhè gè dì qū yǒu liǎng zhǒng lèi xíng de yán shí。
english: There are two types of rocks in this area.

hanzi: 坐过去点，让你外婆坐下来。
pinyin: zuò guò qu diǎn， ràng nǐ wài pó zuò xia lái。
english: Move over and let your grandmother sit down.

hanzi: 海明威常用第一人称写作。
pinyin: hǎi míng wēi cháng yòng dì yī rén chèng xiě zuò。
english: Hemingway often writes in the first person.

hanzi: 这家公司正大搞推销运动.
pinyin: zhè jiā gōng sī zhèng dà gǎo tuī xiāo yùn dòng.
english: The firm is big on extravagant promotion drives.

pinyin: tóu qiú shí zài bǎi dòng zhī qián jǔ qǐ qiú bàng
english: Cocked the bat before swinging at the pitch.

hanzi: 他的声音中带有权威的口气。
pinyin: tā de shēng yīn zhòng dài yǒu quán wēi de kǒu qì。
english: His voice carries the ring of authority.

hanzi: 这只受伤的狗要予以人道毁灭.
pinyin: zhè zhǐ shòu shāng de gǒu yào yǔ yǐ rén dào huǐ miè.
english: The injured dog had to be destroyed.

hanzi: 他总想成为注意力的焦点。
pinyin: tā zǒng xiǎng chéng wéi zhù yì lì de jiāo diǎn。
english: He always wants to be the focus of attention.

hanzi: 双方球迷之间发生了骚乱.
pinyin: shuāng fāng qiú mí zhī jiān fā shēng le sāo luàn.
english: Rioting broke out between rival groups of fans.

hanzi: 你必须申报去年的总收入.
pinyin: nǐ bì xū shēn bào qù nián de zǒng shōu rù.
english: You must declare all you have earned in the last year.

hanzi: 她做的工作把她累得筋疲力尽.
pinyin: tā zuò de gōng zuò bǎ tā lèi de jīn pí lì jìn.
english: She's knocking herself out with all that work.

hanzi: 这宗事故是人为过失造成的。
pinyin: zhè zōng shì gù shì rén wéi guò shī zào chéng de。
english: The accident was caused by human error.

hanzi: 向悲观的人推销保险很容易.
pinyin: xiàng bēi guān de rén tuī xiāo bǎo xiǎn hěn róng yì.
english: It's easy to sell insurance to a pessimist.

hanzi: 没有人能够阻挡历史的车轮。
pinyin: méi yǒu rén néng gòu zǔ dǎng lì shǐ de jū lún。
english: No one can hold back the wheel of history.

hanzi: 我们必须确保饮用水的纯净。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū què bǎo yǐn yòng shuǐ de chún jìng。
english: We must ensure the purity of drinking water.

hanzi: 棒球是美国全民喜爱的运动。
pinyin: bàng qiú shì Měi guó quán mín xǐ ài de yùn dòng。
english: Baseball is the national game of the USA.

hanzi: 他的成功是勤奋工作的结果。
pinyin: tā de chéng gōng shì qín fèn gōng zuò de jié guǒ。
english: His success was consequent on his hard work.

hanzi: 他们签署了协议与附件。
pinyin: tā men qiān shǔ le xié yì yù fù jiàn。
english: They signed the agreement and the documents appended thereto.

hanzi: 她在群众中享有很高威信。
pinyin: tā zài qún zhòng zhòng xiǎng yǒu hěn gāo wēi xìn。
english: She enjoyed high prestige among the masses.

hanzi: 他一直在生病，尚不能工作。
pinyin: tā yī zhí zài shēng bìng， shàng bù néng gōng zuò。
english: He's been ill and isn't fit for work yet.

hanzi: 这个计划的反对派全部屈服了。
pinyin: zhè gè jì huà de fǎn duì pài quán bù qū fú le。
english: All opposition to the plan has caved in.

hanzi: 市民的情绪是赞成减税。
pinyin: shì mín de qíng xù shì zàn chéng jiǎn shuì。
english: Sentiment in the town is now in favor of a cut in tax.

hanzi: 零售商须承受耗损的费用.
pinyin: líng shòu shāng xū chéng shòu hào sǔn de fèi yòng.
english: The retailer has to absorb the cost of wastage.

hanzi: 晚餐后我们不妨离开桌子。
pinyin: wǎn cān hòu wǒ men bù fāng lí kāi zhuō zi。
english: We may as well leave the table after dinner is over.

hanzi: 人们的权益是受法律保护的。
pinyin: rén men de quán yì shì shòu fǎ lu:4 bǎo hù de。
english: The rights of the people are protected by law.

hanzi: 棒球是美国全民喜爱的运动。
pinyin: bàng qiú shì Měi guó quán mín xǐ ài de yùn dòng。
english: Baseball is the national game of the USA.

hanzi: 步兵黎明时开始进入战斗位置.
pinyin: bù bīng lí míng shí kāi shǐ jìn rù zhàn dòu wèi zhi.
english: The infantry began to deploy at dawn.

hanzi: 我反对他的计划，他不予理会。
pinyin: wǒ fǎn duì tā de jì huà， tā bù yú lǐ huì。
english: He brushed aside my objections to his plan.

hanzi: 混凝土墙是用钢筋加固的。
pinyin: hùn níng tǔ qiáng shì yòng gāng jīn jiā gù de。
english: The concrete walls are reinforced with steel rods.

hanzi: 撤哈拉大部分地区终年无雨。
pinyin: chè hǎ lā dà bù fen dì qū zhōng nián wú yǔ。
english: Most of Sahara receives almost no rain at all.

hanzi: 傲慢是他品格上的最大缺陷.
pinyin: ào màn shì tā pǐn gé shàng de zuì dà quē xiàn.
english: Pride was the greatest flaw in his personality.

hanzi: 老一辈的各类人都在那里.
pinyin: lǎo yī bèi de gè lèi rén dōu zài nà li.
english: Many representatives of the older generation were there.

hanzi: 成功和财富改变了他的性格。
pinyin: chéng gōng huò cái fù gǎi biàn le tā de xìng gé。
english: Success and wealth transformed his character.

hanzi: 镜头慢慢移动拍摄房间全景.
pinyin: jìng tóu màn màn yí dòng pāi shè fáng jiān quán jǐng.
english: The shot panned slowly across the room.

hanzi: 冠军在决赛中都吃了败仗.
pinyin: guàn jūn zài jué sài zhòng dōu jí le bài zhàng.
english: The champions were completely smashed in the final.

hanzi: 再向前展望到本世纪末....
pinyin: zài xiàng qián zhǎn wàng dào běn shì jì mò....
english: Looking farther forward to the end of the century...

hanzi: 她来串门只是为了打发时间。
pinyin: tā lái chuàn mén zhǐ shì wèi le dǎ fa shí jiān。
english: She stopped by just to pass the time of day.

hanzi: 伤亡太大, 我们不得不撤退。
pinyin: shāng wáng tài dà,  wǒ men bù dé bù chè tuì。
english: We have to draw off because of losses of forces.

hanzi: 那柔和的音乐对他是一种安慰.
pinyin: nà róu hé de yīn yuè duì tā shì yī zhòng ān wèi.
english: The gentle music was (a) balm to his ears.

hanzi: 我们的预算已削减到最低限度。
pinyin: wǒ men de yù suàn yǐ xuē jiǎn dào zuì dī xiàn dù。
english: Our budget has been pared to the bone.

hanzi: 拥有房地产要有很大的开销。
pinyin: yōng yǒu fáng dì chǎn yào yǒu hěn dà de kāi xiāo。
english: Ownership of property involves great expense.

hanzi: 我反对我们的隐私权受到侵害。
pinyin: wǒ fǎn duì wǒ men de yǐn sī quán shòu dào qīn hài。
english: I object to our privacy being invaded.

hanzi: 他正用一把大剪刀剪树枝。
pinyin: tā zhèng yòng yī bǎ dà jiǎn dāo jiǎn shù zhī。
english: He is cutting the branches with a pair of shears.

hanzi: 我们出售的产品是各式各样的。
pinyin: wǒ men chū shòu de chǎn pǐn shì gè shì gè yàng de。
english: The products we sell are many and various.

hanzi: 我们马上发觉彼此志同道合.
pinyin: wǒ men mǎ shàng fā jué bǐ cǐ zhì tóng dào hé.
english: We immediately realized that we were kindred spirits.

hanzi: 我在斯德哥尔摩大学攻读艺术。
pinyin: wǒ zài sī dé gē ěr mó dà xué gōng dú yì shù。
english: I am studying art at Stockholm University.

hanzi: 你的注目凝视使她感到不自在。
pinyin: nǐ de zhù mù níng shì shǐ tā gǎn dào bù zì zài。
english: Your intent gaze made her uncomfortable.

hanzi: 群众迅速聚集在出事现场.
pinyin: qún zhòng xùn sù jù jí zài chū shì xiàn chǎng.
english: A crowd soon collected at the scene of the accident.

hanzi: 我们必须确保饮用水的纯净。
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū què bǎo yǐn yòng shuǐ de chún jìng。
english: We must ensure the purity of drinking water.

hanzi: 黑暗会使他更加珍惜视力。
pinyin: hēi àn kuài shǐ tā gèng jiā zhēn xī shì lì。
english: Darkness would make him more appreciative of sight.

hanzi: 他一觉醒来, 边打呵欠边伸懒腰.
pinyin: tā yī jué xǐng lái,  biān dǎ hē qiàn biān shēn lǎn yāo.
english: He woke up, yawned and stretched.

hanzi: 一丁点儿声音就足以把他吵醒.
pinyin: yī dīng diǎn er shēng yīn jiù zú yǐ bǎ tā chǎo xǐng.
english: The merest noise is enough to wake him.

hanzi: 他正考虑从委员会中辞职。
pinyin: tā zhèng kǎo lu:4 zòng wěi yuán huì zhòng cí zhí。
english: He is considering resignation from the committee.

hanzi: 有传闻说主管已经辞职了.
pinyin: yǒu chuán wén shuō zhǔ guǎn yǐ jīng cí zhí le.
english: There's a buzz going round that the boss has resigned.

hanzi: 他们已经开始防止犯罪行为。
pinyin: tā men yǐ jīng kāi shǐ fáng zhǐ fàn zuì xíng wéi。
english: They have begun to do the prevention of crime.

hanzi: 故事发生在一个宁静的夏夜。
pinyin: gù shì fā shēng zài yī gè níng jìng de xià yè。
english: The story took place in a serene summer night.

hanzi: 该公司不是此协议的当事人。
pinyin: gāi gōng sī bú shì cǐ xié yì de dàng shì rén。
english: The company is not a party to the agreement.

hanzi: 店主收到了对损坏的赔偿。
pinyin: diàn zhǔ shōu dào le duì sǔn huài de péi cháng。
english: The store owner received satisfaction for the damage.

hanzi: 警察查获了大量的非法毒品。
pinyin: jǐng chá chá huò le dà liàng de fēi fǎ dú pǐn。
english: Police found a large quantity of illegal drugs.

hanzi: 这些权利不受新法规的影响。
pinyin: zhè xie quán lì bù shòu xīn fǎ guī de yǐng xiǎng。
english: These rights are unaffected by the new laws.

hanzi: 这是圣地，我们不可践踏。
pinyin: zhè shì shèng dì， wǒ men bù kě jiàn tà。
english: This is sanctified ground, and we may not tread upon it.

hanzi: 他试图为丢失钱而进行辩解。
pinyin: tā shì tú wèi diū shī qián ér jìn xíng biàn jiě。
english: He tried to explain away the missing money.

hanzi: 这种物质能够溶解在酒精中。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng wù zhì néng gòu róng jiě zài jiǔ jīng zhòng。
english: This substance is soluble in alcohol.

hanzi: 我一想到他就忍不住颤抖。
pinyin: wǒ yī xiǎng dào tā jiù rěn bú zhù chàn dǒu。
english: I could not repress a shiver whenever I thought of him.

hanzi: 光学理论是爱因斯坦首创的。
pinyin: guāng xué lǐ lùn shì ài yīn sī tǎn shǒu chuàng de。
english: The optic theory originated with Einstein.

hanzi: 我给你打一针使这颗牙齿麻木。
pinyin: wǒ jǐ nǐ dǎ yī zhēn shǐ zhè kē yá chǐ má mù。
english: Let me give you a needle to numb the tooth.

hanzi: 他们应该设法阻止价钱上涨。
pinyin: tā men yīng gāi shè fǎ zǔ zhǐ jià qian shàng zhǎng。
english: They should try to keep prices from rising.

hanzi: 我厌恶为钱的事兴太太争吵。
pinyin: wǒ yàn wù wèi qián de shì xìng tài tai zhēng chǎo。
english: I hate to squabble with my wife about money.

hanzi: 他被任命为驻日本的总领事。
pinyin: tā bèi rèn mìng wèi zhù Rì běn de zǒng lǐng shì。
english: He was appointed the general consul of Japan.

hanzi: 她的合伙人企图骗走她的股份。
pinyin: tā de hé huǒ rén qǐ tú piàn zǒu tā de gǔ fèn。
english: Her partner tried to trick her out of her share.

hanzi: 这张支票凭身分证件兑现.
pinyin: zhè zhāng zhī piào píng shēn fèn zhèng jiàn duì xiàn.
english: The cheque will be cashed on proof of identity.

hanzi: 他们惊讶地默默凝视那奇景。
pinyin: tā men jīng yà de mò mò níng shì nà qí jǐng。
english: They stared at the strange sight in silent wonder.

hanzi: 他盛怒之下，对我们大声叫嚷。
pinyin: tā shèng nù zhī xià， duì wǒ men dà shēng jiào rǎng。
english: In a blaze of anger he shouted at us.

hanzi: 请不要为了等我们而延缓吃晚饭。
pinyin: qǐng bù yào wèi le děng wǒ men ér yán huǎn jí wǎn fàn。
english: Please don't wait dinner for us.

hanzi: 他计算出他的资产和负债总和。
pinyin: tā jì suàn chū tā de zī chǎn huò fù zhài zǒng hé。
english: He summed up his assets and liabilities.

hanzi: 这些儿童在智力上大致相同.
pinyin: zhè xie ér tóng zài zhì lì shàng dà zhì xiāng tóng.
english: In intelligence, the children are about equal.

hanzi: 道路在暴风雪之后铺上了沙子。
pinyin: dào lù zài bào fēng xuě zhī hòu pù shàng le shā zi。
english: The roads were sanded after the snowstorm.

hanzi: 他的行为该得到最高的赞赏。
pinyin: tā de xíng wéi gāi dé dào zuì gāo de zàn shǎng。
english: His conduct is deserving of the highest praise.

hanzi: 铸造在硬币上的文字已经磨损.
pinyin: zhù zào zài yìng bì shàng de wén zì yǐ jīng mò sǔn.
english: The inscription on the coin had worn away.

hanzi: 他受劝阻去做另一次的尝试。
pinyin: tā shòu quàn zǔ qù zuò lìng yī cì de cháng shì。
english: He was discouraged from making another attempt.

hanzi: 今天的会议将审议我的计划。
pinyin: jīn tiān de huì yì jiàng shěn yì wǒ de jì huà。
english: My plan will be on the carpet at today's meeting.

hanzi: 宪法授予总统宣战权。
pinyin: xiàn fǎ shòu yǔ zǒng tǒng xuān zhàn quán。
english: The constitution vests the president with the power to declare war.

hanzi: 我们的部队撤退到既设阵地上。
pinyin: wǒ men de bù duì chè tuì dào jì shè zhèn dì shàng。
english: Our forces retired to prepared positions.

hanzi: 宪法授予总统宣战权。
pinyin: xiàn fǎ shòu yǔ zǒng tǒng xuān zhàn quán。
english: The constitution vests the president with the power to declare war.

hanzi: 她 的新书论述残疾人的问题.
pinyin: tā  de xīn shū lùn shù cán ji rén de wèn tí.
english: Her latest book discusses the problems of the disabled.

hanzi: 那次失败毁灭了我所有的希望。
pinyin: nà cì shī bài huǐ miè le wǒ suǒ yǒu de xī wàng。
english: That defeat meant the death of all my hopes.

hanzi: 胸痛可能是心脏病的症状。
pinyin: xiōng tòng kě néng shì xīn zàng bìng de zhèng zhuàng。
english: Chest pains may be symptomatic of heart disease.

hanzi: 把水引入一系列灌溉渠中.
pinyin: bǎ shuǐ yǐn rù yī xì liè guàn gài qú zhòng.
english: Water is channelled through a series of irrigation canals.

hanzi: 农夫决定让土地休耕一年。
pinyin: nóng fū jué dìng ràng tǔ dì xiū gēng yī nián。
english: The farmer decided to leave the land fallow for a year.

hanzi: 那艘船因违犯中立而被捕获。
pinyin: nà sōu chuán yīn wéi fàn zhōng lì ér bèi bǔ huò。
english: The ship was prized for violating neutrality.

hanzi: 我因为丢失了钥匙, 无法开门。
pinyin: wǒ yīn wèi diū shī le yào shi,  wú fǎ kāi mén。
english: I can't open the door because I've lost the key.

hanzi: 他举办盛大的宴会招待亲友。
pinyin: tā jǔ bàn shèng dà de yàn huì zhāo dài qīn yǒu。
english: He gave a grand party for friends and relations.

hanzi: 那家制鞋厂商有几家代销店。
pinyin: nà jiā zhì xié chǎng shāng yǒu jǐ jiā dài xiāo diàn。
english: The shoe manufacturer had several outlets.

hanzi: 强迫的表现出或倾向于强制的
pinyin: qiǎng pò de biǎo xiàn chū huò qīng xiàng yú qiáng zhì de
english: Characterized by or inclined to coercion.

hanzi: 热探测器测量热量的敏感接受器
pinyin: rè tàn cè qì cè liàng rè liàng de mǐn gǎn jiē shòu qì
english: A sensory receptor that detects warmth.

hanzi: 她写了很多浪漫小说，质量很差。
pinyin: tā xiě le hěn duō làng màn xiǎo shuō， zhì liàng hěn cī。
english: She churns out romantic novels.

hanzi: 他举办盛大的宴会招待亲友。
pinyin: tā jǔ bàn shèng dà de yàn huì zhāo dài qīn yǒu。
english: He gave a grand party for friends and relations.

hanzi: 救生船去救一艘遇险的船只。
pinyin: jiù shēng chuán qù jiù yī sōu yù xiǎn de chuán zhī。
english: The lifeboat went out to a ship in distress.

hanzi: 一个建设的新高潮正在兴起。
pinyin: yī gè jiàn shè de xīn gāo cháo zhèng zài xīng qǐ。
english: A new upsurge in construction is in the making.

hanzi: 我们这套公寓的租约下月到期.
pinyin: wǒ men zhè tào gōng yù de zū yuē xià yuè dào qī.
english: Our present lease on the flat expires next month.

hanzi: 我可以从她的眼睛里看出她的喜悦。
pinyin: wǒ kě yǐ zòng tā de yǎn jīng lǐ kàn chū tā de xǐ yuè。
english: I can see her gladness in her eyes.

hanzi: 暴雨中出现了好多次闪电。
pinyin: bào yǔ zhòng chū xiàn le hǎo duō cì shǎn diàn。
english: There were many flashes of lightning during the storm.

hanzi: 这丑闻使他当选的希望破灭了.
pinyin: zhè chǒu wén shǐ tā dāng xuǎn de xī wàng pò miè le.
english: The scandal dished his hopes of being elected.

hanzi: 这个树枝已从树干上脱落了.
pinyin: zhè gè shù zhī yǐ zòng shù gàn shàng tuō luò le.
english: The branch has separated from the trunk of the tree.

hanzi: 那船进了拉各斯港进行检修.
pinyin: nà chuán jìn le lā gè sī gǎng jìn xíng jiǎn xiū.
english: The boat put in at Lagos/put into Lagos for repairs.

hanzi: 照顾一个重病号的谨慎的护士
pinyin: zhào gu yī gè zhòng bìng hào de jǐn shèn de hù shi
english: A watchful nurse tending a critically ill patient.

hanzi: 女王将亲自授予礼品.
pinyin: nu:3 wáng jiàng qīn zì shòu yǔ lǐ pǐn.
english: The Queen will make the presentation (ie will hand over the gift) herself.

hanzi: 我的工作虽苦，但也有所补偿。
pinyin: wǒ de gōng zuò suī kǔ， dàn yě yǒu suǒ bǔ cháng。
english: My job is hard, but it has its compensation.

hanzi: 饮酒过度的人常常失去记忆。
pinyin: yǐn jiǔ guò dù de rén cháng cháng shī qù jì yì。
english: Alcoholics often suffer from periods of oblivion.

hanzi: 几个证人的陈述并不一致。
pinyin: jǐ ge zhèng ren de chén shù bìng bù yī zhì。
english: The witnesses' statements just don't agree with each other.

hanzi: 这名罪犯被判处一年监禁。
pinyin: zhè míng zuì fàn bèi pàn chǔ yī nián jiān jìn。
english: The criminal was sentenced to one year's imprisonment.

hanzi: 这幅画的原作在大英博物馆内。
pinyin: zhè fú huà de yuán zuò zài dà yīng bó wù guǎn nèi。
english: The original picture is in the British Museum.

hanzi: 一部好的百科全书是知识宝库。
pinyin: yī bù hǎo de bǎi kē quán shū shì zhī shi bǎo kù。
english: A good encyclopaedia is a mine of information.

hanzi: 他辞去军职而从事平民工作.
pinyin: tā cí qù jūn zhí ér cóng shì píng mín gōng zuò.
english: He resigned his commission to take up a civilian job.

hanzi: 老板同意向罢工者做出让步。
pinyin: lǎo bǎn tóng yì xiàng bà gōng zhě zuò chū ràng bù。
english: The boss agreed to meet the strikers half way.

hanzi: 他旋动把手, 但门就是打不开.
pinyin: tā xuàn dòng bǎ shǒu,  dàn mén jiù shì dǎ bù kāi.
english: She turned the handle but the door wouldn't open.

hanzi: 他用一块沾油的抹布擦干净汽车。
pinyin: tā yòng yī kuài zhān yóu de mǒ bù cā gān jìng qì chē。
english: He cleaned the car with an oily rag.

hanzi: 他登上顶端时气喘得很厉害.
pinyin: tā dēng shàng dǐng duān shí qì chuǎn de hěn lì hai.
english: He was quite puffed by the time he reached the top.

hanzi: 她对孩子和动物总是很温柔。
pinyin: tā duì hái zi huò dòng wù zǒng shì hěn wēn róu。
english: She always shows kindness to children and animals.

hanzi: 当陌生人走近时，狗叫了起来。
pinyin: dàng mò shēng rén zǒu jìn shí， gǒu jiào le qǐ lai。
english: The dog barked when the stranger came near.

hanzi: 牧师在船离港之前为其祝福。
pinyin: mù shī zài chuán lí gǎng zhī qián wèi qí zhù fú。
english: The priest blessed the ship before it left port.

hanzi: 秋收后，我们将获得大量稻谷。
pinyin: qiū shōu hòu， wǒ men jiàng huò dé dà liàng dào yù。
english: After harvest we will have a mass of rice.

hanzi: 他登上顶端时气喘得很厉害.
pinyin: tā dēng shàng dǐng duān shí qì chuǎn de hěn lì hai.
english: He was quite puffed by the time he reached the top.

hanzi: 她总是在高档店铺里买首饰。
pinyin: tā zǒng shì zài gāo dàng diàn pù lǐ mǎi shǒu shì。
english: She always gets her jewels at high-class shops.

hanzi: 今年的葡萄酒产量前景不佳.
pinyin: jīn nián de pú tao jiǔ chǎn liàng qián jǐng bù jiā.
english: The prospects for this year's wine harvest are poor.

hanzi: 许多人力求发财但都未成功。
pinyin: xǔ duō rén lì qiú fā cái dàn dōu wèi chéng gōng。
english: Many a man has tried to get rich without success.

hanzi: 这条船的侧面碰撞了港口岸壁.
pinyin: zhè tiáo chuán de cè miàn pèng zhuàng le gǎng kǒu àn bì.
english: The ship hit the harbour wall broadside on.

hanzi: 他们打开包裹, 高兴地叫喊起来.
pinyin: tā men dǎ kāi bāo guǒ,  gāo xìng de jiào hǎn qǐ lai.
english: They opened the parcel with whoops of delight.

hanzi: 找一处平坦的地面放野餐的餐桌.
pinyin: zhǎo yī chù píng tǎn de dì miàn fàng yě cān de cān zhuō.
english: Find level ground for the picnic table.

hanzi: 她听到这一悲惨消息, 脸都白了.
pinyin: tā tīng dào zhè yī bēi cǎn xiāo xi,  liǎn dōu bái le.
english: She listened to the tragic news ashen-faced.

hanzi: 这故障数月来未引起注意.
pinyin: zhè gù zhàng shù yuè lái wèi yǐn qǐ zhù yì.
english: The fault escaped observation (ie was not spotted) for months.

hanzi: 主席一直以沉闷的语调讲了几小时.
pinyin: zhǔ xí yī zhí yǐ chén mèn de yǔ diào jiǎng le jǐ xiǎo shí.
english: The chairman droned on for hours.

hanzi: 他已走完他的行程而长眠了。
pinyin: tā yǐ zǒu wán tā de xíng chéng ér zhǎng mián le。
english: He has run his course and takes his perpetual rest.

hanzi: 平民，百姓遵循平民生活的人
pinyin: píng mín， bǎi xìng zūn xún píng mín shēng huó de rén
english: A person following the pursuits of civil life.

hanzi: 政府将派军驻守沿海的城镇。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ jiàng pài jūn zhù shǒu yán hǎi de chéng zhèn。
english: The government will garrison the coastal towns.

hanzi: 她把食物和饮料放在客人面前。
pinyin: tā bǎ shí wù huò yǐn liào fàng zài kè ren miàn qián。
english: She set the foods and drink before the guest.

hanzi: 她不至于愚蠢到干出那样的事来。
pinyin: tā bù zhì yú yú chǔn dào gàn chū nà yàng de shì lái。
english: She is not so foolish as to do that.

hanzi: 这家剧院光顾者寡只好关闭。
pinyin: zhè jiā jù yuàn guāng gù zhě guǎ zhǐ hǎo guān bì。
english: The theatre has had to close for lack of support.

hanzi: 这个党的核心成员决定一切。
pinyin: zhè gè dǎng de hé xīn chéng yuán jué dìng yī qiè。
english: The hard core in the party make all the decisions.

hanzi: 税收使英国各阶层均感压迫。
pinyin: shuì shōu shǐ Yīng guó gè jiē céng jūn gǎn yā pò。
english: Taxation bears heavily on all classes in Britain.

hanzi: 补助费政府给予工矿企业的补助
pinyin: bǔ zhù fèi zhèng fǔ gěi yǔ gōng kuàng qǐ yè de bǔ zhù
english: A subsidy from a government to an industry.

hanzi: 要买瓷砖的订货已登记下来了。
pinyin: yào mǎi cí zhuān de dìng huò yǐ dēng jì xia lai le。
english: The order for ceramic tiles has been booked in.

hanzi: 坐这种豪华型汽车感觉很平稳。
pinyin: zuò zhè zhǒng háo huá xíng qì chē gǎn jué hěn píng wěn。
english: The luxury model gives a smoother ride.

hanzi: 她演唱歌曲既有风度又有才华。
pinyin: tā yǎn chàng gē qǔ jì yǒu fēng dù yòu yǒu cái huá。
english: She performs the songs with style and flair.

hanzi: 我们因交通堵塞而受阻一个小时.
pinyin: wǒ men yīn jiāo tōng dǔ sè ér shòu zǔ yī gè xiǎo shí.
english: We were stuck in a traffic jam for an hour.

hanzi: 与其撤约还不如延期装运。
pinyin: yǔ qí chè yuē huán bù rú yán qí zhuāng yùn。
english: Better to postpone the shipment than to cancel the contract.

hanzi: 他对我说，你是一个了不起的患者。
pinyin: tā duì wǒ shuō， nǐ shì yī gè le bù qǐ de huàn zhě。
english: He tells me you are his prize patient.

hanzi: 他撞车后驾驶执照被吊销了。
pinyin: tā zhuàng chē hòu jià shǐ zhí zhào bèi diào xiāo le。
english: His driving licence was revoked after the crash.

hanzi: 总统抵达时, 检阅了仪仗队.
pinyin: zǒng tǒng dǐ dá shí,  jiǎn yuè le yí zhàng duì.
english: On his arrival the president inspected the guard of honour.

hanzi: 他用蒸汽把信封上的邮票揭下来。
pinyin: tā yòng zhēng qì bǎ xìn fēng shàng de yóu piào jiē xia lai。
english: He steamed the stamp off the envelope.

hanzi: 倒杯水把药片放进去溶解了.
pinyin: dào bēi shuǐ bǎ yào piàn fàng jìn qù róng jiě le.
english: Fill a glass with water and dissolve this tablet in it.

hanzi: 股东对公司的前景很乐观。
pinyin: gǔ dōng duì gōng sī de qián jǐng hěn lè guān。
english: The stockholders are optimistic about the company's future.

hanzi: 他下决心不让任何事情阻挡他。
pinyin: tā xià jué xīn bù ràng rèn hé shì qing zǔ dǎng tā。
english: He resolved that nothing should hold him back.

hanzi: 希尔夫人不会客, 但近亲除外.
pinyin: xī ěr fū ren bù huì kè,  dàn jìn qīn chú wài.
english: Mrs Hill is not at home to anyone except close relatives.

hanzi: 六个月监禁的判决极其不公。
pinyin: liù gè yuè jiān jìn de pàn jué jí qí bù gōng。
english: The sentence of six months imprisonment was most unjust.

hanzi: 总统上个星期否决了减税法案。
pinyin: zǒng tǒng shàng gè xīng qī fǒu jué le jiǎn shuì fǎ àn。
english: The president last week vetoed the tax cut.

hanzi: 人人都爱听夸奖自己容貌的话.
pinyin: rén rén dōu ài tìng kuā jiǎng zì jǐ róng mào de huà.
english: One likes to hear complimentson one's appearance.

hanzi: 这些狂野的年轻人什么都不尊重。
pinyin: zhè xie kuáng yě de nián qīng rén shén me dōu bù zūn zhòng。
english: Nothing is sacred to these wild youths.

hanzi: 他在起居室里用吸尘器打扫地毯。
pinyin: tā zài qǐ jū shì lǐ yòng xī chén qì dǎ sǎo dì tǎn。
english: He is vacuuming a rug in the sitting room.

hanzi: 公车定期往返于那两个城市之间。
pinyin: gōng jū dìng qī wǎng fǎn yú nà liǎng gè chéng shì zhī jiān。
english: Buses ply between the two cities.

hanzi: 她十六岁, 而智力年龄是五岁.
pinyin: tā shí liù suì,  ér zhì lì nián líng shì wǔ suì.
english: She is sixteen years old but has a mental age of five.

hanzi: 在合同中写入了一项罚款条款.
pinyin: zài hé tong zhòng xiě rù le yí xiàng fá kuǎn tiáo kuǎn.
english: A penalty clause was written into the contract.

hanzi: 用绳子穿著的旗子横悬在街道上.
pinyin: yòng shéng zi chuān著 de qí zi hèng xuán zài jiē dào shàng.
english: Flags had been strung up across the street.

hanzi: 桥已毁坏, 我们无法过河.
pinyin: qiáo yǐ huǐ huài,  wǒ men wú fǎ guò hé.
english: The bridge was destroyed so we couldn't get across (ie cross) the river.

hanzi: 法院将法定损害赔偿金判给了她.
pinyin: fǎ yuàn jiàng fǎ dìng sǔn hài péi cháng jīn pàn jǐ le tā.
english: The court adjudged legal damages to her.

hanzi: 在火灾中，好些房子给烧毁了。
pinyin: zài huǒ zāi zhòng， hǎo xiē fáng zi jǐ shāo huǐ le。
english: A number of houses were burnt down in the fire.

hanzi: 继续这种无聊的争辩是无用的。
pinyin: jì xù zhè zhǒng wú liáo de zhēng biàn shì wú yòng de。
english: It's useless to continue such a barren argument.

hanzi: 只要交了罚款, 他就会被释放。
pinyin: zhǐ yào jiāo le fá kuǎn,  tā jiù kuài bèi shì fàng。
english: He will be set free as soon as the fine is paid.

hanzi: 这些狂野的年轻人什么都不尊重。
pinyin: zhè xie kuáng yě de nián qīng rén shén me dōu bù zūn zhòng。
english: Nothing is sacred to these wild youths.

hanzi: 一个竭力鼓吹自由主义的政治家
pinyin: yī gè jié lì gǔ chuī zì yóu zhǔ yì de zhèng zhì jiā
english: A politician who beats the drum for liberalism.

hanzi: 他根据情况，变换治疗方法。
pinyin: tā gēn jù qíng kuàng， biàn huàn zhì liáo fāng fǎ。
english: He varies the treatment according to circumstances.

hanzi: 那个凶手向司法部门投案自首。
pinyin: nèi gè xiōng shǒu xiàng Sī fǎ bù mén tóu àn zì shǒu。
english: The murderer delivered himself up to justice.

hanzi: 这个画廊是中世纪艺术的宝库。
pinyin: zhè gè huà láng shì zhòng shì jì yì shù de bǎo kù。
english: The gallery is a treasure trove of medieval art.

hanzi: 尖端一个带尖或突起的物体的末端
pinyin: jiān duān yī gè dài jiān huò tū qǐ de wù tǐ de mò duān
english: The end of a pointed or projecting object.

hanzi: 他的军队从来不向侵略者屈服。
pinyin: tā de jūn duì cóng lái bù xiàng qīn lu:è zhě qū fú。
english: His army never came under the yoke of invaders.

hanzi: 参加聚会的男子大都非常年轻。
pinyin: cān jiā jù huì de nán zǐ dà dōu fēi cháng nián qīng。
english: The men at the party were mostly fairly young.

hanzi: 借来的钱使他支撑到月底。
pinyin: jiè lái de qián shǐ tā zhī chēng dào yuè dǐ。
english: The money he borrowed carried him through to the end of month.

hanzi: 这些信流露出她的教养和才华。
pinyin: zhè xie xìn liú lù chū tā de jiào yǎng huò cái huá。
english: These letters revealed her wit and civilization.

hanzi: 这些信流露出她的教养和才华。
pinyin: zhè xie xìn liú lù chū tā de jiào yǎng huò cái huá。
english: These letters revealed her wit and civilization.

hanzi: 海港的灯火在水平线上闪烁著.
pinyin: hǎi gǎng de dēng huǒ zài shuǐ píng xiàn shàng shǎn shuò著.
english: Harbour lights were blinking on the horizon.

hanzi: 她对所涉及的钱数十分肯定.
pinyin: tā duì suǒ shè jí de qián shuò shí fēn kěn dìng.
english: She was quite positive about the amount of money involved.

hanzi: 他的双腿很疲乏，但心情舒畅。
pinyin: tā de shuāng tuǐ hěn pí fá， dàn xīn qíng shū chàng。
english: His legs were weary, but his mind was at ease.

hanzi: 这一绑架事件引起了国际纠纷。
pinyin: zhè yī bǎng jià shì jiàn yǐn qǐ le guó jì jiū fēn。
english: The kidnapping caused an international incident.

hanzi: 会所决定增加报刊订阅份数.
pinyin: kuài suǒ jué dìng zēng jiā bào kān dìng yuè fèn shuò.
english: The club has/have decided to increase subscriptions.

hanzi: 有迹象表明情况可能好转.
pinyin: yǒu jī xiàng biǎo míng qíng kuàng kě néng hǎo zhuǎn.
english: There are indications that the situation may be improving.

hanzi: 他猛力一拧, 将那把手拧了下来.
pinyin: tā měng lì yī nìng,  jiàng nà bǎ shǒu nìng le xia lai.
english: With a violent twist, he wrenched off the handle.

hanzi: 操纵这台机器要转动这个把手.
pinyin: cāo zòng zhè tái jī qì yào zhuǎn dòng zhè gè bǎ shǒu.
english: You operate the mechanism by winding this handle.

hanzi: 她无法掩盖她身为作家的不足之处.
pinyin: tā wú fǎ yǎn gài tā shēn wèi zuò jiā de bù zú zhī chù.
english: She can't hide her deficiencies as a writer.

hanzi: 我们已注意到温度的波动情形.
pinyin: wǒ men yǐ zhù yì dào wēn dù de bō dòng qíng xing.
english: We had already perceived how the temperature fluctuated.

hanzi: 人们有集会和发表言论的权利。
pinyin: rén men yǒu jí huì huò fā biǎo yán lùn de quán lì。
english: People have the rights of assembly and expression.

hanzi: 他已由仓库调到会计室任职.
pinyin: tā yǐ yóu cāng kù tiáo dào kuài jì shì rèn zhí.
english: He has transferredfrom the warehouse to the accounts office.

hanzi: 他之所以成功是因为他工作勤奋。
pinyin: tā zhī suǒ yǐ chéng gōng shì yīn wèi tā gōng zuò qín fèn。
english: He achieved because he was a hard worker.

hanzi: 窗帘同房间的气氛不协调。
pinyin: chuāng lián tóng fáng jiān de qì fēn bù xié tiáo。
english: The curtain is not in tune with the atmosphere of the room.

hanzi: 难民处境惨苦真叫我牵肠割肚.
pinyin: nàn mín chǔ jìng cǎn kǔ zhēn jiào wǒ qiān cháng gē dù.
english: The plight of the refugees really wrung my heart.

hanzi: 他们对她的外表横加粗暴的评论。
