pinyin: tā men duì tā de wài biǎo hèng jiā cū bào de píng lùn。
english: They made rude remarks about her appearance.

hanzi: 这座公寓的管理员不在公寓里住.
pinyin: zhè zuò gōng yù de guǎn lǐ yuán bù zài gōng yù lǐ zhù.
english: This block of flats has a non-resident caretaker.

hanzi: 他恶毒的表情吓坏了这个小女孩。
pinyin: tā è dú de biǎo qíng xià huài le zhè gè xiǎo nu:3 hái。
english: His venomous look terrified the little girl.

hanzi: 汽车喇叭的叫声使男孩感到慌乱。
pinyin: qì chē lǎ ba de jiào shēng shǐ nán hái gǎn dào huāng luàn。
english: The honking of horns flustered the boy.

hanzi: 她撞见他正在搜查她的房间.
pinyin: tā zhuàng jiàn tā zhèng zài sōu chá tā de fáng jiān.
english: She came upon him unawares as he was searching her room.

hanzi: 她虽然身有残疾, 却是个游泳好手.
pinyin: tā suī rán shēn yǒu cán ji,  què shì gè yóu yǒng hào shǒu.
english: She swims well despite her disabilities.

hanzi: 为确保乘客安全而不遗余力.
pinyin: wèi què bǎo chéng kè ān quán ér bù yí yú lì.
english: Great pains have been taken to ensure the safety of passengers.

hanzi: 船经受住了暴风雨，安全抵达。
pinyin: chuán jīng shòu zhù le bào fēng yǔ， ān quán dǐ dá。
english: The ship weathered the storm, and arrived safely.

hanzi: 难民处境惨苦真叫我牵肠割肚.
pinyin: nàn mín chǔ jìng cǎn kǔ zhēn jiào wǒ qiān cháng gē dù.
english: The plight of the refugees really wrung my heart.

hanzi: 教皇是众多基督徒的宗教领袖.
pinyin: jiào huáng shì zhòng duō Jī dū tú de zōng jiào lǐng xiù.
english: The Pope is the spiritual leader of many Christians.

hanzi: 去年的出生人数大于死亡人数。
pinyin: qù nián de chū shēng rén shù dà yú sǐ wáng rén shù。
english: Last year there were many more births than deaths.

hanzi: 男性在身体上要比女性强壮。
pinyin: nán xìng zài shēn tǐ shàng yào bì nu:3 xìng qiáng zhuàng。
english: The male is physically stronger than the female.

hanzi: 她所有的钱都投放到股票里去了。
pinyin: tā suǒ yǒu de qián dōu tóu fàng dào gǔ piào lǐ qù le。
english: She's got all her money in stocks and shares.

hanzi: 几经失败之后，敌军被迫后撤。
pinyin: jǐ jīng shī bài zhī hòu， dí jūn bèi pò hòu chè。
english: After several reverses the enemy was forced to retreat.

hanzi: 公司在新人管理下就要垮台了。
pinyin: gōng sī zài xīn rén guǎn lǐ xià jiù yào kuǎ tái le。
english: The firm is going to pot under the new management.

hanzi: 一英镑面值的钞票已停止流通.
pinyin: yī yīng bàng miàn zhí de chāo piào yǐ tíng zhǐ liú tōng.
english: Pound notes have been withdrawn from circulation.

hanzi: 男性在身体上要比女性强壮。
pinyin: nán xìng zài shēn tǐ shàng yào bì nu:3 xìng qiáng zhuàng。
english: The male is physically stronger than the female.

hanzi: 有两个商人让恐怖分子绑架了.
pinyin: yǒu liǎng gè shāng rén ràng kǒng bù fèn zǐ bǎng jià le.
english: Two businessmen have been kidnapped by terrorists.

hanzi: 在微浪的美妙颤抖中缓缓合目。
pinyin: zài wēi làng de měi miào chàn dǒu zhòng huǎn huǎn hé mù。
english: On the smooth wave in trembling beauty sleep.

hanzi: 这项工程耗费了长期的艰辛劳动
pinyin: zhè xiàng gōng chéng hào fèi le cháng qī de jiān xīn láo dòng
english: Spent many laborious hours on the project.

hanzi: 该财产处理掉能获相当的金额。
pinyin: gāi cái chǎn chǔ lǐ diào néng huò xiāng dāng de jīn é。
english: The property can be disposed of for a good sum.

hanzi: 我们把这座旧房子的窗户都钉死了。
pinyin: wǒ men bǎ zhè zuò jiù fáng zi de chuāng hu dōu dìng sǐ le。
english: We nailed up the windows of the old house.

hanzi: 他心乱如麻难以镇定下来.
pinyin: tā xīn luàn rú má nán yǐ zhèn dìng xia lai.
english: His mind was in such a whirl that he could hardly compose his thoughts.

hanzi: 他饥饿与疾病交加，体质已削弱。
pinyin: tā jī è yù jí bìng jiāo jiā， tǐ zhì yǐ xuē ruò。
english: Hunger and disease had weakened his constitution.

hanzi: 我们全都被邀请参加这次盛典。
pinyin: wǒ men quán dōu bèi yāo qǐng cān jiā zhè cì shèng diǎn。
english: We are all invited to take part in the pageant.

hanzi: 他饥饿与疾病交加，体质已削弱。
pinyin: tā jī è yù jí bìng jiāo jiā， tǐ zhì yǐ xuē ruò。
english: Hunger and disease had weakened his constitution.

hanzi: 他打电话时, 她恰巧不在家.
pinyin: tā dǎ diàn huà shí,  tā qià qiǎo bù zài jiā.
english: She happened to be out/It happened that she was out when he called.

hanzi: 他在恳求拨款修建一所新学校。
pinyin: tā zài kěn qiú bō kuǎn xiū jiàn yī suǒ xīn xué xiào。
english: He was appealing for funds to build a new school.

hanzi: 我们出国前匆匆探望了她一次.
pinyin: wǒ men chū guó qián cōng cōng tàn wàng le tā yī cì.
english: We paid her a fleeting visit before leaving the country.

hanzi: 一些人反对说，新税法不公平。
pinyin: yī xiē rén fǎn duì shuō， xīn shuì fǎ bù gōng píng。
english: Some people objected that the new tax law was unfair.

hanzi: 被修剪坏后丧失生命力的植物
pinyin: bèi xiū jiǎn huài hòu sàng shī shēng mìng lì de zhí wù
english: Plants that lost their vitality when badly pruned.

hanzi: 我们得找个借口不去参加聚会。
pinyin: wǒ men de zhǎo gè jiè kǒu bù qù cān jiā jù huì。
english: We'll have to find a pretext for not going to the party.

hanzi: 展览会上陈列著所有的新产品。
pinyin: zhǎn lǎn huì shàng chén liè著 suǒ yǒu de xīn chǎn pǐn。
english: All the new products are on show at the exhibition.

hanzi: 那孩子让狂风暴雨吓得要命.
pinyin: nà hái zi ràng kuáng fēng bào yǔ xià de yào mìng.
english: The child was frightened to death by the violent thunderstorm.

hanzi: 降低，划减资产帐面价值的降低
pinyin: jiàng dī， huà jiǎn zī chǎn zhàng miàn jià zhí de jiàng dī
english: A reduction of the entered value of an asset.

hanzi: 毒液的输入毒液输入动物的细胞组织
pinyin: dú yè de shū rù dú yè shū rù dòng wù de xì bāo zǔ zhī
english: Introduction of a venom into animal tissue.

hanzi: 从整体来看, 这两幢楼是相似的。
pinyin: zòng zhěng tǐ lái kàn,  zhè liǎng chuáng lóu shì xiāng sì de。
english: The two buildings are similar on the whole.

hanzi: 不断增加的失业引起了社会骚乱。
pinyin: bù duàn zēng jiā de shī yè yǐn qǐ le shè huì sāo luàn。
english: The increasing unemployment caused social unrest.

hanzi: 这条路穿过两条山脉之间的峡谷。
pinyin: zhè tiáo lù chuān guò liǎng tiáo shān mài zhī jiān de xiá gǔ。
english: The road goes through a gap in the hills.

hanzi: 那个废品商有个压碎汽车的机器.
pinyin: nèi gè fèi pǐn shāng yǒu gè yā suì qì chē de jī qì.
english: The scrap merchant has a machine which crushes cars.

hanzi: 老板要求我们在截止限期前完成
pinyin: lǎo bǎn yāo qiú wǒ men zài jié zhǐ xiàn qī qián wán chéng
english: The boss is leaning on us to meet the deadline.

hanzi: 在废墟中依然挺立着几根柱子。
pinyin: zài fèi xū zhòng yī rán tǐng lì zhuó jǐ gēn zhù zi。
english: Several columns among the ruins still stood upright.

hanzi: 他掀起垫子把钥匙悄悄放在下面.
pinyin: tā xiān qǐ diàn zǐ bǎ yào shi qiǎo qiǎo fàng zài xià mian.
english: He lifted the mat and slid the key under (it).

hanzi: 带动转盘旋转的机械装置坏了.
pinyin: dài dòng zhuàn pán xuán zhuàn de jī xiè zhuāng zhì huài le.
english: The mechanism that revolves the turntable is broken.

hanzi: 电力供应已在电源处截断.
pinyin: diàn lì gōng yìng yǐ zài diàn yuán chù jié duàn.
english: The electricity supply has been cut off/disconnected at the mains.

hanzi: 他的聪明和技巧使我们赞叹不已。
pinyin: tā de cōng míng huò jì qiǎo shǐ wǒ men zàn tàn bù yǐ。
english: His cleverness and skill compel our admiration.

hanzi: 去年这个镇已有十起破产事件。
pinyin: qù nián zhè gè zhèn yǐ yǒu shí qǐ pò chǎn shì jiàn。
english: Ten bankruptcies were recorded in this town last year.

hanzi: 他东奔西走了好久才定居下来。
pinyin: tā dōng bèn xī zǒu le hǎo jiǔ cái dìng jū xia lai。
english: He kicked about a great deal before settling down.

hanzi: 铁路模型展销会将于星期五举行。
pinyin: tiě lù mó xíng zhǎn xiāo kuài jiàng yú xīng qī wǔ jǔ xíng。
english: A model railway mart will be held on Friday.

hanzi: 你最好给电线裹上绝缘胶布。
pinyin: nǐ zuì hǎo jǐ diàn xiàn guǒ shàng jué yuán jiāo bù。
english: You'd better put some insulating tape on electric wires.

hanzi: 他因被指控触犯选举法而遭逮捕。
pinyin: tā yīn bèi zhǐ kòng chù fàn xuǎn jǔ fǎ ér zāo dài bǔ。
english: He is accused because offending electoral law.

hanzi: 无法识别颜色的人是色盲。
pinyin: wú fǎ shí bié yán sè de rén shì sè máng。
english: People who cannot distinguish between colors are said to be color-blind.

hanzi: 这人失业后就生活在贫困之中。
pinyin: zhè rén shī yè hòu jiù shēng huó zài pín kùn zhī zhōng。
english: The man lived in poverty after his unemployment.

hanzi: 把九号车床调好来车这个新活塞。
pinyin: bǎ jiǔ hào chē chuáng tiáo hào lái jū zhè gè xīn huó sāi。
english: Get lathe No.9 set to turn the new piston.

hanzi: 危险正逼近，我们必须保持警惕。
pinyin: wēi xiǎn zhèng bī jìn， wǒ men bì xū bǎo chí jǐng tì。
english: While danger threatens we must all be on guard.

hanzi: 当局已采取措施防止偷税漏税。
pinyin: dāng jú yǐ cǎi qǔ cuò shī fáng zhǐ tōu shuì lòu shuì。
english: The authorities took measures to prevent tax fraud.

hanzi: 这种严重罪行今日是不能容忍的.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng yán zhòng zuì xíng jīn rì shì bù néng róng rěn de.
english: Such enormities would not be tolerated today.

hanzi: 这个学院只不过是个文凭制造厂
pinyin: zhè gè xué yuàn zhǐ bù guò shì gè wén píng zhì zào chǎng
english: The college was nothing more than a diploma mill.

hanzi: 曲状物具有此种曲线形状的物体
pinyin: qǔ zhuàng wù jù yǒu cǐ zhòng qū xiàn xíng zhuàng de wù tǐ
english: Something having the general shape of this curve.

hanzi: 法庭已经做出不合法杀害的裁决。
pinyin: fǎ tíng yǐ jīng zuò chū bù hé fǎ shā hài de cái jué。
english: The court has made a verdict of unlawful killing.

hanzi: 当局已采取措施防止偷税漏税。
pinyin: dāng jú yǐ cǎi qǔ cuò shī fáng zhǐ tōu shuì lòu shuì。
english: The authorities took measures to prevent tax fraud.

hanzi: 他很困倦，上课时候都睡着了。
pinyin: tā hěn kùn juàn， shàng kè shí hou dōu shuì zhāo le。
english: He was so sleepy that he fell asleep during the class.

hanzi: 那位大使预期他下次派驻巴黎.
pinyin: nà wèi dà shǐ yù qī tā xià cì pài zhù Bā lí.
english: The ambassador expects that his next posting will be (to) Paris.

hanzi: 在三十年代有很多麻疯病人。
pinyin: zài sān shí nián dài yǒu hěn duō má fēng bìng rén。
english: There were many people with leprosy around the age of thirty.

hanzi: 我的助听器是国民保健署资助的.
pinyin: wǒ de zhù tìng qì shì guó mín bǎo jiàn shǔ zī zhù de.
english: I got my hearing aid on the National Health (Service).

hanzi: 这幅画在他的收藏品中最为珍贵
pinyin: zhè fú huà zài tā de shōu cáng pǐn zhòng zuì wéi zhēn guì
english: The painting has pride of place in his collection.

hanzi: 他从母方接受的遗传是良好的。
pinyin: tā zòng mǔ fāng jiē shòu de yí chuán shì liáng hǎo de。
english: On the maternal side his inheritance was a happy one.

hanzi: 谷物进口量受最高限额的严格控制.
pinyin: gǔ wù jìn kǒu liàng shòu zuì gāo xiàn é de yán gé kòng zhì.
english: Grain imports are controlled by strict quotas.

hanzi: 那些年国际事态不很协调。
pinyin: nà xiē nián guó jì shì tài bù hěn xié tiáo。
english: There was not much harmony in international affairs during those years.

hanzi: 我军对敌军的司令部发起突然袭击。
pinyin: wǒ jūn duì dí jūn de sī lìng bù fā qǐ tū rán xí jī。
english: Our army descended on the enemy headquarters.

hanzi: 他发出一声绝望的叹息，转身走开了。
pinyin: tā fā chū yī shēng jué wàng de tàn xí， zhuǎn shēn zǒu kāi le。
english: With a hopeless sigh, he turned away.

hanzi: 这条路把所有的新城镇都连接起来了。
pinyin: zhè tiáo lù bǎ suǒ yǒu de xīn chéng zhèn dōu lián jiē qǐ lai le。
english: The road links all the new towns.

hanzi: 这些是文艺复兴时期的文化遗产。
pinyin: zhè xie shì wén yì fù xīng shí qī de wén huà yí chǎn。
english: These are the cultural legacies of the Renaissance.

hanzi: 炮火掩护步兵前进.
pinyin: pào huǒ yǎn hù bù bīng qián jìn.
english: Artillery gave cover (ie fired at the enemy to stop them firing back) while the infantry advanced.

hanzi: 她单凭个人气势就镇住了会场。
pinyin: tā shàn píng gè rén qì shì jiù zhèn zhù le huì chǎng。
english: She dominated the meeting by sheer force of character.

hanzi: 炮火掩护步兵前进.
pinyin: pào huǒ yǎn hù bù bīng qián jìn.
english: Artillery gave cover (ie fired at the enemy to stop them firing back) while the infantry advanced.

hanzi: 他正在写他的最新畅销书的续集。
pinyin: tā zhèng zài xiě tā de zuì xīn chàng xiāo shū de xù jí。
english: He is writing a sequel to his latest best seller.

hanzi: 帮助盲人过马路是做好事.
pinyin: bāng zhù máng rén guò mǎ lù shì zuò hǎo shì.
english: It is an act of kindness/a kind act to help a blind man across the street.

hanzi: 因矿井已关闭, 镇上一片死气沉沉.
pinyin: yīn kuàng jǐng yǐ guān bì,  zhèn shàng yī piàn sǐ qì chén chén.
english: The town is dead now the mine has closed.

hanzi: 保险公司已经清偿了她的索赔款额.
pinyin: bǎo xiǎn gōng sī yǐ jīng qīng cháng le tā de suǒ péi kuǎn é.
english: The insurance company has settled her claim.

hanzi: 摔下来的骑手遭飞奔马群践踏.
pinyin: shuāi xia lai de qí shǒu zāo fēi bēn mǎ qún jiàn tà.
english: Fallen riders were trampled underfoot by the charging horses.

hanzi: 闭幕式将于三月二十五日举行。
pinyin: bì mù shì jiàng yú sān yuè èr shí wǔ rì jǔ xíng。
english: The closing ceremony is going to be held on March 25th.

hanzi: 与世隔绝生活的不受外界干扰的区域
pinyin: yù shì gé jué shēng huó de bù shòu wài jiè gān rǎo de qū yù
english: The hermetic confines of an isolated life.

hanzi: 我们互相帮助做夏季的额外工作.
pinyin: wǒ men hù xiāng bāng zhù zuò xià jì de é wài gōng zuò.
english: We help one another with the extra work in the summer.

hanzi: 一些强壮的人在冰冷的水中游泳。
pinyin: yī xiē qiáng zhuàng de rén zài bīng lěng de shuǐ zhōng yóu yǒng。
english: A few hardy people swam in the icy water.

hanzi: 耐心结合勤奋是成功所必需的。
pinyin: nài xīn jié hé qín fèn shì chéng gōng suǒ bì xū de。
english: Patience combined with diligence is necessary to success.

hanzi: 那个嫌疑犯被带到警察局问话.
pinyin: nèi gè xián yí fàn bèi dài dào jǐng chá jú wèn huà.
english: The suspect was taken to the police station for questioning.

hanzi: 总论，纲要详细的摘要或整个论文
pinyin: zǒng lùn， gāng yào xiáng xì de zhāi yào huò zhěng gè lùn wén
english: A comprehensive digest or complete treatise.

hanzi: 我得在黑暗中摸索著找电灯开关.
pinyin: wǒ de zài hēi àn zhòng mō suo著 zhǎo diàn dēng kāi guān.
english: I had to feel about in the dark for the light switch.

hanzi: 现在每个人都想要尽快发财致富。
pinyin: xiàn zài měi gè rén dōu xiǎng yào jǐn kuài fā cái zhì fù。
english: Everyone is trying to get rich quick nowadays.

hanzi: 她对这一危机的处理使我赞叹不已.
pinyin: tā duì zhè yī wēi jī de chǔ lǐ shǐ wǒ zàn tàn bù yǐ.
english: Her handling of the crisis fills me with admiration.

hanzi: 无人驾驶飞机无飞行员的遥控飞机
pinyin: wú rén jià shǐ fēi jī wú fēi xíng yuán de yáo kòng fēi jī
english: A pilotless aircraft operated by remote control.

hanzi: 这部影片违反了审美的一切准则.
pinyin: zhè bù yǐng piàn wéi fǎn le shěn měi de yī qiè zhǔn zé.
english: This film offends against all the canons of good taste.

hanzi: 双方都应按协议条款办事。
pinyin: shuāng fāng dōu yìng àn xié yì tiáo kuǎn bàn shì。
english: Both sides should act according to the provisions of the agreement.

hanzi: 扭曲，变形，扭歪使扭歪的行为或例子
pinyin: niǔ qū， biàn xíng， niǔ wāi shǐ niǔ wāi de xíng wéi huò lì zi
english: The act or an instance of distorting.

hanzi: 旅游公司的失误使我的假日泡汤了。
pinyin: lu:3 yóu gōng sī de shī wù shǐ wǒ de jià rì pào tāng le。
english: The travel company's failure bust up my holiday.

hanzi: 我宁愿看处于野生状态的动物。
pinyin: wǒ nìng yuàn kàn chǔ yú yě shēng zhuàng tài de dòng wù。
english: I prefer to see animals living in their natural state.

hanzi: 官僚主义的流毒拖慢了我们的进步.
pinyin: guān liáo zhǔ yì de liú dú tuō màn le wǒ men de jìn bù.
english: The dead hand of bureaucracy is slowing our progress.

hanzi: 听到这个坏消息，他心里充满恐怖。
pinyin: tīng dào zhè gè huài xiāo xi， tā xīn lǐ chōng mǎn kǒng bù。
english: He was filled with horror at the bad news.

hanzi: 论智力, 她和她哥哥不相上下.
pinyin: lùn zhì lì,  tā huò tā gē ge bù xiàng shàng xià.
english: She's the equal of her brother as far as intelligence is concerned.

hanzi: 文书工作耗费了委员会许多时间。
pinyin: wén shū gōng zuò hào fèi le wěi yuán huì xǔ duō shí jiān。
english: Paperwork consumed much of the committee's time.

hanzi: 我觉得有人扯我的袖子, 便转过身来.
pinyin: wǒ jué de yǒu rén chě wǒ de xiù zi,  pián zhuàn guò shēn lái.
english: I felt a pull at my sleeve and turned round.

hanzi: 为节省开支现正逐渐裁员.
pinyin: wèi jié shěng kāi zhī xiàn zhèng zhú jiàn cái yuán.
english: The number of employees is being whittled down in order to reduce costs.

hanzi: 指挥部命令宇宙飞船返回地球.
pinyin: zhǐ huī bù mìng lìng yǔ zhòu fēi chuán fǎn huí dì qiú.
english: Mission control ordered the spacecraft to return to earth.

hanzi: 鉴于税务原因，我们得组成公司。
pinyin: jiàn yú shuì wù yuán yīn， wǒ men de zǔ chéng gōng sī。
english: We had to incorporate for a company for tax reasons.

hanzi: 这笔钱主要投资于政府公债上。
pinyin: zhè bǐ qián zhǔ yào tóu zī yú zhèng fǔ gōng zhài shàng。
english: The money is invested principally in government stock.

hanzi: 这位部长为反对那项决策而辞职.
pinyin: zhè wèi bù zhǎng wèi fǎn duì nà xiàng jué cè ér cí zhí.
english: The minister resigned in protest against the decision.

hanzi: 水在穿透岩石的过程中获得了净化.
pinyin: shuǐ zài chuān tòu yán shí de guò chéng zhòng huò dé le jìng huà.
english: Water is purified by passing through rock.

hanzi: 园艺叉子的一个尖齿把他的脚扎了.
pinyin: yuán yì chā zi de yī gè jiān chǐ bǎ tā de jué zhá le.
english: One of the prongs of the garden fork went through his foot.

hanzi: 你可以看到小孩在河对岸玩耍。
pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ kàn dào xiǎo hái zài hé duì àn wàn shuǎ。
english: You can see children playing on the other side of the river.

hanzi: 他被倒下来的树击中，当场死亡。
pinyin: tā bèi dào xia lai de shù jī zhòng， dāng chǎng sǐ wáng。
english: He was hit by a falling tree and killed on the spot.

hanzi: 医生用显微镜作了血迹检查。
pinyin: yī shēng yòng xiǎn wēi jìng zuò le xuè jī jiǎn chá。
english: The doctor had a microscopic examination of traces of blood.

hanzi: 我们的步兵和装甲兵均比敌军的少.
pinyin: wǒ men de bù bīng huò zhuāng jiǎ bīng jūn bì dí jūn de shào.
english: We have less infantry and armour than the enemy.

hanzi: 旧制的英镑纸币已不是法定的货币了.
pinyin: jiù zhì de yīng bàng zhǐ bì yǐ bú shì fǎ dìng de huò bì le.
english: The old pound note is no longer legal tender.

hanzi: 他发出一声绝望的叹息，转身走开了。
pinyin: tā fā chū yī shēng jué wàng de tàn xí， zhuǎn shēn zǒu kāi le。
english: With a hopeless sigh, he turned away.

hanzi: 今年, 他们已发射了数艘宇宙飞船。
pinyin: jīn nián,  tā men yǐ fā shè le shuò sōu yǔ zhòu fēi chuán。
english: They have sent up several spaceships this year.

hanzi: 把旁观者牵扯进他与警察的争执
pinyin: bǎ páng guān zhě qiān chě jìn tā yù jǐng chá de zhēng zhí
english: Involved the bystanders in his dispute with the police.

hanzi: 我们不应该对贫穷的孩子漠然不顾。
pinyin: wǒ men bù yīng gāi duì pín qióng de hái zi mò rán bù gù。
english: We should not show apathy towards the poor children.

hanzi: 政府甚至不考虑他的赔款要求。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ shèn zhì bù kǎo lu:4 tā de péi kuǎn yāo qiú。
english: The government would not even consider his claim for money.

hanzi: 这个奴隶从未体验过自由的快乐。
pinyin: zhè gè nú lì zòng wèi tǐ yàn guò zì yóu de kuài lè。
english: The slave has never experienced the sweetness of freedom.

hanzi: 至于无家可归的人，那就为数众多了。
pinyin: zhì yú wú jiā kě guī de rén， nà jiù wèi shuò zhòng duō le。
english: As for the homeless, their name is legion.

hanzi: 警方在广场的入口处设置了路障.
pinyin: jǐng fāng zài guǎng chǎng de rù kǒu chù shè zhì le lù zhàng.
english: The police barricaded off the entrance to the square.

hanzi: 演讲结束的时候，房间里寂静无声。
pinyin: yǎn jiǎng jié shù de shí hou， fáng jiān lǐ jì jìng wú shēng。
english: The room was still at the end of the speech.

hanzi: 我们到旅程终点时全都累垮了.
pinyin: wǒ men dào lu:3 chéng zhōng diǎn shí quán dōu lèi kuǎ le.
english: We were all suffering from fatigue at the end of our journey.

hanzi: 她的脸上带著受过苦难的深深的痕迹.
pinyin: tā de liǎn shàng dài著 shòu guò kǔ nàn de shēn shēn de hén jī.
english: Her face bore the deep imprint of suffering.

hanzi: 他出示假证据，这就是蔑视法庭。
pinyin: tā chū shì jiǎ zhèng jù， zhè jiù shì miè shì fǎ tíng。
english: He gave false proof, which set the court at defiance.

hanzi: 警方在广场的入口处设置了路障.
pinyin: jǐng fāng zài guǎng chǎng de rù kǒu chù shè zhì le lù zhàng.
english: The police barricaded off the entrance to the square.

hanzi: 我劝他不要急急忙忙递交辞职书。
pinyin: wǒ quàn tā bù yào jí jí máng máng dì jiāo cí zhí shū。
english: I dissuade him from rush in to submit his resignation.

hanzi: 好的饮食习惯有助于强身防病。
pinyin: hǎo de yǐn shí xí guàn yǒu zhù yú qiáng shēn fáng bìng。
english: Good eating habits help to fortify the body against disease.

hanzi: 根据规定, 申请者一律需经笔试.
pinyin: gēn jù guī dìng,  shēn qǐng zhě yī lu:4 xū jīng bǐ shì.
english: It is laid down that all applicants must sit a written exam.

hanzi: 我们会把决定及早通知申请者。
pinyin: wǒ men kuài bǎ jué dìng jí zǎo tōng zhī shēn qǐng zhě。
english: Applicants will be notified of our decision in good season.

hanzi: 一旦价格回升，询盘将恢复活跃。
pinyin: yī dàn jià gé huí shēng， xún pán jiàng huī fù huó yuè。
english: As soon as the price picks up, enquiries will revive.

hanzi: 不对称的，不匀称的失去平衡或对称性的
pinyin: bù duì chèng de， bù yún chèn de shī qù píng héng huò duì chèn xìng de
english: Having no balance or symmetry.

hanzi: 教友派信徒们强烈反对暴力和战争。
pinyin: jiào yǒu pài xìn tú men qiáng liè fǎn duì bào lì huò zhàn zhēng。
english: Quakers strongly oppose violence and war.

hanzi: 这些早期遗物被认为具有神奇的力量.
pinyin: zhè xie zǎo qī yí wù bèi rèn wéi jù yǒu shén qí de lì liang.
english: The relics are credited with miraculous powers.

hanzi: 人们认为它是最珍贵的药材之一。
pinyin: rén men rèn wéi tā shì zuì zhēn guì de yào cái zhī yī。
english: It was reckoned among the most precious medicinal herbs.

hanzi: 卡车非装卸货物时不得在此停车。
pinyin: kǎ chē fēi zhuāng xiè huò wù shí bù dé zài cǐ tíng chē。
english: Lorries may only park here when loading or unloading.

hanzi: 不严格地说，一种数学或逻辑运算符。
pinyin: bù yán gé de shuō， yī zhòng shù xué huò luó ji yùn suàn fú。
english: Loosely, a mathematical or logic operator.

hanzi: 犹豫迟疑不决的状态或迟疑不决的性质
pinyin: yóu yù chí yí bù jué de zhuàng tài huò chí yí bù jué de xìng zhì
english: The state or quality of being hesitant.

hanzi: 他赛前量体重比规定限度少几磅。
pinyin: tā sài qián liàng tǐ zhòng bì guī dìng xiàn dù shào jǐ bàng。
english: He weighed in at several pounds below the limit.

hanzi: 双方宣布停战以避免再有伤亡。
pinyin: shuāng fāng xuān bù tíng zhàn yǐ bì miǎn zài yǒu shāng wáng。
english: The two sides called a truce to avoid further bloodshed.

hanzi: 亚历山大大帝曾率领大军入侵印度.
pinyin: yà lì shān dà dà dì zēng shuài lǐng dà jūn rù qīn Yìn dù.
english: Alexander the Great invaded India with a large army.

hanzi: 大声叫嚷的孩子听不到妈妈的叫唤。
pinyin: dà shēng jiào rǎng de hái zi tìng bù dào mā ma de jiào huan。
english: The shouting boy did not hear his mother call him.

hanzi: 我这件大衣请你照这个式样裁剪。
pinyin: wǒ zhè jiàn dà yī qǐng nǐ zhào zhè gè shì yàng cái jiǎn。
english: Please cut out my overcoat according to this pattern.

hanzi: 果树栽培学对果树的科学研究和栽培
pinyin: guǒ shù zāi péi xué duì guǒ shù de kē xué yán jiū huò zāi péi
english: The scientific study and cultivation of fruit.

hanzi: 奖章和奖牌上的人像系低浮雕。
pinyin: jiǎng zhāng huò jiǎng pái shàng de rén xiàng xì dī fú diāo。
english: In medals and medallions the figures are in low relief.

hanzi: 在一阵痛恨的狂乱中，他杀死了敌人。
pinyin: zài yī zhèn tòng hèn de kuáng luàn zhòng， tā shā sǐ le dí rén。
english: In a frenzy of hate he killed his enemy.

hanzi: 皇后要求儿子娶邻国的公主。
pinyin: huáng hòu yāo qiú ér zi qǔ lín guó de gōng zhǔ。
english: The empress asked his son to marry the princess of the neighboring kingdom.

hanzi: 皮特好像设了狡猾的圈套要陷害你。
pinyin: pí tè hǎo xiàng shè le jiǎo huá de juān tào yào xiàn hài nǐ。
english: Peter seems to have set a cunning trap for you.

hanzi: 这个讲话回避了所有的敏感的问题。
pinyin: zhè gè jiǎng huà huí bì le suǒ yǒu de mǐn gǎn de wèn tí。
english: The speech skirted round all the sensitive questions.

hanzi: 我可以在我的寓所里为你提供一个床位。
pinyin: wǒ kě yǐ zài wǒ de yù suǒ lǐ wèi nǐ tí gōng yī gè chuáng wèi。
english: I'll fit you up with a bed at my flat.

hanzi: 暴风雨把树枝从树干上刮了下来.
pinyin: bào fēng yǔ bǎ shù zhī zòng shù gàn shàng guā le xia lai.
english: The storm has split the branch off from the main tree trunk.

hanzi: 上校命令士兵们在甲板上集合。
pinyin: shàng xiào mìng lìng shì bīng men zài jiǎ bǎn shàng jí hé。
english: The colonel ordered their soldiers to gather on the deck.

hanzi: 我劝他不要冲进去，递交辞职书。
pinyin: wǒ quàn tā bù yào chōng jìn qù， dì jiāo cí zhí shū。
english: I dissuaded him from rushing in to submit his resignation.

hanzi: 一个男人对妻子隐瞒事情是不对的。
pinyin: yī gè nán rén duì qī zi yǐn mán shì qing shì bù duì de。
english: It is wrong for a man to conceal things from his wife.

hanzi: 为撤离该城作准备的命令已下达。
pinyin: wèi chè lí gāi chéng zuò zhǔn bèi de mìng lìng yǐ xià dá。
english: Order go out to prepare for the evacuation of the city.

hanzi: 交付将立法议案交归委员会的行动
pinyin: jiāo fù jiàng lì fǎ yì àn jiāo guī wěi yuán huì de xíng dòng
english: The act of referring a legislative bill to committee.

hanzi: 镇上的面粉场主以优质面粉著称。
pinyin: zhèn shàng de miàn fěn chǎng zhǔ yǐ yōu zhì miàn fěn著 chèng。
english: The town miller was famous for his excellent flour.

hanzi: 她极力掩盖她在此事中充当的角色。
pinyin: tā jí lì yǎn gài tā zài cǐ shì zhòng chōng dāng de jué sè。
english: She's very defensive about her part in the affair.

hanzi: 他的所见所闻使他内心大为震动。
pinyin: tā de suǒ xiàn suǒ wén shǐ tā nèi xīn dà wèi zhèn dòng。
english: His mind was reeling with all that he had seen and heard.

hanzi: 会诊商议，尤指医生们参予的会诊
pinyin: kuài zhěn shāng yì， yóu zhǐ yī shēng men shēn yǔ de kuài zhěn
english: A consultation, especially one involving physicians.

hanzi: 他宁愿送分数，也不愿要求利益。
pinyin: tā nìng yuàn sòng fēn shù， yě bù yuàn yāo qiú lì yì。
english: He would rather give away a point than claim an advantage.

hanzi: 一种顽固的社会恶习扩散到整个社区
pinyin: yī zhòng wán gù de shè huì wù xí kuò sàn dào zhěng gè shè qū
english: A cancer of bigotry spread through the community.

hanzi: 他每次买汽油都记在报销帐目上.
pinyin: tā měi cì mǎi qì yóu dōu jì zài bào xiāo zhàng mù shàng.
english: Whenever he buys petrol, he puts it on his expense account.

hanzi: 那个孩子的残疾是交通事故造成的。
pinyin: nèi gè hái zi de cán ji shì jiāo tōng shì gù zào chéng de。
english: The boy's deformity was caused by a traffic accident.

hanzi: 法庭裁定那个人犯了侵犯人身罪。
pinyin: fǎ tíng cái dìng nèi gè rén fàn le qīn fàn rén shēn zuì。
english: The court determined that the man was guilty of assault.

hanzi: 问题征求或要求回答的询问的词句
pinyin: wèn tí zhēng qiú huò yāo qiú huí dá de xún wèn de cí jù
english: An expression of inquiry that invites or calls for a reply.

hanzi: 抄袭者，起码也有保存文物的功劳。
pinyin: chāo xí zhě， qǐ mǎ yě yǒu bǎo cún wén wù de gōng láo。
english: Plagiarists, at least, have the merit of preservation.

hanzi: 他们越过群山，到了那边的山谷。
pinyin: tā men yuè guò qún shān， dào le nà bian de shān gǔ。
english: They crossed the mountains and travelled to the valleys beyond.

hanzi: 辩护律师提出理由认为证据不充分.
pinyin: biàn hù lu:4 shī tí chū lǐ yóu rèn wéi zhèng jù bù chōng fèn.
english: The defence argue/argues that the evidence is weak.

hanzi: 我们没有地方躲避这场风暴.
pinyin: wǒ men méi yǒu dì fang duǒ bì zhè chǎng fēng bào.
english: There was nowhere we could take cover (ie go for protection) from the storm.

hanzi: 向大门走去的人受到了哨兵的查问.
pinyin: xiàng dà mén zǒu qù de rén shòu dào le shào bīng de zhā wèn.
english: People approaching the gate were challenged by the sentry.

hanzi: 他很倒霉，在考试当天生病了。
pinyin: tā hěn dǎo méi， zài kǎo shì dàng tiān shēng bìng le。
english: He had the misfortune to fall ill on the day of the examination.

hanzi: 法定监护人应该维护这个孩子的利益.
pinyin: fǎ dìng jiàn hù rén yīng gāi wéi hù zhè gè hái zi de lì yì.
english: The legal guardian must act on behalf of the child.

hanzi: 我父亲要我牢记努力工作的重要性。
pinyin: wǒ fù qīn yào wǒ láo jì nǔ lì gōng zuò de zhòng yào xìng。
english: My father impress on me the importance of hard work.

hanzi: 天气潮湿是这个地区生活的一个特色。
pinyin: tiān qì cháo shī shì zhè gè dì qū shēng huó de yī gè tè sè。
english: Wet weather is a feature of life in this area.

hanzi: 这本小说是去年最畅销的书之一。
pinyin: zhè běn xiǎo shuō shì qù nián zuì chàng xiāo de shū zhī yī。
english: This novel was one of last year's best-selling titles.

hanzi: 皇后要求儿子娶邻国的公主。
pinyin: huáng hòu yāo qiú ér zi qǔ lín guó de gōng zhǔ。
english: The empress asked his son to marry the princess of the neighboring kingdom.

hanzi: 那不是深宅大院, 只不过是个小农舍.
pinyin: nà bú shì shēn zhái dà yuàn,  zhǐ bù guò shì gè xiǎo nóng shè.
english: It's not a very grand house, just a little cottage.

hanzi: 我们公司在经济衰退时期历尽艰辛。
pinyin: wǒ men gōng sī zài jīng jì shuāi tuì shí qī lì jìn jiān xīn。
english: In the recession, our firm go through a bad time.

hanzi: 他以两杆的成绩赢得了这场高尔夫球赛。
pinyin: tā yǐ liǎng gǎn de chéng jī yíng dé le zhè chǎng gāo ěr fū qiú sài。
english: He won the golf match by two shots.

hanzi: 皇后要求儿子娶邻国的公主。
pinyin: huáng hòu yāo qiú ér zi qǔ lín guó de gōng zhǔ。
english: The empress asked his son to marry the princess of the neighboring kingdom.

hanzi: 在英国食用的黄油多产自新西兰.
pinyin: zài Yīng guó shí yòng de huáng yóu duō chǎn zì xīn xī lán.
english: Much of the butter eaten in England comes from New Zealand.

hanzi: 他就人权问题提出的抗议听来很空洞。
pinyin: tā jiù rén quán wèn tí tí chū de kàng yì tìng lái hěn kōng dòng。
english: His protests on human rights sound hollow.

hanzi: 她情愿玩玩蜜蜂也不愿与愚人为伍。
pinyin: tā qíng yuàn wàn wàn mì fēng yě bù yuàn yù yú rén wéi wǔ。
english: She will rather fool with a bee than being with a fool.

hanzi: 从右边驶来的车辆享有优先通行权.
pinyin: zòng yòu biān shǐ lái de chē liàng xiǎng yǒu yōu xiān tōng xíng quán.
english: Vehicles coming from the right have priority.

hanzi: 这项条约可以认为是完全作废了。
pinyin: zhè xiàng tiáo yuē kě yǐ rèn wéi shì wán quán zuò fèi le。
english: The treaty may be considered to be as dead as a doornail.

hanzi: 喷射机的黑色轮廓在雾中隐隐显现。
pinyin: pēn shè jī de hēi sè lún kuò zài wù zhòng yǐn yǐn xiǎn xiàn。
english: The dark outline of a jet loomed through the mist.

hanzi: 她这次患流行性感冒还没有完全恢复。
pinyin: tā zhè cì huàn liú xíng xìng gǎn mào huán méi yǒu wán quán huī fù。
english: She's still recovering from a bout of flu.

hanzi: 血液还能从身体组织里排出废物。
pinyin: xuè yè huán néng zòng shēn tǐ zǔ zhī lǐ pái chū fèi wù。
english: The blood can also export waste products from the tissues.

hanzi: 工人们正竭尽全力提高生产力。
pinyin: gōng rén men zhèng jié jìn quán lì tí gāo shēng chǎn lì。
english: The workers are trying their best to increase productivity.

hanzi: 他的用意不是这个，只是做做样子罢了。
pinyin: tā de yòng yì bú shì zhè gè， zhǐ shì zuò zuò yàng zi bà le。
english: He doesn't really mean it; it's just an act.

hanzi: 人们认为这些早期遗物具有神奇的力量.
pinyin: rén men rèn wéi zhè xie zǎo qī yí wù jù yǒu shén qí de lì liang.
english: Miraculous powers are credited to the relics.

hanzi: 他就人权问题提出的抗议听来很空洞。
pinyin: tā jiù rén quán wèn tí tí chū de kàng yì tìng lái hěn kōng dòng。
english: His protests on human rights sound hollow.

hanzi: 沿这条小径走终究会见到大路的。
pinyin: yàn zhè tiáo xiǎo jìng zǒu zhōng jiū huì jiàn dào dà lù de。
english: Follow the footpath and you'll eventually hit the road.

hanzi: 集市的景象光怪陆离, 纷然杂陈.
pinyin: jí shì de jǐng xiàng guāng guài lù lí,  fēn rán zá chén.
english: The bazaar was a kaleidoscope of strange sights and impressions.

hanzi: 没有什么能使他丧失对人性的信心。
pinyin: méi yǒu shén me néng shǐ tā sàng shī duì rén xìng de xìn xīn。
english: Nothing could extinguish his faith in human nature.

hanzi: 公务员须签署遵守公务保密条例.
pinyin: gōng wù yuán xū qiān shǔ zūn shǒu gōng wù bǎo mì tiáo lì.
english: Civil Servants are required to sign the Official Secrets Act.

hanzi: 它展示了从幼虫变成蝴蝶的过程。
pinyin: tā zhǎn shì le zòng yòu chóng biàn chéng hú dié de guò chéng。
english: It shows the metamorphosis of a larva into a butterfly.

hanzi: 他们要求对税收制度进行根本改革。
pinyin: tā men yāo qiú duì shuì shōu zhì dù jìn xíng gēn běn gǎi gé。
english: They called for a radical reform of our tax system.

hanzi: 公务员须签署遵守公务保密条例.
pinyin: gōng wù yuán xū qiān shǔ zūn shǒu gōng wù bǎo mì tiáo lì.
english: Civil Servants are required to sign the Official Secrets Act.

hanzi: 我三番五次地告诉过你, 不要做那种事.
pinyin: wǒ sān pān wǔ cì de gào su guò nǐ,  bù yào zuò nà zhòng shì.
english: I've told you again and again not to do that.

hanzi: 这首乐曲是这个故事必不可少的组成部分。
pinyin: zhè shǒu yuè qǔ shì zhè gè gù shì bì bù kě shào de zǔ chéng bù fen。
english: The music is organic to the story.

hanzi: 她从没吸取教训，不晓得分清善恶。
pinyin: tā zòng mò xī qǔ jiào xun， bù xiǎo de fēn qīng shàn wù。
english: She never learned to differentiate between good and evil.

hanzi: 无论如何，天堂是没有婚礼赠品的。
pinyin: wú lùn rú hé， tiān táng shì méi yǒu hūn lǐ zèng pǐn de。
english: At any rate there will be no wedding presents in heaven.

hanzi: 他因保险单失效未得任何补偿.
pinyin: tā yīn bǎo xiǎn shàn shī xiào wèi de rèn hé bǔ cháng.
english: He didn't get any compensation because his insurance policy had lapsed.

hanzi: 这两位艺术家并非都有审美的眼光。
pinyin: zhè liǎng wèi yì shù jiā bìng fēi dōu yǒu shěn měi de yǎn guāng。
english: Not both the artists have a keen eye for beauty.

hanzi: 在死者胃中找到了少量的毒药。
pinyin: zài sǐ zhě wèi zhòng zhǎo dào le shǎo liàng de dú yào。
english: Small quantities of poison were detected in the dead man's stomach.

hanzi: 他们用很多时间探讨生命的奥秘.
pinyin: tā men yòng hěn duō shí jiān tàn tǎo shēng mìng de ào mì.
english: They spend their time philosophizingabout the mysteries of life.

hanzi: 尽管遭受干旱，还是获得了好收成。
pinyin: jǐn guǎn zāo shòu gān hàn， hái shì huò dé le hào shōu cheng。
english: A good harvest was obtained in spite of the drought.

hanzi: 有人告诉我说，西班牙是个浪漫的国家。
pinyin: yǒu rén gào su wǒ shuō， xī bān yá shì gè làng màn de guó jiā。
english: I was told that Spain is a romantic nation.

hanzi: 他非常仔细, 把每一个细节都核对过了。
pinyin: tā fēi cháng zǐ xì,  bǎ měi yī gè xì jié dōu hé duì guò le。
english: He was careful enough to check up every detail.

hanzi: 他因保险单失效未得任何补偿.
pinyin: tā yīn bǎo xiǎn shàn shī xiào wèi de rèn hé bǔ cháng.
english: He didn't get any compensation because his insurance policy had lapsed.

hanzi: 她为获得额外收入决定租出一个房间.
pinyin: tā wèi huò dé é wài shōu rù jué dìng zū chū yī gè fáng jiān.
english: She decided to rent out a room to get extra income.

hanzi: 科学家仍在寻求治疗感冒的方法。
pinyin: kē xué jiā réng zài xún qiú zhì liáo gǎn mào de fāng fǎ。
english: Scientists are still searching for a cure to the common cold.

hanzi: 这个花园布局很好, 有许多宜人小径.
pinyin: zhè gè huā yuán bù jú hěn hǎo,  yǒu xǔ duō yí rén xiǎo jìng.
english: The garden is well laid out, with many pleasant walks.

hanzi: 法律界人士对变革总是加以抵制.
pinyin: fǎ lu:4 jiè rén shì duì biàn gé zǒng shì jiā yǐ dǐ zhì.
english: The legal profession (ie lawyers) has/have always resisted change.

hanzi: 我倘若知道她病了, 早就去探望她了.
pinyin: wǒ tǎng ruò zhī dào tā bìng le,  zǎo jiù qù tàn wàng tā le.
english: If I had but known she was ill, I would have visited her.

hanzi: 他对旧冤家的敌对情绪仍然很大.
pinyin: tā duì jiù yuān jiā de dí duì qíng xù réng rán hěn dà.
english: The antagonism he felt towards his old enemy was still very strong.

hanzi: 必须对警方的权限作出明确的规定。
pinyin: bì xū duì jǐng fāng de quán xiàn zuò chū míng què de guī dìng。
english: The powers of the police need to be clearly defined.

hanzi: 通往宫殿的所有道路都有部队把守。
pinyin: tōng wàng gōng diàn de suǒ yǒu dào lù dōu yǒu bù duì bǎ shǒu。
english: All the approaches to the palace are guarded by troops.

hanzi: 这幢旧房子在昨夜的大火中烧毁了。
pinyin: zhè chuáng jiù fáng zi zài zuó yè de dà huǒ zhòng shāo huǐ le。
english: The old house burned down last night in the big fire.

hanzi: 他在执行职务中遇到许多阻力.
pinyin: tā zài zhí xíng zhí wù zhòng yù dào xǔ duō zǔ lì.
english: In the prosecution of his duties he had met with a good deal of resistance.

hanzi: 事实上，许多人身体都有某种缺陷。
pinyin: shì shí shàng， xǔ duō rén shēn tǐ dōu yǒu mǒu zhǒng quē xiàn。
english: As a matter of fact, many people have a disability.

hanzi: 昨天市长主持了世界博览会的开幕式。
pinyin: zuó tiān shì zhǎng zhǔ chí le shì jiè bó lǎn huì de kāi mù shì。
english: The mayor dedicated the World Fair yesterday.

hanzi: 他们不停地射击, 耗尽了所有的弹药.
pinyin: tā men bù tíng de shè jī,  hào jìn le suǒ yǒu de dàn yào.
english: They went on firing until they had spent all their ammunition.

hanzi: 被旅馆服务人员洗烫得很整洁的衬衣
pinyin: bèi lu:3 guǎn fú wù rén yuán xǐ tàng de hěn zhěng jié de chèn yī
english: Shirts that were neatly laundered by the hotel staff.

hanzi: 在环形防线上已布置了几处岗哨.
pinyin: zài huán xíng fáng xiàn shàng yǐ bù zhì le jǐ chù gǎng shào.
english: Guards had been posted at several points around the perimeter.

hanzi: 那台陈旧的发动机抖动著发出摩擦的声音。
pinyin: nà tái chén jiù de fā dòng jī dǒu dòng著 fā chū mó cā de shēng yīn。
english: The old engine ground and shuddered.

hanzi: 他在陈述事实, 但他隐瞒了一些事。
pinyin: tā zài chén shù shì shí,  dàn tā yǐn mán le yī xiē shì。
english: He may be telling the truth but he is keeping something back.

hanzi: 这座城市被占领使国人大为震惊。
pinyin: zhè zuò chéng shì bèi zhàn lǐng shǐ guó rén dà wèi zhèn jīng。
english: The capture of the city shocked everyone in the country.

hanzi: 在足够的证据面前，这个罪犯屈服了。
pinyin: zài zú gòu de zhèng jù miàn qián， zhè gè zuì fàn qū fú le。
english: In the face of enough witness, the criminal caved in.

hanzi: 虚构，捏造虚构作品或捏造借口的行为
pinyin: xū gòu， niē zào xū gòu zuò pǐn huò niē zào jiè kǒu de xíng wéi
english: The act of inventing such a creation or pretense.

hanzi: 这一新方法用于从页岩油里提炼出石油。
pinyin: zhè yī xīn fāng fǎ yòng yú zòng yè yán yóu lǐ tí liàn chū shí yóu。
english: The new process extracts oil from shale.

hanzi: 他的仇人竭力想把他牵扯进谋杀案中.
pinyin: tā de chóu rén jié lì xiǎng bǎ tā qiān chě jìn móu shā àn zhòng.
english: His enemies tried to implicate him (in the murder).

hanzi: 他因在人行横道上乱扔杂物而被罚款。
pinyin: tā yīn zài rén xìng hèng dào shàng luàn rēng zá wù ér bèi fá kuǎn。
english: He was fined for littering on the sidewalks.

hanzi: 发高烧是这种疾病的表现症状之一
pinyin: fà gāo shāo shì zhè zhǒng jí bìng de biǎo xiàn zhèng zhuàng zhī yī
english: A high fever is an early manifestation of the disease.

hanzi: 人事部门正在组织新雇员的培训.
pinyin: rén shì bù mén zhèng zài zǔ zhī xīn gù yuán de péi xùn.
english: Personnel is/are organizing the training of the new members of staff.

hanzi: 经分析发现蛋糕里含有微量的毒素。
pinyin: jīng fēn xī fā xiàn dàn gāo lǐ hán yǒu wēi liàng de dú sù。
english: The cake on analysis was found to contain traces of toxin.

hanzi: 人事部门正在组织新雇员的培训.
pinyin: rén shì bù mén zhèng zài zǔ zhī xīn gù yuán de péi xùn.
english: Personnel is/are organizing the training of the new members of staff.

hanzi: 我不应该雇用他们--简直是一群外行.
pinyin: wǒ bù yīng gāi gù yòng tā men-- jiǎn zhí shì yī qún wài háng.
english: I shouldn't employ them they're just a bunch of amateurs.

hanzi: 不懂艺术欣赏的缺乏艺术品位或审美情趣的
pinyin: bù dǒng yì shù xīn shǎng de quē fá yì shù pǐn wèi huò shěn měi qíng qù de
english: Lacking taste or interest in art.

hanzi: 这些防御工事是上次战争时修建的。
pinyin: zhè xie fáng yù gōng shì shì shàng cì zhàn zhēng shí xiū jiàn de。
english: These fortifications were built during the last war.

hanzi: 冰间湖由海水冰围成的一块开阔的水域
pinyin: bīng jiàn hú yóu hǎi shuǐ bīng wéi chéng de yī kuài kāi kuò de shuǐ yù
english: An area of open water surrounded by sea ice.

hanzi: 他拼命在她的书桌里搜寻那封信。
pinyin: tā pīn mìng zài tā de shū zhuō lǐ sōu xún nà fēng xìn。
english: He was rifling through her desk in a desperate search for the letter.

hanzi: 我在黑暗的房间里摸索着找电灯开关。
pinyin: wǒ zài hēi àn de fáng jiān lǐ mō suo zhuó zhǎo diàn dēng kāi guān。
english: I groped for the light switch in the dark room.

hanzi: 这些男孩捉弄那位老人真是残忍。
pinyin: zhè xie nán hái zhuō nòng nà wèi lǎo rén zhēn shì cán rěn。
english: It is very cruel of these boys to make a fool of that old man.

hanzi: 他开汽车像个疯子--不定哪天就得撞死.
pinyin: tā kāi qì chē xiàng gè fēng zi-- bù dìng něi tiān jiù de zhuàng sǐ.
english: He drives like a nut he'll kill himself one day.

hanzi: 我们所珍视的权利之一是言论自由。
pinyin: wǒ men suǒ zhēn shì de quán lì zhī yī shì yán lùn zì yóu。
english: One of our cherished privileges is the right of free speech.

hanzi: 临床指导在诊所讲授或指导研讨的人
pinyin: lín chuáng zhǐ dǎo zài zhěn suǒ jiǎng shòu huò zhǐ dǎo yán tǎo de rén
english: One who conducts sessions or teaches at a clinic.

hanzi: 你所持的护照可使你享有免费医疗.
pinyin: nǐ suǒ chí de hù zhào kě shǐ nǐ xiǎng yǒu miǎn fèi yī liáo.
english: Your passport qualifies you to receive free medical treatment.

hanzi: 渡船上有个挺不错的免税商店.
pinyin: dù chuán shàng yǒu gè tǐng bù cuò de miǎn shuì shāng diàn.
english: There's a good duty-free shop (ie one selling such goods) on the ferry.

hanzi: 我们喜欢观赏初升太阳的灿烂光辉。
pinyin: wǒ men xǐ huan guān shǎng chū shēng tài yáng de càn làn guāng huī。
english: We enjoy seeing the glorious beams of the rising sun.

hanzi: 无表决权的股票与有投票地位同等。
pinyin: wú biǎo jué quán de gǔ piào yù yǒu tóu piào dì wèi tóng děng。
english: The non- voting share rank equally with the voting share.

hanzi: 他的朋友很少，因此他的生活非常孤单。
pinyin: tā de péng you hěn shǎo， yīn cǐ tā de shēng huó fēi cháng gū dān。
english: He has so few friends that his life is lonely.

hanzi: 警方得到了他们在策划着暴动的情报。
pinyin: jǐng fāng dé dào le tā men zài cè huà zhuó bào dòng de qíng bào。
english: The police had a tip that they were plotting a riot.

hanzi: 教皇在当代社会没有世俗方面的权利。
pinyin: jiào huáng zài dāng dài shè huì méi yǒu shì sú fāng miàn de quán lì。
english: The Pope has no temporal power in modern society.

hanzi: 哦，好吧，这就是人生吧。总还有来年。
pinyin: ó， hào ba， zhè jiù shì rén shēng ba。 zǒng hái yǒu lái nián。
english: Oh, well, such is life. there's always next year.

hanzi: 水加热则成为蒸汽，冷却则成为冰。
pinyin: shuǐ jiā rè zé chéng wéi zhēng qì， lěng què zé chéng wéi bīng。
english: Water is changed into steam by heat and into ice by cold.

hanzi: 这些收音机制造厂产品打不开销路.
pinyin: zhè xie shōu yīn jī zhì zào chǎng chǎn pǐn dǎ bù kāi xiāo lù.
english: The producers of the radios could not find a market for them.

hanzi: 这一切凑合起来使我们的假期圆满过去。
pinyin: zhè yī qiè còu hé qǐ lai shǐ wǒ men de jià qī yuán mǎn guò qu。
english: Everything cooperated to make our holiday a success.

hanzi: 他把档案翻了一遍，最后才找到图纸。
pinyin: tā bǎ dàng àn fān le yī biàn， zuì hòu cái zhǎo dào tú zhǐ。
english: He hunted through the files till he found the blueprint.

hanzi: 那辆货车遭罢工者抵制而无法卸货.
pinyin: nà liàng huò chē zāo bà gōng zhě dǐ zhì ér wú fǎ xiè huò.
english: The lorry had been blacked by strikers and could not be unloaded.

hanzi: 在一些发展中国家, 文盲是个大问题.
pinyin: zài yī xiē fā zhǎn Zhōng guó jiā,  wén máng shì gè dà wèn tí.
english: Illiteracy is a major problem in some developing countries.

hanzi: 有一棵树横在铁轨上, 造成机车出轨.
pinyin: yǒu yī kē shù hèng zài tiě guǐ shàng,  zào chéng jī chē chū guǐ.
english: The engine was derailed by a tree lying across the line.

hanzi: 我们必须把公文归档工作弄出些条理来.
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū bǎ gōng wén guī dàng gōng zuò nòng chū xiē tiáo lǐ lái.
english: We must get some method into our office filing.

hanzi: 宪法规定治理国家的方式方法。
pinyin: xiàn fǎ guī dìng zhì lǐ guó jiā de fāng shì fāng fǎ。
english: A constitution lays down the manner and means by which a state is governed.

hanzi: 她在攀登过程中表现出极大的耐力。
pinyin: tā zài pān dēng guò chéng zhòng biǎo xiàn chū jí dà de nài lì。
english: She exhibited great powers of endurance during the climb.

hanzi: 疾病和衰老使她的模样变得认不出了。
pinyin: jí bìng huò shuāi lǎo shǐ tā de mú yàng biàn de rèn bù chū le。
english: Illness and age had changed her out of all recognition.

hanzi: 陪审团做出被告无罪的裁决.
pinyin: péi shěn tuán zuò chū bèi gào wú zuì de cái jué.
english: The jury returned a verdict of (ie reached a decision that the accused was) not guilty.

hanzi: 我们驶抵公海, 海岸似乎退到了远方.
pinyin: wǒ men shǐ dǐ gōng hǎi,  hǎi àn sì hu tuì dào le yuǎn fāng.
english: We reached the open sea and the coast receded into the distance.

hanzi: 西方各国对这个国家实行了严厉制裁。
pinyin: xī fāng gè guó duì zhè gè guó jiā shí xíng le yán lì zhì cái。
english: Western nations imposed tough sanctions on the country.

hanzi: 她未曾想到这计谋反倒使她自食其果.
pinyin: tā wèi zēng xiǎng dào zhè jì móu fǎn dào shǐ tā zì sì qí guǒ.
english: The scheme rebounded on her in a way she had not expected.

hanzi: 清洁的衣服和良好的举止能给人以好感。
pinyin: qīng jié de yī fu huò liáng hǎo de jǔ zhǐ néng jǐ rén yǐ hǎo gǎn。
english: Clean clothes and good manners are prepossessing.

hanzi: 废气已过视为城市空气污染的原因。
pinyin: fèi qì yǐ guò shì wéi chéng shì kōng qì wū rǎn de yuán yīn。
english: Exhaust gas has been incriminated in air pollution in cities.

hanzi: 他的话已在他们心中播下怀疑的种子。
pinyin: tā de huà yǐ zài tā men xīn zhōng bō xià huái yí de zhǒng zi。
english: His words had sowed the seeds of suspicion in their minds.

hanzi: 尘土受到损辱，却以她的花朵来报答。
pinyin: chén tǔ shòu dào sǔn rǔ， què yǐ tā de huā duǒ lái bào dá。
english: The dust receives insult and in return offers her flowers.

hanzi: 那个加拿大籍日本人两种语言都精通。
pinyin: nèi gè jiā ná dà jí Rì běn rén liǎng zhòng yǔ yán dōu jīng tōng。
english: The Canadian-Japanese is at home in both languages.

hanzi: 他舒展开身体躺在炉火旁边睡著了.
pinyin: tā shū zhǎn kāi shēn tǐ tǎng zài lú huǒ páng biān shuì著 le.
english: He stretched (himself) out in front of the fire and fell asleep.

hanzi: 这些多石的荒地上任何作物都不能生长。
pinyin: zhè xie duō shí de huāng dì shàng rèn hé zuò wù dōu bù néng shēng zhǎng。
english: No crops will grow on these stony wastes.

hanzi: 随著时间的流逝, 我的记忆力似乎越来越差.
pinyin: suí著 shí jiān de liú shì,  wǒ de jì yì lì sì hu yuè lái yuè cī.
english: As time goes by my memory seems to get worse.

hanzi: 街道曲曲弯弯的, 把我们弄得迷失了方向.
pinyin: jiē dào qǔ qǔ wān wān de,  bǎ wǒ men nòng de mí shī le fāng xiàng.
english: We were quite disorientated by the maze of streets.

hanzi: 那个吸血鬼依附于他人希望获得钱财。
pinyin: nèi gè xī xuè guǐ yī fù yú tā rén xī wàng huò dé qián cái。
english: The leech hangs about other people hoping to obtain money.

hanzi: 水加热则成为蒸汽，冷却则成为冰。
pinyin: shuǐ jiā rè zé chéng wéi zhēng qì， lěng què zé chéng wéi bīng。
english: Water is changed into steam by heat and into ice by cold.

hanzi: 该团体的成员之间有牢固的友情.
pinyin: gāi tuán tǐ de chéng yuán zhī jiān yǒu láo gù de yǒu qíng.
english: There were strong ties of friendship between the members of the society.

hanzi: 他在找新房子时把家具存放在仓库里。
pinyin: tā zài zhǎo xīn fáng zi shí bǎ jiā jù cún fàng zài cāng kù lǐ。
english: His furniture is in storage while he finds a new house.

hanzi: 她竭力巴结主任希望得到提升.
pinyin: tā jié lì bā jié zhǔ rèn xī wàng dé dào tí shēng.
english: She tried to ingratiateherself with the director, in the hope of getting promotion.

hanzi: 从资料库借磁带是退而求其次的办法。
pinyin: zòng zī liào kù jiè cí dài shì tuì ér qiú qí cì de bàn fǎ。
english: Borrowing tapes from the library would be the next-best thing.

hanzi: 千方百计振兴渔业注定徒劳无功.
pinyin: qiān fāng bǎi jì zhèn xīng yú yè zhù dìng tú láo wú gōng.
english: All attempts to revive the fishing industry were foredoomed to failure.

hanzi: 政府正在引用某些措施来振兴贸易。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ zhèng zài yǐn yòng mǒu xiē cuò shī lái zhèn xīng mào yì。
english: The government is introducing measures to revive trade.

hanzi: 千方百计振兴渔业注定徒劳无功.
pinyin: qiān fāng bǎi jì zhèn xīng yú yè zhù dìng tú láo wú gōng.
english: All attempts to revive the fishing industry were foredoomed to failure.

hanzi: 她已恢复了知觉, 但尚未脱险.
pinyin: tā yǐ huī fù le zhī jué,  dàn shàng wèi tuō xiǎn.
english: She's regained consciousness, but she's not out of the woods (ie sure to recover) yet.

hanzi: 那项令人赞赏的发现注定由他完成。
pinyin: nà xiàng lìng rén zàn shǎng de fā xiàn zhù dìng yóu tā wán chéng。
english: It was reserved for him to make the admirable discovery.

hanzi: 他被邀请担任本地摄影俱乐部的主席。
pinyin: tā bèi yāo qǐng dān rèn běn dì shè yǐng jù yuè bù de zhǔ xí。
english: He was invited to become president of the local camera club.

hanzi: 儿子总归要离开家的, 这种事很难免.
pinyin: ér zi zǒng guī yào lí kāi jiā de,  zhè zhǒng shì hěn nán miǎn.
english: It is only to be expected your son will leave home eventually.

hanzi: 我们全神贯注地倾听她讲的惊人故事。
pinyin: wǒ men quán shén guàn zhù de qīng tīng tā jiǎng de jīng rén gù shì。
english: We listened to her amazing story with rapt attention.

hanzi: 雕刻家把大理石块凿成优美的雕像.
pinyin: diāo kè jiā bǎ dà lǐ shí kuài zuò chéng yōu měi de diāo xiàng.
english: The sculptor chiselled the lump of marble into a fine statue.

hanzi: 巨浪将那艘失事的船只冲击得支离破碎.
pinyin: jù làng jiàng nà sōu shī shì de chuán zhī chōng jī de zhī lí pò suì.
english: The huge waves battered the wrecked ship to pieces.

hanzi: 我丈夫和我都喜欢乡村的宁静生活。
pinyin: wǒ zhàng fu huò wǒ dōu xǐ huan xiāng cūn de níng jìng shēng huó。
english: Both my husband and I love the tranquil life in the country.

hanzi: 她举起一根手指放在唇边，示意肃静。
pinyin: tā jǔ qǐ yī gēn shǒu zhǐ fàng zài chún biān， shì yì sù jìng。
english: She raised her finger to her lips as a sign for silence.

hanzi: 维多利亚女王的统治持续了六十多年。
pinyin: wéi Duō lì yà nu:3 wáng de tǒng zhì chí xù le liù shí duō nián。
english: The reign of Queen Victoria lasted more than sixty years.

hanzi: 这位牧师被教皇指定为他的高级使节。
pinyin: zhè wèi mù shī bèi jiào huáng zhǐ dìng wèi tā de gāo jí shǐ jié。
english: The priest was appointed the legate by the pope.

hanzi: 你若是规规矩矩的，老板就可能提拔你。
pinyin: nǐ ruò shì guī guī ju jǔ de， lǎo bǎn jiù kě néng tí bá nǐ。
english: If you keep your nose clean, the boss might promote you.

hanzi: 那位流行歌曲歌星周围蜂拥著许多歌迷。
pinyin: nà wèi liú xíng gē qǔ gē xīng zhōu wéi fēng yōng著 xǔ duō gē mí。
english: The pop star was followed by a train of admirers.

hanzi: 我得到法庭认可重新拥有这笔财产。
pinyin: wǒ dé dào fǎ tíng rèn kě chóng xīn yōng yǒu zhè bǐ cái chǎn。
english: I've been authorised by the court to repossess this property.

hanzi: 跳伞者大胆的冒险动作令人赞叹不已.
pinyin: tiào sǎn zhě dà dǎn de mào xiǎn dòng zuò lìng rén zàn tàn bù yǐ.
english: The daring exploits of the parachutists were much admired.

hanzi: 家庭电脑的销售量近年来上升很快.
pinyin: jiā tíng diàn nǎo de xiāo shòu liàng jìn nián lái shàng shēng hěn kuài.
english: Sales of home computers have taken off in recent years.

hanzi: 兰花和报春花之类的野花越来越少了.
pinyin: lán huā huò bào chūn huā zhī lèi de yě huā yuè lái yuè shào le.
english: Wild flowers such as orchids and primroses are becoming rare.

hanzi: 这些防御工事都是上次战争时修筑的.
pinyin: zhè xie fáng yù gōng shì dōu shì shàng cì zhàn zhēng shí xiū zhù de.
english: These fortifications were all built during the last war.

hanzi: 汽车放出的废气在污染我们城市的空气。
pinyin: qì chē fàng chū de fèi qì zài wū rǎn wǒ men chéng shì de kōng qì。
english: Gases from cars are poisoning the air of our cities.

hanzi: 增加税收归结起来将造成很多困难.
pinyin: zēng jiā shuì shōu guī jié qǐ lai jiàng zào chéng hěn duō kùn nan.
english: The tax increases will, in the aggregate, cause much hardship.

hanzi: 我们的产品在国内市场上都很畅销。
pinyin: wǒ men de chǎn pǐn zài guó nèi shì chǎng shàng dōu hěn chàng xiāo。
english: Our product command a good market both at home and abroad.

hanzi: 这位老人是小麦病虫害方面的权威。
pinyin: zhè wèi lǎo rén shì xiǎo mài bìng chóng hài fāng miàn de quán wēi。
english: This old man is a leading authority on wheat diseases.

hanzi: 我们向经销商出售汽车, 不卖给一般人.
pinyin: wǒ men xiàng jīng xiāo shāng chū shòu qì chē,  bù mài jǐ yī bān rén.
english: We sell cars to the trade, not to the general public.

hanzi: 壁内的发生于或位于腔或器官的壁内的
pinyin: bì nèi de fā shēng yú huò wèi yú qiāng huò qì guān de bì nèi de
english: Occurring or situated within the wall of a cavity or an organ.

hanzi: 他经诊断为精神失常而送往精神病院.
pinyin: tā jīng zhěn duàn wèi jīng shén shī cháng ér sòng wàng jīng shén bìng yuàn.
english: He was certified and sent to a mental hospital.

hanzi: 由于他是牧师，言行须顾虑到自己的身份。
pinyin: yóu yú tā shì mù shī， yán xìng xū gù lu:4 dào zì jǐ de shēn fèn。
english: As he is a parson, he has to respect the cloth.

hanzi: 土壤中的养分能促进植物生长.
pinyin: tǔ rǎng zhòng dì yǎng fèn néng cù jìn zhí wù shēng zhǎng.
english: The nutrient in the soil acts as a stimulus to growth/to make the plants grow.

hanzi: 包装瓷器时在周围多放些包装材料。
pinyin: bāo zhuāng cí qì shí zài zhōu wéi duō fàng xiē bāo zhuāng cái liào。
english: Put plenty of wrapping round the china when you pack it.

hanzi: 他隐隐约约地觉得以前曾经见过她.
pinyin: tā yǐn yǐn yuē yuē de jué de yǐ qián céng jīng xiàn guò tā.
english: At the back of his mind was the vague idea that he had met her before.

hanzi: 允许你每月从帐户中提取两次存款.
pinyin: yǔn xǔ nǐ měi yuè zòng zhàng hù zhòng tí qǔ liǎng cì cún kuǎn.
english: You are allowed to make two withdrawals a month from the account.

hanzi: 现在，田径项目的半决赛正在进行。
pinyin: xiàn zài， tián jìng xiàng mù de bàn jué sài zhèng zài jìn xíng。
english: Now, the semifinal of the track and field event is underway.

hanzi: 她等他邀请她跳舞, 而不愿显得失慎.
pinyin: tā děng tā yāo qǐng tā tiào wǔ,  ér bù yuàn xiǎn de shī shèn.
english: She waited for him to invite her to dance, not wishing to seem bold.

hanzi: 在社会中生活就要遵循社会行为准则.
pinyin: zài shè huì zhòng shēng huó jiù yào zūn xún shè huì xíng wéi zhǔn zé.
english: You must adapt to the norms of the society you live in.

hanzi: 蒸气接触冷的表面而凝结成水珠.
pinyin: zhēng qì jiē chù lěng de biǎo miàn ér níng jié chéng shuǐ zhū.
english: Steam condenses/is condensed into water when it touches a cold surface.

hanzi: 那个推销员试图以劣质牌号骗卖给我们。
pinyin: nèi gè tuī xiāo yuán shì tú yǐ liè zhì pái hào piàn mài jǐ wǒ men。
english: The salesman tried to fob off an inferior brand on us.

hanzi: 这种图案的钞票是十年前首次发行的。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng tú àn de chāo piào shì shí nián qián shǒu cì fā xíng de。
english: Banknotes of this design were first issued 10 years ago.

hanzi: 他们气得拒不接受对方提出的妥协建议。
pinyin: tā men qì de jù bù jiē shòu duì fāng tí chū de tuǒ xié jiàn yì。
english: Out of pique they refuse to accept the compromise offer.

hanzi: 她作出的他此时已经死亡的推论是正确的。
pinyin: tā zuò chū de tā cǐ shí yǐ jīng sǐ wáng de tuī lùn shì zhèng què de。
english: Her deduction that he was now dead was correct.

hanzi: 警方来搜查大楼时, 大家都很惊慌.
pinyin: jǐng fāng lái sōu chá dà lóu shí,  dà jiā dōu hěn jīng huāng.
english: It was panic stations when the police arrived to search the building.

hanzi: 他被家庭束缚，不能再到处去旅游了。
pinyin: tā bèi jiā tíng shù fù， bù néng zài dào chù qù lu:3 yóu le。
english: He was fettered by his family and could not travel any longer.

hanzi: 我们决不辜负我们的父母对我们的期望。
pinyin: wǒ men jué bù gū fù wǒ men de fù mǔ duì wǒ men de qī wàng。
english: We will never fail to live up to what our parents expect of us.

hanzi: 他被警方以私闯民宅的罪名而扣留。
pinyin: tā bèi jǐng fāng yǐ sī chuǎng mín zhái de zuì míng ér kòu liú。
english: He was held by the police on a charge of breaking and entering.

hanzi: 我负责偿还他们为我而用的全部花费.
pinyin: wǒ fù zé cháng huán tā men wèi wǒ ér yòng de quán bù huā fèi.
english: I undertook to indemnify them for expenses incurred on my behalf.

hanzi: 这个中心提供各种娱乐活动设施。
pinyin: zhè gè zhōng xīn tí gōng gè zhǒng yú lè huó dòng shè shī。
english: The center provides facilities for a whole range of leisure activities.

hanzi: 在社会中生活就要遵循社会行为准则.
pinyin: zài shè huì zhòng shēng huó jiù yào zūn xún shè huì xíng wéi zhǔn zé.
english: You must adapt to the norms of the society you live in.

hanzi: 市价已见回升，仓促处理掉，不足为取。
pinyin: shì jià yǐ xiàn huí shēng， cāng cù chǔ lǐ diào， bù zú wèi qǔ。
english: Hurried disposal unadvisable market recovery envisage.

hanzi: 警察怀疑银行职员与强盗有勾结。
pinyin: jǐng chá huái yí yín háng zhí yuán yù qiáng dào yǒu gōu jié。
english: The police suspected that the bank clerk was in league with the rubbers.

hanzi: 数据库中包含有某个实体信息的字段。
pinyin: shù jù kù zhòng bāo hán yǒu mǒu gè shí tǐ xìn xī de zì duàn。
english: In database, a field that contain information about an entity.

hanzi: 那作家常以细枝末节来混淆实质问题.
pinyin: nà zuò jiā cháng yǐ xì zhī mò jié lái hùn xiáo shí zhì wèn tí.
english: The writer often obfuscates the real issues with petty details.

hanzi: 在这条街上停车是此处居民特有的权利.
pinyin: zài zhè tiáo jiē shàng tíng chē shì cǐ chù jū mín tè yǒu de quán lì.
english: Parking in this street is the privilege of the residents.

hanzi: 政府决定对进口汽车征收保护税。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ jué dìng duì jìn kǒu qì chē zhēng shōu bǎo hù shuì。
english: The government decided to impose a protective tariff on foreign cars.

hanzi: 她对他脸上露出的责备的神色感到惊讶。
pinyin: tā duì tā liǎn shàng lù chū de zé bèi de shén sè gǎn dào jīng yà。
english: She is astonished at the look of reproach on his face.

hanzi: 这个纵横字谜的提示完全把我弄糊涂了.
pinyin: zhè gè zòng héng zì mí de tí shì wán quán bǎ wǒ nòng hú tu le.
english: I am totally bewildered by the clues to this crossword puzzle.

hanzi: 低血糖症血液中葡萄糖不正常地低含量
pinyin: dī xuè táng zhèng xuè yè zhòng pú tao táng bù zhèng cháng de dī hán liàng
english: An abnormally low level of glucose in the blood.

hanzi: 有些罪犯被释放后有可能重新犯罪。
pinyin: yǒu xiē zuì fàn bèi shì fàng hòu yǒu kě néng chóng xīn fàn zuì。
english: Some criminals are likely to offend again when they are released.

hanzi: 这张票已过了有效期，现在作废了。
pinyin: zhè zhāng piào yǐ guò le yǒu xiào qī， xiàn zài zuò fèi le。
english: This ticket has passed its expiration date, and so it is now invalid.

hanzi: 他很有礼貌地帮助那个老太太扛包裹。
pinyin: tā hěn yǒu lǐ mào de bāng zhù nèi gè lǎo tài tai káng bāo guǒ。
english: It was courteous of him to help the old lady with her bundles.

hanzi: 灌木丛中突如其来的响声把她的马吓惊了.
pinyin: guàn mù cóng zhòng tū rú qí lái de xiǎng shēng bǎ tā de mǎ xià jīng le.
english: The sudden noise in the bushes startled her horse.

hanzi: 英国把获得奖牌的希望寄托在奥维特的身上.
pinyin: Yīng guó bǎ huò dé jiǎng pái de xī wàng jì tuō zài ào Wéi tè de shēn shàng.
english: British hopes of a medal rested on Ovett.

hanzi: 在林肯就职其间，美国爆发了内战。
pinyin: zài lín kěn jiù zhí qí jiān， Měi guó bào fā le nèi zhàn。
english: The America Civil War was broken out during the presidency of Lincoln.

hanzi: 病人由于慢性病或残疾引起无能力的人
pinyin: bìng rén yóu yú màn xìng bìng huò cán ji yǐn qǐ wú néng lì de rén
english: One who is incapacitated by a chronic illness or disability.

hanzi: 博物馆里有些很好的岩石和矿石标本.
pinyin: bó wù guǎn lǐ yǒu xiē hěn hǎo de yán shí huò kuàng shí biāo běn.
english: There were some fine specimens of rocks and ores in the museum.

hanzi: 灌木丛中突如其来的响声把她的马吓惊了.
pinyin: guàn mù cóng zhòng tū rú qí lái de xiǎng shēng bǎ tā de mǎ xià jīng le.
english: The sudden noise in the bushes startled her horse.

hanzi: 从眼前来看，这药可能疗效不是很大。
pinyin: zòng yǎn qián lái kàn， zhè yào kě néng liáo xiào bú shì hěn dà。
english: In the short term, the medicine may not be very effective.

hanzi: 他提高了售价以补偿材料成本的增加.
pinyin: tā tí gāo le shòu jià yǐ bǔ cháng cái liào chéng běn de zēng jiā.
english: He put up his prices to offset the increased cost of materials.

hanzi: 我们轻声谈话, 以免吵醒婴儿.
pinyin: wǒ men qīng shēng tán huà,  yǐ miǎn chǎo xǐng yīng ér.
english: We spoke in whispers for fear of waking the baby/for fear (that) we might wake the baby.

hanzi: 如果你匆匆忙忙地做事，那你就要出差错。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ cōng cōng máng máng de zuò shì， nà nǐ jiù yào chū chāi cuò。
english: You make mistakes if you do things in a hurry.

hanzi: 同年，他们又把工作扩大到另一领域。
pinyin: tóng nián， tā men yòu bǎ gōng zuò kuò dà dào lìng yī lǐng yù。
english: That same year, they extended their work in yet another field.

hanzi: 把无辜的人投入监狱显然是审判不公.
pinyin: bǎ wú gū de rén tóu rù jiān yù xiǎn ran shì shěn pàn bù gōng.
english: Sending an innocent man to prison is a clear miscarriage of justice.

hanzi: 新的住宅区一直延伸到游乐场的那一边.
pinyin: xīn de zhù zhái qū yī zhí yán shēn dào yóu lè chǎng de nà yī biān.
english: The new housing estate stretches beyond the playing-fields.

hanzi: 至于那男孩的才智, 多得他都用不完。
pinyin: zhì yú nà nán hái de cái zhì,  duō de tā dōu yòng bù wán。
english: As to intelligence, the boy has more than he can possibly make use of.

hanzi: 将财产转让他人，通常指土地的转让。
pinyin: jiàng cái chǎn zhuǎn ràng tā rén， tōng cháng zhǐ tǔ dì de zhuǎn ràng。
english: The transfer of property usually land to someone else.

hanzi: 麻疯病是一种影响皮肤和神经的疾病。
pinyin: má fēng bìng shì yī zhòng yǐng xiǎng pí fū huò shén jīng de jí bìng。
english: Leprosy is a kind of disease affecting the skin and nerves.

hanzi: 尚未证实他有罪, 就得假定他是清白的.
pinyin: shàng wèi zhèng shí tā yǒu zuì,  jiù de jiǎ dìng tā shì qīng bái de.
english: We must assume him to be innocent until he is proved guilty.

hanzi: 经济制裁不能阻碍那个国家的发展。
pinyin: jīng jì zhì cái bù néng zǔ ài nèi gè guó jiā de fā zhǎn。
english: The economic sanctions could not prevent the development of that country.

hanzi: 前来增援的装甲部队受到空袭的牵制。
pinyin: qián lái zēng yuán de zhuāng jiǎ bù duì shòu dào kōng xí de qiān zhì。
english: Armour coming up in support was tied down by air strikes.

hanzi: 她认为看浪漫小说是虚度时光。
pinyin: tā rèn wéi kàn làng màn xiǎo shuō shì xū dù shí guāng。
english: She thought that reading romantic novels was a frivolous way of spending her time.

hanzi: 那个法西斯士兵把刺刀刺入那人的身体。
pinyin: nèi gè fǎ xī sī shì bīng bǎ cì dāo cì rù nà rén de shēn tǐ。
english: The fascist soldier thrust his bayonet into the man's body.

hanzi: 前来增援的装甲部队受到空袭的牵制。
pinyin: qián lái zēng yuán de zhuāng jiǎ bù duì shòu dào kōng xí de qiān zhì。
english: Armour coming up in support was tied down by air strikes.

hanzi: 奴隶们起来反抗奴隶主并把他们都杀光。
pinyin: nú lì men qǐ lai fǎn kàng nú lì zhǔ bìng bǎ tā men dōu shā guāng。
english: The slaves rebelled against their masters and killed them all.

hanzi: 罢工的办公室人员占据了整座建筑物。
pinyin: bà gōng de bàn gōng shì rén yuán zhàn jù le zhěng zuò jiàn zhù wù。
english: The striking office workers have occupied the whole building.

hanzi: 在公众场所遗弃杂物是妨害公众利益的.
pinyin: zài gōng zhòng chǎng suǒ yí qì zá wù shì fáng hài gōng zhòng lì yì de.
english: It is antisocial to leave one's litter in public places.

hanzi: 人类采用一切手段保持生态平衡。
pinyin: rén lèi cǎi yòng yī qiè shǒu duàn bǎo chí shēng tài píng héng。
english: Mankind have been trying every means to maintain the balance of nature.

hanzi: 防风雨的能经受风吹雨淋而不受损害的
pinyin: fáng fēng yǔ de néng jīng shòu fēng chuī yǔ lìn ér bù shòu sǔn hài de
english: Capable of withstanding exposure to weather without damage.

hanzi: 陪审团根据证据作出结论, 认定她有罪.
pinyin: péi shěn tuán gēn jù zhèng jù zuò chū jié lùn,  rèn dìng tā yǒu zuì.
english: The jury concluded, from the evidence, that she was guilty.

hanzi: 我三番五次请她来，她都断然拒绝了。
pinyin: wǒ sān pān wǔ cì qǐng tā lái， tā dōu duàn rán jù jué le。
english: I asked her several times to come but she categorically refused.

hanzi: 领先的那辆赛车在第十圈的中途撞毁了。
pinyin: lǐng xiān de nà liàng sài chē zài dì shí quān de zhōng tú zhuàng huǐ le。
english: The leading car crashed midway through the tenth lap.

hanzi: 倍数性一个细胞中染色体基本数目的倍数
pinyin: bèi shù xìng yī gè xì bāo zhòng rǎn shǎi tǐ jī běn shù mù de bèi shù
english: A multiple of the basic number of chromosomes in a cell.

hanzi: 他急匆匆地走出办公室，好象很生气的样子。
pinyin: tā jí cōng cōng de zǒu chū bàn gōng shì， hǎo xiàng hěn shēng qì de yàng zi。
english: He hurriedly left the office as if angry.

hanzi: 这个国家应该主动提出禁止核武器.
pinyin: zhè gè guó jiā yīng gāi zhǔ dòng tí chū jìn zhǐ hé wǔ qì.
english: It's up to this country to take the initiative in banning nuclear weapons.

hanzi: 那个人因为误食毒菌而被送进了医院。
pinyin: nèi gè rén yīn wèi wù sì dú jùn ér bèi sòng jìn le yī yuàn。
english: The man was sent to the hospital for having eaten toadstool by mistake.

hanzi: 医生逐个检查，看孩子们是否患近视眼。
pinyin: yī shēng zhú gè jiǎn chá， kàn hái zi men shì fǒu huàn jìn shì yǎn。
english: The doctor examined every child for possible short sight.

hanzi: 粗磨粉谷类植物完全或粗磨的可食用颗粒
pinyin: cū mò fěn gǔ lèi zhí wù wán quán huò cū mò de kě shí yòng kē lì
english: The edible whole or coarsely ground grains of a cereal grass.

hanzi: 那个人因为误食毒菌而被送进了医院。
pinyin: nèi gè rén yīn wèi wù sì dú jùn ér bèi sòng jìn le yī yuàn。
english: The man was sent to the hospital for having eaten toadstool by mistake.

hanzi: 我们把权力下放, 各省就有更多的自主权.
pinyin: wǒ men bǎ quán lì xià fàng,  gè xǐng jiù yǒu gèng duō de zì zhǔ quán.
english: If we decentralize, the provinces will have more autonomy.

hanzi: 对休闲有明显作用的另一产业是娱乐。
pinyin: duì xiū xián yǒu míng xiǎn zuò yòng de lìng yī chǎn yè shì yú lè。
english: Another industry obviously devoted to leisure is entertainment.

hanzi: 她在协会中借助图片讲述其印度之行.
pinyin: tā zài xié huì zhòng jiè zhù tú piàn jiǎng shù qí Yìn dù zhī xìng.
english: She gave the society an illustrated talk on her travels in India.

hanzi: 既然大家都在，她不妨把想法都谈出来。
pinyin: jì rán dà jiā dōu zài， tā bù fāng bǎ xiǎng fǎ dōu tán chū lai。
english: Now that they were all there she might as well speak her mind.

hanzi: 英国的政治以往是有产阶级的特权.
pinyin: Yīng guó de zhèng zhì yǐ wǎng shì yǒu chǎn jiē jí de tè quán.
english: Politics in Britain used to be the perquisite of the property-owning classes.

hanzi: 违法，犯罪对于别人法律权利的侵犯或侵害
pinyin: wéi fǎ， fàn zuì duì yú bié rén fǎ lu:4 quán lì de qīn fàn huò qīn hài
english: An invasion or a violation of another's legal rights.

hanzi: 这个协议是双方妥协的产物而不是一方让步.
pinyin: zhè gè xié yì shì shuāng fāng tuǒ xié de chǎn wù ér bú shì yī fāng ràng bù.
english: The agreement is a compromise, not a sell-out.

hanzi: 换个不甚诚实的人是决不会把钱归还的。
pinyin: huàn gè bù shèn chéng shí de rén shì jué bù kuài bǎ qián guī huán de。
english: A less scrupulous man wouldn't have given the money back.

hanzi: 由于天气恶劣，许多选民今天没有投票。
pinyin: yóu yú tiān qì è liè， xǔ duō xuǎn mín jīn tiān méi yǒu tóu piào。
english: Many electors didn't vote today because of the bad weather.

hanzi: 守门员用手掌将球托出了球门的横木。
pinyin: shǒu mén yuán yòng shǒu zhǎng jiàng qiú tuō chū le qiú mén de hèng mù。
english: The goalkeeper just managed to palm the ball over the crossbar.

hanzi: 按我目前的财务状况我是不可能买车的。
pinyin: àn wǒ mù qián de cái wù zhuàng kuàng wǒ shì bù kě néng mǎi jū de。
english: My present finances preclude the possibility of buying a car.

hanzi: 重型卡车一经过，整所房子都震动起来。
pinyin: zhòng xíng kǎ chē yī jīng guò， zhěng suǒ fáng zi dōu zhèn dòng qǐ lai。
english: The whole house vibrates whenever a heavy lorry passes.

hanzi: 她拒绝向警方作陈述以免受连累.
pinyin: tā jù jué xiàng jǐng fāng zuò chén shù yǐ miǎn shòu lián lèi.
english: She refused to make a statement to the police in case she incriminated herself.

hanzi: 经济学家预言通货膨胀率将会增长。
pinyin: jīng jì xué jiā yù yán tōng huò péng zhàng shuài jiāng huì zēng zhǎng。
english: The economists predicted an increase in the rate of inflation.

hanzi: 他新拍摄的电影确实受到评论家严厉的批评。
pinyin: tā xīn pāi shè de diàn yǐng què shí shòu dào píng lùn jiā yán lì de pī píng。
english: His new film was really panned by the critics.

hanzi: 在爆炸中有两个士兵和一个平民被炸死.
pinyin: zài bào zhà zhòng yǒu liǎng gè shì bīng huò yī gè píng mín bèi zhà sǐ.
english: Two soldiers and one civilian were killed in the explosion.

hanzi: 用这个专门的挂钩把客车车厢挂上机车。
pinyin: yòng zhè gè zhuān mén de guà gōu bǎ kè chē chē xiāng guà shàng jī chē。
english: Lock the carriages on the engine with this special hook.

hanzi: 没有提拔，跟钱有关的事一点好处也没沾上。
pinyin: méi yǒu tí bá， gēn qián yǒu guān de shì yī diǎn hǎo chu yě mò zhān shàng。
english: No promotion...no nothing as far as money go.

hanzi: 揭发了反总统的阴谋可能救了他一命。
pinyin: jiē fā le fǎn zǒng tǒng de yīn móu kě néng jiù le tā yī mìng。
english: The exposure of the plot against the President probably saved his life.

hanzi: 英国广播公司经常在节目空档时播放唱片。
pinyin: Yīng guó guǎng bō gōng sī jīng cháng zài jié mù kòng dàng shí bō fàng chàng piàn。
english: The BBC often plays a record to fill in.

hanzi: 现已有数千人给我们来信索要免费样品.
pinyin: xiàn yǐ yǒu shuò qiān rén jǐ wǒ men lái xìn suǒ yào miǎn fèi yàng pǐn.
english: Thousands of people have written in to us for a free sample.

hanzi: 在工厂后面的荒地上突然长出了草木。
pinyin: zài gōng chǎng hòu mian de huāng dì shàng tū rán zhǎng chū le cǎo mù。
english: Greenery has sprouted out in the waste land behind the factory.

hanzi: 在实验室能够繁殖细菌和其他生物.
pinyin: zài shí yàn shì néng gòu fán zhí xì jūn huò qí tā shēng wù.
english: It is possible to multiply bacteria and other living organisms in the laboratory.

hanzi: 为这样的小事辞职未免愚蠢而轻率。
pinyin: wèi zhè yàng de xiǎo shì cí zhí wèi miǎn yú chǔn ér qīng shuài。
english: It would be foolish and impetuous to resign over such a trivial matter.

hanzi: 她驾车小心地从这条很多石头的小路上驶过去。
pinyin: tā jià chē xiǎo xīn de zòng zhè tiáo hěn duō shí tou de xiǎo lù shàng shǐ guò qu。
english: She drives carefully up the rocky lane.

hanzi: 蒙难地，蒙难时刻使人受巨大折磨的事例或地方
pinyin: měng nàn de， měng nàn shí kè shǐ rén shòu jù dà zhé mo de shì lì huò dì fang
english: An instance or a place of great suffering.

hanzi: 修路费已削减到不能再减的最低限度了.
pinyin: xiū lù fèi yǐ xuē jiǎn dào bù néng zài jiǎn de zuì dī xiàn dù le.
english: Expenditure on road repairs has been cut to an irreducible minimum.

hanzi: 对有些人来说, 吸毒是一种逃避现实的手段.
pinyin: duì yǒu xiē rén lái shuō,  xī dú shì yī zhòng táo bì xiàn shí de shǒu duàn.
english: Drug-taking is a form of escapism for some people.

hanzi: 史密斯先生有时屈尊帮他的妻子做家务。
pinyin: shǐ mì sī xiān sheng yǒu shí qū zūn bāng tā de qī zi zuò jiā wù。
english: Mr. Smith sometimes condescends to help his wife with the housework.

hanzi: 政府拨款给这家公司使其免于破产。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ bō kuǎn jǐ zhè jiā gōng sī shǐ qí miǎn yú pò chǎn。
english: The government has rescued the firm from bankruptcy by giving them a grant.

hanzi: 那个国家现在正处于军事独裁统治之下。
pinyin: nèi gè guó jiā xiàn zài zhèng chǔ yú jūn shì dú cái tǒng zhì zhī xià。
english: That country is now living under a military dictatorship.

hanzi: 早期的飞行器是木头和胶粘合的脆弱机器.
pinyin: zǎo qī de fēi xíng qì shì mù tou huò jiāo zhān hé de cuì ruò jī qì.
english: Early aircraft were insubstantial constructions of wood and glue.

hanzi: 经过长时间的辩论，下议院通过了议案。
pinyin: jīng guò zhǎng shí jiān de biàn lùn， xià yì yuàn tōng guò le yì àn。
english: After a long debate, the house of commons approved the bill.

hanzi: 这件要事不容耽搁，我们必须现在谈谈。
pinyin: zhè jiàn yào shì bù róng dān ge， wǒ men bì xū xiàn zài tán tán。
english: This important matter brooks no delay. We must talk about it now.

hanzi: 我庆幸自己不必在天气这样恶劣的夜晚外出.
pinyin: wǒ qìng xìng zì jǐ bù bì zài tiān qì zhè yàng è liè de yè wǎn wài chū.
english: I'm glad I don't have to go out on such a dirty night.

hanzi: 他设法抓住悬崖表面向外伸出的岩石.
pinyin: tā shè fǎ zhuā zhù xuán yá biǎo miàn xiàng wài shēn chū de yán shí.
english: He managed to hang on to a piece of rock protruding from the cliff face.

hanzi: 那样的天气情况打消了任何打猎的念头。
pinyin: nà yàng de tiān qì qíng kuàng dǎ xiāo le rèn hé dǎ liè de niàn tou。
english: The weather conditions ruled out any chance of hunting that day.

hanzi: 那个目光敏锐的警察发现了那辆被盗的汽车.
pinyin: nèi gè mù guāng mǐn ruì de jǐng chá fā xiàn le nà liàng bèi dào de qì chē.
english: A ,sharp-eyed police officer spotted the stolen car.

hanzi: 近来有几起毒品走私活动被检举立案.
pinyin: jìn lái yǒu jǐ qǐ dú pǐn zǒu sī huó dòng bèi jiǎn jǔ lì àn.
english: There have been several successful prosecutions for drug smuggling recently.

hanzi: 政治和宗教是人们平常交谈的主要话题。
pinyin: zhèng zhì huò zōng jiào shì rén men píng cháng jiāo tán de zhǔ yào huà tí。
english: Politics and religion are daily topics of conversation.

hanzi: 我部队在临河高地上占据了防御阵地.
pinyin: wǒ bù duì zài Lín hé gāo dì shàng zhàn jù le fáng yù zhèn dì.
english: Our troops took up defensive positions on high ground overlooking the river.

hanzi: 发表这个声明只是为了提高他个人的威信。
pinyin: fā biǎo zhè gè shēng míng zhǐ shì wèi le tí gāo tā gè rén de wēi xìn。
english: The statement was aimed at raising his personal prestige.

hanzi: 我以为他会变好。但事实上，他愈变愈糟。
pinyin: wǒ yǐ wéi tā huì biàn hào。 dàn shì shí shàng， tā yù biàn yù zāo。
english: I thought he would get better. As it is, he is getting worse.

hanzi: 摄政者在他的国家推行了一套先进的制度。
pinyin: shè zhèng zhě zài tā de guó jiā tuī xíng le yī tào xiān jìn de zhì dù。
english: The regent carried out an advanced system in his country.

hanzi: 警察搜索了在周围六英里以内的树林各处。
pinyin: jǐng chá sōu suǒ le zài zhōu wéi liù yīng lǐ yǐ nèi de shù lín gè chù。
english: The police searched all the woods within a six-mile radius.

hanzi: 那篇文章不甚乐观, 暗示将无改进.
pinyin: nà piān wén zhāng bù shèn lè guān,  àn shì jiàng wú gǎi jìn.
english: The article struck a pessimistic note; it suggested there would be no improvement.

hanzi: 我每天尽量腾出一些时间锻炼一下身体.
pinyin: wǒ měi tiān jìn liàng téng chū yī xiē shí jiān duàn liàn yī xià shēn tǐ.
english: I try to set aside a few minutes each day to do some exercises.

hanzi: 他最好的乐曲创作灵感来自怀念他的母亲。
pinyin: tā zuì hǎo de yuè qǔ chuàng zuò líng gǎn lái zì huái niàn tā de mǔ qīn。
english: His best music was inspired by the memory of his mother.

hanzi: 他的儿子已成长为一个健壮勤劳的小伙子。
pinyin: tā de ér zi yǐ chéng zhǎng wèi yī gè jiàn zhuàng qín láo de xiǎo huǒ zi。
english: His son has grown up into a sturdy hardworking young man.

hanzi: 世界上大多数大城市都交通堵塞为患。
pinyin: shì jiè shàng dà duō shù dà chéng shì dōu jiāo tōng dǔ sè wèi huàn。
english: Most of the important cities of the world suffer from traffic jam.

hanzi: 我要是你就不参加了，他的计划似乎不妥当。
pinyin: wǒ yào shì nǐ jiù bù cān jiā le， tā de jì huà sì hu bù tuǒ dàng。
english: I should lie off if I were you, his scheme doesn't seem sound.

hanzi: 这名记者因为试图揭露一个阴谋而被杀害。
pinyin: zhè míng jì zhě yīn wèi shì tú jiē lù yī gè yīn móu ér bèi shā hài。
english: The reporter was killed because he tried to expose a plot.

hanzi: 请把这些卡片按次序放好，别把它们搅乱了。
pinyin: qǐng bǎ zhè xie kǎ piàn àn cì xù fàng hào， biè bǎ tā men jiǎo luàn le。
english: Please keep the cards in sequence; don't mix them up.

hanzi: 我们应该始终牢记日本是一个好战的国家。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi shǐ zhōng láo jì Rì běn shì yī gè hào zhàn de guó jiā。
english: We should always remember that Japan is a martial nation.

hanzi: 根据解剖结果，此人死于心脏病发作。
pinyin: gēn jù jiě pōu jié guǒ， cǐ rén sǐ yú xīn zàng bìng fā zuò。
english: According to the result of the dissection, the man died from heart attack.

hanzi: 有些人一直密谋想让老板把秘书解雇。
pinyin: yǒu xiē rén yī zhí mì móu xiǎng ràng lǎo bǎn bǎ mì shū jiě gù。
english: Some of the members had been intriguing to get the secretary dismissed.

hanzi: 遵照你的要求我们已将建议撤销.
pinyin: zūn zhào nǐ de yāo qiú wǒ men yǐ jiàng jiàn yì chè xiāo.
english: In compliance with your wishes (ie As you have requested) we have withdrawn our suggestion.

hanzi: 保险金额此类合同规定的保险的金额或比例
pinyin: bǎo xiǎn jīn é cǐ lèi hé tong guī dìng de bǎo xiǎn de jīn é huò bǐ lì
english: The sum or rate for which such a contract insures something.

hanzi: 集资的困难使我们的建筑计划受到了阻碍。
pinyin: jí zī de kùn nan shǐ wǒ men de jiàn zhù jì huà shòu dào le zǔ ài。
english: Difficulties in raising money have set back our building program.

hanzi: 我现在需要的是一个幸福家庭所给予的安全感。
pinyin: wǒ xiàn zài xū yào de shì yī gè xìng fú jiā tíng suǒ gěi yǔ de ān quán gǎn。
english: What I need now is the security of a happy home.

hanzi: 威尔非常专心读书, 以至于没有吃晚餐。
pinyin: wēi ěr fēi cháng zhuān xīn dú shū,  yǐ zhì yú méi yǒu jí wǎn cān。
english: Will was so absorbed in reading that he went without his dinner.

hanzi: 这些村子里的农民常常以实物偿付帐单。
pinyin: zhè xie cūn zi lǐ de nóng mín cháng cháng yǐ shí wù cháng fù zhàng dān。
english: Farmers in these small villages often pay their bills in kind.

hanzi: 她讲话中一再强调的就是需要削减开支.
pinyin: tā jiǎng huà zhòng yī zài qiáng diào de jiù shì xū yào xuē jiǎn kāi zhī.
english: The leitmotiv of her speech was the need to reduce expenditure.

hanzi: 她请你, 你要是不回个信儿就可能把她得罪了.
pinyin: tā qǐng nǐ,  nǐ yào shì bù huí gè xìn er jiù kě néng bǎ tā dé zuì le.
english: She may be offended if you don't reply to her invitation.

hanzi: 看到战争造成的荒凉，他感到触目惊心。
pinyin: kàn dào zhàn zhēng zào chéng de huāng liáng， tā gǎn dào chù mù jīng xīn。
english: He felt startled when he saw the desolation caused by war.

hanzi: 舰队司令乘直升机视察他所指挥的军舰。
pinyin: jiàn duì sī lìng chéng zhí shēng jī shì chá tā suǒ zhǐ huī de jūn jiàn。
english: The admiral visit the ships under his command by helicopter.

hanzi: 有些报纸刊登出生, 婚姻, 死亡的通告.
pinyin: yǒu xiē bào zhǐ kān dēng chū shēng,  hūn yīn,  sǐ wáng de tōng gào.
english: Announcements of births, marriages and deaths appear in some newspapers.

hanzi: 那孩子已死去多时, 我对其面容仍记忆犹新.
pinyin: nà hái zi yǐ sǐ qù duō shí,  wǒ duì qí miàn róng réng jì yì yóu xīn.
english: The image of the dead child's face stuck in my mind for ages.

hanzi: 如果领子不牢稳，你最好用别针把它别住。
pinyin: rú guǒ lǐng zi bù láo wěn， nǐ zuì hǎo yòng bié zhēn bǎ tā biè zhù。
english: If the collar won't stay in place, you'd better pin it back.

hanzi: 尽管他已经八十多岁了，看上去还很健壮。
pinyin: jǐn guǎn tā yǐ jīng bā shí duō suì le， kàn shàng qù huán hěn jiàn zhuàng。
english: Although he is over eighty, he looks hale and healthy.

hanzi: 着迷愚蠢的，非理性的或过分的激情或迷恋
pinyin: zháo mí yú chǔn de， fēi lǐ xìng de huò guò fèn de jī qíng huò mí liàn
english: A foolish, unreasoning, or extravagant passion or attraction.

hanzi: 请书面申报你在国外购买的全部商品。
pinyin: qǐng shū miàn shēn bào nǐ zài guó wài gòu mǎi de quán bù shāng pǐn。
english: Please make a written declaration of all the goods you bought abroad.

hanzi: 在对他进行评审时，你应该考虑到他还年轻。
pinyin: zài duì tā jìn xíng píng shěn shí， nǐ yīng gāi kǎo lu:4 dào tā huán nián qīng。
english: In judging him you should consider his youth.

hanzi: 您可以将您的贵重物品放在旅馆的保险柜里。
pinyin: nín kě yǐ jiàng nín de guì zhòng wù pǐn fàng zài lu:3 guǎn de bǎo xiǎn jǔ lǐ。
english: You may deposit your valuables in the hotel safe.

hanzi: 她女儿的漂亮眼睛是来自她的部分遗传特征。
pinyin: tā nu:3 ér de piào liang yǎn jīng shì lái zì tā de bù fen yí chuán tè zhēng。
english: Her daughter's bonny eyes are parts of her heredity.

hanzi: 手绣的丝制手帕在西方市场销路很好。
pinyin: shǒu xiù de sī zhì shǒu pà zài xī fāng shì chǎng xiāo lù hěn hǎo。
english: Silk handkerchiefs embroidered by hand sell well in the Western market.

hanzi: 在那里驻扎大量军队会有一定的危险性。
pinyin: zài nà li zhù zhā dà liàng jūn duì kuài yǒu yī dìng de wēi xiǎn xìng。
english: Stationing large forces there would involve a considerable risk.

hanzi: 我记得感到上帝或某人把我们凑合在一起。
pinyin: wǒ jì de gǎn dào shàng dì huò mǒu rén bǎ wǒ men còu hé zài yī qǐ。
english: I remember feeling that God, or someone, had brought us together.

hanzi: 那个文件柜中的发票是按日期顺序整理好的。
pinyin: nèi gè wén jiàn jǔ zhòng dì fā piào shì àn rì qī shùn xù zhěng lǐ hǎo de。
english: That filing cabinet contain invoice ordered by date.

hanzi: 这些批评意见已修改得缓和些以免得罪人.
pinyin: zhè xie pī píng yì jiàn yǐ xiū gǎi de huǎn hé xiē yǐ miǎn dé zuì rén.
english: The criticisms had been watered down so as not to offend anybody.

hanzi: 他并没有把这首诗的意义真正揭示出来.
pinyin: tā bìng méi yǒu bǎ zhè shǒu shī de yì yì zhēn zhèng jiē shì chū lai.
english: The meaning of the poem doesn't really come out in his interpretation.

hanzi: 他有个主意，以纯白为背景给他们拍摄。
pinyin: tā yǒu gè zhǔ yi， yǐ chún bái wèi bèi jǐng jǐ tā men pāi shè。
english: He had the idea of shooting them against a complete plain white background.

hanzi: 她抬起头来，凝望着十二月份阴沉沉的天空。
pinyin: tā tái qǐ tou lái， níng wàng zhuó shí èr yuè fèn yīn chén chén de tiān kōng。
english: She looked up staring at the sombre December sky.

hanzi: 他随著年龄的增长, 弹钢琴的次数越来越少了.
pinyin: tā suí著 nián líng de zēng zhǎng,  tán gāng qín de cì shù yuè lái yuè shào le.
english: He played the piano less and less as he grew older.

hanzi: 警方为搜索毒品把那个俱乐部彻底搜查了一遍.
pinyin: jǐng fāng wèi sōu suǒ dú pǐn bǎ nèi gè jù yuè bù chè dǐ sōu chá le yī biàn.
english: Police shook the club down, looking for narcotics.

hanzi: 对世界领袖的正直无私的普通尊敬的瓦解
pinyin: duì shì jiè lǐng xiù de zhèng zhí wú sī de pǔ tōng zūn jìng de wǎ jiě
english: The collapse of popular respect for the integrity of world leaders.

hanzi: 他要求他们把他著作的销售情况随时告诉他。
pinyin: tā yāo qiú tā men bǎ tā著 zuò de xiāo shòu qíng kuàng suí shí gào su tā。
english: He ask them to keep him posted about the sale of his book.

hanzi: 若要争执获得解决, 双方就要互相让步.
pinyin: ruò yào zhēng zhí huò dé jiě jué,  shuāng fāng jiù yào hù xiāng ràng bù.
english: If the dispute is to be resolved there must be some give and take.

hanzi: 他们预见到天快黑了, 就都带上了手电筒.
pinyin: tā men yù jiàn dào tiān kuài hēi le,  jiù dōu dài shàng le shǒu diàn tǒng.
english: Anticipating that it would soon be dark, they all took torches.

hanzi: 在他们的欢呼声中, 他把杯子里的啤酒一饮而尽。
pinyin: zài tā men de huān hū shēng zhòng,  tā bǎ bēi zi lǐ de pí jiǔ yī yǐn ér jìn。
english: He drank off a glass of beer amid their cheers.

hanzi: 也许太空的智慧生物已经访问过地球。
pinyin: yě xǔ tài kōng de zhì huì shēng wù yǐ jīng fǎng wèn guò dì qiú。
english: Maybe the earth has been visited by intelligent creatures from outer space.

hanzi: 拍摄危险的场景时, 这位大明星有个替身.
pinyin: pāi shè wēi xiǎn de chǎng jǐng shí,  zhè wèi dà míng xīng yǒu gè tì shēn.
english: Another man stands in for the big star in the dangerous scenes.

hanzi: 我们得简化手续才能将你的签证及时办妥.
pinyin: wǒ men de jiǎn huà shǒu xù cái néng jiàng nǐ de qiān zhèng jí shí bàn tuǒ.
english: We've had to cut a few corners to get your visa ready in time.

hanzi: 我们得简化手续才能将你的签证及时办妥.
pinyin: wǒ men de jiǎn huà shǒu xù cái néng jiàng nǐ de qiān zhèng jí shí bàn tuǒ.
english: We've had to cut a few corners to get your visa ready in time.

hanzi: 那位职员用算盘将上周的花销计算出来。
pinyin: nà wèi zhí yuán yòng suàn pán jiàng shàng zhōu de huā xiāo jì suàn chū lai。
english: The clerk reckoned the expenditure last week with an abacus.

hanzi: 我的朋友告诉我她住的地方文化生活贫乏。
pinyin: wǒ de péng you gào su wǒ tā zhù de dì fang wén huà shēng huó pín fá。
english: My friend told me that the place she live is a cultural wasteland.

hanzi: 他抬眼凝视着头顶上方星光闪烁的天空。
pinyin: tā tái yǎn níng shì zhuó tou dǐng shàng fāng xīng guāng shǎn shuò de tiān kōng。
english: He stared up at the stars twinkling in the sky above him.

hanzi: 火山灰火山爆发喷射出来的粉末状颗粒物质
pinyin: huǒ shān huī huǒ shān bào fā pēn shè chū lai de fěn mò zhuàng kē lì wù zhì
english: Pulverized particulate matter ejected by volcanic eruption.

hanzi: 校长斥责那个学生不该接二连三地迟到。
pinyin: xiào zhǎng chì zé nèi gè xué sheng bù gāi jiē èr lián sān de chí dào。
english: The principal reprimand the student for his chronic lateness.

hanzi: 科学家推算出宇宙飞船抵达月球的时间。
pinyin: kē xué jiā tuī suàn chū yǔ zhòu fēi chuán dǐ dá yuè qiú de shí jiān。
english: The scientists calculated when the spacecraft would reach the moon.

hanzi: 他的行为毫无理智，我认为他一定是疯了。
pinyin: tā de xíng wéi háo wú lǐ zhì， wǒ rèn wéi tā yī dìng shì fēng le。
english: His action are so irrational that I think he must be off his chump.

hanzi: 你竟当着别人面前告诉他，实在很不机智。
pinyin: nǐ jìng dàng zhuó bié rén miàn qián gào su tā， shí zài hěn bù jī zhì。
english: It wasn't very tactful of you to tell him in front of others.

hanzi: 要照出清晰的照片，就要把焦点对准物体。
pinyin: yào zhào chū qīng xī de zhào piàn， jiù yào bǎ jiāo diǎn duì zhǔn wù tǐ。
english: Bring the object into focus if you want a sharp photograph.

hanzi: 从上个世纪以来人们一直耕种着这块土地。
pinyin: zòng shàng gè shì jì yǐ lái rén men yī zhí gēng zhòng zhuó zhè kuài tǔ dì。
english: This land has been in cultivation since the last century.

hanzi: 鉴于这些事实，一个专门委员会被委任。
pinyin: jiàn yú zhè xie shì shí， yī gè zhuān mén wěi yuán huì bèi wěi rèn。
english: In view of these facts, one the specialized commission is appointed.

hanzi: 这个地区淹了水，这是台风时经常发生的。
pinyin: zhè gè dì qū yān le shuǐ， zhè shì tái fēng shí jīng cháng fā shēng de。
english: The area is flooded, as frequently happens during the typhoon.

hanzi: 星期五之前我必须把这两本书归还图书馆。
pinyin: xīng qī wǔ zhī qián wǒ bì xū bǎ zhè liǎng běn shū guī huán tú shū guǎn。
english: I must give back the two books to the library before Friday.

hanzi: 他们预见到天快黑了, 就都带上了手电筒.
pinyin: tā men yù jiàn dào tiān kuài hēi le,  jiù dōu dài shàng le shǒu diàn tǒng.
english: Anticipating that it would soon be dark, they all took torches.

hanzi: 缺乏营养耗尽，由于缺乏营养或活力而造成的
pinyin: quē fá yíng yǎng hào jìn， yóu yú quē fá yíng yǎng huò huó lì ér zào chéng de
english: Exhaustion, as from lack of nourishment or vitality.

hanzi: 哨站，岗位如卫兵或哨兵的指派的站岗位置
