pinyin: shào zhàn， gǎng wèi rú wèi bīng huò shào bīng de zhǐ pài de zhàn gǎng wèi zhi
english: An assigned position or station, as of a guard or sentry.

hanzi: 他猛然把那纸翻过来，看背面写着什么。
pinyin: tā měng rán bǎ nà zhǐ fān guò lai， kàn bèi miàn xiě zhuó shén me。
english: He flipped over the piece of paper to see what was written on the back.

hanzi: 我们大家可以一起走--假定其他人不耽搁的话.
pinyin: wǒ men dà jiā kě yǐ yī qǐ zǒu-- jiǎ dìng qí tā rén bù dān ge de huà.
english: We can all leave together assuming (that) the others aren't late.

hanzi: 压抑自然的冲动可能会引起心理上的问题。
pinyin: yā yì zì rán de chōng dòng kě néng kuài yǐn qǐ xīn lǐ shàng de wèn tí。
english: Inhibition of natural impulses may cause psychological problems.

hanzi: 工厂的扩展意味著将增雇六十名工人.
pinyin: gōng chǎng de kuò zhǎn yì wèi著 jiàng zēng gù liù shí míng gōng rén.
english: The expansion of the factory will mean the employment of sixty extra workers.

hanzi: 我们只好匆忙找套房子--没有时间挑选了.
pinyin: wǒ men zhǐ hǎo cōng máng zhǎo tào fáng zi-- méi yǒu shí jiān tiāo xuǎn le.
english: We had to find a flat in a hurry there was no time to pick and choose.

hanzi: 恐怖分子只有在某些条件下才释放人质.
pinyin: kǒng bù fèn zǐ zhǐ yǒu zài mǒu xiē tiáo jiàn xià cái shì fàng rén zhì.
english: The terrorists will only release their hostages on certain conditions.

hanzi: 那套有你亲手绣着我们名字的浴巾美极了。
pinyin: nà tào yǒu nǐ qīn shǒu xiù zhuó wǒ men míng zi de yù jīn měi jí le。
english: The set of bath towels you personally monogrammed for us is beautiful.

hanzi: 一场火烧毁了他开的店，他的事业就此完蛋。
pinyin: yī chǎng huǒ shāo huǐ le tā kāi de diàn， tā de shì yè jiù cǐ wán dàn。
english: His business was done in by a fire that burned down his store.

hanzi: 在以后的岁月中，他一直记着她临别时的一吻。
pinyin: zài yǐ hòu de suì yuè zhòng， tā yī zhí jì zhuó tā lín biè shí de yī wěn。
english: He remembered her parting kiss in the following years.

hanzi: 有些尚未查明的势力正在活动图谋推翻政府.
pinyin: yǒu xiē shàng wèi chá míng de shì li zhèng zài huó dòng tú móu tuī fān zhèng fǔ.
english: Unknownforces were at work to overthrow the government.

hanzi: 一场火烧毁了他开的店，他的事业就此完蛋。
pinyin: yī chǎng huǒ shāo huǐ le tā kāi de diàn， tā de shì yè jiù cǐ wán dàn。
english: His business was done in by a fire that burned down his store.

hanzi: 他在总统竞选中曾以改革者的姿态出现。
pinyin: tā zài zǒng tǒng jìng xuǎn zhòng zēng yǐ gǎi gé zhě de zī tài chū xiàn。
english: He have project himself as a reformer in the presidential campaign.

hanzi: 他擦去试卷上的铅笔笔迹然后递给了老师。
pinyin: tā cā qù shì juàn shàng de qiān bǐ bǐ jī rán hòu dì jǐ le lǎo shī。
english: He erased pencil marks form the test paper and handed to the teacher.

hanzi: 请遵守我们的协议，给我们调换损坏的货物。
pinyin: qǐng zūn shǒu wǒ men de xié yì， jǐ wǒ men diào huàn sǔn huài de huò wù。
english: Please honor our arrangement by exchanging the damaged goods.

hanzi: 我们雇用了一家广告公司来推销我们的产品。
pinyin: wǒ men gù yòng le yī jiā guǎng gào gōng sī lái tuī xiāo wǒ men de chǎn pǐn。
english: We hired an advertising company for help to sell our product.

hanzi: 他虽竭尽全力，但仍然未能将那石头搬起来。
pinyin: tā suī jié jìn quán lì， dàn réng rán wèi néng jiàng nà shí tou bān qǐ lai。
english: He failed to lift the rock in spite of all his exertions.

hanzi: 这些宏伟的宫殿给外宾们留下了深刻的印象。
pinyin: zhè xie hóng wěi de gōng diàn jǐ wài bīn men liú xià le shēn kè de yìn xiàng。
english: These magnificent palaces impressed the foreigners deeply.

hanzi: 还没有装订成册的论文稿件堆放在桌子上。
pinyin: huán méi yǒu zhuāng dìng chéng cè de lùn wén gǎo jiàn duī fàng zài zhuō zi shàng。
english: The unbound sheets of paper were piled up on the table.

hanzi: 他惯常坐在桌旁的位置被一个陌生人占据了。
pinyin: tā guàn cháng zuò zài zhuō páng de wèi zhi bèi yī gè mò shēng rén zhàn jù le。
english: His habitual place at the table was occupied by a stranger.

hanzi: 他的许多困难都是因为他的知识的贫乏而产生的。
pinyin: tā de xǔ duō kùn nan dōu shì yīn wèi tā de zhī shi de pín fá ér chǎn shēng de。
english: His difficulties issue from his lack of knowledge.

hanzi: 我们经济的决定性因素是控制通货膨胀。
pinyin: wǒ men jīng jì de jué dìng xìng yīn sù shì kòng zhì tōng huò péng zhàng。
english: The determinate factor of our economy is to control inflation.

hanzi: 总裁的年龄甚至是比他的一些雇员还小。
pinyin: zǒng cái de nián líng shèn zhì shì bì tā de yī xiē gù yuán huán xiǎo。
english: The president was so young that he was junior to some of his employees.

hanzi: 若时机不当, 一言不慎, 可能毁掉整个计画.
pinyin: ruò shí jī bù dàng,  yī yán bù shèn,  kě néng huǐ diào zhěng gè jì huà.
english: One indiscreet remark at the wrong moment could ruin the whole plan.

hanzi: 我的叔叔虽然老了，但他看上去还是很健壮。
pinyin: wǒ de shū shu suī rán lǎo le， dàn tā kàn shàng qù hái shì hěn jiàn zhuàng。
english: Although my uncle is old, he looks very strong and healthy.

hanzi: 参加协商的人花了十个小时才敲定一桩生意。
pinyin: cān jiā xié shāng de rén huā le shí gè xiǎo shí cái qiāo dìng yī zhuāng shēng yi。
english: It take the negotiator ten hours to nail down a deal.

hanzi: 在他的酒类收藏中有一些名贵的陈年葡萄酒。
pinyin: zài tā de jiǔ lèi shōu cáng zhòng yǒu yī xiē míng guì de chén nián pú tao jiǔ。
english: He have some rare old vintage in his collection of wine.

hanzi: 我正巧路过，所以我想不妨进来坐几分钟。
pinyin: wǒ zhèng qiǎo lù guò， suǒ yǐ wǒ xiǎng bù fāng jìn lái zuò jǐ fēn zhōng。
english: I was just passing, so I thought I'd blow in for a few minutes.

hanzi: 付给医院医疗费是有违她的社会主义原则的.
pinyin: fù jǐ yī yuàn yī liáo fèi shì yǒu wéi tā de shè huì zhǔ yì yuán zé de.
english: Paying for hospital treatment goes against her socialist principles.

hanzi: 这个公司今年亏损巨大，有可能倒闭。
pinyin: zhè gè gōng sī jīn nián kuī sǔn jù dà， yǒu kě néng dǎo bì。
english: The company has made gigantic losses this year, and will probably be out of business.

hanzi: 这些美丽的古老宫殿是我们民族遗产的一部分。
pinyin: zhè xie měi lì de gǔ lǎo gōng diàn shì wǒ men mín zú yí chǎn de yī bù fen。
english: These beautiful old palaces are part of our national heritage.

hanzi: 这位律师正在为明天法庭审理的案件做准备。
pinyin: zhè wèi lu:4 shī zhèng zài wèi míng tiān fǎ tíng shěn lǐ de àn jiàn zuò zhǔn bèi。
english: The solicitor is preparing a case in the court tomorrow.

hanzi: 夏季游人成群结队到博物馆和艺术馆参观。
pinyin: xià jì yóu rén chéng qún jié duì dào bó wù guǎn huò yì shù guǎn cān guān。
english: In the summer, tourists flock to the museums and art galleries.

hanzi: 烤面包片，煎面包片一种烤的或油煎的脆面包片
pinyin: kǎo miàn bāo piàn， jiān miàn bāo piàn yī zhòng kǎo de huò yóu jiān de cuì miàn bāo piàn
english: A small crisp piece of toasted or fried bread.

hanzi: 税率低而政府支出大, 结果出现预算赤字.
pinyin: shuì shuài dī ér zhèng fǔ zhī chū dà,  jié guǒ chū xiàn yù suàn chì zì.
english: Tax was low and state spending was high, resulting in a budget deficit.

hanzi: 该杂志对防务内幕的透露引起了极大的关注。
pinyin: gāi zá zhì duì fáng wù nèi mù de tòu lù yǐn qǐ le jí dà de guān zhù。
english: The magazine's disclosure of defense secrets caused great attention.

hanzi: 福斯特先生不能接受你的宴请，深表歉意。
pinyin: fú sī tè xiān sheng bù néng jiē shòu nǐ de yàn qǐng， shēn biǎo qiàn yì。
english: Mr Foster is sorry that he cannot accept your invitation to dinner.

hanzi: 她未曾想发牢骚无形中反倒帮了彼得的忙.
pinyin: tā wèi zēng xiǎng fà láo sāo wú xíng zhòng fǎn dào bāng le Bǐ dé de máng.
english: She didn't realize that by complaining she was only playing Peter's game.

hanzi: 对他来说，要得到那份工作，文凭是很重要的。
pinyin: duì tā lái shuō， yào dé dào nà fèn gōng zuò， wén píng shì hěn zhòng yào de。
english: The diploma is very important for him to get the job.

hanzi: 她最新的一套唱片是她的最佳单曲唱片的汇集.
pinyin: tā zuì xīn de yī tào chàng piàn shì tā de zuì jiā dān qǔ chàng piàn de huì jí.
english: Her latest album is a compilation of all her best singles.

hanzi: 她有个新生婴儿要照看, 活动难免受些限制.
pinyin: tā yǒu gè xīn shēng yīng ér yào zhào kàn,  huó dòng nán miǎn shòu xiē xiàn zhì.
english: Having a new baby to look after has clipped her wings a bit.

hanzi: 该诗仍然享有版权, 因此你必须支付引用费.
pinyin: gāi shī réng rán xiǎng yǒu bǎn quán,  yīn cǐ nǐ bì xū zhī fù yǐn yòng fèi.
english: The poem is still under copyright, so you have to pay to quote it.

hanzi: 她应该在附近贴几张寻找狗狗的悬赏公告。
pinyin: tā yīng gāi zài fù jìn tiē jǐ zhāng xún zhǎo gǒu gǒu de xuán shǎng gōng gào。
english: She should post rewards around the neighborhood for finding it.

hanzi: 女老前辈一个团体中最年长或地位最高的女性
pinyin: nu:3 lǎo qián bèi yī gè tuán tǐ zhòng zuì nián zhǎng huò dì wèi zuì gāo de nu:3 xìng
english: A woman who is the eldest or senior member of a group.

hanzi: 她宁可辞职也不愿参与这种不正当的买卖.
pinyin: tā nìng kě cí zhí yě bù yuàn cān yù zhè zhǒng bù zhèng dāng de mǎi mài.
english: She would sooner resign than take part in such dishonest business deals.

hanzi: 例如，我们的一艘货轮上星期在台风中沉了。
pinyin: lì rú， wǒ men de yī sōu huò lún shàng xīng qī zài tái fēng zhòng chén le。
english: For instance, one of our cargo ships sank last week in typhoon.

hanzi: 我妻子如往日一般身着盛装从楼上走了下来。
pinyin: wǒ qī zi rú wǎng rì yì bān shēn zhuó shèng zhuāng zòng lóu shàng zǒu le xia lai。
english: Down came my wife dressed out in all her former splendour.

hanzi: 执政党在补缺选举中落选，是一极大挫折。
pinyin: zhí zhèng dǎng zài bǔ quē xuǎn jǔ zhòng luò xuǎn， shì yī jí dà cuò zhé。
english: Defeat in the by-election is a major set-back to the ruling party.

hanzi: 该诗仍然享有版权, 因此你必须支付引用费.
pinyin: gāi shī réng rán xiǎng yǒu bǎn quán,  yīn cǐ nǐ bì xū zhī fù yǐn yòng fèi.
english: The poem is still under copyright, so you have to pay to quote it.

hanzi: 执政党在补缺选举中落选，是一极大挫折。
pinyin: zhí zhèng dǎng zài bǔ quē xuǎn jǔ zhòng luò xuǎn， shì yī jí dà cuò zhé。
english: Defeat in the by-election is a major set-back to the ruling party.

hanzi: 在这个贫穷的地区，他的贵族气派显得很可笑。
pinyin: zài zhè gè pín qióng de dì qū， tā de guì zú qì pài xiǎn de hěn kě xiào。
english: His aristocratic manners seemed ridiculous in this poor area.

hanzi: 他已经把填好的表格连同你的汇款一并寄回了。
pinyin: tā yǐ jīng bǎ tián hǎo de biǎo gé lián tóng nǐ de huì kuǎn yī bìng jì huí le。
english: He has returned the completed form with your remittance.

hanzi: 他若继续摆弄那钟表，那非把它弄坏不可。
pinyin: tā ruò jì xù bǎi nòng nà zhōng biǎo， nà fēi bǎ tā nòng huài bù kě。
english: If he keeps fiddling with the clock, he is sure to put it out of order.

hanzi: 老先生喜欢喜欢给头发擦上发膏使它光亮。
pinyin: lǎo xiān sheng xǐ huan xǐ huan jǐ tóu fa cā shàng fà gāo shǐ tā guāng liàng。
english: The old gentleman likes to put grease on his hair to make it shiny.

hanzi: 这部词典的销售量是去年同季度的两倍.
pinyin: zhè bù cí diǎn de xiāo shòu liàng shì qù nián tóng jì dù de liǎng bèi.
english: Sales of the dictionary are twice what they were in the same quarter last year.

hanzi: 这是一次严重的撞车事故，但幸好无人死亡。
pinyin: zhè shì yī cì yán zhòng de zhuàng chē shì gù， dàn xìng hǎo wú rén sǐ wáng。
english: It was a bad crash, but fortunately there were no fatalities.

hanzi: 感谢您使我们把枯燥的学习变成了巨大的乐趣。
pinyin: gǎn xiè nín shǐ wǒ men bǎ kū zào de xué xí biàn chéng le jù dà de lè qù。
english: Thank you for making learning not a dull thing but a great joy.

hanzi: 她在枪上留下的指纹就是她犯罪的确凿证据.
pinyin: tā zài qiāng shàng liú xià de zhǐ wén jiù shì tā fàn zuì dí què zuò zhèng jù.
english: Her fingerprints on the gun were conclusive proof of her guilt.

hanzi: 对销售额的仔细分析显示出明显的地区差别。
pinyin: duì xiāo shòu é de zǐ xì fēn xī xiǎn shì chū míng xiǎn de dì qū chā bié。
english: Close analysis of sales figures showed clear regional variations.

hanzi: 你或许有权要求退回去年你交付的部分税金。
pinyin: nǐ huò xǔ yǒu quán yāo qiú tuì huí qu nián nǐ jiāo fù de bù fen shuì jīn。
english: You may be entitled to reclaim some of the tax you paid last year.

hanzi: 他的行动不仅没有缓和局势，反而加剧了局势。
pinyin: tā de xíng dòng bù jǐn méi yǒu huǎn hé jú shì， fǎn ér jiā jù le jú shì。
english: Rather than relieving the situation, his action aggravated it.

hanzi: 我对一直放在走廊里的那个包裹有些怀疑。
pinyin: wǒ duì yī zhí fàng zài zǒu láng lǐ de nèi gè bāo guǒ yǒu xiē huái yí。
english: I'm a bit suspicious about the package that's been left in the corridor.

hanzi: 你或许有权要求退回去年你交付的部分税金。
pinyin: nǐ huò xǔ yǒu quán yāo qiú tuì huí qu nián nǐ jiāo fù de bù fen shuì jīn。
english: You may be entitled to reclaim some of the tax you paid last year.

hanzi: 他在气力方面和我相等, 但在智力方面却不如我。
pinyin: tā zài qì lì fāng miàn huò wǒ xiāng děng,  dàn zài zhì lì fāng miàn què bù rú wǒ。
english: He equals me in strength but not in intelligence.

hanzi: 很多人都说犯罪与贫穷是密切相关的.
pinyin: hěn duō rén dōu shuō fàn zuì yù pín qióng shì mì qiè xiāng guān de.
english: Many would say that crime and poverty interrelate/are interrelated (with one another).

hanzi: 他在气力方面和我相等, 但在智力方面却不如我。
pinyin: tā zài qì lì fāng miàn huò wǒ xiāng děng,  dàn zài zhì lì fāng miàn què bù rú wǒ。
english: He equals me in strength but not in intelligence.

hanzi: 妙语，俏皮话经常是即兴说出的机智风趣的话语
pinyin: miào yù， qiào pí huà jīng cháng shì jí xìng shuō chū de jī zhì fēng qù de huà yù
english: A clever, witty remark often prompted by the occasion.

hanzi: 不扣除的不扣除的，尤指为所得税的目的而不扣除的
pinyin: bù kòu chú de bù kòu chú de， yóu zhǐ wèi suǒ dé shuì de mù dì ér bù kòu chú de
english: Not deductible, especially for income-tax purposes.

hanzi: 影片捕捉到了医院里沉著而自信的气氛.
pinyin: yǐng piàn bǔ zhuō dào le yī yuàn lǐ chén著 ér zì xìn de qì fēn.
english: The film captured (ie described very well) the mood of quiet confidence at the hospital.

hanzi: 那艘损坏的船只在海岛沿岸航行以寻找港口。
pinyin: nà sōu sǔn huài de chuán zhī zài hǎi dǎo yán àn háng xíng yǐ xún zhǎo gǎng kǒu。
english: The disabled ship coasted the island, looking for a harbor.

hanzi: 警方封锁了这个区域直至拆除炸弹的引信为止。
pinyin: jǐng fāng fēng suǒ le zhè gè qū yù zhí zhì chāi chú zhà dàn de yǐn xìn wéi zhǐ。
english: Police cordoned off the area until the bomb was defused.

hanzi: 警方封锁了这个区域直至拆除炸弹的引信为止。
pinyin: jǐng fāng fēng suǒ le zhè gè qū yù zhí zhì chāi chú zhà dàn de yǐn xìn wéi zhǐ。
english: Police cordoned off the area until the bomb was defused.

hanzi: 那种新汽车因有机械缺陷只好撤出市场.
pinyin: nà zhòng xīn qì chē yīn yǒu jī xiè quē xiàn zhǐ hǎo chè chū shì chǎng.
english: The new car had to be withdrawn from the market because of a mechanical defect.

hanzi: 一旦你掌握了煎蛋饼的技巧, 做起来就很容易了.
pinyin: yī dàn nǐ zhǎng wò le jiān dàn bǐng de jì qiǎo,  zuò qǐ lai jiù hěn róng yì le.
english: Making an omelette is easy once you've got the knack (of it).

hanzi: 银行直到签字得到了确认才兑现了这张支票
pinyin: yín háng zhí dào qiān zì dé dào le què rèn cái duì xiàn le zhè zhāng zhī piào
english: The bank refused to cash the check until the signature was verified.

hanzi: 经劝说, 他们签署了放弃向房东索赔的权利.
pinyin: jīng quàn shuō,  tā men qiān shǔ le fàng qì xiàng fáng dōng suǒ péi de quán lì.
english: They were persuaded to sign a waiver of claims against the landlord.

hanzi: 他只是带着那种奇特的神情死死地盯着她看。
pinyin: tā zhǐ shì dài zhuó nà zhòng qí tè de shén qíng sǐ sǐ de dīng zhuó tā kàn。
english: He simply stared at her with that peculiar expression on his face.

hanzi: 法院准予公司有两周的延缓执行判决的时间。
pinyin: fǎ yuàn zhǔn yǔ gōng sī yǒu liǎng zhōu de yán huǎn zhí xíng pàn jué de shí jiān。
english: The court granted the company a two weeks stay of execution.

hanzi: 那个编辑在一篇社论中恶毒地攻击了反对派。
pinyin: nèi gè biān jí zài yī piān shè lùn zhòng è dú de gōng jī le fǎn duì pài。
english: The editor got his claws into the opposition in a vicious editorial.

hanzi: 经劝说, 他们签署了放弃向房东索赔的权利.
pinyin: jīng quàn shuō,  tā men qiān shǔ le fàng qì xiàng fáng dōng suǒ péi de quán lì.
english: They were persuaded to sign a waiver of claims against the landlord.

hanzi: 这孩子偷偷摸摸地溜出了屋子, 走向游泳池。
pinyin: zhè hái zi tōu tōu mó mó de liū chū le wū zi,  zǒu xiàng yóu yǒng chí。
english: The boy slipped out of the room and headed for the swimming pool secretly.

hanzi: 他向警方隐瞒实情而并未感到十分不妥.
pinyin: tā xiàng jǐng fāng yǐn mán shí qíng ér bìng wèi gǎn dào shí fēn bù tuǒ.
english: He had/felt no serious qualms about concealing the information from the police.

hanzi: 我们的销售方法得力, 超过主要对手几个等级.
pinyin: wǒ men de xiāo shòu fāng fǎ dé lì,  chāo guò zhǔ yào duì shǒu jǐ ge děng jí.
english: Our marketing methods put us several steps ahead of our main rivals.

hanzi: 过敏症专家过敏症诊断和治疗的专科医生
pinyin: guò mǐn zhèng zhuān jiā guò mǐn zhèng zhěn duàn huò zhì liáo de zhuān kē yī shēng
english: A physician specializing in the diagnosis and treatment of allergies.

hanzi: 不扣除的不扣除的，尤指为所得税的目的而不扣除的
pinyin: bù kòu chú de bù kòu chú de， yóu zhǐ wèi suǒ dé shuì de mù dì ér bù kòu chú de
english: Not deductible, especially for income-tax purposes.

hanzi: 那个腿部受伤致残的士兵正沉浸在悲哀之中。
pinyin: nèi gè tuǐ bù shòu shāng zhì cán de shì bīng zhèng chén jìn zài bēi āi zhī zhōng。
english: The soldier disabled by wounds in his leg is buried in sadness.

hanzi: 过敏症专家过敏症诊断和治疗的专科医生
pinyin: guò mǐn zhèng zhuān jiā guò mǐn zhèng zhěn duàn huò zhì liáo de zhuān kē yī shēng
english: A physician specializing in the diagnosis and treatment of allergies.

hanzi: 他邀请我们到他乡下的庄园去过一次打猎的周末。
pinyin: tā yāo qǐng wǒ men dào tā xiāng xià de zhuāng yuán qù guò yī cì dǎ liè de zhōu mò。
english: He invited us to his country estate for a weekend shoot.

hanzi: 她两次被派到国外在国际博览会上作表演。
pinyin: tā liǎng cì bèi pài dào guó wài zài guó jì bó lǎn huì shàng zuò biǎo yǎn。
english: She has twice been sent abroad to demonstrate at international fairs.

hanzi: 作曲者把这个曲子随便哼了一会儿，看看行不行。
pinyin: zuò qǔ zhě bǎ zhè gè qǔ zi suí biàn hng le yī huìr， kàn kan xìng bù xíng。
english: The composer kicked the music around for a while, trying it out.

hanzi: 很多著名的流行音乐歌星都因使用毒品而毁了自己。
pinyin: hěn duō著 míng de liú xíng yīn yuè gē xīng dōu yīn shǐ yòng dú pǐn ér huǐ le zì jǐ。
english: Many a famous pop star has been ruined by drugs.

hanzi: 一切想维护殖民主义的企图都是注定要失败的。
pinyin: yī qiè xiǎng wéi hù zhí mín zhǔ yì de qǐ tú dōu shì zhù dìng yào shī bài de。
english: All attempts to bolster up colonialism are bound to fail.

hanzi: 我不会抛弃你，我对你一向是诚心诚意的。
pinyin: wǒ bù huì pāo qì nǐ， wǒ duì nǐ yí xiàng shì chéng xīn chéng yì de。
english: I'm not going to throw you over. I've always been on the square with you.

hanzi: 他有个很能干的伙伴，替他把一切弄得井井有条。
pinyin: tā yǒu gè hěn néng gàn de huǒ bàn， tì tā bǎ yī qiè nòng de jǐng jǐng yǒu tiáo。
english: He has a practical partner who organizes everything for him.

hanzi: 我已写信订购我在报纸广告上看到的那种灯泡.
pinyin: wǒ yǐ xiě xìn dìng gòu wǒ zài bào zhǐ guǎng gào shàng kàn dào de nà zhòng dēng pào.
english: I've sent off for those bulbs I saw advertised in the paper.

hanzi: 本市的市民举行了盛大的晚会庆祝他们的胜利。
pinyin: běn shì de shì mín jǔ xíng le shèng dà de wǎn huì qìng zhù tā men de shèng lì。
english: People in the city held a great party to celebrate their victory.

hanzi: 出示确凿的证据之后，对方不得不作出让步。
pinyin: chū shì què záo de zhèng jù zhī hòu， duì fāng bù dé bù zuò chū ràng bù。
english: After being shown conclusive evidence, the other side had to back down.

hanzi: 多吃些水果, 少摄入些蛋白质, 使饮食均衡合理.
pinyin: duō jí xiē shuǐ guǒ,  shào shè rù xiē dàn bái zhí,  shǐ yǐn shí jūn héng hé lǐ.
english: Try to balance your diet by eating more fruit and less protein.

hanzi: 政府停发研究经费让他们的计画半途而废.
pinyin: zhèng fǔ tíng fà yán jiū jīng fèi ràng tā men de jì huà bàn tú ér fèi.
english: The government put the skids under the plan by stopping their research grant.

hanzi: 该独裁者发布命令，将其生日定为公众假期。
pinyin: gāi dú cái zhě fā bù mìng lìng， jiàng qí shēng rì dìng wèi gōng zhòng jià qī。
english: The dictator decreed that his birthday would be a public holiday.

hanzi: 他邀请我们到他乡下的庄园去过一次打猎的周末。
pinyin: tā yāo qǐng wǒ men dào tā xiāng xià de zhuāng yuán qù guò yī cì dǎ liè de zhōu mò。
english: He invited us to his country estate for a weekend shoot.

hanzi: 将军推测说敌人将于今天晚上突袭我们。
pinyin: jiāng jūn tuī cè shuō dí rén jiàng yú jīn tiān wǎn shang tū xí wǒ men。
english: The general conjectures that the enemy will launch an attack against us this night.

hanzi: 现在大多数国家的儿童受到无微不至的关怀。
pinyin: xiàn zài dà duō shù guó jiā de ér tóng shòu dào wú wēi bù zhì de guān huái。
english: The children have the best of care in most of the countries now.

hanzi: 这个记者很想知道那位官员是否涉及此案。
pinyin: zhè gè jì zhě hěn xiǎng zhī dào nà wèi guān yuán shì fǒu shè jí cǐ àn。
english: The reporter is curious to know whether the official is involved in the case.

hanzi: 我们的父母在战争期间有两次被炸弹炸得无家可归。
pinyin: wǒ men de fù mǔ zài zhàn zhēng qī jiān yǒu liǎng cì bèi zhà dàn zhà de wú jiā kě guī。
english: Our parents were bombed out twice during the war.

hanzi: 新的道路系统可使车辆在任何时候都畅通无阻.
pinyin: xīn de dào lù xì tǒng kě shǐ chē liàng zài rèn hé shí hou dōu chàng tōng wú zǔ.
english: The new road system permits the free flow of traffic at all times.

hanzi: 他作曲家和指挥家的双重身份使他非常繁忙。
pinyin: tā zuò qǔ jiā huò zhǐ huī jiā de shuāng chóng shēn fèn shǐ tā fēi cháng fán máng。
english: His dual role as a composer and a conductor made him very busy.

hanzi: 颤音两个相距一个音或半个音的音的迅速交替
pinyin: zhàn yīn liǎng gè xiàng jù yī gè yīn huò bàn gè yīn de yīn de xùn sù jiāo tì
english: The rapid alternation of two tones either a whole or a half tone apart.

hanzi: 警方必须竭尽全力追捕罪犯，将他们绳之以法。
pinyin: jǐng fāng bì xū jié jìn quán lì zhuī bǔ zuì fàn， jiàng tā men shéng zhī yǐ fǎ。
english: The police must do all they can to bring criminals to justice.

hanzi: 这家杂志刊登了一个中学生所写的短篇小说。
pinyin: zhè jiā zá zhì kān dēng le yī gè zhōng xué shēng suǒ xiě de duǎn piān xiǎo shuō。
english: The magazine publish a short story write by a high school student.

hanzi: 官方尚未就总统的健康状况发表公告.
pinyin: guān fāng shàng wèi jiù zǒng tǒng de jiàn kāng zhuàng kuàng fā biǎo gōng gào.
english: There has been no official pronouncement yet on the state of the president's health.

hanzi: 这家人持有可以证明他们享有所有权的文件.
pinyin: zhè jiā rén chí yǒu kě yǐ zhèng míng tā men xiǎng yǒu suǒ yǒu quán de wén jiàn.
english: The family possessed documents that proved their right to ownership.

hanzi: 在暴动中，农奴们以赤手空拳对付钢枪铁炮。
pinyin: zài bào dòng zhòng， nóng nú men yǐ chì shǒu kòng quán duì fu gāng qiāng tiě pào。
english: In the uprising the serfs fought with bare hands against gunfire.

hanzi: 在这座大城市里寻找一个人犹如大海捞针.
pinyin: zài zhè zuò dà chéng shì lǐ xún zhǎo yī gè rén yóu rú dà hǎi lāo zhēn.
english: Searching for one man in this big city is like looking for a needle in a haystack.

hanzi: 我们有个协议，不向对方的顾客出售货物。
pinyin: wǒ men yǒu gè xié yì， bù xiàng duì fāng de gù kè chū shòu huò wù。
english: There is an understanding between us that we will not sell to each other's customers.

hanzi: 让我们达成切实可行的协议以尽快开始工作.
pinyin: ràng wǒ men dá chéng qiè shí kě xíng de xié yì yǐ jǐn kuài kāi shǐ gōng zuò.
english: Let's have a clear no-nonsense agreement to start work as soon as possible.

hanzi: 把指明用于城镇建设的钱冻结起来的地方官
pinyin: bǎ zhǐ míng yòng yú chéng zhèn jiàn shè de qián dòng jié qǐ lai de dì fang guān
english: A governor who impounded monies designated for the use of cities and towns.

hanzi: 警方搜索了在周围六英里以内的树林各处.
pinyin: jǐng fāng sōu suǒ le zài zhōu wéi liù yīng lǐ yǐ nèi de shù lín gè chù.
english: Police searched all the woods within a six-mile radius/within a radius of six miles.

hanzi: 她反复地给孩子们说，他们不可以独自横过马路。
pinyin: tā fǎn fù de jǐ hái zi men shuō， tā men bù kě yǐ dú zì héng guò mǎ lù。
english: She drummed it into the children that they must not cross the road alone.

hanzi: 他并不是病得不能来工作，他只是在泡病号。
pinyin: tā bìng bù shì bìng de bù néng lái gōng zuò， tā zhǐ shì zài pào bìng hào。
english: He's not so ill that he can't come to work; he's just swinging the lead.

hanzi: 候选人须 表明他们对单方面裁军所持的立场.
pinyin: hòu xuǎn rén xū  biǎo míng tā men duì shàn fāng miàn cái jūn suǒ chí de lì chǎng.
english: The candidates had to state their position on unilateral disarmament.

hanzi: 伤风败俗的与公认的正派的或谨慎的标准有冲突的
pinyin: shāng fēng bài sú de yù gōng rèn de zhèng pài de huò jǐn shèn de biāo zhǔn yǒu chōng tū de
english: Offensive to accepted standards of decency or modesty.

hanzi: 他们刷了一层油漆以防止船只被海水氧化。
pinyin: tā men shuà le yī céng yóu qī yǐ fáng zhǐ chuán zhī bèi hǎi shuǐ yǎng huà。
english: They painted a coat of paint to prevent the oxidation of the ship by seawater.

hanzi: 在我们这个时代先进人物正在大量地涌现出来。
pinyin: zài wǒ men zhè gè shí dài xiān jìn rén wù zhèng zài dà liàng de yǒng xiàn chū lai。
english: Advanced figures are emerging in multitude in this era of ours.

hanzi: 他们刷了一层油漆以防止船只被海水氧化。
pinyin: tā men shuà le yī céng yóu qī yǐ fáng zhǐ chuán zhī bèi hǎi shuǐ yǎng huà。
english: They painted a coat of paint to prevent the oxidation of the ship by seawater.

hanzi: 我们为在村中保留一所学校这一权利进行请愿.
pinyin: wǒ men wèi zài cūn zhòng bǎo liú yī suǒ xué xiào zhè yī quán lì jìn xíng qǐng yuàn.
english: We're petitioning for our right to keep a school in our village.

hanzi: 这个独裁者把所有反对他的活动均视为非法加以镇压.
pinyin: zhè gè dú cái zhě bǎ suǒ yǒu fǎn duì tā de huó dòng jūn shì wéi fēi fǎ jiā yǐ zhèn yā.
english: The dictator represses all opposition as illegal.

hanzi: 到第二天早上，我们那些快死的秧苗又挺立起来。
pinyin: dào dì èr tiān zǎo shang， wǒ men nà xiē kuài sǐ de yāng miáo yòu tǐng lì qǐ lai。
english: By the next morning our dying seedlings were standing upright.

hanzi: 这一税收制度一旦施行，必定会危害国民经济。
pinyin: zhè yī shuì shōu zhì dù yī dàn shī xíng， bì dìng kuài wēi hài guó mín jīng jì。
english: This tax can not be introduced without detriment to the economy.

hanzi: 她在今年奥运会女子马拉松赛跑中赢得金牌.
pinyin: tā zài jīn nián Aò yùn huì nu:3 zǐ mǎ lá sōng sài pǎo zhòng yíng dé jīn pái.
english: She won the gold medal in the women's marathon at this year's Olympic Games.

hanzi: 你最好变换一下饮食，不要总吃同样的东西。
pinyin: nǐ zuì hǎo biàn huàn yī xià yǐn shí， bù yào zǒng jí tóng yàng de dōng xi。
english: It's better to vary your diet rather than eat the same things all the time.

hanzi: 英格兰队某些主力运动员受伤而使攻球削弱.
pinyin: yīng gé lán duì mǒu xiē zhǔ lì yùn dòng yuán shòu shāng ér shǐ gōng qiú xuē ruò.
english: England's attack has been weakened by the injury of certain key players.

hanzi: 国际法这一领域, 不熟悉其复杂性则寸步难行.
pinyin: guó jì fǎ zhè yī lǐng yù,  bù shú xī qí fù zá xìng zé cùn bù nàn xìng.
english: International law is a minefield for anyone not familiar with its complexity.

hanzi: 我与彼得情思未断之际, 却遇上了哈里又生恋情.
pinyin: wǒ yù Bǐ dé qíng sī wèi duàn zhī jì,  què yù shàng le hǎ lǐ yòu shēng liàn qíng.
english: I was still getting over Peter when I met and fell in love with Harry.

hanzi: 人们聚集起来，组成国民自卫队来保卫他们的城镇。
pinyin: rén men jù jí qǐ lai， zǔ chéng guó mín zì wèi duì lái bǎo wèi tā men de chéng zhèn。
english: People gathered to form a militia to protect their town.

hanzi: 现在他们在完成定额方面不再落在别人后面了。
pinyin: xiàn zài tā men zài wán chéng dìng é fāng miàn bù zài luò zài bié rén hòu mian le。
english: Now they no longer fall behind the others in meeting their quotas.

hanzi: 她挑拨两个对手相争, 自己却获得了那份工作.
pinyin: tā tiǎo bō liǎng gè duì shǒu xiàng zhēng,  zì jǐ què huò dé le nà fèn gōng zuò.
english: She played her two rivals off against each other and got the job herself.

hanzi: 行政国家在行使其权力或义务过程中的活动
pinyin: xíng zhèng guó jiā zài xíng shǐ qí quán lì huò yì wù guò chéng zhòng dì huó dòng
english: The activity of a sovereign state in the exercise of its powers or duties.

hanzi: 该项预测展望经济前景暗淡, 因而股票价格大跌.
pinyin: gāi xiàng yù cè zhǎn wàng jīng jì qián jǐng àn dàn,  yīn ér gǔ piào jià gé dà diē.
english: Share prices plunged as a result of the gloomy economic forecast.

hanzi: 冷疗法一种在医疗中局部或全部使用低温的方法
pinyin: lěng liáo fǎ yī zhòng zài yī liáo zhòng jú bù huò quán bù shǐ yòng dī wēn de fāng fǎ
english: The local or general use of low temperatures in medical therapy.

hanzi: 多年的研究工作未能找到医治这种疾病的疗法.
pinyin: duō nián de yán jiū gōng zuò wèi néng zhǎo dào yī zhì zhè zhǒng jí bìng de liáo fǎ.
english: Years of research work have failed to produce a cure for the disease.

hanzi: 她在乡村图书展销会上买到一本珍贵的首版书。
pinyin: tā zài xiāng cūn tú shū zhǎn xiāo kuài shàng mǎi dào yī běn zhēn guì de shǒu bǎn shū。
english: She picked up a valuable first edition at a village book sale.

hanzi: 不过现在它们已经被改建，用作库房或粮仓了。
pinyin: bù guò xiàn zài tā men yǐ jīng bèi gǎi jiàn， yòng zuò kù fáng huò liáng cāng le。
english: But now they have been adapted for use as storehouses or granaries.

hanzi: 这个地方笼罩在神秘气氛下，继续使游览者着迷。
pinyin: zhè gè dì fang lǒng zhào zài shén mì qì fēn xià， jì xù shǐ yóu lǎn zhě zháo mí。
english: The place continues to fascinate visitors, cloaked in its mystery.

hanzi: 大群大群的人聚集到监狱外面，表示他们的关切。
pinyin: dà qún dà qún de rén jù jí dào jiān yù wài mian， biǎo shì tā men de guān qiè。
english: Huge crowds gathered outside the prison to demonstrate their concern.

hanzi: 士兵们在山腰上成扇形散开，搜索那个男人。
pinyin: shì bīng men zài shān yāo shàng chéng shàn xíng sàn kāi， sōu suǒ nèi gè nán rén。
english: The soldiers fanned out across the hillside in their search for the man.

hanzi: 在这儿为你们举行盛大的宴会是我们极大的愉快。
pinyin: zài zhèr wèi nǐ men jǔ xíng shèng dà de yàn huì shì wǒ men jí dà de yú kuài。
english: It's a great happiness to us to have a grand banquet in your honour here.

hanzi: 她干起活来倒是相当不错, 不过有时需要加以督促.
pinyin: tā gàn qǐ huó lái dào shì xiāng dāng bù cuò,  bù guò yǒu shí xū yào jiā yǐ dū cù.
english: She is a fairly good worker, but she needs prodding occasionally.

hanzi: 由于他打死了不少狼，他享有模范猎手的称号。
pinyin: yóu yú tā dǎ sǐ le bù shǎo láng， tā xiǎng yǒu mó fàn liè shǒu de chēng hào。
english: He holds the title of model hunter for the number of wolves he has killed.

hanzi: 甚至他最知己的朋友也劝阻他去寻求更高的职位。
pinyin: shèn zhì tā zuì zhī jǐ de péng you yě quàn zǔ tā qù xún qiú gèng gāo de zhí wèi。
english: Even his closest friends discouraged him from seeking higher office.

hanzi: 甚至他最知己的朋友也劝阻他去寻求更高的职位。
pinyin: shèn zhì tā zuì zhī jǐ de péng you yě quàn zǔ tā qù xún qiú gèng gāo de zhí wèi。
english: Even his closest friends discouraged him from seeking higher office.

hanzi: 该项预测展望经济前景暗淡，因而股票价格大跌。
pinyin: gāi xiàng yù cè zhǎn wàng jīng jì qián jǐng àn dàn， yīn ér gǔ piào jià gé dà diē。
english: Share price plunge as a result of the gloomy economic forecast.

hanzi: 非教派的不受宗教派别约束的或与宗教别无联系的
pinyin: fēi jiào pài de bù shòu zōng jiào pài bié yuē shù de huò yù zōng jiào bié wú lián xì de
english: Not restricted to or associated with a religious denomination.

hanzi: 非教派的不受宗教派别约束的或与宗教别无联系的
pinyin: fēi jiào pài de bù shòu zōng jiào pài bié yuē shù de huò yù zōng jiào bié wú lián xì de
english: Not restricted to or associated with a religious denomination.

hanzi: 看到我的生日礼物受到极大的赞赏，我感到高兴。
pinyin: kàn dào wǒ de shēng rì lǐ wù shòu dào jí dà de zàn shǎng， wǒ gǎn dào gāo xìng。
english: I was gratified to see how much my birthday present was appreciated.

hanzi: 我们大多数人必须为某种理由阅读若干的资料。
pinyin: wǒ men dà duō shù rén bì xū wèi mǒu zhǒng lǐ yóu yuè dú ruò gān de zī liào。
english: Most of us have to read a certain amount of material for one reason or another.

hanzi: 她仗著她那些有钱的亲戚而不必工作, 得以坐享清福.
pinyin: tā zhàng著 tā nà xiē yǒu qián de qīn qi ér bù bì gōng zuò,  dé yǐ zuò xiǎng qīng fú.
english: She avoided having to work by battening on her rich relatives.

hanzi: 为了预防回来以前天就黑了，所以他带着手电筒。
pinyin: wèi le yù fáng huí lai yǐ qián tiān jiù hēi le， suǒ yǐ tā dài zhū shǒu diàn tǒng。
english: He took a flashlight lest it should get dark before he returned.

hanzi: 横跨结构，桥，渡口横跨或横渡的地方或使用的工具
pinyin: héng kuà jié gòu， qiáo， dù kǒu héng kuà huò hèng dù de dì fang huò shǐ yòng de gōng jù
english: A place at which or the means by which a crossing is made.

hanzi: 她干起活来倒是相当不错，不过有时需要加以督促。
pinyin: tā gàn qǐ huó lái dào shì xiāng dāng bù cuò， bù guò yǒu shí xū yào jiā yǐ dū cù。
english: She is a fairly good worker, but she needs prod occasionally.

hanzi: 参加打猎者打猎中的跟随着一群猎狗的全体骑马猎人
pinyin: cān jiā dǎ liè zhě dǎ liè zhòng dì gēn suí zhuó yī qún liè gǒu de quán tǐ qí mǎ liè rén
english: The body of riders following a pack of hounds in hunting.

hanzi: 她将放在冰箱里的一些残余食物拼凑成一餐饭。
pinyin: tā jiàng fàng zài bīng xiāng lǐ de yī xiē cán yú shí wù pīn còu chéng yī cān fàn。
english: He made a meal of the odds and ends that were left in the refrigerator.

hanzi: 一种尚未搞清的病虫害突然侵袭了这一带的庄稼。
pinyin: yī zhòng shàng wèi gǎo qīng de bìng chóng hài tū rán qīn xí le zhè yī dài de zhuāng jia。
english: An unknown disease suddenly attacked the crops in this area.

hanzi: 组织这样大规模的聚会要花费许多时间和精力。
pinyin: zǔ zhī zhè yàng dà guī mó de jù huì yào huā fèi xǔ duō shí jiān huò jīng lì。
english: The organization of such a large-scale party takes a lot of time and energy.

hanzi: 法院匆促做出的不公正裁决使这次审判形同儿戏.
pinyin: fǎ yuàn cōng cù zuò chū de bù gōng zhèng cái jué shǐ zhè cì shěn pàn xíng tóng er xì.
english: The unfair and hasty decision of the court made a mockery of the trial.

hanzi: 要想有效控制住犯罪活动, 就得加强法制的威力.
pinyin: yào xiǎng yǒu xiào kòng zhì zhù fàn zuì huó dòng,  jiù de jiā qiáng fǎ zhì de wēi lì.
english: The law must be given more teeth if crime is to be properly controlled.

hanzi: 他急切地取食物，因为从黎明开始，他一直没吃东西。
pinyin: tā jí qiè de qǔ shí wù， yīn wèi zòng lí míng kāi shǐ， tā yī zhí mò jí dōng xi。
english: He took the food eagerly, for he had eaten nothing since dawn.

hanzi: 有些新车在投放市场前没有进行行驶性检验。
pinyin: yǒu xiē xīn jū zài tóu fàng shì chǎng qián méi yǒu jìn xíng xíng shǐ xìng jiǎn yàn。
english: Some new cars are not given road tests before they are put on the market.

hanzi: 不论何时我到台北，我一定去参观故宫博物院。
pinyin: bù lùn hé shí wǒ dào Tái běi， wǒ yī dìng qù cān guān gù gōng bó wù yuàn。
english: Whenever I go to Taipei, I make a point of visiting the National Palace Museum.

hanzi: 他真是愚蠢，竟会拒绝做那份名报的新闻记者。
pinyin: tā zhēn shì yú chǔn， jìng kuài jù jué zuò nà fèn míng bào de xīn wén jì zhě。
english: It is stupid of him to refuse a job as a reporter on that well known newspaper.

hanzi: 玩具火车的客车车厢用专门的挂钩挂上了机车。
pinyin: wán jù huǒ chē de kè chē chē xiāng yòng zhuān mén de guà gōu guà shàng le jī chē。
english: The carriages of the toy train lock onto the toy train with a special hook.

hanzi: 第二天早上我发现秧苗挺立着，一点也没损坏。
pinyin: dì èr tiān zǎo shang wǒ fā xiàn yāng miáo tǐng lì zhuó， yī diǎn yě mò sǔn huài。
english: The next morning I found the shoots standing up straight, not bit damaged.

hanzi: 所有经济部门都遭受到这次汇率下跌带来的损失。
pinyin: suǒ yǒu jīng jì bù mén dōu zāo shòu dào zhè cì huì lu:4 xià diē dài lái de sǔn shī。
english: All sector of the economy suffer from the fall in the exchange rate.

hanzi: 法院匆促做出的不公正裁决使这次审判形同儿戏.
pinyin: fǎ yuàn cōng cù zuò chū de bù gōng zhèng cái jué shǐ zhè cì shěn pàn xíng tóng er xì.
english: The unfair and hasty decision of the court made a mockery of the trial.

hanzi: 他是个优秀的运动员，他所有的动作都非常协调。
pinyin: tā shì gè yōu xiù de yùn dòng yuán， tā suǒ yǒu de dòng zuò dōu fēi cháng xié tiáo。
english: He is an excellent athlete; all his movements are perfectly coordinated.

hanzi: 惊险故事连载每一集都在悬念中结束的情节剧连载
pinyin: jīng xiǎn gù shì lián zài měi yī jí dōu zài xuán niàn zhòng jié shù de qíng jié jù lián zài
english: A melodramatic serial in which each episode ends in suspense.

hanzi: 如果能把这篇文章登在你的期刊上我将很高兴。
pinyin: rú guǒ néng bǎ zhè piān wén zhāng dēng zài nǐ de qī kān shàng wǒ jiàng hěn gāo xìng。
english: I should be glad if you could insert this article into your periodical.

hanzi: 这些大森林的毁坏会带来生态上的严重后果。
pinyin: zhè xie dà sēn lín de huǐ huài kuài dài lái shēng tài shàng de yán zhòng hòu guǒ。
english: The destruction of these big forests could have serious ecological consequences.

hanzi: 人不同于野兽，因前者能笑，而后者却不能。
pinyin: rén bù tóng yú yě shòu， yīn qián zhě néng xiào， ér hòu zhě què bù néng。
english: Man differs from beasts in that the former is able to laugh, while the latter aren't.

hanzi: 有些电视节目的用意是要今天观赏，明天忘掉。
pinyin: yǒu xiē diàn shì jié mù de yòng yì shì yào jīn tiān guān shǎng， míng tiān wàng diào。
english: Some TV programs are meant to be watched today and forgotten tomorrow.

hanzi: 每逢他晚归, 妻子总要追问他晚上到哪里去了.
pinyin: měi féng tā wǎn guī,  qī zi zǒng yào zhuī wèn tā wǎn shang dào nǎ li qù le.
english: Whenever he comes in late his wife cross-examines him about where he's spent the evening.

hanzi: 让死者有那不朽的名，但让生者有那不朽的爱。
pinyin: ràng sǐ zhě yǒu nà bù xiǔ de míng， dàn ràng shēng zhě yǒu nà bù xiǔ de ài。
english: Let the dead have the immortality of fame, but the living the immortality of love.

hanzi: 先知先觉的人们自称在某个领域受过特别启示的人
pinyin: xiān zhī xiān jué de rén men zì chēng zài mǒu gè lǐng yù shòu guò tè bié qǐ shì de rén
english: People claiming to be unusually enlightened with regard to a subject.

hanzi: 根据英国法律，一个人未经证实有罪仍视为无罪。
pinyin: gēn jù Yīng guó fǎ lu:4， yī gè rén wèi jīng zhèng shí yǒu zuì réng shì wéi wú zuì。
english: In English law a man is accounted innocent until he is proved guilty.

hanzi: 这一设计图纸还未画出就被认为不实用而遭废弃。
pinyin: zhè yī shè jì tú zhǐ huán wèi huà chū jiù bèi rèn wéi bù shí yòng ér zāo fèi qì。
english: The design is scrubbed at the drawing board stage as being impractical.

hanzi: 在补偿贸易中，付款以货物而不是用外汇进行。
pinyin: zài bǔ cháng mào yì zhòng， fù kuǎn yǐ huò wù ér bú shì yòng wài huì jìn xíng。
english: In compensation trade payment is made by goods and not by for deign exchange.

hanzi: 哪怕是出了再小的差错，老板也会对他横加斥责。
pinyin: nǎ pà shì chū le zài xiǎo de chā cuò， lǎo bǎn yě kuài duì tā hèng jiā chì zé。
english: His boss will jump on every little mistake he makes, no matter how trivial.

hanzi: 公路干线遭水淹没，我们只得择乡间小径绕行。
pinyin: gōng lù gàn xiàn zāo shuǐ yān mò， wǒ men zhǐ dé zhái xiāng jiàn xiǎo jìng rào xìng。
english: The main road was flooded so we had to go round by narrow country lanes.

hanzi: 当他们的祖父去世时，巨大的悲伤笼罩了他们的生活。
pinyin: dàng tā men de zǔ fù qù shì shí， jù dà de bēi shāng lǒng zhào le tā men de shēng huó。
english: When their grandfather died a great sadness filled their lives.

hanzi: 多个数据对象的结构化汇集，以形成一种数据类型。
pinyin: duō gè shù jù duì xiàng de jié gòu huà huì jí， yǐ xíng chéng yī zhòng shù jù lèi xíng。
english: A structured collection of data objects, forming a data type.

hanzi: 公路干线遭水淹没，我们只得择乡间小径绕行。
pinyin: gōng lù gàn xiàn zāo shuǐ yān mò， wǒ men zhǐ dé zhái xiāng jiàn xiǎo jìng rào xìng。
english: The main road was flooded so we had to go round by narrow country lanes.

hanzi: 公共汽车可能早到, 因此我们得稳妥点, 现在就动身.
pinyin: gōng gòng qì chē kě néng zǎo dào,  yīn cǐ wǒ men de wěn tuǒ diǎn,  xiàn zài jiù dòng shēn.
english: The bus might be early, so we'd better play safe and leave now.

hanzi: 经理企图以解雇来威胁，迫使职工更卖力气。
pinyin: jīng lǐ qǐ tú yǐ jiě gù lái wēi xié， pò shǐ zhí gōng gèng mài lì qì。
english: The manager tried to bully his men into working harder by threatening them with dismissal.

hanzi: 我们之间产生了一连串的误解, 因而关系紧张了.
pinyin: wǒ men zhī jiān chǎn shēng le yī lián chuàn de wù jiě,  yīn ér guān xi jǐn zhāng le.
english: Relations between us have become frayed through a series of misunderstandings.

hanzi: 你心地真好，在我出差期间照顾我年迈的外婆。
pinyin: nǐ xīn de zhēn hào， zài wǒ chū chāi qī jiān zhào gu wǒ nián mài de wài pó。
english: It's very noble of you to look after my old grandmother when I was out for business.

hanzi: 我要是找到了那小子，我饶不了他，你看他做的这事。
pinyin: wǒ yào shì zhǎo dào le nà xiǎo zi， wǒ ráo bù liǎo tā， nǐ kàn tā zuò de zhè shì。
english: I'll take that boy apart when I find him: look what he's done now.

hanzi: 感谢盛情款待，已安全到达并转告关心此事的朋友。
pinyin: gǎn xiè shèng qíng kuǎn dài， yǐ ān quán dào dá bìng zhuǎn gào guān xīn cǐ shì de péng you。
english: Thanks for hospitality arrival safely inform friend regard.

hanzi: 这些新的事实连同其他证据已证明在押者无罪.
pinyin: zhè xie xīn de shì shí lián tóng qí tā zhèng jù yǐ zhèng míng zài yā zhě wú zuì.
english: These new facts, together with the other evidence, prove the prisoner's innocence.

hanzi: 他是个优秀的运动员，他所有的动作都非常协调。
pinyin: tā shì gè yōu xiù de yùn dòng yuán， tā suǒ yǒu de dòng zuò dōu fēi cháng xié tiáo。
english: He is an excellent athlete; all his movements are perfectly coordinated.

hanzi: 在那个国家的少数民族的国籍问题上仍有争论。
pinyin: zài nèi gè guó jiā de shǎo shù mín zú de guó jí wèn tí shàng réng yǒu zhēng lùn。
english: The nationality of the minority groups in that country is still at issue.

hanzi: 因为地震，每天飞往这个城市的航班暂停了。
pinyin: yīn wèi dì zhèn， měi tiān fēi wàng zhè gè chéng shì de háng bān zàn tíng le。
english: The daily flight to the city has been temporarily suspended because of the earthquake.

hanzi: 引出推论的表达推论的或置于推论前面的，用来修饰词语
pinyin: yǐn chū tuī lùn de biǎo dá tuī lùn de huò zhì yú tuī lùn qián mian de， yòng lái xiū shì cí yǔ
english: Expressing or preceding an inference. Used of a word.

hanzi: 他们进行反对特权的斗争以便建立较为公平的社会.
pinyin: tā men jìn xíng fǎn duì tè quán de dòu zhēng yǐ biàn jiàn lì jiào wèi gōng píng de shè huì.
english: They fought against privilege in order to create a fairer society.

hanzi: 票据交换结算总额票据交换所中每天进行的交易总额
pinyin: piào jù jiāo huàn jié suàn zǒng é piào jù jiāo huàn suǒ zhòng měi tiān jìn xíng de jiāo yì zǒng é
english: The total of claims presented daily at a clearing-house.

hanzi: 新近发生的这一悲惨事件使药品厂商受到指控.
pinyin: xīn jìn fā shēng de zhè yī bēi cǎn shì jiàn shǐ yào pǐn chǎng shāng shòu dào zhǐ kòng.
english: This recent tragedy has put the manufacturersof the drug squarely in the dock.

hanzi: 警方声称这男子是被谋杀的，但未提出任何证据。
pinyin: jǐng fāng shēng chēng zhè nán zǐ shì bèi móu shā de， dàn wèi tí chū rèn hé zhèng jù。
english: The police alleged that the man was murdered but they have given no proof.

hanzi: 政府力求今年把通货膨胀率再减低百分之二.
pinyin: zhèng fǔ lì qiú jīn nián bǎ tōng huò péng zhàng shuài zài jiǎn dī bǎi fēn zhī èr.
english: The government will be looking to reduce inflation by a further two per cent this year.

hanzi: 夺标者如在拳击赛中与优胜者或冠军对抗的人，
pinyin: duó biāo zhě rú zài quán jī sài zhòng yù yōu shèng zhě huò guàn jūn duì kàng de rén，
english: One who competes against the holder of a title or championship, as in boxing.

hanzi: 他相信，教育不应该是某一限定人数的特权。
pinyin: tā xiāng xìn， jiào yù bù yīng gāi shì mǒu yī xiàn dìng rén shù de tè quán。
english: It is his belief that education should not be the privilege of a limited number of people.

hanzi: 你要努力打开新产品的销路--市场上竞争很激烈.
pinyin: nǐ yào nǔ lì dǎ kāi xīn chǎn pǐn de xiāo lù-- shì chǎng shàng jìng zhēng hěn jī liè.
english: You will have to push the new product to win sales there's lots of competition.

hanzi: 我估计我的申请书不知道让哪个无能的官僚给弄丢了.
pinyin: wǒ gū jì wǒ de shēn qǐng shū bù zhī dào ràng nǎ ge wú néng de guān liáo jǐ nòng diū le.
english: I suppose my application has been lost by some incompetent bureaucrat.

hanzi: 我并不是永久雇员，而是根据定期合同在此工作的。
pinyin: wǒ bìng bù shì yǒng jiǔ gù yuán， ér shì gēn jù dìng qī hé tong zài cǐ gōng zuò de。
english: I'm not a permanent employee; I'm working here on a fixed-term contract.

hanzi: 从这种药草提炼出来的精华对治疗高血压有效。
pinyin: zòng zhè zhǒng yào cǎo tí liàn chū lai de jīng huá duì zhì liáo gāo xuè yā yǒu xiào。
english: The essence drawn out from this medicinal herb is good for high blood pressure.

hanzi: 我并不是永久雇员，而是根据定期合同在此工作的。
pinyin: wǒ bìng bù shì yǒng jiǔ gù yuán， ér shì gēn jù dìng qī hé tong zài cǐ gōng zuò de。
english: I'm not a permanent employee; I'm working here on a fixed-term contract.

hanzi: 警察搜查了半径两英里范围内所有的田野和森林。
pinyin: jǐng chá sōu chá le bàn jìng liǎng yīng lǐ fàn wéi nèi suǒ yǒu de tián yě huò sēn lín。
english: The police searched all the fields and woods within a radius of two miles.

hanzi: 申请人请求司法检查以便废除责令某人守法的命令。
pinyin: shēn qǐng rén qǐng qiú sī fǎ jiǎn chá yǐ biàn fèi chú zé lìng mǒu rén shǒu fǎ de mìng lìng。
english: The applicant seek judicial review to quash the bind-over order.

hanzi: 这个党竭力装出一付关心工人阶级的新形象.
pinyin: zhè gè dǎng jié lì zhuāng chū yī fù guān xīn gōng rén jiē jí de xīn xíng xiàng.
english: The party is trying to project a new image of itself as caring for the working classes.

hanzi: 医生定期到这家进行拜访，检查婴儿有没有问题。
pinyin: yī shēng dìng qī dào zhè jiā jìn xíng bài fǎng， jiǎn chá yīng ér yǒu méi yǒu wèn tí。
english: The doctor made periodic visit to the house to see if the baby was all right.

hanzi: 你的车子受到了损坏，你应当通过法律途径要求赔偿。
pinyin: nǐ de jū zi shòu dào le sǔn huài， nǐ yīng dāng tōng guò fǎ lu:4 tú jìng yāo qiú péi cháng。
english: You must seek redress in the law courts for the damage to your car.

hanzi: 外伤身体的严重损伤或刺激，常由暴力或事故造成

english: A serious injury or shock to the body, as from violence or an accident.

hanzi: 阻力流体介质，如水或空气对移动物体施加的阻力
pinyin: zǔ lì liú tǐ jiè zhì， rú shuǐ huò kōng qì duì yí dòng wù tǐ shī jiā de zǔ lì
english: The retarding force exerted on a moving body by a fluid medium such as air or water.

hanzi: 人们对这问题的看法超越了他们沿袭至今的政治界限。
pinyin: rén men duì zhè wèn tí de kàn fǎ chāo yuè le tā men yán xí zhì jīn de zhèng zhì jiè xiàn。
english: Opinion on this issue cuts across traditional political boundaries.

hanzi: 某一时期的文学可反映出该时期的价值观念和审美观念.
pinyin: mǒu yī shí qī de wén xué kě fǎn yìng chū gāi shí qī de jià zhí guān niàn huò shěn měi guān niàn.
english: The literature of a period reflects its values and tastes.

hanzi: 节目涉及从流行音乐到京剧这样形形色色的题材。
pinyin: jié mù shè jí zòng liú xíng yīn yuè dào jīng jù zhè yàng xíng xíng shǎi shǎi de tí cái。
english: The program deals with subjects as diverse as pop music and Beijing Opera.

hanzi: 从这种药草提炼出来的精华对治疗高血压有效。
pinyin: zòng zhè zhǒng yào cǎo tí liàn chū lai de jīng huá duì zhì liáo gāo xuè yā yǒu xiào。
english: The essence drawn out from this medicinal herb is good for high blood pressure.

hanzi: 双方之间的任何争议都应通过友好协商来解决。
pinyin: shuāng fāng zhī jiān de rèn hé zhēng yì dōu yìng tōng guò yǒu hǎo xié shāng lái jiě jué。
english: Any dispute between the two parties shall be settled by friendly consultation.

hanzi: 通才在几种领域内有广泛的普遍的知识和技能的一种人
pinyin: tōng cái zài jǐ zhòng lǐng yù nèi yǒu guǎng fàn de pǔ biàn de zhī shi huò jì néng de yī zhòng rén
english: One who has broad general knowledge and skills in several areas.

hanzi: 欣赏意识或灵敏的感知力，尤其指审美品质或价值
pinyin: xīn shǎng yì shí huò líng mǐn de gǎn zhī lì， yóu qí zhǐ shěn měi pǐn zhì huò jià zhí
english: Awareness or delicate perception, especially of aesthetic qualities or values.

hanzi: 因经济衰退状况终止有望，股票价格得以保持高位。
pinyin: yīn jīng jì shuāi tuì zhuàng kuàng zhōng zhǐ yǒu wàng， gǔ piào jià gé dé yǐ bǎo chí gāo wèi。
english: Share prices were buoyed up by hopes of an end to the recession.

hanzi: 因经济衰退状况终止有望，股票价格得以保持高位。
pinyin: yīn jīng jì shuāi tuì zhuàng kuàng zhōng zhǐ yǒu wàng， gǔ piào jià gé dé yǐ bǎo chí gāo wèi。
english: Share prices were buoyed up by hopes of an end to the recession.

hanzi: 折叠式婴儿浴盆一种商标名，用于婴儿的轻便洗澡用具
pinyin: zhé dié shì yīng ér yù pén yī zhòng shāng biāo míng， yòng yú yīng ér de qīng biàn xǐ zǎo yòng jù
english: A trademark used for portable bathing devices for infants.

hanzi: 我学法语的时间还不长, 所以我只能凑合著说几句.
pinyin: wǒ xué fǎ yǔ de shí jiān huán bù zhǎng,  suǒ yǐ wǒ zhǐ néng còu hé著 shuō jǐ jù.
english: I haven't been learning French for long, so I can only manage (ie speak) a few words.

hanzi: 很难弄清楚他们那套官僚体制全部细微的层次分别。
pinyin: hěn nàn nòng qīng chǔ tā men nà tào guān liáo tǐ zhì quán bù xì wēi de céng cì fēn bié。
english: It was hard to understand all the minute gradations of their bureaucracy.

hanzi: 这两种有关政治行为的理论有差异，但彼此可并存。
pinyin: zhè liǎng zhòng yǒu guān zhèng zhì xíng wéi de lǐ lùn yǒu chā yì， dàn bǐ cǐ kě bìng cún。
english: The two theories of political behavior vary, but they are compossible.

hanzi: 这是一桩民事案件，因此他没有被送进监狱的可能。
pinyin: zhè shì yī zhuāng mín shì àn jiàn， yīn cǐ tā méi yǒu bèi sòng jìn jiān yù de kě néng。
english: It was a civil case so there was no question of him being sent to prison.

hanzi: 膨胀凝固性一种粘性物质在压力下变成凝固的现象
pinyin: péng zhàng níng gù xìng yī zhòng nián xìng wù zhì zài yā lì xià biàn chéng níng gù de xiàn xiàng
english: The phenomenon whereby a viscous substance solidifies under pressure.

hanzi: 棚户区之行使我深切地感到那里的人民何等的贫穷。
pinyin: péng hù qū zhī xíng shǐ wǒ shēn qiè de gǎn dào nà li de rén mín hé děng de pín qióng。
english: A trip through the shanty town brought home to me just how poor the people are.

hanzi: 我弟弟用这部车时毫不爱惜，害得我花一大笔修理费。
pinyin: wǒ dì di yòng zhè bù jū shí háo bú ài xí， hài de wǒ huā yī dà bǐ xiū lǐ fèi。
english: My brother's careless treatment of the car has run me in for a large repair bill.

hanzi: 为了使它更实用，这本书在下一版本中将编有索引。
pinyin: wèi le shǐ tā gèng shí yòng， zhè běn shū zài xià yī bǎn běn zhōng jiàng biān yǒu suǒ yǐn。
english: The book will be indexed in the next edition so as to make it more useful.

hanzi: 那老人的头脑一犯起糊涂来，仓促之间是很难复原的。
pinyin: nà lǎo rén de tóu nǎo yī fàn qǐ hú tu lái， cāng cù zhī jiān shì hěn nàn fù yuán de。
english: The old man's wits, once gone a-wool-gathering, rarely came back in a hurry.

hanzi: 准平原一种因晚期侵蚀作用而形成的近似平坦的地面
pinyin: zhǔn píng yuán yī zhòng yīn wǎn qī qīn shí zuò yòng ér xíng chéng de jìn sì píng tǎn de dì miàn
english: A nearly flat land surface representing an advanced stage of erosion.

hanzi: 我在墙上钉了一个图钉，然后在上面挂了一张小图片。
pinyin: wǒ zài qiáng shàng dīng le yī gè tú dīng， rán hòu zài shàng mian guà le yī zhāng xiǎo tú piàn。
english: I hammered a tack into the wall and hung a small picture from it.

hanzi: 把粉末洒在土里，让牛走过时把它们都踩进地里去。
pinyin: bǎ fěn mò sǎ zài tǔ lǐ， ràng niú zǒu guò shí bǎ tā men dōu cǎi jìn de lǐ qù。
english: Spread the powder over the earth and let the cattle trample it in as they walk over it.

hanzi: 英国邮局直接转帐制度称为全国邮政通汇转帐制.
pinyin: Yīng guó yóu jú zhí jiē zhuǎn zhàng zhì dù chēng wéi quán guó yóu zhèng tōng huì zhuǎn zhàng zhì.
english: The British Post Office giro system is called the National Giro/Girobank.

hanzi: 缩小贫富之间的差距是政府面临的主要难题之一.
pinyin: suō xiǎo pín fù zhī jiān de chā jù shì zhèng fǔ miàn lín de zhǔ yào nán tí zhī yī.
english: Reducing the gap between rich and poor is one of the main challenges facing the government.

hanzi: 偏执狂现象在妇女中很盛行，引起了许多婚姻纠纷。
pinyin: piān zhí kuáng xiàn xiàng zài fù nu:3 zhòng hěn shèng xíng， yǐn qǐ le xǔ duō hūn yīn jiū fēn。
english: Paranoia reigns supreme among the women, causing much marital conflict.

hanzi: 公司的事情已经到了这种地步, 因此他正在考虑辞职.
pinyin: gōng sī de shì qing yǐ jīng dào le zhè zhǒng dì bù,  yīn cǐ tā zhèng zài kǎo lu:4 cí zhí.
english: Things have come to such a state in the company that he's thinking of resigning.

hanzi: 战争给无辜的人民带来的痛苦不是金钱可以补偿的。
pinyin: zhàn zhēng jǐ wú gū de rén mín dài lái de tòng kǔ bú shì jīn qián kě yǐ bǔ cháng de。
english: The suffering of innocent people caused by the war cannot be compensated for by money.

hanzi: 那位船长被免除了因船只失事而遭致的非难和罪责。
pinyin: nà wèi chuán zhǎng bèi miǎn chú le yīn chuán zhī shī shì ér zāo zhì de fēi nàn huò zuì zé。
english: The captain is absolved from all blame and responsibility for the shipwreck.

hanzi: 那位船长被免除了因船只失事而遭致的非难和罪责。
pinyin: nà wèi chuán zhǎng bèi miǎn chú le yīn chuán zhī shī shì ér zāo zhì de fēi nàn huò zuì zé。
english: The captain is absolved from all blame and responsibility for the shipwreck.

hanzi: 英国人引以自豪的传统之一是有获得公正审判的权利.
pinyin: Yīng guó rén yǐn yǐ zì háo de chuán tǒng zhī yī shì yǒu huò dé gōng zhèng shěn pàn de quán lì.
english: One of the glories of the British heritage is the right to a fair trial.

hanzi: 这一定很小，目前精神病的诊断方法还发现不了。
pinyin: zhè yī dìng hěn xiǎo， mù qián jīng shén bìng de zhěn duàn fāng fǎ huán fā xiàn bù liǎo。
english: It must be so small that present methods of psychiatric diagnosis cannot find it.

hanzi: 鉴于你我双方长期的业务关系，我们可以考虑减价。
pinyin: jiàn yú nǐ wǒ shuāng fāng cháng qī de yè wù guān xi， wǒ men kě yǐ kǎo lu:4 jiǎn jià。
english: In view of our long-standing business relations, we can consider a price reduction.

hanzi: 聚会进行到一半，我太太发病了，我们只好赶紧离开。
pinyin: jù huì jìn xíng dào yī bàn， wǒ tài tai fā bìng le， wǒ men zhǐ hǎo gǎn jǐn lí kāi。
english: Halfway through the party my wife become ill and we have to leave in short order.

hanzi: 这些放射性废物应该放在密封的箱子里深埋在地下。
pinyin: zhè xie fàng shè xìng fèi wù yīng gāi fàng zài mì fēng de xiāng zǐ lǐ shēn mán zài dì xià。
english: The radioactive waste should be buried deeply under the ground in sealed box.

hanzi: 该保险单对大多数损坏投保但不保机器的自然损耗。
pinyin: gāi bǎo xiǎn shàn duì dà duō shù sǔn huài tóu bǎo dàn bù bǎo jī qì de zì rán sǔn hào。
english: The insurance policy cover most damage but not fair wear and tear to the machine.

hanzi: 他徒步走了好几天，最后安全到达一个游击队根据地。
pinyin: tā tú bù zǒu le hǎo jǐ tiān， zuì hòu ān quán dào dá yī gè yóu jī duì gēn jù dì。
english: He travelled on foot for several days until he safely reached a guerrilla base.

hanzi: 他向她讲解那音乐的妙处，可是这无异于对牛弹琴。
pinyin: tā xiàng tā jiǎng jiě nà yīn yuè de miào chù， kě shì zhè wú yì yú duì niú tán qín。
english: He explained the beauty of the music to her but it was casting pearls before swine.

hanzi: 满地是苹果树上飘落下来的花瓣，地上一片雪白。
pinyin: mǎn de shì píng guǒ shù shàng piāo luò xià lái de huā bàn， dì shang yī piàn xuě bái。
english: The ground was as white as snow with petals that had drifted down from the apple trees.

hanzi: 他心向往之的是要面对面地见见他心目中的流行曲歌星。
pinyin: tā xīn xiàng wǎng zhī de shì yào miàn duì miàn de xiàn xiàn tā xīn mù zhòng dì liú xíng qǔ gē xīng。
english: His ambition was to meet his favourite pop star face to face.

hanzi: 我想你方技术人员可以在我方用户的工厂里接受培训。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng nǐ fāng jì shù rén yuán kě yǐ zài wǒ fāng yòng hù de gōng chǎng lǐ jiē shòu péi xùn。
english: I think your technician can be trained in the factory of our customer.

hanzi: 虽然富人和穷人住在一起，但是条件相差极为悬殊。
pinyin: suī rán fù rén huò qióng rén zhù zài yī qǐ， dàn shì tiáo jiàn xiāng chà jí wéi xuán shū。
english: Rich and poor live side by side but in conditions of extraordinary disparity.

hanzi: 在国会里，地方税收问题似乎又成了引人注意的问题。
pinyin: zài guó huì lǐ， dì fang shuì shōu wèn tí sì hu yòu chéng le yǐn rén zhù yì de wèn tí。
english: The question of local taxation seems to come again to the front in the Congress.

hanzi: 当前的贸易赤字表明我们的进出口贸易严重失调.
pinyin: dāng qián de mào yì chì zì biǎo míng wǒ men de jìn chū kǒu mào yì yán zhòng shī tiáo.
english: The current trade deficit indicates a serious imbalance between our import and export trade.

hanzi: 这架军用飞机着陆前在着陆跑道上空盘旋了一阵。
pinyin: zhè jià jūn yòng fēi jī zhuó lù qián zài zhuó lù pǎo dào shàng kōng pán xuán le yī zhèn。
english: The military aircraft circled over the landing strip for some time before it landed.

hanzi: 比较富裕的农民这时购买化肥，但合作社却买不起。
pinyin: bǐ jiào fù yù de nóng mín zhè shí gòu mǎi huà féi， dàn hé zuò shè què mǎi bù qǐ。
english: The richer peasants were buying chemical fertilizer, but the co-op could not afford it.

hanzi: 好客的主人很快为尊贵的客人腾空了闲置着的房间。
pinyin: hào kè de zhǔ rén hěn kuài wèi zūn guì de kè ren téng kòng le xián zhì zhuó de fáng jiān。
english: The hospitable host had his spare room emptied very quickly for the honoured guest.

hanzi: 兴奋增盛身体某个器官或部分对刺激反常或过度的敏感
pinyin: xīng fèn zēng shèng shēn tǐ mǒu gè qì guān huò bù fen duì cì jī fǎn cháng huò guò dù de mǐn gǎn
english: Abnormal or excessive sensitivity of a body organ or part to a stimulus.

hanzi: 耳毒性的对耳结构有毒害影响的，尤指对耳神经感觉
pinyin: ěr dú xìng de duì ěr jié gòu yǒu dú hài yǐng xiǎng de， yóu zhǐ duì ěr shén jīng gǎn jué
english: Having a toxic effect on the structures of the ear, especially on its nerve supply.

hanzi: 这个联盟会很快瓦解，除非采取措施加强它的团结。
pinyin: zhè gè lián méng kuài hěn kuài wǎ jiě， chú fēi cǎi qǔ cuò shī jiā qiáng tā de tuán jié。
english: The alliance will soon disintegrate unless something is done to pull it together.

hanzi: 兴奋增盛身体某个器官或部分对刺激反常或过度的敏感
pinyin: xīng fèn zēng shèng shēn tǐ mǒu gè qì guān huò bù fen duì cì jī fǎn cháng huò guò dù de mǐn gǎn
english: Abnormal or excessive sensitivity of a body organ or part to a stimulus.

hanzi: 他把所有的时间都用在做纵横填字游戏和其他无聊的活动上.
pinyin: tā bǎ suǒ yǒu de shí jiān dōu yòng zài zuò zòng héng tián zì yóu xì huò qí tā wú liáo de huó dòng shàng.
english: He spends all his time on crosswords and other trifles.

hanzi: 他乘机利用她的无知和单纯，这种做法是不光明正大的。
pinyin: tā chéng jī lì yòng tā de wú zhī huò dān chún， zhè zhǒng zuò fǎ shì bù guāng míng zhèng dà de。
english: He takes advantage of her ignorance and simplicity; it isn't cricket.

hanzi: 这个商店可用支票和信用卡付帐, 当然也收现金.
pinyin: zhè gè shāng diàn kě yòng zhī piào huò xìn yòng kǎ fù zhàng,  dāng rán yě shōu xiàn jīn.
english: The shop will accept cheques and credit cards, not forgetting (ie and also) cash, of course.

hanzi: 在英国法中在证明他有罪前被告是被假定无罪的。
pinyin: zài Yīng guó fǎ zhòng zài zhèng míng tā yǒu zuì qián bèi gào shì bèi jiǎ dìng wú zuì de。
english: In English law, the accused is presumed to be innocent until he is proved to be guilty.

hanzi: 首席小提琴手在交响乐队中的第一小提琴手兼助理指挥
pinyin: shǒu xí xiǎo tí qín shǒu zài jiāo xiǎng yuè duì zhòng dì dì yī xiǎo tí qín shǒu jiān zhù lǐ zhǐ huī
english: The first violinist and assistant conductor in a symphony orchestra.

hanzi: 指挥官朝气蓬勃和欢欣愉悦的神态使士兵们勇气倍增。
pinyin: zhǐ huī guān zhāo qì péng bó huò huān xīn yú yuè de shén tài shǐ shì bīng men yǒng qì bèi zēng。
english: The leader's vital and cheerful manner filled his men with courage.

hanzi: 用于修饰或说明与故障或错误的检测和隔离有关的特性。
pinyin: yòng yú xiū shì huò shuō míng yù gù zhàng huò cuò wù de jiǎn cè huò gé lí yǒu guān de tè xìng。
english: Pertaining to the detection and isolation of a malfunction or mistake.

hanzi: 该养老基金在几家主要出售股份给公众的公司中均有股份.
pinyin: gāi yǎng lǎo jī jīn zài jǐ jiā zhǔ yào chū shòu gǔ fèn jǐ gōng zhòng de gōng sī zhòng jūn yǒu gǔ fèn.
english: The pension fund owns shares in several major public companies.

hanzi: 教师希望给小学生读宗教故事来提高他们的修养.
pinyin: jiào shī xī wàng jǐ xiǎo xué shēng dú zōng jiào gù shì lái tí gāo tā men de xiū yǎng.
english: The teacher hoped to elevate the minds of her young pupils by reading them religious stories.

hanzi: 该养老基金在几家主要出售股份给公众的公司中均有股份.
pinyin: gāi yǎng lǎo jī jīn zài jǐ jiā zhǔ yào chū shòu gǔ fèn jǐ gōng zhòng de gōng sī zhòng jūn yǒu gǔ fèn.
english: The pension fund owns shares in several major public companies.

hanzi: 正是设备的低劣才导致一些徒步旅行者不愿继续攀登
pinyin: zhèng shì shè bèi de dī liè cái dǎo zhì yī xiē tú bù lu:3 xíng zhě bù yuàn jì xù pān dēng
english: Inferior equipment was precisely the reason some hikers refused to continue the climb.

hanzi: 所提出的事实会揭示社区中普遍存在的一种可悲的情形。
pinyin: suǒ tí chū de shì shí kuài jiē shì shè qū zhòng pǔ biàn cún zài de yī zhòng kě bēi de qíng xing。
english: The facts quoted would reveal a sorry state of affairs in any community.

hanzi: 我们的战士在那个孤立无援的阵地上坚持了两个多钟点。
pinyin: wǒ men de zhàn shì zài nèi gè gū lì wú yuán de zhèn dì shàng jiān chí le liǎng gè duō zhōng diǎn。
english: Our fighters held on in that isolated position for more that two hours.

hanzi: 节目中的暴力场面和难听的粗话使许多观众感到震惊。
pinyin: jié mù zhòng dì bào lì chǎng miàn huò nàn tìng de cū huà shǐ xǔ duō guān zhòng gǎn dào zhèn jīng。
english: The violence and bad language in the program shocked many of the viewers.

hanzi: 过去荒凉的山村已发展成为欣欣向荣的人民公社。
pinyin: guò qu huāng liáng de shān cūn yǐ fā zhǎn chéng wéi xīn xīn xiàng róng de rén mín gōng shè。
english: The once deserted mountain villages have grown into a flourishing people's commune.

hanzi: 保龄球一种较重的轻度削平的大木球，以使球斜进滚动
pinyin: bǎo líng qiú yī zhòng jiào zhòng de qīng dù xuē píng de dà mù qiú， yǐ shǐ qiú xié jìn gǔn dòng
english: A large wooden ball weighted or slightly flattened so as to roll with a bias.

hanzi: 纵使大众也曾偏向正途也罢，那总是出于错误的原因。
pinyin: zòng shǐ dà zhòng yě zēng piān xiàng zhèng tú yě ba， nà zǒng shì chū yú cuò wù de yuán yīn。
english: If the multitude ever deviate into the right, it is always for the wrong reason.

hanzi: 当时若警方迟一些干预就会发生严重的暴力事件了。
pinyin: dāng shí ruò jǐng fāng chí yī xiē gān yù jiù kuài fā shēng yán zhòng de bào lì shì jiàn le。
english: If the police had not stepped in when they did there will have been serious violence.

hanzi: 当他得知对手是谁时，他立即断了想获取权力的念头。
pinyin: dàng tā dé zhī duì shǒu shì shéi shí， tā lì jí duàn le xiǎng huò qǔ quán lì de niàn tou。
english: His idea of winning power quickly toppled down when he learned who his opponent was.

hanzi: 马上把化肥给我们送来，要不，我们小麦播种就要给耽误了。
pinyin: mǎ shàng bǎ huà féi jǐ wǒ men sòng lái， yào bu， wǒ men xiǎo mài bō zhǒng jiù yào jǐ dān wu le。
english: Send us the fertilizer at once, or our wheat sowing will be held up.

hanzi: 无限生长分化的能无限生长或分割的，用于培养中的细胞
pinyin: wú xiàn shēng zhǎng fēn huà de néng wú xiàn shēng zhǎng huò fēn gē de， yòng yú péi yǎng zhòng dì xì bāo
english: Capable of indefinite growth or division. Used of cells in culture.

hanzi: 抗维生素一种破坏或抑制维生素的新陈代谢功能的物质
pinyin: kàng wéi shēng sù yī zhòng pò huài huò yì zhì wéi shēng sù de xīn chén dài xiè gōng néng de wù zhì
english: A substance that destroys or inhibits the metabolic action of a vitamin.

hanzi: 如果她没有无节制地花钱，她亡夫的遗产是够她晚年用的。
pinyin: rú guǒ tā méi yǒu wú jié zhì de huā qián， tā wáng fū de yí chǎn shì gòu tā wǎn nián yòng de。
english: The dowry will be enough for her old age had she not spent it irrationally.

hanzi: 记住，靠近大桥时开慢一些，迎面来的车流有先行权。
pinyin: jì zhu， kào jìn dà qiáo shí kāi màn yī xiē， yíng miàn lái de jū liú yǒu xiān xíng quán。
english: Remember to ease up as you approach the bridge; oncoming traffic has the right of way.

hanzi: 菜要择, 汤要加热. 还得摆上餐具, 把酒冰镇一下.
pinyin: cài yào zhái,  tāng yào jiā rè.  huán de bǎi shàng cān jù,  bǎ jiǔ bīng zhèn yī xià.
english: There are the vegetables to peel and the soup to heat. Then there's the table to lay and the wine to cool.

hanzi: 她若只因迟到一次就失去了工作，这样对她未免太不公平了。
pinyin: tā ruò zhǐ yīn chí dào yī cì jiù shī qù le gōng zuò， zhè yàng duì tā wèi miǎn tài bù gōng píng le。
english: If she lost her job for being late once, she got a pretty raw deal.

hanzi: 尽管他碰到一些困难，但他对自己的成功依然满怀信心。
pinyin: jǐn guǎn tā pèng dào yī xiē kùn nan， dàn tā duì zì jǐ de chéng gōng yī rán mǎn huái xìn xīn。
english: Although he met with some difficulties, he was none the less sure of his success.

hanzi: 他在明知他的性命有可能受到威胁的情况下接任了那职位。
pinyin: tā zài míng zhī tā de xìng mìng yǒu kě néng shòu dào wēi xié de qíng kuàng xià jiē rèn le nà zhí wèi。
english: He took over the post in the knowledge that it might endanger his life.

hanzi: 精心制作的对众多部分或细节给予精心注意的计划或制作的
pinyin: jīng xīn zhì zuò de duì zhòng duō bù fen huò xì jié gěi yǔ jīng xīn zhù yì de jì huà huò zhì zuò de
english: Planned or executed with painstaking attention to numerous parts or details.

hanzi: 给予投资者的建议是以利率将继续下降这一点为前提的.
pinyin: gěi yǔ tóu zī zhě de jiàn yì shì yǐ lì lu:4 jiàng jì xù xià jiàng zhè yī diǎn wèi qián tí de.
english: Advice to investors was based on the premise that interest rates would continue to fall.

hanzi: 早年对军用火箭进行的实验为发展航天技术奠定了基础。
pinyin: zǎo nián duì jūn yòng huǒ jiàn jìn xíng de shí yàn wèi fā zhǎn háng tiān jì shù diàn dìng le jī chǔ。
english: Early experiments with military rockets prepared the ground for space travel.

hanzi: 属性，特性符合一种大体模式或属于特定的组或类的倾向
pinyin: shǔ xìng， tè xìng fú hé yī zhòng dà tǐ mó shì huò shǔ yú tè dìng de zǔ huò lèi de qīng xiàng
english: A tendency to conform to a general pattern or belong to a particular group or category.

hanzi: 与岩石之间的摩擦加上攀登者的重量，使得绳子断了。
pinyin: yù yán shí zhī jiān de mó cā jiā shàng pān dēng zhě de zhòng liàng， shǐ de shéng zi duàn le。
english: Friction against the rock, combined with the weight of the climber, caused his rope to break.

hanzi: 发起人安排这位年轻的拳击选手同一位更老练的拳击手比赛。
pinyin: fā qǐ rén ān pái zhè wèi nián qīng de quán jī xuǎn shǒu tóng yī wèi gèng lǎo liàn de quán jī shǒu bǐ sài。
english: The promoters matched the young boxer with a more skillful fighter.

hanzi: 低音的与一相对少量的每秒钟音波周期相对应的低音的
pinyin: dī yīn de yù yī xiāng duì shǎo liàng de měi miǎo zhōng yīn bō zhōu qī xiāng duì yìng de dī yīn de
english: Having a pitch corresponding to a relatively small number of sound-wave cycles per second.

hanzi: 法国队开始时领先, 但中场休息前威尔士队已与之拉平.
pinyin: fǎ guó duì kāi shǐ shí lǐng xiān,  dàn zhōng cháng xiū xi qián wēi ěr shì duì yǐ yù zhī lā píng.
english: France took an early lead but Wales drew level (ie equalized the score) before half-time.

hanzi: 我真希望我的灵魂有个窗户，使得你能够看到我的一些感情。
pinyin: wǒ zhēn xī wàng wǒ de líng hún yǒu gè chuāng hu， shǐ de nǐ néng gòu kàn dào wǒ de yī xiē gǎn qíng。
english: I wish there was windows to my soul, so that you could see some of my feelings.

hanzi: 孩子们经常有他们自己的天地，你最好不要干涉他们的事。
pinyin: hái zi men jīng cháng yǒu tā men zì jǐ de tiān dì， nǐ zuì hǎo bù yào gān shè tā men de shì。
english: Children are often in a world by themselves. You'd better not interfere in their business.

hanzi: 他铲起了一点土，非常小心，不去扰乱底下的任何东西。
pinyin: tā chǎn qǐ le yī diǎn tǔ， fēi cháng xiǎo xīn， bù qù rǎo luàn dǐ xia de rèn hé dōng xi。
english: He scooped out a little of the earth, being careful not to disturb anything that was underneath.

hanzi: 摄政者，代理人由国家统治者或者首脑指派的行政代理人
pinyin: shè zhèng zhě， dài lǐ rén yóu guó jiā tǒng zhì zhē huò zhě shǒu nǎo zhǐ pài de xíng zhèng dài lǐ rén
english: A person appointed by a ruler or head of state to act as an administrative deputy.

hanzi: 基督人格基督最重要的人格，在这人格里他的人性和神性结合
pinyin: Jī dū rén gé Jī dū zuì zhòng yào de rén gé， zài zhè rén gé lǐ tā de rén xìng huò shén xìng jié hé
english: The essential person of Jesus in which his human and divine natures are united.

hanzi: 一些独居的男人宁肯靠罐头食品过日子，也不愿自己烧饭吃。
pinyin: yī xiē dú jū de nán rén nìng kěn kào guàn tou shí pǐn guò rì zi， yě bù yuàn zì jǐ shāo fàn jí。
english: Some men on their own will live out of tins rather than cook meals for themselves.

hanzi: 被传授了初步知识的人已被引入或熟悉某一特定领域知识的人
pinyin: bèi chuán shòu le chū bù zhī shi de rén yǐ bèi yǐn rù huò shú xī mǒu yī tè dìng lǐng yù zhī shi de rén
english: One who has been introduced to or has attained knowledge in a particular field.

hanzi: 被传授了初步知识的人已被引入或熟悉某一特定领域知识的人
pinyin: bèi chuán shòu le chū bù zhī shi de rén yǐ bèi yǐn rù huò shú xī mǒu yī tè dìng lǐng yù zhī shi de rén
english: One who has been introduced to or has attained knowledge in a particular field.

hanzi: 正式确认向有权威的证人正式确认以保证法律上的有效性
pinyin: zhèng shì què rèn xiàng yǒu quán wēi de zhèng ren zhèng shì què rèn yǐ bǎo zhèng fǎ lu:4 shàng de yǒu xiào xìng
english: A formal declaration made to authoritative witnesses to ensure legal validity.

hanzi: 人生是一所病院，每一个住院患者都一心想换自己的床。
pinyin: rén shēng shì yī suǒ bìng yuàn， měi yī gè zhù yuàn huàn zhě dōu yī xīn xiǎng huàn zì jǐ de chuáng。
english: Life is a hospital in which every patient is possessed by the desire to change his bed.

hanzi: 希望你我双方尽力在销售优质产品的同时提供最佳的服务。
pinyin: xī wàng nǐ wǒ shuāng fāng jìn lì zài xiāo shòu yōu zhì chǎn pǐn de tóng shí tí gōng zuì jiā de fú wù。
english: Let us jointly do our best to sell high quality products with high quality services.

hanzi: 他在事业上经过一番周折，如今他又回到了最初工作的那家俱乐部。
pinyin: tā zài shì yè shàng jīng guò yī pān zhōu zhé， rú jīn tā yòu huí dào le zuì chū gōng zuò de nà jiā jū yuè bù。
english: His career have come full circle to the club where it begin.

hanzi: 如果可能的话，希望能在贵方的培训中心训练我方专业人员。
pinyin: rú guǒ kě néng de huà， xī wàng néng zài guì fāng de péi xùn zhōng xīn xùn liàn wǒ fāng zhuān yè rén yuán。
english: If possible, you are expected to train our specialist in your training center.

hanzi: 他在比赛中坚持跑完了全程，不像大部分选手那样半途而废。
pinyin: tā zài bǐ sài zhòng jiān chí pǎo wán le quán chéng， bù xiàng dà bù fen xuǎn shǒu nà yàng bàn tú ér fèi。
english: He managed to finish the race, unlike more than half of the competitors.

hanzi: 最高天天堂的最高处，古人相信那里完全是火与光的圣地
pinyin: zuì gāo tiān tiān táng de zuì gāo chù， gǔ rén xiāng xìn nà li wán quán shì huǒ yù guāng de shèng dì
english: The highest reaches of heaven, believed by the ancients to be a realm of pure fire or light.

hanzi: 我们的付款方式，是以不可撤消信用状见票即付汇票支付。
pinyin: wǒ men de fù kuǎn fāng shì， shì yǐ bù kě chè xiāo xìn yòng zhuàng xiàn piào jí fù huì piào zhī fù。
english: Payment will be made by paying your sight draft under our irrevocable letter of credit.

hanzi: 特命全权公使派驻国外使馆的特命全权使节，仅低于大使
pinyin: tè mìng quán quán gōng shǐ pài zhù guó wài shǐ guǎn de tè mìng quán quán shǐ jié， jǐn dī yú dà shǐ
english: A minister plenipotentiary assigned to a foreign embassy, ranking next below the ambassador.

hanzi: 减价销售原来预料要持续一周, 然而实际上现在已经结束了.
pinyin: jiǎn jià xiāo shòu yuán lái yù liào yào chí xù yī zhōu,  rán ér shí jì shàng xiàn zài yǐ jīng jié shù le.
english: The sale was supposed to last for a week, but for all practical purposes it's over.

hanzi: 这些被警察抓住的犯罪分子只是些小鱼，他们的头子却跑掉了。
pinyin: zhè xie bèi jǐng chá zhuā zhù de fàn zuì fèn zǐ zhǐ shì xiē xiǎo yú， tā men de tóu zi què pǎo diào le。
english: These criminals arrested by the police are only minnows, their leader has escaped.

hanzi: 一旦您为用户创建了一个帐号，用户就可以进入安全域中。
pinyin: yī dàn nín wèi yòng hù chuàng jiàn le yī gè zhàng hào， yòng hù jiù kě yǐ jìn rù ān quán yù zhòng。
english: As soon as you create an account for the user, the user can participate in a secure domain.

hanzi: 英国司法运作的前提是被告在被证明有罪之前是清白的。
pinyin: Yīng guó sī fǎ yùn zuò de qián tí shì bèi gào zài bèi zhèng míng yǒu zuì zhī qián shì qīng bái de。
english: British justice works on the premise that an accused person is innocent until he's proved guilty.

hanzi: 英国司法运作的前提是被告在被证明有罪之前是清白的。
pinyin: Yīng guó sī fǎ yùn zuò de qián tí shì bèi gào zài bèi zhèng míng yǒu zuì zhī qián shì qīng bái de。
english: British justice works on the premise that an accused person is innocent until he's proved guilty.

hanzi: 投资是一项风险事业，就是那些懂行的人有时也会栽跟头。
pinyin: tóu zī shì yí xiàng fēng xiǎn shì yè， jiù shì nà xiē dǒng háng de rén yǒu shí yě kuài zāi gēn tou。
english: Investment is a hazardous business; even those who are in the swim sometimes come a cropper.

hanzi: 由于这笔交易金额很大，买主在做出决定之前必须再三考虑。
pinyin: yóu yú zhè bǐ jiāo yì jīn é hěn dà， mǎi zhǔ zài zuò chū jué dìng zhī qián bì xū zài sān kǎo lu:4。
english: As this transaction involve a very large sum, buyer have to think twice before deciding.

hanzi: 大规模的农场聚集在白人的所有权之下，这在当时是一股潮流。
pinyin: dà guī mó de nóng chǎng jù jí zài bái rén de suǒ yǒu quán zhī xià， zhè zài dāng shí shì yī gǔ cháo liú。
english: The aggregation of immense farms under white ownership was a trend at that time.

hanzi: 有组织的在正式结构中起作用的，如在活动的协调和指导中
pinyin: yǒu zǔ zhī de zài zhèng shì jié gòu zhòng qǐ zuò yòng de， rú zài huó dòng de xié tiáo huò zhǐ dǎo zhòng
english: Functioning within a formal structure, as in the coordination and direction of activities.

pinyin: bàn suí zhuó gèng nián qī de nèi fēn mì biàn huà shǐ hěn duō fù nu:3 de qíng xù shòu dào yǐng xiǎng。
english: A lot of women are affected emotionally by the hormonal changes that accompany the change of life.

hanzi: 正如人类发现的许多事物一样, 原子能既可用来为善, 也可用以作恶.
pinyin: zhèng rú rén lèi fā xiàn de xǔ duō shì wù yí yàng,  yuán zǐ néng jì kě yòng lái wèi shàn,  yě kě yòng yǐ zuò wù.
english: Like many discoveries, atomic power can be used for good or evil.

hanzi: 在为生存在斗争场里，才能就是重拳，机智就是巧妙的步法。
pinyin: zài wéi shēng cún zài dòu zhēng chǎng lǐ， cái néng jiù shì zhòng quán， jī zhì jiù shì qiǎo miào de bù fǎ。
english: In the battle for existence, talent is the punch, and tact is the clever footwork.

hanzi: 振动在一个平衡位置附近一个粒子或弹性固体迅速的直线运动
pinyin: zhèn dòng zài yī gè píng héng wèi zhi fù jìn yī gè lì zi huò tán xìng gù tǐ xùn sù de zhí xiàn yùn dòng
english: A rapid linear motion of a particle or of an elastic solid about an equilibrium position.

hanzi: 小钉板一种用木钉可塞入的孔做成花样的用来玩游戏的板
pinyin: xiǎo dīng bǎn yī zhòng yòng mù dìng kě sè rù de kǒng zuò chéng huā yàng de yòng lái wàn yóu xì de bǎn
english: A board perforated with a pattern of holes into which pegs can be fitted for playing certain games.

hanzi: 密集的迫击炮火力从这些阵地射向由山谷那边上来的援军。
pinyin: mì jí de pò jī pào huǒ lì zòng zhè xie zhèn dì shè xiàng yóu shān gǔ nà bian shàng lái de yuán jūn。
english: From these positions mortar fire was rained down upon reinforcements moving up through the valley.

hanzi: 这次示威活动事先作了精心安排, 正好在首相访问时进行.
pinyin: zhè cì shì wēi huó dòng shì xiān zuò le jīng xīn ān pái,  zhèng hǎo zài shǒu xiàng fǎng wèn shí jìn xíng.
english: The demonstration had been carefully stage-managed to coincide with the Prime Minister's visit.

hanzi: 旅游公司将押金退还给他，并承认旅游宣传手册内容有误。
pinyin: lu:3 yóu gōng sī jiàng yā jīn tuì huán jǐ tā， bìng chéng rèn lu:3 yóu xuān chuán shǒu cè nèi róng yǒu wù。
english: The tour company refunded his deposit, with an admission that the brochure was incorrect.

hanzi: 反应减弱因不断接受条件刺激而伴随产生的条件反射减弱
pinyin: fǎn yìng jiǎn ruò yīn bù duàn jiē shòu tiáo jiàn cì jī ér bàn suí chǎn shēng de tiáo jiàn fǎn shè jiǎn ruò
english: The decline of a conditioned response following repeated exposure to the conditioned stimulus.

pinyin: fù zhài zī chǎn mǒu rén yóu zhǐ pò chǎn zhě suǒ yōng yǒu de kě yǐ yòng lái dǐ zhài de quán bù cái chǎn
english: The entire property owned by a person, especially a bankrupt, that can be used to settle debts.

hanzi: 最后乐章的高潮慢慢发展到了顶点。以重复主旋律而告终。
pinyin: zuì hòu yuè zhāng de gāo cháo màn màn fā zhǎn dào le dǐng diǎn。 yǐ chóng fù zhǔ xuán lu:4 ér gào zhōng。
english: The crescendo in the last movement leads up to a grand climax and a repeat of the main theme.

pinyin: zhè zuò chéng zhèn zhòng dà duō shù jiàn zhù wù dōu bù tài hǎo kàn,  dàn zhè zuò jiào táng shì gè lì wài.
english: Most of the buildings in this town are rather unattractive, but this church is an exception.

hanzi: 我还不想公开我那些会引起争论的观点，宁可暂且随大溜。

english: Not wanting to make my controversial view know yet, I preferred to follow the crowd for a while.

pinyin: nà zhǐ wài xīng lái de yǔ zhòu fēi chuán zài gōng yuán shàng kōng pán xuán le yī huìr zhī hòu jiù bù jiàn le。
english: After the alien spacecraft had hovered over the park for a short time, it vanished.

pinyin: shèng gōng huì jiào qū wěi yuán shèng gōng huì jiào qū wěi yuán huì zhòng tuī xuǎn de liǎng wèi zhǔ yào zhí shì zhī yī
english: One of two elected chief lay officers of the vestry in the Episcopal Church.

pinyin: dòng wù fēn lèi de mén jiè de yī gè jī běn fēn zhī， rú dòng wù jiè de， zài fàn wéi shàng dà yú gāng
english: A primary division of a kingdom, as of the animal kingdom, ranking next above a class in size.

hanzi: 比尔不肯参加球赛，因为他知道他的球艺不好，而他又爱面子。
pinyin: Bǐ ěr bù kěn cān jiā qiú sài， yīn wèi tā zhī dào tā de qiú yì bù hǎo， ér tā yòu ài miàn zi。
english: Bill would not play in the game because he knew he could not do well and he wanted to save face.

pinyin: hěn duō duì yuán jiàn jiàn biàn de dòng zuò chí huǎn le。 zhè zhī duì suǒ xū de shì yī xiē xīn xiān xuè yè。
english: Many of the players are getting sluggish and what this team needs is some fresh blood.

pinyin: zài zhè gè shì yàn chē dào， biāo zhǔn qì chē chéng pǐn jiàng jiē shòu yǒu yì de huǐ huài xìng cè shì。
english: On this test track, the standard production cars will be subjected to rough treatment deliberately.

pinyin: jiè shí shàng yǒu zuì xīn shè jì de shì yàng， pǐn zhǒng fán duō de yàng pǐn chén liè， gòng nǐ men xuǎn gòu。
english: A great variety of samples, newly designed by our manufacturers, will be on exhibition.

pinyin: wǒ kě yǐ bǎ tā cái de dī yī diǎn， zhè yàng ràng nín chuān zhuó zhè jiàn wài tào xiǎn de gèng fēng mǎn yī diǎn。
english: I can cut it lower and in that way give you a little more fullness in the blouse.

pinyin: kòng sù， shēn sù zhǐ kòng huò kòng gào de yī bù fen， zhēn duì bèi kòng fāng qǐ zhuó jí zhòng yào de zuò yòng
english: The part of a charge or an accusation that weighs most substantially against the accused.

hanzi: 由于海关征收繁重的紧急关税，使得我们处于极其困难的境地。
pinyin: yóu yú hǎi guān zhēng shōu fán zhòng de jǐn jí guān shuì， shǐ de wǒ men chǔ yú jí qí kùn nan de jìng dì。
english: The imposition of heavy emergency custom duties have render our position exceedingly difficult.

pinyin: bào zhà hòu jīng guò xiāng dāng yī duàn shí jiān， zhè gè chéng zhèn cái huī fù le zhèng cháng de shēng huó zhì xù。
english: After the explosion it was some time before the town resumed its everyday routines.

hanzi: 衡量驾驶员水平的决定性考验, 就是看他在紧急关头能否保持镇静.
pinyin: héng liang jià shǐ yuán shuǐ píng de jué dìng xìng kǎo yàn,  jiù shì kàn tā zài jǐn jí guān tóu néng pǐ bǎo chí zhèn jìng.
english: The acid test of a good driver is whether he remains calm in an emergency.

hanzi: 界面在相关区域，实体，物质或阶段之间所形成共同界限的面
pinyin: jiè miàn zài xiāng guān qū yù， shí tǐ， wù zhì huò jiē duàn zhī jiān suǒ xíng chéng gòng tóng jiè xiàn de miàn
english: A surface forming a common boundary between adjacent regions, bodies, substances, or phases.

hanzi: 去年我返乡探亲，惊讶地发现小村和村里的人都发生了变化。
pinyin: qù nián wǒ fǎn xiāng tàn qīn， jīng yà de fā xiàn xiǎo cūn huò cūn lǐ de rén dōu fā shēng le biàn huà。
english: Last year I returned home and was surprised to find both the village and the people completely changed.

hanzi: 马克曾想谋求秘书的职位，但因提出太迟，错过了被考虑录用的时机。
pinyin: mǎ kè zēng xiǎng móu qiú mì shū de zhí wèi， dàn yīn tí chū tài chí， cuò guò le bèi kǎo lu:4 lù yòng de shí jī。
english: Mark tried for the post of secretary, but was too late to be considered for it.

hanzi: 日本一家公司同意就手表不精确向我们赔偿总价值的百分之四。
pinyin: Rì běn yī jiā gōng sī tóng yì jiù shǒu biǎo bù jīng què xiàng wǒ men péi cháng zǒng jià zhí de bǎi fēn zhī sì。
english: The Japanese Company agreed to compensate us for the defective watches by4% of the total value.
