pinyin: wén huà yí rù zòng yīng ér qǐ yī tè dìng shè huì de wén huà jiù zhí rù yī gè rén dà nǎo de guò chéng
english: The process by which the culture of a particular society is instilled in a human being from infancy onward.

hanzi: 鲜明的，鲜艳的一种高亮度和强饱和度结合的色彩的或与之相关的
pinyin: xiān míng de， xiān yàn de yī zhòng gāo liàng dù huò qiáng bǎo hé dù jié hé de sè cǎi de huò yù zhī xiāng guān de
english: Relating to or being a hue that has a combination of high lightness and strong saturation.

hanzi: 部分因为物价高涨，部分因为时机不好，生活真是愈来愈难过了。
pinyin: bù fen yīn wèi wù jià gāo zhǎng， bù fen yīn wèi shí jī bù hǎo， shēng huó zhēn shì yù lái yù nán guò le。
english: What with the high prices, and what with the badness of the times, we find it hard to get along.

hanzi: 与此同时，许多大学生在罢工持续期间自愿去驾驶公共汽车。
pinyin: yù cǐ tóng shí， xǔ duō dà xué sheng zài bà gōng chí xù qī jiān zì yuàn qù jià shǐ gōng gòng qì chē。
english: Meanwhile, a number of university students have volunteered to drive buses while the strike lasts. All

hanzi: 一元发生说认为所有生物都是由一个单细胞或有机体发展而来的理论
pinyin: yī yuán fā shēng shuō rèn wéi suǒ yǒu shēng wù dōu shì yóu yī gè shàn xì bāo huò yǒu jī tǐ fā zhǎn ér lái de lǐ lùn
english: The theory that all living organisms are descended from a single cell or organism.

hanzi: 一天的这段时间有数以百万计的职工从工厂和办公场所涌向街头.
pinyin: yī tiān de zhè duàn shí jiān yǒu shuò yǐ bǎi wàn jì de zhí gōng zòng gōng chǎng huò bàn gōng chǎng suǒ yǒng xiàng jiē tóu.
english: The shops and offices pour millions of workers into the street at this time of day.

hanzi: 作者似乎拿不定主意是写喜剧还是写悲剧, 致使这个剧非驴非马.
pinyin: zuó zhě sì hu ná bù dìng zhǔ yi shì xiě xǐ jù hái shì xiě bēi jù,  zhì shǐ zhè gè jù fēi lu:2 fēi mǎ.
english: The author seems uncertain whether he is writing a comedy or a tragedy, so the play falls between two stools.

hanzi: 在编辑语言中，把若干值变换为由给定格式所规定的表示形式。
pinyin: zài biān jí yǔ yán zhòng， bǎ ruò gān zhí biàn huàn wèi yóu jǐ dìng gé shì suǒ guī dìng de biǎo shì xíng shì。
english: In programming languages, transforming values to the representations specified by a given format.

hanzi: 作者似乎拿不定主意是写喜剧还是写悲剧, 致使这个剧非驴非马.
pinyin: zuó zhě sì hu ná bù dìng zhǔ yi shì xiě xǐ jù hái shì xiě bēi jù,  zhì shǐ zhè gè jù fēi lu:2 fēi mǎ.
english: The author seems uncertain whether he is writing a comedy or a tragedy, so the play falls between two stools.

hanzi: 他活动于社交甚严的社交圈内，而且属于那些最不愿吸收外人的俱乐部。
pinyin: tā huó dòng yú shè jiāo shèn yán de shè jiāo quān nèi， ér qiě shǔ yú nà xiē zuì bù yuàn xī shōu wài rén de jù yuè bù。
english: He moves in exclusive social circles and belongs to the most exclusive clubs.

hanzi: 飞船驾驶员，气球驾驶员轻于空气的航空器，例如气球的驾驶员或导航员
pinyin: fēi chuán jià shǐ yuán， qì qiú jià shǐ yuán qīng yú kōng qì de háng kōng qì， lì rú qì qiú de jià shǐ yuán huò dǎo háng yuán
english: A pilot or navigator of a lighter-than-air craft, such as a balloon.

hanzi: 在报社记者七嘴八舌地高声向他提问时，他始终表现得镇定自若。
pinyin: zài bào shè jì zhě qī zuǐ bā shé de gāo shēng xiàng tā tí wèn shí， tā shǐ zhōng biǎo xiàn de zhèn dìng zì ruò。
english: He kept as cool as a cucumber as the newspaper reporters shouted questions at him at once.

hanzi: 主任管理人或监督人，作为某一收藏品展览或图书馆的行政主管
pinyin: zhǔ rèn guǎn lǐ rén huò jiān dū rén， zuò wéi mǒu yī shōu cáng pǐn zhǎn lǎn huò tú shū guǎn de xíng zhèng zhǔ guǎn
english: One that manages or oversees, as the administrative director of a museum collection or a library.

hanzi: 海陆空协同作战的与陆军和海军联合军事登陆有关的或为此而组织的
pinyin: hǎi lù kòng xié tóng zuò zhàn de yù lù jūn huò hǎi jūn lián hé jūn shì dēng lù yǒu guān de huò wèi cǐ ér zǔ zhī de
english: Relating to or organized for a military landing by means of combined naval and land forces.

hanzi: 串联一系列部件或网络，其中每个部件的输出传递到下一个的输入
pinyin: chuàn lián yī xì liè bù jiàn huò wǎng luò， qí zhōng měi gè bù jiàn de shū chū chuán dì dào xià yī gè de shū rù
english: A series of components or networks, the output of each of which serves as the input for the next.

hanzi: 对抗作用一个生物和另一种生物新陈代谢物之间的对抗性关系
pinyin: duì kàng zuò yòng yī gè shēng wù huò lìng yī zhòng shēng wù xīn chén dài xiè wù zhī jiān de duì kàng xìng guān xi
english: The antagonistic association between an organism and the metabolic substances produced by another.

hanzi: 她看上去又可怜又孤独，对于答应来看她的朋友的到来已不抱希望。
pinyin: tā kàn shàng qù yòu kě lián yòu gū dú， duì yú dā ying lái kàn tā de péng you de dào lái yǐ bù bào xī wàng。
english: She looked wretched and forlorn, despairing of the arrival of a friend who had promised to meet her.

hanzi: 地震本身的真正原因是地球表面的或地底下的岩石断裂或破裂。
pinyin: dì zhèn běn shēn de zhēn zhèng yuán yīn shì dì qiú biǎo miàn de huò de dǐ xia de yán shí duàn liè huò pò liè。
english: The actual cause of the quake itself is the rupturing or breaking of rocks at or below the earth's surface.

hanzi: 内庭法官与检察官私下讨论或听取不必在法庭上审讯的案件的房间
pinyin: nèi tíng fǎ guān yù jiǎn chá guān sī xià tǎo lùn huò tīng qǔ bù bì zài fǎ tíng shàng shěn xùn de àn jiàn de fáng jiān
english: A room in which a judge may consult privately with attorneys or hear cases not taken into court.

hanzi: 我们的地毯是用中国纯羊毛手工织成的。它们富有弹性且做工精细。
pinyin: wǒ men de dì tǎn shì yòng Zhōng guó chún yáng máo shǒu gōng zhī chéng de。 tā men fù yǒu tán xìng qiě zuò gōng jīng xì。
english: Our carpet is hand- made of pure chinese wool. They are resilient and have fine workmanship.

hanzi: 正如今天的报道，英磅进一步下跌导致了市内的抛售的一股新浪潮。
pinyin: zhèng rú jīn tiān de bào dào， yīng bàng jìn yí bù xià diē dǎo zhì le shì nèi de pāo shòu de yī gǔ xīn làng cháo。
english: The further decline of the pound as reported today has set off a fresh wave of selling in the city.

hanzi: 昨天钢材股市上的股票被大量买进更明确地预示了大选即将来临。
pinyin: zuó tiān gāng cái gǔ shì shàng de gǔ piào bèi dà liàng mǎi jìn gèng míng què de yù shì le dà xuǎn jí jiāng lái lín。
english: A more specific election straw in the wind can be found in yesterday's heavy buying of steel shares.

hanzi: 流行敏感的，赶新潮的对最新的潮流或发展很敏感的，感兴趣的或了解的
pinyin: liú xíng mǐn gǎn de， gǎn xīn cháo de duì zuì xīn de cháo liú huò fā zhǎn hěn mǐn gǎn de， gǎn xìng qu de huò liǎo jiě de
english: Keenly aware of, knowledgeable about, or interested in the latest trends or developments.

hanzi: 捏造，想象虚构的作品或托词，并不代表是真实的，而是被编造出来的
pinyin: niē zào， xiǎng xiàng xū gòu de zuò pǐn huò tuō cí， bìng bù dài biǎo shì zhēn shí de， ér shì bèi biān zào chū lai de
english: An imaginative creation or a pretense that does not represent actuality but has been invented.

hanzi: 很少有老师能使学生对那些需要刻苦努力才能学好的枯燥学科感兴趣。
pinyin: hěn shǎo yǒu lǎo shī néng shǐ xué sheng duì nà xiē xū yào kè kǔ nǔ lì cái néng xué hǎo de kū zào xué kē gǎn xìng qu。
english: Few teachers are able to interest their students in dull subjects that mean a lot of hard work.

hanzi: 水平巷道穿过矿脉或与矿脉平行的矿井中水平或近似水平的巷道
pinyin: shuǐ píng xiàng dào chuān guò kuàng mài huò yù kuàng mài píng xíng de kuàng jǐng zhòng shuǐ píng huò jìn sì shuǐ píng de xiàng dào
english: A horizontal or nearly horizontal passageway in a mine running through or parallel to a vein.

hanzi: 然而，其他的同事们却听信了青年就业新闻发布官员的那一番明智的劝告。
pinyin: rán ér， qí tā de tóng shì men què tìng xìn le qīng nián jiù yè xīn wén fā bù guān yuán de nà yī pān míng zhì de quàn gào。
english: And the rest of the fellows fell for the Youth Employment Officer's words of wisdom.

hanzi: 若要老婆留意自己所说的话，作丈夫的只要把话向其他女性说便成了。
pinyin: ruò yào lǎo pó liú yì zì jǐ suǒ shuō de huà， zuò zhàng fu de zhǐ yào bǎ huà xiàng qí tā nu:3 xìng shuō pián chéng le。
english: If a man want his wife to pay attention to what he say, he address his remarks to another woman.

hanzi: 一种用于按照严格的过程规则实现的数学和逻辑运算的通用术语。
pinyin: yī zhòng yòng yú àn zhào yán gé de guò chéng guī zé shí xiàn de shù xué huò luó ji yùn suàn de tōng yòng shù yǔ。
english: A generic term for all mathematical and logical operations carried out according to precise rules of procedure.

hanzi: 在打斗中为了自卫把人打死是一回事，残酷无情地开枪杀人是另一回事。
pinyin: zài dǎ dòu zhòng wèi le zì wèi bǎ rén dǎ sǐ shì yī huí shì， cán kù wú qíng de kāi qiāng shā rén shì lìng yī huí shì。
english: It's one thing to kill a man in a fight, in self-defence, another to shoot him in cold blood.

hanzi: 我买了一本关于神权自使徒传至教皇及其他主教的一脉相承的书。
pinyin: wǒ mǎi le yī běn guān yú shén quán zì shǐ tú zhuàn zhì jiào huáng jí qí tā zhǔ jiào de yī mài xiàng chéng de shū。
english: I bought a book on the passing of spiritual authority from the apostles through successive popes and other bishops.

hanzi: 我的友人，多数生活在城市。然而，一提起农村，他们总是欣喜若狂。
pinyin: wǒ de yǒu rén， duō shù shēng huó zài chéng shì。 rán ér， yī tí qǐ nóng cūn， tā men zǒng shì xīn xǐ ruò kuáng。
english: Most of my friends live in the city, yet they always go into raptures at the mere mention of the country.

hanzi: 假若贵方愿意接受我们的建议，请通知我们，以便进一步商讨合作的细节。
pinyin: jiǎ ruò guì fāng yuàn yì jiē shòu wǒ men de jiàn yì， qǐng tōng zhī wǒ men， yǐ biàn jìn yí bù shāng tǎo hé zuò de xì jié。
english: If this proposal is acceptable to you, please let us know so that we can discuss details.

hanzi: 我得把你送进监狱直到你的案子进行审理，除非你可以找个人保释你。
pinyin: wǒ de bǎ nǐ sòng jìn jiān yù zhí dào nǐ de àn zi jìn xíng shěn lǐ， chú fēi nǐ kě yǐ zhǎo gè rén bǎo shì nǐ。
english: I shall have to put you in prison until your case can be heard, unless you can find anyone to go bail for you.

hanzi: 律师的论点所依据的前提是，人们在没有被证明有罪之前都是无罪的。
pinyin: lu:4 shī de lùn diǎn suǒ yī jù de qián tí shì， rén men zài méi yǒu bèi zhèng míng yǒu zuì zhī qián dōu shì wú zuì de。
english: The lawyer based his argument on the premise that people are innocent until they are proved to be guilty.

hanzi: 一连串的持续跳动以数量短促而突然的变化为特征的一系列间歇性出现
pinyin: yī lián chuàn de chí xù tiào dòng yǐ shù liàng duǎn cù ér tū rán de biàn huà wèi tè zhēng de yī xì liè jiàn xiē xìng chū xiàn
english: Any of a series of intermittent occurrences characterized by a brief, sudden change in a quantity.

hanzi: 那个越狱犯躲避警察追捕一个多星期之后，终于在一家小旅馆被抓获。
pinyin: nèi gè yuè yù fàn duǒ bì jǐng chá zhuī bǔ yī gè duō xīng qī zhī hòu， zhōng yú zài yī jiā xiǎo lu:3 guǎn bèi zhuā huò。
english: After eluding the police for over a week, the escaped prisoner was finally run down in a public house.

hanzi: 变速器，换档装置在一传送过程中从一个齿轮变到另一个齿轮的一种机械装置
pinyin: biàn sù qì， huàn dàng zhuāng zhì zài yī chuán sòng guò chéng zhòng zòng yī gè chǐ lūn biàn dào lìng yī gè chǐ lūn de yī zhòng jī xiè zhuāng zhì
english: A mechanism for changing from one gear to another in a transmission.

hanzi: 他说他如何如何赚钱，我就不太相信，我们认识以来他总是喜欢吹牛。
pinyin: tā shuō tā rú hé rú hé zhuàn qián， wǒ jiù bù tài xiāng xìn， wǒ men rèn shi yǐ lái tā zǒng shì xǐ huan chuī niú。
english: I don't believe all he says about the profits he is making; ever since I have known him he has liked to talk big.

hanzi: 新牧师访问了他教堂所属的各个家庭的每个成员，以便更好地了解他们。
pinyin: xīn mù shī fǎng wèn le tā jiào táng suǒ shǔ de gè ge jiā tíng de měi gè chéng yuán， yǐ biàn gèng hǎo de liǎo jiě tā men。
english: The new minister called on each of the families of his church in order to become better acquainted with them.

hanzi: 人言沉默是金，但这世界出产的顶尖蠢才们则对这问题未见有话说过。
pinyin: rén yán chén mò shì jīn， dàn zhè shì jiè chū chǎn de dǐng jiān chǔn cái men zé duì zhè wèn tí wèi xiàn yǒu huà shuō guò。
english: Silence is said to be golden, but the best fool the world has has ever produced nothing to say on the subject.

hanzi: 孩子们玩遍了博览会上所有的娱乐项目，最后发现坐车回家的钱都不够了。
pinyin: hái zi men wàn biàn le bó lǎn huì shàng suǒ yǒu de yú lè xiàng mù， zuì hòu fā xiàn zuò jū huí jiā de qián dōu bù gòu le。
english: The children went on everything at the Fair, and then found they hadn't enough money to get the bus home.

hanzi: 尽管我儿子在伊顿公学中得过名次，但当然还得取决于他的入学考试成绩。
pinyin: jǐn guǎn wǒ ér zi zài yī dùn gōng xué zhòng de guò míng cì， dàn dāng rán huán de qǔ jué yú tā de rù xué kǎo shì chéng jī。
english: My son has a place at Eton, although of course it still hinges on the result of his entrance examination.

hanzi: 半神半人的女神神与人的女性子孙，她拥有一部分但并不是全部神的力量
pinyin: bàn shén bàn rén de nu:3 shén shén yù rén de nu:3 xìng zǐ sūn， tā yōng yǒu yī bù fen dàn bìng bù shì quán bù shén de lì liang
english: A female being, often the offspring of a god and a mortal, who has some but not all of the powers of a goddess.

hanzi: 她再与也不会干涉你了，你有了独立自主权，你已经有了你自己出入大门的钥匙。
pinyin: tā zài yù yě bù kuài gān shè nǐ le， nǐ yǒu le dú lì zì zhǔ quán， nǐ yǐ jīng yǒu le nǐ zì jǐ chū rù dà mén de yào shi。
english: She won't interfere with you any more; your independence is achieved and you have won your latchkey.

hanzi: 霉，霉菌通常在植物或多种有机物表面形成白色生长物的菌类中的一种
pinyin: méi， méi jūn tōng cháng zài zhí wù huò duō zhǒng yǒu jī wù biǎo miàn xíng chéng bái sè shēng zhǎng wù de jūn lèi zhòng dì yī zhòng
english: Any of various fungi that form a superficial, usually whitish growth on plants and various organic materials.

hanzi: 父母们担心他们孩子们的心灵全被他们在电视里经常见到的暴力行为所毒害。
pinyin: fù mǔ men dān xīn tā men hái zi men de xīn líng quán bèi tā men zài diàn shì lǐ jīng cháng xiàn dào de bào lì xíng wéi suǒ dú hài。
english: Parents are afraid that their child's will be polluted with the violence that they see on television.

hanzi: 此时，他们两人，男人和他的妻子都赤身露体，但他们彼此相对，并不难为情。
pinyin: cǐ shí， tā men liǎng rén， nán rén huò tā de qī zi dōu chì shēn lù tǐ， dàn tā men bǐ cǐ xiāng duì， bìng bù nàn wèi qíng。
english: Now they were both naked, the man and his wife, but they had no feeling of shame towards one another.

hanzi: 即使要求很高的市场对不同种类的商品，也需要有各种档次的货色和价格。
pinyin: jí shǐ yāo qiú hěn gāo de shì chǎng duì bù tóng zhǒng lèi de shāng pǐn， yě xū yào yǒu gè zhǒng dàng cì de huò shǎi huò jià gé。
english: Even highly demanding markets require a wide range of quality and price levels for any group of products.

hanzi: 假使语言是为了隐藏思想而被发明的，那么报纸就是对这不良发明的一大改进。
pinyin: jiǎ shǐ yǔ yán shì wèi le yǐn cáng sī xiǎng ér bèi fā míng de， nà me bào zhǐ jiù shì duì zhè bù liáng fā míng de yī dà gǎi jìn。
english: If word were invented to conceal think, newspaper should be a great improvement on a bad invention.

hanzi: 我们经过好多小时的辩论以后，谈判有了转折，没用多久便达成了协议。
pinyin: wǒ men jīng guò hǎo duō xiǎo shí de biàn lùn yǐ hòu， tán pàn yǒu le zhuǎn zhé， méi yòng duō jiǔ pián dá chéng le xié yì。
english: After all those hours of arguing, the talks began to head out and it was not long before we were able to reach an agreement.

hanzi: 他建立了产品控制标准数据，并为财会部建立了一套标准成本分析系统。
pinyin: tā jiàn lì le chǎn pǐn kòng zhì biāo zhǔn shù jù， bìng wèi cái kuài bù jiàn lì le yī tào biāo zhǔn chéng běn fēn xī xì tǒng。
english: He displayed admirably in establishing standard data, and a standard cost analysis system for our accounting department.

hanzi: 垫版印刷过程中的一个准备步骤，即通过调理和平整版面以确保印刷清晰
pinyin: diàn bǎn yìn shuà guò chéng zhòng dì yī gè zhǔn bèi bù zhòu， jí tōng guò tiáo lǐ hé píng zhěng bǎn miàn yǐ què bǎo yìn shuà qīng xī
english: The operation of preparing a form for printing by adjusting and leveling the plates to ensure a clear impression.

hanzi: 音轨一独立的轨道，如沿着一段胶片或磁带的，可将声音或其它信息记录在上面
pinyin: yīn guǐ yī dú lì de guǐ dào， rú yán zhe yī duàn jiāo piàn huò cí dài de， kě jiàng shēng yīn huò qí tā xìn xī jì lù zài shàng mian
english: A distinct path, as along a length of film or magnetic tape, on which sound or other information is recorded.

hanzi: 办事处的气氛已紧张一段时日，而最近解雇员工一事使事态的发展达到了顶点。
pinyin: bàn shì chù de qì fēn yǐ jǐn zhāng yī duàn shí rì， ér zuì jìn jiě gù yuán gōng yī shì shǐ shì tài de fā zhǎn dá dào le dǐng diǎn。
english: The atmosphere in the office has been tense for some time but this latest dismissal brings matter to a head.

hanzi: 圣诞节是朋友家人互相再见，以及寄圣诞卡给住在远方的人的一段时间。
pinyin: Shèng dàn jié shì péng you jiā rén hù xiāng zài jiàn， yǐ jí jì Shèng dàn kǎ jǐ zhù zài yuǎn fāng de rén de yī duàn shí jiān。
english: Christmas is a time for friends and family members to see each other again and to send Christmas cards to those who live far away.

hanzi: 我相信那成群女人们的服装颜色一定是一种华丽的奇观，我会百看不厌的。
pinyin: wǒ xiāng xìn nà chéng qún nu:3 rén men de fú zhuāng yán sè yī dìng shì yī zhòng huá lì de qí guān， wǒ kuài bǎi kàn bù yàn de。
english: I am certain that the colors of women's dresses moving in a throng must be a gorgeous spectacle of which I should never tire.

hanzi: 等值用不同种货币以一个固定的官方交换汇率表示的一定货币的等量价值
pinyin: děng zhí yòng bù tóng zhòng huò bì yǐ yī gè gù dìng de guān fāng jiāo huàn huì lu:4 biǎo shì de yī dìng huò bì de děng liàng jià zhí
english: The equivalent in value of a sum of money expressed in terms of a different currency at a fixed, official rate of exchange.

hanzi: 北极星第二星的光度中的一颗星，位于小熊星座把柄的末端，几乎位于北天极
pinyin: Běi jí xīng dì èr xīng de guāng dù zhòng dì yī kē xīng， wèi yú xiǎo xióng xīng zuò bǎ bǐng de mò duān， jī hū wèi yú běi tiān jí
english: A star of the second magnitude, at the end of the handle of the Little Dipper and almost at the north celestial pole.

hanzi: 我一整天围着火热的炉子辛辛苦苦地做出这顿饭，可是他们现在几乎一点儿也没有吃。
pinyin: wǒ yī zhěng tiān wéi zháo huǒ rè de lú zi xīn xīn kǔ kǔ de zuò chū zhè dùn fàn， kě shì tā men xiàn zài jī hū yī diǎnr yě méi yǒu jí。
english: I slaved away all day over a hot stove to produce this meal, and now they've hardly eaten any of it.

hanzi: 我不管你个人是怎么想的，但与公司顾客谈生意时，你必须遵循我们的既定方针。
pinyin: wǒ bù guǎn nǐ gè rén shì zěn me xiǎng de， dàn yù gōng sī gù kè tán shēng yi shí， nǐ bì xū zūn xún wǒ men de jì dìng fāng zhēn。
english: I don't care what your personal views are; when talking to this company's clients you must follow the party line.

hanzi: 堆肥腐烂有机体的混合物，如树叶或粪便，用来改善土壤结构并增加土壤养分
pinyin: duī féi fǔ làn yǒu jī tǐ de hùn hé wù， rú shù yè huò fèn biàn， yòng lái gǎi shàn tǔ rǎng jié gòu bìng zēng jiā tǔ rǎng yǎng fèn
english: A mixture of decaying organic matter, as from leaves and manure, used to improve soil structure and provide nutrients.

hanzi: 所有权构成控制或处置财产或所有权的合法权力的所有要素同时符合的条件
pinyin: suǒ yǒu quán gòu chéng kòng zhì huò chǔ zhì cái chǎn huò suǒ yǒu quán de hé fǎ quán lì de suǒ yǒu yào sù tóng shí fú hé de tiáo jiàn
english: The coincidence of all the elements that constitute the fullest legal right to control and dispose of property or a claim.

hanzi: 为保证设备的正常运转，每个品目都应包括一套标准定额的附件和专用工具。
pinyin: wèi bǎo zhèng shè bèi de zhèng cháng yùn zhuǎn， měi gè pǐn mù dōu yìng bāo kuò yī tào biāo zhǔn dìng é de fù jiàn huò zhuān yòng gōng jù。
english: Every item shall include a standard complement of accessories and special tools to ensure the normal operation.

hanzi: 当顺序写操作超出文件原长度时，在文件末端另分配给该文件的空间量。
pinyin: dàng shùn xù xiě cāo zuò chāo chū wén jiàn yuán cháng dù shí， zài wén jiàn mò duān lìng fēn pèi jǐ gāi wén jiàn de kōng jiān liàng。
english: The amount of space to be allocated at the end of a file each time a sequential write exceeds the allocated length of the file.

hanzi: 抛物线到一固定直线和不在直线上某一固定点等距的点的轨迹所形成的平面曲线
pinyin: pāo wù xiàn dào yī gù dìng zhí xiàn huò bù zài zhí xiàn shàng mǒu yī gù dìng diǎn děng jù de diǎn de guǐ jì suǒ xíng chéng de píng miàn qū xiàn
english: A plane curve formed by the locus of points equidistant from a fixed line and a fixed point not on the line.

hanzi: 抛物线到一固定直线和不在直线上某一固定点等距的点的轨迹所形成的平面曲线
pinyin: pāo wù xiàn dào yī gù dìng zhí xiàn huò bù zài zhí xiàn shàng mǒu yī gù dìng diǎn děng jù de diǎn de guǐ jì suǒ xíng chéng de píng miàn qū xiàn
english: A plane curve formed by the locus of points equidistant from a fixed line and a fixed point not on the line.

hanzi: 成洞身体组织或器官内空洞的形成，尤指那种因肺结核而在肺中形成的空洞
pinyin: chéng dòng shēn tǐ zǔ zhī huò qì guān nèi kōng dòng de xíng chéng， yóu zhǐ nà zhòng yīn fèi jié hé ér zài fèi zhòng xíng chéng de kōng dòng
english: The formation of cavities in a body tissue or an organ, especially those formed in the lung as a result of tuberculosis.

hanzi: 我想把的房子扩建一下，但我的抵押已经全部用完，因此我不得不搁数年再说了。
pinyin: wǒ xiǎng bǎ de fáng zi kuò jiàn yī xià， dàn wǒ de dǐ yá yǐ jīng quán bù yòng wán， yīn cǐ wǒ bù dé bù gē shuò nián zài shuō le。
english: I would like to build an extension to my house, but I'm up to the hilt on my mortgage so I'll have to leave it a few years.

hanzi: 军事法庭由指挥官指定的官员组成的军事或海军法庭以对违反军事法的人进行审判
pinyin: jūn shì fǎ tíng yóu zhǐ huī guān zhǐ dìng de guān yuán zǔ chéng de jūn shì huò hǎi jūn fǎ tíng yǐ duì wéi fǎn jūn shì fǎ de rén jìn xíng shěn pàn
english: A military or naval court of officers appointed by a commander to try persons for offenses under military law.

hanzi: 他在去糖果店的路上，把钱掉到地上了，硬币沿着人行道滚动，掉进阴沟里去了。
pinyin: tā zài qù táng guǒ diàn de lù shang， bǎ qián diào dào dì shang le， yìng bì yán zhe rén xìng dào gǔn dòng， diào jìn yīn gōu lǐ qù le。
english: On him way to the sweet shop, he dropped his sixpence and it rolled along the pavement and then disappeared down a drain.

hanzi: 那家公司的今年年度预算出现亏损。因为公司时常出现赤字，不久将会关闭。
pinyin: nà jiā gōng sī de jīn nián nián dù yù suàn chū xiàn kuī sǔn。 yīn wèi gōng sī shí cháng chū xiàn chì zì， bù jiǔ jiāng huì guān bì。
english: The annual budget of that company continues to show a deficit this year. It will go out of business because it is always in the red.

hanzi: 假如施予比接受更受到祝福的话，我们大多数都情愿让其他的人得到更大的祝福。
pinyin: jiǎ rú shī yǔ bì jiē shòu gèng shòu dào zhù fú de huà， wǒ men dà duō shù dōu qíng yuàn ràng qí tā de rén dé dào gèng dà de zhù fú。
english: If it is more blessed to give than to receive, then most of us are content to let the other fellow have the greater blessing.

hanzi: 定时器一种计时器，尤指控制时间间隔并指示间隔结束的那种计时器，如炉子上的计时器
pinyin: dìng shí qì yī zhòng jì shí qì， yóu zhǐ kòng zhì shí jiān jiàn gé bìng zhǐ shì jiàn gé jié shù de nà zhòng jì shí qì， rú lú zi shàng de jì shí qì
english: A timepiece, especially one used for measuring and signaling the end of time intervals, as on a stove.

hanzi: 感谢你们使我的访问如此有价值。我将珍惜我们之间的友谊及你们给予我的盛情款待。
pinyin: gǎn xiè nǐ men shǐ wǒ de fǎng wèn rú cǐ yǒu jià zhí。 wǒ jiàng zhēn xī wǒ men zhī jiān de yǒu yì jí nǐ men gěi yǔ wǒ de shèng qíng kuǎn dài。
english: Thank you for making my visit so worthwhile. I shall treasure your friendship and kind hospitality you have given me.

hanzi: 表处理语言用于处理包含有表格的数据的编程语言，被广泛地运用于人工智能研究
pinyin: biǎo chǔ lǐ yǔ yán yòng yú chǔ lǐ bāo hán yǒu biǎo gé de shù jù de biān chéng yǔ yán， bèi guǎng fàn de yùn yòng yú rén gōng zhì néng yán jiū
english: A programming language designed to process data consisting of lists. It is widely used in artificial intelligence research.

hanzi: 药量已被减低到某一水平，既足以对付受感染的细胞，又不会干扰正常的新陈代谢。
pinyin: yào liàng yǐ bèi jiǎn dī dào mǒu yī shuǐ píng， jì zú yǐ duì fu shòu gǎn rǎn de xì bāo， yòu bù huì gān rǎo zhèng cháng de xīn chén dài xiè。
english: The dosage was geared down to a level which would work on the infected cells but not upset their normal metabolism.

hanzi: 我已经注意到有些雇员上班迟到一个小时. 我不点出名字来, 但是要是你觉得我说的是你....
pinyin: wǒ yǐ jīng zhù yì dào yǒu xiē gù yuán shàng bān chí dào yī gè xiǎo shí.  wǒ bù diǎn chū míng zì lái,  dàn shì yào shì nǐ jué de wǒ shuō de shì nǐ....
english: I have noticed some employees coming to work an hour late. I shall name no names, but if the cap fits....

hanzi: 脚注放在书或手稿的页底的注释，对文中的标明的一部分加以评论或引出参考书目
pinyin: jué zhù fàng zài shū huò shǒu gǎo de yè dǐ de zhù shì， duì Wén zhōng de biāo míng de yī bù fen jiā yǐ píng lùn huò yǐn chū cān kǎo shū mù
english: A note placed at the bottom of a page of a book or manuscript that comments on or cites a reference for a designated part of the text.

hanzi: 尽管在井下不舒服，但全体矿工决心在井下罢工，直到他们增加工资的要求得到满足为止。
pinyin: jǐn guǎn zài jǐng xià bù shū fu， dàn quán tǐ kuàng gōng jué xīn zài jǐng xià bà gōng， zhí dào tā men zēng jiā gōng zī de yāo qiú dé dào mǎn zú wéi zhǐ。
english: All the miners are determined to stay down until their pay demands are met. In spite of the discomfort.

hanzi: 格雷在一小块地下开始种花，如今他的生意确实十分红火，英格兰各地都有他的花店。
pinyin: gé léi zài yī xiǎo kuài dì xià kāi shǐ zhòng huā， rú jīn tā de shēng yi què shí shí fēn hóng huǒ， yīng gé lán gè dì dōu yǒu tā de huā diàn。
english: Gray started growing flowers on a small piece of land. Now he has really made it big and owns flower shops all over England.

hanzi: 脚踏旋转平台一种由一圆形小平台组成的游乐场设备，当推动它或踩其踏板时能够转动
pinyin: jué tà xuán zhuǎn píng tái yī zhòng yóu yī yuán xíng xiǎo píng tái zǔ chéng de yóu lè chǎng shè bèi， dàng tuī dòng tā huò cǎi qí tà bǎn shí néng gòu zhuǎn dòng
english: A piece of playground equipment consisting of a small circular platform that revolves when pushed or pedaled.

hanzi: 考克斯兄弟雇了一个尽职的鬼魂替他们干了大部分事情，这件事终于变成了公认的事实。
pinyin: kǎo kè sī xiōng dì gù le yī gè jìn zhí de guǐ hún tì tā men gàn le dà bù fen shì qing， zhè jiàn shì zhōng yú biàn chéng le gōng rèn de shì shí。
english: In time, it became an accepted fact that the Cox brothers employed a conscientious ghost that did most of their work for them.

hanzi: 这位女秘书一心忙于勾引新来的经理，简直未觉察到办公室里人人都在暗中笑她。
pinyin: zhè wèi nu:3 mì shū yī xīn máng yú gōu yǐn xīn lái de jīng lǐ， jiǎn zhí wèi jué chá dào bàn gōng shì lǐ rén rén dōu zài àn zhōng xiào tā。
english: The secretary was so busy getting her hooks into the new manager, that she hardly noticed that everyone in the office was laughing at her.

hanzi: 对于贵方的发票金额，贵方可开出以我方为付款人，自发票出具之日起三个月后付款的汇票。
pinyin: duì yú guì fāng de fā piào jīn é， guì fāng kě kāi chū yǐ wǒ fāng wèi fù kuǎn rén， zì fā piào chū jù zhī rì qǐ sān gè yuè hòu fù kuǎn de huì piào。
english: For the amount of your invoice you may cover yourself by drawing upon me at three months from the date of the invoice.

hanzi: 生物动力学有机物栽培和作物培养的一种方法，需要考虑如行星作用和季节轮换等因素
pinyin: shēng wù dòng lì xué yǒu jī wù zāi péi huò zuò wù péi yǎng de yī zhòng fāng fǎ， xū yào kǎo lu:4 rú xíng xīng zuò yòng huò jì jié lún huàn děng yīn sù
english: A method of organic gardening and crop cultivation in which certain factors, such as planetary and seasonal cycles, are considered.

hanzi: 电晕在电晕放电中在高压电极出现的一种微弱光辉，常伴随有朝向低压电极的电流
pinyin: diàn yùn zài diàn yùn fàng diàn zhòng zài gāo yā diàn jí chū xiàn de yī zhòng wēi ruò guāng huī， cháng bàn suí yǒu cháo xiàng dī yà diàn jí de diàn liú
english: A faint glow enveloping the high-field electrode in a corona discharge, often accompanied by streamers directed toward the low-field electrode.

hanzi: 质量密集月球上的阴暗部，其内部岩石比周围地区的岩石的密度大，因此产生略大些的引力
pinyin: zhì liàng mì jí yuè qiú shàng de yīn àn bù， qí nèi bù yán shí bì zhōu wéi dì qū de yán shí de mì dù dà， yīn cǐ chǎn shēng lu:è dà xiē de yǐn lì
english: A mare on the moon having rock of greater density than that of the surrounding area, thus exerting a slightly higher gravitational force.

hanzi: 对计算机程序中的指令序列的检测和记录，例如在监控程序和调试程序中使用的情况。
pinyin: duì jì suàn jī chéng xù zhòng dì zhǐ lìng xù liè de jiǎn cè huò jì lù， lì rú zài jiān kòng chéng xù huò tiáo shì chéng xù zhòng shǐ yòng de qíng kuàng。
english: The detection and recording of the sequencing of instructions in computer programs, for example, as used in monitors and debugging routines.

hanzi: 我曾经警告过他不要调换工作，可如今他被迫在一家亏损公司工作。他这是自作自受。
pinyin: wǒ céng jīng jǐng gào guò tā bù yào diào huàn gōng zuò， kě rú jīn tā bèi pò zài yī jiā kuī sǔn gōng sī gōng zuò。 tā zhè shì zì zuò zì shòu。
english: I warned him not to change his job but now he is forced to work for a company that is losing money. He has made his own bed and now he must lie in it.

hanzi: 想到我们把所有的钱都花在儿子的教育上，而他却所想去一家沉闷的工厂工作，我感到很伤心。
pinyin: xiǎng dào wǒ men bǎ suǒ yǒu de qián dōu huā zài ér zi de jiào yù shàng， ér tā què suǒ xiǎng qù yī jiā chén mèn de gōng chǎng gōng zuò， wǒ gǎn dào hěn shāng xīn。
english: It breads my heart to think of all the money we spent on our son's education and all he wants to do is work in a dreary factory.

hanzi: 边座，楼座剧院或大礼堂中为了增加座席，而从后面或侧墙突出的具有倾斜地板的上面部分
pinyin: biān zuò， lóu zuò jù yuàn huò dà lǐ táng zhòng wèi le zēng jiā zuò xí， ér zòng hòu mian huò zhāi qiáng tū chū de jù yǒu qīng xié dì bǎn de shàng mian bù fen
english: An upper section, often with a sloping floor, projecting from the rear or side walls of a theater or an auditorium to provide additional seating.

hanzi: 党羽的政治阴谋经常是良好政府的妨碍。公务上的政治争斗经常是带削弱性质和招致反效果的
pinyin: dǎng yǔ de zhèng zhì yīn móu jīng cháng shì liáng hǎo zhèng fǔ de fáng ài。 gōng wù shàng de zhèng zhì zhēng dòu jīng cháng shì dài xuē ruò xìng zhì huò zhāo zhì fǎn xiào guǒ de
english: Partisan politics is often an obstruction to good government. Office politics are often debilitating and counterproductive.

hanzi: 我听说有人能回忆起童年甚至婴儿时期的一些往事，但是我的过去依依稀稀，我确实记不清了。
pinyin: wǒ tīng shuō yǒu rén néng huí yì qǐ tóng nián shèn zhì yīng ér shí qī de yī xiē wǎng shì， dàn shì wǒ de guò qu yī yī xī xī， wǒ què shí jì bù qīng le。
english: I hear of people recalling incidents from their early childhood—and even their infancy—but my dim and distant past is very dim indeed to me.

hanzi: 既然雇主们同工会领袖无法在直接谈判中达成协议，就指定了一位当地的名律师进行调解。
pinyin: jì rán gù zhǔ men tóng gōng huì lǐng xiù wú fǎ zài zhí jiē tán pàn zhòng dá chéng xié yì， jiù zhǐ dìng le yī wèi dāng dì de míng lu:4 shī jìn xíng tiáo jiě。
english: A well-known local lawyer has been appointed to mediate between the employers and the union leaders, since they can't reach an agreement in direct talks.

hanzi: 我们的房子只住我们两人实在太大了，所以我们利用周末抽空外出看看是否有合适的套房，想买一套。
pinyin: wǒ men de fáng zi zhǐ zhù wǒ men liǎng rén shí zài tài dà le， suǒ yǐ wǒ men lì yòng zhōu mò chōu kòng wài chū kàn kan shì fǒu yǒu hé shì de tào fáng， xiǎng mǎi yī tào。
english: Our house is too large for just the two of us and so we spent part of the weekend seeing over some flats with a view to buying one.

hanzi: 经过长时间调查后，撤消了对经理失职罪的指控，并免除了他对导致工厂烧毁的失火事故的责任。
pinyin: jīng guò zhǎng shí jiān diào chá hòu， chè xiāo le duì jīng lǐ shī zhí zuì de zhǐ kòng， bìng miǎn chú le tā duì dǎo zhì gōng chǎng shāo huǐ de shī huǒ shì gù de zé rèn。
english: After a long inquiry, the Manager was exonerated from the charge of neglect and from any responsibility for the fire that destroyed the factory.

hanzi: 他过去毫不留情地欺侮他的秘书，但是如被逼太甚，最温顺者也会反抗的，结果有一天她不辞而别了。
pinyin: tā guò qu háo bú liú qíng de qī wǔ tā de mì shū， dàn shì rú bèi bī tài shèn， zuì wēn shùn zhě yě kuài fǎn kàng de， jié guǒ yǒu yī tiān tā bù cí ér biè le。
english: He used to bully his secretary without mercy, but even a worm will turn and one day she walked out and left her job without even saying goodbye.

hanzi: 酒精中毒由过量及习惯性饮酒而造成的一种慢性渐进的病理状况，主要影响神经及消化系统
pinyin: jiǔ jīng zhòng dú yóu guò liàng jí xí guàn xìng yǐn jiǔ ér zào chéng de yī zhòng màn xìng jiàn jìn de bìng lǐ zhuàng kuàng， zhǔ yào yǐng xiǎng shén jīng jí xiāo huà xì tǒng
english: A chronic, progressive pathological condition, mainly affecting the nervous and digestive systems, caused by the excessive and habitual consumption of alcohol.

hanzi: 今天大地在太阳光里向我营营哼鸣，象一个织着布的妇人，用一种已经被忘却的语言，哼着一些古代的歌曲。
pinyin: jīn tiān dà dì zài tài yáng guāng lǐ xiàng wǒ yíng yíng hng míng， xiàng yī gè zhī zhuó bù de fù rén， yòng yī zhòng yǐ jīng bèi wàng què de yǔ yán， hng zhuó yī xiē gǔ dài de gē qǔ。
english: The earth hums to me today in the sun, like a woman at her spinning, some ballad of the ancient time in a forgotten tongue.

hanzi: 我的引导者呵，领导着我在光明逝去之前，进到沉静的山谷里去吧。在那里，一生的收获将会成熟为黄金的智慧。
pinyin: wǒ de yǐn dǎo zhě hē， lǐng dǎo zhuó wǒ zài guāng míng shì qù zhī qián， jìn dào chén jìng de shān gǔ lǐ qù ba。 zài nà li， yī shēng de shōu huò jiāng huì chéng shú wèi huáng jīn de zhì huì。
english: Lead me, my Guide, before the light fades, into the valley of quiet where life's harvest mellows into golden wisdom.

hanzi: 模态逻辑命题的限制条件，建立在其内容的肯定或否定其可能性，不可能性，偶然性或必然性基础之上
pinyin: mó tài luó ji mìng tí de xiàn zhì tiáo jiàn， jiàn lì zài qí nèi róng de kěn dìng huò fǒu dìng qí kě néng xìng， bù kě néng xìng， ǒu rán xìng huò bì rán xìng jī chǔ zhī shàng
english: The classification of propositions on the basis of whether they assert or deny the possibility, impossibility, contingency, or necessity of their content.

hanzi: 神判法让被控诉的人接受痛苦或危险的考验的一种审判方法，结果被视为神对其是否有罪或清白的审定
pinyin: shén pàn fǎ ràng bèi kòng sù de rén jiē shòu tòng kǔ huò wēi xiǎn de kǎo yàn de yī zhòng shěn pàn fāng fǎ， jié guǒ bèi shì wéi shén duì qí shì fǒu yǒu zuì huò qīng bái de shěn dìng
english: A method of trial in which the accused was subjected to physically painful or dangerous tests, the result being regarded as a divine judgment of guilt or innocence.

hanzi: 在微波系统中，来自各处的分散的输入必须被汇集在一起，以形成一个综合的输入，然后由无线电发送和接收。
pinyin: zài wēi bō xì tǒng zhòng， lái zì gè chù de fēn sàn de shū rù bì xū bèi huì jí zài yī qǐ， yǐ xíng chéng yī gè zōng hé de shū rù， rán hòu yóu wú xiàn diàn fā sòng huò jiē shōu。
english: In microwave system the separate input from various sources must be brought together to give a composite input which is then transmitted and received by radio.

hanzi: 超声波心动描记器一种用来显示详细的大脑图象的仪器，利用超声波发送和反射的差异来测试并无伤无痛
pinyin: chāo shēng bō xīn dòng miáo jì qì yī zhòng yòng lái xiǎn shì xiáng xì de dà nǎo tú xiàng de yí qì， lì yòng chāo shēng bō fā sòng huò fǎn shè de chā yì lái cè shì bìng wú shāng wú tòng
english: An instrument that in a painless and noninvasive manner uses the differential transmission and reflection of ultrasonic waves to create a detailed visual image of the brain.

hanzi: 联体，并体天生的或手术施行的通常进行血液交换的两器官的联合，比如在连体婴的发育或某种嫁接手术中
pinyin: lián tǐ， bìng tǐ tiān shēng de huò shǒu shù shī xíng de tōng cháng jìn xíng xuè yè jiāo huàn de liǎng qì guān de lián hé， bǐ rú zài lián tǐ yīng de fā yù huò mǒu zhǒng jià jiē shǒu shù zhòng
english: The natural or surgical union of anatomical parts of two organisms, usually involving exchange of blood, as in the development of Siamese twins or in certain transplant operations.

hanzi: 他援引教授物理学方面的一些运动定律为例，说明当计算机用于辅助教学时，学生在幼年就能够理解这些定律。
pinyin: tā yuán yǐn jiào shòu wù lǐ xué fāng miàn de yī xiē yùn dòng dìng lu:4 wèi lì， shuō míng dàng jì suàn jī yòng yú fǔ zhù jiào xué shí， xué sheng zài yòu nián jiù néng gòu lǐ jiě zhè xie dìng lu:4。
english: He cites as an example the teaching of the laws of motion in physics, which he says are accessible at an early age when a computer is used to assist in the instruction.

hanzi: 验证协议的程序，它从一个给定的初始状态机械地产生出一切可以到达的状态，并且审查每一状态下用户定义的条件的有效性。
pinyin: yàn zhèng xié yì de chéng xù， tā zòng yī gè jǐ dìng de chū shǐ zhuàng tài jī xiè dì chǎn shēng chū yī qiè kě yǐ dào dá de zhuàng tài， bìng qiě shěn chá měi yī zhuàng tài xià yòng hù dìng yì de tiáo jiàn de yǒu xiào xìng。
english: A program for protocol verification which mechanically generates all states reachable from a given initial state and checks the validity of user defined conditions in each state.

hanzi: 曾有两位年轻人非法侵入了大学网络，创建了一个公告牌，并在上面装入了流行的商业软件，还邀请因特网上的用户下载这些软件包。
pinyin: zēng yǒu liǎng wèi nián qīng rén fēi fǎ qīn rù le dà xué wǎng luò， chuàng jiàn le yī gè gōng gào pái， bìng zài shàng mian zhuāng rù le liú xíng de shāng yè ruǎn jiàn， huán yāo qǐng yīn tè wǎng shàng de yòng hù xià zài zhè xie ruǎn jiàn bāo。
english: Once two lads broke into the university network, created a bulletin board, loaded popular commercial software on it and invited users across Internet to download the packages.

hanzi: 有人说布什因选举大会开得不好以及竞选方法不佳而受害。可是即使两者都做得较好，结果也将是一样。我想根本问题也不在于经济。
pinyin: yǒu rén shuō Bù shí yīn xuǎn jǔ dà huì kāi de bù hǎo yǐ jí jìng xuǎn fāng fǎ bù jiā ér shòu hài。 kě shì jí shǐ liǎng zhě dōu zuò de jiào hǎo， jié guǒ yě jiàng shì yí yàng。 wǒ xiǎng gēn běn wèn tí yě bù zài yú jīng jì。
english: Some will say Mr. Bush was done in by a bad convention and a bad campaign. But if both had gone better the outcome would have been the same. And I don't think it all came down to the economy, either.

hanzi: 马克思列宁主义马克思主义的延伸，包含了列宁的帝国主义是资本主义的最终表现形式的理论，并指出了斗争中心从发达国家到不发达国家的转移
pinyin: Mǎ kè sī liè níng zhǔ yì Mǎ kè sī zhǔ yì de yán shēn， bāo hán le liè níng de dì guó zhǔ yì shì zī běn zhǔ yì de zuì zhōng biǎo xiàn xíng shì de lǐ lùn， bìng zhǐ chū le dòu zhēng zhōng xīn zòng fā dá guó jiā dào bù fā dá guó jiā de zhuǎn yí
english: The expansion of Marxism to include both Lenin's concept of imperialism as the final form of capitalism and a shift in the focus of struggle from the developed to the underdeveloped countries.

hanzi: 一种重要的处理过程，其中最高优先权处理任务常常由具有优先度的实时任务形成，经过使用中断而进入较低优先权任务或后台处理任务。
pinyin: yī zhòng zhòng yào de chǔ lǐ guò chéng， qí zhōng zuì gāo yōu xiān quán chǔ lǐ rèn wu cháng cháng yóu jù yǒu yōu xiān dù de shí shí rèn wu xíng chéng， jīng guò shǐ yòng zhōng duàn ér jìn rù jiào dī yōu xiān quán rèn wu huò hòu tái chǔ lǐ rèn wu。
english: An important processing procedure in which top-priority processing most often results from real-time entries which usually have precedence, through the use of interrupts into lower-priority or background processing.

hanzi: 在分时系统中，终端和其它设备进行一次数据交换，从而完成一个特定的动作或产生一个特定的结果。例如，输入客户的存款金额并修改客户的余额。
pinyin: zài fèn shí xì tǒng zhòng， zhōng duān huò qí tā shè bèi jìn xíng yī cì shù jù jiāo huàn， cóng ér wán chéng yī gè tè dìng de dòng zuò huò chǎn shēng yī gè tè dìng de jié guǒ。 lì rú， shū rù kè hù de cún kuǎn jīn é bìng xiū gǎi kè hù de yú é。
english: In systems with time sharing, an exchange between a terminal and another device that accomplishes a particular action or result; for example, the entry of a customer's deposit and the updating of the customer's balance.

hanzi: 园中有一堆马铃薯。
pinyin: yuán zhòng yǒu yī duī mǎ líng shǔ。
english: There is a pile of potato in the garden.

hanzi: 她一化妆就是几个小时.
pinyin: tā yī huà zhuāng jiù shì jǐ ge xiǎo shí.
english: She spends hours painting her face.

hanzi: 增税引起了一片怨声。
pinyin: zēng shuì yǐn qǐ le yī piàn yuàn shēng。
english: There was uproar over the tax increase.

hanzi: 我们有个女仆干家务活儿.
pinyin: wǒ men yǒu gè nu:3 pú gàn jiā wù huór.
english: We have a maid to do the housework.

hanzi: 他似乎和往常一样忙碌。
pinyin: tā sì hu huò wǎng cháng yí yàng máng lù。
english: He seems to be as busy as ever.

hanzi: 谁都不喜欢被人怠慢。
pinyin: shéi dōu bù xǐ huan bèi rén dài màn。
english: No one like to be treated with neglect.

hanzi: 资方有权拒绝接纳.
pinyin: zī fāng yǒu quán jù jué jiē nà.
english: The management reserves the right to refuse admission.

hanzi: 在搏斗中打出了几拳.
pinyin: zài bó dòu zhòng dǎ chū le jǐ quán.
english: In the struggle several punches were thrown.

hanzi: 我最犯不上对你撒谎了。
pinyin: wǒ zuì fàn bù shàng duì nǐ sā huǎng le。
english: Least of all would I lie to you.

hanzi: 需刷牙以去除牙斑.
pinyin: xū shuā yá yǐ qù chú yá bān.
english: It is necessary to remove plaque by brushing one's teeth.

hanzi: 腐败与犯罪携手并行。
pinyin: fǔ bài yù fàn zuì xié shǒu bìng xíng。
english: Corruption and crime go hand in hand.

hanzi: 她迁往气候较温暖的地方.
pinyin: tā qiān wàng qì hòu jiào wēn nuǎn de dì fang.
english: She moved to a warmer climate.

hanzi: 他们行使了内阁否决权。
pinyin: tā men xíng shǐ le nèi gé fǒu jué quán。
english: They carried the ministerial veto.

hanzi: 这个男孩被引诱逃学。
pinyin: zhè gè nán hái bèi yǐn yòu táo xué。
english: The boy was enticed into playing truant.

hanzi: 把这些捣乱分子赶出去。
pinyin: bǎ zhè xie dǎo luàn fèn zǐ gǎn chū qù。
english: Let's pitch out the troublemakers.

hanzi: 撒谎违反我做人的原则。
pinyin: sā huǎng wéi fǎn wǒ zuò rén de yuán zé。
english: Lying goes against my principles.

hanzi: 他喜欢在说话中用比喻。
pinyin: tā xǐ huan zài shuō huà zhòng yòng bǐ yù。
english: He likes to talk in similitude.

hanzi: 我会设法尽可能多储蓄。
pinyin: wǒ kuài shè fǎ jìn kě néng duō chǔ xù。
english: I will try to save as much as I can.

hanzi: 这螺丝钉需要再拧紧些。
pinyin: zhè luó sī dīng xū yào zài nìng jǐn xiē。
english: This screw needs tightening.

hanzi: 他的怪衣裳简直笑死人。
pinyin: tā de guài yī shang jiǎn zhí xiào sǐ rén。
english: His weird clothes really gas me.

hanzi: 我喜欢用马铃薯炒菜。
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan yòng mǎ líng shǔ chǎo cài。
english: I like to cook dishes with potatoes.

hanzi: 他给我买了两只小乌龟。
pinyin: tā jǐ wǒ mǎi le liǎng zhǐ xiǎo wū guī。
english: He bought two small tortoises for me.

hanzi: 罗马教皇的使节或代表
pinyin: Luó mǎ jiào huáng de shǐ jié huò dài biǎo
english: A papal ambassador or representative.

hanzi: 战时很少交换俘虏.
pinyin: zhàn shí hěn shǎo jiāo huàn fú lǔ.
english: The exchange of prisoners during a war is unusual.

hanzi: 我那时正在后院劈柴。
pinyin: wǒ nà shí zhèng zài hòu yuàn pǐ chái。
english: I was out in the back yard splitting logs.

hanzi: 换档时扳动这根操纵杆。
pinyin: huàn dàng shí pān dòng zhè gēn cāo zòng gǎn。
english: Move this lever to change gear.

hanzi: 他一再缺课使人担忧.
pinyin: tā yī zài quē kè shǐ rén dān yōu.
english: His repeated absence (from school) is worrying.

hanzi: 你吃的含淀粉的食物太多了。
pinyin: nǐ jí de hán diàn fěn de shí wù tài duō le。
english: You eat too much starch.

hanzi: 他向朋友倾诉烦恼事。
pinyin: tā xiàng péng you qīng sù fán nǎo shì。
english: He confided his troubles to his friend.

hanzi: 那群牲畜被绳子拴着。
pinyin: nà qún shēng chù bèi shéng zi shuān zhuó。
english: The animals were fastened by tether.

hanzi: 他讨厌人家影射他秃顶.
pinyin: tā tǎo yàn rén jiā yǐng shè tā tū dǐng.
english: He resents any allusion to his baldness.

hanzi: 他们未经许可擅入该地.
pinyin: tā men wèi jīng xǔ kě shàn rù gāi de.
english: They entered the area without permission.

hanzi: 你过于信赖你的记忆力了。
pinyin: nǐ guò yú xìn lài nǐ de jì yì lì le。
english: You trust to your memory too much.

hanzi: 谷粒禾谷类作物的一个颗粒
pinyin: yù lì hé gǔ lèi zuò wù de yī gè kē lì
english: A single grain of a cereal plant.

hanzi: 危险驾驶应受严惩。
pinyin: wēi xiǎn jià shǐ yìng shòu yán chéng。
english: Dangerous driving should be severely punished.

hanzi: 她的聪颖是不言而喻的。
pinyin: tā de cōng yǐng shì bù yán ér yù de。
english: Her intelligence is self-evident.

hanzi: 军队按时沿边界巡逻.
pinyin: jūn duì àn shí yàn biān jiè xún luó.
english: The army regularly patrol (along) the border.

hanzi: 我非常感激您的恩惠。
pinyin: wǒ fēi cháng gǎn jī nín de ēn huì。
english: I am greatly indebted to you for your kindness.

hanzi: 走了长路使我食欲大振.
pinyin: zǒu le zhǎng lù shǐ wǒ shí yù dà zhèn.
english: The long walk has given me a good appetite.

hanzi: 水由氢和氧化合而成。
pinyin: shuǐ yóu qīng huò yǎng huà hé ér chéng。
english: Water is composed of hydrogen and oxygen.

hanzi: 暮色四合, 渐而一片漆黑.
pinyin: mù shǎi sì hé,  jiàn ér yī piàn qī hēi.
english: Twilight merged into total darkness.

hanzi: 瘟疫流行这种疾病的流行
pinyin: wēn yì liú xíng zhè zhǒng jí bìng de liú xíng
english: An epidemic of such a disease.

hanzi: 这主调接著由笛子合奏.
pinyin: zhè zhǔ tiáo jiē著 yóu dí zi hé zòu.
english: The melody is next taken up by the flutes.

hanzi: 公正是仁政的要素.
pinyin: gōng zhèng shì rén zhèng de yào sù.
english: Justice is an important element of good government.

hanzi: 他已向银行申请贷款。
pinyin: tā yǐ xiàng yín háng shēn qǐng dài kuǎn。
english: He has applied to the banker for a loan.

hanzi: 尽量不要过于为此烦恼。
pinyin: jìn liàng bù yào guò yú wèi cǐ fán nǎo。
english: Try not to get too upset about it.

hanzi: 考试作弊必予追究.
pinyin: kǎo shì zuò bì bì yǔ zhuī jiū.
english: If you cheat in the exam you'll never get away with it.

hanzi: 所有的树都已锯成原木.
pinyin: suǒ yǒu de shù dōu yǐ jù chéng yuán mù.
english: All the trees have been sawn up into logs.

hanzi: 我会设法尽可能多储蓄。
pinyin: wǒ kuài shè fǎ jìn kě néng duō chǔ xù。
english: I will try to save as much as I can.

hanzi: 牧师在圣坛前行鞠躬礼.
pinyin: mù shī zài shèng tán qián xìng jū gōng lǐ.
english: The priest bowed down before the altar.

hanzi: 他用小号吹奏了一首曲子。
pinyin: tā yòng xiǎo hào chuī zòu le yī shǒu qǔ zi。
english: He played a tune on his trumpet.

hanzi: 马克捶胸顿足，痛不欲生。
pinyin: mǎ kè chuí xiōng dùn zú， tòng bù yù shēng。
english: Mark beat his breast in agony.

hanzi: 那栋旧房子的屋顶塌下了。
pinyin: nà dòng jiù fáng zi de wū dǐng tā xià le。
english: The roof of the old house caved in.

hanzi: 他现在尝到了失败的滋味。
pinyin: tā xiàn zài cháng dào le shī bài de zī wèi。
english: He has now tasted of failure.

hanzi: 她因长途骑车而疲惫不堪.
pinyin: tā yīn cháng tú qí chē ér pí bèi bù kān.
english: The long cycle ride exhausted her.

hanzi: 士兵们奉命举枪致敬.
pinyin: shì bīng men fèng mìng jǔ qiāng zhì jìng.
english: The soldiers were ordered to present arms.

hanzi: 该公司的股票已经贬值.
pinyin: gāi gōng sī de gǔ piào yǐ jīng biǎn zhí.
english: Shares in the company have depreciated.

hanzi: 这只戒指只是镀金的而已。
pinyin: zhè zhǐ jiè zhi zhǐ shì dù jīn de ér yǐ。
english: The ring was only plated with gold.

hanzi: 他由于偷窃被送入监狱。
pinyin: tā yóu yú tōu qiè bèi sòng rù jiān yù。
english: He was sent into prison for stealing.

hanzi: 小汽车的前面有一个凹痕.
pinyin: xiǎo qì chē de qián mian yǒu yī gè āo hén.
english: The front of the car has a dent in it.

hanzi: 他看上去完全是正人君子.
pinyin: tā kàn shàng qù wán quán shì zhèng rén jūn zi.
english: He looked every inch a gentleman.

hanzi: 耗子在墙上啃了一个洞。
pinyin: hào zi zài qiáng shàng kěn le yī gè dòng。
english: The rat gnawed a hole through the wall.

hanzi: 他一直对我心怀嫉妒.
pinyin: tā yī zhí duì wǒ xīn huái jí dù.
english: He has been harbouring/nursing a grudge against me.

hanzi: 你把屁股挪一挪, 我想坐下.
pinyin: nǐ bǎ pì gu nuó yī nuó,  wǒ xiǎng zuò xia.
english: Move your stern, I want to sit down.

hanzi: 黄水仙是水仙属植物.
pinyin: huáng shuǐ xiān shì shuǐ xiān zhǔ zhí wù.
english: The daffodil belongs to the genus Narcissus'.

hanzi: 巫婆把王子变成了青蛙.
pinyin: wū pó bǎ wáng zǐ biàn chéng le qīng wā.
english: The witch changed the prince into a frog.

hanzi: 是另一个男子使她怀孕的.
pinyin: shì lìng yī gè nán zǐ shǐ tā huái yùn de.
english: She is/got pregnant by another man.

hanzi: 爱护的表现出父亲的慈爱的
pinyin: ài hù de biǎo xiàn chū fù qīn de cí ài de
english: Showing the affection of a father.

hanzi: 她在海滨拥有自己的房子。
pinyin: tā zài hǎi bīn yōng yǒu zì jǐ de fáng zi。
english: She owns a house at the seaside.

hanzi: 炎热的天气持续到九月。
pinyin: yán rè de tiān qì chí xù dào jiǔ yuè。
english: The hot weather lasted until September.

hanzi: 拜托您捎个信儿给他。
pinyin: bài tuō nín shāo gè xìn er jǐ tā。
english: Would you be kind enough to take a message to him?

hanzi: 把它放下，不然我就揍你。
pinyin: bǎ tā fàng xia， bù rán wǒ jiù zòu nǐ。
english: Put that down or else I'll smack you.

hanzi: 我已经喝了一杯石榴汁了。
pinyin: wǒ yǐ jīng hè le yī bēi shí liu zhī le。
english: I've drunk a cup of pomegranate juice.

hanzi: 我不喜欢泡沫太多的啤酒.
pinyin: wǒ bù xǐ huan pào mò tài duō de pí jiǔ.
english: I don't like beer with too much froth.

hanzi: 我觉得这个计画荒谬可笑.
pinyin: wǒ jué de zhè gè jì huà huāng miù kě xiào.
english: The plan strikes me as ridiculous.

hanzi: 他以勇敢赢得芳心无数。
pinyin: tā yǐ yǒng gǎn yíng dé fāng xīn wú shù。
english: He won many hearts by his gallantry.

hanzi: 狗嗅来嗅去，搜寻踪迹。
pinyin: gǒu xiù lái xiù qù， sōu xún zōng jī。
english: The dogs cast about seeking the scent.

hanzi: 用大锤把岩石砸成了碎块.
pinyin: yòng dà chuí bǎ yán shí zá chéng le suì kuài.
english: Huge hammers crush (up) the rocks.

hanzi: 旗帜上有镰刀的图案。
pinyin: qí zhì shàng yǒu lián dāo de tú àn。
english: There is a picture of the sickle on the flag.

hanzi: 销售现已开始停滞不前。
pinyin: xiāo shòu xiàn yǐ kāi shǐ tíng zhì bù qián。
english: Sales have now reached a plateau.

hanzi: 别把你的小女儿娇惯坏了。
pinyin: biè bǎ nǐ de xiǎo nu:3 ér jiāo guàn huài le。
english: Don't pamper your little daughter.

hanzi: 成群的士兵洗劫了村庄。
pinyin: chéng qún de shì bīng xǐ jié le cūn zhuāng。
english: Bands of soldiers ravaged the village.

hanzi: 她一斧子就把树苗砍倒了.
pinyin: tā yī fǔ zi jiù bǎ shù miáo kǎn dào le.
english: She cut down the sapling with one chop.

hanzi: 她有六次因盗窃而被判刑.
pinyin: tā yǒu liù cì yīn dào qiè ér bèi pàn xíng.
english: She has six convictions for theft.

hanzi: 稠密的有相对较高的密度的
pinyin: chóu mì de yǒu xiāng duì jiào gāo de mì dù de
english: Having relatively high density.

hanzi: 她摔倒在地，碰破了膝盖。
pinyin: tā shuāi dǎo zài de， pèng pò le xī gài。
english: She fell down and grazed her knee.

hanzi: 艾滋病对一些人危害很大。
pinyin: ài zī bìng duì yī xiē rén wēi hài hěn dà。
english: AIDS is hard on some people.

hanzi: 我们尚未收到他的辞呈。
pinyin: wǒ men shàng wèi shōu dào tā de cí chéng。
english: We haven't yet received his resignation.

hanzi: 老板雇佣了一些临时工。
pinyin: lǎo bǎn gù yōng le yī xiē lín shí gōng。
english: The boss hired some temporary workers.

hanzi: 那只船正与风浪搏斗。
pinyin: nà zhǐ chuán zhèng yù fēng làng bó dòu。
english: The ship is combating the wind and waves.

hanzi: 走了长路使我食欲大振.
pinyin: zǒu le zhǎng lù shǐ wǒ shí yù dà zhèn.
english: The long walk has given me a good appetite.

hanzi: 隧道的尽头露出了亮光.
pinyin: suì dào de jìn tóu lù chū le liàng guāng.
english: A light appeared at the end of the tunnel.

hanzi: 这些房子是免付捐税的。
pinyin: zhè xie fáng zi shì miǎn fù juān shuì de。
english: These houses are exempt from paying rates.

hanzi: 还魂尸借还魂术复活的尸体
pinyin: huán hún shī jiè huán hún zhú fù huó de shī tǐ
english: A corpse revived in this way.

hanzi: 穿过拱门, 沿著那条路走.
pinyin: chuān guò gǒng mén,  yàn著 nà tiáo lù zǒu.
english: Go through the arch and follow the path.

hanzi: 他用小号吹奏了一首曲子。
pinyin: tā yòng xiǎo hào chuī zòu le yī shǒu qǔ zi。
english: He played a tune on his trumpet.

hanzi: 这些情况预示著要有灾祸.
pinyin: zhè xie qíng kuàng yù shì著 yào yǒu zāi huò.
english: These developments forebode disaster.

hanzi: 他因犯谋杀罪而被处以绞刑。
pinyin: tā yīn fàn móu shā zuì ér bèi chù yǐ jiǎo xíng。
english: He was hanged for murder.

hanzi: 他因负伤而退役.
pinyin: tā yīn fù shāng ér tuì yì.
english: He was invalided out of the army because of the wounds he received.

hanzi: 他酗酒越来越成问题了。
pinyin: tā xù jiǔ yuè lái yuè chéng wèn tí le。
english: His drinking is getting to be a problem.

hanzi: 隧道的尽头露出了亮光.
pinyin: suì dào de jìn tóu lù chū le liàng guāng.
english: A light appeared at the end of the tunnel.

hanzi: 牧师在圣坛前行鞠躬礼.
pinyin: mù shī zài shèng tán qián xìng jū gōng lǐ.
english: The priest bowed down before the altar.

hanzi: 举止或风度的自在或优雅
pinyin: jǔ zhǐ huò fēng dù de zì zài huò yōu yǎ
english: Ease or cheerfulness in manner or style.

hanzi: 大猫叼著小猫的颈背.
pinyin: dà māo diāo著 xiǎo māo de jǐng bèi.
english: The cat picked up the kitten by the scruff of its neck.

hanzi: 味觉与嗅觉是密切相关的.
pinyin: wèi jué yù xiù jué shì mì qiè xiāng guān de.
english: Taste and smell are closely connected.

hanzi: 他将一生奉献给了音乐。
pinyin: tā jiàng yī shēng fèng xiàn jǐ le yīn yuè。
english: He devoted himself entirely to music.

hanzi: 棉布比尼龙穿着舒服。
pinyin: mián bù bì ní lóng chuān zhuó shū fu。
english: Cotton is more comfortable to wear than nylon.

hanzi: 警方对他进行拘留审问.
pinyin: jǐng fāng duì tā jìn xíng jū liú shěn wèn.
english: The police detained him for questioning.

hanzi: 他把石头拿在手上掂了掂。
pinyin: tā bǎ shí tou ná zài shǒu shàng diān le diān。
english: He weighed the stone in his hands.

hanzi: 发现一个老妇人被掐死了。
pinyin: fā xiàn yī gè lǎo fù rén bèi qiā sǐ le。
english: An old woman was found choked to death.

hanzi: 衣服在晾衣绳上冻住了.
pinyin: yī fu zài liàng yì shéng shàng dòng zhù le.
english: The clothes were frozen on the washing-line.

hanzi: 她用手指在喷泉中玩水.
pinyin: tā yòng shǒu zhǐ zài pēn quán zhòng wàn shuǐ.
english: She dabbled her fingers in the fountain.

hanzi: 信徒们都赶往清真寺。
pinyin: xìn tú men dōu gǎn wàng qīng zhēn sì。
english: The devout were all hurrying to the mosque.

hanzi: 在空白栏中写上你的名字。
pinyin: zài kòng bái lán zhòng xiě shàng nǐ de míng zi。
english: Write your name in the blank.

hanzi: 那种浅底小船叫小舟。
pinyin: nà zhòng qiǎn dǐ xiǎo chuán jiào xiǎo zhōu。
english: The small shallow boat is called a cockle.

hanzi: 这匹骡子忽然用后腿猛踢
pinyin: zhè pǐ luó zi hū rán yòng hòu tuǐ měng tī
english: The mule lashed out with its hind legs.

hanzi: 最严重的最严峻的或最不利的
pinyin: zuì yán zhòng de zuì yán jùn de huò zuì bù lì de

pinyin: tā yòng xiǎo tí qín yǎn zòu le yī shǒu qǔ zi。

hanzi: 这条路向远处绵延伸展.
pinyin: zhè tiáo lù xiàng yuǎn chù mián yán shēn zhǎn.

hanzi: 他们的举动显然有贪污之嫌.
pinyin: tā men de jǔ dòng xiǎn ran yǒu tān wū zhī xián.

hanzi: 他倒了些汁液以防烤干。

hanzi: 罗盘的指针永远指向北方.

english: A compass needle points (to the) north.

hanzi: 他非常懒惰，整天睡觉。
pinyin: tā fēi cháng lǎn duò， zhěng tiān shuì jiào。
english: He is a very lazy person, sleeping all day.

pinyin: tā zài yù shì de bāng chèng shàng chèng tǐ zhòng.

english: His portrait (was) hung above the fireplace.

pinyin: shǐ yòng suǒ fù tú fū qì tú yòng jiāo shuǐ.
english: Use the applicator provided to spread the glue.

pinyin: tā men shēng huó zài yī qǐ shí fēn róng qià.
english: They live in perfect accord with each other.

pinyin: tā yòng biān zǐ qīng qīng chōu mǎ.
english: He flicked the horse with his whip/flicked his whip at the horse.

english: The kite circled round and round.

english: The white-lipped deer are rare in this area.

english: The squirrel hoards up nuts for the winter.

english: We went on a guided tour round the castle.

pinyin: tā jiàng guó jiā jī mì xiè lòu jǐ dí rén le.

hanzi: 他不理会一切求援的呼吁。
pinyin: tā bù lǐ kuài yī qiè qiú yuán de hū yù。

hanzi: 马戏团主管把鞭子抽得很响.
pinyin: mǎ xì tuán zhǔ guǎn bǎ biān zǐ chōu de hěn xiǎng.
english: The circus manager snapped his whip.

english: The deer lowered its head to drink from the pond.

english: She sued a newspaper for libel.

pinyin: zhè cì xí jī chéng gōng,  ná xià le bǎo lěi.
english: The attack succeeded,and the fort was taken.

hanzi: 你若固执, 他们就更恼火了.
pinyin: nǐ ruò gù zhí,  tā men jiù gèng nǎo huǒ le.
english: If you persist, you will annoy them even more.

pinyin: dòng xuè de zuì shēn chù yǒu zhǐ gǒu xióng。

hanzi: 洞穴的最深处有只狗熊。
pinyin: dòng xuè de zuì shēn chù yǒu zhǐ gǒu xióng。
english: There is a bear in the inmost recesses of the cave.

pinyin: yīn tíng diàn suǒ yǒu de dēng dōu xī miè le.

pinyin: shì bīng men yǐ xíng jūn de bù fá zǒu le guò qu。

pinyin: fáng zi lǐ mí màn著 kǎo píng guǒ de xiāng wèi.

hanzi: 那个皇帝是个残酷的专制君主。
pinyin: nèi gè huáng dì shì gè cán kù de zhuān zhì jūn zhǔ。
english: That emperor was a cruel despot.

hanzi: 轮船横着停泊在港口里。
pinyin: lún chuán hèng zhuó tíng bó zài gǎng kǒu lǐ。

pinyin: xià yì yuàn líng chén sān shí réng zài kāi huì.
english: The House of Commons was still sitting at 3 am.

english: He varied the transmission frequency.

pinyin: xìn yòng zī xún shǐ wǒ men miǎn chú le yōu lu:4

pinyin: xiàng rén tù tuò mo shì fēi cháng cū bào wú lǐ de。

pinyin: nà rén bèi qū zhú chū Jī dū jiào kuài。
english: The man was excommunicated from the Christian Church.

pinyin: xiǎo xué shēng wǎng wǎng hěn qīn pèi lǎo shī.
english: Schoolchildren often have/get crushes on teachers.

pinyin: yǒu rén fèng chéng nǐ shí,  yī dìng yào dāng xīn。

pinyin: měi miào de yīn yuè zài wǒ xīn zhōng huí dàng。
english: The beautiful melody is lingering in my mind.

pinyin: nóng mín men shī féi lái shǐ tǔ dì féi wò。
english: The peasants fertilize the field by using manure.

pinyin: wǒ gū jì zhè jiàng shì yī gè yán rè de xià tiān。
english: I reckon this will be a hot summer.

pinyin: méi guī shì biàn shēng yú shì jiè gè dì de zhí wù。
english: The rose is a cosmopolitan plant.

pinyin: zhè xie jiān kù de gōng zuò shǐ wǒ pí bèi bù kān。
english: I'm worn out by all this hard work.

pinyin: zài jiù shè huì， guì zú men shēng huó shē chǐ。
english: In old society, the gentry lived in luxury.

hanzi: 美妙的音乐在我心中回荡。
pinyin: měi miào de yīn yuè zài wǒ xīn zhōng huí dàng。
english: The beautiful melody is lingering in my mind.

hanzi: 那两只航天器衔接起来了。
pinyin: nà liǎng zhǐ háng tiān qì xián jiē qǐ lai le。
english: The two space vehicles locked on to each other.

english: The fluctuating value of gold and silver.

pinyin: duì wǒ men lái shuō jīn qián shì zhòng yòu huò wù。

pinyin: wǒ yī zhěng tiān dōu zài chú yuán zi lǐ de cǎo。
english: I spent the whole day weeding in the garden.

hanzi: 他变换了无线电传送的频率。
pinyin: tā biàn huàn le wú xiàn diàn chuán sòng de pín lu:4。
english: He varied the transmission frequency.

pinyin: tā zài wǎn lǐ fú shàng zhuì著 yī duǒ lán huā.

english: His witty remark caused a storm of laughter.

english: She sat twiddling the ring on her finger.

english: He could not account for his absence from school.

pinyin: tā yīn duì zōng jiào de yí jù ér shí fēn fán nǎo。

pinyin: wǒ kàn dào tā zhèng zài jǐ méi guī xiū jiǎn zhī tiáo。
english: I found him pruning his roses.

pinyin: tā yòng dí zi chuī zòu le huān kuài de qǔ tiáo。
english: He played a delightful melody on his flute.

pinyin: nà tiáo gǒu zài huā yuán lǐ páo chū yī gēn gú tou.
english: The dog scratched up a bone in the garden.

pinyin: tā men fā shì yào xiàng bǎng jià zhě bào chóu.

pinyin: zhèng fǔ nǐ tuī xíng sī yǒu huà jì huà.

pinyin: zhè fáng jiān lǐ yǒu bó dòu guò de hén jī.

hanzi: 他们发誓要向绑架者报仇.
pinyin: tā men fā shì yào xiàng bǎng jià zhě bào chóu.
english: They swore to take their revenge on the kidnappers.

pinyin: nuǎn huó de tiān qì yòu shǐ wǒ men qù yóu yǒng.

pinyin: liáo kuò de píng yuán mián yán shù bǎi yīng lǐ。

pinyin: gāi kōng jūn zhòng duì zhí xíng yī zhēn chá rèn wu.

hanzi: 在旧社会，贵族们生活奢侈。
pinyin: zài jiù shè huì， guì zú men shēng huó shē chǐ。
english: In old society, the gentry lived in luxury.

pinyin: zài shōu huò jì jié lǐ nóng mín fēi cháng máng lù.

english: A fertilizer containing phosphorus compounds.

pinyin: pài qiǎn le yī xiē shì bīng shǒu wèi yòu yì.
english: A number of men were detached to guard the right flank.

pinyin: zhè xie jīng měi de huì huà shǐ sì bì shēng huī。
english: Fine paintings graced the walls of the room.

pinyin: hěn duō zhòng yě shēng lán yuè lái yuè hǎn jiàn le.
english: Many kinds of wild orchid are becoming rare.

pinyin: mào mì de sēn lín huán bào zhuó nèi gè cūn zhuāng。
english: A thick forest girdled the village about.

hanzi: 很多种野生兰越来越罕见了.
pinyin: hěn duō zhòng yě shēng lán yuè lái yuè hǎn jiàn le.
english: Many kinds of wild orchid are becoming rare.

english: Her life has run smoothly up to now.

pinyin: rén men dài zhuó hēi shā āi dào wǒ men de lǐng dǎo。

pinyin: nèi gé gé yuán shì yóu shǒu xiàng tiāo xuǎn de.
english: Members of the Cabinet are chosen by the Prime Minister.

pinyin: xīn wén jiè shì hàn wèi wǒ men zì yóu de wèi bīng。

english: We went to the park to see Japanese cherry blossoms.

pinyin: tí dào pēng rèn， jiù chāo guò wǒ de suǒ néng le
english: I am out of my depth when it comes to cooking.

pinyin: xióng xìng de jīng zǐ shǐ cí xìng de luǎn zǐ shòu jīng.

pinyin: yī gè xiǎo nán hái zài yáng tái shàng fàng fēng zhēng。
english: A boy is flying a kite in the piazza.

english: They decorated the house regardless of cost.

pinyin: wǒ zài wǎn huì shàng diū shī le shuǐ jīng xiàng liàn。

hanzi: 外科医生切除了她乳房的肿块.
pinyin: wài kē yī shēng qiè chú le tā rǔ fáng de zhǒng kuài.
english: The surgeon excised the lump from her breast.

hanzi: 冰淇淋对孩子们非常有吸引力。
pinyin: bīng qí lìn duì hái zi men fēi cháng yǒu xī yǐn lì。

hanzi: 磷肥含有磷化合物的一种化肥
pinyin: lín féi hán yǒu lín huà hé wù de yī zhòng huà féi
english: A fertilizer containing phosphorus compounds.

hanzi: 政府正奉行不干预政策。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ zhèng fèng xíng bù gān yù zhèng cè。
english: The government is pursuing a policy of non-intervention.

pinyin: zhè shì wǒ mǎi guò de zuì shē chǐ de dōng xi.

pinyin: tā dà hǎn dà jiào de bào yuàn fáng zū tài gāo.
english: She's kicking up an awful fuss about the high rent.

hanzi: 高大的树木成拱形横跨过那条河.
pinyin: gāo dà de shù mù chéng gǒng xíng héng kuà guò nà tiáo hé.
english: Tall trees arched across the river.

hanzi: 部长被查出挪用了公款。
pinyin: bù zhǎng bèi chá chū nuó yòng le gōng kuǎn。
english: The minister was found to have appropriated government money.

hanzi: 她捐款给一个动物保护协会。
pinyin: tā juān kuǎn jǐ yī gè dòng wù bǎo hù xié huì。
english: She subscribes to an animal protection society.

hanzi: 高大的树木成拱形横跨过那条河.
pinyin: gāo dà de shù mù chéng gǒng xíng héng kuà guò nà tiáo hé.
english: Tall trees arched across the river.

hanzi: 水冲击在岩石上溅起了泡沫.
pinyin: shuǐ chōng jī zài yán shí shàng jiàn qǐ le pào mò.
english: The water frothed as it tumbled down the rocks.

hanzi: 这座山里有许多相通的洞穴.

english: A surge of demonstrators broke through the fence.

pinyin: guǒ dòng chān shuǐ tài duō jiù níng gù bù hǎo le.
english: You won't get a good set if you put too much water in the jelly.

hanzi: 她写信来咨询玫瑰花的栽培方法。
pinyin: tā xiě xìn lái zī xún méi guī huā de zāi péi fāng fǎ。
english: She wrote in for advice on how to grow roses.

hanzi: 水是由氢元素和氧元素组成的.
pinyin: shuǐ shì yóu qīng yuán sù huò yǎng yuán sù zǔ chéng de.
english: Water is composed of the elements hydrogen and oxygen.

hanzi: 据说那种植物可用来治肝炎。
pinyin: jù shuō nà zhòng zhí wù kě yòng lái zhì gān yán。
english: It is said that the plant can be used to treat hepatitis.

hanzi: 葱翠的有或以茂盛植被为特征的
pinyin: cōng cuì de yǒu huò yǐ mào shèng zhí bèi wèi tè zhēng de
english: Having or characterized by luxuriant vegetation.

hanzi: 他用剪子连花带茎都剪下来。
pinyin: tā yòng jiǎn zi lián huā dài jīng dōu jiǎn xia lai。
english: He cut off the flowers at the stalk with a pair of scissors.

hanzi: 他向银行经理提出贷款问题。
pinyin: tā xiàng yín háng jīng lǐ tí chū dài kuǎn wèn tí。
english: He broached the subject of a loan with his bank manager.

hanzi: 我感到了猫在我的腿上蹭来蹭去。
pinyin: wǒ gǎn dào le māo zài wǒ de tuǐ shàng cèng lái cèng qù。
english: I could feel the cat rubbing up against my leg.

hanzi: 英国和法国之间隔著英吉利海峡.
pinyin: Yīng guó huò fǎ guó zhī jiān gé著 yīng jí lì hǎi xiá.
english: England is separated from France by the Channel.

hanzi: 他们在雷达屏上看到了那艘游艇.
pinyin: tā men zài léi dá píng shàng kàn dào le nà sōu yóu tǐng.
english: They picked up the yacht on their radar screen.

hanzi: 我们都称赞了她烹饪技术的高超。
pinyin: wǒ men dōu chēng zàn le tā pēng rèn jì shù de gāo chāo。
english: We all praised the excellence of her cooking.

hanzi: 爱尔兰人过去用马铃薯作为主食。
pinyin: ài ěr lán rén guò qu yòng mǎ líng shǔ zuò wéi zhǔ shí。
english: The Irish used to live on a diet of potatoes.

hanzi: 该大臣已示意他明年可能辞职.
pinyin: gāi dà chén yǐ shì yì tā míng nián kě néng cí zhí.
english: The minister has indicated that he may resign next year.

hanzi: 不要偏离车道--这一带沼泽地多.
pinyin: bù yào piān lí chē dào-- zhè yī dài zhǎo zé dì duō.
english: Keep to the track the moor is very boggy around here.

hanzi: 炊事员去照看炉子里的蛋糕了。
pinyin: chuī shì yuán qù zhào kàn lú zi lǐ de dàn gāo le。
english: The cook went to see after the cake left in the oven.

hanzi: 他透过一片熏黑的玻璃观看太阳.
pinyin: tā tòu guò yī piàn xūn hēi de bō li guān kàn tài yáng.
english: He looked at the sun through a sheet of smoked glass.

hanzi: 球迷群情激昂, 一窝蜂涌进球场.
pinyin: qiú mí qún qíng jī áng,  yī wō fēng yǒng jìn qiú chǎng.
english: The fans rushed onto the pitch in an excited mob.

hanzi: 一位护士来给他包上干净的绷带。
pinyin: yī wèi hù shi lái jǐ tā bāo shàng gān jìng de bēng dài。
english: A nurse came to put on a clean dressing for him.

hanzi: 他遇上了警卫犬, 把他吓坏了.
pinyin: tā yù shàng le jǐng wèi quǎn,  bǎ tā xià huài le.
english: His encounter with the guard dog had completely unnerved him.

hanzi: 许多妇女常在自己的年龄上说谎话。
pinyin: xǔ duō fù nu:3 cháng zài zì jǐ de nián líng shàng shuō huǎng huà。
english: Many women lie about their age.

hanzi: 我们让他们在花园里劈木柴.
pinyin: wǒ men ràng tā men zài huā yuán lǐ pǐ mù chái.
english: We set them to chop wood/set them to work chopping wood in the garden.

hanzi: 我们需要一台挖掘机来平整土地。
pinyin: wǒ men xū yào yī tái wá jué jī lái píng zhěng tǔ dì。
english: We need a mechanical digger to level the ground.

hanzi: 在他的带动下，战士们斗志昂扬。
pinyin: zài tā de dài dòng xià， zhàn shì men dòu zhì áng yáng。
english: His example kept the fighters in high spirits.

hanzi: 他把烟灰磕掉，然后继续往下说。
pinyin: tā bǎ yān huī kē diào， rán hòu jì xù wàng xià shuō。
english: He knocked the ash off his pipe before he went on.

hanzi: 我方面鱼雷艇向敌巡洋舰冲去。
pinyin: wǒ fāng miàn yú léi tǐng xiàng dí xún yáng jiàn chòng qù。
english: Our torpedo boats bore down on the enemy cruiser.

hanzi: 校长用藤条责打不听话的男学生.
pinyin: xiào zhǎng yòng téng tiáo zé dǎ bù tīng huà de nán xué sheng.
english: The headmaster caned the boys for disobedience.

hanzi: 它是一个中型的灰色绅耐特皮箱。
pinyin: tā shì yī gè zhōng xíng de huī sè shēn nài tè pí xiāng。
english: It is a medium- size samsonite, and it's gray.

hanzi: 奥运会是举世瞩目的体育比赛。
pinyin: Aò yùn huì shì jǔ shì zhǔ mù de tǐ yù bǐ sài。
english: The Olympic Games commands the attention of the world.

hanzi: 果冻搀水太多就凝固不好了.
pinyin: guǒ dòng chān shuǐ tài duō jiù níng gù bù hǎo le.
english: You won't get a good set if you put too much water in the jelly.

hanzi: 我已多次告诫过你不要做那件事.
pinyin: wǒ yǐ duō cì gào jiè guò nǐ bù yào zuò nà jiàn shì.
english: I've warned you over and over (again) not to do that.

hanzi: 他的小说开拓了想像力新天地。
pinyin: tā de xiǎo shuō kāi tuò le xiǎng xiàng lì xīn tiān dì。
english: His stories opened up new worlds of the imagination.

hanzi: 他的小说开拓了想像力新天地。
pinyin: tā de xiǎo shuō kāi tuò le xiǎng xiàng lì xīn tiān dì。
english: His stories opened up new worlds of the imagination.

hanzi: 这种思想只能把世人引入歧途。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng sī xiǎng zhǐ néng bǎ shì rén yǐn rù qí tú。
english: Such ideas will only lead the world's people astray.

hanzi: 他过去曾为这家报纸写专栏文章。
pinyin: tā guò qu zēng wèi zhè jiā bào zhǐ xiě zhuān lán wén zhāng。
english: He used to write a column for this newspaper.

hanzi: 出版商付给他雇佣的文人很低的费用。
pinyin: chū bǎn shāng fù jǐ tā gù yōng de wén rén hěn dī de fèi yòng。
english: The publisher paid his hacks low.

hanzi: 法庭中使用的誓词有固定的格式.
pinyin: fǎ tíng zhòng shǐ yòng de shì cí yǒu gù dìng de gé shì.
english: There is a standard form of oath used in lawcourts.

hanzi: 她要赢得这一分才能将比分扳平.
pinyin: tā yào yíng dé zhè yī fèn cái néng jiàng bǐ fēn pān píng.
english: She needs to win this point to level the score.

hanzi: 我的一部分津贴被扣去付了饭费。
pinyin: wǒ de yī bù fen jīn tiē bèi kòu qù fù le fàn fèi。
english: Part of my allowance is kept back to pay for my meals.

hanzi: 老师的说明澄清了困扰的问题。
pinyin: lǎo shī de shuō míng dèng qīng le kùn rǎo de wèn tí。
english: The teacher's explanation clarify the puzzling problem.

hanzi: 炭笔画用这种炭笔画成的速描或画
pinyin: tàn bǐ huà yòng zhè zhǒng tàn bǐ huà chéng de sù miáo huò huà
english: A sketch or drawing made with this charcoal.

hanzi: 爆竹爆炸声把杰克的狗吓了一跳。
pinyin: bào zhú bào zhà shēng bǎ jié kè de gǒu xià le yī tiào。
english: The fire cracker went off and scared Jack's dog.

hanzi: 你太畏缩了--要尽量增强自信心.
pinyin: nǐ tài wèi suō le-- yào jìn liàng zēng qiáng zì xìn xīn.
english: You're too timid you must try to assert yourself more.

hanzi: 警方已通知各店主留意伪钞.
pinyin: jǐng fāng yǐ tōng zhī gè diàn zhǔ liú yì wěi chāo.
english: The police have warned shopkeepers about the forged banknotes.

hanzi: 老师因为他们态度粗鲁而责罚他们。
pinyin: lǎo shī yīn wèi tā men tài du cū lǔ ér zé fá tā men。
english: Their teacher punished them for their rudeness.

hanzi: 董事会原则上同意这个项目。
pinyin: dǒng shì huì yuán zé shàng tóng yì zhè gè xiàng mù。
english: The board of directors approved the project in principle.

hanzi: 遇有急用时, 我们只好动用积蓄.
pinyin: yù yǒu jí yòng shí,  wǒ men zhǐ hǎo dòng yòng jī xù.
english: If it comes to the push, we shall have to use our savings.

hanzi: 那贼听到警铃声就飞快逃走了。
pinyin: nà zéi tīng dào jǐng líng shēng jiù fēi kuài táo zǒu le。
english: The thief ran like anything when he heard the alarm.

hanzi: 新法例有限制新闻自由的趋势.
pinyin: xīn fǎ lì yǒu xiàn zhì xīn wén zì yóu de qū shì.
english: Recent laws have tended to restrict the freedom of the press.

hanzi: 她用一把锋利的刀削去厚厚的果皮.
pinyin: tā yòng yī bǎ fēng lì de dāo xuē qù hòu hòu de guǒ pí.
english: She pared off the thick peel with a sharp knife.

hanzi: 两国首相昨天在日内瓦会晤。
pinyin: liǎng guó shǒu xiàng zuó tiān zài rì nèi wǎ huì wù。
english: The premiers of the two countries met in Geneva yesterday.

hanzi: 该机在飞往德里的途中遭到劫持.
pinyin: gāi jī zài fēi wàng Dé lǐ de tú zhōng zāo dào jié chí.
english: The plane was highjacked while on a flight to Delhi.

hanzi: 他们正计划九月份访问巴勒斯坦。
pinyin: tā men zhèng jì huà jiǔ yuè fèn fǎng wèn bā lēi sī tǎn。
english: They are planning to visit Palestine in September.

hanzi: 我总的印象是他似乎很和蔼可亲.
pinyin: wǒ zǒng de yìn xiàng shì tā sì hu hěn hé ǎi kě qīn.
english: My general impression was that he seemed a pleasant man.

hanzi: 我去睡觉，茶沏好后告诉我一声。
pinyin: wǒ qù shuì jiào， chá qī hào hòu gào su wǒ yī shēng。
english: I'm going to sleep, tip me the wink when tea's ready.

hanzi: 太阳队在第一轮比赛中被淘汰了。
pinyin: tài yáng duì zài dì yī lún bǐ sài zhòng bèi táo tài le。
english: The Sun Team was washed out in the first round.

hanzi: 成功的滋味能让人对之形成习惯
pinyin: chéng gōng de zī wèi néng ràng rén duì zhī xíng chéng xí guàn
english: The taste of success may become habit-forming.

hanzi: 蠢话，蠢事愚蠢的言语或笨拙的行为
pinyin: chǔn huà， chǔn shì yú chǔn de yán yǔ huò bèn zhuō de xíng wéi
english: A foolish or stupid utterance or deed.

hanzi: 一位护士来给他包上干净的绷带。
pinyin: yī wèi hù shi lái jǐ tā bāo shàng gān jìng de bēng dài。
english: A nurse came to put on a clean dressing for him.

hanzi: 汽车碰撞时左侧的翼子板撞坏了。
pinyin: qì chē pèng zhuàng shí zuǒ zhāi de yì zi bǎn zhuàng huài le。
english: The nearside wing was damaged in the collision.

hanzi: 蒜别放太多--不是人人都喜欢的.
pinyin: suàn biè fàng tài duō-- bú shì rén rén dōu xǐ huan de.
english: Don't overdo the garlic in the food not everyone likes it.

hanzi: 我对不公平地被解雇表示愤慨。
pinyin: wǒ duì bù gōng píng de bèi jiě gù biǎo shì fèn kǎi。
english: I expressed my indignation at being unfairly dismissed.

hanzi: 她需要改进阐述其论点的方式。
pinyin: tā xū yào gǎi jìn chǎn shù qí lùn diǎn de fāng shì。
english: She needs to improve her presentation of the arguments.

hanzi: 他们生活非常俭朴，力避奢侈。
pinyin: tā men shēng huó fēi cháng jiǎn pǔ， lì bì shē chǐ。
english: They lived a very frugal existence, avoiding all luxuries.

hanzi: 医生们决定为他开刀切除肿瘤。
pinyin: yī shēng men jué dìng wèi tā kāi dāo qiè chú zhǒng liú。
english: The doctors decided to operate on him for the tumor.

hanzi: 他无法抵抗漂亮的女招待的引诱。
pinyin: tā wú fǎ dǐ kàng piào liang de nu:3 zhāo dài de yǐn yòu。
english: He can't resist the allure of the pretty waitress.

hanzi: 老师宣布她将惩罚那个坏学生。
pinyin: lǎo shī xuān bù tā jiàng chéng fá nèi gè huài xué sheng。
english: The teacher blazoned she would punish the bad student.

hanzi: 他的大钥匙把他的口袋捅破了一个洞。
pinyin: tā de dà yào shi bǎ tā de kǒu dài tǒng pò le yī gè dòng。
english: His large key had poked a hole in his pocket.

hanzi: 我把巧克力掰成两半--这一半给你.
pinyin: wǒ bǎ qiǎo kè lì bāi chéng liǎng bàn-- zhè yī bàn jǐ nǐ.
english: I broke the chocolate into halves here's your half.

hanzi: 她的头发剪得很糟，发梢高低不齐。
pinyin: tā de tóu fa jiǎn de hěn zāo， fà shāo gāo dī bù qí。
english: Her hair has been badly cut and the ends are uneven.

hanzi: 大街两旁的梧桐树已冒芽长叶。
pinyin: dà jiē liǎng páng de wú tóng shù yǐ mào yá zhǎng yè。
english: The plane trees lining the main street are leafing out.

hanzi: 歹徒们冲进酒吧胡乱扫射一通。
pinyin: dǎi tú men chōng jìn jiǔ bā hú luàn sào shè yī tōng。
english: The gangster run into the bar and start shooting it up.

hanzi: 她禁不住诱惑, 又吃了一块巧克力.
pinyin: tā jìn bú zhù yòu huò,  yòu jí le yī kuài qiǎo kè lì.
english: She yielded to temptation and had another chocolate.

hanzi: 小贝壳常被用作简单的货币。
pinyin: xiǎo bèi ké cháng bèi yòng zuò jiǎn dān de huò bì。
english: Small seashells were often used as a primitive kind of money.

hanzi: 遇有急用时, 我们只好动用积蓄.
pinyin: yù yǒu jí yòng shí,  wǒ men zhǐ hǎo dòng yòng jī xù.
english: If it comes to the push, we shall have to use our savings.

hanzi: 她公开斥责那位大臣言论失当.
pinyin: tā gōng kāi chì zé nà wèi dà chén yán lùn shī dàng.
english: She rapped the Minister publicly for his indiscreet remarks.

hanzi: 安不应该这样谈论她的恩人.
pinyin: ān bù yīng gāi zhè yàng tán lùn tā de ēn rén.
english: It ill behoves Anne (ie She ought not) to speak thus of her benefactor.

hanzi: 她由于投资精明而积蓄了一笔财产。
pinyin: tā yóu yú tóu zī jīng míng ér jī xù le yī bǐ cái chǎn。
english: By investing wisely she accumulated a fortune.

hanzi: 制造这些小部件是非常昂贵的。
pinyin: zhì zào zhè xie xiǎo bù jiàn shì fēi cháng áng guì de。
english: The manufacture of these small components is expensive.

hanzi: 人们总是把老师比喻为燃烧的蜡烛。
pinyin: rén men zǒng shì bǎ lǎo shī bǐ yù wèi rán shāo de là zhú。
english: Teachers are often compared to burning candles.

hanzi: 砂箱铸造车间内保持砂模用的框架
pinyin: shā xiāng zhù zào chē jiān nèi bǎo chí shā mó yòng de kuàng jià
english: A frame for holding a sand mold in a foundry.

hanzi: 我们可以用一个筛子把石头分离出来。
pinyin: wǒ men kě yǐ yòng yī gè shāi zi bǎ shí tou fēn lí chū lai。
english: We can separate the stones out with a sieve.

hanzi: 有几家银行在信贷方面紧缩起来了。
pinyin: yǒu jǐ jiā yín háng zài xìn dài fāng miàn jǐn suō qǐ lai le。
english: Some banks tightened up on their credits.

hanzi: 该组织旨在促进各国之间的友谊.
pinyin: gāi zǔ zhī zhǐ zài cù jìn gè guó zhī jiān de yǒu yì.
english: The organizationworks to promote friendship between nations.

hanzi: 大使馆的两名随员已驱逐出境.
pinyin: dà shǐ guǎn de liǎng míng suí yuán yǐ qū zhú chū jìng.
english: Two attaches at the embassy were expelled from the country.

hanzi: 柠檬味的品尝起来或闻起来有柠檬味的
pinyin: níng méng wèi de pǐn cháng qǐ lai huò wén qǐ lai yǒu níng méng wèi de
english: Tasting or smelling like lemons.

hanzi: 她抱怨名单上遗漏了她的名字。
pinyin: tā bào yuàn míng dān shàng yí lòu le tā de míng zi。
english: She complained about the omission of her name from the list.

hanzi: 吉姆把他的一切支出都记在笔记本里。
pinyin: jí mǔ bǎ tā de yī qiè zhī chū dōu jì zài bǐ jì běn lǐ。
english: Jim entered all his expenses in a notebook.

hanzi: 在瀑布下游附近可以过河.
pinyin: zài pù bù xià yóu fù jìn kě yǐ guò hé.
english: You can cross the river a short distance below (ie downstream from) the waterfall.

hanzi: 我刚才还在琢磨著这条路多长啊.
pinyin: wǒ gāng cái huán zài zhuó mó著 zhè tiáo lù duō zhǎng a.
english: I was just thinking (to myself) what a long way it is.

hanzi: 我们应该对罪犯施加严厉的惩罚。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi duì zuì fàn shī jiā yán lì de chéng fá。
english: We should inflict severe chastisement on criminals.

hanzi: 他们因趣味相投很快就变得十分融洽。
pinyin: tā men yīn qù wèi xiàng tóu hěn kuài jiù biàn de shí fēn róng qià。
english: Similar tastes soon thawed them.

hanzi: 潮水退去，我们就能寻找贝壳了。
pinyin: cháo shuǐ tuì qù， wǒ men jiù néng xún zhǎo bèi ké le。
english: As the tide receded we were able to look for shells.

hanzi: 大使馆的两名随员已驱逐出境.
pinyin: dà shǐ guǎn de liǎng míng suí yuán yǐ qū zhú chū jìng.
english: Two attaches at the embassy were expelled from the country.

hanzi: 我头痛得很厉害，而且我的鼻涕很多。
pinyin: wǒ tóu tòng de hěn lì hai， ér qiě wǒ de bí tì hěn duō。
english: I have a bad headache and my nose run a lot.

hanzi: 储存的谷物经常受到害虫的破坏。
pinyin: chǔ cún de gǔ wù jīng cháng shòu dào hài chóng de pò huài。
english: Stores of grain are frequently attacked by pests.

hanzi: 她用一些尖锐的问题反驳讲话人.
pinyin: tā yòng yī xiē jiān ruì de wèn tí fǎn bó jiǎng huà rén.
english: She came back at the speaker with some sharp questions.

hanzi: 她是一个圣洁的女人，天真而忠贞。
pinyin: tā shì yī gè shèng jié de nu:3 rén， tiān zhēn ér zhōng zhēn。
english: She was a holy woman, innocent and chaste.

hanzi: 老师宣布她将惩罚那个坏学生。
pinyin: lǎo shī xuān bù tā jiàng chéng fá nèi gè huài xué sheng。
english: The teacher blazoned she would punish the bad student.

hanzi: 伤口不久就愈合了, 但却留下了伤疤.
pinyin: shāng kǒu bù jiǔ jiù yù hé le,  dàn què liú xià le shāng bā.
english: The cut soon healed over/up, but it left a scar.

hanzi: 这种疾病能引起面部色素斑沉著.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng jí bìng néng yǐn qǐ miàn bù shǎi sù bān chén著.
english: The disease causes patches of pigmentation on the face.

hanzi: 他有个看法是男人戴帽子就会秃顶.
pinyin: tā yǒu gè kàn fǎ shì nán rén dài mào zi jiù kuài tū dǐng.
english: He has a theory that wearing hats makes men go bald.

hanzi: 我们已做好会议的全部筹备工作。
pinyin: wǒ men yǐ zuò hào huì yì de quán bù chóu bèi gōng zuò。
english: We have made all the arrangements for the conference.

hanzi: 要聘请到素质好的老师是很困难的。
pinyin: yào pìn qǐng dào sù zhì hǎo de lǎo shī shì hěn kùn nan de。
english: It's difficult to recruit teachers of quality.

hanzi: 那些股东被召集去叁加股东大会。
pinyin: nà xiē gǔ dōng bèi zhào jí qù sān jiā gǔ dōng dà huì。
english: The shareholders were summoned to a general meeting.

hanzi: 他们有些人养成了严重的自卑感。
pinyin: tā men yǒu xiē rén yǎng chéng le yán zhòng de zì bēi gǎn。
english: Some of them developed a great inferiority complex.

hanzi: 我无法把这颗螺丝钉从墙上取出。
pinyin: wǒ wú fǎ bǎ zhè kē luó sī dīng zòng qiáng shàng qǔ chū。
english: I can't get this screw to come out of the wall.

hanzi: 一会儿她就用钳子把孩子接下来了。
pinyin: yī huìr tā jiù yòng qián zi bǎ hái zi jiē xia lai le。
english: In a little while she delivered the baby with forceps.

hanzi: 骡子是公驴和母马交配而生的杂种。
pinyin: luó zi shì gōng lu:2 huò mǔ mǎ jiāo pèi ér shēng de zá zhòng。
english: A mule is a hybrid of a donkey and a horse.

hanzi: 我们被指控非法携带货物入境.
pinyin: wǒ men bèi zhǐ kòng fēi fǎ xié dài huò wù rù jìng.
english: We were alleged to have brought goods into the country illegally.

hanzi: 我对万能的上帝发誓我要说真话。
pinyin: wǒ duì wàn néng de shàng dì fā shì wǒ yào shuō zhēn huà。
english: I swear by Almighty God that I will tell the truth.

hanzi: 我们当务之急是安抚死者的家属.
pinyin: wǒ men dàng wù zhī jí shì ān fǔ sǐ zhě de jiā shǔ.
english: Our immediate concern is for/with the families of those who died.

hanzi: 轰隆一声，大量冰雪从山腰崩落。
pinyin: hōng lóng yī shēng， dà liàng bīng xuě zòng shān yāo bēng luò。
english: The avalanche crashed down the mountainside.

hanzi: 我们被指控非法携带货物入境.
pinyin: wǒ men bèi zhǐ kòng fēi fǎ xié dài huò wù rù jìng.
english: We were alleged to have brought goods into the country illegally.

hanzi: 瞧那对时髦夫妇，打扮多么入时。
pinyin: qiáo nà duì shí máo fū fù， dǎ bàn duō me rù shí。
english: Look at that trendy couple- kitted up all the latest gear!

hanzi: 人们总是把老师比喻为燃烧的蜡烛。
pinyin: rén men zǒng shì bǎ lǎo shī bǐ yù wèi rán shāo de là zhú。
english: Teachers are often compared to burning candles.

hanzi: 我们可以用一个筛子把石头分离出来。
pinyin: wǒ men kě yǐ yòng yī gè shāi zi bǎ shí tou fēn lí chū lai。
english: We can separate the stones out with a sieve.

hanzi: 医生给他打开胸膛并取出肿瘤。
pinyin: yī shēng jǐ tā dǎ kāi xiōng táng bìng qǔ chū zhǒng liú。
english: The surgeon cut his chest open and took out the tumour.

hanzi: 在举行葬礼以前尸体被放在棺材里。
pinyin: zài jǔ xíng zàng lǐ yǐ qián shī tǐ bèi fàng zài guān cái lǐ。
english: The body was placed in bier before burial.

hanzi: 人们总是把老师比喻为燃烧的蜡烛。
pinyin: rén men zǒng shì bǎ lǎo shī bǐ yù wèi rán shāo de là zhú。
english: Teachers are often compared to burning candles.

hanzi: 所有战士作战英勇都受到表彰。
pinyin: suǒ yǒu zhàn shì zuò zhàn yīng yǒng dōu shòu dào biǎo zhāng。
english: All the soldiers were cited for bravery in battle.

hanzi: 红色和紫色位于光谱相对的两端。
pinyin: hóng sè huò zǐ sè wèi yú guāng pǔ xiāng duì de liǎng duān。
english: Red and violet are at opposite ends of the spectrum.

hanzi: 用不了多少时间就可以把咖啡过滤好.
pinyin: yòng bù liǎo duō shao shí jiān jiù kě yǐ bǎ kā fēi guò lu:4 hào.
english: It won't take long to filter the coffee.

hanzi: 我们被指控非法携带货物入境.
pinyin: wǒ men bèi zhǐ kòng fēi fǎ xié dài huò wù rù jìng.
english: We were alleged to have brought goods into the country illegally.

hanzi: 公共汽车频繁地从城市驶往机场.
pinyin: gōng gòng qì chē pín fán de zòng chéng shì shǐ wàng jī chǎng.
english: Buses run frequently from the city to the airport.

hanzi: 她乔装打扮戴著金色假发和墨镜.
pinyin: tā qiáo zhuāng dǎ bàn dài著 jīn sè jiǎ fà huò mò jìng.
english: She disguised herself with a blonde wig and dark glasses.

hanzi: 我的侄子都想帮我收拾收拾房子.
pinyin: wǒ de zhí zi dōu xiǎng bāng wǒ shōu shi shōu shi fáng zi.
english: My nephews tried to make themselves useful about the house.

hanzi: 她脸上带著困惑的表情在倾听著。
pinyin: tā liǎn shàng dài著 kùn huò de biǎo qíng zài qīng tīng著。
english: She listened with a puzzled expression on her face.

hanzi: 有了她当主管, 公司开始兴旺起来.
pinyin: yǒu le tā dàng zhǔ guǎn,  gōng sī kāi shǐ xīng wàng qǐ lai.
english: With her at the wheel, the company began to prosper.

hanzi: 现代化的都市里遍地是高楼大厦。
pinyin: xiàn dài huà de dū shì lǐ biàn dì shì gāo lóu dà shà。
english: In modern cities there are high-rise buildings everywhere.

hanzi: 市长在学校运动会上颁发奖品.
pinyin: shì zhǎng zài xué xiào yùn dòng huì shàng bān fā jiǎng pǐn.
english: The mayor gave away the prizes at the school sports day.

hanzi: 快速巡逻艇迅即赶上那艘旧货船.
pinyin: kuài sù xún luó tǐng xùn jí gǎn shàng nà sōu jiù huò chuán.
english: The fast cruiser soon overhauled the old cargo boat.

hanzi: 他们在支票上伪造了经理的签名。
pinyin: tā men zài zhī piào shàng wěi zào le jīng lǐ de qiān míng。
english: They forged their manager's signature on the cheque.

hanzi: 我津津有味地品尝了我妈妈做的鱼。
pinyin: wǒ jīn jīn yǒu wèi de pǐn cháng le wǒ mā ma zuò de yú。
english: I tasted the fish my mother cooked with relish.

hanzi: 他们能够用雷达测定快艇的方位.
pinyin: tā men néng gòu yòng léi dá cè dìng kuài tǐng de fāng wèi.
english: They were able to position the yacht by means of radar.

hanzi: 这个淘气的孩子把书藏在了灌木丛里。
pinyin: zhè gè táo qì de hái zi bǎ shū zàng zài le guàn mù cóng lǐ。
english: The naughty boy hid the books in the shrub.

hanzi: 他画了海湾里一个风景如画的渔村。
pinyin: tā huà le hǎi wān lǐ yī gè fēng jǐng rú huà de yú cūn。
english: He painted the picturesque fishing village in the bay.

hanzi: 天空和大海构成了一幅和谐的画面。
pinyin: tiān kōng huò dà hǎi gòu chéng le yī fú hé xié de huà miàn。
english: The sky and the sea make a harmonious picture.

hanzi: 据说他腿瘸了，是一次事故造成的。
pinyin: jù shuō tā tuǐ qué le， shì yī cì shì gù zào chéng de。
english: It's said that his lameness resulted from an accident.

hanzi: 她正在把米过筛，好把石头筛出。
pinyin: tā zhèng zài bǎ mǐ guò shāi， hào bǎ shí tou shāi chū。
english: She is sieving the rice in order to sieve out the stones.

hanzi: 进贡的义务支付贡金或缴纳贡税的义务
pinyin: jìn gòng de yì wù zhī fù gòng jīn huò jiǎo nà gòng shuì de yì wù
english: The obligation to make such a payment.

hanzi: 他设法弄到一笔贷款买了一栋房子。
pinyin: tā shè fǎ nòng dào yī bǐ dài kuǎn mǎi le yī dòng fáng zi。
english: He managed to secure a loan to purchase a house.

hanzi: 八条大道从广场呈辐射形伸展出去。
pinyin: bā tiáo dà dào zòng guǎng chǎng chéng fú shè xíng shēn zhǎn chū qù。
english: Eight roads radiate from the square.

hanzi: 钳形的形状象钳子的或与其极为相似的
pinyin: qián xíng de xíng zhuàng xiàng qián zi de huò yǔ qí jí wéi xiāng sì de
english: Shaped like or resembling forceps.

hanzi: 他们能够用雷达测定快艇的方位.
pinyin: tā men néng gòu yòng léi dá cè dìng kuài tǐng de fāng wèi.
english: They were able to position the yacht by means of radar.

hanzi: 遇有急用时，我们只好动用积蓄。
pinyin: yù yǒu jí yòng shí， wǒ men zhǐ hǎo dòng yòng jī xù。
english: If it come to the push, we shall have to use our savings.

hanzi: 劫掠物，战利品战时取自敌人的战利品
pinyin: jié lu:è wù， zhàn lì pǐn zhàn shí qǔ zì dí rén de zhàn lì pǐn
english: Plunder taken from an enemy in time of war.

hanzi: 他常常为了噪音和邻居们争吵。
pinyin: tā cháng cháng wèi le zào yīn huò lín jū men zhēng chǎo。
english: He was always fighting with his neighbors about the noise.

hanzi: 加利福尼亚有许多来自其他州的移民。
pinyin: jiā lì fú ní yà yǒu xǔ duō lái zì qí tā zhōu de yí mín。
