english: California has many immigrants from other states.

hanzi: 茅屋用木杆搭成，上面以草席覆盖。
pinyin: máo wū yòng mù gǎn dā chéng， shàng mian yǐ cǎo xí fù gài。
english: The hut was made of poles covered with grass mats.

hanzi: 小提琴的弦上得太紧，突然断了。
pinyin: xiǎo tí qín de xián shàng de tài jǐn， tū rán duàn le。
english: The violin string snapped because it was fastened too tight.

hanzi: 孩子睡了，她掂着脚走到床前。
pinyin: hái zi shuì le， tā diān zhuó jué zǒu dào chuáng qián。
english: She tiptoed across to the bed where the child was lying asleep.

hanzi: 罗马的喷泉以其建筑之美而著称.
pinyin: Luó mǎ de pēn quán yǐ qí jiàn zhù zhī měi ér著 chèng.
english: The fountains of Rome are famed for their architectural beauty.

hanzi: 这种花在温暖的气候中长得茂盛.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng huā zài wēn nuǎn de qì hòu zhòng zhǎng de mào shèng.
english: This species of flower flourishes in a warm climate.

hanzi: 只需一笔贷款就能帮我摆脱困境。
pinyin: zhǐ xū yī bǐ dài kuǎn jiù néng bāng wǒ bǎi tuō kùn jìng。
english: A loan of money would help me out of my predicament.

hanzi: 所有的人都震惊于她天仙般的美貌。
pinyin: suǒ yǒu de rén dōu zhèn jīng yú tā tiān xiān bān de měi mào。
english: People were all shocked at her godlike beauty.

hanzi: 救护车及时赶到了那座倒塌的大厦。
pinyin: jiù hù chē jí shí gǎn dào le nà zuò dǎo tā de dà shà。
english: The ambulance reached the collapsed building in due time.

hanzi: 参观者川流不息地向这所房子走来.
pinyin: cān guān zhě chuān liú bù xī de xiàng zhè suǒ fáng zi zǒu lái.
english: A procession of visitors came to the house.

hanzi: 风势已减弱, 做帆船运动较为安全了.
pinyin: fēng shì yǐ jiǎn ruò,  zuò fān chuán yùn dòng jiào wèi ān quán le.
english: The wind has moderated, making sailing safer.

hanzi: 他们将为不得不干那项工作而抱怨。
pinyin: tā men jiàng wèi bù dé bù gàn nà xiàng gōng zuò ér bào yuàn。
english: They will grumble about having to do the work.

hanzi: 她的连衣裙下摆离膝盖整整三英寸.
pinyin: tā de lián yì qún xià bǎi lí xī gài zhěng zhěng sān yīng cùn.
english: Her dress was a full three inches above the knee.

hanzi: 他让我尝到了他敏锐尖刻之机智的滋味。
pinyin: tā ràng wǒ cháng dào le tā mǐn ruì jiān kè zhī jī zhì de zī wèi。
english: He gave me a taste of his acid wit.

hanzi: 他在狭窄的窗台上很难保持平衡.
pinyin: tā zài xiá zhǎi de chuāng tái shàng hěn nán bǎo chí píng héng.
english: He balanced precariously on the narrow window-ledge.

hanzi: 该请愿书奉命暂搁一边，以后讨论。
pinyin: gāi qǐng yuàn shū fèng mìng zàn gē yī biān， yǐ hòu tǎo lùn。
english: The petition was ordered to lie on the table.

hanzi: 他至少跟珍一样对谱曲很感兴趣。
pinyin: tā zhì shǎo gēn zhēn yí yàng duì pǔ qǔ hěn gǎn xìng qu。
english: He is not less interested in composing music than Jane.

hanzi: 书中女主人翁是作者的真实写照。
pinyin: shū zhòng nu:3 zhǔ rén wēng shì zuó zhě de zhēn shí xiě zhào。
english: The heroine is the spitting image of the author.

hanzi: 那头凶猛的狮子一下子就挣脱了锁链。
pinyin: nà tou xiōng měng de shī zi yí xià zi jiù zhèng tuō le suǒ liàn。
english: The fierce lion burst free from the chains.

hanzi: 现代化的都市里遍地是高楼大厦。
pinyin: xiàn dài huà de dū shì lǐ biàn dì shì gāo lóu dà shà。
english: In modern cities there are high-rise buildings everywhere.

hanzi: 恐怖分子袭击了两名正在巡逻的士兵.
pinyin: kǒng bù fèn zǐ xí jī le liǎng míng zhèng zài xún luó de shì bīng.
english: Terrorists attacked two soldiers on patrol.

hanzi: 邮车每周只到这个偏僻的村庄一次。
pinyin: yóu jū měi zhōu zhǐ dào zhè gè piān pì de cūn zhuāng yī cì。
english: Mail comes to this remote village only once a week.

hanzi: 战败的消息给小城蒙上了一层忧郁。
pinyin: zhàn bài de xiāo xi jǐ xiǎo chéng měng shàng le yī céng yōu yù。
english: The news of defeat cast a gloom over the town.

hanzi: 向警察投掷的东西有石块和瓶子.
pinyin: xiàng jǐng chá tóu zhì de dōng xi yǒu shí kuài huò píng zi.
english: Missiles thrown at the police included stones and bottles.

hanzi: 条文规定必须由律师拟定此公文。
pinyin: tiáo wén guī dìng bì xū yóu lu:4 shī nǐ dìng cǐ gōng wén。
english: Regulations prescribe that a lawyer draw up the paper.

hanzi: 他对自己所处何种地步茫无所知.
pinyin: tā duì zì jǐ suǒ chù hé zhòng dì bù máng wú suǒ zhī.
english: Little does he know (ie He doesn't know) what trouble he's in.

hanzi: 她儿子回来了，她总算解除了忧虑。
pinyin: tā ér zi huí lai le， tā zǒng suàn jiě chú le yōu lu:4。
english: When her son returned she was at last free from anxiety.

hanzi: 现代化的都市里遍地是高楼大厦。
pinyin: xiàn dài huà de dū shì lǐ biàn dì shì gāo lóu dà shà。
english: In modern cities there are high-rise buildings everywhere.

hanzi: 这辆自行车没闸--你要骑可太危险了.
pinyin: zhè liàng zì xíng chē mò zhá-- nǐ yào qí kě tài wēi xiǎn le.
english: The bicycle has no brakes you ride it at your peril.

hanzi: 在许多国家, 当众吐痰属不雅行为.
pinyin: zài xǔ duō guó jiā,  dāng zhòng tù tán zhǔ bù yǎ xíng wéi.
english: In many countries it is considered rude to spit in public.

hanzi: 轰炸机对这港口进行了一次突然袭击。
pinyin: hōng zhà jī duì zhè gǎng kǒu jìn xíng le yī cì tū rán xí jī。
english: The bombers made a sudden strike on the harbor.

hanzi: 一只兔子被卷到收割机的刀刃中去了。
pinyin: yī zhǐ tù zi bèi juàn dào shōu gē jī de dāo rèn zhòng qù le。
english: A rabbit get catch in the blade of the reaper.

hanzi: 只要顺著她, 她是又和蔼又讲理.
pinyin: zhǐ yào shùn著 tā,  tā shì yòu hé ǎi yòu jiǎng lǐ.
english: She's all sweetness and light provided you're doing what she wants.

hanzi: 正在制定处理这种弊端的新法令。
pinyin: zhèng zài zhì dìng chǔ lǐ zhè zhǒng bì duān de xīn fǎ lìng。
english: New laws to deal with this abuse are in the pipeline.

hanzi: 当船徐徐开动时，孩子们欢呼雀跃。
pinyin: dàng chuán xú xú kāi dòng shí， hái zi men huān hū què yuè。
english: The children cheered as the ship drew slowly away.

hanzi: 政府雇员宣誓不泄露官方机密.
pinyin: zhèng fǔ gù yuán xuān shì bù xiè lòu guān fāng jī mì.
english: Government employees swear an oath not to reveal official secrets.

hanzi: 我们生起了火, 很快就觉得暖烘烘的了.
pinyin: wǒ men shēng qǐ le huǒ,  hěn kuài jiù jué de nuǎn hōng hōng de le.
english: We lit the fire and were soon as warm as toast.

hanzi: 该足球队已签约聘用了两名新队员。
pinyin: gāi zú qiú duì yǐ qiān yuē pìn yòng le liǎng míng xīn duì yuán。
english: The football team has signed two new players.

hanzi: 那时他正穿着笨重的靴子走来走去。
pinyin: nà shí tā zhèng chuān zhuó bèn zhòng de xuē zi zǒu lái zǒu qù。
english: He was clumping about in heavy boots that time.

hanzi: 他往汤里放盐太多，把汤给糟蹋了。
pinyin: tā wàng tāng lǐ fàng yán tài duō， bǎ tāng jǐ zāo tà le。
english: He had spoiled the soup by putting in too much salt.

hanzi: 说英语时, 重音和节奏是很重要的.
pinyin: shuō Yīng yǔ shí,  zhòng yīn huò jié zòu shì hěn zhòng yào de.
english: Stress and rhythm are important in speaking English.

hanzi: 茅屋用木杆搭成，上面以草席覆盖。
pinyin: máo wū yòng mù gǎn dā chéng， shàng mian yǐ cǎo xí fù gài。
english: The hut was made of poles covered with grass mats.

hanzi: 植物可以吸收二氧化碳释放氧气。
pinyin: zhí wù kě yǐ xī shōu èr yǎng huà tàn shì fàng yǎng qì。
english: Plants can absorb carbon dioxide and release oxygen.

hanzi: 那位演唱者的姐姐用钢琴给她伴奏.
pinyin: nà wèi yǎn chàng zhě de jiě jie yòng gāng qín jǐ tā bàn zòu.
english: The singer was accompanied at/on the piano by her sister.

hanzi: 他们俩都外出工作, 雇了个保姆看家.
pinyin: tā men liǎng dōu wài chū gōng zuò,  gù le gè bǎo mǔ kàn jiā.
english: They both go out to work and have a nanny living in.

hanzi: 我们不应该嘲笑别人的宗教信仰。
pinyin: wǒ men bù yīng gāi cháo xiào bié rén de zōng jiào xìn yǎng。
english: We should not mock at other people's religious beliefs.

hanzi: 这座山高而陡，形成一道岩石屏障。
pinyin: zhè zuò shān gāo ér dǒu， xíng chéng yī dào yán shí píng zhàng。
english: The mountain rose up in a steep wall of rock.

hanzi: 风势已减弱, 做帆船运动较为安全了.
pinyin: fēng shì yǐ jiǎn ruò,  zuò fān chuán yùn dòng jiào wèi ān quán le.
english: The wind has moderated, making sailing safer.

hanzi: 窃贼把失火的仓库里的货物都偷走了.
pinyin: qiè zéi bǎ shī huǒ de cāng kù lǐ de huò wù dōu tōu zǒu le.
english: Thieves snaffled all the goods from the burnt warehouse.

hanzi: 她从收藏品中挑选了一枚钻石戒指。
pinyin: tā zòng shōu cáng pǐn zhòng tiāo xuǎn le yī méi zuàn shí jiè zhi。
english: She selected a diamond ring from the collection.

hanzi: 如果灯杆不是笔直的，我就感到烦恼。
pinyin: rú guǒ dēng gǎn bú shì bǐ zhí de， wǒ jiù gǎn dào fán nǎo。
english: It annoys me if a lamppost is not bolt upright.

hanzi: 我苏醒过来的时候是在地板上躺著呢.
pinyin: wǒ sū xǐng guò lai de shí hou shì zài dì bǎn shàng tǎng著 ne.
english: When I came to my senses, I was lying on the floor.

hanzi: 这么冷的天不穿一件外套真荒唐。
pinyin: zhè me lěng de tiān bù chuān yī jiàn wài tào zhēn huāng táng。
english: It is absurd not to wear a coat in such cold weather.

hanzi: 箱子突然打开，从里面蹦出只小狗。
pinyin: xiāng zǐ tū rán dǎ kāi， zòng lǐ miàn bèng chū zhǐ xiǎo gǒu。
english: Suddenly the box split open and a puppy jumped out.

hanzi: 都市生活的艰难迫使他迁往乡村.
pinyin: dū shì shēng huó de jiān nán pò shǐ tā qiān wàng xiāng cūn.
english: The pressures of city life forced him to move to the country.

hanzi: 邮车每周只到这个偏僻的村庄一次。
pinyin: yóu jū měi zhōu zhǐ dào zhè gè piān pì de cūn zhuāng yī cì。
english: Mail comes to this remote village only once a week.

hanzi: 储备金额为预防不测而存留的资金数额
pinyin: chǔ bèi jīn é wèi yù fáng bù cè ér cún liú de zī jīn shù é
english: The amount of funds reserved to meet liabilities.

hanzi: 付新地毯的款用去了我的一部分储蓄。
pinyin: fù xīn dì tǎn de kuǎn yòng qù le wǒ de yī bù fen chǔ xù。
english: Paying for that new carpet has eaten into my savings.

hanzi: 现正全力以赴来解决这场纠纷。
pinyin: xiàn zhèng quán lì yǐ fù lái jiě jué zhè chǎng jiū fēn。
english: Intensive efforts are being made to resolve the dispute.

hanzi: 圣女贞德是法国最伟大的女性之一。
pinyin: shèng nu:3 zhēn dé shì fǎ guó zuì wěi dà de nu:3 xìng zhī yī。
english: Joan of Arc was one of France's greatest daughters.

hanzi: 我听到了他口袋里叮当碰撞的硬币声。
pinyin: wǒ tīng dào le tā kǒu dài lǐ dīng dàng pèng zhuàng de yìng bì shēng。
english: I heard the clink of coins in his pockets.

hanzi: 前景似颇暗淡，但我们仍满怀希望。
pinyin: qián jǐng sì pō àn dàn， dàn wǒ men réng mǎn huái xī wàng。
english: The future looks rather gloomy, but we live in hope.

hanzi: 按此地址函索即免费寄奉样品.
pinyin: àn cǐ dì zhǐ hán suǒ jí miǎn fèi jì fèng yàng pǐn.
english: Write now to this address and we will send you a free sample by return.

hanzi: 她的第一本书在文学界大为轰动.
pinyin: tā de dì yī běn shū zài wén xué jiè dà wèi hōng dòng.
english: She has made quite a splash in literary circles with her first book.

hanzi: 基督教教义和穆斯林教义极为不同。
pinyin: Jī dū jiào jiào yì huò mù sī lín jiào yì jí wéi bù tóng。
english: Christian and Muslim doctrines are very different.

hanzi: 她在一封长信里阐明了辞职原因.
pinyin: tā zài yī fēng zhǎng xìn lǐ chǎn míng le cí zhí yuán yīn.
english: She set out the reasons for her resignation in a long letter.

hanzi: 罩，防护罩用于脸或头的保护性覆盖物
pinyin: zhào， fáng hù zhào yòng yú liǎn huò tou de bǎo hù xìng fù gài wù
english: A protective covering for the face or head.

hanzi: 这篇报道不是颠倒黑白就是含糊其辞.
pinyin: zhè piān bào dào bú shì diān dǎo hēi bái jiù shì hán hú qí cí.
english: The report was full of lies and prevarications.

hanzi: 计算机的反馈能使我们更新程序.
pinyin: jì suàn jī de fǎn kuì néng shǐ wǒ men gēng xīn chéng xù.
english: The feedback from the computer enables us to update the program.

hanzi: 管子以熔合管端的方法封闭起来了。
pinyin: guǎn zi yǐ róng hé guǎn duān de fāng fǎ fēng bì qǐ lai le。
english: The tube was sealed off by fusing the material together.

hanzi: 小提琴的弦上得太紧，突然断了。
pinyin: xiǎo tí qín de xián shàng de tài jǐn， tū rán duàn le。
english: The violin string snapped because it was fastened too tight.

hanzi: 他屡次失败使他的声誉受到很大损害。
pinyin: tā lu:3 cì shī bài shǐ tā de shēng yú shòu dào hěn dà sǔn hài。
english: His failures did his reputation a lot of harm.

hanzi: 倘若我们进行干预，那可能弊多利少。
pinyin: tǎng ruò wǒ men jìn xíng gān yù， nà kě néng bì Duō lì shào。
english: If we interfere, it may do more harm than good.

hanzi: 他为他的案子聘了该州最好的律师。
pinyin: tā wèi tā de àn zi pìn le gāi zhōu zuì hǎo de lu:4 shī。
english: He retained the best lawyer in the state to defend his case.

hanzi: 他们投产的新轿车广获传媒报道.
pinyin: tā men tóu chǎn de xīn jiào chē guǎng huò zhuàn méi bào dào.
english: The launch of their new saloon received much media coverage.

hanzi: 我给你拍照的那一刹那, 你不要动。
pinyin: wǒ jǐ nǐ pāi zhào de nà yī chà nà,  nǐ bù yào dòng。
english: Hold yourself still for a moment while I take your photograph.

hanzi: 她坐在那里用手指捻着玻璃杯的杯颈。
pinyin: tā zuò zài nà li yòng shǒu zhǐ niǎn zhuó bō li bēi de bēi jǐng。
english: She sit twirl the stem of the glass in her finger

hanzi: 柱，杆建筑物框架中横梁的支撑物
pinyin: zhù， gǎn jiàn zhù wù kuàng jià zhòng héng liáng de zhī chēng wù
english: A support for a beam in the framework of a building.

hanzi: 透过敞开的房门可以看见凌乱的厨房。
pinyin: tòu guò chǎng kāi de fáng mén kě yǐ kàn jiàn líng luàn de chú fáng。
english: The open door revealed an untidy kitchen.

hanzi: 计算机的反馈能使我们更新程序.
pinyin: jì suàn jī de fǎn kuì néng shǐ wǒ men gēng xīn chéng xù.
english: The feedback from the computer enables us to update the program.

hanzi: 新的法规旨在杜绝诈骗行为。
pinyin: xīn de fǎ guī zhǐ zài dù jué zhà piàn xíng wéi。
english: The new regulations are deliberately calculated to make cheating impossible.

hanzi: 我们买了一些装饰品来点缀圣诞树。
pinyin: wǒ men mǎi le yī xiē zhuāng shì pǐn lái diǎn zhuì Shèng dàn shù。
english: We bought some ornaments for the Christmas tree.

hanzi: 一个正直的法官不能一味顺从舆论。
pinyin: yī gè zhèng zhí de fǎ guān bù néng yī wèi shùn cóng yú lùn。
english: An honest judge cannot be servile to public opinion.

hanzi: 心律失常不规则的心跳强度或节奏
pinyin: xīn lu:4 shī cháng bù guī zé de xīn tiào qiáng dù huò jié zòu
english: An irregularity in the force or rhythm of the heartbeat.

hanzi: 他的放荡的行为使他的母亲极为苦恼。
pinyin: tā de fàng dàng de xíng wéi shǐ tā de mǔ qīn jí wéi kǔ nǎo。
english: His wild behavior was a great distress to his mother.

hanzi: 新的法规旨在杜绝诈骗行为。
pinyin: xīn de fǎ guī zhǐ zài dù jué zhà piàn xíng wéi。
english: The new regulations are deliberately calculated to make cheating impossible.

hanzi: 我踌躇了一阵，还是无法做决定。
pinyin: wǒ chóu chú le yī zhèn， hái shì wú fǎ zuò jué dìng。
english: I faltered for a while and was still unable to make a decision.

hanzi: 人们经常在葬礼和追悼会上见到他。
pinyin: rén men jīng cháng zài zàng lǐ huò zhuī dào kuài shàng xiàn dào tā。
english: He was often seen at funerals and memorials.

hanzi: 他竖起大衣领子, 匆匆冒雨出去了.
pinyin: tā shù qi dà yī lǐng zi,  cōng cōng mào yǔ chū qù le.
english: He turned up the collar of his coat and hurried out into the rain.

hanzi: 青年仆人正服侍他的主人进晚餐。
pinyin: qīng nián pú rén zhèng fú shì tā de zhǔ rén jìn wǎn cān。
english: The young servant is waiting upon his master to have dinner.

hanzi: 那位演唱者的姐姐用钢琴给她伴奏.
pinyin: nà wèi yǎn chàng zhě de jiě jie yòng gāng qín jǐ tā bàn zòu.
english: The singer was accompanied at/on the piano by her sister.

hanzi: 在上次战争中他在北非战役参战.
pinyin: zài shàng cì zhàn zhēng zhòng tā zài běi fēi zhàn yì shēn zhàn.
english: He fought in the N African campaign during the last war.

hanzi: 大多数歹徒最终都落得个不好的下场。
pinyin: dà duō shù dǎi tú zuì zhōng dōu luò de gè bù hǎo de xià chǎng。
english: Most gangsters come to a sticky end eventually.

hanzi: 他往土里掺了些沙子以提高渗水性能。
pinyin: tā wàng tǔ lǐ shǎn le xiē shā zi yǐ tí gāo shèn shuǐ xìng néng。
english: He added sand to the soil to make it more porous.

hanzi: 那个国家由于政治对抗而陷于瘫痪。
pinyin: nèi gè guó jiā yóu yú zhèng zhì duì kàng ér xiàn yú tān huàn。
english: That country was paralysed by political rivalries.

hanzi: 核武装轰炸机在危机期间负责警戒
pinyin: hé wǔ zhuāng hōng zhà jī zài wēi jī qī jiān fù zé jǐng jiè
english: Nuclear-armed bombers were put on alert during the crisis.

hanzi: 上天既赋予她美貌，又赋予她聪颖。
pinyin: shàng tiān jì fù yǔ tā měi mào， yòu fù yǔ tā cōng yǐng。
english: Nature endowed her with intelligence as well as beauty.

hanzi: 公共汽车向路边靠，让小轿车超过去。
pinyin: gōng gòng qì chē xiàng lù biān kào， ràng xiǎo jiào chē chāo guò qù。
english: The bus pulled in to let the cars pass.

hanzi: 都市生活的艰难迫使他迁往乡村.
pinyin: dū shì shēng huó de jiān nán pò shǐ tā qiān wàng xiāng cūn.
english: The pressures of city life forced him to move to the country.

hanzi: 酝酿了一会儿想法，然后把它宣布出来
pinyin: yùn niàng le yī huìr xiǎng fǎ， rán hòu bǎ tā xuān bù chū lai
english: Incubated the idea for a while, then announced it.

hanzi: 那把锋利的刀上把我的手指划了道小口子.
pinyin: nà bǎ fēng lì de dāo shàng bǎ wǒ de shǒu zhǐ huà le dào xiǎo kǒu zi.
english: I snicked my finger on the sharp knife.

hanzi: 我的自行车在凹凸不平的车辙道上颠颠簸簸.
pinyin: wǒ de zì xíng chē zài āo tū bù píng de jū zhé dào shàng diān diān bǒ bò.
english: My bike bumped over the ruts.

hanzi: 困境中，他坚定的信仰支撑着他。
pinyin: kùn jìng zhòng， tā jiān dìng de xìn yǎng zhī chēng zhuó tā。
english: His firmness on his belief supported him in difficulties.

hanzi: 粗鲁的缺乏良好的举止，文化，或修养的
pinyin: cū lǔ de quē fá liáng hǎo de jǔ zhǐ， wén huà， huò xiū yǎng de
english: Lacking good manners, culture, or refinement.

hanzi: 恐怖分子扬言要炸毁劫持的客机。
pinyin: kǒng bù fèn zǐ yáng yán yào zhà huǐ jié chí de kè jī。
english: The terrorists are threatening to blow up the hijacked airliner.

hanzi: 剧中多处幽默地提到人类的弱点。
pinyin: jù zhòng duō chù yōu mò de tí dào rén lèi de ruò diǎn。
english: There are many humorous allusions to human foibles in the drama.

hanzi: 这个女孩总是抱怨没有合适的衣服。
pinyin: zhè gè nu:3 hái zǒng shì bào yuàn méi yǒu hé shì de yī fu。
english: The girl always complains about lacking suitable raiment.

hanzi: 他希望改邪归正，过体面的生活。
pinyin: tā xī wàng gǎi xié guī zhèng， guò tǐ miàn de shēng huó。
english: He wishes to straighten up and lead a respectable life.

hanzi: 我看到小扬扛着两把锄头从旁走过。
pinyin: wǒ kàn dào xiǎo yáng káng zhuó liǎng bǎ chú tóu zòng páng zǒu guò。
english: I saw Xiao Yang walking by, shouldering two hoes.

hanzi: 首先，要向杯子里放一小片锌板。
pinyin: shǒu xiān， yào xiàng bēi zi lǐ fàng yī xiǎo piàn xīn bǎn。
english: You should first put a small piece of zinc plate into the cup.

hanzi: 我们为圣诞节的聚会预约了一位魔术师.
pinyin: wǒ men wèi Shèng dàn jié de jù huì yù yuē le yī wèi mó shù shī.
english: We've booked a conjuror for our Christmas party.

hanzi: 惩罚条款印在不起眼的小号字体部分。
pinyin: chéng fá tiáo kuǎn yìn zài bù qǐ yǎn de xiǎo hào zì tǐ bù fen。
english: The penalty clause was hidden in the small print.

hanzi: 数百只小艇随同这艘班轮驶入港湾.
pinyin: shù bǎi zhǐ xiǎo tǐng suí tóng zhè sōu bān lún shǐ rù gǎng wān.
english: Hundreds of small craft accompany the liner into harbour.

hanzi: 火车时刻编排得可与渡轮运行时刻衔接.
pinyin: huǒ chē shí kè biān pái de kě yù dù lún yùn xíng shí kè xián jiē.
english: The train is timed to connect with the ferry.

hanzi: 他径直前往拉各斯, 未在内罗毕停留.
pinyin: tā jìng zhí qián wǎng lā gè sī,  wèi zài nèi luó bì tíng liú.
english: He went straight to Lagos, without stopping in Nairobi.

hanzi: 那只鹰向那小动物猛扑过去把它叼走了.
pinyin: nà zhǐ yīng xiàng nà xiǎo dòng wù měng pū guò qu bǎ tā diāo zǒu le.
english: The hawk pounced on its prey and carried it off.

hanzi: 他因卷入丑闻, 在名誉上留下污点.
pinyin: tā yīn juǎn rù chǒu wén,  zài míng yù shàng liú xià wū diǎn.
english: His involvement in the scandal was a blot on his reputation.

hanzi: 这动物嗅觉灵敏弥补了视力之不足.
pinyin: zhè dòng wù xiù jué líng mǐn mí bǔ le shì lì zhī bù zú.
english: The animal's good sense of smell compensates for its poor eyesight.

hanzi: 木屑床垫填满草杆或木屑的一床薄垫子
pinyin: mù xiè chuáng diàn tián mǎn cǎo gǎn huò mù xiè de yī chuáng bò diàn zǐ
english: A thin mattress filled with straw or sawdust.

hanzi: 她用一双水汪汪的眼睛深情地看着他。
pinyin: tā yòng yī shuāng shuǐ wāng wāng de yǎn jīng shēn qíng de kàn zhuó tā。
english: She looked at him all dewy-eyed with love.

hanzi: 她说话滔滔不绝, 我们都插不上嘴.
pinyin: tā shuō huà tāo tāo bù jué,  wǒ men dōu chā bù shàng zuǐ.
english: She talks so much that the rest of us never get a look-in.

hanzi: 有的人看到色情杂志能激发起性欲。
pinyin: yǒu de rén kàn dào sè qíng zá zhì néng jī fā qǐ xìng yù。
english: Some people are sexually excited by pornographic magazines.

hanzi: 支柱，支持物生命力赖以释放的动原
pinyin: zhī zhù， zhī chí wù shēng mìng lì lài yǐ shì fàng de dòng yuán
english: An agent through which vital powers are exercised.

hanzi: 金矿区蕴藏大量黄金或金矿的地区
pinyin: jīn kuàng qū yùn cáng dà liàng huáng jīn huò jīn kuàng de dì qū
english: An area containing abundant deposits of gold or gold ore.

hanzi: 现在不是奢侈花钱买新立体音响的时候.
pinyin: xiàn zài bú shì shē chǐ huā qián mǎi xīn lì tǐ yīn xiǎng de shí hou.
english: This is no time to lash out on a new stereo.

hanzi: 董事长裁定该会议是违反章程的。
pinyin: dǒng shì zhǎng cái dìng gāi huì yì shì wéi fǎn zhāng chéng de。
english: The chairman ruled that the meeting was unconstitutional.

hanzi: 她为公司的前景描绘了一幅美好的图画。
pinyin: tā wèi gōng sī de qián jǐng miáo huì le yī fú měi hǎo de tú huà。
english: She painted a rosy picture of the firm's future.

hanzi: 她脸上挂着虚伪的笑容来欢迎我们。
pinyin: tā liǎn shàng guà zhuó xū wèi de xiào róng lái huān yíng wǒ men。
english: She welcome us with an artificial smile on her face.

hanzi: 这位歌唱家由她妹妹担任钢琴伴奏。
pinyin: zhè wèi gē chàng jiā yóu tā mèi mei dān rèn gāng qín bàn zòu。
english: The singer was accompanied by her sister at the piano.

hanzi: 至于地平学说，我相信我能驳斥它。
pinyin: zhì yú de píng xué shuō， wǒ xiāng xìn wǒ néng bó chì tā。
english: As for the Flat Earth theory, I believe I could refute it.

hanzi: 那只鹰向那小动物猛扑过去把它叼走了.
pinyin: nà zhǐ yīng xiàng nà xiǎo dòng wù měng pū guò qu bǎ tā diāo zǒu le.
english: The hawk pounced on its prey and carried it off.

hanzi: 那不是稀有的鸟, 只不过是普通的麻雀.
pinyin: nà bú shì xī yǒu de niǎo,  zhǐ bù guò shì pǔ tōng de má què.
english: It isn't a rare bird, just a common or garden sparrow.

hanzi: 她有一条用三角形蓝绸子做的围巾。
pinyin: tā yǒu yī tiáo yòng sān jiǎo xíng lán chóu zi zuò de wéi jīn。
english: She has a scarf made of a triangular piece of blue silk.

hanzi: 这件事发生在河南一个偏僻的农村。
pinyin: zhè jiàn shì fā shēng zài hé nán yī gè piān pì de nóng cūn。
english: The thing happened in an out-of-the-way village in Henan.

hanzi: 我曾经叮嘱他不要和任何人讲这件事。
pinyin: wǒ céng jīng dīng zhǔ tā bù yào huò rèn hé rén jiǎng zhè jiàn shì。
english: I had warned him not to tell anyone about it.

hanzi: 人们心中的恐惧像瘟疫一样蔓延开来。
pinyin: rén men xīn zhōng de kǒng jù xiàng wēn yì yí yàng màn yán kāi lái。
english: Fear spread through the crowd like a contagion.

hanzi: 要是过去没有书，我们就会愚昧无知。
pinyin: yào shì guò qu méi yǒu shū， wǒ men jiù kuài yú mèi wú zhī。
english: If there had been no book, we will have been ignorant.

hanzi: 我觉察到我在时他们有些拘束.
pinyin: wǒ jué chá dào wǒ zài shí tā men yǒu xiē jū shù.
english: I was aware of a certain constraint on their part when they were in my presence.

hanzi: 我建议，就提出的协议拟定一个草案。
pinyin: wǒ jiàn yì， jiù tí chū de xié yì nǐ dìng yī gè cǎo àn。
english: I suggest that a draft be made of the proposed agreement.

hanzi: 只有一个枕头--我跟你掷硬币决定谁用吧.
pinyin: zhǐ yǒu yī gè zhěn tou-- wǒ gēn nǐ zhì yìng bì jué dìng shéi yòng ba.
english: There's only one pillow I'll toss you for it.

hanzi: 她忧戚的面容反映出她内心的思想。
pinyin: tā yōu qī de miàn róng fǎn yìng chū tā nèi xīn de sī xiǎng。
english: Her sad looks reflected the thought passing through her mind.

hanzi: 定向与罗盘所指相关的地点或位置
pinyin: dìng xiàng yù luó pán suǒ zhǐ xiāng guān de dì diǎn huò wèi zhi
english: Location or position relative to the points of the compass.

hanzi: 她有一条用三角形蓝绸子做的围巾。
pinyin: tā yǒu yī tiáo yòng sān jiǎo xíng lán chóu zi zuò de wéi jīn。
english: She has a scarf made of a triangular piece of blue silk.

hanzi: 人们心中的恐惧像瘟疫一样蔓延开来。
pinyin: rén men xīn zhōng de kǒng jù xiàng wēn yì yí yàng màn yán kāi lái。
english: Fear spread through the crowd like a contagion.

hanzi: 蝗虫群毁坏了所有的庄稼和蔬菜。
pinyin: huáng chóng qún huǐ huài le suǒ yǒu de zhuāng jia huò shū cài。
english: The locust swarm has destroyed all the crops and vegetables.

hanzi: 这个盆子是镀金金属的，所以不太值钱。
pinyin: zhè gè pén zi shì dù jīn jīn shǔ de， suǒ yǐ bù tài zhí qián。
english: This basin is only plate so it's not very valuable.

hanzi: 第三天，他们就交出了两万箱鸦片。
pinyin: dì sān tiān， tā men jiù jiāo chū le liǎng wàn xiāng yā piàn。
english: On the third day, they handed over20000 chests of opium.

hanzi: 一个青年因偷窃罪而在刑事庭受审。
pinyin: yī gè qīng nián yīn tōu qiè zuì ér zài xíng shì tíng shòu shěn。
english: A youth was tried in the criminal court for stealing.

hanzi: 一个青年因偷窃罪而在刑事庭受审。
pinyin: yī gè qīng nián yīn tōu qiè zuì ér zài xíng shì tíng shòu shěn。
english: A youth was tried in the criminal court for stealing.

hanzi: 用那样的花招欺负一个老太太, 可真卑鄙.
pinyin: yòng nà yàng de huā zhāo qī fu yī gè lǎo tài tai,  kě zhēn bēi bǐ.
english: That was a scurvy trick to play on an old lady.

hanzi: 她呜咽着诉说自已的孩子是怎样死去的。
pinyin: tā wū yè zhuó sù shuō zì yǐ de hái zi shì zěn yàng sǐ qù de。
english: She sobbed out the story of the death of her child.

hanzi: 他自从失业以来, 常觉百无聊赖.
pinyin: tā zì cóng shī yè yǐ lái,  cháng jué bǎi wú liáo lài.
english: Since losing his job, he has often experienced a profound sense of ennui.

hanzi: 有些小炊具非但没有用处反而碍事。
pinyin: yǒu xiē xiǎo chuī jù fēi dàn méi yǒu yòng chu fǎn ér ài shì。
english: Some kitchen gadgets are more of a hindrance than a help.

hanzi: 新的建筑物如雨后春笋般大批出现。
pinyin: xīn de jiàn zhù wù rú yǔ hòu chūn sǔn bān dà pī chū xiàn。
english: New buildings sprang up like bamboo shoots after a spring rain.

hanzi: 他因滥用职权而破坏了政治声誉。
pinyin: tā yīn làn yòng zhí quán ér pò huài le zhèng zhì shēng yú。
english: His political reputation was tainted by his abuse of the power.

hanzi: 他非但不接受我的劝告，反而背叛了我。
pinyin: tā fēi dàn bù jiē shòu wǒ de quàn gào， fǎn ér bèi pàn le wǒ。
english: Far from accepting my advice, he went back on me.

hanzi: 雪融化时, 山间溪流变成山洪暴发.
pinyin: xuě róng huà shí,  shān jiàn xī liú biàn chéng shān hóng bào fā.
english: When the snow melts, the mountain stream becomes a deluge.

hanzi: 这个无家可归的男孩靠乞讨和偷窃为生。
pinyin: zhè gè wú jiā kě guī de nán hái kào qǐ tǎo huò tōu qiè wéi shēng。
english: The homeless boy begs and thieves for a living.

hanzi: 除夕之夜，各条大街一片灯火辉煌。
pinyin: chú xī zhī yè， gè tiáo dà jiē yī piàn dēng huǒ huī huáng。
english: On New Year's eve, every main street was a blaze of light.

hanzi: 作者把她的主人翁安排在第七章中死去。
pinyin: zuó zhě bǎ tā de zhǔ rén wēng ān pái zài dì qī zhāng zhòng sǐ qù。
english: The author kills off her hero in Chapter7.

hanzi: 鸽子被放出去传送发生叛乱的消息。
pinyin: gē zǐ bèi fàng chū qù chuán sòng fā shēng pàn luàn de xiāo xi。
english: Pigeons were sent out to spread the tidings of rebellion.

hanzi: 谈到他的情人时, 他的双眼闪烁着光芒。
pinyin: tán dào tā de qíng rén shí,  tā de shuāng yǎn shǎn shuò zhuó guāng máng。
english: Speaking of his lover, his eyes sparkled.

hanzi: 普罗特斯一个能任意改变自己外形的海神
pinyin: pǔ luó tè sī yī gè néng rèn yì gǎi biàn zì jǐ wài xíng de hǎi shén
english: A sea god who could change his shape at will.

hanzi: 他跳上马, 朝寺庙方向飞奔而去。
pinyin: tā tiào shàng mǎ,  cháo sì miào fāng xiàng fēi bēn ér qù。
english: He jumped onto the horse and galloped in the direction of the temple.

hanzi: 这动物嗅觉灵敏弥补了视力之不足.
pinyin: zhè dòng wù xiù jué líng mǐn mí bǔ le shì lì zhī bù zú.
english: The animal's good sense of smell compensates for its poor eyesight.

hanzi: 我看到两个小孩正在一个小海湾里玩耍。
pinyin: wǒ kàn dào liǎng gè xiǎo hái zhèng zài yī gè xiǎo hǎi wān lǐ wàn shuǎ。
english: I saw two children were playing in a cove.

hanzi: 狐狸躲在猎狗抓不到它的灌木丛中。
pinyin: hú li duǒ zài liè gǒu zhuā bù dào tā de guàn mù cóng zhòng。
english: The fox hid in the thicket where the dog could not reach it.

hanzi: 在那黑暗的年月，他受到种种歧视。
pinyin: zài nà hēi àn de nián yuè， tā shòu dào zhǒng zhǒng qí shì。
english: He suffered all kinds of discrimination in those dark days.

hanzi: 他的遗体被运回，埋葬在一个公墓里。
pinyin: tā de yí tǐ bèi yùn huí， mái zàng zài yī gè gōng mù lǐ。
english: His remains were shipped back and laid away in a cemetery.

hanzi: 麻雀在我们这个城市里是一种常见的鸟。
pinyin: má què zài wǒ men zhè gè chéng shì lǐ shì yī zhòng cháng jiàn de niǎo。
english: The sparrow is a common bird in our city.

hanzi: 公司绝不愿将自己的信誉孤注一掷。
pinyin: gōng sī jué bù yuàn jiàng zì jǐ de xìn yù gū zhù yī zhì。
english: The company would do anything but risk their prestige at stake.

hanzi: 那场战争中很多士兵死于那片沼泽地。
pinyin: nà chǎng zhàn zhēng zhòng hěn duō shì bīng sǐ yú nà piàn zhǎo zé dì。
english: In that war, many soldiers died in that fen area.

hanzi: 他把钱都输光了, 现在可真狼狈了.
pinyin: tā bǎ qián dōu shū guāng le,  xiàn zài kě zhēn láng bèi le.
english: He lost all his money gambling and now he's really in Queer Street.

hanzi: 这部词典的筹备工作已进行了多年.
pinyin: zhè bù cí diǎn de chóu bèi gōng zuò yǐ jìn xíng le duō nián.
english: Years of work have gone into the preparation of this dictionary.

hanzi: 若不用网把豌豆罩上，鸟就要来吃了。
pinyin: ruò bù yòng wǎng bǎ wān dòu zhào shàng， niǎo jiù yào lái jí le。
english: If you don't net your peas the birds will eat them.

hanzi: 总统在电视讲话中阐明了他的计划。
pinyin: zǒng tǒng zài diàn shì jiǎng huà zhòng chǎn míng le tā de jì huà。
english: The president set forth his plans in a television talk.

hanzi: 对于非授权用户其意义是隐蔽的数据。
pinyin: duì yú fēi shòu quán yòng hù qí yì yì shì yǐn bì de shù jù。
english: Data whose meaning is concealed from unauthorized users.

hanzi: 而且中型车的腿部伸展空间较为宽敞。
pinyin: ér qiě zhōng xíng jū de tuǐ bù shēn zhǎn kōng jiān jiào wèi kuān chang。
english: And the mid- size car have a lot more legroom.

hanzi: 驶经山区的公共汽车遭到匪徒袭击.
pinyin: shǐ jīng shān qū de gōng gòng qì chē zāo dào fěi tú xí jī.
english: Buses driving through the mountains have been attacked by bandits.

hanzi: 我们本地的酿酒厂与另一个公司合并了.
pinyin: wǒ men běn dì de niàng jiǔ chǎng yù lìng yī gè gōng sī hé bìng le.
english: Our local brewery has amalgamated with another firm.

hanzi: 吉普车很适合在高低不平的路面上行驶.
pinyin: jí pǔ chē hěn shì hé zài gāo dī bù píng de lù miàn shàng xíng shǐ.
english: A jeep is ideal for driving over rough terrain.

hanzi: 她看着窗外，为她失去的青春而惋惜。
pinyin: tā kàn zhuó chuāng wài， wèi tā shī qù de qīng chūn ér wǎn xī。
english: She looked out of the window, sighing for her lost youth.

hanzi: 她开始与罗杰外出约会, 就把我撇开了.
pinyin: tā kāi shǐ yù luó jié wài chū yuē huì,  jiù bǎ wǒ piě kāi le.
english: She gave me the elbow when she started going out with Roger.

hanzi: 她非常文雅，吃蛋糕一定用小叉子。
pinyin: tā fēi cháng wén yǎ， jí dàn gāo yī dìng yòng xiǎo chā zi。
english: She's so refined that she always eats cake with a little fork.

hanzi: 爸爸尽一切可能来满足我的需求和欲望。
pinyin: bà ba jìn yī qiè kě néng lái mǎn zú wǒ de xū qiú huò yù wàng。
english: Daddy did all he could to fill my needs and desires.

hanzi: 当地超级市场本周烘豆罐头大减价。
pinyin: dāng dì chāo jí shì chǎng běn zhōu hōng dòu guàn tou dà jiǎn jià。
english: Baked bean is on offer this week at the local supermarket.

hanzi: 拥挤的车辆慢吞吞地穿过狭窄的隧道。
pinyin: yōng jǐ de chē liàng màn tūn tūn de chuān guò xiá zhǎi de suì dào。
english: The heavy traffic crawled through the narrow tunnel.

hanzi: 在再装烟丝之前，他磕出了烟斗里的烟灰。
pinyin: zài zài zhuāng yān sī zhī qián， tā kē chū le yān dòu lǐ de yān huī。
english: He knocked his pipe out before refilling it.

hanzi: 我得找些零碎东西捐给教堂作义卖.
pinyin: wǒ de zhǎo xiē líng suì dōng xi juān jǐ jiào táng zuò yì mài.
english: I must look out some bits and pieces for the church jumble sale.

hanzi: 那女孩玫瑰色的脸颊使她显得非常可爱。
pinyin: nà nu:3 hái méi guī shǎi de liǎn jiá shǐ tā xiǎn de fēi cháng kě ài。
english: The girl's rosy cheeks made her look very lovely.

hanzi: 他对死刑存废的见解许多人都不以为然.
pinyin: tā duì sǐ xíng cún fèi de jiàn jiě xǔ duō rén dōu bù yǐ wéi rán.
english: His views on capital punishment are unpalatable to many.

hanzi: 她一见路上有个小孩, 便猛踩刹车.
pinyin: tā yī xiàn lù shang yǒu gè xiǎo hái,  pián měng cǎi shā chē.
english: As soon as she saw the child in the road, she jammed on her brakes.

hanzi: 汽车刹车失灵撞在墙上了.
pinyin: qì chē shā chē shī líng zhuàng zài qiáng shàng le.
english: The brakes failed to grip (ie engage with and stop the wheels) and the car ran into a wall.

hanzi: 请勿在生气的时候去办如此重要的事情。
pinyin: qǐng wù zài shēng qì de shí hou qù bàn rú cǐ zhòng yào de shì qing。
english: Do not go to such an important business in a temper.

hanzi: 台湾是座美丽的岛屿，这是不可否认的。
pinyin: Tái wān shì zuò měi lì de dǎo yǔ， zhè shì bù kě fǒu rèn de。
english: There is no denying that Taiwan is a beautiful island.

hanzi: 成名的弊端之一是失去了私人活动自由。
pinyin: chéng míng de bì duān zhī yī shì shī qù le sī rén huó dòng zì yóu。
english: One of the penalties of fame is loss of privacy.

hanzi: 山姆对他的妻子很猜忌，因为她很漂亮。
pinyin: shān mǔ duì tā de qī zi hěn cāi jì， yīn wèi tā hěn piào liang。
english: Sam is very jealous of his wife, as she is very pretty.

hanzi: 他们隔著笼子的栏杆用尖东西捅那动物.
pinyin: tā men gé著 lóng zi de lán gān yòng jiān dōng xi tǒng nà dòng wù.
english: They prodded (at) the animal through the bars of its cage.

hanzi: 他讲得滔滔不绝，别人都无法插嘴。
pinyin: tā jiǎng de tāo tāo bù jué， bié rén dōu wú fǎ chā zuǐ。
english: He talk so much that no one else can get a word in edgeways.

hanzi: 会前磋商谈判之前进行的会谈或讨论
pinyin: kuài qián cuō shāng tán pàn zhī qián jìn xíng de huì tán huò tǎo lùn
english: Conversation or discussion preliminary to negotiation.

hanzi: 他把一辈子的积蓄保藏在一口旧箱子里.
pinyin: tā bǎ yī bèi zi de jī xù bǎo cáng zài yī kǒu jiù xiāng zǐ lǐ.
english: He's got his life savings stashed (away) in an old suitcase.

hanzi: 这一策略旨在逐步削弱敌人的抵抗力.
pinyin: zhè yī cè lu:è zhǐ zài zhú bù xuē ruò dí rén de dǐ kàng lì.
english: The strategy was designed to wear down the enemy's resistance.

hanzi: 线条和色彩在肖像绘画中都很重要.
pinyin: xiàn tiáo huò sè cǎi zài xiào xiàng huì huà zhòng dōu hěn zhòng yào.
english: Line and colour are both important in portrait painting.

hanzi: 该项目极佳, 但地方舆论却表示反对.
pinyin: gāi xiàng mù jí jiā,  dàn dì fang yú lùn què biǎo shì fǎn duì.
english: The project seems excellent, but local opinion is against it.

hanzi: 我们队在这次比赛的预赛中遭淘汰。
pinyin: wǒ men duì zài zhè cì bǐ sài de yù sài zhòng zāo táo tài。
english: Our team got beaten in the preliminary rounds of the competition.

hanzi: 大多数的失踪案都是恐怖分子造成的.
pinyin: dà duō shù de shī zōng àn dōu shì kǒng bù fèn zǐ zào chéng de.
english: Most disappearances are the result of the terrorist activity.

hanzi: 那场战争中很多士兵死于那片沼泽地。
pinyin: nà chǎng zhàn zhēng zhòng hěn duō shì bīng sǐ yú nà piàn zhǎo zé dì。
english: In that war, many soldiers died in that fen area.

hanzi: 他讲了许多冒险故事, 我们听得津津有味.
pinyin: tā jiǎng le xǔ duō mào xiǎn gù shì,  wǒ men tìng de jīn jīn yǒu wèi.
english: He beguiled us with many a tale ofadventure.

hanzi: 奖学金包括八十美元的书籍费津贴。
pinyin: jiǎng xué jīn bāo kuò bā shí měi yuán de shū jí fèi jīn tiē。
english: The scholarship includes an allowance of 80 dollars for books.

hanzi: 他们提高生产力的措施卓有成效。
pinyin: tā men tí gāo shēng chǎn lì de cuò shī zhuó yǒu chéng xiào。
english: Their efforts to improve the production have been very effective.

hanzi: 这一地区的入室盗窃案件似有增无已.
pinyin: zhè yī dì qū de rù shì dào qiè àn jiàn sì yǒu zēng wú yǐ.
english: The number of burglaries in the area seems to be on the increase.

hanzi: 苏丹是某些穆斯林国家的最高统治者。
pinyin: sū dān shì mǒu xiē mù sī lín guó jiā de zuì gāo tǒng zhì zhē。
english: Sultan is sovereign ruler of certain Muslim countries.

hanzi: 自古以来该部落就把死者埋葬在这里。
pinyin: zì gǔ yǐ lái gāi bù luò jiù bǎ sǐ zhě mái zàng zài zhè lǐ。
english: From time immemorial the tribe have buried their dead here.

hanzi: 一有贬值的消息，股票价格就暴跌了。
pinyin: yī yǒu biǎn zhí de xiāo xi， gǔ piào jià gé jiù bào dié le。
english: Share price plummet or plunge on the news of the devaluation.

hanzi: 那个印度勇士用剑刺穿了对手的身体。
pinyin: nèi gè Yìn dù yǒng shì yòng jiàn cì chuān le duì shǒu de shēn tǐ。
english: The Indian warrior passed a sword through his opponent.

hanzi: 蒂姆成了传播媒介的焦点, 却也满不在乎.
pinyin: dì mǔ chéng le chuán bō méi jiè de jiāo diǎn,  què yě mǎn bù zài hū.
english: Tim appeared unabashed by all the media attention.

hanzi: 这些花是用来对您的恩惠略表谢意的.
pinyin: zhè xie huā shì yòng lái duì nín de ēn huì lu:è biǎo xiè yì de.
english: These flowers are a small acknowledgement of your great kindness.

hanzi: 据报道一项改组计划正在拟定之中。
pinyin: jù bào dào yí xiàng gǎi zǔ jì huà zhèng zài nǐ dìng zhī zhōng。
english: A plan of reorganization is reported to be now in the works.

hanzi: 这些衣服还是湿的，把他们在太阳下晾干。
pinyin: zhè xie yī fu hái shì shī de， bǎ tā men zài tài yáng xià liàng gàn。
english: The clothes are still moist. Dry them in the sun.

hanzi: 他偷偷塞给侍者一镑，以求得到好的桌位。
pinyin: tā tōu tōu sè jǐ shì zhě yī bàng， yǐ qiú dé dào hǎo de zhuō wèi。
english: He slipped the waiter￡1 to get a good table.

hanzi: 如果让他谈谈艺术，他就茫然不知了。
pinyin: rú guǒ ràng tā tán tán yì shù， tā jiù máng rán bù zhī le。
english: If you get him talking on art, he soon gets out of his depth.

hanzi: 工作大部分是她做的, 可是荣誉都归他了.
pinyin: gōng zuò dà bù fen shì tā zuò de,  kě shì róng yù dōu guī tā le.
english: She did most of the work but all the kudos went to him.

hanzi: 贼车被撞坏得很厉害，容易辩认出来。
pinyin: zéi jū bèi zhuàng huài de hěn lì hai， róng yì biàn rèn chū lai。
english: The thieves' car was badly damaged and easy to recognize.

hanzi: 他兴办那项慈善事业以纪念他已故的妻子。
pinyin: tā xīng bàn nà xiàng cí shàn shì yè yǐ jì niàn tā yǐ gù de qī zi。
english: He found the charity in memory of his late wife.

hanzi: 在混凝土凝固以前, 一定要把柱子竖直了.
pinyin: zài hùn níng tǔ níng gù yǐ qián,  yī dìng yào bǎ zhù zi shù zhí le.
english: Make sure the post is true before the concrete sets.

hanzi: 千百万人响应救灾呼吁而慷慨解囊.
pinyin: qiān bǎi wàn rén xiǎng yìng jiù zāi hū yù ér kāng kǎi xiè náng.
english: Millions of people gave freely in response to the famine appeal.

hanzi: 解毒剂一种药物复合剂，以前用于解毒
pinyin: xiè dú jì yī zhòng yào wù fù hé jì， yǐ qián yòng yú xiè dú
english: A medicinal compound formerly used as an antidote for poison.

hanzi: 我对他那种自私的行为愈加恼火起来。
pinyin: wǒ duì tā nà zhòng zì sī de xíng wéi yù jiā nǎo huǒ qǐ lai。
english: I am becoming more and more irritate by his selfish behaviour.

hanzi: 飞机的航线互相交错铸成人命惨祸.
pinyin: fēi jī de háng xiàn hù xiāng jiāo cuò zhù chéng rén mìng cǎn huò.
english: The flight paths of the aeroplanes crossed, with fatal results.

hanzi: 耳穗谷类植物上带有种子的穗，如玉米等
pinyin: ěr suì gǔ lèi zhí wù shàng dài yǒu zhǒng zi de suì， rú yù mǐ děng
english: The seed-bearing spike of a cereal plant, such as corn.

hanzi: 现今人们越来越依赖计算机协助工作.
pinyin: xiàn jīn rén men yuè lái yuè yī lài jì suàn jī xié zhù gōng zuò.
english: Nowadays we rely increasingly on computers for help/to help us.

hanzi: 本年度的盈利将与上一年度的亏损相抵.
pinyin: běn nián dù de yíng lì jiàng yù shàng yī nián dù de kuī sǔn xiàng dǐ.
english: This year's profits will balance our previous losses.

hanzi: 公司雇佣了一名侦探来调查这次事故。
pinyin: gōng sī gù yōng le yī míng zhēn tàn lái diào chá zhè cì shì gù。
english: The company hired a detective to investigate the accident.

hanzi: 这不是原作，它只不过是廉价的复制品。
pinyin: zhè bú shì yuán zuò， tā zhǐ bù guò shì lián jià de fù zhì pǐn。
english: This is not the original; it's only a cheap reproduction.

hanzi: 孩子听了客人说的幽默话, 都斯文地笑了.
pinyin: hái zi tìng le kè ren shuō de yōu mò huà,  dōu sī wén de xiào le.
english: The children smiled politely at the visitor's pleasantries.

hanzi: 这地方虽然简陋，却是我们的会议厅。
pinyin: zhè dì fang suī rán jiǎn lòu， què shì wǒ men de huì yì tīng。
english: Crude and simple, this place had to serve as the meeting hall.

hanzi: 篱笆附近有一丛玫瑰，长得非常美丽。
pinyin: lí bā fù jìn yǒu yī cóng méi guī， zhǎng de fēi cháng měi lì。
english: There is a rosebush near the fence and it is very beautiful.

hanzi: 她蹦蹦跳跳地来到我们面前说她要走了.
pinyin: tā bèng bèng tiào tiào de lái dào wǒ men miàn qián shuō tā yào zǒu le.
english: She waltzed up to us and announced that she was leaving.

hanzi: 公司雇佣了一名侦探来调查这次事故。
pinyin: gōng sī gù yōng le yī míng zhēn tàn lái diào chá zhè cì shì gù。
english: The company hired a detective to investigate the accident.

hanzi: 一系列的幸运事使她的事业一帆风顺。
pinyin: yī xì liè de xìng yùn shì shǐ tā de shì yè yī fān fēng shùn。
english: A series of fortuitous circumstances advanced her career.

hanzi: 贝多芬被认为是不朽的古典音乐大师.
pinyin: bèi duō fēn bèi rèn wéi shì bù xiǔ de gǔ diǎn yīn yuè dà shī.
english: Beethoven is regarded as one of the immortals of classical music.

hanzi: 船颠簸加剧，他知道海浪猛烈起来了。
pinyin: chuán diān bǒ jiā jù， tā zhī dào hǎi làng měng liè qǐ lai le。
english: The added motion of the ship told him the sea was getting up.

hanzi: 别看这辆汽车小, 里面还比较宽敞.
pinyin: biè kàn zhè liàng qì chē xiǎo,  lǐ miàn huán bǐ jiào kuān chang.
english: Considering the smallness of the car, it is relatively roomy inside.

hanzi: 妇女被排斥于寺院之外使得她们很难过。
pinyin: fù nu:3 bèi pái chì yú sì yuàn zhī wài shǐ de tā men hěn nán guò。
english: The exclusion of women from the temple made them feel sad.

hanzi: 警方掘出尸体, 发现有中毒的痕迹.
pinyin: jǐng fāng jué chū shī tǐ,  fā xiàn yǒu zhòng dú de hén jī.
english: When the police exhumed the corpse they discovered traces of poison in it.

hanzi: 肯定是什么人物，因他棺材上有国旗。
pinyin: kěn dìng shì shén me rén wù， yīn tā guān cái shàng yǒu guó qí。
english: He must be somebody, for a flag was draped over the coffin.

hanzi: 把酒搁在架子上放一个星期好让它澄清。
pinyin: bǎ jiǔ gē zài jià zi shàng fàng yī gè xīng qī hào ràng tā dèng qīng。
english: Leave the wine on a shelf for a week to settle it.

hanzi: 防盗警报器一响，警卫就放出了警犬。
pinyin: fáng dào jǐng bào qì yī xiǎng， jǐng wèi jiù fàng chū le jǐng quǎn。
english: The guard loosed the dogs when the burglar alarm went off.

hanzi: 她几个星期也琢磨不透他那封奇怪的来信.
pinyin: tā jǐ ge xīng qī yě zhuó mó bù tòu tā nà fēng qí guài de lái xìn.
english: She's been puzzling over his strange letter for weeks.

hanzi: 对这些荒谬的指控我们是不甘受辱的.
pinyin: duì zhè xie huāng miù de zhǐ kòng wǒ men shì bù gān shòu rǔ de.
english: We have no intention of lying down under these absurd allegations.

hanzi: 他父母雇佣了一位家庭教师来教他希腊语。
pinyin: tā fù mǔ gù yōng le yī wèi jiā tíng jiào shī lái jiào tā xī là yǔ。
english: His parents employed a tutor to teach him Greek.

hanzi: 骡子是公驴和母马交配而生的杂种动物.
pinyin: luó zi shì gōng lu:2 huò mǔ mǎ jiāo pèi ér shēng de zá zhòng dòng wù.
english: A mule is a hybrid of a male donkey and a female horse.

hanzi: 他的勇气在艰难困苦中经受了严峻的考验。
pinyin: tā de yǒng qì zài jiān nán kùn kǔ zhòng jīng shòu le yán jùn de kǎo yàn。
english: His courage was severely tried by his ordeal.

hanzi: 令我惊奇的是, 我侄子穿着女孩的裙子。
pinyin: lìng wǒ jīng qí de shì,  wǒ zhí zi chuān zhuó nu:3 hái de qún zi。
english: To my surprise, I found my nephew dressed in a girl's skirt.

hanzi: 现今人们越来越依赖计算机协助工作.
pinyin: xiàn jīn rén men yuè lái yuè yī lài jì suàn jī xié zhù gōng zuò.
english: Nowadays we rely increasingly on computers for help/to help us.

hanzi: 墨索里尼一伙使意大利倒退了好多年。
pinyin: mò suǒ lǐ ní yī huǒ shǐ yì dà lì dào tuì le hǎo duō nián。
english: Mussolini and his group set back the progress of Italy many years.

hanzi: 凌晨三点钟就打电话来, 太不像话了.
pinyin: líng chén sān diǎn zhōng jiù dǎ diàn huà lái,  tài bù xiàng huà le.
english: It's a bit much ringing me up at three o'clock in the morning.

hanzi: 修建这堵高墙作为屏障以防外人闯入.
pinyin: xiū jiàn zhè dǔ gāo qiáng zuò wéi píng zhàng yǐ fáng wài rén chuǎng rù.
english: The high wall was built as a defence against intruders.

hanzi: 我们不得不冒著可能遇上敌人巡逻兵的危险.
pinyin: wǒ men bù dé bù mào著 kě néng yù shàng dí rén xún luó bīng de wēi xiǎn.
english: We'll have to chance meeting an enemy patrol.

hanzi: 文件已经被输入到一台便携式电脑里了。
pinyin: wén jiàn yǐ jīng bèi shū rù dào yī tái pián xié shì diàn nǎo lǐ le。
english: The documents have been typed into a portable computer.

hanzi: 要她去牙科医生那里看病非得生拉硬拽不可.
pinyin: yào tā qù yá kē yī shēng nà li kàn bìng fēi de shēng lā yìng zhuài bù kě.
english: She had to be dragged into seeing the dentist.

hanzi: 警方已排除该谋杀案中有抢劫的动机.
pinyin: jǐng fāng yǐ pái chú gāi móu shā àn zhòng yǒu qiāng jié de dòng jī.
english: The police have excluded robbery as a motive for the murder.

hanzi: 没渗出来了，因为没箱上有一个小洞。
pinyin: mò shèn chū lai le， yīn wèi mò xiāng shàng yǒu yī gè xiǎo dòng。
english: The oil leaked away because there was a small hole on the tank.

hanzi: 说话要当心，咱们的话可能被窃听了。
pinyin: shuō huà yào dāng xīn， zán men de huà kě néng bèi qiè tīng le。
english: Be careful what you say; our conversation may be being bugged.

hanzi: 我遥望天空，只见风筝越来越小。
pinyin: wǒ yáo wàng tiān kōng， zhǐ xiàn fēng zhēng yuè lái yuè xiǎo。
english: I looked up into the sky and saw the kite become smaller and smaller.

hanzi: 她没有端著架子把我们当作仆人对待.
pinyin: tā méi yǒu duān著 jià zi bǎ wǒ men dàng zuò pú rén duì dài.
english: She doesn't stand on her dignity and treat the rest of us as servants.

hanzi: 他从一个害羞的人转变为出色的政治家。
pinyin: tā zòng yī gè hài xiū de rén zhuǎn biàn wèi chū sè de zhèng zhì jiā。
english: He changed from a shy person into quite a politician.

hanzi: 这个房间是用红色和棕色装饰的暖色调。
pinyin: zhè gè fáng jiān shì yòng hóng sè huò zōng sè zhuāng shì de nuǎn sè diào。
english: The room was furnished in warm reds and browns.

hanzi: 我板球曾打得很好，可惜现在已生疏了。
pinyin: wǒ bǎn qiú zēng dǎ de hěn hào， kě xī xiàn zài yǐ shēng shū le。
english: I used to be good at cricket, but now I'm out of practice.

hanzi: 放假的消息几分钟内全校就人人皆知了.
pinyin: fàng jià de xiāo xi jǐ fēn zhōng nèi quán xiào jiù rén rén jiē zhī le.
english: News of the holiday was all over the school within minutes.

hanzi: 就是最佳质量的橡胶也会因老化而腐烂。
pinyin: jiù shì zuì jiā zhì liàng de xiàng jiāo yě kuài yīn lǎo huà ér fǔ làn。
english: Even the best quality rubber will perish with age.

hanzi: 他接受了尼采的思想，堕落成法西斯分子。
pinyin: tā jiē shòu le Ní cǎi de sī xiǎng， duò luò chéng fǎ xī sī fèn zǐ。
english: He ate up Nietzsche and degenerated into a fascist.

hanzi: 那篇采访报道完全是对一诚实人的诽谤.
pinyin: nà piān cǎi fǎng bào dào wán quán shì duì yī chéng shí rén de fěi bàng.
english: That interview was an absolute libel on a honest man.

hanzi: 公共汽车往路边靠让小轿车超过去。
pinyin: gōng gòng qì chē wàng lù biān kào ràng xiǎo jiào chē chāo guò qù。
english: The bus pulled into the side of the road to let the cars pass.

hanzi: 董事长用两小时阐述了公司的规划.
pinyin: dǒng shì zhǎng yòng liǎng xiǎo shí chǎn shù le gōng sī de guī huà.
english: The chairman expatiated for two hours on his plans for the company.

hanzi: 芭芭内鸭系由野鸭与普通鸭杂交而成。
pinyin: bā bā nèi yā xì yóu yě yā yù pǔ tōng yā zá jiāo ér chéng。
english: A barbary duck is a cross between a wild duck and an ordinary duck.

hanzi: 让我们来检查一下浆果，把梗和叶子拣掉。
pinyin: ràng wǒ men lái jiǎn chá yī xià jiāng guǒ， bǎ gěng huò yè zi jiǎn diào。
english: Let's pick the berries over for stems and leaves.

hanzi: 银行对这样的大笔贷款一定要有抵押物。
pinyin: yín háng duì zhè yàng de dà bǐ dài kuǎn yī dìng yào yǒu dǐ yá wù。
english: The bank will insist on collateral for a loan of that size.

hanzi: 她很会变魔术, 能从帽子里变出兔子来.
pinyin: tā hěn huì biàn mó shù,  néng zòng mào zi lǐ biàn chū tù zi lái.
english: She's very good at magic; she can conjure a rabbit out of a hat.

hanzi: 所有这些运动都受到军阀政府的镇压。
pinyin: suǒ yǒu zhè xie yùn dòng dōu shòu dào jūn fá zhèng fǔ de zhèn yā。
english: All these movements were suppressed by the warlord government.

hanzi: 他们之间存在的分歧应通过协商解决。
pinyin: tā men zhī jiān cún zài de fēn qí yìng tōng guò xié shāng jiě jué。
english: The difficulty among them should be resolved by consultation.

hanzi: 领队告诫我们在大赛之前不要太激动.
pinyin: lǐng duì gào jiè wǒ men zài dà sài zhī qián bù yào tài jī dòng.
english: The manager warned us not to get too keyed up before the big match.

hanzi: 在聚会上, 你最好同你的对手和睦相处。
pinyin: zài jù huì shàng,  nǐ zuì hǎo tóng nǐ de duì shǒu hé mù xiāng chǔ。
english: It is better to be at peace with your rivals at the party.

hanzi: 所以他们在执政的最后一年就彻底崩溃了。
pinyin: suǒ yǐ tā men zài zhí zhèng de zuì hòu yī nián jiù chè dǐ bēng kuì le。
english: And they go to pieces completely in the last year.

hanzi: 仓库中的失窃使利润损失了百分之二.
pinyin: cāng kù zhòng dì shī qiè shǐ lì rùn sǔn shī le bǎi fēn zhī èr.
english: Pilferage in the warehouse reduces profitability by about two per cent.

hanzi: 你那只狗竟然把我的水仙花全给扒出来了。
pinyin: nǐ nà zhǐ gǒu jìng rán bǎ wǒ de shuǐ xiān huā quán jǐ pá chū lai le。
english: That dog of yours has been and dug up all my daffodils!

hanzi: 这家农舍由于周围的大榆树而增光不少。
pinyin: zhè jiā nóng shè yóu yú zhōu wéi de dà yú shù ér zēng guāng bù shǎo。
english: The farmhouse is dignified by the great elm around it.

hanzi: 甘蔗渣在汁液被榨完以后剩下的甘蔗废料
pinyin: gān zhè zhā zài zhī yè bèi zhà wán yǐ hòu shèng xià de gān zhè fèi liào
english: The refuse of sugar cane after extraction of the juice.

hanzi: 白兰地和水的混合物，要糟蹋两样好东西。
pinyin: bái lán de huò shuǐ de hùn hé wù， yào zāo tà liǎng yàng hào dōng xi。
english: A mixture of brandy and water spoil two good thing.

hanzi: 但是他的阶级本能使他把历史弄颠倒了。
pinyin: dàn shì tā de jiē jí běn néng shǐ tā bǎ lì shǐ nòng diān dǎo le。
english: But his class instinct led him to turn history upside down.

hanzi: 多年的劳累和疏于保养损害了他们的健康。
pinyin: duō nián de láo lèi huò shū yú bǎo yǎng sǔn hài le tā men de jiàn kāng。
english: Years of hardship and neglect had taken their toll.

hanzi: 我们应该考虑父母的建议, 反之亦然。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi kǎo lu:4 fù mǔ de jiàn yì,  fǎn zhī yì rán。
english: We should take into account the proposals of our parents and vice versa.

hanzi: 这位封臣宣誓他将永远忠诚于国王。
pinyin: zhè wèi fēng chén xuān shì tā jiàng yǒng yuǎn zhōng chéng yú guó wáng。
english: The vassal swore that he would be loyal to the king forever.

hanzi: 那个孩子不调皮捣蛋简直就受不了.
pinyin: nèi gè hái zi bù tiáo pí dǎo dàn jiǎn zhí jiù shòu bù liǎo.
english: That child seems incapable of keeping out of (ie not getting into) mischief.

hanzi: 普鲁士士兵在锯木厂后边草地上操练。
pinyin: pǔ lǔ shì shì bīng zài jù mù chǎng hòu biān cǎo dì shàng cāo liàn。
english: The Prussians are drilling in the meadow behind the sawmill.

hanzi: 他接受了尼采的思想，堕落成法西斯分子。
pinyin: tā jiē shòu le Ní cǎi de sī xiǎng， duò luò chéng fǎ xī sī fèn zǐ。
english: He ate up Nietzsche and degenerated into a fascist.

hanzi: 稻子经过收割，筛清和去壳以后才出售。
pinyin: dào zi jīng guò shōu gē， shāi qīng huò qù qiào yǐ hòu cái chū shòu。
english: Rice is gathered, cleaned and hulled before being sold.

hanzi: 一个新来的人就比他强, 他觉得很窝囊.
pinyin: yī gè xīn lái de rén jiù bì tā qiáng,  tā jué de hěn wō nang.
english: Being beaten by a newcomer has really taken the wind out of his sails.

hanzi: 我们的办事处的大楼高高耸立在城市上空。
pinyin: wǒ men de bàn shì chù de dà lóu gāo gāo sǒng lì zài chéng shì shàng kōng。
english: High above the city, stood the build of our office.

hanzi: 联合王国由大不列颠和北爱尔兰组成。
pinyin: lián hé wáng guó yóu dà bù liè diān huò běi ài ěr lán zǔ chéng。
english: The United Kingdom consists of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.

hanzi: 中国孩子会在春节前买很多鞭炮。
pinyin: Zhōng guó hái zi kuài zài chūn jié qián mǎi hěn duō biān pào。
english: Chinese children like to buy many firecrackers before the Spring Festival.

hanzi: 侦探根据所掌握的线索推断出作案的人。
pinyin: zhēn tàn gēn jù suǒ zhǎng wò de xiàn suǒ tuī duàn chū zuò àn de rén。
english: Detective deduce from the clue who have commit the crime.

hanzi: 他从衣兜里拿出一些钱递给出租车司机。
pinyin: tā zòng yì dōu lǐ ná chū yī xiē qián dì jǐ chū zū chē sī jī。
english: He took some money from his pocket and gave it to the taxi driver.

hanzi: 没有人怀疑他在金融事务中的卓越成就。
pinyin: méi yǒu rén huái yí tā zài jīn róng shì wù zhòng dì zhuó yuè chéng jiù。
english: No one doubted his preeminence in financial matters.

hanzi: 窃贼把夜班守卫员捆住, 把他的嘴也堵住了.
pinyin: qiè zéi bǎ yè bān shǒu wèi yuán kǔn zhù,  bǎ tā de zuǐ yě dǔ zhù le.
english: The thieves left the night-watchman tied up and gagged.

hanzi: 政府拟采取措施严禁在足球比赛中闹事。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ nǐ cǎi qǔ cuò shī yán jìn zài zú qiú bǐ sài zhòng nào shì。
english: The Government intends to clamp down on soccer hooliganism.

hanzi: 许多著名的人物都曾在挫折中奋争拼搏过。
pinyin: xǔ duō著 míng de rén wù dōu zēng zài cuò zhé zhòng fèn zhēng pīn bó guò。
english: Many famous men have ever struggled in setbacks.

hanzi: 有个富有的赞助人慷慨捐赠来解救我们.
pinyin: yǒu gè fù yǒu de zàn zhù rén kāng kǎi juān zèng lái jiě jiù wǒ men.
english: A wealthy sponsor came to our rescue with a generous donation.

hanzi: 有个富有的赞助人慷慨捐赠来解救我们.
pinyin: yǒu gè fù yǒu de zàn zhù rén kāng kǎi juān zèng lái jiě jiù wǒ men.
english: A wealthy sponsor came to our rescue with a generous donation.

hanzi: 汉堡包连锁店声明他们只用上等牛肉。
pinyin: hàn bǎo bāo lián suǒ diàn shēng míng tā men zhǐ yòng shàng děng niú ròu。
english: The hamburger chain say it only use premium quality beef.

hanzi: 老保姆为这个家庭忠实地服务了三十年.
pinyin: lǎo bǎo mǔ wèi zhè gè jiā tíng zhōng shí de fú wù le sān shí nián.
english: The old nurse had served the family faithfully for thirty years.

hanzi: 大家正在进行一场减低城市噪音的运动.
pinyin: dà jiā zhèng zài jìn xíng yī chǎng jiǎn dī chéng shì zào yīn de yùn dòng.
english: People are campaigning to abate the noise in our cities.

hanzi: 风笛的调旋律管其上能弹奏曲调的风笛管
pinyin: fēng dí de tiáo xuán lu:4 guǎn qí shàng néng tán zòu qǔ tiáo de fēng dí guǎn
english: The pipe of a bagpipe on which the melody is played.

hanzi: 自私的野餐者乱扔包装纸使海滩杂乱不堪
pinyin: zì sī de yě cān zhě luàn rēng bāo zhuāng zhǐ shǐ hǎi tān zá luàn bù kān
english: Selfish picnickers litter the beach with food wrappers.

hanzi: 他已上诉请求将死刑减为无期徒刑.
pinyin: tā yǐ shàng sù qǐng qiú jiàng sǐ xíng jiǎn wèi wú qī tú xíng.
english: He appealed for (a) commutation of the death sentence to life imprisonment.

hanzi: 辐射泄露的消息引起了公众的普遍恐慌。
pinyin: fú shè xiè lòu de xiāo xi yǐn qǐ le gōng zhòng de pǔ biàn kǒng huāng。
english: The news of the radiation leak caused widespread public alarm.

hanzi: 辐射泄露的消息引起了公众的普遍恐慌。
pinyin: fú shè xiè lòu de xiāo xi yǐn qǐ le gōng zhòng de pǔ biàn kǒng huāng。
english: The news of the radiation leak caused widespread public alarm.

hanzi: 炊事员把罐头食品分给所有登山队员。
pinyin: chuī shì yuán bǎ guàn tou shí pǐn fēn gěi suǒ yǒu dēng shān duì yuán。
english: The cook served out tins of food to all the mountaineers.

hanzi: 她踌躇着，不知该怎样宣布这一坏消息。
pinyin: tā chóu chú zhuó， bù zhī gāi zěn yàng xuān bù zhè yī huài xiāo xi。
english: She hold back, not knowing how to break the terrible news.

hanzi: 他由于无可奉告，拒绝了记者采访。
pinyin: tā yóu yú wú kě fèng gào， jù jué le jì zhě cǎi fǎng。
english: As he had nothing to tell, he refused to give any interviews to the journalists.

hanzi: 很多富户都因那次金融危机而家道中落。
pinyin: hěn duō fù hù dōu yīn nà cì jīn róng wēi jī ér jiā dào zhòng luò。
english: Many rich families are brought low by the financial crisis.

hanzi: 他在聚会上竭力表现自己使她感到很难堪.
pinyin: tā zài jù huì shàng jié lì biǎo xiàn zì jǐ shǐ tā gǎn dào hěn nán kān.
english: She was embarrassed by his exhibitionism at the party.

hanzi: 这个人一想起死后的永久惩罚就颤抖不已。
pinyin: zhè gè rén yī xiǎng qǐ sǐ hòu de yǒng jiǔ chéng fá jiù chàn dǒu bù yǐ。
english: The man trembled whenever he thought of the perdition.

hanzi: 胜利的，凯旋的关于胜利的或有胜利的性质的
pinyin: shèng lì de， kǎi xuán de guān yú shèng lì de huò yǒu shèng lì de xìng zhì de
english: Relating to or having the nature of a triumph.

hanzi: 他们用积蓄的钱合资在乡间买了一所房子.
pinyin: tā men yòng jī xù de qián hé zī zài xiāng jiàn mǎi le yī suǒ fáng zi.
english: They pooled their savings and bought a house in the country.

hanzi: 我们在整个冬季战役中始终不如对手.
pinyin: wǒ men zài zhěng gè dōng jì zhàn yì zhòng shǐ zhōng bù rú duì shǒu.
english: We were outmanoeuvred and outfought throughout the winter campaign.

hanzi: 只要有几个爱捣乱的学生, 就能把全班搅乱.
pinyin: zhǐ yào yǒu jǐ ge ài dǎo luàn de xué sheng,  jiù néng bǎ quán bān jiǎo luàn.
english: A few disruptive students can easily ruin a class.

hanzi: 安葬是在大清早进行的，没有举行葬礼。
pinyin: ān zàng shì zài dà qīng zǎo jìn xíng de， méi yǒu jǔ xíng zàng lǐ。
english: The burial was done early in the morning without a ceremony.

hanzi: 狠心的女巫对孤苦无助的小女孩施发妖术。
pinyin: hěn xīn de nu:3 wū duì gū kǔ wú zhù de xiǎo nu:3 hái shī fà yāo zhú。
english: The heartless witch cast a spell on the poor little girl.

hanzi: 这个侦探试图查明都有谁参加了聚会。
pinyin: zhè gè zhēn tàn shì tú chá míng dōu yǒu shéi cān jiā le jù huì。
english: The detective was trying to ascertain exactly who was at the party.

hanzi: 董事会决定大规模生产这种汽车。
pinyin: dǒng shì huì jué dìng dà guī mó shēng chǎn zhè zhǒng qì chē。
english: The board of directors made the decision to produce the car on a large scale.

hanzi: 安葬是在大清早进行的，没有举行葬礼。
pinyin: ān zàng shì zài dà qīng zǎo jìn xíng de， méi yǒu jǔ xíng zàng lǐ。
english: The burial was done early in the morning without a ceremony.

hanzi: 他对模型飞机感兴趣之后就全力以赴了。
pinyin: tā duì mó xíng fēi jī gǎn xìng qu zhī hòu jiù quán lì yǐ fù le。
english: When he became interested in model airplanes he went the whole hog.

hanzi: 金融家告诉我们不要再用那种方法做业务。
pinyin: jīn róng jiā gào su wǒ men bù yào zài yòng nà zhòng fāng fǎ zuò yè wù。
english: The financier told us not to do business in that way.

hanzi: 士兵们用铁锹在丛林中开出一条道路。
pinyin: shì bīng men yòng tiě qiāo zài cóng lín zhòng kāi chū yī tiáo dào lù。
english: The soldiers cut a passage through the jungle with their spades.

hanzi: 哪个小淘气干的聪明事, 让水龙头开了一夜.
pinyin: nǎ ge xiǎo táo qì gàn de cōng míng shì,  ràng shuǐ lóng tóu kāi le yī yè.
english: Some bright spark has left the tap running all night.

hanzi: 弹钢琴的人把乐谱忘了, 只好即兴伴奏.
pinyin: tán gāng qín de rén bǎ yuè pǔ wàng le,  zhǐ hǎo jí xìng bàn zòu.
english: The pianist forgot his music and had to improvise (the accompaniment).

hanzi: 我认为失业是我们社会最为严重的弊病.
pinyin: wǒ rèn wéi shī yè shì wǒ men shè huì zuì wéi yán zhòng de bì bìng.
english: I would contend that unemployment is our most serious social evil.

hanzi: 永恒不变的个人恒心和经常顺从的挂念
pinyin: yǒng héng bù biàn de gè rén héng xīn huò jīng cháng shùn cóng de guà niàn
english: Constant personal attention and often obsequious solicitude.

hanzi: 一系列的挑衅事件导致了边境战争的发生。
pinyin: yī xì liè de tiǎo xìn shì jiàn dǎo zhì le biān jìng zhàn zhēng de fā shēng。
english: A series of provocations led up to the border war.

hanzi: 这个管弦乐队演奏的特色是声音优美柔和.
pinyin: zhè gè guǎn xián yuè duì yǎn zòu de tè sè shì shēng yīn yōu měi róu hé.
english: The orchestra had a distinctively warm and mellow sound.

hanzi: 我恳求她帮忙, 但她完全不理睬我的请求.
pinyin: wǒ kěn qiú tā bāng máng,  dàn tā wán quán bù lǐ cǎi wǒ de qǐng qiú.
english: I begged her for help but she shut her ears to all my appeals.

hanzi: 他惟恐婚姻破裂，把一切都告诉了妻子。
pinyin: tā wéi kǒng hūn yīn pò liè， bǎ yī qiè dōu gào su le qī zi。
english: Rather than risk breaking up his marriage he told his wife everything.

hanzi: 他们哄骗我，让我产生了一种虚假的安全感。
pinyin: tā men hòng piàn wǒ， ràng wǒ chǎn shēng le yī zhòng xū jiǎ de ān quán gǎn。
english: They lulled me into a false sense of security.

hanzi: 他对这个事件毫不知情，真让人感到诧异。
pinyin: tā duì zhè gè shì jiàn háo bú zhī qíng， zhēn ràng rén gǎn dào chà yì。
english: It was amazing that he knew nothing about the event.

hanzi: 反流，逆流向后流的水，如由浆的划动引起
pinyin: fǎn liú， nì liú xiàng hòu liú de shuǐ， rú yóu jiàng de huà dòng yǐn qǐ
english: A backward flow of water, as from the action of oars.

hanzi: 政府拟采取措施严禁在足球比赛中闹事。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ nǐ cǎi qǔ cuò shī yán jìn zài zú qiú bǐ sài zhòng nào shì。
english: The Government intends to clamp down on soccer hooliganism.

hanzi: 不应把人的因素看成是经济体制的附庸.
pinyin: bù yìng bǎ rén de yīn sù kàn chéng shì jīng jì tǐ zhì de fù yōng.
english: People should not be regarded as subservient to the economic system.

hanzi: 该处地势平坦又没有树木, 部队无处隐蔽.
pinyin: gāi chù dì shì píng tǎn yòu méi yǒu shù mù,  bù duì wú chù yǐn bì.
english: The land was flat and treeless and gave no cover to the troops.

hanzi: 他这个人太懒惰，真想在他屁股上踢一脚。
pinyin: tā zhè gè rén tài lǎn duò， zhēn xiǎng zài tā pì gu shàng tī yī jué。
english: He is so lazy; he could do with a good kick up the rear.

hanzi: 他的新房子是他自己一块砖一块砖砌起来的。
pinyin: tā de xīn fáng zi shì tā zì jǐ yī kuài zhuān yī kuài zhuān qì qǐ lai de。
english: His new house was built by himself, brick by brick.

hanzi: 在这一政治危机时期我是目睹一切的局外人。
pinyin: zài zhè yī zhèng zhì wēi jī shí qī wǒ shì mù dǔ yī qiè de jú wài rén。
english: I was on the sidelines during the political crisis.

hanzi: 大多数穆斯林妇女在公共场所都戴着面纱。
pinyin: dà duō shù mù sī lín fù nu:3 zài gōng gòng chǎng suǒ dōu dài zhuó miàn shā。
english: Most Moslem women wear veils in public places.

hanzi: 我一觉醒来，发现我所有的衣服不翼而飞。
pinyin: wǒ yī jué xǐng lái， fā xiàn wǒ suǒ yǒu de yī fu bù yì ér fēi。
english: I awoke from sleep to find that all my clothes had disappeared.

hanzi: 该处地势平坦又没有树木, 部队无处隐蔽.
pinyin: gāi chù dì shì píng tǎn yòu méi yǒu shù mù,  bù duì wú chù yǐn bì.
english: The land was flat and treeless and gave no cover to the troops.

hanzi: 原定砍伐的那棵树已经推迟六个月再砍.
pinyin: yuán dìng kǎn fá de nà kē shù yǐ jīng tuī chí liù gè yuè zài kǎn.
english: The tree that was due to be cut down has been reprieved for six months.

hanzi: 从松岭回来后，办公室似乎变得枯燥无味了。
pinyin: zòng sōng lǐng huí lai hòu， bàn gōng shì sì hu biàn de kū zào wú wèi le。
english: The office seems so dull and prosaic after Pine Ridge.

hanzi: 解放前，各种捐税沉重地压在人民身上。
pinyin: jiě fàng qián， gè zhǒng juān shuì chén zhòng de yà zài rén mín shēn shàng。
english: Before liberation, taxes weighed heavily upon the people.

hanzi: 母亲把她那顽皮捣蛋的儿子按在膝盖上揍他。
pinyin: mǔ qīn bǎ tā nà wán pí dǎo dàn de ér zi àn zài xī gài shàng zòu tā。
english: The mother set her naughty son over her knee and beat him.

hanzi: 事实上，最引不起我兴趣的莫过于烹调了。
pinyin: shì shí shàng， zuì yǐn bù qǐ wǒ xìng qu de mò guò yú pēng tiáo le。
english: Nothing interests me less than cooking, as a matter of fact.

hanzi: 如果这匹马不受牵制, 它就会跳过篱笆。
pinyin: rú guǒ zhè pǐ mǎ bù shòu qiān zhì,  tā jiù kuài tiào guò lí bā。
english: If the horse had not been held in, he would have cleared the fence.

hanzi: 在葬礼上发笑或开玩笑是失礼的行为。
pinyin: zài zàng lǐ shàng fà xiào huò kāi wán xiào shì shī lǐ de xíng wéi。
english: Laughing and joking are considered improper behaviors at a funeral.

hanzi: 雇主扣下你部分薪金作保险金用.
pinyin: gù zhǔ kòu xià nǐ bù fen xīn jīn zuò bǎo xiǎn jīn yòng.
english: A certain percentage of your salary is kept back by your employer as an insurance payment.

hanzi: 我们的船长下令调整风帆，顺风行驶。
pinyin: wǒ men de chuán zhǎng xià lìng tiáo zhěng fēng fán， shùn fēng xíng shǐ。
english: Our captain ordered us to square away and sail before the wind.

hanzi: 岁月和风雨早已磨掉纪念碑上的铭文。
pinyin: suì yuè hé fēng yǔ zǎo yǐ mò diào jì niàn bēi shàng de míng wén。
english: Time and weather had long ago effaced the inscription on the monument.

hanzi: 你总是随心所欲而不考虑我们的情感。
pinyin: nǐ zǒng shì suí xīn suǒ yù ér bù kǎo lu:4 wǒ men de qíng gǎn。
english: You always follow your own inclination instead of thinking of our feelings.

hanzi: 我可以用用你们的厕所吗--我实在憋不住了.
pinyin: wǒ kě yǐ yòng yòng nǐ men de cè suǒ ma-- wǒ shí zài biē bú zhù le.
english: May I use your lavatory I'm bursting! ie I need to urinate urgently.

hanzi: 那孩子因其母带他回家而生气地捶打著母亲.
pinyin: nà hái zi yīn qí mǔ dài tā huí jiā ér shēng qì de chuí dǎ著 mǔ qīn.
english: The child pummelled his mother angrily as she carried him home.

hanzi: 他很快使自己适应了这个国家炎热的天气。
pinyin: tā hěn kuài shǐ zì jǐ shì yìng le zhè gè guó jiā yán rè de tiān qì。
english: He adjusted himself very quickly to the heat of the country.

hanzi: 一个明智的候选人应该把传媒控制在手中。
pinyin: yī gè míng zhì de hòu xuǎn rén yīng gāi bǎ zhuàn méi kòng zhì zài shǒu zhòng。
english: A wise candidate should have the media in hand.

hanzi: 他对你说他没有结婚，他是在公然说谎。
pinyin: tā duì nǐ shuō tā méi yǒu jié hūn， tā shì zài gōng rán shuō huǎng。
english: He was lying in his throat when he told you he was not married.

hanzi: 他的行李刚一装上车，吉普车就开走了。
pinyin: tā de xíng li gāng yī zhuāng shàng chē， jí pǔ chē jiù kāi zǒu le。
english: No sooner had his luggage been loaded than the jeep started off.

hanzi: 你继续这样大量吸烟，就是在自掘坟墓。
pinyin: nǐ jì xù zhè yàng dà liàng xī yān， jiù shì zài zì jué fén mù。
english: You are just digging your own grave if you go on smoking so heavily.

hanzi: 去年，广州遭到六十年未遇的严重旱灾。
pinyin: qù nián， Guǎng zhōu zāo dào liù shí nián wèi yù de yán zhòng hàn zāi。
english: Last year Canton was visited by the worst drought in60 years.

hanzi: 他因为在战斗中的勇猛被授予一枚奖章。
pinyin: tā yīn wèi zài zhàn dòu zhòng dì yǒng měng bèi shòu yǔ yī méi jiǎng zhāng。
english: He was awarded a merit badge for his bravery in the battle.

hanzi: 榨取，提取榨取，提取的行为或被榨取的状态
pinyin: zhà qǔ， tí qǔ zhà qǔ， tí qǔ de xíng wéi huò bèi zhà qǔ de zhuàng tài
english: The act of extracting or the condition of being extracted.

hanzi: 水分子含有两个氢原子和一个氧原子.
pinyin: shuǐ fèn zi hán yǒu liǎng gè qīng yuán zǐ huò yī gè yǎng yuán zǐ.
english: A molecule of water consists of two atoms of hydrogen and one atom of oxygen.

hanzi: 大多数人都以他们最好的朋友的自卑感为乐。
pinyin: dà duō shù rén dōu yǐ tā men zuì hǎo de péng you de zì bēi gǎn wèi yuè。
english: Most people enjoy the inferiority of their best friend.

hanzi: 华丽的服装使他那极其英俊的外貌更为增色.
pinyin: huá lì de fú zhuāng shǐ tā nà jí qí yīng jùn de wài mào gèng wèi zēng shǎi.
english: Fine clothes added to his strikingly handsome appearance.

hanzi: 秋季来临时，玉米地里呈现出丰收的景象。
pinyin: qiū jì lái lín shí， yù mǐ de lǐ chéng xiàn chū fēng shōu de jǐng xiàng。
english: As autumn draws near, the cornfields show signs of ripeness.

hanzi: 顺着这条大路走，在路的分岔口向右拐。
pinyin: shùn zhuó zhè tiáo dà lù zǒu， zài lù de fèn chà kǒu xiàng yòu guǎi。
english: Follow the main road until it branches, and then turn to the right.

hanzi: 我希望的是长久恩爱, 而不是一夜露水之欢.
pinyin: wǒ xī wàng de shì cháng jiǔ ēn ài,  ér bú shì yī yè lù shui zhī huān.
english: I was hoping for a lasting affair, not just a one-night stand.

hanzi: 她在比赛的第一轮比赛中遭淘汰.
pinyin: tā zài bǐ sài de dì yī lún bǐ sài zhòng zāo táo tài.
english: She went out in the first round of the tournament/went out of the tournament in the first round.

hanzi: 这包应装有十个螺丝钉, 可是短了两个.
pinyin: zhè bāo yìng zhuāng yǒu shí gè luó sī dīng,  kě shì duǎn le liǎng gè.
english: This packet is supposed to contain ten screws, but it's two short.

hanzi: 讲课人继续解释说民法与刑法是不同的。
pinyin: jiǎng kè rén jì xù jiě shì shuō mín fǎ yù xíng fǎ shì bù tóng de。
english: The lecturer continued that civil law was different to criminal law.

hanzi: 这些弊病是由于缺乏一个稳定的政府而引起的。
pinyin: zhè xie bì bìng shì yóu yú quē fá yī gè wěn dìng de zhèng fǔ ér yǐn qǐ de。
english: The evils ensue from lack of a stable government.

hanzi: 火车一开, 一阵凉风吹来, 我们顿感凉爽.
pinyin: huǒ chē yī kāi,  yī zhèn liáng fēng chuī lái,  wǒ men dùn gǎn liáng shuǎng.
english: As the train began to move a pleasant draught cooled us all down.

hanzi: 他用图表和数字进一步阐明他新近的发现。
pinyin: tā yòng tú biǎo huò shù zì jìn yí bù chǎn míng tā xīn jìn de fā xiàn。
english: He amplified(on) his new findings with drawings and figures.

hanzi: 他把桨放入水中，搅乱了平静的湖面。
pinyin: tā bǎ jiǎng fàng rù shuǐ zhòng， jiǎo luàn le píng jìng de hú miàn。
english: He put his oars in the water and disturbed the smooth surface of the lake.

hanzi: 医生不得不用石膏绷带来固定他断了的胳膊。
pinyin: yī shēng bù dé bù yòng shí gāo bēng dài lái gù dìng tā duàn le de gē bo。
english: The doctor had to hold his broken arm with a plaster cast.

hanzi: 政府正在采取措施消除艾滋病的危害性。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ zhèng zài cǎi qǔ cuò shī xiāo chú ài zī bìng de wēi hài xìng。
english: The government is taking measures to draw the fangs of AIDS.

hanzi: 要使婚姻美满, 双方必须懂得互相迁就.
pinyin: yào shǐ hūn yīn měi mǎn,  shuāng fāng bì xū dǒng de hù xiāng qiān jiù.
english: For a marriage to succeed, both partners must learn to give and take.

hanzi: 铸造车间熔化金属并将之注入模子的地方
pinyin: zhù zào chē jiān róng huà jīn shǔ bìng jiàng zhī zhù rù mó zi de dì fang
english: An establishment in which metal is melted and poured into molds.

hanzi: 低频扬声器设计用来再现低音频率的扬声器
pinyin: dī pín yáng shēng qì shè jì yòng lái zài xiàn dī yīn pín lu:4 de yáng shēng qì
english: A loudspeaker designed to reproduce bass frequencies.

hanzi: 侦察员们分成两人一组，开始巡逻这一地区。
pinyin: zhēn chá yuán men fèn chéng liǎng rén yī zǔ， kāi shǐ xún luó zhè yī dì qū。
english: The scouts paired off and began to patrol the area.

hanzi: 律师论辨说这一裁决侵害了他的委托人。
pinyin: lu:4 shī lùn biàn shuō zhè yī cái jué qīn hài le tā de wěi tuō rén。
english: The attorney argue that the decision involve prejudice to his client.

hanzi: 依照常规大臣在这种情况下应该辞职.
pinyin: yī zhào cháng guī dà chén zài zhè zhǒng qíng kuàng xià yīng gāi cí zhí.
english: Convention dictates that a minister should resign in such a situation.

hanzi: 她的精心化妆掩饰了脂粉下面岁月刻下的痕迹。
pinyin: tā de jīng xīn huà zhuāng yǎn shì le zhī fěn xià mian suì yuè kè xià de hén jī。
english: Her careful make-up hid the signs of age beneath.

hanzi: 该艺术家把她那温柔的笑容表现得惟妙惟肖。
pinyin: gāi yì shù jiā bǎ tā nà wēn róu de xiào róng biǎo xiàn de wéi miào wéi xiào。
english: The artist had rendered her gentle smile perfectly.

hanzi: 法西斯专政的垮台引起左翼运动的高涨.
pinyin: fǎ xī sī zhuān zhèng de kuǎ tái yǐn qǐ zuǒ yì yùn dòng de gāo zhǎng.
english: The fall of the fascist dictatorship was followed by a left-wing backlash.

hanzi: 巡道工，护路员受雇保养或巡查铁道的工人
pinyin: xún dào gōng， hù lù yuán shòu gù bǎo yǎng huò xún chá tiě dào de gōng rén
english: A worker employed to maintain or inspect railroad tracks.

hanzi: 他在餐桌上举止粗鲁, 在座的人颇为难堪.
pinyin: tā zài cān zhuō shàng jǔ zhǐ cū lǔ,  zài zuò de rén pō wéi nán kān.
english: His ignorant behaviour at the dinner table caused much embarrassment.

hanzi: 那些吵吵闹闹的邻居成了我生活中的一大忧患.
pinyin: nà xiē chǎo chǎo nào nào de lín jū chéng le wǒ shēng huó zhòng dì yī dà yōu huàn.
english: Those noisy neighbours are the bane of my life.

hanzi: 她对别人对她行为的多方谴责一点也不在乎。
pinyin: tā duì bié rén duì tā xíng wéi de duō fāng qiǎn zé yī diǎn yě bù zài hu。
english: She cares nothing about the condemnations of her action.

hanzi: 最新的进展情况已向大众传播媒介发表。
pinyin: zuì xīn de jìn zhǎn qíng kuàng yǐ xiàng dà zhòng chuán bō méi jiè fā biǎo。
english: The latest developments have just been released to the media.

hanzi: 总经理和董事长并列坐在桌子后面。
pinyin: zǒng jīng lǐ huò dǒng shì zhǎng bìng liè zuò zài zhuō zi hòu mian。
english: The general manager and the chairman are sitting behind the desk side by side.

hanzi: 为了把烦恼忘却，他让自己忙于花园的工作。
pinyin: wèi le bǎ fán nǎo wàng què， tā ràng zì jǐ máng yú huā yuán de gōng zuò。
english: To forget his trouble, he busied himself in his garden .

hanzi: 他感慨万千，用力握了一下她的手，离开了她。
pinyin: tā gǎn kǎi wàn qiān， yòng lì wò le yī xià tā de shǒu， lí kāi le tā。
english: Overcome with emotion, he pressed her hand and left her.

hanzi: 班上计划义卖糖果，推选凯特为主持人。
pinyin: bān shàng jì huà yì mài táng guǒ， tuī xuǎn kǎi tè wèi zhǔ chí rén。
english: The class planned a candy sale and they elected Kate to head it up.

hanzi: 但愿他别再昼夜不分地招待他的朋友.
pinyin: dàn yuàn tā biè zài zhòu yè bù fēn de zhāo dài tā de péng you.
english: I wish he'd desist from entertaining his friends at all hours of the day and night.

hanzi: 这次暴动可看作是政治上不稳定的征兆。
pinyin: zhè cì bào dòng kě kàn zuò shì zhèng zhì shàng bù wěn dìng de zhēng zhào。
english: The riot can be considered a symptom of political instability.

hanzi: 锅炉内壁要洗刷一下，除去钙质沉淀物。
pinyin: guō lú nèi bì yào xǐ shuā yī xià， chú qù gài zhì chén diàn wù。
english: The boilers will have to be scoured out to remove the calcium deposits.

hanzi: 硅铁一种用于生产碳素钢的铁和硅的合金
pinyin: guī tiě yī zhòng yòng yú shēng chǎn tàn sù gāng de tiě huò guī de hé jīn
english: An alloy of iron and silicon used in the production of carbon steel.

hanzi: 一位绅士无论发生什么都不应对人家生气。
pinyin: yī wèi shēn shì wú lùn fā shēng shén me dōu bù yìng duì rén jiā shēng qì。
english: A gentleman should not be down on others whatever happens.

hanzi: 杰克是一位精通中国古代经典著作的学者。
pinyin: jié kè shì yī wèi jīng tōng Zhōng guó gǔ dài jīng diǎn著 zuò de xué zhě。
english: Jack is a scholar steeped in the classics of ancient China.

hanzi: 薄皮，薄膜如生物膜或液体膜等细薄的皮或膜
pinyin: bò pí， bó mó rú shēng wù mó huò yè tǐ mó děng xì bò de pí huò mó
english: A thin skin or film, such as an organic membrane or a liquid film.

hanzi: 华丽的服装使他那极其英俊的外貌更为增色.
pinyin: huá lì de fú zhuāng shǐ tā nà jí qí yīng jùn de wài mào gèng wèi zēng shǎi.
english: Fine clothes added to his strikingly handsome appearance.

hanzi: 美国的年轻人宁可从陌生人那里获取咨询。
pinyin: Měi guó de nián qīng rén nìng kě zòng mò shēng rén nà li huò qǔ zī xún。
english: American young people would rather get advice from strangers.

hanzi: 膝处于坐姿的人从腰到膝盖的大腿正面部位
pinyin: xī chǔ yú zuò zī de rén zòng yāo dào xī gài de dà tuǐ zhèng miàn bù wèi
english: The front area from the waist to the knees of a seated person.

hanzi: 我已将情况告诉你，所以你必须酌情处理。
pinyin: wǒ yǐ jiàng qíng kuàng gào su nǐ， suǒ yǐ nǐ bì xū zhuó qíng chǔ lǐ。
english: I have told you the circumstances, so you must act accordingly.

hanzi: 除了他那颇为古怪的口音以外, 我没注意到别的.
pinyin: chú le tā nà pō wèi gǔ guài de kǒu yīn yǐ wài,  wǒ mò zhù yì dào bié de.
english: I didn't notice anything beyond his rather strange accent.

hanzi: 那条高速公路上车祸发生得越来越频繁。
pinyin: nà tiáo gāo sù gōng lù shàng chē huò fā shēng de yuè lái yuè pín fán。
english: Accidents on that highway are happening with increasing frequency.

hanzi: 这家公司不久就能偿还所借的银行贷款.
pinyin: zhè jiā gōng sī bù jiǔ jiù néng cháng huán suǒ jiè de yín háng dài kuǎn.
english: The company will soon be able to repay its borrowings from the bank.

hanzi: 附着的与同类的部分或组织粘着但不融合的
pinyin: fù zhe de yù tóng lèi de bù fen huò zǔ zhī zhān zhuó dàn bù róng hé de
english: Sticking to but not fused with a part or an organ of the same kind.

hanzi: 她有非凡的自立的精神和坚韧不拔的精神。
pinyin: tā yǒu fēi fán de zì lì de jīng shén huò jiān rèn bù bá de jīng shén。
english: She have an unusual degree of self-reliance and mental toughness.

hanzi: 我不赞成损害与生俱来的愚昧的任何事物。
pinyin: wǒ bù zàn chéng sǔn hài yù shēng jù lái de yú mèi de rèn hé shì wù。
english: I do not approve of anything which tampers with natural ignorance.

hanzi: 含汞的与汞有关的或含汞的，尤指含一价汞的
pinyin: hán gǒng de yù gǒng yǒu guān de huò hán gǒng de， yóu zhǐ hán yī jie gǒng de
english: Relating to or containing mercury, especially with valence1.

hanzi: 在我们的菜园里，我们种了茄子，黄瓜和土豆。
pinyin: zài wǒ men de cài yuán lǐ， wǒ men zhòng le qié zi， huáng guā huò tǔ dòu。
english: In our garden we have egg-plants, cucumber and potato.

hanzi: 小女孩把贝壳穿成一串，戴在脖子上。
pinyin: xiǎo nu:3 hái bǎ bèi ké chuān chéng yī chuàn， dài zài bó zi shàng。
english: The little girl threaded the shells together and wore them round her neck.

hanzi: 他用挑逗的目光看了她一眼，羞得她满脸通红。
pinyin: tā yòng tiǎo dòu de mù guāng kàn le tā yī yǎn， xiū de tā mǎn liǎn tōng hóng。
english: He gave her a suggestive glance, and she blushed.

hanzi: 他被提名为行政总裁的事被董事会批准了。
pinyin: tā bèi tí míng wèi xíng zhèng zǒng cái de shì bèi dǒng shì huì pī zhǔn le。
english: His nomination as chief executive was approved by the board.

hanzi: 有些猎获的飞禽一直保存到开始变质才烹制.
pinyin: yǒu xiē liè huò de fēi qín yī zhí bǎo cún dào kāi shǐ biàn zhì cái pēng zhì.
english: Some game-birds are kept until they are high before cooking.

hanzi: 他的车祸给了他一个教训，使他不再开快车。
pinyin: tā de chē huò jǐ le tā yī gè jiào xun， shǐ tā bù zài kāi kuài chē。
english: His car accident has been a lesson to him to stop driving too fast.

hanzi: 美元突然贬值, 财经专家无不大伤脑筋.
pinyin: měi yuán tū rán biǎn zhí,  cái jīng zhuān jiā wú bú dà shāng nǎo jīn.
english: The sudden fall in the value of the dollar has puzzled financial experts.

hanzi: 法西斯专政的垮台引起左翼运动的高涨.
pinyin: fǎ xī sī zhuān zhèng de kuǎ tái yǐn qǐ zuǒ yì yùn dòng de gāo zhǎng.
english: The fall of the fascist dictatorship was followed by a left-wing backlash.

hanzi: 我没料到他会堕落到对我进行人身攻击的地步。
pinyin: wǒ mò liào dào tā kuài duò luò dào duì wǒ jìn xíng rén shēn gōng jī de dì bù。
english: I didn't expect him to descend to personal abuse.

hanzi: 她为抛弃婴儿事辩称自己抚养不起.
pinyin: tā wèi pāo qì yīng ér shì biàn chèng zì jǐ fǔ yǎng bù qǐ.
english: She rationalized her decision to abandon her baby by saying she could not afford to keep it.

hanzi: 我膀子上挎着两件衣服，活像一个卖旧货的。
pinyin: wǒ bǎng zǐ shàng kuà zhuó liǎng jiàn yī fu， huó xiàng yī gè mài jiù huò de。
english: I held two coats over my arm like a rag-and-bone merchant.

hanzi: 我的小小捐献在巨大的总额中小得几乎看不见。
pinyin: wǒ de xiǎo xiǎo juān xiàn zài jù dà de zǒng é zhòng xiǎo de jī hū kàn bù jiàn。
english: My small contribution was lost in the grand total.

hanzi: 上个月数百名妇女儿童死于叛军的炮火。
pinyin: shàng gè yuè shù bǎi míng fù nu:3 ér tóng sǐ yú pàn jūn de pào huǒ。
english: Hundreds of women and children fell to the rebels’ gunfire last month.

hanzi: 薄皮，薄膜如生物膜或液体膜等细薄的皮或膜
pinyin: bò pí， bó mó rú shēng wù mó huò yè tǐ mó děng xì bò de pí huò mó
english: A thin skin or film, such as an organic membrane or a liquid film.

hanzi: 大元帅某一国内所有武装部队的最高统帅
pinyin: dà yuán shuài mǒu yī guó nèi suǒ yǒu wǔ zhuāng bù duì de zuì gāo tǒng shuài
english: The commander in chief of all the armed forces in certain countries.

hanzi: 君子协定通常不能在法律上得以强制执行。
pinyin: jūn zi xié dìng tōng cháng bù néng zài fǎ lu:4 shàng dé yǐ qiáng zhì zhí xíng。
english: A gentleman's agreement is not usually enforceable by law.

hanzi: 在父母的慈爱的抚育下，我度过了幸福的童年。
pinyin: zài fù mǔ de cí ài de fǔ yù xià， wǒ dù guò le xìng fú de tóng nián。
english: I spent a happy childhood under the loving care of my parents.

hanzi: 老师设法把她的思想渗透到孩子们的心中。
pinyin: lǎo shī shè fǎ bǎ tā de sī xiǎng shèn tòu dào hái zi men de xīn zhōng。
english: The teacher tried to infiltrate her ideas into the children's minds.

hanzi: 诉讼记录法律案件中法庭诉讼程序的简要记录
pinyin: sù sòng jì lù fǎ lu:4 àn jiàn zhòng fǎ tíng sù sòng chéng xù de jiǎn yào jì lù
english: A brief entry of the court proceedings in a legal case.

hanzi: 失控的通货膨胀似乎阻止这一趋势的发展。
pinyin: shī kòng de tōng huò péng zhàng sì hu zǔ zhǐ zhè yī qū shì de fā zhǎn。
english: The runaway inflation would seem to put the brakes on such a trend.

hanzi: 作者在前言中阐明了他写这本书的原因。
pinyin: zuó zhě zài qián yán zhòng chǎn míng le tā xiě zhè běn shū de yuán yīn。
english: In his preface the author set forth his reasons for writing the book.

hanzi: 电视已成为传播政治思想的重要媒介。
pinyin: diàn shì yǐ chéng wéi chuán bō zhèng zhì sī xiǎng de zhòng yào méi jiè。
english: Television has become an important vehicle for spreading political ideas.

hanzi: 这姑娘太害羞以至和男人讲话时就脸红。
pinyin: zhè gū niang tài hài xiū yǐ zhì huò nán rén jiǎng huà shí jiù liǎn hóng。
english: The girl is so shy that she colours up whenever a man speaks to her.

hanzi: 法西斯专政的垮台引起左翼运动的高涨.
pinyin: fǎ xī sī zhuān zhèng de kuǎ tái yǐn qǐ zuǒ yì yùn dòng de gāo zhǎng.
english: The fall of the fascist dictatorship was followed by a left-wing backlash.

hanzi: 那孩子跑到汽车前面的路上, 司机猛踩刹车.
pinyin: nà hái zi pǎo dào qì chē qián mian de lù shang,  sī jī měng cǎi shā chē.
english: The driver braked hard as the child ran onto the road in front of him.

hanzi: 在切斯特的主教主持下举行了新教堂的奉献礼.
pinyin: zài qiè sī tè de zhǔ jiào zhǔ chí xià jǔ xíng le xīn jiào táng de fèng xiàn lǐ.
english: The new church was consecrated by the Bishop of Chester.

hanzi: 她把棍子朝里面捅了好深，可是没有动物出来。
pinyin: tā bǎ gùn zi cháo lǐ miàn tǒng le hào shēn， kě shì méi yǒu dòng wù chū lai。
english: She poked the stick in a long way, but no animal came out.

hanzi: 戴桂冠的戴以月桂冠或饰以月挂作为荣誉标志的
pinyin: dài guì guān de dài yǐ yuè guì guān huò shì yǐ yuè guà zuò wéi róng yù biāo zhì de
english: Crowned or decked with laurel as a mark of honor.

hanzi: 恐光症，光恐怖对光线不正常或不合情理的畏惧
pinyin: kǒng guāng zhèng， guāng kǒng bù duì guāng xiàn bù zhèng cháng huò bù hé qíng lǐ de wèi jù
english: An abnormal or irrational fear of light.

hanzi: 他用两小时左右的时间草草拟出了故事的大纲。
pinyin: tā yòng liǎng xiǎo shí zuǒ yòu de shí jiān cǎo cǎo nǐ chū le gù shì de dà gāng。
english: He batted out an outline of a story in about two hours.

hanzi: 毛毛虫必须经过茧的阶段才能变成蝴蝶。
pinyin: máo máo chóng bì xū jīng guò jiǎn de jiē duàn cái néng biàn chéng hú dié。
english: A caterpillar must pass through the cocoon stage to become a butterfly.

hanzi: 她发觉很难与她的老师和同学们相处融洽。
pinyin: tā fā jué hěn nàn yù tā de lǎo shī huò tóng xué men xiāng chǔ róng qià。
english: She finds it difficult to relate to her tutors and fellow students.

hanzi: 医治者，抚慰者治愈别人的人，具有治愈影响的人
pinyin: yī zhì zhě， fǔ wèi zhě zhì yù bié rén de rén， jù yǒu zhì yù yǐng xiǎng de rén
english: A person who heals or exerts a healing influence.

hanzi: 食人妖魔传说或神说中食人的巨人或妖怪
pinyin: sì rén yāo mó chuán shuō huò shén shuō zhòng sì rén de jù rén huò yāo guài
english: A giant or monster in legends and fairy tales that eats human beings.

hanzi: 抽头扑克牌戏中每一次赌注的一部分凑集成的钱
pinyin: chōu tou pū kè pái xì zhòng měi yī cì dǔ zhù de yī bù fen còu jí chéng de qián
english: A fund made up of a portion of each pot in a poker game.

hanzi: 被击败的军队偷偷潜回到它在山里的据点里。
pinyin: bèi jī bài de jūn duì tōu tōu qián huí dào tā zài shān lǐ de jù diǎn lǐ。
english: The defeat army slinked back to its stronghold in the mountain.

hanzi: 他用一面凸透镜把阳光在纸上聚成焦点。
pinyin: tā yòng yī miàn tū tòu jìng bǎ yáng guāng zài zhǐ shàng jù chéng jiāo diǎn。
english: He focused the sun's ray on a piece of paper with a burning-glass.

hanzi: 假若认为耳聋有趣, 这种幽默感十分不当.
pinyin: jiǎ ruò rèn wéi ěr lóng yǒu qù,  zhè zhǒng yōu mò gǎn shí fēn bù dàng.
english: If you think deafness is funny, you've got a very misplaced sense of humour.

hanzi: 这个建议完全是荒唐可笑的, 根本不可能采纳.
pinyin: zhè gè jiàn yì wán quán shì huāng táng kě xiào de,  gēn běn bù kě néng cǎi nà.
english: The entire proposal is risible: it will never be accepted.

hanzi: 吉米还不能分辨颜色，他把紫色和蓝色搅混了。
pinyin: jí mǐ huán bù néng fēn biàn yán sè， tā bǎ zǐ sè huò lán sè jiǎo hun le。
english: Jimmy doesn't know colors yet; he mixes up purple with blue.

hanzi: 侵略者在沿海城乡抢劫食物和贵重物品.
pinyin: qīn lu:è zhě zài yán hǎi chéng xiāng qiāng jié shí wù huò guì zhòng wù pǐn.
english: The invaders plundered food and valuables from coastal towns and villages.

hanzi: 这一产品非常成功, 其名称已经家喻户晓.
pinyin: zhè yī chǎn pǐn fēi cháng chéng gōng,  qí míng chēng yǐ jīng jiā yù hù xiǎo.
english: The product was so successful that its name became a household word.

hanzi: 渔民和水手有时声称看到过海里的妖怪。
pinyin: yú mín huò shuǐ shǒu yǒu shí shēng chēng kàn dào guò hǎi lǐ de yāo guài。
english: Fishermen and sailors sometimes claim to have seen monsters in the sea.

pinyin: tā xīn zhōng biē zhuó yī gǔ nù huǒ， àn zhào bié rén gào su tā de qù zuò。
english: He acted on what he was told with a cold fury in his heart.

hanzi: 我们新派遣一组护理人员开赴受灾最重的地区.
pinyin: wǒ men xīn pài qiǎn yī zǔ hù lǐ rén yuán kāi fù shòu zāi zuì zhòng de dì qū.
english: We're sending a fresh draft of nurses to the worst hit area.

english: Blood can be cleaned by osmosis if the kidneys have failed.

pinyin: tā lì yòng nà jī huì biǎo dá le duì zhǔ xí jī yā yǐ jiǔ de yuàn qì.
english: He used the occasion to express all his old grievances against the chairman.

hanzi: 集团的大部分利润是由远东的子公司缴纳。
pinyin: jí tuán de dà bù fen lì rùn shì yóu yuǎn dōng de zi gōng sī jiǎo nà。
english: Most of the group profit is contributed by the subsidiary in the far east.

hanzi: 波浪起伏的显示短而杂乱的波浪的，比如在海潮中
pinyin: bō làng qǐ fú de xiǎn shì duǎn ér zá luàn de bō làng de， bǐ rú zài hǎi cháo zhòng
english: Exhibiting short, jumbled waves, as a tidal rip.

hanzi: 由于温度起伏不定，他们的测验结果很不准确。
pinyin: yóu yú wēn dù qǐ fú bù dìng， tā men de cè yàn jié guǒ hěn bù zhǔn què。
english: Fluctuations in temperatures put their results oat by a mile.
