hanzi: 卡祖笛一种当吹奏者向吹口处低吟或哼唱时一个膜能够发出声音的玩具乐器
pinyin: qiǎ zǔ dí yī zhòng dàng chuī zòu zhě xiàng chuī kǒu chù dī yín huò hng chàng shí yī gè mó néng gòu fā chū shēng yīn de wán jù yuè qì
english: A toy instrument with a membrane that produces a sound when a player hums or sings into the mouthpiece.

hanzi: 挡板，调节风门一种可调节的薄片，如在熔炉或火炉的通气管中的，用来控制气流
pinyin: dàng bǎn， tiáo jié fēng mén yī zhòng kě tiáo jié de bó piàn， rú zài róng lú huò huǒ lú de tōng qì guǎn zhòng dì， yòng lái kòng zhì qì liú
english: An adjustable plate, as in the flue of a furnace or stove, for controlling the draft.

hanzi: 地方法官拥有有限司法权，尤其是在刑事案件中有司法权的司法官中的地方成员
pinyin: dì fang fǎ guān yōng yǒu yǒu xiàn sī fǎ quán， yóu qí shì zài xíng shì àn jiàn zhòng yǒu sī fǎ quán de sī fǎ guān zhòng dì dì fang chéng yuán
english: A local member of the judiciary having limited jurisdiction, especially in criminal cases.

hanzi: 霍勒斯沾沾自喜于自己的权力。他就是那个拉动响鞭发号令的是暴徒，是头子。
pinyin: huò lēi sī zhān zhān zì xǐ yú zì jǐ de quán lì。 tā jiù shì nèi gè lā dòng xiǎng biān fà hào lìng de shì bào tú， shì tóu zi。
english: Horace was relishing his power. He was the tough, the big shot, who gave orders with the crack of a whip.

hanzi: 三层刺网一种三层竖向安置的渔网，由一层细目网夹在两层粗目网中构成
pinyin: sān céng cì wǎng yī zhòng sān céng shù xiàng ān zhì de yú wǎng， yóu yī céng xì mù wǎng jiá zài liǎng céng cū mù wǎng zhòng gòu chéng
english: A vertically set fishing net of three layers, consisting of a finely meshed net between two nets of coarse mesh.

hanzi: 她在当地的旅馆询问打听，得知罗切斯特太太在一天夜间点火烧着了房子。
pinyin: tā zài dāng dì de lu:3 guǎn xún wèn dǎ ting， dé zhī luó qiè sī tè tài tai zài yī tiān yè jiān diǎn huǒ shāo zhuó le fáng zi。
english: Making inquiries at the local inn, she discovers that Mrs. Rochester one night succeeded in setting the house on fire.

hanzi: 我们这世界，是人们不知道自己想要什么而甘心赴汤蹈火为了把它弄到手的地方。
pinyin: wǒ men zhè shì jiè， shì rén men bù zhī dào zì jǐ xiǎng yào shén me ér gān xīn fù tāng dǎo huǒ wèi le bǎ tā nòng dào shǒu de dì fang。
english: Ours is a world where people do not know what they want and are willing to go through hell to get it.

hanzi: 吊床一种易摆动的吊床或躺椅，用帆布或厚网挂在两树或别的支撑物之间
pinyin: diào chuáng yī zhòng yì bǎi dòng de diào chuáng huò tǎng yǐ， yòng fán bù huò hòu wǎng guà zài liǎng shù huò bié de zhī chēng wù zhī jiān
english: A hanging, easily swung cot or lounge of canvas or heavy netting suspended between two trees or other supports.

hanzi: 煤砖，炭砖把煤灰，木炭或锯木灰和木片压缩制成的砖块状物，用作燃料和点火
pinyin: méi zhuān， tàn zhuān bǎ méi huī， mù tàn huò jù mù huī huò mù piàn yā suō zhì chéng de zhuān kuài zhuàng wù， yòng zuò rán liào huò diǎn huǒ
english: A block of compressed coal dust, charcoal, or sawdust and wood chips, used for fuel and kindling.

hanzi: 煤砖，炭砖把煤灰，木炭或锯木灰和木片压缩制成的砖块状物，用作燃料和点火
pinyin: méi zhuān， tàn zhuān bǎ méi huī， mù tàn huò jù mù huī huò mù piàn yā suō zhì chéng de zhuān kuài zhuàng wù， yòng zuò rán liào huò diǎn huǒ
english: A block of compressed coal dust, charcoal, or sawdust and wood chips, used for fuel and kindling.

hanzi: 因为除去钢中的磷和硫需要一些特殊的条件，这些条件只有碱性法才能满足。
pinyin: yīn wèi chú qù gāng zhòng dì lín huò liú xū yào yī xiē tè shū de tiáo jiàn， zhè xie tiáo jiàn zhǐ yǒu jiǎn xìng fǎ cái néng mǎn zú。
english: Because the removal of phosphorus and sulfur require special condition that can be met only by the basic process.

hanzi: 在这篇爱情背叛和复仇的故事中，表现了阴森可怖的想像力，真是刺激，棒极了。
pinyin: zài zhè piān ài qíng bèi pàn huò fù chóu de gù shì zhòng， biǎo xiàn le yīn sēn kě bù de xiǎng xiàng lì， zhēn shì cì jī， bàng jí le。
english: A darker imagination is at work in this story of betrayed love and revenge. Strong meat and very good.

hanzi: 巴鲁克先生讲述了他所认为的禁止抽鸦片烟的最好方法，大家都热烈赞同。
pinyin: bā lǔ kè xiān sheng jiǎng shù le tā suǒ rèn wéi de jìn zhǐ chōu yā piàn yān de zuì hǎo fāng fǎ， dà jiā dōu rè liè zàn tóng。
english: Mr Baruch stated what he thought the best method of suppressing opium smoking and the people heartily entered into his views.

hanzi: 杰克太爱吹牛了，当教练说他并不是他所想像的那么好时，他感到很惊讶。
pinyin: jié kè tài ài chuī niú le， dàng jiào liàn shuō tā bìng bù shì tā suǒ xiǎng xiàng de nà me hào shí， tā gǎn dào hěn jīng yà。
english: Jack brags too much and it set him back on his heels when the coach told him he wasn't as good a player as he thought he was.

hanzi: 当然，父亲会经常供给一些零钱，但是叔叔和婶婶也总是额外收入的源泉。
pinyin: dāng rán， fù qīn kuài jīng cháng gōng gěi yī xiē líng qián， dàn shì shū shu huò shěn shen yě zǒng shì é wài shōu rù de yuán quán。
english: Father, of course, provides a regular supply of pocket-money, but uncles and aunts are always a source of extra income.

hanzi: 及时反馈自己的意见和建议，以便不断提高我们节目的质量和促进俱乐部的发展。
pinyin: jí shí fǎn kuì zì jǐ de yì jiàn huò jiàn yì， yǐ biàn bù duàn tí gāo wǒ men jié mù de zhì liàng huò cù jìn jù yuè bù de fā zhǎn。
english: Meanwhile, you are allowed to feedback your thoughts and opinions regularly to develop our program and the club.

hanzi: 医生做完了手术，但他的成功有赖于那些发明了新型激光手术刀的研究人员。
pinyin: yī shēng zuò wán le shǒu shù， dàn tā de chéng gōng yǒu lài yú nà xiē fā míng le xīn xíng jī guāng shǒu shù dāo de yán jiū rén yuán。
english: The doctor finished the operation, but his success depended on the backroom boys who had invented the new laser scalpel.

hanzi: 燃放鞭炮不仅仅被看作讨厌的事，而且还被认为是对人的生命财产的严重威胁。
pinyin: rán fàng biān pào bù jǐn jǐn bèi kàn zuò tǎo yàn de shì， ér qiě huán bèi rèn wéi shì duì rén de shēng mìng cái chǎn de yán zhòng wēi xié。
english: Setting off firecrackers is seen not merely as a nuisance, but also as a big threat to man's life and property.

hanzi: 甘受贿赂，贪污腐化易受贿赂或腐败的影响性，如在使用不诚实的收益的信托状况时
pinyin: gān shòu huì lù， tān wū fǔ huà yì shòu huì lù huò fǔ bài de yǐng xiǎng xìng， rú zài shǐ yòng bù chéng shí de shōu yì de xìn tuō zhuàng kuàng shí
english: Susceptibility to bribery or corruption, as in the use of a position of trust for dishonest gain.

hanzi: 它的用处是备份大量的数据或增加存储容量。硬盘的存储容量从几百兆字节不等。
pinyin: tā de yòng chu shì bèi fèn dà liàng de shù jù huò zēng jiā cún chǔ róng liàng。 yìng pán de cún chǔ róng liàng zòng jǐ bǎi zhào zì jié bù děng。
english: Hard disks provide tremendous storage capacities ranging from hundreds of megabytes to several gigabytes.

hanzi: 管辖区城市或城镇的分区或地区，由警察机构的特定单位对其进行管辖或巡逻
pinyin: guǎn xiá qū chéng shì huò chéng zhèn de fèn qū huò dì qū， yóu jǐng chá jī gòu de tè dìng dān wèi duì qí jìn xíng guǎn xiá huò xún luó
english: A subdivision or district of a city or town under the jurisdiction of or patrolled by a specific unit of its police force.

hanzi: 空头支票代表虚构的金融交易的可转让票据，暂时用于维持信贷或筹集钱款
pinyin: kōng tóu zhī piào dài biǎo xū gòu de jīn róng jiāo yì de kě zhuǎn ràng piào jù， zàn shí yòng yú wéi chí xìn dài huò chóu jí qián kuǎn
english: A piece of negotiable paper representing a fictitious financial transaction and used temporarily to sustain credit or raise money.

hanzi: 我的目光没有聚焦，以致我没有看到特别的目标，仅仅是那川流不息的彩色万花筒。
pinyin: wǒ de mù guāng méi yǒu jù jiāo， yǐ zhì wǒ méi yǒu kàn dào tè bié de mù biāo， jǐn jǐn shì nà chuān liú bù xī de cǎi sè wàn huā tǒng。
english: I throw my eyes out of focus, so that I see no particular object but only a seething kaleidoscope of colors.

hanzi: 空头支票代表虚构的金融交易的可转让票据，暂时用于维持信贷或筹集钱款
pinyin: kōng tóu zhī piào dài biǎo xū gòu de jīn róng jiāo yì de kě zhuǎn ràng piào jù， zàn shí yòng yú wéi chí xìn dài huò chóu jí qián kuǎn
english: A piece of negotiable paper representing a fictitious financial transaction and used temporarily to sustain credit or raise money.

hanzi: 德拉就这样做了。你知道，人生是由呜咽，抽泣和徽笑组成的，而其中主要的是抽泣。
pinyin: dé lā jiù zhè yàng zuò le。 nǐ zhī dào， rén shēng shì yóu wū yè， chōu qì huò huī xiào zǔ chéng de， ér qí zhōng zhǔ yào de shì chōu qì。
english: So Della did. You see, life You see, life is made up of sobs, sniffles, and smiles- but mainly of sniffles.

hanzi: 酗酒成性的人承认饮酒过度是弊多利少，他这样说实际是自己打自己的嘴巴。
pinyin: xù jiǔ chéng xìng de rén chéng rèn yǐn jiǔ guò dù shì bì Duō lì shào， tā zhè yàng shuō shí jì shì zì jǐ dǎ zì jǐ de zuǐ bā。
english: By admitting that excessive drinking does more harm than good, the man who indulged in the practice was condemned out of his own mouth.

hanzi: 在荷兰，人们拦海造田已开垦了成千上万公顷的土地并将它们变成可耕地和牧场。
pinyin: zài hé lán， rén men lán hǎi zào tián yǐ kāi kěn le chéng qiān shàng wàn gōng qǐng de tǔ dì bìng jiàng tā men biàn chéng kě gēng dì huò mù chǎng。
english: In Holland thousands of hectares have been reclaimed from the sea and turned over to arable land and pasture.

hanzi: 扫黄对被认为不道德或淫秽的文学作品或其它表现或传播此内容的形式进行查禁
pinyin: sào huáng duì bèi rèn wéi bù dào dé huò yín huì de wén xué zuò pǐn huò qí tā biǎo xiàn huò chuán bō cǐ nèi róng de xíng shì jìn xíng zhā jìn
english: Censorship of literature and other forms of expression and communication because of perceived immorality or obscenity.

hanzi: 全部艰苦的工作都是我做的，但是我的老板却宣布那是他自己的发现，窃取了我的发明创造。
pinyin: quán bù jiān kù de gōng zuò dōu shì wǒ zuò de， dàn shì wǒ de lǎo bǎn què xuān bù nà shì tā zì jǐ de fā xiàn， qiè qǔ le wǒ de fā míng chuàng zào。
english: I did all the hard work but my boss stole my thunder by announcing the discovery as his own

hanzi: 毁船打劫者引诱船只失事的人，如通过在多岩石的海岸线上打信号灯，以掠夺其财物
pinyin: huǐ chuán dǎ jié zhě yǐn yòu chuán zhī shī shì de rén， rú tōng guò zài duō yán shí de hǎi àn xiàn shàng dǎ xìn hào dēng， yǐ lu:è duó qí cái wù
english: One who lures a vessel to destruction, as by a display of lights on a rocky coastline, in order to plunder it.

hanzi: 肠毒素由只限于肠结胸的细菌而产生的毒素，引起呕吐和腹泻并导致食物中毒
pinyin: cháng dú sù yóu zhǐ xiàn yú cháng jié xiōng de xì jūn ér chǎn shēng de dú sù， yǐn qǐ ǒu tù huò fù xiè bìng dǎo zhì shí wù zhòng dú
english: A toxin produced by bacteria that is specific for intestinal cells and causes the vomiting and diarrhea associated with food poisoning.

hanzi: 她用一个问答的方式引起她的演讲。这支乐队通过全国巡回演出来创下了自己的记录
pinyin: tā yòng yī gè wèn dá de fāng shì yǐn qǐ tā de yǎn jiǎng。 zhè zhī yuè duì tōng guò quán guó xún huí yǎn chū lái chuàng xià le zì jǐ de jì lù
english: She followed her lecture with a question-and-answer period. The band followed its hit record with a national tour.

hanzi: 肠毒素由只限于肠结胸的细菌而产生的毒素，引起呕吐和腹泻并导致食物中毒
pinyin: cháng dú sù yóu zhǐ xiàn yú cháng jié xiōng de xì jūn ér chǎn shēng de dú sù， yǐn qǐ ǒu tù huò fù xiè bìng dǎo zhì shí wù zhòng dú
english: A toxin produced by bacteria that is specific for intestinal cells and causes the vomiting and diarrhea associated with food poisoning.

hanzi: 原生质体植物细胞或细菌细胞的有生命的部分，包括原生质和去掉细胞壁后的质膜
pinyin: yuán shēng zhí tǐ zhí wù xì bāo huò xì jūn xì bāo de yǒu shēng mìng de bù fen， bāo kuò yuán shēng zhí huò qù diào xì bāo bì hòu de zhì mó
english: The living material of a plant or bacterial cell, including the protoplasm and plasma membrane after the cell wall has been removed.

hanzi: 象中国一样，美国继承了幅员辽阔的国土，有一望无际的丛山峻岭，沃土良田和无边草原。
pinyin: xiàng Zhōng guó yí yàng， Měi guó jí chéng le fú yuán liáo kuò de guó tǔ， yǒu yī wàng wú jì de cóng shān jùn lǐng， wò tǔ liáng tián huò wú biān cǎo yuán。
english: Like you, we inherited a vast land of endless skies, tall mountains, rich fields, and open prairies.

hanzi: 我并非真的想同我儿子打一场艰苦的网球赛，因此就敷衍了一下，让他赢了前两局。
pinyin: wǒ bìng fēi zhēn de xiǎng tóng wǒ ér zi dǎ yī chǎng jiān kù de wǎng qiú sài， yīn cǐ jiù fū yǎn le yī xià， ràng tā yíng le qián liǎng jú。
english: I didn't really want to play a hard game of tennis with my son, so I went through the motions and let him win the first two sets.

hanzi: 我女朋友唠叨着要我去理发，因此我今天终于去理了。只要能保持安宁，那还是值得的。
pinyin: wǒ nu:3 péng you láo tāo zhuó yào wǒ qù lǐ fà， yīn cǐ wǒ jīn tiān zhōng yú qù lǐ le。 zhǐ yào néng bǎo chí ān níng， nà hái shì zhí de de。
english: My girlfriend keeps on nagging me to get a haircut so I finally had one today; it was worth it if only to keep the peace.

hanzi: 象中国一样，美国继承了幅员辽阔的国土，有一望无际的丛山峻岭，沃土良田和无边草原。
pinyin: xiàng Zhōng guó yí yàng， Měi guó jí chéng le fú yuán liáo kuò de guó tǔ， yǒu yī wàng wú jì de cóng shān jùn lǐng， wò tǔ liáng tián huò wú biān cǎo yuán。
english: Like you, we inherited a vast land of endless skies, tall mountains, rich fields, and open prairies.

hanzi: 象中国一样，美国继承了幅员辽阔的国土，有一望无际的丛山峻岭，沃土良田和无边草原。
pinyin: xiàng Zhōng guó yí yàng， Měi guó jí chéng le fú yuán liáo kuò de guó tǔ， yǒu yī wàng wú jì de cóng shān jùn lǐng， wò tǔ liáng tián huò wú biān cǎo yuán。
english: Like you, we inherited a vast land of endless skies, tall mountains, rich fields, and open prairies.

hanzi: 函数两组元素一一对应的规则，第一组中的每个元素在第二组中只有唯一的对应量
pinyin: hán shù liǎng zǔ yuán sù yī yī duì yìng de guī zé， dì yī zǔ zhòng dì měi gè yuán sù zài dì èr zǔ zhòng zhǐ yǒu wéi yī de duì yìng liàng
english: A rule of correspondence between two sets such that there is a unique element in the second set assigned to each element in the first set.

hanzi: 第三位在有机分子中从一指定碳原子后第三个位置，在此一个原子或原子团可能被替代
pinyin: dì sān wèi zài yǒu jī fèn zǐ zhòng zòng yī zhǐ dìng tàn yuán zǐ hòu dì sān gè wèi zhi， zài cǐ yī gè yuán zǐ huò yuán zǐ tuán kě néng bèi tì dài
english: The third position from a designated carbon atom in an organic molecule at which an atom or a radical may be substituted.

hanzi: 水合物结晶中有一定比例水分子成分的固体化合物，其中水分子与晶体的含量为一固定比例
pinyin: shuǐ hé wù jié jīng zhòng yǒu yī dìng bǐ lì shuǐ fèn zi chéng fèn de gù tǐ huà hé wù， qí zhōng shuǐ fèn zi yù jīng tǐ de hán liàng wèi yī gù dìng bǐ lì
english: A solid compound containing water molecules combined in a definite ratio as an integral part of the crystal.

hanzi: 如果你找不到别人，我同意为球队上场打球，但我先告诉你，我的球艺因久不练习已经生疏。
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ zhǎo bù dào bié rén， wǒ tóng yì wèi qiú duì shàng chǎng dǎ qiú， dàn wǒ xiān gào su nǐ， wǒ de qiú yì yīn jiǔ bù liàn xí yǐ jīng shēng shū。
english: If you can't get anyone else I don't mind playing for the team, but I warn you that I'm not in practice.

hanzi: 柴油潜艇在水下只能航行非常短的时间，而核潜艇在水下航行的时间要长得多。
pinyin: chái yóu qián tǐng zài shuǐ xià zhǐ néng háng xíng fēi cháng duǎn de shí jiān， ér hé qián tǐng zài shuǐ xià háng xíng de shí jiān yào zhǎng de duō。
english: A diesel submarine is able to cruise under water for a short period of time, but a nuclear one is able to cruise under water much longer.

hanzi: 对我们来说，猫是热情又充满深情的动物，但是在鸟儿和老鼠看来，猫是恶毒的食肉动物。
pinyin: duì wǒ men lái shuō， māo shì rè qíng yòu chōng mǎn shēn qíng de dòng wù， dàn shì zài niǎo er huò lǎo shǔ kàn lai， māo shì è dú de sì ròu dòng wù。
english: Cats are warm and affectionate creatures to us, but viewed through the eyes of birds and mice they are vicious predators.

hanzi: 针灸，针刺疗法，针刺麻醉以细针扎入身体特定部位以减轻疼痛或诱导局部麻醉的方法
pinyin: zhēn jiǔ， zhēn cì liáo fǎ， zhēn cì má zuì yǐ xì zhēn zhá rù shēn tǐ tè dìng bù wèi yǐ jiǎn qīng téng tòng huò yòu dǎo jú bù má zuì de fāng fǎ
english: A technique, as for relieving pain or inducing regional anesthesia, in which thin needles are inserted into the body at specific points.

hanzi: 纳粹主义纳粹党的意识和实施，尤其是种族国家主义，国家扩张，政府控制经济的政策
pinyin: nà cuì zhǔ yì nà cuì dǎng de yì shí huò shí shī， yóu qí shì zhǒng zú guó jiā zhǔ yì， guó jiā kuò zhāng， zhèng fǔ kòng zhì jīng jì de zhèng cè
english: The ideology and practice of the Nazis, especially the policy of racist nationalism, national expansion, and state control of the economy.

hanzi: 他老是连续不断地锤击，把钉子敲进木头，而且钉头与板面平齐之后，还是一个劲儿地敲。
pinyin: tā lǎo shi lián xù bù duàn de chuí jī， bǎ dīng zi qiāo jìn mù tou， ér qiě dīng tou yù bǎn miàn píng qí zhī hòu， hái shì yī gè jìng er de qiāo。
english: He would hammer a nail into the wood with a series of blows that continued to down long after the head was flush with the boards.

hanzi: 在那之后，简直拦不住他，他觉得该是放弃原有的工作而全力以赴当作家谋生的时候了。
pinyin: zài nà zhī hòu， jiǎn zhí lán bú zhù tā， tā jué de gāi shì fàng qì yuán yǒu de gōng zuò ér quán lì yǐ fù dàng zuò jiā móu shēng de shí hou le。
english: After that, there was no holding him, and the day came when he felt he could chuck his job and to all out to make a living as writer.

hanzi: 要不是办像酿酒厂或保险公司这样的副业，他们没有多少人只靠艺术就能过的舒舒服服。
pinyin: yào bu shì bàn xiàng niàng jiǔ chǎng huò bǎo xiǎn gōng sī zhè yàng de fù yè， tā men méi yǒu duō shao rén zhǐ kào yì shù jiù néng guò de shū shū fu fú。
english: Few of them managed to make a good living out of their art alone, without running a sideline such as a brewery or an insurance office.

hanzi: 天体要素在古代和中古时代被认为是充满于月球空间并且是构成恒星和行星的元素
pinyin: tiān tǐ yào sù zài gǔ dài huò zhōng gǔ shí dài bèi rèn wéi shì chōng mǎn yú yuè qiú kōng jiān bìng qiě shì gòu chéng héng xīng huò xíng xīng de yuán sù
english: The element believed in ancient and medieval civilizations to fill all space above the sphere of the moon and to compose the stars and planets.

hanzi: 盈亏平衡点尤指在出售货物或服务的水平上，投资的收益与投资的数量恰好相等的一点
pinyin: yíng kuī píng héng diǎn yóu zhǐ zài chū shòu huò wù huò fú wù de shuǐ píng shàng， tóu zī de shōu yì yù tóu zī de shù liàng qià hǎo xiāng děng de yī diǎn
english: The point, especially the level of sales of a good or service, at which the return on investment is exactly equal to the amount invested.

hanzi: 反应素个体血液中的一种抗体，可以对诸如气喘病和光粉热这些变态反应产生预先的基因处理
pinyin: fǎn yìng sù gè tǐ xuè yè zhòng dì yī zhòng kàng tǐ， kě yǐ duì zhū rú qì chuǎn bìng huò guāng fěn rè zhè xie biàn tài fǎn yìng chǎn shēng yù xiān de jī yīn chǔ lǐ
english: An antibody found in the blood of individuals having a genetic predisposition to allergies such as asthma and hay fever.

hanzi: 对许多小女孩来说，童话故事构成了她们的梦幻世界，她们小小的生活天地也系于神话仙境。
pinyin: duì xǔ duō xiǎo nu:3 hái lái shuō， tóng huà gù shì gòu chéng le tā men de mèng huàn shì jiè， tā men xiǎo xiǎo de shēng huó tiān dì yě xì yú shén huà xiān jìng。
english: For most little girls fairy tales are the stuff that dreams are made of, and their little lives are bounded by the fairyland.

hanzi: 她来了将近两个月的时候，开始抱怨说她觉得身体更糟了，从那时起，她成了牧场上的负担。
pinyin: tā lái le jiāng jìn liǎng gè yuè de shí hou， kāi shǐ bào yuàn shuō tā jué de shēn tǐ gèng zāo le， zòng nà shí qǐ， tā chéng le mù chǎng shàng de fù dān。
english: Nearly two months after her arrival she began to complain that she felt worse. It was then that she became ranch's old man of the sea.

hanzi: 政治迫害表面上是开展揭露颠覆的活动，但实际上用于扰乱和削弱持不同看法的人的调查
pinyin: zhèng zhì pò hài biǎo miàn shàng shì kāi zhǎn jiē lù diān fù de huó dòng， dàn shí jì shàng yòng yú rǎo luàn huò xuē ruò chí bù tóng kàn fǎ de rén de diào chá
english: An investigation carried out ostensibly to uncover subversive activities but actually used to harass and undermine those with differing views.

hanzi: 政治迫害表面上是开展揭露颠覆的活动，但实际上用于扰乱和削弱持不同看法的人的调查
pinyin: zhèng zhì pò hài biǎo miàn shàng shì kāi zhǎn jiē lù diān fù de huó dòng， dàn shí jì shàng yòng yú rǎo luàn huò xuē ruò chí bù tóng kàn fǎ de rén de diào chá
english: An investigation carried out ostensibly to uncover subversive activities but actually used to harass and undermine those with differing views.

hanzi: 缩微平片一个缩微胶卷片，能够以缩微形式容纳并储存相当多数量的页数，如一印刷文本的
pinyin: suō wēi píng piàn yī gè suō wēi jiāo juān piàn， néng gòu yǐ suō wēi xíng shì róng nà bìng chǔ cún xiāng dāng duō shù liàng de yè shuò， rú yī yìn shuà wén běn de
english: A card or sheet of microfilm capable of accommodating and preserving a considerable number of pages, as of printed text, in reduced form.

hanzi: 但愿上帝使我们不至于鄙视我们的统治者，更愿上帝使他们不至于作出我们禁不住要鄙视他们的行动。
pinyin: dàn yuàn shàng dì shǐ wǒ men bù zhì yú bǐ shì wǒ men de tǒng zhì zhē， gèng yuàn shàng dì shǐ tā men bù zhì yú zuò chū wǒ men jìn bú zhù yào bǐ shì tā men de xíng dòng。
english: Oh Lord, grant that we may not despise our rulers; and grant, oh Lord, that they may not act so we can't help it.

hanzi: 主动脉系统血管的主干道，将血液由心脏左侧输送到除肺部以外的所有肢体及器官的动脉里
pinyin: zhǔ dòng mài xì tǒng xuè guǎn de zhǔ gàn dào， jiàng xuè yè yóu xīn zàng zuǒ zhāi shū sòng dào chú fèi bù yǐ wài de suǒ yǒu zhī tǐ jí qì guān de dòng mài lǐ
english: The main trunk of the systemic arteries, carrying blood from the left side of the heart to the arteries of all limbs and organs except the lungs.

hanzi: 这位下级行政官员急不可待地想晋升，但他知道只有待某人死后或退休后才能步其后尘，谋取其职。
pinyin: zhè wèi xià jí xíng zhèng guān yuán jí bù kě dài de xiǎng jìn shēng， dàn tā zhī dào zhǐ yǒu dài mǒu rén sǐ hòu huò tuì xiū hòu cái néng bù qí hòu chén， móu qǔ qí zhí。
english: The junior executive was impatient for promotion but knew that he would only get it by stepping into a dead man's shoes.

hanzi: 这场抢劫统共经历了三分钟，因为这伙人争先恐后的爬进汽车，以使人难以置信的速度把汽车开跑了。
pinyin: zhè chǎng qiāng jié tǒng gòng jīng lì le sān fēn zhōng， yīn wèi zhè huǒ rén zhēng xiān kǒng hòu de pá jìn qì chē， yǐ shǐ rén nán yǐ zhì xìn de sù dù bǎ qì chē kāi pǎo le。
english: The raid was all over in three minutes, for the men scrambled back into the car and it moved off at a fantastic speed.

hanzi: 对比染色剂，对照染色剂一种对比颜色的染色剂，用来染制主染色剂染后显不出的显微术标本成分
pinyin: duì bǐ rǎn shǎi jì， duì zhào rǎn shǎi jì yī zhòng duì bǐ yán sè de rǎn shǎi jì， yòng lái rǎn zhì zhǔ rǎn shǎi jì rǎn hòu xiǎn bù chū de xiǎn wēi zhú biāo běn chéng fèn
english: A stain of a contrasting color used to color the components in a microscopic specimen that are not made visible by the principal stain.

hanzi: 长音节的拆分或替换一个韵律元素替代另一个，尤指在数量韵文中用两个短音节替代一个长音节
pinyin: zhǎng yīn jié de chāi fèn huò tì huàn yī gè yùn lu:4 yuán sù tì dài lìng yī gè， yóu zhǐ zài shù liàng yùn wén zhòng yòng liǎng gè duǎn yīn jié tì dài yī gè zhǎng yīn jié
english: The substitution of one metrical unit for another, especially the substitution of two short syllables for one long syllable in quantitative verse.

hanzi: 莫斯科电视为撤军做了广泛的报导，一则苏联电视报导说车队曾受攻击，但是并未提供细节。
pinyin: mò sī kē diàn shì wèi chè jūn zuò le guǎng fàn de bào dǎo， yī zé sū lián diàn shì bào dǎo shuō chē duì zēng shòu gōng jī， dàn shì bìng wèi tí gōng xì jié。
english: Moscow television carried extensive coverage of the pullout. A Soviet television correspondence said the convoy had come under fire but did not provide details.

hanzi: 三色性某些矿物质所具有的特性，当放在白光下从三个不同的方向观察，会呈现出三种不同的颜色
pinyin: sān sè xìng mǒu xiē kuàng wù zhì suǒ jù yǒu de tè xìng， dàng fàng zài bái guāng xià zòng sān gè bù tóng de fāng xiàng guān chá， kuài chéng xiàn chū sān zhòng bù tóng de yán sè
english: The property possessed by certain minerals of exhibiting three different colors when viewed from three different directions under white lights.

hanzi: 新上任的警察局长很快就让人感觉到他不是平庸之辈。他的主张一付诸实施镇里犯罪情况就少多了。
pinyin: xīn shàng rèn de jǐng chá jú zhǎng hěn kuài jiù ràng rén gǎn jué dào tā bú shì píng yōng zhī bèi。 tā de zhǔ zhāng yī fù zhū shí shī zhèn lǐ fàn zuì qíng kuàng jiù shào duō le。
english: The new chief police officer quickly made his presence felt, and there was much less crime in the town after his ideas were put into practice.

hanzi: 敌人就在背后，而前面横跨在深谷之上的桥已经腐朽不堪，摇摇晃晃。他处在两难之中，犹豫了起来。
pinyin: dí rén jiù zài bèi hòu， ér qián mian héng kuà zài shēn gǔ zhī shàng de qiáo yǐ jīng fǔ xiǔ bù kān， yáo yáo huàng huàng。 tā chù zài liǎng nàn zhī zhōng， yóu yù le qǐ lai。
english: His enemy was close behind him, and the bridge over the ravine was rotten and swaying. Caught between the devil and the deep blue sea, he hesitated.

hanzi: 通货紧缩由于可获得货币和信贷的减少，导致消费品价格水平的持续下降或货币购买力的持续提高
pinyin: tōng huò jǐn suō yóu yú kě huò dé huò bì huò xìn dài de jiǎn shǎo， dǎo zhì xiāo fèi pǐn jià gé shuǐ píng de chí xù xià jiàng huò huò bì gòu mǎi lì de chí xù tí gāo
english: A persistent decrease in the level of consumer prices or a persistent increase in the purchasing power of money because of a reduction in available currency and credit.

hanzi: 水冶金术通过液体过程，象过滤，提炼，沉淀等方法处理金属，从矿石中或矿石浓缩物中分离出金属
pinyin: shuǐ yě jīn zhú tōng guò yè tǐ guò chéng， xiàng guò lu:4， tí liàn， chén diàn děng fāng fǎ chǔ lǐ jīn shǔ， zòng kuàng shí zhòng huò kuàng shí nóng suò wù zhòng fēn lí chū jīn shǔ
english: The treatment of metal or the separation of metal from ores and ore concentrates by liquid processes, such as leaching, extraction, and precipitation.

hanzi: 水冶金术通过液体过程，象过滤，提炼，沉淀等方法处理金属，从矿石中或矿石浓缩物中分离出金属
pinyin: shuǐ yě jīn zhú tōng guò yè tǐ guò chéng， xiàng guò lu:4， tí liàn， chén diàn děng fāng fǎ chǔ lǐ jīn shǔ， zòng kuàng shí zhòng huò kuàng shí nóng suò wù zhòng fēn lí chū jīn shǔ
english: The treatment of metal or the separation of metal from ores and ore concentrates by liquid processes, such as leaching, extraction, and precipitation.

hanzi: 重力天体如地球，所施加的自然吸引力，如地球，对处于或接近其表面的物体有将它们拉向其中心的趋势
pinyin: zhòng lì tiān tǐ rú dì qiú， suǒ shī jiā de zì rán xī yǐn lì， rú dì qiú， duì chǔ yú huò jiē jìn qí biǎo miàn de wù tǐ yǒu jiàng tā men lā xiàng qí zhōng xīn de qū shì
english: The natural force of attraction exerted by a celestial body, such as Earth, upon objects at or near its surface, tending to draw them toward the center of the body.

hanzi: 遭遇伊拉克上校的最初片刻，目睹他令士兵在我们面前劫掠我们车里的物件，我们的生命似乎危在旦夕。
pinyin: zāo yù yī lā kè shàng xiào de zuì chū piàn kè， mù dǔ tā lìng shì bīng zài wǒ men miàn qián jié lu:è wǒ men jū lǐ de wù jiàn， wǒ men de shēng mìng sì hu wēi zài dàn xì。
english: For the first few moments, confronted by an Iraqi colonel who had his soldiers loot our vehicle in front of us, it seemed as if our lives hung by a precarious thread.

hanzi: 描述逻辑函数的一种表，表中列出输入值的全部可能组合，并列出与每种输入组合相对应的实际的输出值。
pinyin: miáo shù luó ji hán shù de yī zhòng biǎo， biǎo zhòng liè chū shū rù zhí de quán bù kě néng zǔ hé， bìng liè chū yù měi zhòng shū rù zǔ hé xiāng duì yìng de shí jì de shū chū zhí。
english: A table that describes a logic function by listing all possible combinations of input values and indicating, for each combination, the true output values.

hanzi: 某人能去请求改变判决的民事法院或刑事法院。这两种法院的裁决对高等法院和下级法院全都有拘束力。
pinyin: mǒu rén néng qù qǐng qiú gǎi biàn pàn jué de mín shì fǎ yuàn huò xíng shì fǎ yuàn。 zhè liǎng zhòng fǎ yuàn de cái jué duì gāo děng fǎ yuàn huò xià jí fǎ yuàn quán dōu yǒu jū shù lì。
english: Civil or criminal court to which a person may go to ask for a sentence to be changed and of which the decision be binding on the high court and lower court.

hanzi: 部分能量能以与它主要传播方向相反的方向从一个机械部件传到另一个机械部件，那就是我们所称的反馈。
pinyin: bù fen néng liàng néng yǐ yù tā zhǔ yào chuán bō fāng xiàng xiāng fǎn de fāng xiàng zòng yī gè jī xiè bù jiàn zhuàn dào lìng yī gè jī xiè bù jiàn， nà jiù shì wǒ men suǒ chèng de fǎn kuì。
english: Part of the energy can be transferred from one part of a mechanism to another, in a direction opposite to its main flow. That's what we call feedback.

hanzi: 用暴力威胁侵犯他人身体犯罪行为应与殴打罪区别开来。其区别是，前者是用暴力相威胁而后者是实际上的使用暴力。
pinyin: yòng bào lì wēi xié qīn fàn tā rén shēn tǐ fàn zuì xíng wéi yìng yù ōu dǎ zuì qū bié kāi lái。 qí qū bié shì， qián zhě shì yòng bào lì xiàng wēi xié ér hòu zhě shì shí jì shàng de shǐ yòng bào lì。
english: Assault shall be distinguished from battery, in that assault is the threat of violence, whereas battery is actual violence.

hanzi: 水闸用门关住的水道的一部分，如运河。其中通过升高或降低这部分的水位可以抬升或压低运输中的船只
pinyin: shuǐ zhá yòng mén guān zhù de shuǐ dào de yī bù fen， rú yùn hé。 qí zhōng tōng guò shēng gāo huò jiàng dī zhè bù fen de shuǐ wèi kě yǐ tái shēng huò yā dī yùn shū zhòng dì chuán zhī
english: A section of a waterway, such as a canal, closed off with gates, in which vessels in transit are raised or lowered by raising or lowering the water level of that section.

hanzi: 病人情况危急，因而需要手术，但又无法保证她是否能经受得住麻醉剂，外科医生处于进退两难的境地。
pinyin: bìng rén qíng kuàng wēi jí， yīn ér xū yào shǒu shù， dàn yòu wú fǎ bǎo zhèng tā shì fǒu néng jīng shòu de zhù má zuì jì， wài kē yī shēng chǔ yú jìn tuì liǎng nàn de jìng dì。
english: The patient's condition was critical and she needed an operation but there was no guarantee that she would survive the anaesthetic; the surgeon was on the horns of a dilemma.

hanzi: 切换镜头一种中断电影的主要情节画面的连续性的简短镜头，通常用来描绘相关事件或可能同时发生的情节
pinyin: qiē huàn jìng tóu yī zhòng zhōng duàn diàn yǐng de zhǔ yào qíng jié huà miàn de lián xù xìng de jiǎn duǎn jìng tóu， tōng cháng yòng lái miáo huì xiāng guān shì jiàn huò kě néng tóng shí fā shēng de qíng jié
english: A brief shot that interrupts the visual continuity of the main action of a film, often to depict related matter or supposedly concurrent action.

hanzi: 库存品已经变质，而且全都搞混了，因此经理决定快刀斩乱麻，把它们当作废品出售，然后重新储藏新的物资。
pinyin: kù cún pǐn yǐ jīng biàn zhì， ér qiě quán dōu gǎo hùn le， yīn cǐ jīng lǐ jué dìng kuài dāo zhǎn luàn má， bǎ tā men dàng zuò fèi pǐn chū shòu， rán hòu chóng xīn chǔ cáng xīn de wù zī。
english: The old stock had deteriorated and was all mixed up so the manager decided to cut the Gordian knot, sell it all as scrap, and re-stock with new materials.

hanzi: 库存品已经变质，而且全都搞混了，因此经理决定快刀斩乱麻，把它们当作废品出售，然后重新储藏新的物资。
pinyin: kù cún pǐn yǐ jīng biàn zhì， ér qiě quán dōu gǎo hùn le， yīn cǐ jīng lǐ jué dìng kuài dāo zhǎn luàn má， bǎ tā men dàng zuò fèi pǐn chū shòu， rán hòu chóng xīn chǔ cáng xīn de wù zī。
english: The old stock had deteriorated and was all mixed up so the manager decided to cut the Gordian knot, sell it all as scrap, and re-stock with new materials.

hanzi: 库存品已经变质，而且全都搞混了，因此经理决定快刀斩乱麻，把它们当作废品出售，然后重新储藏新的物资。
pinyin: kù cún pǐn yǐ jīng biàn zhì， ér qiě quán dōu gǎo hùn le， yīn cǐ jīng lǐ jué dìng kuài dāo zhǎn luàn má， bǎ tā men dàng zuò fèi pǐn chū shòu， rán hòu chóng xīn chǔ cáng xīn de wù zī。
english: The old stock had deteriorated and was all mixed up so the manager decided to cut the Gordian knot, sell it all as scrap, and re-stock with new materials.

hanzi: 切换镜头一种中断电影的主要情节画面的连续性的简短镜头，通常用来描绘相关事件或可能同时发生的情节
pinyin: qiē huàn jìng tóu yī zhòng zhōng duàn diàn yǐng de zhǔ yào qíng jié huà miàn de lián xù xìng de jiǎn duǎn jìng tóu， tōng cháng yòng lái miáo huì xiāng guān shì jiàn huò kě néng tóng shí fā shēng de qíng jié
english: A brief shot that interrupts the visual continuity of the main action of a film, often to depict related matter or supposedly concurrent action.

hanzi: 绞车，起货机一种装有卷筒的固定的电动机驱动或手动的吊升机械，卷筒周围缠绕着与提升的重物相连的绳索
pinyin: jiǎo jū， qǐ huò jī yī zhòng zhuāng yǒu juàn tǒng de gù dìng de diàn dòng jī qū dòng huò shǒu dòng de diào shēng jī xiè， juàn tǒng zhōu wéi chán rǎo zhuó yù tí shēng de zhòng wù xiāng lián de shéng suǒ
english: A stationary motor-driven or hand-powered hoisting machine having a drum around which is wound a rope or chain attached to the load being lifted.

hanzi: 当数据从一个设备传送到另一个设备时，用于补偿数据流速率差或事件发生时间差的一种例行程序或存储器。
pinyin: dàng shù jù zòng yī gè shè bèi chuán sòng dào lìng yī gè shè bèi shí， yòng yú bǔ cháng shù jù liú sù lu:4 cī huò shì jiàn fā shēng shí jiān cī de yī zhòng lì xíng chéng xù huò cún chǔ qì。
english: A routine or storage used to compensate for a difference in rate of flow of data, or time of occurrence of events, when transferring data from one device to another.

hanzi: 奇异风格，形状怪诞的图案一种自然的形式和奇异的图形以一种奇异或古怪的方式结合在一起的绘画雕塑和装饰风格
pinyin: qí yì fēng gé， xíng zhuàng guài dàn de tú àn yī zhòng zì rán de xíng shì huò qí yì de tú xíng yǐ yī zhòng qí yì huò gǔ guài de fāng shì jié hé zài yī qǐ de huì huà diāo sù huò zhuāng shì fēng gé
english: A style of painting, sculpture, and ornamentation in which natural forms and monstrous figures are intertwined in bizarre or fanciful combinations.

hanzi: 最近几个月，泰恩经历了一系列失败的捕捞，老板对他非常不满，于是他决定在捕鱼季节结束前再一次出海。
pinyin: zuì jìn jǐ ge yuè， tài ēn jīng lì le yī xì liè shī bài de bǔ lāo， lǎo bǎn duì tā fēi cháng bù mǎn， yú shì tā jué dìng zài bǔ yú jì jié jié shù qián zài yī cì chū hǎi。
english: For several months Tyne has had a run of disappointing catches, and his boss was quite dissatisfied with him. So he decides to make one more trip before the end of the fishing season.

hanzi: 如果这种婚姻出自一个女人的自愿选择，甚至是不顾亲友的劝告而选择的，那么就让她自己去品尝这枚果实的滋味吧。
pinyin: rú guǒ zhè zhǒng hūn yīn chū zì yī gè nu:3 rén de zì yuàn xuǎn zé， shèn zhì shì bù gù qīn yǒu de quàn gào ér xuǎn zé de， nà me jiù ràng tā zì jǐ qù pǐn cháng zhè méi guǒ shí de zī wèi ba。
english: But this never fails, if the bad husbands were of their own choosing, against their friends consent; for then they will be sure to make good their own folly.

hanzi: 路易斯制造的局面使得该政府首脑不仅能够在竞选中弄虚作假，而且还可以肆意侵吞联邦公款，除掉可能的竞争对手。
pinyin: Lù yì sī zhì zào de jú miàn shǐ de gāi zhèng fǔ shǒu nǎo bù jǐn néng gòu zài jìng xuǎn zhòng nòng xū zuò jià， ér qiě huán kě yǐ sì yì qīn tūn lián bāng gōng kuǎn， chú diào kě néng de jìng zhēng duì shǒu。
english: Lewis had created a situation whereby it was possible for the man at the top to fiddle elections, embezzle union funds and do away with potential rivals.

hanzi: 一种能动态重新安排存储器的处理技术，即把各连续已用的存储段移到存储器的一端，把未使用的存储空间集中到存储器的另一端。
pinyin: yī zhòng néng dòng tài chóng xīn ān pái cún chǔ qì de chǔ lǐ jì shù， jí bǎ gè lián xù yǐ yòng de cún chǔ duàn yí dào cún chǔ qì de yī duān， bǎ wèi shǐ yòng de cún chǔ kōng jiān jí zhōng dào cún chǔ qì de lìng yī duān。
english: A process of dynamic relocation in which contiguous segments are moved to one end of the memory to combine all unused storage at the other end.

hanzi: 磁控管一种微波管，它里面的发热阴极发出的电子受到磁场和电场的影响，从而产生能用于雷达和微波炉微波辐射
pinyin: cí kòng guǎn yī zhòng wēi bō guǎn， tā lǐ miàn de fā rè yīn jí fā chū de diàn zǐ shòu dào cí chǎng huò diàn cháng de yǐng xiǎng， cóng ér chǎn shēng néng yòng yú léi dá huò wēi bō lú wēi bō fú shè
english: A microwave tube in which electrons generated from a heated cathode are affected by magnetic and electric fields in such a way as to produce microwave radiation used in radar and in microwave ovens.

hanzi: 比尔的母亲为比尔所属的俱乐部会员们准备热狗当点心，汤姆的母亲因此说她要招待得更好，除了给你们热狗外，另再加冰淇淋。
pinyin: Bǐ ěr de mǔ qīn wèi Bǐ ěr suǒ shǔ de jù yuè bù huì yuán men zhǔn bèi rè gǒu dàng diǎn xīn， tāng mǔ de mǔ qīn yīn cǐ shuō tā yào zhāo dài de gèng hǎo， chú le jǐ nǐ men rè gǒu wài， lìng zài jiā bīng qí lìn。
english: Bill's mother gave the boys in Bill's club hot dogs for refreshments, so Tom's mother said that she would go her on better next time by giving them ho dogs and icecream.

hanzi: 中立船证由联盟的外国政府颁发给船只的一种官方文件，尤指战时授权中立商船在特定水城内自由进出和航行的文件
pinyin: zhōng lì chuán zhèng yóu lián méng de wài guó zhèng fǔ bān fā jǐ chuán zhī de yī zhòng guān fāng wén jiàn， yóu zhǐ zhàn shí shòu quán zhōng lì shāng chuán zài tè dìng Shuǐ chéng nèi zì yóu jìn chū huò háng xíng de wén jiàn
english: An official document issued by an allied foreign government to a ship, especially a neutral merchant ship in time of war, authorizing it to enter and travel through certain waters freely.

hanzi: 中立船证由联盟的外国政府颁发给船只的一种官方文件，尤指战时授权中立商船在特定水城内自由进出和航行的文件
pinyin: zhōng lì chuán zhèng yóu lián méng de wài guó zhèng fǔ bān fā jǐ chuán zhī de yī zhòng guān fāng wén jiàn， yóu zhǐ zhàn shí shòu quán zhōng lì shāng chuán zài tè dìng Shuǐ chéng nèi zì yóu jìn chū huò háng xíng de wén jiàn
english: An official document issued by an allied foreign government to a ship, especially a neutral merchant ship in time of war, authorizing it to enter and travel through certain waters freely.

hanzi: 哈吉司羊肉一种苏格兰菜，由绵羊或牛切碎的心，肺，肝与板油，洋葱，燕麦片和调味料混合在被屠宰动物的腹中煮熟而成
pinyin: hǎ jí sī yáng ròu yī zhòng sū gé lán cài， yóu mián yáng huò niú qiè suì de xīn， fèi， gān yù bǎn yóu， yáng cōng， yān mài piàn huò tiáo wèi liào hùn hé zài bèi tú zǎi dòng wù de fù zhòng zhǔ shóu ér chéng
english: A Scottish dish consisting of a mixture of the minced heart, lungs, and liver of a sheep or calf mixed with suet, onions, oatmeal, and seasonings and boiled in the stomach of the slaughtered animal.

hanzi: 这是一个应该避免使用的非正式术语。该术语有时用于一种逻辑元件，这种逻辑元件可以实现特定的功能或在变量之间提供链接。
pinyin: zhè shì yī gè yīng gāi bì miǎn shǐ yòng de fēi zhèng shì shù yǔ。 gāi shù yǔ yǒu shí yòng yú yī zhòng luó ji yuán jiàn， zhè zhǒng luó ji yuán jiàn kě yǐ shí xiàn tè dìng de gōng néng huò zài biàn liàng zhī jiān tí gōng liàn jiē。
english: An improper term to be avoided. This term is sometimes used to designate a logic element which performs a specific function or provides a linkage between variables.

hanzi: 当飞机上的灯一下子熄灭时，旅客显得很紧张，但当机长告诉他们这只不过是一次电气故障，很快就会修好时，他们才放下心来。
pinyin: dàng fēi jī shàng de dēng yí xià zi xī miè shí， lu:3 kè xiǎn de hěn jǐn zhāng， dàn dàng jī zhǎng gào su tā men zhè zhǐ bù guò shì yī cì diàn qì gù zhàng， hěn kuài jiù kuài xiū hào shí， tā men cái fàng xia xīn lái。
english: The passengers became alarmed when the lights went out on the plane, but the captain put their minds at rest when he told them it was only a minor electrical fault and it would soon be repaired.

hanzi: 在数据保密学中，通过合法访问数据的进程将数据传输给未授权的用户的过程。例如，编译程序在编译期间便可能泄漏专用程序。
pinyin: zài shù jù bǎo mì xué zhòng， tōng guò hé fǎ fǎng wèn shù jù de jìn chéng jiàng shù jù chuán shū jǐ wèi shòu quán de yòng hù de guò chéng。 lì rú， biān yì chéng xù zài biān yì qī jiān pián kě néng xiè lòu zhuān yòng chéng xù。
english: In data security, the transmission of data to unauthorized users by processes with legitimate access to data. A compiler, for example, could leak a proprietary program whilst it is being compiled.

hanzi: 祝福夫君生日快乐，你给流逝的岁月增添了醉人的情意，你让平凡的事情发出耀眼的光芒，感谢你已成为我生命中特别重要的一部分。
pinyin: zhù fú fū jūn shēng rì kuài lè， nǐ jǐ liú shì de suì yuè zēng tiān le zuì rén de qíng yì， nǐ ràng píng fán de shì qing fā chū yào yǎn de guāng máng， gǎn xiè nǐ yǐ chéng wéi wǒ shēng mìng zhòng tè bié zhòng yào de yī bù fen。
english: Happy birthday to my dear husband. You add a special happiness to days that come and go. You give an extra sparkle to the ordinary things. It's so nice to have you being a special part of my life.

hanzi: 鉴别器，鉴频器一种将输入信号的某一特征，如频率或相位转变为幅度变化装置，其变化大小因信号与标准或参考信号的不同程度而异
pinyin: jiàn bié qì， jiàn pín qì yī zhòng jiàng shū rù xìn hào de mǒu yī tè zhēng， rú pín lu:4 huò xiàng wèi zhuǎn biàn wèi fú dù biàn huà zhuāng zhì， qí biàn huà dà xiǎo yīn xìn hào yù biāo zhǔn huò cān kǎo xìn hào de bù tóng chéng dù ér yì
english: A device that converts a property of an input signal, such as frequency or phase, into an amplitude variation, depending on how the signal differs from a standard or reference signal.

hanzi: 犁一种农具，由在一根横梁端部的厚重的刃构成，通常系在一组牵引它的牲畜或机动车上，用来破碎土块并耕出槽沟从而为播种做好准备
pinyin: lí yī zhòng nóng jù， yóu zài yī gēn héng liáng duān bù de hòu zhòng de rèn gòu chéng， tōng cháng xì zài yī zǔ qiān yǐn tā de shēng chù huò jī dòng chē shàng， yòng lái pò suì tǔ kuài bìng gēng chū cáo gōu cóng ér wèi bō zhǒng zuò hào zhǔn bèi
english: A farm implement consisting of a heavy blade at the end of a beam, usually hitched to a draft team or motor vehicle and used for breaking up soil and cutting furrows in preparation for sowing.

hanzi: 饮食失常一种饮食无序，在这种情况下，一个人常常处于不正常的贪食和厌食的交替状态，特点是偶尔的暴饮暴食继而又很快的引起呕吐或腹泻
pinyin: yǐn shí shī cháng yī zhòng yǐn shí wú xù， zài zhè zhǒng qíng kuàng xià， yī gè rén cháng cháng chǔ yú bù zhèng cháng de tān sì huò yàn shí de jiāo tì zhuàng tài， tè diǎn shì ǒu ěr de bào yǐn bào sì jì ér yòu hěn kuài de yǐn qǐ ǒu tù huò fù xiè
english: An eating disorder in which one alternates between abnormal craving for and aversion to food. It is characterized by episodes of excessive food intake followed by periods of fasting and self-induced vomiting or diarrhea.

hanzi: 也许最重要的是，这些选举将使大众认识新面孔，尤其是来自反对党阵营的。这样投石问路将会测如候选人的影响力，建立知名度，并过滤问题。
pinyin: yě xǔ zuì zhòng yào de shì， zhè xie xuǎn jǔ jiàng shǐ dà zhòng rèn shi xīn miàn kǒng， yóu qí shì lái zì fǎn duì dǎng zhèn yíng de。 zhè yàng tóu shí wèn lù jiāng huì cè rú hòu xuǎn rén de yǐng xiǎng lì， jiàn lì zhī míng dù， bìng guò lu:4 wèn tí。
english: Perhaps most important, these elections will put new faces before the public, especially from the opposition camp. This testing of the waters will measure the impact of the candidates, build name recognition and sift the issues.

hanzi: 分析家说，通过影艺公司向哈考特提出的优厚条件似乎颇有成功的希望，并应可解除这家困难重重的出版商的庞大债务负荷，而使基本上健全的营业得到生机。
pinyin: fēn xī jiā shuō， tōng guò yǐng yì gōng sī xiàng hǎ kǎo tè tí chū de yōu hòu tiáo jiàn sì hu pō yǒu chéng gōng de xī wàng， bìng yìng kě jiě chú zhè jiā kùn nan chóng chóng de chū bǎn shāng de páng dà zhài wù fù hé， ér shǐ jī běn shang jiàn quán de yíng yè dé dào shēng jī。
english: A sweetened offer for Harcourt by General Cinema appears to have a good chance of success, analysts said, and should give the troubled publisher a new lease on life by freeing its basically sound businesses from the burden of overwhelming debt.

hanzi: 尽管有大量的宗教派别，研究美国宗教惯常做法的学者发现，在许多情况下，许多新教教派之间在信仰方面并没有多大的不同，只是在仪式方面有较小的差异。
pinyin: jǐn guǎn yǒu dà liàng de zōng jiào pài bié， yán jiū Měi guó zōng jiào guàn cháng zuò fǎ de xué zhě fā xiàn， zài xǔ duō qíng kuàng xià， xǔ duō xīn jiào jiào pài zhī jiān zài xìn yǎng fāng miàn bìng méi yǒu duō dà de bù tóng， zhǐ shì zài yí shì fāng miàn yǒu jiào xiǎo de chā yì。
english: In spite of the great number of denominations, students of religious practice in the United State find that in many cases there are no major differences in belief, and only minor ones in ritual between many of the Protestant denominations.

hanzi: 因此，看起来政治家们取得了胜利。我惟一的想法是，他们为此付出了惨重的代价，未免得不偿失。世界上其他任何一个国家的政治家之间的分歧都没有这里的政治家之间的分歧那么大，那么公开。
pinyin: yīn cǐ， kàn qǐ lai zhèng zhì jiā men qǔ dé le shèng lì。 wǒ wéi yī de xiǎng fǎ shì， tā men wèi cǐ fù chū le cǎn zhòng de dài jià， wèi miǎn de bù cháng shī。 shì jiè shàng qí tā rèn hé yī gè guó jiā de zhèng zhì jiā zhī jiān de fēn qí dōu méi yǒu zhè lǐ de zhèng zhì jiā zhī jiān de fēn qí nà me dà， nà me gōng kāi。
english: So it looks as it the politicians have won. My only point is that it has been a Pyrrhic victory. In no country in the world are politicians held in greater or more open division than they are here.

hanzi: 日本公司有能力在发展与生产方面，较美国公司投资为多，是他们在半导体方面占上风的一个主要原因。现在，英泰尔计划在经济不景气时大量投资以压倒弱小竞争者。
pinyin: Rì běn gōng sī yǒu néng lì zài fā zhǎn yù shēng chǎn fāng miàn， jiào Měi guó gōng sī tóu zī wèi duō， shì tā men zài bàn dǎo tǐ fāng miàn zhàn shàng fēng de yī gè zhǔ yào yuán yīn。 xiàn zài， yīng Tài ěr jì huà zài jīng jì bù jǐng qì shí dà liàng tóu zī yǐ yā dǎo ruò xiǎo jìng zhēng zhě。
english: The ability to outspend American companies on development and production has been a big reason Japanese companies have made gains in the semi-conductor business. Now Intel plans to borrow a page from the Japanese by spending heavily through a recession to gain ground on weaker competitors.

hanzi: 以低于信号中最高频率两倍的频率进行信号取样时出现的一种效应，即当由取样状态还原时，还原后的信号将不再含有原来信号中的高频成分，并将显示出虚假的低频信号。
pinyin: yǐ dī yú xìn hào zhòng zuì gāo pín lu:4 liǎng bèi de pín lu:4 jìn xíng xìn hào qǔ yàng shí chū xiàn de yī zhòng xiào yìng， jí dàng yóu qǔ yàng zhuàng tài huán yuán shí， huán yuán hòu de xìn hào jiàng bù zài hán yǒu yuán lái xìn hào zhòng dì gāo pín chéng fèn， bìng jiàng xiǎn shì chū xū jiǎ de dī pín xìn hào。
english: An effect that occurs when a signal is sampled at a rate less than twice the highest frequency present in the signal.The subsequent signal recovered from the samples will not contain the high frequency component of the original signal and will display a false low frequency signal.

hanzi: 在远程通信系统中，当报文发往的工作站处于不工作状态时控制站所采取的行动，即接收并存储该报文直到该工作站恢复工作时，再由控制站将报文送给它。在报文交换系统中，控制站可以是一台计算机。
pinyin: zài yuǎn chéng tōng xìn xì tǒng zhòng， dàng bào wén fà wàng de gōng zuò zhàn chǔ yú bù gōng zuò zhuàng tài shí kòng zhì zhàn suǒ cǎi qǔ de xíng dòng， jí jiē shōu bìng cún chǔ gāi bào wén zhí dào gāi gōng zuò zhàn huī fù gōng zuò shí， zài yóu kòng zhì zhàn jiàng bào wén sòng jǐ tā。 zài bào wén jiāo huàn xì tǒng zhòng， kòng zhì zhàn kě yǐ shì yī tái jì suàn jī。
english: In a remote communication system, the action taken by a control station whereby messages addressed to an inoperative station are accepted and stored at the control station until they can be sent to the destination station. The control station may be a computer in a message switching system.

hanzi: 你这个叛徒！
pinyin: nǐ zhè gè pàn tú！
english: You Judas!

hanzi: 他多么和气！
pinyin: tā duō me hé qi！
english: How kind he is!

hanzi: 谁在敲鼓?
pinyin: shéi zài qiāo gǔ?
english: Who's beating the drum?

hanzi: 誓言的迸发
pinyin: shì yán de bèng fà
english: A volley of oaths.

hanzi: 我的宝贝儿!
pinyin: wǒ de bǎo bèi er!
english: My dearest treasure!

hanzi: 别那麽窝囊!
pinyin: biè nà mó wō nang!
english: Don't be such a wimp!

hanzi: 蝌蚪有尾巴。
pinyin: kē dǒu yǒu wěi ba。
english: A tadpole has a tail.

hanzi: 你流鼻涕了!
pinyin: nǐ liú bí tì le!
english: You've got a runny nose!

hanzi: 别这么固执！
pinyin: biè zhè me gù zhí！
english: Don't be so obstinate!

hanzi: 她是小宝贝!
pinyin: tā shì xiǎo bǎo bèi!
english: She's a little darling!

hanzi: 让碟子控乾.
pinyin: ràng dié zi kòng qián.
english: Leave the dishes to drain.

hanzi: 老太婆、老妪
pinyin: lǎo tài pó、 lǎo yù
english: An old woman; a crone.

hanzi: 动物能思考吗?
pinyin: dòng wù néng sī kǎo ma?
english: Are animals able to think?

hanzi: 愿您早日康复！
pinyin: yuàn nín zǎo rì kāng fù！
english: May you recover soon!

hanzi: 再见, 多保重!
pinyin: zài jiàn,  duō bǎo zhòng!
english: Good bye, and take care!

hanzi: 她把椰子劈开了.
pinyin: tā bǎ椰 zi pǐ kāi le.
english: She split open the coconut.

hanzi: 杏仁能吃吗？
pinyin: xìng rén néng jí ma？
english: Are kernels of apricots edible?

hanzi: 注意，油漆未干!
pinyin: zhù yì， yóu qī wèi gàn!
english: Mind the wet paint!

hanzi: 你看到彩虹了吗？
pinyin: nǐ kàn dào cǎi hóng le ma？
english: Do you see rainbow?

hanzi: 请勿践踏草坪。
pinyin: qǐng wù jiàn tà cǎo píng。
english: Keep off the grass.

hanzi: 愿您早日康复！
pinyin: yuàn nín zǎo rì kāng fù！
english: May you recover soon!

hanzi: 发愁於事无补.
pinyin: fā chóu yū shì wú bǔ.
english: Fretting about it won't help.

hanzi: 爆竹啪啪地响。
pinyin: bào zhú pā pā de xiǎng。
english: The firecrackers popped.

hanzi: 事情进行得如何？
pinyin: shì qing jìn xíng de rú hé？
english: How are things going?

hanzi: 溪流十分清澈。
pinyin: xī liú shí fēn qīng chè。
english: The stream is very limpid.

hanzi: 他可不是正人君子!
pinyin: tā kě bú shì zhèng rén jūn zi!
english: He's no gentleman!

hanzi: 卢·格里克打一垒
pinyin: lú· gé lǐ kè dǎ yī lěi
english: Lou Gehrig played first base.

hanzi: 大宝贝, 别哭了!
pinyin: Dà bǎo bèi,  biè kū le!
english: Stop blubbering, you big baby!

hanzi: 多麽荒谬的念头!
pinyin: duō mó huāng miù de niàn tou!
english: What a ridiculous idea!

hanzi: 那纯粹是捏造的!
pinyin: nà chún cuì shì niē zào de!
english: That's pure fabrication!

hanzi: 桨喀吧一声断了.
pinyin: jiǎng kā ba yī shēng duàn le.
english: The oar broke with a snap.

hanzi: 多麽荒谬的念头!
pinyin: duō mó huāng miù de niàn tou!
english: What a ridiculous idea!

hanzi: 真是个愚蠢的白痴!
pinyin: zhēn shì gè yú chǔn de bái chī!
english: What a stupid idiot!

hanzi: 那孩子真丢人!
pinyin: nà hái zi zhēn diū rén!
english: What a performance the child made!

hanzi: 桃花蓓蕾枯萎了。
pinyin: táo huā bèi lěi kū wěi le。
english: The peach buds aborted.

hanzi: 钝剪刀剪不齐.
pinyin: dùn jiǎn dāo jiǎn bù qí.
english: Blunt scissors don't cut cleanly.

hanzi: 不协调的；不和谐的
pinyin: bù xié tiáo de； bù hé xié de
english: Lacking in harmony.

hanzi: 不协调的；不和谐的
pinyin: bù xié tiáo de； bù hé xié de
english: Lacking in harmony.

hanzi: 你这个幸运的家伙！
pinyin: nǐ zhè gè xìng yùn de jiā huo！
english: You lucky rascal!

hanzi: 我们打棒球如何？
pinyin: wǒ men dǎ bàng qiú rú hé？
english: Suppose we play baseball.

hanzi: 【谚】傻子有傻福。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 shǎ zi yǒu shǎ fú。
english: Fortune favours fools.

hanzi: 你会开车床吗?
pinyin: nǐ kuài kāi chē chuáng ma?
english: Do you know how to work a lathe?

hanzi: 这卡片有什么用?
pinyin: zhè kǎ piàn yǒu shén me yòng?
english: What's this card good for?

hanzi: 局势真惊人哪!
pinyin: jú shì zhēn jīng rén něi!
english: What a shocking state of affairs!

hanzi: 这故事的结局如何?
pinyin: zhè gù shì de jié jú rú hé?
english: How does this story end?

hanzi: 马上报告校长!
pinyin: mǎ shàng bào gào xiào zhǎng!
english: Report to the Head immediately!

hanzi: 你怎么可以这样说？
pinyin: nǐ zěn me kě yǐ zhè yàng shuō？
english: How can you say that?

hanzi: 约翰攻读物理学。
pinyin: Yuē hàn gōng dú wù lǐ xué。
english: John reads up on physics.

hanzi: 危险! 正在爆破!
pinyin: wēi xiǎn!  zhèng zài bào pò!
english: Danger! Blasting in progress!

hanzi: 他殷勤地侍候她。
pinyin: tā yīn qín de shì hòu tā。
english: He danced attendance on her.

hanzi: 【谚】傻子有傻福。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 shǎ zi yǒu shǎ fú。
english: Fortune favours fools.

hanzi: 小心那个台阶!
pinyin: xiǎo xīn nèi gè tái jiē!
english: Mind (ie Don't trip over) that step!

hanzi: 吸烟有害於健康.
pinyin: xī yān yǒu hài yū jiàn kāng.
english: Smoking damages your health.

hanzi: 你喜欢不喜欢烹调?
pinyin: nǐ xǐ huan bù xǐ huan pēng tiáo?
english: Do you go for cooking?

hanzi: 外面飓风呼啸著.
pinyin: wài mian jù fēng hū xiào著.
english: The hurricane screamed outside.

hanzi: 你想耍心眼儿吗?
pinyin: nǐ xiǎng shuǎ xīn yǎn er ma?
english: Are you trying to be clever?

hanzi: 你去过故宫吗？
pinyin: nǐ qù guò gù gōng ma？
english: Have you been to the Imperial Palace?

hanzi: 道路[通道]畅通吗?
pinyin: dào lù[ tōng dào] chàng tōng ma?
english: Is the way/passage free?

hanzi: 你这个该死的大笨蛋!
pinyin: nǐ zhè gè gāi sǐ de dà bèn dàn!
english: You frigging idiot!

pinyin: yǒu bàn shù wèi shù bù duì zài zhí qín.

hanzi: 有半数卫戍部队在执勤.
pinyin: yǒu bàn shù wèi shù bù duì zài zhí qín.
english: Half the garrison is/are on duty.

pinyin: tā zòng zhī jia lǐ tī diào wū gòu.
english: She cleaned the dirt from her finger-nails.

english: The Queen was crowned with much ceremony.

pinyin: nǐ de qì chē shàng yǒu bèi yòng jū lún ma?

english: Most people abhor cruelty to children.

english: The head of state was deposed by the army.

english: She pasted the pictures into a scrapbook.

pinyin: něi wèi fǎ guān（ jiàng） shěn lǐ zhè àn jiàn?

english: A woman who practices sorcery; a witch.

hanzi: 我怎麽能报答你的恩惠呢?
pinyin: wǒ zěn mó néng bào dá nǐ de ēn huì ne?
english: How can I ever repay (you for) your kindness?

english: He is a tramp in shabby old clothes.

pinyin: dù chuán yū yī diǎn zhōng kāi wàng fǎ guó.
english: The ferry leaves for France at one o'clock.

pinyin: tā xǐ huan xuàn yào tā de jīng měi yī fu。
english: She likes to show off her fine clothes.

pinyin: rén jiān ruò yǒu tiān táng,  fēi cǐ mò zhǔ!

english: The boy bent over to be caned.

english: What associations does the sea have for you?

pinyin: nǐ shì nán zǐ hàn hái shì dǎn xiǎo guǐ?
english: Are you a man or a mouse (ie brave or cowardly)?

pinyin: kuài diǎn ba,  nǐ men zhè yī duì ēn ài qíng lu:3!
english: Come along, you two love-birds!

english: What are you burrowing around in my drawer for?

english: I can vouch for him/his honesty.

pinyin: wǒ xǐ huan jú zi gèng shèn yú xǐ huan níng méng。
english: I like orange more than lemon.

english: There are thousands of awnings on the sea beach.

pinyin: nǐ cóng qián kàn guò zhè chū bā lěi wǔ jù ma?
english: Have you seenthis ballet before?

pinyin: mìng zhòng zhù dìng tā de sǐ yū pín kùn.
english: Fate had ordained that he should die in poverty.

english: All his promises were snares and delusions.

pinyin: mǐ kāi lǎng qí luó zài dà lǐ shí shàng diāo kè.
english: Michelangelo carved in marble.

pinyin: yīng wǔ luó shì zhòng xiǎo xíng hǎi yáng dòng wù。
english: Nautilus is a small sea animal.

english: After the fire, very little remained of my house.

english: They had little desire for wealth/to get rich.

pinyin: tā men duì cái fù[ zhì fù] wú dà yù wàng.
english: They had little desire for wealth/to get rich.

english: Tax official: This is the foreign tax bureau.

hanzi: 他们对财富[致富]无大欲望.
pinyin: tā men duì cái fù[ zhì fù] wú dà yù wàng.
english: They had little desire for wealth/to get rich.

english: A profit obtained from an investment; a return.

pinyin: nǐ shì nà mó xiǎng de ma?  chún cuì shì cuò jué!
english: You think that, do you? Pure illusion!

english: She's a (fully) ,paid-up member of the party.

english: Should public transport be subsidized?

pinyin: shòu nu:è dài ér tóng jí pèi ǒu de biàn hù rén
english: Advocates for abused children and spouses.

english: Her face was dark in the shadowy place.

pinyin: zhè jiāo juān shì cǎi sè de hái shì hēi bái de?
english: Is the film in colour or black and white?

english: We may purge water by distillation.

english: An old jeep is putter along the road.

english: Do you accept foreign exchange certificate?

english: `Pass water' is a euphemism for `urinate'.

pinyin: tā de shōu rù yǒu duō shao xū nà suǒ dé shuì?
english: What percentage of his income is taxable?

pinyin: jīn yīng zhǎng zhuó hēi huáng de yǔ máo。
english: An oriole is a bird which has black and yellow feathers.

pinyin: xīn wén jì zhě yìng bù yīng gāi yǒu diǎn rén qíng wèi？

pinyin: nà chuán zài bào fēng yǔ jiǎn ruò後 qǐ háng le.
english: The ship sailed when the storm had abated.

pinyin: bó cí wǎ nà de zhǔ yào shū chū pǐn shì shí mó?
english: What are the chief exports of Botswana?

english: Marilyn wanted to be loved, not lionized.

pinyin: xiān bǎ de píng zhěng hào zài zhí cǎo píng.
english: The ground should be levelled before you plant a lawn.

pinyin: cí ài de guān huái； wēn hé rén cí de xīn líng
english: A kindly interest; a gentle, kindly soul.

english: She spoke about her fears with complete frankness.

pinyin: cí ài de guān huái； wēn hé rén cí de xīn líng
english: A kindly interest; a gentle, kindly soul.

english: December is the last month of the year.

english: He stretched the rubber band till it snapped.

pinyin: tā de liǎn shàng yǒu bǎo jīng kǔ nàn de lào yìn。
english: His face bears the stamp of suffering.

hanzi: 小羊羔在田野里跳跃嬉戏。
pinyin: xiǎo yáng gāo zài tián yě lǐ tiào yuè xī xì。
english: The lambs were capering about in the fields.

hanzi: 博茨瓦纳的主要输出品是什麽?
pinyin: bó cí wǎ nà de zhǔ yào shū chū pǐn shì shí mó?
english: What are the chief exports of Botswana?

hanzi: 这场火灾应该追究谁的责任?
pinyin: zhè chǎng huǒ zāi yīng gāi zhuī jiū shéi de zé rèn?
english: Who is to blame for starting the fire?

hanzi: 造反的人经大赦释放回家.
pinyin: zào fǎn de rén jīng dà shè shì fàng huí jiā.
english: The rebels returned home under a general amnesty.

hanzi: 她手臂上有一块显眼的伤痕.
pinyin: tā shǒu bei shàng yǒu yī kuài xiǎn yǎn de shāng hén.
english: She had a dilly of a bruise on her arm.

hanzi: 我们近期的信件卷宗在哪里?
pinyin: wǒ men jìn qī de xìn jiàn juàn zōng zài nǎ li?
english: Where's the file of our recent correspondence?

hanzi: 工厂关闭後工人失业了.
pinyin: gōng chǎng guān bì後 gōng rén shī yè le.
english: The workshop has shut down and the workers are unemployed.

hanzi: 我就是这个时侯被教会思考的。
pinyin: wǒ jiù shì zhè gè shí hóu bèi jiào huì sī kǎo de。
english: That was when I was taught to think.

hanzi: 是什麽促使你推测出这样的结论?
pinyin: shì shí mó cù shǐ nǐ tuī cè chū zhè yàng de jié lùn?
english: What made you conjecture that?

hanzi: 他们一个个都跑了, 把我撇下了!
pinyin: tā men yī gè gè dōu pǎo le,  bǎ wǒ piě xià le!
english: Every man jack of them ran off and left me!

hanzi: 烛光在日光下显得很黯淡。
pinyin: zhú guāng zài rì guāng xià xiǎn de hěn àn dàn。
english: The light of a candle is dimmed by sunlight.

hanzi: 他们最後毅然决定结婚.
pinyin: tā men zuì後 yì rán jué dìng jié hūn.
english: They have finally decided to take the plunge and get married.

hanzi: 深奥知识、感情或意义的深处
pinyin: shēn ào zhī shi、 gǎn qíng huò yì yì de shēn chù
english: Depth of intellect, feeling, or meaning.

hanzi: 珊瑚是由某些水螅体构成的.
pinyin: shān hú shì yóu mǒu xiē shuǐ xī tǐ gòu chéng de.
english: Coral is formed by certain types of polyp.

hanzi: 短暂的时尚：流行一时的狂热
pinyin: duǎn zàn de shí shàng： liú xíng yī shí de kuáng rè
english: A short-lived popular fashion; a fad.

hanzi: 洋葱的味道一直都不散，是吗？
pinyin: yáng cōng de wèi dao yī zhí dōu bù sàn， shì ma？
english: The smell of onions clings, doesn't it?

hanzi: 我们近期的信件卷宗在哪里?
pinyin: wǒ men jìn qī de xìn jiàn juàn zōng zài nǎ li?
english: Where's the file of our recent correspondence?

hanzi: 他在品德[名誉]上毫无瑕疵.
pinyin: tā zài pǐn dé[ míng yù] shàng háo wú xiá cī.
english: His character/reputation is without (a) blemish.

hanzi: 玛丽和我隔着花园篱笆交谈。
pinyin: Mǎ lì huò wǒ gé zhuó huā yuán lí bā jiāo tán。
english: Mary talked with me across the garden fence.

hanzi: 您想买进口的还是国产的？
pinyin: nín xiǎng mǎi jìn kǒu de hái shì guó chǎn de？
english: Do you want an import brand or a home-make one?

hanzi: 承办殡葬者准备埋葬尸体。
pinyin: chéng bàn bìn zàng zhě zhǔn bèi mái zàng shī tǐ。
english: The corpse was laid out by the undertaker.

hanzi: 这艘船运行多佛--加莱航线.
pinyin: zhè sōu chuán yùn xíng Duō fó-- jiā lái háng xiàn.
english: The boat operates on the Dover-Calais run.

hanzi: 斯克鲁奇是多麽可恶的吝啬鬼呀!
pinyin: sī kè lǔ qí shì duō mó kě wù de lìn sè guǐ ya!
english: What a miserable old devil Scrooge was!

hanzi: 鞍马是很难掌握的器械.
pinyin: ān mǎ shì hěn nàn zhǎng wò de qì xiè.
english: The vaulting horse is a difficult piece of apparatus to master.

hanzi: 亨利英勇奋战，可是打败了。
pinyin: Hēng lì yīng yǒng fèn zhàn， kě shì dǎ bài le。
english: Henry put up a good fight, but was beaten.

hanzi: 碳精棒常用于电弧灯。
pinyin: tàn jīng bàng cháng yòng yú diàn hú dēng。
english: The stick of carbon is often used in an electric arc lamp.

hanzi: 他煽动其他的男孩子调皮捣蛋。
pinyin: tā shān dòng qí tā de nán hái zǐ tiáo pí dǎo dàn。
english: He stirred the other boys to mischief.

hanzi: 那场旱灾过後疾病丛生.
pinyin: nà chǎng hàn zāi guò後 jí bìng cóng shēng.
english: Outbreaks of disease occurred in the wake of the drought.

hanzi: 教授心不在焉地沿途瞎遛.
pinyin: jiào shòu xīn bù zài yān de yán tú xiā liù.
english: The professor bumbled absent-mindedly along the road.

hanzi: 他的所作所为皆取决於一己之利.
pinyin: tā de suǒ zuò suǒ wèi jiē qǔ jué yū yī jǐ zhī lì.
english: Self-interest governs all his actions.

hanzi: 胸脯其它哺乳动物的相应器官
pinyin: xiōng pú qí tā bǔ rǔ dòng wù de xiāng yìng qì guān
english: A corresponding organ in other mammals.

hanzi: 这使他完全茫然（而语塞）了.
pinyin: zhè shǐ tā wán quán máng rán（ ér yù sè） le.
english: It left him at a complete loss (for words).

hanzi: 敌人从四面八方（向我们）逼近.
pinyin: dí rén zòng sì miàn bā fāng（ xiàng wǒ men） bī jìn.
english: The enemy is closing in (on us).

hanzi: 他摔倒时, 额头磕著了（墙）.
pinyin: tā shuāi dǎo shí,  é tóu kē著 le（ qiáng）.
english: He hit his forehead (against the wall) as he fell.

hanzi: 他当初刚到伦敦时很孤单.
pinyin: tā dāng chū gāng dào lún dūn shí hěn gū dān.
english: He was very lonely at first when he moved to London.

hanzi: “三思而后行”是我的座右铭。
pinyin: “ sān sī ér hòu xìng” shì wǒ de zuò yòu míng。
english: "Think before you act" is my motto.

hanzi: 税务局负责徵收所得税.
pinyin: shuì wù jú fù zé zhēng shōu suǒ dé shuì.
english: The Inland Revenue is responsible for collecting income tax.

hanzi: 这意外的失败犹如晴天霹雳。
pinyin: zhè yì wài de shī bài yóu rú qíng tiān pī lì。
english: The unexpected defeat came as a thunderbolt.

hanzi: 囚犯绝望地乱抓牢房的门.
pinyin: qiú fàn jué wàng de luàn zhuā láo fáng de mén.
english: The prisoner clawed at the cell door in desperation.

hanzi: 他把一小块乾净的布缠住脚腕.
pinyin: tā bǎ yī xiǎo kuài qián jìng de bù chán zhù jué wàn.
english: He wrapped a clean rag around his ankle.

hanzi: 他还管他母亲叫“老太婆”呢。
pinyin: tā huán guǎn tā mǔ qīn jiào“ lǎo tài pó” ne。
english: He called his mother"old girl", too.

hanzi: 他的行为玷污了国家的荣誉。
pinyin: tā de xíng wéi diàn wū le guó jiā de róng yù。
english: His action profaned the honour of his country.

hanzi: 【谚】无蜂则无密，不劳则无酬。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 wú fēng zé wú mì， bù láo zé wú chóu。
english: No bees, no honey; no work, no money.

hanzi: 大雨过后，下水道溢出水来。
pinyin: dà yǔ guò hòu， xià shuǐ dào yì chū shuǐ lái。
english: The drains overflowed after the heavy rain.

hanzi: 【谚】孩子和傻子，口中无诈语。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 hái zi huò shǎ zi， kǒu zhòng wú zhà yù。
english: Children and fools tell the truth.

hanzi: 你们是不是都得到了公平的一份了?
pinyin: nǐ men shì bú shì dōu dé dào le gōng píng de yī fèn le?
english: Have you all had a fair whack?

hanzi: 他为父母亲兴建了一楝新房子。
pinyin: tā wèi fù mǔ qīn xīng jiàn le yī liàn xīn fáng zi。
english: He has built his parents a new house.

hanzi: 处决囚犯过去都是公开执行的。
pinyin: chǔ jué qiú fàn guò qu dōu shì gōng kāi zhí xíng de。
english: There used to be public executions.

hanzi: 那是一个宁静、明媚的早晨。
pinyin: nà shì yī gè níng jìng、 míng mèi de zǎo chén。
english: It was a beautiful morning, calm and serene.

hanzi: 忧心忡忡的家长们开了一次会。
pinyin: yōu xīn chōng chōng de jiā zhǎng men kāi le yī cì kuài。
english: Concerned parents held a meeting.

hanzi: 他十分虔诚地崇拜女明星。
pinyin: tā shí fēn qián chéng de chóng bài nu:3 míng xīng。
english: He adores this screen goddess with godliness.

hanzi: 这家公司的帐目收支是否平衡？
pinyin: zhè jiā gōng sī de zhàng mù shōu zhī shì fǒu píng héng？
english: Do the firm's accounts balance?

hanzi: 你读过那本书的全文版本吗？
pinyin: nǐ dú guò nà běn shū de quán wén bǎn běn ma？
english: Have you read the unabridged edition of that book?

pinyin: nóng fū zhèng zài yòng è bǎ niú tào dào lí shàng。
english: The farmer was yoking his oxen to a plough.

hanzi: 你认为砂糖可以替代蜂蜜吗？
pinyin: nǐ rèn wéi shā táng kě yǐ tì dài fēng mì ma？
english: Can you think sugar will substitute for honey?

hanzi: 我居然发现了一只巨大的蜘蛛！
pinyin: wǒ jū rán fā xiàn le yī zhǐ jù dà de zhī zhū！
english: What should I find but an enormous spider!

hanzi: 你把这些靴子好好擦一下好吗？
pinyin: nǐ bǎ zhè xie xuē zi hǎo hǎo cā yī xià hào ma？
english: Would you put a good shine on these boots?

hanzi: 他噼噼啪啪地挥鞭策马狂跑。
pinyin: tā噼噼 pā pā de huī biān cè mǎ kuáng pǎo。
english: He cracked his whip and the horses began to trot.

hanzi: 礼仪，礼节彬彬有礼的行为的习俗
pinyin: lǐ yí， lǐ jié bīn bīn yǒu lǐ de xíng wéi de xí sú
english: The conventions of polite behavior.

hanzi: 盒子有顶面、 底面和四个侧面.
pinyin: hé zi yǒu dǐng miàn、  dǐ miàn huò sì gè cè miàn.
english: A box has a top, a bottom and four sides.

pinyin: wǒ yuān wang le tā， zěn yàng cái néng bǔ jiù ne？
english: How can I repair the wrong I have done her?

pinyin: jī ròu yùn dòng de xié tiáo； jī ròu yùn dòng fǎn shè
english: Motor coordination; a motor reflex.
