pinyin: tā máng yū zhào liào sān gè xiǎo hái er.
english: He's fully occupied in looking after/with three small children.

hanzi: 迪纳摩队的防守看起来已瓦解了。
pinyin: dí nà mó duì de fáng shǒu kàn qǐ lai yǐ wǎ jiě le。
english: Dynamo's defence looks disorganize.

hanzi: 我跟你说话的时候, 你要留心听!
pinyin: wǒ gēn nǐ shuō huà de shí hou,  nǐ yào liú xīn tìng!
english: Pay attention when I'm talking to you!

hanzi: 那次事故後她的腿上留下了伤疤。
pinyin: nà cì shì gù後 tā de tuǐ shàng liú xià le shāng bā。
english: The accident left a scar on her leg.

hanzi: 你有进入加拿大必备的签证吗?
pinyin: nǐ yǒu jìn rù jiā ná dà bì bèi de qiān zhèng ma?
english: Have you the requisite visa to enter Canada?

hanzi: 你知道美国的三大电视网吗？
pinyin: nǐ zhī dào Měi guó de sān dà diàn shì wǎng ma？
english: Do you know the three USA television networks?

hanzi: 我自行车的后轮车胎没气了。
pinyin: wǒ zì xíng chē de hòu lún jū tāi mò qì le。
english: I got a flat tire of the rear wheel of my bicycle.

hanzi: 你丈夫麻醉後还没有苏醒.
pinyin: nǐ zhàng fu má zuì後 huán méi yǒu sū xǐng.
english: Your husband hasn't yet come round after the anaesthetic.

hanzi: 海豹、 海龟、 企鹅均有鳍状肢.
pinyin: hǎi bào、  hǎi guī、  qǐ é jūn yǒu qí zhuàng zhī.
english: Seals, turtles and penguins have flippers.

hanzi: 他们不可靠[不是我信赖的人].
pinyin: tā men bù kě kào[ bú shì wǒ xìn lài de rén].
english: They're not to be trusted/not people I would trust.

hanzi: 裸露的伤口很快就受到了感染。
pinyin: luǒ lù de shāng kǒu hěn kuài jiù shòu dào le gǎn rǎn。
english: The open wound soon became infected.

hanzi: 这笔生意应於明天顺利成交.
pinyin: zhè bǐ shēng yi yìng yū míng tiān shùn lì chéng jiāo.
english: The deal should be buttoned up by tomorrow.

hanzi: 中国历史上有多少个朝代？
pinyin: Zhōng guó lì shǐ shàng yǒu duō shao gè cháo dài？
english: How many dynasties are there in China's history?

hanzi: 直布罗陀岩山上有许多洞穴.
pinyin: zhí bù luó tuó yán shān shàng yǒu xǔ duō dòng xuè.
english: The Rock of Gibraltar is honeycombed with caves.

hanzi: 亨利写给父亲的信简明扼要。
pinyin: Hēng lì xiě jǐ fù qīn de xìn jiǎn míng è yào。
english: Henry's note to his father was short and sweet.

hanzi: 滑铁卢战役的遗址在比利时。
pinyin: huá tiě lú zhàn yì de yí zhǐ zài bǐ lì shí。
english: The site of the battle of Waterloo is in Belgium.

hanzi: 先前的时间上先发生的；较早的
pinyin: xiān qián de shí jiān shàng xiān fā shēng de； jiào zǎo de
english: Occurring before in time; earlier.

hanzi: 你知道这箱商品的商标吗?
pinyin: nǐ zhī dào zhè xiāng shāng pǐn de shāng biāo ma?
english: Do you know the trade name of this box of merchandise?

hanzi: 爱、喜、恨、惧、悲都是情感。
pinyin: ài、 xǐ、 hèn、 jù、 bēi dōu shì qíng gǎn。
english: Love, joy, hate, fear and grief are all emotions.

hanzi: 我们大家不要回避棘手的问题。
pinyin: wǒ men dà jiā bù yào huí bì jí shǒu de wèn tí。
english: Let's not skirt round the awkward questions.

hanzi: 大理石拱门是著名的伦敦标志.
pinyin: dà lǐ shí gǒng mén shì著 míng de lún dūn biāo zhì.
english: Marble Arch is a famous London landmark.

hanzi: 范围；区域被该界限围合的空间
pinyin: fàn wéi； qū yù bèi gāi jiè xiàn wéi hé de kōng jiān
english: The space enclosed by such a boundary.

hanzi: 这张照片与通缉人相符.
pinyin: zhè zhāng zhào piàn yù tōng jī rén xiāng fú.
english: The photograph answers to the description of the wanted man.

hanzi: 他用藤杖抽断了荨麻的顶部.
pinyin: tā yòng téng zhàng chōu duàn le荨 má de dǐng bù.
english: He swished off the tops of the nettles with his cane.

hanzi: 你听到她打算辞职的传闻了吗？
pinyin: nǐ tīng dào tā dǎ suàn cí zhí de chuán wén le ma？
english: Have you heard of her intention to resign?

hanzi: 有暴力行为的囚犯隔离囚禁.
pinyin: yǒu bào lì xíng wéi de qiú fàn gé lí qiú jìn.
english: Violent prisoners are kept separate from the others.

hanzi: 这种药没有什麽不良的副作用.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng yào méi yǒu shí mó bù liáng de fù zuò yòng.
english: The drug has no undesirable side-effects.

hanzi: 间接宣传；间接无线电传送
pinyin: jiàn jiē xuān chuán； jiàn jiē wú xiàn diàn chuán sòng
english: Black propaganda; black radio transmissions.

hanzi: 小说中的事远逊於实际体验.
pinyin: xiǎo shuō zhòng dì shì yuǎn xùn yū shí jì tǐ yàn.
english: Fiction is a poor surrogate for real experience.

hanzi: 他停顿了一下然後继续讲话.
pinyin: tā tíng dùn le yī xià rán後 jì xù jiǎng huà.
english: He paused for a moment, and then continued his speech.

hanzi: 奇异的不寻常的或特别的；奇妙的
pinyin: qí yì de bù xún cháng de huò tè bié de； qí miào de
english: Remarkable or extraordinary; wonderful.

hanzi: 她与我们洽谈成交後又翻悔了.
pinyin: tā yù wǒ men qià tán chéng jiāo後 yòu fān huǐ le.
english: She welshed on (the bargain she made with) us.

hanzi: 她用抹布把房间擦得乾乾净净。
pinyin: tā yòng mǒ bù bǎ fáng jiān cā de qián qián jìng jìng。
english: She went over the room with a duster.

hanzi: 告密者检举他人的人；告密的人
pinyin: gào mì zhě jiǎn jǔ tā rén de rén； gào mì de rén
english: One who informs against others; an informer.

hanzi: 工人们清理（杂物）後就走了.
pinyin: gōng rén men qīng lǐ（ zá wù）後 jiù zǒu le.
english: The workmen cleaned up (the mess) before they left.

hanzi: 别这麽窝囊，没什麽可怕的嘛。
pinyin: biè zhè mó wō nang， mò shí mó kě pà de ma。
english: Don't be so soft there's nothing to be afraid of.

hanzi: 先把黄油融化, 然後加入面粉.
pinyin: xiān bǎ huáng yóu róng huà,  rán後 jiā rù miàn fěn.
english: Melt the butter and then blend in the flour.

hanzi: 上尉对我们重申了那项命令。
pinyin: shàng wèi duì wǒ men chóng shēn le nà xiàng mìng lìng。
english: The captain reiterated the command to us.

hanzi: 她似乎很诚实, 但我可以信赖她吗?
pinyin: tā sì hu hěn chéng shí,  dàn wǒ kě yǐ xìn lài tā ma?
english: She seems genuine but can I trust her?

hanzi: 偏度偏差；一特定数量的偏差
pinyin: piān dù piān chā； yī tè dìng shù liàng de piān chā
english: Deviation or a specified amount of deviation.

hanzi: 诘问者的嘲笑打断了她的讲话.
pinyin: jié wèn zhě de cháo xiào dǎ duàn le tā de jiǎng huà.
english: Hecklers interrupted her speech with jeering.

hanzi: 替捕的一垒安打；第二垒替补偷击
pinyin: tì bǔ de yī lěi ān dǎ； dì èr lěi tì bǔ tōu jī
english: A pinch single; a pinch steal of second base.

hanzi: 对这些孩子的处罚过於严厉.
pinyin: duì zhè xie hái zi de chǔ fá guò yū yán lì.
english: The punishments inflicted on the children were too severe.

hanzi: 我星期五辞职後当天就离开了。
pinyin: wǒ xīng qī wǔ cí zhí後 dàng tiān jiù lí kāi le。
english: I resigned on Friday and left that same day.

hanzi: 成群的歹徒犯法後栖身於树林中.
pinyin: chéng qún de dǎi tú fàn fǎ後 qī shēn yū shù lín zhòng.
english: Bands of outlaws lived in the forest.

hanzi: 她落选後其影响力大为降低.
pinyin: tā luò xuǎn後 qí yǐng xiǎng lì dà wèi jiàng dī.
english: Her influence declined after she lost the election.

hanzi: 野蛮的长相凶恶的或面目狰狞的
pinyin: yě mán de zhǎng xiāng xiōng è de huò miàn mù zhēng níng de
english: Savage or threatening in appearance.

hanzi: 用五个苹果换五个鸡蛋公平吗?
pinyin: yòng wǔ gè píng guǒ huàn wǔ gè jī dàn gōng píng ma?
english: Is five apples for five eggs a fair exchange?

hanzi: 冻结的雪在我们的脚下嘎吱作响.
pinyin: dòng jié de xuě zài wǒ men de jué xià gá zī zuò xiǎng.
english: The frozen snow crunched under our feet.

hanzi: 把黄油加热，直到变成褐色为止。
pinyin: bǎ huáng yóu jiā rè， zhí dào biàn chéng hè sè wéi zhǐ。
english: Heat the butter until it browns.

hanzi: 微小表微小的后缀、单词或名称
pinyin: wēi xiǎo biǎo wēi xiǎo de hòu zhuì、 dān cí huò míng chēng
english: A diminutive suffix, word, or name.

hanzi: 她的小嘴巴一噘，眼泪汪汪。
pinyin: tā de xiǎo zuǐ bā yī juē， yǎn lèi wāng wāng。
english: Her little mouth pucker up and tear fille her eyes.

hanzi: 不知为什麽, 我有点为他惋惜.
pinyin: bù zhī wèi shí mó,  wǒ yǒu diǎn wèi tā wǎn xī.
english: I'm not sure why, but I feel kind of sorry for him.

hanzi: 这种金属框受压後容易变形。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng jīn shǔ kuàng shòu yà後 róng yì biàn xíng。
english: The metal frame tends to twist under pressure.

hanzi: 漂浮物漂浮的物品或材料；漂浮物
pinyin: piāo fú wù piāo fú de wù pǐn huò cái liào； piāo fú wù
english: Floating objects or material; flotsam.

hanzi: 硫磺是炸药的一种组成成分。
pinyin: liú huáng shì zhà yào de yī zhòng zǔ chéng chéng fèn。
english: Brimstone is a component part of explosive.

hanzi: 这些符号我完全不明白是什麽意思.
pinyin: zhè xie fú hào wǒ wán quán bù míng bái shì shí mó yì si.
english: These symbols mean nothing to me.

hanzi: 盖上果酱瓶! 要不准得招黄蜂.
pinyin: gě shàng guǒ jiàng píng!  yào bu zhǔn de zhāo huáng fēng.
english: Cover the jam! It's sure to invite the wasps.

hanzi: 怎样解决视力不好这一难题呢?
pinyin: zěn yàng jiě jué shì lì bù hǎo zhè yī nán tí ne?
english: How do you cope with the problem of poor vision?

hanzi: 难道你还不明白－－那都是诬陷。
pinyin: nán dào nǐ huán bù míng bái－－ nà dōu shì wū xiàn。
english: Don't you see it was all a frame-up!

hanzi: 趋向总体的倾向、动向或进程
pinyin: qū xiàng zǒng tǐ de qīng xiàng、 dòng xiàng huò jìn chéng
english: A general tendency, movement, or course.

hanzi: 光滑表面薄的、光滑而发光亮的面
pinyin: guāng hua biǎo miàn bò de、 guāng hua ér fā guāng liàng de miàn
english: A thin, smooth, shiny coating.

hanzi: 是否可在此购买观光巴士券？
pinyin: shì fǒu kě zài cǐ gòu mǎi guān guāng bā shì quàn？
english: Can I get a ticket for the sight- seeing bus here?

hanzi: 装上新天线後画面清晰多了.
pinyin: zhuāng shàng xīn tiān xiàn後 huà miàn qīng xī duō le.
english: The picture is much clearer with the new aerial.

hanzi: 怪人一个奇特或怪癖的人；怪人
pinyin: guài rén yī gè qí tè huò guài pǐ de rén； guài rén
english: A peculiar or eccentric person; a character.

hanzi: 他用欧芹的嫩枝点缀在鸡上。
pinyin: tā yòng ōu qín de nèn zhī diǎn zhuì zài jī shàng。
english: He decorated the chicken with sprigs of parsley.

hanzi: 我怎样才能补救我对她的冤枉？
pinyin: wǒ zěn yàng cái néng bǔ jiù wǒ duì tā de yuān wang？
english: How can I repair the wrong I have done her?

hanzi: 狗拴著链子, 是怎麽挣脱开的呢?
pinyin: gǒu shuān著 liàn zi,  shì zěn mó zhèng tuō kāi de ne?
english: The dog was chained, so how did it get free?

hanzi: 由於罢工生产逐渐停顿下来。
pinyin: yóu yū bà gōng shēng chǎn zhú jiàn tíng dùn xia lai。
english: The strike brought industry grinding to a halt.

hanzi: 我们应该怎样投入学校生活？
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi zěn yàng tóu rù xué xiào shēng huó？
english: How should we involve ourselves in school life?

hanzi: 他的双臂和双腿严重受伤。
pinyin: tā de shuāng bì huò shuāng tuǐ yán zhòng shòu shāng。
english: He suffered serious injuries to the arms and legs.

hanzi: 别拖延! 今天就定下你休假的日子!
pinyin: biè tuō yán!  jīn tiān jiù dìng xià nǐ xiū jià de rì zi!
english: Don't delay! Book your holiday today!

hanzi: 我们把蒲公英看作希望的象征。
pinyin: wǒ men bǎ pú gōng yīng kàn zuò xī wàng de xiàng zhēng。
english: We regard dandelion as an emblem of hope.

hanzi: 这个肿瘤是良性的还是癌肿性的?
pinyin: zhè gè zhǒng liú shì liáng xìng de hái shì yán zhǒng xìng de?
english: Is the growth benign or cancerous?

hanzi: 这平底锅上的搪瓷有些已脱落.
pinyin: zhè píng dǐ guō shàng de táng cí yǒu xiē yǐ tuō luò.
english: Some of the enamel on this pan is chipped off.

hanzi: 赋予特殊条件、天赋或优点的
pinyin: fù yǔ tè shū tiáo jiàn、 tiān fù huò yōu diǎn de
english: Endowed with special gifts, talents, or advantages.

hanzi: 我们超越对手时要目不斜视!
pinyin: wǒ men chāo yuè duì shǒu shí yào mù bù xié shì!
english: All eyes to the front as we pass the other competitors!

hanzi: 他们把这个过失归咎于我的疏忽。
pinyin: tā men bǎ zhè gè guò shī guī jiù yú wǒ de shū hū。
english: They charged the fault to my carelessness.

hanzi: 他逃跑一周後警方才逮住他.
pinyin: tā táo pǎo yī zhōu後 jǐng fāng cái dài zhù tā.
english: He was on the run for a week before the police got him.

hanzi: 拂晓时敌人向我防线开了火。
pinyin: fú xiǎo shí dí rén xiàng wǒ fáng xiàn kāi le huǒ。
english: The enemy opened fire on our lines at early dawn.

hanzi: 他发财之後把老朋友都抛弃了.
pinyin: tā fā cái zhī後 bǎ lǎo péng you dōu pāo qì le.
english: When he became rich he threw over all his old friends.

hanzi: 这种金属框受压後容易变形。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng jīn shǔ kuàng shòu yà後 róng yì biàn xíng。
english: The metal frame tends to twist under pressure.

hanzi: 移民官员在我的护照上盖了戳。
pinyin: yí mín guān yuán zài wǒ de hù zhào shàng gě le chuō。
english: The immigration officer stamped my passport.

hanzi: 你见到的是实物, 还是鬼魂?
pinyin: nǐ xiàn dào de shì shí wù,  hái shì guǐ hún?
english: Was it something substantial that you saw, or was it a ghost?

hanzi: 那攀登者不得不紧扒着悬崖峭壁。
pinyin: nà pān dēng zhě bù dé bù jǐn pá zhuó xuán yá qiào bì。
english: The climber had to cling onto the cliff.

hanzi: 他发财之後把老朋友都抛弃了.
pinyin: tā fā cái zhī後 bǎ lǎo péng you dōu pāo qì le.
english: When he became rich he threw over all his old friends.

hanzi: 指定，指明指有；标明，指出
pinyin: zhǐ dìng， zhǐ míng zhǐ yǒu； biāo míng， zhǐ chū
english: The act of designating; a marking or pointing out.

hanzi: 她掐了他（胳膊）一下, 把他叫醒.
pinyin: tā qiā le tā（ gē bo） yī xià,  bǎ tā jiào xǐng.
english: She gave him a pinch (on the arm) to wake him up.

hanzi: 杰出的在同类中显著的；杰出的
pinyin: jié chū de zài tóng lèi zhòng xiǎn著 de； jié chū de
english: Standing out among others of its kind; prominent.

hanzi: 我将为你预订直飞伦敦的航班。
pinyin: wǒ jiàng wèi nǐ yù dìng zhí fēi lún dūn de háng bān。
english: I'll book you on a direct flight to London.

hanzi: 空袭几乎把这座城镇夷为平地。
pinyin: kōng xí jī hū bǎ zhè zuò chéng zhèn yí wèi píng dì。
english: The bombing raid practically leveled the town.

hanzi: 西斯廷教堂的壁画举世闻名.
pinyin: xī sī tíng jiào táng de bì huà jǔ shì wén míng.
english: The frescos in the Sistine Chapel are world-famous.

hanzi: 他经常引用《圣经》中的章节.
pinyin: tā jīng cháng yǐn yòng《 shèng jīng》 zhòng dì zhāng jié.
english: He's always quoting verses from the Bible.

hanzi: 厚颜无耻鲁莽的自我肯定；厚颜无耻
pinyin: hòu yán wú chǐ lǔ mǎng de zì wǒ kěn dìng； hòu yán wú chǐ
english: Bold self-assurance; effrontery.

hanzi: 桶的摇晃使一些牛奶溢了出来。
pinyin: tǒng de yáo huàng shǐ yī xiē niú nǎi yì le chū lai。
english: The sway of the pail cause some milk to spill out.

hanzi: 我们离别时我如何忍得住眼泪呢？
pinyin: wǒ men lí bié shí wǒ rú hé rěn de zhù yǎn lèi ne？
english: How shall I withhold from tears when we part?

hanzi: 别听他的种种藉口，他在撒谎。
pinyin: biè tìng tā de zhǒng zhǒng jiè kǒu， tā zài sā huǎng。
english: Don't listen to his pretences; he is lying.

hanzi: 空想的想象的；不真实的；爱空想的
pinyin: kōng xiǎng de xiǎng xiàng de； bù zhēn shí de； ài kōng xiǎng de
english: Imaginary; unreal; fanciful.

hanzi: 精通一门外语难不难?
pinyin: jīng tōng yī mén wài yǔ nàn bù nàn?
english: Is it difficult to feel at home in (ie confident when using) a foreign language?

hanzi: 她争执一番後, 无可奈何地缴纳了罚金.
pinyin: tā zhēng zhí yī pān後,  wú kě nài hé de jiǎo nà le fá jīn.
english: She paid the fine under protest.

hanzi: 囚犯对被控罪名再三否认。
pinyin: qiú fàn duì bèi kòng zuì míng zài sān fǒu rèn。
english: The prisoner repeated denials of the charges against him.

hanzi: 他陷於绝望, 终於自杀了.
pinyin: tā xiàn yū jué wàng,  zhōng yū zì shā le.
english: He surrendered (himself) to despair and eventually committed suicide.

hanzi: 是否可在此购买观光巴士券？
pinyin: shì fǒu kě zài cǐ gòu mǎi guān guāng bā shì quàn？
english: Can I get a ticket for the sight- seeing bus here?

hanzi: 光亮的灿烂地闪耀的；非常明亮的
pinyin: guāng liàng de càn làn de shǎn yào de； fēi cháng míng liàng de
english: Shining brilliantly; very bright.

hanzi: 和尚在香炉里焚上一柱香。
pinyin: hé shang zài xiāng lú lǐ fén shàng yī zhù xiāng。
english: The monk burned a stick of incense in the incense burner.

hanzi: 天资天生的能力，如学习；天资
pinyin: tiān zī tiān shēng de néng lì， rú xué xí； tiān zī
english: An inherent ability, as for learning; a talent.

hanzi: 自由的不受监禁或奴役的；自由的
pinyin: zì yóu de bù shòu jiān jìn huò nú yì de； zì yóu de
english: Not imprisoned or enslaved; being at liberty.

hanzi: 他和妻子吵架後就把她抛弃了。
pinyin: tā huò qī zi chǎo jià後 jiù bǎ tā pāo qì le。
english: He had a row with his wife and just walked out on her.

hanzi: 平峒通往矿井的几乎水平的入口
pinyin: píng tóng tōng wàng kuàng jǐng de jī hū shuǐ píng de rù kǒu
english: An almost horizontal entrance to a mine.

hanzi: 他妻子去世後他的生活很空虚.
pinyin: tā qī zi qù shì後 tā de shēng huó hěn kōng xū.
english: There has been a vacuum in his life since his wife died.

hanzi: 他跌下来也并未气馁，继续攀登。
pinyin: tā diē xia lai yě bìng wèi qì něi， jì xù pān dēng。
english: He continued the climb, undaunted by his fall.

hanzi: 那囚犯从墙上的缺口处逃走了.
pinyin: nà qiú fàn zòng qiáng shàng de quē kǒu chù táo zǒu le.
english: The prisoner escaped through a hole in the wall.

hanzi: 总是受到讥笑使人非常气馁。
pinyin: zǒng shì shòu dào jī xiào shǐ rén fēi cháng qì něi。
english: It's very discouraging to be sneered at all time.

hanzi: 政府会拨款资助美术事业吗？
pinyin: zhèng fǔ kuài bō kuǎn zī zhù měi shù shì yè ma？
english: Will the government provide money to support the arts?

hanzi: 这里晚间没有什麽活动的迹象.
pinyin: zhè lǐ wǎn jiān méi yǒu shí mó huó dòng de jī xiàng.
english: There are few signs of life here in the evenings.

hanzi: 那囚犯从墙上的缺口处逃走了.
pinyin: nà qiú fàn zòng qiáng shàng de quē kǒu chù táo zǒu le.
english: The prisoner escaped through a hole in the wall.

hanzi: 她喜欢仆人前呼後拥地侍候她.
pinyin: tā xǐ huan pú rén qián hū後 yōng de shì hòu tā.
english: She loves to have servants dance attendance (up) on her.

hanzi: 她喜欢仆人前呼後拥地侍候她.
pinyin: tā xǐ huan pú rén qián hū後 yōng de shì hòu tā.
english: She loves to have servants dance attendance (up) on her.

hanzi: 他奋力开出一条生路；他奋战一生。
pinyin: tā fèn lì kāi chū yī tiáo shēng lù； tā fèn zhàn yī shēng。
english: He fought his way through life.

hanzi: 这一章的标题是｀我早年的生活＇.
pinyin: zhè yī zhāng de biāo tí shì｀ wǒ zǎo nián de shēng huó＇.
english: The chapter was headed My Early Life'.

hanzi: 那时一场大瘟疫正在该城肆虐。
pinyin: nà shí yī chǎng dà wēn yì zhèng zài gāi chéng sì nu:è。
english: A great plague was then raging in the city.

hanzi: 笨蛋被看作软弱、傻或愚蠢的人
pinyin: bèn dàn bèi kàn zuò ruǎn ruò、 shǎ huò yú chǔn de rén
english: A person regarded as weak, foolish, or stupid.

hanzi: 护士给我受伤的胳臂裹上绷带。
pinyin: hù shi jǐ wǒ shòu shāng de gē bei guǒ shàng bēng dài。
english: The nurse wound a bandage round my wounded arm.

hanzi: 缝纫时，她在手上戴一枚顶针。
pinyin: fèng rèn shí， tā zài shǒu shàng dài yī méi dǐng zhēn。
english: She put a thimble over the finger when sewing.

hanzi: 我怎样才能使你相信我的诚意呢？
pinyin: wǒ zěn yàng cái néng shǐ nǐ xiāng xìn wǒ de chéng yì ne？
english: How can I persuade you of my sincerity!

hanzi: 旅客须知要服用预防疟疾药.
pinyin: lu:3 kè xū zhī yào fú yòng yù fáng nu:è jí yào.
english: Travellers are reminded that malaria tablets are advisable.

hanzi: 他找到住房之前, 在我家寄膳.
pinyin: tā zhǎo dào zhù fáng zhī qián,  zài wǒ jiā jì shàn.
english: He boarded at my house/with me until he found a flat.

hanzi: 他反驳说：“这完全是你的错误。”
pinyin: tā fǎn bó shuō：“ zhè wán quán shì nǐ de cuò wù。”
english: He retorted, "it's entirely your fault."

hanzi: 我的座右铭是: ｀有一天过一天.＇
pinyin: wǒ de zuò yòu míng shì: ｀ yǒu yī tiān guò yī tiān.＇
english: My motto is: `Live each day as it comes.'

hanzi: 当　外面悬挂著三个球的标记.
pinyin: dàng　 wài mian xuán guà著 sān gè qiú de biāo jì.
english: Signs with three balls hang outside pawnbrokers' shops.

hanzi: 你可以得到一笔拨款来修缮住房。
pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ dé dào yī bǐ bō kuǎn lái xiū shàn zhù fáng。
english: You can get a grant to improve your house.

hanzi: 纯粹地符合类型、标准或模式地
pinyin: chún cuì de fú hé lèi xíng、 biāo zhǔn huò mó shì de
english: So as to conform to a type, standard, or pattern.

hanzi: 【谚】祸来如飞行，祸去似步行。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 huò lái rú fēi xíng， huò qù sì bù xíng。
english: Misfortunes come on wings and depart on foot.

hanzi: 租金贵是贵, （但）房子倒很好.
pinyin: zū jīn guì shì guì, （ dàn） fáng zi dào hěn hǎo.
english: The rent is high, (but) otherwise the house is fine.

hanzi: 他忸忸怩怩走到她跟前请她跳舞.
pinyin: tā niǔ niǔ ní ní zǒu dào tā gēn qián qǐng tā tiào wǔ.
english: He sidled up/over to her and asked her to dance.

hanzi: 冰、雪和蒸汽是水的不同形态。
pinyin: bīng、 xuě huò zhēng qì shì shuǐ de bù tóng xíng tài。
english: Ice, snow and steam are different forms of water.

hanzi: 紧张过度的或兴奋过度的；紧张的
pinyin: jǐn zhāng guò dù de huò xīng fèn guò dù de； jǐn zhāng de
english: Excessively nervous or excited; agitated.

hanzi: 那个罪犯找到後就要挨鞭子抽打.
pinyin: nèi gè zuì fàn zhǎo dào後 jiù yào ái biān zǐ chōu dǎ.
english: The culprit will be whipped when he is found.

hanzi: 他对忏悔的罪人一概慈悲为怀。
pinyin: tā duì chàn huǐ de zuì rén yī gài cí bēi wèi huái。
english: He is kind and gracious to all sinners who repent.

hanzi: 我们旅行多年後, 决定在此定居.
pinyin: wǒ men lu:3 xíng duō nián後,  jué dìng zài cǐ dìng jū.
english: After years of travel, we decided to settle here.

hanzi: 她泰然自若地履行王妃的职责.
pinyin: tā tài rán zì ruò de lu:3 xíng wáng fēi de zhí zé.
english: She performs the duties of a princess with great aplomb.

hanzi: 那名间谍把秘密计画泄漏给敌人。
pinyin: nà míng jiàn dié bǎ mì mì jì huà xiè lòu jǐ dí rén。
english: The spy divulged the secret plans to the enemy.

hanzi: 她泰然自若地履行王妃的职责.
pinyin: tā tài rán zì ruò de lu:3 xíng wáng fēi de zhí zé.
english: She performs the duties of a princess with great aplomb.

hanzi: 我上当了! 这些番茄一半是坏的!
pinyin: wǒ shàng dàng le!  zhè xie fān qié yī bàn shì huài de!
english: I've been diddled! Half of these tomatoes are bad!

hanzi: 恶毒女人被看作邪恶和诡诈的妇女
pinyin: è dú nu:3 rén bèi kàn zuò xié è huò guǐ zhà de fù nu:3
english: A woman who is regarded as evil and scheming.

hanzi: 裁军谈判的最新情况怎麽样?
pinyin: cái jūn tán pàn de zuì xīn qíng kuàng zěn mó yàng?
english: What is the latest state of play in the disarmament talks?

hanzi: 广袤的平原被厚厚的雪覆盖着。
pinyin: guǎng mào de píng yuán bèi hòu hòu de xuě fù gài zhuó。
english: The vast champaign was covered with thick snow.

hanzi: 劫案发生後警方立即跟踪追击.
pinyin: jié àn fā shēng後 jǐng fāng lì jí gēn zōng zhuī jī.
english: After the robbery the police immediately gave chase.

hanzi: 太阳看起来在天空以弧线运行。
pinyin: tài yáng kàn qǐ lai zài tiān kōng yǐ hú xiàn yùn xíng。
english: The sun appears to move in an arc across the sky.

hanzi: 那个国家将要展示埃及木乃伊。
pinyin: nèi gè guó jiā jiāng yào zhǎn shì Aī jí mù nǎi yī。
english: There will be an Egyptian mummy show in that country.

hanzi: 你以後要为你的愚蠢行动付出 代价的.
pinyin: nǐ yǐ後 yào wèi nǐ de yú chǔn xíng dòng fù chū  dài jià de.
english: You'll pay later for your follies.

hanzi: 他现在没有固定的（性）伴侣.
pinyin: tā xiàn zài méi yǒu gù dìng de（ xìng） bàn lu:3.
english: He doesn't have a regular (sexual) partner at the moment.

hanzi: 阿根廷是牛肉制品的一大出口国。
pinyin: ē gēn tíng shì niú ròu zhì pǐn de yī dà chū kǒu guó。
english: Argentina is a big exporter of beef products.

hanzi: 让我们举杯向新娘和新郎祝贺!
pinyin: ràng wǒ men jǔ bēi xiàng xīn niáng huò xīn láng zhù hè!
english: Let's drink (a toast) to the bride and bridegroom!

hanzi: 岛上逐渐迁入很多欧洲移民.
pinyin: dǎo shàng zhú jiàn qiān rù hěn duō ōu zhōu yí mín.
english: The islands were gradually populated by settlers from Europe.

hanzi: 和谐一种饱满、奔放的和音的流露
pinyin: hé xié yī zhòng bǎo mǎn、 bēn fàng de huò yīn de liú lù
english: A full, rich outpouring of harmonious sound.

hanzi: 葛粉从这些植物中提取的食用淀粉
pinyin: gě fěn zòng zhè xie zhí wù zhòng tí qǔ de shí yòng diàn fěn
english: An edible starch made from these plants.

hanzi: 一瞥；一眼很快的一看或一瞥；粗略看
pinyin: yī piē； yī yǎn hěn kuài de yī kàn huò yī piē； cū lu:è kàn
english: A quick look or glimpse; a glance.

hanzi: 附带说一下，约翰下星期要回家。
pinyin: fù dài shuō yī xià， Yuē hàn xià xīng qī yào huí jiā。
english: Incidentally, John's coming home next week.

hanzi: 我的靴子挤压了我脚趾上的水泡。
pinyin: wǒ de xuē zi jǐ yà le wǒ jiǎo zhǐ shàng de shuǐ pào。
english: My boot is pressing against a blister on my toe.

hanzi: 和谐一种饱满、奔放的和音的流露
pinyin: hé xié yī zhòng bǎo mǎn、 bēn fàng de huò yīn de liú lù
english: A full, rich outpouring of harmonious sound.

hanzi: 那军官於星期日晚上报到销假.
pinyin: nà jūn guān yū xīng qī rì wǎn shang bào dào xiāo jià.
english: The officer reported back from leave on Sunday night.

hanzi: 人质被（用绳）捆住并塞住了口.
pinyin: rén zhì bèi（ yòng shéng） kǔn zhù bìng sè zhù le kǒu.
english: The hostages were bound (with ropes) and gagged.

hanzi: 使兴奋的使人精力充沛的；使兴奋的
pinyin: shǐ xīng fèn de shǐ rén jīng lì chōng pèi de； shǐ xīng fèn de
english: Serving to invigorate; stimulating.

hanzi: 唾液是由口腔的唾液腺分泌出来的.
pinyin: tuò yè shì yóu kǒu qiāng de tuò yè xiàn fēn mì chū lai de.
english: Saliva is secreted by glands in the mouth.

hanzi: 演出拖延很久, 最後总算开始了.
pinyin: yǎn chū tuō yán hěn jiǔ,  zuì後 zǒng suàn kāi shǐ le.
english: After a long delay the performance finally started.

hanzi: 这本书破旧了，封面上有墨渍。
pinyin: zhè běn shū pò jiù le， fēng miàn shàng yǒu mò zì。
english: The book is worn out and has ink stain on its cover.

hanzi: 一个上尉指挥一个连队或炮兵连。
pinyin: yī gè shàng wèi zhǐ huī yī gè lián duì huò pào bīng lián。
english: A captain commands a company or battery.

hanzi: 他伸手捂住她的嘴, 不让她叫喊.
pinyin: tā shēn shǒu wǔ zhù tā de zuǐ,  bù ràng tā jiào hǎn.
english: He put his hand over her mouth to stop her screaming.

hanzi: 好。是要豪华型、中型还是小型车？
pinyin: hào。 shì yào háo huá xíng、 zhōng xíng hái shì xiǎo xíng chē？
english: Ok. Luxury, mid-size or compact?

hanzi: 她不折不扣地履行了她的所有诺言。
pinyin: tā bù zhé bù kòu de lu:3 xíng le tā de suǒ yǒu nuò yán。
english: She carry out all her pledge to the letter.

hanzi: 意向感觉、做或说的意向；倾向
pinyin: yì xiàng gǎn jué、 zuò huò shuō de yì xiàng； qīng xiàng
english: A disposition to feel, do, or say; a propensity.

hanzi: 他把衣服拧乾後晾到绳子上.
pinyin: tā bǎ yī fu nìng qián後 liàng dào shéng zi shàng.
english: He wrung the clothes (out) before putting them on the line to dry.

hanzi: 他跌了一跤, 头部撞在栏杆上了.
pinyin: tā diē le yī jiāo,  tóu bù zhuàng zài lán gān shàng le.
english: He tripped and bashed his head against the railing.

hanzi: 她泰然自若地履行王妃的职责。
pinyin: tā tài rán zì ruò de lu:3 xíng wáng fēi de zhí zé。
english: She perform the duties of a princess with great aplomb.

hanzi: 这种混合物凝结之後就成了太妃糖.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng hùn hé wù níng jié zhī後 jiù chéng le tài fēi táng.
english: The mixture solidifies into toffee.

hanzi: 这老人想把痰咯出来但他不能。
pinyin: zhè lǎo rén xiǎng bǎ tán luò chū lai dàn tā bù néng。
english: The old man tried to spit up sputum, but he could not.

hanzi: 我的名字叫亚历山大，简称“亚尔”。
pinyin: wǒ de míng zi jiào yà lì shān dà， jiǎn chēng“ yà ěr”。
english: My name is Alexander,"Al" for short.

hanzi: 好。是要豪华型、中型还是小型车？
pinyin: hào。 shì yào háo huá xíng、 zhōng xíng hái shì xiǎo xíng chē？
english: Ok. Luxury, mid-size or compact?

hanzi: 你能告诉我这些鞋子的零售价吗？
pinyin: nǐ néng gào su wǒ zhè xie xié zi de líng shòu jie ma？
english: Could you tell me the retail prices of these shoes?

pinyin: zài jīng jì xiāo tiáo qī jiān， yín háng hěn kě néng dǎo bì
english: In a depression banks are liable to fail.

pinyin: nà mó,  nǐ gǎi biàn lì chǎng le,  nǐ zhè kě chǐ de pàn tú!
english: So you've changed sides, you dirty rat!

hanzi: 【谚】没有了名誉也就没有了生命。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 méi yǒu le míng yù yě jiù méi yǒu le shēng mìng。
english: Take honour from me and my life is done.

pinyin: yǎn lèi yóu shàng yǎn jiǎn xià mian de qì guān fēn mì。
english: Tears are secreted by an organ under the upper eyelid.

pinyin: tā shī zōng yī shì yǐn qǐ le gè zhǒng liú yán fěi yù.
english: Her disappearance gave rise to the wildest rumours.

english: She is a peacock in everything but beauty.

pinyin: xǔ duō rén guī yī tā men fù mǔ suǒ shǔ de jiào pài。
english: Many people adhere to the church of their parents.

pinyin: shùn jiān yī gè duǎn zàn de、 bù què dìng de shí jiān jiàn gé
english: A brief, indefinite interval of time.

pinyin: tā xiān ruò de shēn qū yīn zhèn zhèn ké sou ér fà zhàn。
english: Her slight frame was shaken by bouts of coughing.

hanzi: 直接从碗里咕嘟咕嘟地喝汤是粗俗的
pinyin: zhí jiē zòng wǎn lǐ gū dū gū dū de hè tāng shì cū sú de
english: Slurping soup directly from the bowl is vulgar.

pinyin: yì chú yòng lái chǔ cáng yī fu de yī zhòng guì zi； yī guì
english: A chamber for storing clothes; a wardrobe.

hanzi: 采牡蛎者捉、养殖或专卖牡蛎的人
pinyin: cài mǔ lì zhě zhuō、 yǎng zhí huò zhuān mài mǔ lì de rén
english: One who gathers, cultivates, or sells oysters.

hanzi: 士兵死亡後, 女眷表示沉痛哀悼.
pinyin: shì bīng sǐ wáng後,  nu:3 juàn biǎo shì chén tòng āi dào.
english: The dead soldiers were mourned by their womenfolk.

hanzi: 急欲获得的妄想权力或荣誉的；嫉妒的
pinyin: jí yù huò dé de wàng xiǎng quán lì huò róng yù de； jí dù de
english: Covetous of power or honor; envious.

hanzi: 这银花瓶上刻有花卉浮雕图案。
pinyin: zhè yín huā píng shàng kè yǒu huā huì fú diāo tú àn。
english: The silver vase is embossed with a design of flower.

hanzi: 他们把船开进海港下锚停泊.
pinyin: tā men bǎ chuán kāi jìn hǎi gǎng xià máo tíng bó.
english: They brought the boat into the harbour and dropped (the) anchor.

pinyin: guò qu lún dūn de jiāo tōng cháng yīn yān wù ér shòu zǔ.
english: Smog used to bring London traffic to a standstill.

pinyin: míng chēng， chēng hào（ yòng yú qū fēn de） míng zi huò tou xián
english: A distinguishing name or title.

hanzi: 即便是天涯海角我也要跟随他。
pinyin: jí biàn shì tiān yá hǎi jiǎo wǒ yě yào gēn suí tā。
english: I will follow him to the uttermost parts of the earth.

pinyin: sòng xiǎo hái shàng xué de zhòng dàn yòu tuī jǐ le wǒ！
english: I got saddled with taking the children to school again!

hanzi: 立法者制定或颁布法律的人；立法者
pinyin: lì fǎ zhě zhì dìng huò bān bù fǎ lu:4 de rén； lì fǎ zhě
english: One who makes or enacts laws; a legislator.

hanzi: 总统死後全国陷入了内战.
pinyin: zǒng tǒng sǐ後 quán guó xiàn rù le nèi zhàn.
english: The country (was) plunged into civil war after the death of the President.

hanzi: 喂，玛丽，何时有喜事？快了吧。
pinyin: wèi， Mǎ lì， hé shí yǒu xǐ shì？ kuài le ba。
english: Hello, Mary, when's the happy event? It can't be long now.

hanzi: 我们把讨论的要点归纳一下好吗?
pinyin: wǒ men bǎ tǎo lùn de yào diǎn guī nà yī xià hào ma?
english: Could we have a run-through of the main points discussed?

hanzi: 冻鸡应彻底解冻後再烹调.
pinyin: dòng jī yìng chè dǐ jiě dòng後 zài pēng tiáo.
english: A frozen chicken should be allowed to defrost completely before cooking.

hanzi: 那两个齿轮一啮合, 机器就启动了.
pinyin: nà liǎng gè chǐ lūn yī niè hé,  jī qì jiù qǐ dòng le.
english: The two cog-wheels engaged and the machine started.

hanzi: 新政府将他的地产徵作军用.
pinyin: xīn zhèng fǔ jiàng tā de dì chǎn zhǐ zuò jūn yòng.
english: The new government expropriated his estate for military purposes.

hanzi: 吵闹的声音这样大，我怎能读书呢？
pinyin: chǎo nào de shēng yīn zhè yàng dà， wǒ zěn néng dú shū ne？
english: How can I read with all this row going on?

hanzi: 声誉——主要是死得其时的问题。
pinyin: shēng yú—— zhǔ yào shì sǐ de qí shí de wèn tí。
english: Fame- it is chiefly a matter of die at the right moment.

hanzi: 不好客的没有表现出好客的；不友好的
pinyin: bù hǎo kè de méi yǒu biǎo xiàn chū hào kè de； bù yǒu hǎo de
english: Displaying no hospitality; unfriendly.

hanzi: 忘却、遗忘忘却、遗忘的状态；遗忘
pinyin: wàng què、 yí wàng wàng què、 yí wàng de zhuàng tài； yí wàng
english: A condition of forgetfulness; oblivion.

hanzi: 在拜访岳父之前，他把鞋子擦黑。
pinyin: zài bài fǎng yuè fù zhī qián， tā bǎ xié zi cā hēi。
english: He blacked his shoes before visiting his father-in-law.

hanzi: 耗尽被损耗的状态；精疲力竭，耗尽
pinyin: hào jìn bèi sǔn hào de zhuàng tài； jīng pí lì jié， hào jìn
english: The state of being depleted; exhaustion.

hanzi: 这件衣服由于洗涤而慢慢褪色了。
pinyin: zhè jiàn yī fu yóu yú xǐ dí ér màn màn tùn sè le。
english: The color of the dress faded away gradually on washing.

hanzi: 侦探们又开始在那楝房子警戒了。
pinyin: zhēn tàn men yòu kāi shǐ zài nà liàn fáng zi jǐng jiè le。
english: The detectives resumed their vigil at the house.

hanzi: 玛丽·杜瓦尔夫人转交彼得·布朗先生.
pinyin: Mǎ lì· dù wǎ ěr fū ren zhuǎn jiāo Bǐ dé· bù lǎng xiān sheng.
english: Mr Peter Brown c/o Mme Marie Duval....

hanzi: 为什麽允许这些人随意进入该地?
pinyin: wèi shí mó yǔn xǔ zhè xie rén suí yì jìn rù gāi de?
english: Why give these people licence to enter the place at will?

hanzi: 她生性乐观有助於她渡过难关。
pinyin: tā shēng xìng lè guān yǒu zhù yū tā dù guò nán guān。
english: Her natural resilience helped her overcome the crisis.

hanzi: 你（如果）不付款，他们就要断电。
pinyin: nǐ（ rú guǒ） bù fù kuǎn， tā men jiù yào duàn diàn。
english: Fail to pay and they'll cut off the electricity.

hanzi: 投诉信件源源不断地寄到（总部）.
pinyin: tóu sù xìn jiàn yuán yuán bù duàn de jì dào（ zǒng bù）.
english: Letters of complaint poured in (to head office).

hanzi: 清晰地表达或呈现的；容易理解的
pinyin: qīng xī de biǎo dá huò chéng xiàn de； róng yì lǐ jiě de
english: Clearly expressed or presented; easy to understand.

hanzi: 金属门猛一关上时发出　光的响声.
pinyin: jīn shǔ mén měng yī guān shàng shí fā chū　 guāng de xiǎng shēng.
english: The metal door rang as it slammed shut.

hanzi: 到现在已提名多少人了?
pinyin: dào xiàn zài yǐ tí míng duō shao rén le?
english: How many nominations have there been (ie How many people have been nominated) so far?

hanzi: 健谈的倾向于易于沟通的；爱说话的
pinyin: jiàn tán de qīng xiàng yú yì yú gōu tōng de； ài shuō huà de
english: Inclined to communicate readily; talkative.

hanzi: 久病後他的生命力逐渐在枯竭。
pinyin: jiǔ bìng後 tā de shēng mìng lì zhú jiàn zài kū jié。
english: His life is slowly draining away after a long illness.

hanzi: 他那彬彬有礼的举止显出他是个绅士.
pinyin: tā nà bīn bīn yǒu lǐ de jǔ zhǐ xiǎn chū tā shì gè shēn shì.
english: His polite manners bespoke the gentleman.

hanzi: 飞机猛然俯冲致使驾驶员昏厥.
pinyin: fēi jī měng rán fǔ chòng zhì shǐ jià shǐ yuán hūn jué.
english: The plane dived suddenly, causing the pilot to black out.

hanzi: 荒原荒凉、贫瘠或遭到毁坏之土地
pinyin: huāng yuán huāng liáng、 pín jí huò zāo dào huǐ huài zhī tǔ dì
english: Land that is desolate, barren, or ravaged.

hanzi: 莎士比亚的作品赋予他不朽的声名。
pinyin: suō shì Bǐ yà de zuò pǐn fù yǔ tā bù xiǔ de shēng míng。
english: Shakespeare's works have given him immortality.

hanzi: 分期付的款可於每月最後一日交付.
pinyin: fēn qī fù de kuǎn kě yū měi yuè zuì後 yī rì jiāo fù.
english: Instalments are payable on the last day of the month.

hanzi: 这个剧本通常认为是莎士比亚作的.
pinyin: zhè gè jù běn tōng cháng rèn wéi shì suō shì Bǐ yà zuò de.
english: This play is usually attributed to Shakespeare.

hanzi: 【谚】知识是宝库，实践是钥匙。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 zhī shi shì bǎo kù， shí jiàn shì yào shi。
english: Knowledge is a treasure, but practice is the key to it.

hanzi: 被降级的降级的、丢脸的或降低尊严的
pinyin: bèi jiàng jí de jiàng jí de、 diū liǎn de huò jiàng dī zūn yán de
english: Reduced in rank, dignity, or esteem.

hanzi: 血洗野蛮的、不加区别的杀戳；大屠杀
pinyin: xuè xǐ yě mán de、 bù jiā qū bié de shā chuō； dà tú shā
english: Savage, indiscriminate killing; a massacre.

hanzi: 这个年轻军官被提升为上尉。
pinyin: zhè gè nián qīng jūn guān bèi tí shēng wèi shàng wèi。
english: The young army officer was promoted to the rank of captain.

hanzi: 我提议为新娘新郎的幸福乾杯.
pinyin: wǒ tí yì wèi xīn niáng xīn láng de xìng fú qián bēi.
english: I should like to propose a toast to the bride and bridegroom.

hanzi: 你们公司的海关注册号码是多少？
pinyin: nǐ men gōng sī de hǎi guān zhù cè hào mǎ shì duō shao？
english: What's your company's registration number in customs?

hanzi: 这些可怜的佃户在那个庄园里耕种。
pinyin: zhè xie kě lián de diàn hù zài nèi gè zhuāng yuán lǐ gēng zhòng。
english: The poor tenants farmed in that manor.

hanzi: 飞机猛然俯冲致使驾驶员昏厥。
pinyin: fēi jī měng rán fǔ chòng zhì shǐ jià shǐ yuán hūn jué。
english: The plane dive suddenly, cause the pilot to black out.

hanzi: 我们求生的唯一希望就在於裁军吗?
pinyin: wǒ men qiú shēng de wéi yī xī wàng jiù zài yū cái jūn ma?
english: Does our only hope of survival lie in disarmament?

hanzi: 阴谋，密谋秘密的或不光彩的计划；密谋
pinyin: yīn móu， mì móu mì mì de huò bù guāng cǎi de jì huà； mì móu
english: A secret or underhand scheme; a plot.

hanzi: 莎士比亚的作品赋予他不朽的声名。
pinyin: suō shì Bǐ yà de zuò pǐn fù yǔ tā bù xiǔ de shēng míng。
english: Shakespeare's works have given him immortality.

hanzi: 他由於死要面子而不肯接受帮助.
pinyin: tā yóu yū sǐ yào miàn zi ér bù kěn jiē shòu bāng zhù.
english: He refused to accept help out of a false sense of pride.

hanzi: 他不惜工本为自己造了一幢别墅。
pinyin: tā bù xī gōng běn wèi zì jǐ zào le yī chuáng bié shù。
english: He spares no expense in building a villa for himself.

hanzi: 孩子们常常（为玩具）争吵.
pinyin: hái zi men cháng cháng（ wèi wán jù） zhēng chǎo.
english: The children are always bickering (with each other) (over their toys).

hanzi: 这次销售交涉不知道结果会怎样？
pinyin: zhè cì xiāo shòu jiāo shè bù zhī dào jié guǒ kuài zěn yàng？
english: How is the sale negotiation going to turn out?

hanzi: 他在向小学生贩卖海洛因时被捕.
pinyin: tā zài xiàng xiǎo xué shēng fàn mài hǎi luò yīn shí bèi bǔ.
english: He was caught pushing heroin to schoolchildren.

hanzi: 我宁愿约翰打网球而不玩扑克牌。
pinyin: wǒ nìng yuàn Yuē hàn dǎ wǎng qiú ér bù wàn pū kè pái。
english: I prefer John's playing tennis to his playing cards.

hanzi: 他们失去了首领以後便丧失了斗志.
pinyin: tā men shī qù le shǒu lǐng yǐ後 pián sàng shī le dòu zhì.
english: Losing their leader took all the fight out of them.

hanzi: 机车喷出一股蒸气後就停了下来.
pinyin: jī chē pèn chū yī gǔ zhēng qì後 jiù tíng le xia lai.
english: There was a puff of steam from the engine before it stopped.

hanzi: 她总是抱怨伦敦缺少体育设施.
pinyin: tā zǒng shì bào yuàn lún dūn quē shǎo tǐ yù shè shī.
english: She's always lamenting the lack of sports facilities in town.

hanzi: 他们是这样宣称的，但他们有证据吗？
pinyin: tā men shì zhè yàng xuān chēng de， dàn tā men yǒu zhèng jù ma？
english: So they alleged, but have they any proof?

hanzi: 我们不能冒（失掉全部钱的）风险.
pinyin: wǒ men bù néng mào（ shī diào quán bù qián de） fēng xiǎn.
english: We can't run the risk (of losing all that money).

hanzi: 她出身上层社会[她社会地位极高].
pinyin: tā chū shēn shàng céng shè huì[ tā shè huì dì wèi jí gāo].
english: She's out of the top drawer/She's very top drawer.

hanzi: 屡次侵占我的闲暇时间, 我很反感.
pinyin: lu:3 cì qīn zhàn wǒ de xián xiá shí jiān,  wǒ hěn fǎn gǎn.
english: I resent these incursions into/upon my leisure time.

hanzi: 对市场动态，烦告货主意向如何？
pinyin: duì shì chǎng dòng tài， fán gào huò zhǔ yi xiàng rú hé？
english: Advise how shipper dispose towards market movement?

hanzi: 她带病努力工作, 真是难能可贵!
pinyin: tā dài bìng nǔ lì gōng zuò,  zhēn shì nàn néng kě guì!
english: She works so hard in spite of her illness: she's a marvel!

hanzi: 【谚】智者热爱真理，愚者回避真理。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 zhì zhě rè ài zhēn lǐ， yú zhě huí bì zhēn lǐ。
english: Wise men love truth, whereas fools shun it.

hanzi: 自由的没有限制或局限的；不受约束的
pinyin: zì yóu de méi yǒu xiàn zhì huò jú xiàn de； bù shòu yuē shù de
english: Not limited or restricted; unrestrained.

hanzi: 唱流行歌曲的歌星什麽时候都是新闻人物.
pinyin: chàng liú xíng gē qǔ de gē xīng shí mó shí hou dōu shì xīn wén rén wù.
english: Pop stars are always news.

hanzi: 蜡烛发出轻轻的毕剥声後就熄灭了.
pinyin: là zhú fā chū qīng qīng de bì bō shēng後 jiù xī miè le.
english: The candle gave a few faint splutters and then went out.

hanzi: 狗吠声有特色地低沉的、粗哑的狗叫
pinyin: gǒu fèi shēng yǒu tè sè de dī chén de、 cū yǎ de gǒu jiào
english: The characteristically deep, gruff bark of a dog.

hanzi: 我们得等电源接通後才能搬进去.
pinyin: wǒ men de děng diàn yuán jiē tōng後 cái néng bān jìn qù.
english: We can't move in until the electricity has been laid on.

hanzi: 农夫用镰刀在地里刈出一条路来。
pinyin: nóng fū yòng lián dāo zài de lǐ yì chū yī tiáo lù lái。
english: The farmer cut a swathe in the field with his scythe.

hanzi: 他受妻子怂恿进行这些非法活动.
pinyin: tā shòu qī zi sǒng yǒng jìn xíng zhè xie fēi fǎ huó dòng.
english: He was abetted in these illegal activities by his wife.

hanzi: 难民苦於缺少食物和医药用品.
pinyin: nàn mín kǔ yū quē shǎo shí wù huò yī yào yòng pǐn.
english: The refugees are suffering for want of food and medical supplies.

hanzi: 我还在学习, 别指望我十全十美!
pinyin: wǒ huán zài xué xí,  biè zhǐ wàng wǒ shí quán shí měi!
english: I'm still only a learner, so don't expect perfection!

hanzi: 四条林荫大道从那广场向四方延伸。
pinyin: sì tiáo lín yìn dà dào zòng nà guǎng chǎng xiàng sì fāng yán shēn。
english: Four avenues radiate from the square.

hanzi: 不要逾期不缴房租, 否则会被逐出.
pinyin: bù yào yú qī bù jiǎo fáng zū,  fǒu zé kuài bèi zhú chū.
english: Don't fall behind with the rent, or you'll be evicted.

hanzi: 他为伦敦的一家大公司到处推销地毯.
pinyin: tā wèi lún dūn de yī jiā dà gōng sī dào chù tuī xiāo dì tǎn.
english: He travels in carpets for a big London firm.

hanzi: 残忍的行为与他的本性[与他]格格不入.
pinyin: cán rěn de xíng wéi yù tā de běn xìng[ yù tā] gé gé bù rù.
english: Cruelty was quite alien to his nature/to him.

hanzi: 残忍的行为与他的本性[与他]格格不入.
pinyin: cán rěn de xíng wéi yù tā de běn xìng[ yù tā] gé gé bù rù.
english: Cruelty was quite alien to his nature/to him.

hanzi: 我身上没带现钱，明天付你行吗？
pinyin: wǒ shēn shàng mò dài xiàn qián， míng tiān fù nǐ xìng ma？
english: I have no ready cash on me, can I pay you tomorrow?

hanzi: 怎样才能使你相信我是真心实意的呢?
pinyin: zěn yàng cái néng shǐ nǐ xiāng xìn wǒ shì zhēn xīn shí yì de ne?
english: How can I persuade you that I am sincere?

hanzi: 我们怎样才能延长短促的人生？
pinyin: wǒ men zěn yàng cái néng yán cháng duǎn cù de rén shēng？
english: How can we endeavor to prolong the brevity of human life?

hanzi: 请你把这颗纽扣缝到我的衬衫上好吗？
pinyin: qǐng nǐ bǎ zhè kē niǔ kòu fèng dào wǒ de chèn shān shàng hào ma？
english: Would you sew this button onto my shirt?

hanzi: 你的名字已登记在选民名册上了吗？
pinyin: nǐ de míng zi yǐ dēng jì zài xuǎn mín míng cè shàng le ma？
english: Have you got your name on the electoral register?

hanzi: 她（一点都）不喜欢人家说她丰满.
pinyin: tā（ yī diǎn dōu） bù xǐ huan rén jiā shuō tā fēng mǎn.
english: She didn't take (at all) kindly to being called plump.

hanzi: 他们是这样宣称的，但他们有证据吗？
pinyin: tā men shì zhè yàng xuān chēng de， dàn tā men yǒu zhèng jù ma？
english: So they alleged, but have they any proof?

hanzi: 他引用莎士比亚的话是恰如其分的。
pinyin: tā yǐn yòng suō shì Bǐ yà de huà shì qià rú qí fèn de。
english: His quotation from Shakespeare is appropriate.

hanzi: 骑自行车横越美国? 听起来有些冒险.
pinyin: qí zì xíng chē hèng yuè Měi guó?  tìng qǐ lai yǒu xiē mào xiǎn.
english: Cycle across America? Sounds a bit dodgy to me.

hanzi: 轰炸之後, 只剩下几所房子没倒塌.
pinyin: hōng zhà zhī後,  zhǐ shèng xià jǐ suǒ fáng zi mò dǎo tā.
english: After the bombing only a few houses were left standing.

hanzi: 海关查出了隐藏在货物中的海洛因.
pinyin: hǎi guān chá chū le yǐn cáng zài huò wù zhòng dì hǎi luò yīn.
english: The Customs have found heroin hidden in freight.

hanzi: 我要发火了，你为何瞒我这么多事？
pinyin: wǒ yào fā huǒ le， nǐ wèi hé mán wǒ zhè me duō shì？
english: I shall lose my temper. Why do you hide so much from me?

hanzi: 我们队在上季度的联赛中排名最後.
pinyin: wǒ men duì zài shàng jì dù de lián sài zhòng pái míng zuì後.
english: Our team came/was bottom of the league last season.

hanzi: 酒石形成于酒的发酵桶的内侧。
pinyin: jiǔ shí xíng chéng yú jiǔ de fā jiào tǒng de nèi zhāi。
english: Tartar forms on the inside of a cask in which wine is fermented.

hanzi: 彬彬有礼和谈吐得体是文雅的标志。
pinyin: bīn bīn yǒu lǐ hé tán tù de tǐ shì wén yǎ de biāo zhì。
english: Good manners and correct speech are marks of refinement.

hanzi: 蜡烛发出轻轻的毕剥声後就熄灭了.
pinyin: là zhú fā chū qīng qīng de bì bō shēng後 jiù xī miè le.
english: The candle gave a few faint splutters and then went out.

hanzi: 他的谦逊[愉快的样子]都是装出来的。
pinyin: tā de qiān xùn[ yú kuài de yàng zi] dōu shì zhuāng chū lai de。
english: His modesty [air of joviality] was all put on.

hanzi: 亟须找出解决方法, 这是鞭策他的动力.
pinyin: qì xū zhǎo chū jiě jué fāng fǎ,  zhè shì biān cè tā de dòng lì.
english: The need to find a solution urged him on.

hanzi: 助学金削减後, 学生人数大大减少.
pinyin: zhù xué jīn xuē jiǎn後,  xué sheng rén shù dà dà jiǎn shǎo.
english: Student numbers have been decimated by cuts in grants.

hanzi: 她把全部存款取出後离开了那个国家.
pinyin: tā bǎ quán bù cún kuǎn qǔ chū後 lí kāi le nèi gè guó jiā.
english: She withdrew all her savings and left the country.

hanzi: 【谚】知识使人谦虚，无知使人骄傲。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 zhī shi shǐ rén qiān xū， wú zhī shǐ rén jiāo ào。
english: Knowledge makes humble; ignorance make proud.

hanzi: 我们对她离家後去往何处毫无线索.
pinyin: wǒ men duì tā lí jiā後 qù wàng hé chù háo wú xiàn suǒ.
english: We have no clue as to where she went after she left home.

hanzi: 那老汉拄著拐杖一瘸一拐地走著.
pinyin: nà lǎo hàn zhǔ著 guǎi zhàng yī qué yī guǎi de zǒu著.
english: The old man hobbled along (the road) with the aid of his stick.

hanzi: 他们为早日结束苦难而祈祷.
pinyin: tā men wèi zǎo rì jié shù kǔ nàn ér qí dǎo.
english: They prayed (to God) for an end to their sufferings/for their sufferings to end.

hanzi: 她叔叔背井离乡十年後返回英国.
pinyin: tā shū shu bèi jǐng lí xiāng shí nián後 fǎn huí Yīng guó.
english: After an exile of ten years her uncle returned to Britain.

hanzi: 你现在能帮我兑现这张邮政汇票吗？
pinyin: nǐ xiàn zài néng bāng wǒ duì xiàn zhè zhāng yóu zhèng huì piào ma？
english: Can you cash this postal order for me now?

hanzi: 由於技术上出现临时故障而发射延期.
pinyin: yóu yū jì shù shàng chū xiàn lín shí gù zhàng ér fā shè yán qí.
english: The launch was delayed by a technical hitch.

hanzi: 身体经不住那麽大剂量的放射线。
pinyin: shēn tǐ jīng bú zhù nà mó dà jì liáng de fàng shè xiàn。
english: The body cannot tolerate such large amounts of radiation.

hanzi: ｀部长, 你是要辞职吗?＇｀无可奉告.＇
pinyin: ｀ bù zhǎng,  nǐ shì yào cí zhí ma?＇｀ wú kě fèng gào.＇
english: `Will you resign, Minister?' `No comment!'

hanzi: 丰富的想象力；新思想的丰富源泉
pinyin: fēng fù de xiǎng xiàng lì； xīn sī xiǎng de fēng fù yuán quán
english: A fertile imagination; a fertile source of new ideas.

hanzi: 我们已经灌溉了荒芜地区使它肥沃。
pinyin: wǒ men yǐ jīng guàn gài le huāng wú dì qū shǐ tā féi wò。
english: We have irrigated the desert area to make it fertile.

hanzi: 大选後有几位新议员脱颖而出.
pinyin: dà xuǎn後 yǒu jǐ wèi xīn yì yuán tuō yǐng ér chū.
english: After the election several new Members of Parliament came to the fore.

hanzi: 这条消息是关於最近的首脑级会议的.
pinyin: zhè tiáo xiāo xi shì guān yū zuì jìn de shǒu nǎo jí huì yì de.
english: The news is all about the latest summit meeting.

hanzi: 我只差一本书就可配齐狄更斯全集了。
pinyin: wǒ zhǐ cī yī běn shū jiù kě pèi qí dí gèng sī quán jí le。
english: I need one volume to complete my set of Dickens.

hanzi: 移居到发展中地区的人不久就迁徙到内地了.
pinyin: yí jū dào fā zhǎn zhòng dì qū de rén bù jiǔ jiù qiān xǐ dào nèi dì le.
english: Settlers soon spread inland.

hanzi: 她待他那种屈尊纡贵的样子, 他十分愤恨.
pinyin: tā dài tā nà zhòng qū zūn yū guì de yàng zi,  tā shí fēn fèn hèn.
english: He resented the way she patronized him.

hanzi: 那次行进速度很快, 到中午已抵达伦敦.
pinyin: nà cì xíng jìn sù dù hěn kuài,  dào zhōng wǔ yǐ dǐ dá lún dūn.
english: It was good going to reach London by midday.

hanzi: 彬彬有礼和谈吐得体是文雅的标志。
pinyin: bīn bīn yǒu lǐ hé tán tù de tǐ shì wén yǎ de biāo zhì。
english: Good manners and correct speech are marks of refinement.

hanzi: 她提　一个棕色的纸包，里面是书。
pinyin: tā tí　 yī gè zōng sè de zhǐ bāo， lǐ miàn shì shū。
english: She was carrying a parcel of books done up in brown paper.

hanzi: 他毫无羞耻之心，而且从不觉得内疚。
pinyin: tā háo wú xiū chǐ zhī xīn， ér qiě cóng bù jué de nèi jiù。
english: He had no sense of shame and never felt guilty.

hanzi: 没有迹象表明萧条已经到了极点.
pinyin: méi yǒu jī xiàng biǎo míng xiāo tiáo yǐ jīng dào le jí diǎn.
english: There is no sign that the recession has bottomed out yet.

hanzi: 那个流浪乞丐乔装得同侦探一样。
pinyin: nèi gè liú làng qǐ gài qiáo zhuāng de tóng zhēn tàn yí yàng。
english: The tramp was none other than a detective in disguise.

hanzi: 内脏内部脏器，尤指大小肠；内脏
pinyin: nèi zàng nèi bù zàng qì， yóu zhǐ dà xiǎo cháng； nèi zàng
english: The internal organs, especially the intestines; viscera.

hanzi: 一年有几个季节？ 一年有四季。
pinyin: yī nián yǒu jǐ ge jì jié？  yī nián yǒu sì jì。
english: How many seasons are there in a year? There are four seasons in a year.

hanzi: 抗议者藐视官方的示威禁令.
pinyin: kàng yì zhě miǎo shì guān fāng de shì wēi jìn lìng.
english: The protesters showed their defiance of the official ban on demonstrations.

hanzi: 你读过另一部关于罗马帝国的史诗吗？
pinyin: nǐ dú guò lìng yī bù guān yú Luó mǎ dì guó de shǐ shī ma？
english: Have you read another epic about the Roman Empire?

hanzi: 他喝著廉价的香槟酒, 样子十分放荡.
pinyin: tā hè著 lián jià de xiāng bīn jiǔ,  yàng zi shí fēn fàng dàng.
english: He was drinking cheap champagne with a raffish air.

hanzi: 他心头一直萦绕著可能失业的恐惧感.
pinyin: tā xīn tóu yī zhí yíng rào著 kě néng shī yè de kǒng jù gǎn.
english: The spectre of unemployment was always on his mind.

hanzi: 这个书架承受得住这些书的重量吗?
pinyin: zhè gè shū jià chéng shòu de zhù zhè xie shū de zhòng liàng ma?
english: Will this shelf sustain the weight of all these books?

hanzi: 银行的职员从格栅後面看著顾客.
pinyin: yín háng de zhí yuán zòng gé zhà後 miàn kàn著 gù kè.
english: The bank clerk peered at the customer through/from behind the grille.

hanzi: 尼任斯基对演技精益求精一丝不苟.
pinyin: ní rèn sī jī duì yǎn jì jīng yì qiú jīng yī sī bù gǒu.
english: Nijinsky was unsparing in his demands for perfection.

hanzi: 他们靠他微薄的薪金勉强　口.
pinyin: tā men kào tā wéi bó de xīn jīn miǎn qiǎng　 kǒu.
english: They eke out a bare existence (ie They scarcely manage) on his low salary.

hanzi: 士兵在列队行进之後，很快便解散了。
pinyin: shì bīng zài liè duì xíng jìn zhī後， hěn kuài pián jiě sàn le。
english: The men fell out quickly after their march.

hanzi: 这一新定单意味著（我们）得加班加点.
pinyin: zhè yī xīn dìng shàn yì wèi著（ wǒ men） de jiā bān jiā diǎn.
english: This new order will mean (us) working overtime.

hanzi: 他说："我的竞选已始出现声势。"
pinyin: tā shuō：" wǒ de jìng xuǎn yǐ shǐ chū xiàn shēng shì。"
english: "There is momentum beginning to occur is my campaign, "he said.

hanzi: 他吃完面包後，去外套上的面包屑。
pinyin: tā chī wán miàn bāo後， qù wài tào shàng de miàn bāo xiè。
english: After eating the loaf he whisked the crumbs off his coat.

hanzi: 在去夏威夷的旅途中, 我们都很开心。
pinyin: zài qù xià wēi yí de lu:3 tú zhòng,  wǒ men dōu hěn kāi xīn。
english: On the trip to Hawaii, we were all in high spirits.

hanzi: 我刚煮好咖啡--你能抽空儿喝点儿吗?
pinyin: wǒ gāng zhǔ hào kā fēi-- nǐ néng chōu kòng er hè diǎn er ma?
english: I've just made some coffee have you time for a quickie?

hanzi: 果断，决断性格或行动的坚定；坚决
pinyin: guǒ duàn， jué duàn xìng gé huò xíng dòng de jiān dìng； jiān jué
english: Firmness of character or action; determination.

hanzi: 他们须疏浚运河河道轮船方可通航.
pinyin: tā men xū shū jùn yùn hé hé dào lún chuán fāng kě tōng háng.
english: They have to dredge the canal so that ships can use it.

hanzi: 煤、石油和矿产品都是工业原料。
pinyin: méi、 shí yóu huò kuàng chǎn pǐn dōu shì gōng yè yuán liào。
english: Coal, oil and mineral are the raw material of industry.

hanzi: 种子，籽如苹果或桔子水果的小种子
pinyin: zhǒng zi， zǐ rú píng guǒ huò jú zi shuǐ guǒ de xiǎo zhǒng zi
english: The small seed of a fruit, as that of an apple or orange.

hanzi: 有两个囚犯设计欺骗了警卫而逃走了.
pinyin: yǒu liǎng gè qiú fàn shè jì qī piàn le jǐng wèi ér táo zǒu le.
english: Two prisoners outwitted their guards and got away.

hanzi: 不要担心马达，会还给你们的[找到的]。
pinyin: bù yào dān xīn mǎ dá， kuài huán jǐ nǐ men de[ zhǎo dào de]。
english: Don't worry about the motor.You'll get it back.

hanzi: 听我说－－他背着他的亲友们溜走了。
pinyin: tìng wǒ shuō－－ tā bèi zhuó tā de qīn yǒu men liù zǒu le。
english: Mind what I say-he has given his relatives the slip.

hanzi: 他的一条腿跛了，走路借助于拐杖。
pinyin: tā de yī tiáo tuǐ bǒ le， zǒu lù jiè zhù yú guǎi zhàng。
english: He is lame in one leg and walks with the help of a crutch.

hanzi: 热气经白色的沙面反射形成了蜃景.
pinyin: rè qì jīng bái sè de shā miàn fǎn shè xíng chéng le shèn jǐng.
english: The heat reflected from the white sand formed a mirage.

hanzi: 奶酪蛋糕非常可口。要不要来一块？
pinyin: nǎi lào dàn gāo fēi cháng kě kǒu。 yào bu yào lái yī kuài？
english: The cheesecake is very tasty. Can I bring you a piece?

hanzi: 她看起来彷佛刚从外太空回来似的。
pinyin: tā kàn qǐ lai páng fú gāng zòng wài tài kōng huí lai sì de。
english: It looks as if she had just come back from outer space.

hanzi: 恣意挥霍的毫不在意地浪费的；极其奢侈的
pinyin: zì yì huī huò de háo bú zài yì de làng fèi de； jí qí shē chǐ de
english: Recklessly wasteful; wildly extravagant.

hanzi: 她写了一本书抨击我们这腐败的社会.
pinyin: tā xiě le yī běn shū pēng jī wǒ men zhè fǔ bài de shè huì.
english: She wrote a book declaiming against our corrupt society.

hanzi: 现售货物；现在正在衰老下去的独裁者
pinyin: xiàn shòu huò wù； xiàn zài zhèng zài shuāi lǎo xià qu de dú cái zhě
english: Goods now on sale; the now aging dictator.

hanzi: 兔子在澳洲是较为近期引进的动物.
pinyin: tù zi zài ào zhōu shì jiào wèi jìn qī yǐn jìn de dòng wù.
english: The rabbit is a relatively recent introduction in Australia.

hanzi: 敌舰的影像已显现在雷达（屏幕）上.
pinyin: dí jiàn de yǐng xiàng yǐ xiǎn xiàn zài léi dá（ píng mù） shàng.
english: Enemy ships were detected on the radar (screen).

hanzi: 很多黄金饰物回炉後铸成了金币.
pinyin: hěn duō huáng jīn shì wù huí lú後 zhù chéng le jīn bì.
english: Many of the gold ornaments were melted down to be made into coins.

hanzi: 这种用法现亦逐渐多见於现在时态。
pinyin: zhè zhǒng yòng fǎ xiàn yì zhú jiàn duō xiàn yū xiàn zài shí tài。
english: It is also increasingly found in the present tense.

hanzi: 衣、 食、 住所是生活的基本必需品.
pinyin: yì、  sì、  zhù suǒ shì shēng huó de jī běn bì xū pǐn.
english: Food, clothing and shelter are all basic necessities of life.

hanzi: 审讯暂停一星期[下星期继续进行].
pinyin: shěn xùn zàn tíng yī xīng qī[ xià xīng qī jì xù jìn xíng].
english: The trial was adjourned for a week/until the following week.

hanzi: 对照物对比平行的成分、项目或主题
pinyin: duì zhào wù duì bǐ píng xíng de chéng fèn、 xiàng mù huò zhǔ tí
english: A contrasting but parallel element, item, or theme.

hanzi: ＂幸好，这种飞机好象相当安全。＂
pinyin: ＂ xìng hǎo， zhè zhǒng fēi jī hǎo xiàng xiāng dāng ān quán。＂
english: "Fortunately, the planes appear to be quite safe."

hanzi: 约翰在离去前特意向女主人道谢。
pinyin: Yuē hàn zài lí qù qián tè yì xiàng nu:3 zhǔ rén dào xiè。
english: John made a point of thanking his hostess before his leaving.

hanzi: 约翰在离去前特意向女主人道谢。
pinyin: Yuē hàn zài lí qù qián tè yì xiàng nu:3 zhǔ rén dào xiè。
english: John made a point of thanking his hostess before his leaving.

hanzi: 虚幻的想法易变的或幻想的想法；空想
pinyin: xū huàn de xiǎng fǎ yì biàn de huò huàn xiǎng de xiǎng fǎ； kōng xiǎng
english: A capricious or fantastic idea; a conceit.

hanzi: 约翰已经著手集邮, 好像真入迷了.
pinyin: Yuē hàn yǐ jīng著 shǒu jí yóu,  hǎo xiàng zhēn rù mí le.
english: John's taken up stamp-collecting; he seems really bitten by it.

hanzi: 他得意地领著他那标致的伴侣遛公园.
pinyin: tā dé yì de lǐng著 tā nà Biāo zhì de bàn lu:3 liù gōng yuán.
english: He proudly promenaded his elegant companion in the park.

hanzi: 柩车装运棺材去教堂或墓地的车辆
pinyin: jiù jū zhuāng yùn guān cái qù jiào táng huò mù dì de chē liàng
english: A vehicle for conveying a coffin to a church or cemetery.

hanzi: 孩子们在沙滩上嬉戏真是乐得其所.
pinyin: hái zi men zài shā tān shàng xī xì zhēn shì yuè de qí suǒ.
english: The children are really in their element playing on the beach.

hanzi: 金属板锻造、轧制，或铸造而成的金属板
pinyin: jīn shǔ bǎn duàn zào、 yà zhì， huò zhù zào ér chéng de jīn shǔ bǎn
english: A sheet of hammered, rolled, or cast metal.

hanzi: 遗传与环境可以决定一个人的性格吗?
pinyin: yí chuán yù huán jìng kě yǐ jué dìng yī gè rén de xìng gé ma?
english: Do heredity and environment determine one's character?

hanzi: 寻物: 遗失钻戒一枚, 寻得者将获重酬.
pinyin: xún wù:  yí shī zuàn jiè yī méi,  xún de zhě jiàng huò zhòng chóu.
english: Lost: one diamond ring. Finder will be rewarded.

hanzi: 考卷答完後请上交（给老师）.
pinyin: kǎo juàn dá wán後 qǐng shàng jiāo（ jǐ lǎo shī）.
english: Please give your examination papers in (to the teacher) when you've finished.

hanzi: 凶恶，残忍凶恶的状态或特点；凶猛
pinyin: xiōng è， cán rěn xiōng è de zhuàng tài huò tè diǎn； xiōng měng
english: The state or quality of being ferocious; fierceness.

hanzi: 刺耳的声音刺耳的碰撞声或摩擦声；不和谐
pinyin: cì ěr de shēng yīn cì ěr de pèng zhuàng shēng huò mó cā shēng； bù hé xié
english: Harsh or grating sound; discord.

hanzi: 朴实的样式或风格上朴实简单的；质朴的
pinyin: pǔ shí de yàng shì huò fēng gé shàng pǔ shí jiǎn dān de； zhì pǔ de
english: Pure or simple in design or style; austere.

hanzi: 种族歧视问题是政治上的棘手问题.
pinyin: zhǒng zú qí shì wèn tí shì zhèng zhì shàng de jí shǒu wèn tí.
english: The racial discrimination issue is a political hot potato.

hanzi: 我熟悉伦敦，那是我度过童年的地方。
pinyin: wǒ shú xī lún dūn， nà shì wǒ dù guò tóng nián de dì fang。
english: I know London as the place where I spent my childhood.

hanzi: 我的手指接触那软膏之後就疼起来了.
pinyin: wǒ de shǒu zhǐ jiē chù nà ruǎn gāo zhī後 jiù téng qǐ lai le.
english: My fingers are beginning to prick after touching that paste.

hanzi: 对于这种新体制，你看会有什么问题吗？
pinyin: duì yú zhè zhǒng xīn tǐ zhì， nǐ kàn kuài yǒu shén me wèn tí ma？
english: Do you foresee any problems with the new system?

hanzi: 他们是何等竭尽全力来完成这一任务啊！
pinyin: tā men shì hé děng jié jìn quán lì lái wán chéng zhè yī rèn wu a！
english: How they laid about them to fulfill the task!

hanzi: 所谓的叛徒均已（从队伍中）清洗出去.
pinyin: suǒ wèi de pàn tú jūn yǐ（ zòng duì wǔ zhòng） qīng xǐ chū qù.
english: So-called traitors were purged (from their ranks).

hanzi: 图表上的曲线突降之後逐渐趋於平稳.
pinyin: tú biǎo shàng de qū xiàn tū xiáng zhī後 zhú jiàn qū yū píng wěn.
english: The graph flattens out gradually after a steep fall.

hanzi: 悬挂式滑翔机藉著暖气流在高空飞行.
pinyin: xuán guà shì huá xiáng jī jiè著 nuǎn qì liú zài gāo kōng fēi xíng.
english: Currents of warm air keep the hang-gliders aloft.

hanzi: 更改，改变由改变导致的状态；更改
pinyin: gēng gǎi， gǎi biàn yóu gǎi biàn dǎo zhì de zhuàng tài； gēng gǎi
english: The condition resulting from altering; modification.

hanzi: 这杆梭镖是江西根据地时代传下来的。
pinyin: zhè gǎn suō biāo shì jiāng xī gēn jù dì shí dài zhuàn xia lai de。
english: The spear descends from the Jiangxi-base days.

hanzi: 水灾过後无家可归的人不计其数.
pinyin: shuǐ zāi guò後 wú jiā kě guī de rén bù jì qí shuò.
english: It's impossible to put a figure on the number of homeless after the flood.

hanzi: 他们怀着浓厚的兴趣聆听着演讲者。
pinyin: tā men huái zhuó nóng hòu de xìng qu líng tīng zhuó yǎn jiǎng zhě。
english: They listened to the speaker with profound interest.

hanzi: 这孩子要有人督促, 否则她什麽也不干.
pinyin: zhè hái zi yào yǒu rén dū cù,  fǒu zé tā shí mó yě bù gàn.
english: One has to push the child or she will do no work at all.

hanzi: 孩子们撕开蚕茧看看里面有没有蛹。
pinyin: hái zi men sī kāi cán jiǎn kàn kan lǐ miàn yǒu méi yǒu yǒng。
english: The children tore the cocoon open to see if there was a pupa.

hanzi: 我再说一遍: 跑道尚未畅通, 不能起飞.
pinyin: wǒ zài shuō yī biàn:  pǎo dào shàng wèi chàng tōng,  bù néng qǐ fēi.
english: I repeat: the runway is not clear for take-off.

hanzi: 前方直接在前面的地区、部位或位置
pinyin: qián fāng zhí jiē zài qián miàn de dì qū、 bù wèi huò wèi zhi
english: The area, location, or position directly before or ahead.

hanzi: 悬挂式滑翔机藉著暖气流在高空飞行.
pinyin: xuán guà shì huá xiáng jī jiè著 nuǎn qì liú zài gāo kōng fēi xíng.
english: Currents of warm air keep the hang-gliders aloft.

hanzi: 他动辄发脾气，你要小心地对付他。
pinyin: tā dòng zhé fà pí qì， nǐ yào xiǎo xīn de duì fu tā。
english: He gets angry ever easily; you must handle him with kid gloves.

hanzi: 无论境遇好坏她的丈夫都对她忠贞不渝.
pinyin: wú lùn jìng yù hǎo huài tā de zhàng fu dōu duì tā zhōng zhēn bù yú.
english: Her husband stuck by her in good times and bad.

hanzi: 巨大的，庞大的规模巨大或大得出奇的；巨大的
pinyin: jù dà de， páng dà de guī mó jù dà huò dà dé chū qí de； jù dà de
english: Of enormous size or magnitude; huge.

hanzi: 无论境遇好坏她的丈夫都对她忠贞不渝.
pinyin: wú lùn jìng yù hǎo huài tā de zhàng fu dōu duì tā zhōng zhēn bù yú.
english: Her husband stuck by her in good times and bad.

hanzi: 我觉得这儿很憋气, 咱们开几扇窗户好吗?
pinyin: wǒ jué de zhèr hěn biē qì,  zán men kāi jǐ shàn chuāng hu hào ma?
english: I'm suffocating in here; can't we open a few windows?

hanzi: 他说他没有时间, 或是诸如此类的藉口.
pinyin: tā shuō tā méi yǒu shí jiān,  huò shì zhū rú cǐ lèi de jiè kǒu.
english: He said he hadn't got time or made some such excuse.

hanzi: 女王将爵士头衔授予几位杰出人士.
pinyin: nu:3 wáng jiàng jué shì tou xián shòu yǔ jǐ wèi jié chū rén shì.
english: The Queen conferred knighthoods on several distinguished men.

hanzi: 他装作若无其事, 藉以掩饰内心的不安.
pinyin: tā zhuāng zuò ruò wú qí shì,  jiè yǐ yǎn shì nèi xīn de bù ān.
english: He conceals his worries behind a mask of nonchalance.

hanzi: 昨天发生的事故应该归咎于他的愚笨。
pinyin: zuó tiān fā shēng de shì gù yīng gāi guī jiù yú tā de yú bèn。
english: The accident happened yesterday owed to his foolishness.

hanzi: 除酒之外, 烟草在多数国家都要徵税.
pinyin: chú jiǔ zhī wài,  yān cǎo zài duō shù guó jiā dōu yào zhǐ shuì.
english: Tobacco is taxed in most countries, along with alcohol.

hanzi: 希罗宁姆斯·博希是怪诞派绘画大师。
pinyin: xī luó níng mǔ sī· bó xī shì guài dàn pài huì huà dà shī。
english: Hieronymus Bosch was a master of the grotesque in painting.

hanzi: 这个错误证明他也是个凡人；人的脆弱
pinyin: zhè gè cuò wù zhèng míng tā yě shì gè fán rén； rén de cuì ruò
english: A mistake that shows he's only human; human frailty.

hanzi: 他从事于物理研究／这一课题许多年了。
pinyin: tā cóng shì yú wù lǐ yán jiū／ zhè yī kè tí xǔ duō nián le。
english: He has worked at physics/the topic for many years.

hanzi: 他贬低她所作的努力（认为是浪费时间）.
pinyin: tā biǎn dī tā suǒ zuò de nǔ lì（ rèn wéi shì làng fèi shí jiān）.
english: He decried her efforts (as a waste of time).

hanzi: 想到还需重新考试，我就感到沮丧。
pinyin: xiǎng dào huán xū chóng xīn kǎo shì， wǒ jiù gǎn dào jǔ sàng。
english: The thought of having to take the exam again depressed me.

hanzi: 金属板锻造、轧制，或铸造而成的金属板
pinyin: jīn shǔ bǎn duàn zào、 yà zhì， huò zhù zào ér chéng de jīn shǔ bǎn
english: A sheet of hammered, rolled, or cast metal.

hanzi: 图书馆的书是按照[根据]科目分类的.
pinyin: tú shū guǎn de shū shì àn zhào[ gēn jù] kē mù fēn lèi de.
english: The books in the library are classified by/according to subject.

hanzi: 他的懦弱的行为遭到了同事们的嘲笑。
pinyin: tā de nuò ruò de xíng wéi zāo dào le tóng shì men de cháo xiào。
english: His cowardly behavior was laughed at by his colleagues.

hanzi: 诱捕一种手段，用以把…引入危险的境地
pinyin: yòu bǔ yī zhòng shǒu duàn， yòng yǐ bǎ… yǐn rù wēi xiǎn de jìng dì
english: A means used to mislead or lead into danger.

hanzi: 小小蜜蜂多忙碌／利用良机不放松。
pinyin: xiǎo xiǎo mì fēng duō máng lù／ lì yòng liáng jī bù fàng sōng。
english: How doth the little busy bee/Improve each shining hour.

hanzi: 图书馆的书是按照[根据]科目分类的.
pinyin: tú shū guǎn de shū shì àn zhào[ gēn jù] kē mù fēn lèi de.
english: The books in the library are classified by/according to subject.

hanzi: 你能否给我一份有规格说明的价目单吗？
pinyin: nǐ néng pǐ jǐ wǒ yī fèn yǒu guī gé shuō míng de jià mù shàn ma？
english: Can you give me a price list with specification?

hanzi: 警铃响起, 顾客纷纷（从银行）逃走.
pinyin: jǐng líng xiǎng qǐ,  gù kè fēn fēn（ zòng yín háng） táo zǒu.
english: The customers fled (from the bank) when the alarm sounded.

hanzi: 她为寻回遗失的手镯提出以酬金答谢.
pinyin: tā wèi xún huí yí shī de shǒu zhuó tí chū yǐ chóu jīn dá xiè.
english: She offered a reward for the return of her lost bracelet.

hanzi: 他的小说我都爱看, 只是最後一部除外.
pinyin: tā de xiǎo shuō wǒ dōu ài kàn,  zhǐ shì zuì後 yī bù chú wài.
english: I enjoyed all his novels with the exception of his last.

hanzi: 这寥寥数语充分显示了她的高贵品质。
pinyin: zhè liáo liáo shuò yù chōng fèn xiǎn shì le tā de gāo guì pǐn zhì。
english: These few words fully revealed her noble quality.

hanzi: 给你施麻醉後, 你就什麽也感觉不到了.
pinyin: jǐ nǐ shī má zuì後,  nǐ jiù shí mó yě gǎn jué bù dào le.
english: You'll be under (an) anaesthetic, so you won't feel a thing.

hanzi: 不体贴的不考虑他人感情的；不得体的
pinyin: bù tǐ tiē de bù kǎo lu:4 tā rén gǎn qíng de； bù dé tǐ de
english: Lacking in consideration for the feelings of others; tactless.

hanzi: 她和妹妹合股经营[他们合伙经营].
pinyin: tā huò mèi mei hé gǔ jīng yíng[ tā men hé huǒ jīng yíng].
english: She worked in partnership with her sister/They worked in partnership.

hanzi: 我们能否确定这一犯罪动机是出於嫉妒?
pinyin: wǒ men néng pǐ què dìng zhè yī fàn zuì dòng jī shì chū yū jí dù?
english: Can we assign jealousy as the motive for the crime?

hanzi: 他是个精明的、有时候冷酷无情的对手。
pinyin: tā shì gè jīng míng de、 yǒu shí hou lěng kù wú qíng de duì shǒu。
english: He is a shrewd and sometimes ruthless adversary.

hanzi: 两船相撞之後都挣扎著驶进海港.
pinyin: liǎng chuán xiàng zhuàng zhī後 dōu zhēng zhá著 shǐ jìn hǎi gǎng.
english: After the collision both vessels managed to limp into harbour.

hanzi: 桨手划桨者，尤指划桨能手；桨手
pinyin: jiǎng shǒu huà jiǎng zhě， yóu zhǐ huà jiǎng néng shǒu； jiǎng shǒu
english: A man who rows, especially an expert in rowing; a rower.

hanzi: 你能辩认出这些潦草的字迹是什麽意思吗？
pinyin: nǐ néng biàn rèn chū zhè xie liǎo cǎo de zì jī shì shí mó yì si ma？
english: Can you work out what these squiggles mean?

hanzi: 我们可以回到最初有关集资的问题上吗?
pinyin: wǒ men kě yǐ huí dào zuì chū yǒu guān jí zī de wèn tí shàng ma?
english: Could we get back to the original question of funding?

hanzi: 他最後恢复些理智, 同意释放人质.
pinyin: tā zuì後 huī fù xiē lǐ zhì,  tóng yì shì fàng rén zhì.
english: He was finally brought to his senses and agreed to let the hostages go.

hanzi: 向后转转向反面，如在政策上；大转变
pinyin: xiàng hòu zhuàn zhuǎn xiàng fǎn miàn， rú zài zhèng cè shàng； dà zhuǎn biàn
english: A reversal, as in policy; an about-face.

hanzi: 英国法律有没有和任何国际法相抵触？
pinyin: Yīng guó fǎ lu:4 yǒu méi yǒu huò rèn hé guó jì fǎ xiàng dǐ chù？
english: Do British laws conflict with any international laws?

hanzi: 乔治先生猛烈抨击大学的招生制度。
pinyin: Qiáo zhì xiān sheng měng liè pēng jī dà xué de zhāo shēng zhì dù。
english: Mr.George lashed out at the university enrolling system.

hanzi: 女王将爵士头衔授予几位杰出人士.
pinyin: nu:3 wáng jiàng jué shì tou xián shòu yǔ jǐ wèi jié chū rén shì.
english: The Queen conferred knighthoods on several distinguished men.

hanzi: ｀他是无意中损坏的吗?＇｀不, 是故意的.＇
pinyin: ｀ tā shì wú yì zhòng sǔn huài de ma?＇｀ bù,  shì gù yì de.＇
english: `Did he break it accidentally?' `No, on purpose.'

hanzi: 她那滑稽的服装引得客人哄堂大笑。
pinyin: tā nà huá ji de fú zhuāng yǐn de kè ren hòng táng dà xiào。
english: Her funny costume caused much mirthful laughter among the guests.

hanzi: 瓶装柠檬汁可不行－－你得用真货。
pinyin: píng zhuāng níng méng zhī kě bù xíng－－ nǐ de yòng zhēn huò。
english: Bottled lemon juice is no good you must use the real thing.

hanzi: 店员（向顾客）示范如何使用洗衣机.
pinyin: diàn yuán（ xiàng gù kè） shì fàn rú hé shǐ yòng xǐ yì jī.
english: An assistant demonstrated the washing machine (to customers).

hanzi: 因为战争，大量的移民涌入欧洲。
pinyin: yīn wèi zhàn zhēng， dà liàng de yí mín yǒng rù ōu zhōu。
english: There was a huge migration of people into Europe because of the war.

hanzi: 紧迫的强求立即的行动和关注的；急迫的
pinyin: jǐn pò de qiǎng qiú lì jí de xíng dòng huò guān zhù de； jí pò de
english: Compelling immediate action or attention; pressing.

hanzi: 芳廷承袭了芭蕾舞艺术的最优秀的传统
pinyin: fāng tíng chéng xí le bā lěi wǔ yì shù de zuì yōu xiù de chuán tǒng
english: Fonteyn represents the best traditions of ballet.

hanzi: 鸡蛋还未孵，先别数鸡雏；莫过早乐观。
pinyin: jī dàn huán wèi fū， xiān biè shuò jī chú； mò guò zǎo lè guān。
english: Do not count your chickens before they are hatched.

hanzi: 我已经戒赌了－－赌博完全是浪费钱财。
pinyin: wǒ yǐ jīng jiè dǔ le－－ dǔ bó wán quán shì làng fèi qián cái。
english: I've finished with gambling it's a waste of money.

hanzi: 我们已经准备好拍摄（舞厅的连续镜头）.
pinyin: wǒ men yǐ jīng zhǔn bèi hào pāi shè（ wǔ tīng de lián xù jìng tóu）.
english: We're ready to shoot (the ballroom sequence).

hanzi: 那种鸟雄鸟的喙呈橙色, 与雌鸟不同.
pinyin: nà zhòng niǎo xióng niǎo de huì chéng chéng sè,  yù cí niǎo bù tóng.
english: The male's orange beak differentiates it from the female.

hanzi: 音响效果经预录後已加入对话中.
pinyin: yīn xiǎng xiào guǒ jīng yù lù後 yǐ jiā rù duì huà zhòng.
english: The sound effects had been pre-recorded and were added to the dialogue.

hanzi: 这些都是事实, 你能从中得出什麽结论?
pinyin: zhè xie dōu shì shì shí,  nǐ néng cóng zhōng dé chū shí mó jié lùn?
english: Those are the facts; what do you conclude from them?

hanzi: 肥畜养肥备宰的幼畜（如羊羔、牛犊）
pinyin: féi xù yǎng féi bèi zǎi de yòu xù（ rú yáng gāo、 niú dú）
english: A young animal, such as a lamb or calf, fattened for slaughter.

hanzi: 我憋不住了（要小便）, 得找个厕所.
pinyin: wǒ biē bú zhù le（ yào xiǎo biàn）,  de zhǎo gè cè suǒ.
english: I can't hold out (ie retain my urine) much longer; I must find a toilet.

hanzi: 她已经（向我）暗示说我得到了这个奖.
pinyin: tā yǐ jīng（ xiàng wǒ） àn shì shuō wǒ dé dào le zhè gè jiǎng.
english: She has already hinted (to me) that I've won the prize.

hanzi: 不要对他期望过高；他只不过是个学生。
pinyin: bù yào duì tā qī wàng guò gāo； tā zhǐ bù guò shì gè xué sheng。
english: Don't expect much of him; he is at best a student.

hanzi: 直到很晚之后，欧洲才知道棉花布料。
pinyin: zhí dào hěn wǎn zhī hòu， ōu zhōu cái zhī dào mián hua bù liào。
english: Cotton material was not known in Europe until much later.

hanzi: 粗暴的，残忍的以残暴为特征的；非常残酷的
pinyin: cū bào de， cán rěn de yǐ cán bào wèi tè zhēng de； fēi cháng cán kù de
english: Characterized by savagery; very cruel.

hanzi: 我们保持镇定、同心协力就没有问题。
pinyin: wǒ men bǎo chí zhèn dìng、 Tóng xīn xié lì jiù méi yǒu wèn tí。
english: If we keep calm and stick together, we'll be all right.

hanzi: 患者头部受击後患严重脑震荡.
pinyin: huàn zhě tóu bù shòu jī後 huàn yán zhòng nǎo zhèn dàng.
english: The patient is suffering from severe concussion following a blow to the head.

hanzi: 用热水把菜盘上凝结的油渍冲洗掉.
pinyin: yòng rè shuǐ bǎ cài pán shàng níng jié de yóu zì chōng xǐ diào.
english: Use hot water to rinse the congealed fat off the dinner plates.

hanzi: 她经过住院治疗後, 前往海滨养病.
pinyin: tā jīng guò zhù yuàn zhì liáo後,  qián wǎng hǎi bīn yǎng bìng.
english: She went to the seaside to convalesce after her stay in hospital.

hanzi: 固体、液体和气体是物质的三种状态。
pinyin: gù tǐ、 yè tǐ hé qi tǐ shì wù zhì de sān zhòng zhuàng tài。
english: Solid, liquid and gas are three kinds of states of substance.

hanzi: 蝎子的长尾巴上长着一个有毒的蛰针。
pinyin: xiē zi de cháng wěi bā shàng zhǎng zhuó yī gè yǒu dú de zhí zhēn。
english: A scorpion has a poisonous sting in its long jointed tail.

hanzi: 歌声虽已结束，但美妙的旋律仍在萦回。
pinyin: gē shēng suī yǐ jié shù， dàn měi miào de xuán lu:4 réng zài yíng huí。
english: The song is ended, but the melody lingers on.

hanzi: 在文明时代，这麽残忍是不能宽恕的。
pinyin: zài wén míng shí dài， zhè mó cán rěn shì bù néng kuān shù de。
english: In an age of enlightenment such cruelty is unforgivable.

hanzi: 我们的儿童是否受著空气中铅的毒害？
pinyin: wǒ men de ér tóng shì fǒu shòu著 kōng qì zhòng qiān de dú hài？
english: Are our children being poisoned by lead in the atmosphere?

hanzi: 你知道[听说过]那个秃头警察的笑话吗?
pinyin: nǐ zhī dào[ tīng shuō guo] nèi gè tū tóu jǐng chá de xiào huà ma?
english: Do you know/Have you heard the one about the bald policeman?

hanzi: 论述，详述对一个主题正式的详谈；阐述
pinyin: lùn shù， xiáng shù duì yī gè zhǔ tí zhèng shì de xiáng tán； chǎn shù
english: A formal discourse on a topic; an exposition.

hanzi: 他被玛丽的魅力迷惑, 对她苦缠不休。
pinyin: tā bèi Mǎ lì de mèi lì mí huo,  duì tā kǔ chán bù xiū。
english: He was smitten with Mary's attractions and laid siege to her heart.

hanzi: 我们得听一个关於酗酒害处的冗长报告!
pinyin: wǒ men de tìng yī gè guān yū xù jiǔ hài chu de rǒng zhǎng bào gào!
english: We had to listen to a peroration on the evils of drink!

hanzi: 马车翻了, 车上的人都（被）摔出来了.
pinyin: mǎ chē fān le,  jū shàng de rén dōu（ bèi） shuāi chū lai le.
english: The carriage overturned and the passengers (were) pitched out.

hanzi: 哪个国家将是下届奥运会的主办国？
pinyin: nǎ ge guó jiā jiàng shì xià jiè Aò yùn huì de zhǔ bàn guó？
english: Which country will be the host country for the next Olympic Games?

hanzi: 我们应该竭尽全力挽救濒于灭绝的生物。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng gāi jié jìn quán lì wǎn jiù bīn yú miè jué de shēng wù。
english: We should do our best to save endangered species.

hanzi: 英国法律有没有和任何国际法相抵触？
pinyin: Yīng guó fǎ lu:4 yǒu méi yǒu huò rèn hé guó jì fǎ xiàng dǐ chù？
english: Do British laws conflict with any international laws?

hanzi: 熊熊的柴火在起居室的炉中噼啪作响。
pinyin: xióng xióng de chái huǒ zài qǐ jū shì de lú zhòng噼 pā zuò xiǎng。
english: A cheerful wood fire was crackling in the sitting room.

hanzi: 这次选举後该党已沦为微不足道的少数党.
pinyin: zhè cì xuǎn jǔ後 gāi dǎng yǐ lún wèi wēi bù zú dào de shǎo shù dǎng.
english: The election reduced the Party to a rump.

hanzi: 女王将爵士头衔授予几位杰出人士。
pinyin: nu:3 wáng jiàng jué shì tou xián shòu yǔ jǐ wèi jié chū rén shì。
english: The Queen conferred knighthood on several distinguished men.

hanzi: 毁坏这幅画的事是恣意破坏公物的人干的.
pinyin: huǐ huài zhè fú huà de shì shì zì yì pò huài gōng wù de rén gàn de.
english: The damage to the painting is the work of vandals.

hanzi: 汽车在高低不平的砾石路面上颠簸着。
pinyin: qì chē zài gāo dī bù píng de lì shí lù miàn shàng diān bǒ zhuó。
english: The car bumped on the uneven surface of the gravel road.

hanzi: 在除夕唱｀美好的往日＇是传统风俗.
pinyin: zài chú xī chàng｀ měi hǎo de wǎng rì＇ shì chuán tǒng fēng sú.
english: It's a tradition to sing `Auld Lang Syne' on New Year's Eve.

hanzi: 学校、教堂、住宅、厂房均为建筑物.
pinyin: xué xiào、 jiào táng、 zhù zhái、 chǎng fáng jūn wèi jiàn zhù wù.
english: Schools, churches, houses and factories are all buildings.

hanzi: 那个设陷阱捕猎的人孤独地生活在山里。
pinyin: nèi gè shè xiàn jǐng bǔ liè de rén gū dú de shēng huó zài shān lǐ。
english: The trapper leads a solitary life in the mountains.

hanzi: 这些问题在本法庭审理范围之内[外].
pinyin: zhè xie wèn tí zài běn fǎ tíng shěn lǐ fàn wéi zhī nèi[ wài].
english: These matters fall within/go beyond the cognizance of this court.

hanzi: 大屠杀大规模杀戮，如战争中的大屠杀；屠宰
pinyin: dà tú shā dà guī mó shā lù， rú zhàn zhēng zhòng dì dà tú shā； tú zǎi
english: Massive slaughter, as in war; a massacre.

hanzi: 音乐会後她徘徊不去, 希望能一见明星.
pinyin: yīn yuè huì後 tā pái huái bù qù,  xī wàng néng yī xiàn míng xīng.
english: She lingered after the concert, hoping to meet the star.

hanzi: 音乐会後她徘徊不去, 希望能一见明星.
pinyin: yīn yuè huì後 tā pái huái bù qù,  xī wàng néng yī xiàn míng xīng.
english: She lingered after the concert, hoping to meet the star.

hanzi: 股票市场上人心惶惶, 掀起抛售浪潮.
pinyin: gǔ piào shì chǎng shàng rén xīn huáng huáng,  xiān qǐ pāo shòu làng cháo.
english: Panic on the stock market set off a wave of selling.

hanzi: 我们将汽车滞销归咎於海外需求量太低.
pinyin: wǒ men jiàng qì chē zhì xiāo guī jiù yū hǎi wài xū qiú liàng tài dī.
english: We blame poor overseas demand for the car's failure.

hanzi: 协调，和睦作为一致的状态或性质；调和
pinyin: xié tiáo， hé mù zuò wéi yī zhì de zhuàng tài huò xìng zhì； tiáo hé
english: The state or quality of being in accord; harmony.

hanzi: 我们所有的玻璃和陶瓷器皿都放在柜橱里。
pinyin: wǒ men suǒ yǒu de bō li huò táo cí qì mǐn dōu fàng zài jǔ chú lǐ。
english: All our glass and china are kept in the cupboard.

hanzi: 这辆汽车後部在碰撞中造成很大的凹陷.
pinyin: zhè liàng qì chē後 bù zài pèng zhuàng zhòng zào chéng hěn dà de āo xiàn.
english: The back of the car was badly dented in a collision.

hanzi: 双方在午夜停止敌对行动（战斗）.
pinyin: shuāng fāng zài wǔ yè tíng zhǐ dí duì xíng dòng（ zhàn dòu）.
english: Hostilities (ie Fighting) between the two sides ceased at midnight.

hanzi: 那事故发生後不久记者就都赶到了现场。
pinyin: nà shì gù fā shēng後 bù jiǔ jì zhě jiù dōu gǎn dào le xiàn chǎng。
english: Reporters were soon on the scene after the accident.

hanzi: 这种令人惊骇的谋杀纯粹是疯子的行为.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng lìng rén jīng hài de móu shā chún cuì shì fēng zi de xíng wéi.
english: This dreadful murder is surely the act of a madman.

hanzi: 贾如树籽这种树的肾状种籽，烤后可食
pinyin: jiǎ rú shù zǐ zhè zhǒng shù de shèn zhuàng zhòng zǐ， kǎo hòu kě sì
english: The kidney-shaped seed of this tree, eaten after roasting.

hanzi: 莱茵河从斯特拉斯堡入海这一段可以通航.
pinyin: lái yīn hé zòng sī tè lā sī pù rù hǎi zhè yī duàn kě yǐ tōng háng.
english: The Rhine is navigable from Strasbourg to the sea.

hanzi: 他受过担任工程师的[工程学方面的]培训.
pinyin: tā shòu guò dān rèn gōng chéng shī de[ gōng chéng xué fāng miàn de] péi xùn.
english: He was trained as an engineer/in engineering.

hanzi: 他终於获得了驾驶执照, 这使他颇为得意.
pinyin: tā zhōng yū huò dé le jià shǐ zhí zhào,  zhè shǐ tā pō wèi dé yì.
english: He is at last the proud possessor of a driving-licence.

hanzi: 他在房间里磕磕绊绊地摸索电灯的开关.
pinyin: tā zài fáng jiān lǐ kē kē bàn bàn de mō suo diàn dēng de kāi guān.
english: He blundered about the room, feeling for the light switch.

hanzi: 池有机体体内一种贮存流体的液囊或穴
pinyin: chí yǒu jī tǐ tǐ nèi yī zhòng zhù cún liú tǐ de yè náng huò xué
english: A fluid-containing sac or cavity in the body of an organism.

hanzi: 检举人已向警方告发他（是恐怖分子）.
pinyin: jiǎn jǔ rén yǐ xiàng jǐng fāng gào fà tā（ shì kǒng bù fèn zǐ）.
english: An informer denounced him to the police (as a terrorist).

hanzi: "不要泄气，不要泄气，"我一直对自己说。
pinyin: " bù yào xiè qì， bù yào xiè qì，" wǒ yī zhí duì zì jǐ shuō。
english: "Don't give up. Don't give up, " I kept telling myself.

hanzi: 诚实、勤劳和善良是幸福生活的要素。
pinyin: chéng shí、 qín láo hé shàn liáng shì xìng fú shēng huó de yào sù。
english: Honesty, industry and kindness are elements of a good life.

hanzi: 旧稿要加上先前拷贝的原新闻的稿件
pinyin: jiù gǎo yào jiā shàng xiān qián kǎo bèi de yuán xīn wén de gǎo jiàn
english: Previous journalistic copy to which succeeding copy is added.

hanzi: 诚实、勤劳和善良是幸福生活的要素。
pinyin: chéng shí、 qín láo hé shàn liáng shì xìng fú shēng huó de yào sù。
english: Honesty, industry and kindness are elements of a good life.

hanzi: 罗杰斯和哈默斯坦的音乐喜剧　南太平洋　.
pinyin: luó jié sī huò hǎ mò sī tǎn de yīn yuè xǐ jù　 nán tài píng yáng　.
english: Rogers and Hammerstein's musical South Pacific'.

hanzi: 利物浦足球队和英格兰足球队实力相当。
pinyin: lì wù pǔ zú qiú duì huò yīng gé lán zú qiú duì shí lì xiāng dāng。
english: Liver-pool and England are neck and neck in strength.

hanzi: 这种可耻的伎俩都是为了能让他当选.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng kě chǐ de jì liǎng dōu shì wèi le néng ràng tā dāng xuǎn.
english: These shameful manoeuvreswere aimed at securing his election.

hanzi: 他在外面犹豫徘徊, 因过於胆怯而不敢进去.
pinyin: tā zài wài miàn yóu yù pái huái,  yīn guò yū dǎn qiè ér bù gǎn jìn qù.
english: He hovered about outside, too afraid to go in.

hanzi: 你猜怎么着：他们昨天在街上打起来了。
pinyin: nǐ cāi zěn me zhe： tā men zuó tiān zài jiē shàng dǎ qǐ lai le。
english: Guess what: they fall into fight in the street yesterday.

hanzi: 他从桥上跳入水中去抢救那溺水儿童.
pinyin: tā zòng qiáo shàng tiào rù shuǐ zhòng qù qiǎng jiù nà niào shuǐ ér tóng.
english: He dived from the bridge to rescue the drowning child.

hanzi: 总统最近死後, 酝酿著一场军事政变.
pinyin: zǒng tǒng zuì jìn sǐ後,  yùn niàng著 yī chǎng jūn shì zhèng biàn.
english: The president's recent death set the stage for a military coup.

hanzi: 最早的在时间和次序上首次出现的；最早的
pinyin: zuì zǎo de zài shí jiān huò cì xù shàng shǒu cì chū xiàn de； zuì zǎo de
english: Occurring first in time or sequence; earliest.

hanzi: 她精心策画後, 谈妥了大幅增加工资的事.
pinyin: tā jīng xīn cè huà後,  tán tuǒ le dà fú zēng jiā gōng zī de shì.
english: By careful strategy she negotiated a substantial pay rise.

hanzi: 他在外面犹豫徘徊, 因过於胆怯而不敢进去.
pinyin: tā zài wài miàn yóu yù pái huái,  yīn guò yū dǎn qiè ér bù gǎn jìn qù.
english: He hovered about outside, too afraid to go in.

hanzi: 眼界视野，理能能力或经历的范围；眼界
pinyin: yǎn jiè shì yě， lǐ néng néng lì huò jīng lì de fàn wéi； yǎn jiè
english: Range of vision, comprehension, or experience; outlook.

hanzi: 短暂的仅限于一个插曲持续的时间；短暂的
pinyin: duǎn zàn de jǐn xiàn yú yī gè chā qǔ chí xù de shí jiān； duǎn zàn de
english: Limited to the duration of an episode; temporary.

hanzi: 睿智与机灵不同，前者可随着年龄增加。
pinyin: ruì zhì yù jī líng bù tóng， qián zhě kě suí zhe nián líng zēng jiā。
english: Sagacity, unlike cleverness, may increase with age.

hanzi: 面包、土豆及其他主食的价格继续上涨。
pinyin: miàn bāo、 tǔ dòu jí qí tā zhǔ shí de jià gé jì xù shàng zhǎng。
english: Bread, potato and other staple continue to rise in price.

hanzi: 他们得（向别人）乞求救济来养活孩子.
pinyin: tā men de（ xiàng bié rén） qǐ qiú jiù jì lái yǎng huo hái zi.
english: They had to beg alms (of others) in order to feed their children.

hanzi: 玛丽谈起她聪明伶俐的儿子从不感到厌倦。
pinyin: Mǎ lì tán qǐ tā cōng míng líng lì de ér zi cóng bù gǎn dào yàn juàn。
english: Mary never tires of talking about her clever son.

hanzi: 他们得（向别人）乞求救济来养活孩子.
pinyin: tā men de（ xiàng bié rén） qǐ qiú jiù jì lái yǎng huo hái zi.
english: They had to beg alms (of others) in order to feed their children.

hanzi: 对於科学家应该准许很大的研究自由。
pinyin: duì yū kē xué jiā yīng gāi zhǔn xǔ hěn dà de yán jiū zì yóu。
english: One should permit a scientist a lot of latitude in his research.

hanzi: 这种药的副作用（科学家）尚未发现.
pinyin: zhè zhǒng yào de fù zuò yòng（ kē xué jiā） shàng wèi fā xiàn.
english: The side-effects of the drug are as yet unknown (toscientists).

hanzi: 她固然很好，但有必要那样大肆吹捧吗？
pinyin: tā gù rán hěn hǎo， dàn yǒu bì yào nà yàng dà sì chuī pěng ma？
english: She was good, but was it any good to pour it on like that?

hanzi: 他祝这对年轻人生活幸福、 万事如意.
pinyin: tā zhù zhè duì nián qīng rén shēng huó xìng fú、  wàn shì rú yì.
english: He wished the young couple a life of happiness and prosperity.

hanzi: 容积，体积大小、体积或容积，常指很大时
pinyin: róng jī， tǐ jī dà xiǎo、 tǐ jī huò róng jī， cháng zhǐ hěn dà shí
english: Size, mass, or volume, especially when very large.

hanzi: 揭露，泄露；公开揭露或揭发的行为或过程
pinyin: jiē lù， xiè lòu； gōng kāi jiē lù huò jiē fā de xíng wéi huò guò chéng
english: The act or process of revealing or uncovering.

hanzi: 成群的歹徒犯法后栖身于荒山中。
pinyin: chéng qún de dǎi tú fàn fǎ hòu qī shēn yú huāng shān zhòng。
english: Bands of outlaws lived in the desolate mountains after breaking the laws.

hanzi: 场雷雨一直捱到我们回家以后才开始下。
pinyin: chǎng léi yǔ yī zhí ái dào wǒ men huí jiā yǐ hòu cái kāi shǐ xià。
english: The thunderstorm dept off until we were safely indoors.

hanzi: 面包、 土豆及其他主食的价格继续上涨.
pinyin: miàn bāo、  tǔ dòu jí qí tā zhǔ shí de jià gé jì xù shàng zhǎng.
english: Bread, potatoes and other staples continue to rise in price.

hanzi: 他们两个人的举动都像孩子一样，不是吗？
pinyin: tā men liǎng gè rén de jǔ dòng dōu xiàng hái zi yí yàng， bú shì ma？
english: Both of them are acting like children, are not they?

hanzi: 假设你有三个愿望, 这三个愿望都是什麽呢?
pinyin: jiǎ shè nǐ yǒu sān gè yuàn wàng,  zhè sān gè yuàn wàng dōu shì shí mó ne?
english: If you had three wishes what would you choose?

hanzi: 诚实、勤劳和善良是幸福生活的要素。
pinyin: chéng shí、 qín láo hé shàn liáng shì xìng fú shēng huó de yào sù。
english: Honesty, industry and kindness are elements of a good life.

hanzi: ｀那麽你是怎麽知道那件事的呢?＇他插嘴问道.
pinyin: ｀ nà mó nǐ shì zěn mó zhī dào nà jiàn shì de ne?＇ tā chā zuǐ wèn dào.
english: `But how do you know that?' he interposed.

hanzi: 一阵烟空气、蒸汽或烟雾短促而突然的散发
pinyin: yī zhèn yān kōng qì、 zhēng qì huò yān wù duǎn cù ér tū rán de sàn fā
english: A brief, sudden emission of air, vapor, or smoke.

hanzi: 把国家公园私营化? 他们绝对不敢, 对吗?
pinyin: bǎ guó jiā gōng yuán sī yíng huà?  tā men jué duì bù gǎn,  duì ma?
english: Privatize the national parks? They'd never dare, would they?

hanzi: 隽语一个简明，机智，常常似是而非的陈述
pinyin: jùn yù yī gè jiǎn míng， jī zhì， cháng cháng sì shì ér fēi de chén shù
english: A concise, clever, often paradoxical statement.

hanzi: 葡萄状的由成串的部分构成的，用于腺体
pinyin: pú tao zhuàng de yóu chéng chuàn de bù fen gòu chéng de， yòng yú xiàn tǐ
english: Having a structure of clustered parts. Used of glands.

hanzi: 工人们把沥青和沙子、石块混合在一起。
pinyin: gōng rén men bǎ lì qīng huò shā zi、 shí kuài hùn hé zài yī qǐ。
english: The workers mixed the asphalt with sand and gravel together.

hanzi: 这对孪生子像得使人无法分辨。
pinyin: zhè duì luán shēng zi xiàng de shǐ rén wú fǎ fēn biàn。
english: The twins were so much alike that it was impossible to distinguish one from the other.

hanzi: ｀多国产物＇之说尽可遮人耳目了.
pinyin: ｀ duō guó chǎn wù＇ zhī shuō jìn kě zhē rén ěr mù le.
english: The description `produce of more than one country' can cover a multitude of sins.

hanzi: 我不明白她怎麽能容忍他[忍受他的虐待].
pinyin: wǒ bù míng bái tā zěn mó néng róng rěn tā[ rěn shòu tā de nu:è dài].
english: I don't know how she puts up with him/his cruelty to her.

hanzi: 请把你的各项开支列在这张表格上，好吗？
pinyin: qǐng bǎ nǐ de gè xiàng kāi zhī liè zài zhè zhāng biǎo gé shàng， hào ma？
english: Could you detail all your expenses on this form?

hanzi: 讨厌的人愚钝的、无聊的或讨厌的人；害人精
pinyin: tǎo yàn de rén yú dùn de、 wú liáo de huò tǎo yàn de rén； hài rén jīng
english: An obtuse, boring, or bothersome person; a pest.

hanzi: 我们可否把这些项目都归在｀杂费＇项内?
pinyin: wǒ men kě pǐ bǎ zhè xie xiàng mù dōu guī zài｀ zá fèi＇ xiàng nèi?
