english: Can we lump all these items together as incidental expenses'?

hanzi: 你怎麽竟然做出这种事? 你难道不知羞耻吗?
pinyin: nǐ zěn mó jìng rán zuò chū zhè zhǒng shì?  nǐ nán dào bù zhī xiū chǐ ma?
english: How could you do such a thing? Have you no shame?

hanzi: 北极熊虽然会游泳，但也是陆栖动物。
pinyin: běi jí xióng suī rán kuài yóu yǒng， dàn yě shì lù xī dòng wù。
english: Although they can swim, the polar bears are terrestrial animals.

hanzi: 我叫丹尼·琼斯。不过我用教名的略称：丹。
pinyin: wǒ jiào dān ní· qióng sī。 bù guò wǒ yòng jiào míng de lu:è chèng： dān。
english: I am Daniel Jones, but I go by my nickname, Dan.

hanzi: 我得同委托人商量後才能接受你的建议.
pinyin: wǒ de tóng wěi tuō rén shāng liàng後 cái néng jiē shòu nǐ de jiàn yì.
english: I must consult my prinicipals before agreeing to your proposal.

hanzi: 自立摆脱了被奴役、扣押或压迫的人的自由
pinyin: zì lì bǎi tuō le bèi nú yì、 kòu yā huò yā pò de rén de zì yóu
english: Liberty of the person from slavery, detention, or oppression.

hanzi: 我伤害了你的感情，该怎样来弥补我的过错呢？
pinyin: wǒ shāng hài le nǐ de gǎn qíng， gāi zěn yàng lái mí bǔ wǒ de guò cuò ne？
english: How can I atone for hurting your feelings?

hanzi: 她说什麽东西也没被偷, 那不过是掩饰罢了.
pinyin: tā shuō shí mó dōng xi yě mò bèi tōu,  nà bù guò shì yǎn shì bà le.
english: She said nothing was stolen, but that's just a cover-up.

hanzi: 假如再让我逮著你偷东西, 看我怎麽揍你!
pinyin: jiǎ rú zài ràng wǒ dài著 nǐ tōu dōng xi,  kàn wǒ zěn mó zòu nǐ!
english: If I catch you stealing again, I'll beat the daylights out of you!

hanzi: 我亲眼看见暗杀的情景，真令我毛骨悚然。
pinyin: wǒ qīn yǎn kàn jiàn àn shā de qíng jǐng， zhēn lìng wǒ máo gǔ sǒng rán。
english: I saw the assassination and it got under my skin.

hanzi: 泰然自若，沉着不受影响或不尴尬；冷静
pinyin: tài rán zì ruò， chén zhuó bù shòu yǐng xiǎng huò bù gān gà； lěng jìng
english: Freedom from affectation or embarrassment; composure.

hanzi: 他洗衬衫时, 连胳膊肘都弄上了肥皂泡沫.
pinyin: tā xǐ chèn shān shí,  lián gē bo zhǒu dōu nòng shàng le féi zào pào mò.
english: He was up to his elbows in soapsuds, washing his shirts.

hanzi: 法国大革命是欧洲历史上的火山爆发。
pinyin: fǎ guó dà gé mìng shì ōu zhōu lì shǐ shàng de huǒ shān bào fā。
english: The French Revolution was a volcanic upheaval in European history.

hanzi: 法国玛丽安东妮皇后是路易十六的妻子。
pinyin: fǎ guó Mǎ lì A1n Dōng nī huáng hòu shì Lù yì shí liù de qī zi。
english: Queen Marie Antoinette of France was the wife of Louis the 16th.

hanzi: 她用穗带装饰连衣裙的领口、摺边和袖口.
pinyin: tā yòng suì dài zhuāng shì lián yì qún de lǐng kǒu、 zhé biān huò xiù kǒu.
english: She braided the neckline, hem and cuffs of the dress.

hanzi: 横越…的航道穿过（船）的航向，航线或路线
pinyin: hèng yuè… de háng dào chuān guò（ chuán） de háng xiàng， háng xiàn huò lù xiàn
english: Across the course, line, or length of.

hanzi: 他把晚年用在教书和编纂以前的著作。
pinyin: tā bǎ wǎn nián yòng zài jiào shū huò biān zuǎn yǐ qián de著 zuò。
english: He spent his last years (in) teaching and editing earlier writings.

hanzi: 时间表变动得如此频繁, 似乎没有什麽道理.
pinyin: shí jiàn biǎo biàn dòng de rú cǐ pín fán,  sì hu méi yǒu shí mó dào lǐ.
english: It seems illogical to change the timetable so often.

hanzi: 你要是以为我是出於私心, 那你就冤枉我了.
pinyin: nǐ yào shì yǐ wéi wǒ shì chū yū sī xīn,  nà nǐ jiù yuān wang wǒ le.
english: You wrong me if you think I only did it for selfish reasons.

hanzi: 岩性学对岩石的微观研究、描绘和分类
pinyin: yán xìng xué duì yán shí de wēi guān yán jiū、 miáo huì huò fēn lèi
english: The microscopic study, description, and classification of rock.

hanzi: 前线，前沿阵地最靠近敌人的战斗区；前线
pinyin: qián xiàn， qián yàn zhèn dì zuì kào jìn dí rén de zhàn dòu qū； qián xiàn
english: The battle area closest to the enemy; the front.

hanzi: 特有的，固有的拥有的本质上的特征；固有的
pinyin: tè yǒu de， gù yǒu de yōng yǒu de běn zhì shàng de tè zhēng； gù yǒu de
english: Possessed as an essential characteristic; inherent.

hanzi: 把第一笔总额加在第二笔（和第三笔）总额上。
pinyin: bǎ dì yī bǐ zǒng é jiā zài dì èr bǐ（ huò dì sān bǐ） zǒng é shàng。
english: Add the first total to the second(and third).

hanzi: 惯例上要求这样的集会应当以祈祷开始。
pinyin: guàn lì shàng yāo qiú zhè yàng de jí huì yīng dāng yǐ qí dǎo kāi shǐ。
english: Convention requires that such meetings open with prayer.

hanzi: 我又提示他一次, 他还是不理解（那答案）.
pinyin: wǒ yòu tí shì tā yī cì,  tā hái shì bù lǐ xiè（ nà dá àn）.
english: I gave him another clue, but he still didn't twig (the answer).

hanzi: 他早年所受的教养使他热衷於冒险活动.
pinyin: tā zǎo nián suǒ shòu de jiào yǎng shǐ tā rè zhōng yū mào xiǎn huó dòng.
english: His early training predisposed him to a life of adventure.

hanzi: 这沙土地利於排水, 适於种植块根作物.
pinyin: zhè shā tǔ de lì yū pái shuǐ,  shì yū zhòng zhí kuài gēn zuò wù.
english: This gravelly soil is well drained and good for growing root crops.

hanzi: 焦炭渣，煤屑焦炭或木炭做成后剩下的渣滓
pinyin: jiāo tàn zhā， méi xiè jiāo tàn huò mù tàn zuò chéng hòu shèng xià de zhā zǐ
english: The refuse left when coke or charcoal is made.

hanzi: 她把球挑高越过对方的头向後场落去.
pinyin: tā bǎ qiú tiǎo gāo yuè guò duì fāng de tou xiàng後 chǎng luò qù.
english: She lobbed the ball over her opponent's head to the back of the court.

hanzi: 他供认抢劫银行案後, 又坦白了其他罪行.
pinyin: tā gòng rèn qiāng jié yín háng àn後,  yòu tǎn bái le qí tā zuì xíng.
english: He confessed to other crimes subsequent to the bank robbery.

hanzi: 反对[抵制]新政权的某些势力仍然存在.
pinyin: fǎn duì[ dǐ zhì] xīn zhèng quán de mǒu xiē shì li réng rán cún zài.
english: Pockets of opposition/resistance to the new regime still remained.

hanzi: 工党领导人更换後全党时来运转.
pinyin: gōng dǎng lǐng dǎo rén gēng huàn後 quán dǎng shí lái yùn zhuǎn.
english: The change of leader led to a turn-around in the fortunes of the Labour Party.

hanzi: 他五十多岁; 嗯, 确切地说是五十六岁.
pinyin: tā wǔ shí duō suì;  ēn,  què qiè de shuō shì wǔ shí liù suì.
english: He's in his mid-fifties; well, fifty-six to be exact (ie more accurately).

hanzi: 从圣坛窃取耶稣受难像是亵渎神灵的行为.
pinyin: zòng shèng tán qiè qǔ Yē sū shòu nàn xiàng shì xiè dú shén líng de xíng wéi.
english: It is (a) sacrilege to steal a crucifix from an altar.

hanzi: 虽然事情进行得不如意, 玛丽还是继续尝试。
pinyin: suī rán shì qing jìn xíng de bù rú yì,  Mǎ lì hái shì jì xù cháng shì。
english: Though things went against Mary, she went on trying.

hanzi: 求神赐福於那些饥饿、孤独或患病的人.
pinyin: qiú shén cì fú yū nà xiē jī è、 gū dú huò huàn bìng de rén.
english: Bless (ie We ask God to bless) all those who are hungry, lonely or sick.

hanzi: 词书编纂者必须精於给词语下定义的技巧.
pinyin: cí shū biān zuǎn zhě bì xū jīng yū jǐ cí yǔ xià dìng yì de jì qiǎo.
english: Dictionary writers must be skilled in the art of definition.

hanzi: 领导人互相寒暄一番, 然後开始谈判.
pinyin: lǐng dǎo rén hù xiāng hán xuān yī pān,  rán後 kāi shǐ tán pàn.
english: After an exchange of pleasantries, the leaders started their negotiations.

hanzi: 小职员迪克很快就被排挤出了这家店铺。
pinyin: xiǎo zhí yuán Dí kè hěn kuài jiù bèi pái jǐ chū le zhè jiā diàn pù。
english: Dick, the junior clerk, was soon shouldered out of the shop.

hanzi: 法官职位，法官权力法官的职位或权力（权限）
pinyin: fǎ guān zhí wèi， fǎ guān quán lì fǎ guān de zhí wèi huò quán lì（ quán xiàn）
english: The office or jurisdiction of a judge.

hanzi: 死心踏地拥护者中的小核心；问题的关键
pinyin: sǐ xīn tà de yōng hù zhě zhòng dì xiǎo hé xīn； wèn tí de guān jiàn
english: A small core of dedicated supporters; the core of the problem.

hanzi: 夏天那条小河的水量减少，成了涓涓溪流。
pinyin: xià tiān nà tiáo xiǎo hé de shuǐ liàng jiǎn shǎo， chéng le juān juān xī liú。
english: The stream is reduced to a mere trickle in summer.

hanzi: 那个胖子坐下时，旧椅子发出嘎吱的响声。
pinyin: nèi gè pàng zi zuò xia shí， jiù yǐ zi fā chū gá zī de xiǎng shēng。
english: The old chair gave a groan when the fat man sat down on it.

hanzi: 不要相信他的记忆力－－他有点神不守舍的。
pinyin: bù yào xiāng xìn tā de jì yì lì－－ tā yǒu diǎn shén bù shǒu shè de。
english: Don't rely on his memory he's a bit of a dreamer.

hanzi: 该书的缺点在於作者未能把论证展开.
pinyin: gāi shū de quē diǎn zài yū zuó zhě wèi néng bǎ lùn zhèng zhǎn kāi.
english: The book's weakness is the author's inability to sustain an argument.

hanzi: 这些鲜红色窗帘显得棕色地毯黯然失色.
pinyin: zhè xie xiǎn hóng sè chuāng lián xiǎn de zōng sè dì tǎn àn rán shī shǎi.
english: The bright red of the curtains kills the brown of the carpet.

hanzi: 精髓赋予特性或增添活力的物质或性质
pinyin: jīng suǐ fù yǔ tè xìng huò zēng tiān huó lì de wù zhì huò xìng zhì
english: A substance or quality that imparts identity and vitality; essence.

hanzi: 亲密的以密切的相识、联系或熟悉为标志的
pinyin: qīn mì de yǐ mì qiè de xiāng shí、 lián xì huò shú xī wèi biāo zhì de
english: Marked by close acquaintance, association, or familiarity.

hanzi: 把他说成是英雄、 天才、 笨蛋, 不一而足.
pinyin: bǎ tā shuō chéng shì yīng xióng、  tiān cái、  bèn dàn,  bù yī ér zú.
english: He was variously described as a hero, a genius and a fool.

hanzi: 从属的，下级的等级、权力或威望低的；附属的
pinyin: cóng shǔ de， xià jí de děng jí、 quán lì huò wēi wàng dī de； fù shǔ de
english: Lower in rank, power, or authority; subordinate.

hanzi: 衰弱的由于久病等脆弱和消瘦的；衰弱的
pinyin: shuāi ruò de yóu yú jiǔ bìng děng cuì ruò huò xiāo shòu de； shuāi ruò de
english: Frail and enfeebled, as from prolonged illness; emaciated.

hanzi: 他按捺不住，大发脾气；过后又感到懊悔。
pinyin: tā àn nà bú zhù， dà fà pí qì； guò hòu yòu gǎn dào ào huǐ。
english: His temper ran away with him and later he regretted what he did.

hanzi: 听你谈话（那口气），我还以为你是首相呢。
pinyin: tìng nǐ tán huà（ nà kǒu qì）， wǒ huán yǐ wéi nǐ shì shǒu xiàng ne。
english: To hear you talk, I'd think you were Prime Minister.

hanzi: 他在石头台阶上（跌倒了,）擦破了小腿的皮.
pinyin: tā zài shí tou tái jiē shàng（ diē dào le,） cā pò le xiǎo tuǐ de pí.
english: He barked his shins (by falling) against some stone steps.

hanzi: 你前後矛盾, 开头责备我, 接著又夸奖我.
pinyin: nǐ qián後 máo dùn,  kāi tóu zé bèi wǒ,  jiē著 yòu kuā jiǎng wǒ.
english: You're not very consistent: first you condemn me, then you praise me.

hanzi: 大火扑灭之後, 工厂只剩下个空架子了.
pinyin: dà huǒ pū miè zhī後,  gōng chǎng zhǐ shèng xià gè kòng jià zi le.
english: Only the shell of the factory was left after the fire had been put out.

hanzi: 我绝不同极端分子来往[与极端主义格格不入].
pinyin: wǒ jué bù tóng jí duān fèn zǐ lái wǎng[ yù jí duān zhǔ yì gé gé bù rù].
english: I'll have no truck with extremists/extremism.

hanzi: 在加利福尼亚居住的好处就在於气候宜人。
pinyin: zài jiā lì fú ní yà jū zhù de hǎo chu jiù zài yū qì hòu yí rén。
english: The beauty of living in California is that the weather is so good.

hanzi: 租金已到期, 你的支票来到真是喜从天降!
pinyin: zū jīn yǐ dào qī,  nǐ de zhī piào lái dào zhēn shì xǐ zòng tiān xiáng!
english: The rent was due, so your cheque came as an absolute godsend!

hanzi: 你应该给缝纫机上点油，以免发出轧轧声。
pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi jǐ féng rèn jī shàng diǎn yóu， yǐ miǎn fā chū yà yà shēng。
english: You should oil the sewing machine to stop the squeaking.

hanzi: 你应该吃胡萝卜、芹菜和菠菜这类的蔬菜。
pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi jí hú luó bo、 qín cài huò bō cài zhè lèi de shū cài。
english: You should eat such vegetables as carrot, celery and spinach.

hanzi: 少量津贴很少一部分金钱补助、工资或津贴
pinyin: shǎo liàng jīn tiē hěn shǎo yī bù fen jīn qián bǔ zhù、 gōng zī huò jīn tiē
english: A meager monetary allowance, wage, or remuneration.

hanzi: 你应该给缝纫机上点油，以免发出轧轧声。
pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi jǐ féng rèn jī shàng diǎn yóu， yǐ miǎn fā chū yà yà shēng。
english: You should oil the sewing machine to stop the squeaking.

hanzi: 他从政三十年之後，终於决定退出政坛。
pinyin: tā zòng zhèng sān shí nián zhī後， zhōng yū jué dìng tuì chū zhèng tán。
english: After thirty years in politics, he is finally bowing out.

hanzi: 他在多大程度上参与了这些犯罪活动?
pinyin: tā zài duō dà chéng dù shàng cān yù le zhè xie fàn zuì huó dòng?
english: To what degree (ie To what extent, How much) was he involved in the crimes?

hanzi: 本质的是物体必不可少的组成部分；固有的
pinyin: běn zhì de shì wù tǐ bì bù kě shào de zǔ chéng bù fen； gù yǒu de
english: Constituting or being part of the essence of something; inherent.

hanzi: 别让她在你们之间挑拨－－她就是太忌妒了。
pinyin: biè ràng tā zài nǐ men zhī jiān tiǎo bō－－ tā jiù shì tài jì du le。
english: Don't let her make mischief between you she's only jealous.

hanzi: 人们告诉他那悲惨的消息後，他已六神无主了。
pinyin: rén men gào su tā nà bēi cǎn de xiāo xi後， tā yǐ liù shén wú zhǔ le。
english: He went to pieces when they told him the tragic news.

hanzi: 暂且不要考虑你从直觉上憎恶他这一因素.
pinyin: zàn qiě bù yào kǎo lu:4 nǐ zòng zhí jué shàng zēng wù tā zhè yī yīn sù.
english: Set aside for a moment your instinctive dislike of the man.

hanzi: 把文章写在练习簿里, 不要写在草稿纸上.
pinyin: bǎ wén zhāng xiě zài liàn xí bù lǐ,  bù yào xiě zài cǎo gǎo zhǐ shàng.
english: Write the essay in your (exercise-)books, not on rough paper.

hanzi: 防卫技巧，自卫保护自己的技术或技巧；自卫
pinyin: fáng wèi jì qiǎo， zì wèi bǎo hù zì jǐ de jì shù huò jì qiǎo； zì wèi
english: The science or art of defending oneself; self-defense.

hanzi: 所有这些说明一点－－他是一个自私自利的人。
pinyin: suǒ yǒu zhè xie shuō míng yī diǎn－－ tā shì yī gè zì sī zì lì de rén。
english: It all adds up to this-he is a selfish man.

hanzi: 这些鲜红色窗帘显得棕色地毯黯然失色。
pinyin: zhè xie xiǎn hóng sè chuāng lián xiǎn de zōng sè dì tǎn àn rán shī shǎi。
english: The bright red of the curtain kill the brown of the carpet.

hanzi: 一小撮人在制定政策中已开始起主导作用.
pinyin: yī xiǎo cuō rén zài zhì dìng zhèng cè zhòng yǐ kāi shǐ qǐ zhǔ dǎo zuò yòng.
english: A smallgroup has begun to predominate in policy-making.

hanzi: 通行证可以自由出入的许可、票证或权力
pinyin: tōng xíng zhèng kě yǐ zì yóu chū rù de xǔ kě、 piào zhèng huò quán lì
english: A permit, a ticket, or an authorization to come and go at will.

hanzi: 他在写一部关於其种族所受迫害的历史书.
pinyin: tā zài xiě yī bù guān yū qí zhǒng zú suǒ shòu pò hài de lì shǐ shū.
english: He is writing a history of the persecutions endured by his race.

hanzi: 这份色拉是由苹果、梨、土豆和芹菜做成的。
pinyin: zhè fèn sè lā shì yóu píng guǒ、 lí、 tǔ dòu huò qín cài zuò chéng de。
english: This salad is made of apple, pear, potato and celery.

hanzi: 经过千辛万苦这部词典才终於得以问世。
pinyin: jīng guò qiān xīn wàn kǔ zhè bù cí diǎn cái zhōng yū dé yǐ wèn shì。
english: It's been a long haul but at last this dictionary is published.

hanzi: 这些罐子可盛的液体多少不等[容量不同].
pinyin: zhè xie guàn zi kě shèng de yè tǐ duō shao bù děng[ róng liàng bù tóng].
english: The jars hold different volumes of liquid/have different volumes.

hanzi: 你一定要急急忙忙走吗？为何不留下喝杯茶呢？
pinyin: nǐ yī dìng yào jí jí máng máng zǒu ma？ wèi hé bù liú xià hè bēi chá ne？
english: Must you dash off? Why not stay for a cup of tea?

hanzi: 齐平地使其均匀、在一个平面上或留边排版
pinyin: qí píng dì shǐ qí jūn yún、 zài yī gè píng miàn shàng huò liú biān pái bǎn
english: So as to be even, in one plane, or aligned with a margin.

hanzi: 她的书抓住了文艺复兴时期人文主义的精髓.
pinyin: tā de shū zhuā zhù le wén yì fù xīng shí qī rén wén zhǔ yì de jīng suǐ.
english: Her book captures the quintessence of Renaissance humanism.

hanzi: 这些罐子可盛的液体多少不等[容量不同].
pinyin: zhè xie guàn zi kě shèng de yè tǐ duō shao bù děng[ róng liàng bù tóng].
english: The jars hold different volumes of liquid/have different volumes.

hanzi: 他在足球比赛结束以後受到一帮暴徒的殴打。
pinyin: tā zài zú qiú bǐ sài jié shù yǐ後 shòu dào yī bāng bào tú de ōu dǎ。
english: He is done over by a gang of thug after a football match.

hanzi: 这些注释有助於弄清文中最难懂的部分。
pinyin: zhè xie zhù shì yǒu zhù yū nòng qīng Wén zhōng zuì nàn dǒng de bù fen。
english: The note help to elucidate the most difficult parts of the text.

hanzi: 餐厅里吸烟的烟雾就没有地方躲得过去吗?
pinyin: cān tīng lǐ xī yān de yān wù jiù méi yǒu dì fang duǒ de guò qu ma?
english: Is there no escape from the ubiquitous cigarette smoke in restaurants?

hanzi: 独裁统治者一个有着无限权利的统治者；专制者
pinyin: dú cái tǒng zhì zhē yī gè yǒu zhe wú xiàn quán lì de tǒng zhì zhē； zhuān zhì zhě
english: A ruler having unlimited power; a despot.

hanzi: 当我给他们糖果时，他们高兴地咧开嘴笑了。
pinyin: dàng wǒ jǐ tā men táng guǒ shí， tā men gāo xìng de liě kāi zuǐ xiào le。
english: They grinned with pleasure when I gave them the sweets.

hanzi: 碰到这样容易的考卷, 那是老天爷的恩赐.
pinyin: pèng dào zhè yàng róng yì de kǎo juàn,  nà shì lǎo tiān yé de ēn cì.
english: To have such an easy examination paper was a gift from the gods.

hanzi: ｀怎样申请许可证?＇｀你得到问讯处打听.＇
pinyin: ｀ zěn yàng shēn qǐng xǔ kě zhèng?＇｀ nǐ dé dào wèn xùn chù dǎ ting.＇
english: `How do I apply for this licence?' `You want inquiries.'

hanzi: 最後总算把孩子从躲藏的地方都找了出来.
pinyin: zuì後 zǒng suàn bǎ hái zi zòng duǒ cáng de dì fang dōu zhǎo le chū lai.
english: The children were finally all winkled out of their hiding places.

hanzi: 她有财富便於她在社会各界造成巨大影响。
pinyin: tā yǒu cái fù pián yū tā zài shè huì gè jiè zào chéng jù dà yǐng xiǎng。
english: Her wealth gives her enormous leverage in social circles.

hanzi: 经急剧通货膨胀之後物价现已趋於平稳.
pinyin: jīng jí jù tōng huò péng zhàng zhī後 wù jià xiàn yǐ qū yū píng wěn.
english: After a period of rapid inflation, prices have now reached a plateau.

hanzi: 不悔改的未在精神上自新或改良的；不惭愧的
pinyin: bù huǐ gǎi de wèi zài jīng shén shàng zì xīn huò gǎi liáng de； bù cán kuì de
english: Not spiritually renewed or reformed; not repentant.

hanzi: 斯堪的那维亚是指丹麦、挪威、瑞典和冰岛。
pinyin: sī kān de nà wéi yà shì zhǐ dān mài、 nuó wēi、 ruì diǎn huò bīng dǎo。
english: Scandinavia refers to Denmark, Norway, Sweden and Iceland.

hanzi: 父母亲常会发觉难於跟他们的小孩沟通。
pinyin: fù mǔ qīn cháng kuài fā jué nàn yū gēn tā men de xiǎo hái gōu tōng。
english: Parents often find it difficult to communicate with their children.

hanzi: 这家商店获许，可经销啤酒、葡萄酒及烈酒。
pinyin: zhè jiā shāng diàn huò xǔ， kě jīng xiāo pí jiǔ、 pú tao jiǔ jí liè jiǔ。
english: The store is licensed to sell beer, wine and spirits.

hanzi: 一个银行经理在街上跳舞, 那是颇失身分的!
pinyin: yī gè yín háng jīng lǐ zài jiē shàng tiào wǔ,  nà shì pō shī shēn fèn de!
english: Dancing in the street is rather infra dig for a bank manager!

hanzi: 夫妻间应该偶尔（彼此）对调充当的角色.
pinyin: fū qī jiàn yīng gāi ǒu ěr（ bǐ cǐ） duì tiáo chōng dāng de jué sè.
english: Husband and wife should switch roles (with each other) occasionally.

hanzi: 瞧霜大哥在窗户上绘制了多麽美丽的图案.
pinyin: qiáo shuāng dà gē zài chuāng hu shàng huì zhì le duō mó měi lì de tú àn.
english: Look what pretty patterns Jack Frost has painted on the windows.

hanzi: 经急剧通货膨胀之後物价现已趋於平稳。
pinyin: jīng jí jù tōng huò péng zhàng zhī後 wù jià xiàn yǐ qū yū píng wěn。
english: After a period of rapid inflation, price have now reach a plateau.

hanzi: 水源，泉水从地下流出的地方；泉或喷泉
pinyin: shuǐ yuán， quán shuǐ zòng dì xià liú chū de dì fang； quán huò pēn quán
english: A place where water issues from the earth; a spring or fountain.

hanzi: 这些酒杯半价出售，因为玉上有瑕疵。
pinyin: zhè xie jiǔ bēi bàn jià chū shòu， yīn wèi yù shàng yǒu xiá cī。
english: These wine glasses were sold at half price because of blemishes in the jade.

hanzi: 卓越的，杰出的以卓越或杰出为特点的；卓著的
pinyin: zhuó yuè de， jié chū de yǐ zhuó yuè huò jié chū wèi tè diǎn de； zhuó著 de
english: Characterized by excellence or distinction; eminent.

hanzi: 麻雀看见孔雀负担着它的翎尾，替它担忧。
pinyin: má què kàn jiàn kǒng què fù dān zhuó tā de líng wěi， tì tā dān yōu。
english: The sparrow is sorry for the peacock at the burden of its tail.

hanzi: 他经常抑郁寡欢, 後来精神完全崩溃了.
pinyin: tā jīng cháng yì yù guǎ huān, 後 lái jīng shén wán quán bēng kuì le.
english: His frequent depressions were the prelude to a complete mental breakdown.

hanzi: 卓越的，杰出的以卓越或杰出为特点的；卓著的
pinyin: zhuó yuè de， jié chū de yǐ zhuó yuè huò jié chū wèi tè diǎn de； zhuó著 de
english: Characterized by excellence or distinction; eminent.

hanzi: 曲率极限当弧长趋向于零时该曲率的极限
pinyin: qǔ lu:4 jí xiàn dàng hú zhǎng qū xiàng yú líng shí gāi qǔ lu:4 de jí xiàn
english: The limit of this ratio as the length of the arc approaches zero.

hanzi: 我把表格填错了. 再给我一张空白的, 可以吗?
pinyin: wǒ bǎ biǎo gé tián cuò le.  zài jǐ wǒ yī zhāng kòng bái de,  kě yǐ ma?
english: I've filled in this form incorrectly. Can I have another blank?

hanzi: 琥珀色的缎子和白色的饰带正是她所想要的。
pinyin: hǔ pò shǎi de duàn zi huò bái sè de shì dài zhèng shì tā suǒ xiǎng yào de。
english: Amber satin and white lace are exactly what she desires.

hanzi: 他聋成这个样子，究竟是怎样从事作曲的呢？
pinyin: tā lóng chéng zhè gè yàng zi， jiū jìng shì zěn yàng cóng shì zuò qǔ de ne？
english: However does he manage to write music when he is so deaf?

hanzi: 他虽说又愚蠢又吝啬，但他有幽默的长处。
pinyin: tā suī shuō yòu yú chǔn yòu lìn sè， dàn tā yǒu yōu mò de cháng chù。
english: He may be stupid and mean, but his one saving grace is his humour.

hanzi: 下星期五晚上我举行宴会，您肯赏光吗？
pinyin: xià xīng qī wǔ wǎn shang wǒ jǔ xíng yàn huì， nín kěn shǎng guāng ma？
english: I'm giving a dinner party next Friday evening; would you like to come?

hanzi: 近期内的情况很清楚, 但很难说以後如何.
pinyin: jìn qī nèi de qíng kuàng hěn qīng chu,  dàn hěn nàn shuō yǐ後 rú hé.
english: The immediate future is clear, but it's hard to tell what lies beyond.

hanzi: "你估计这马达功力有多大？""约为十二马力。"
pinyin: " nǐ gū jì zhè mǎ dá gōng lì yǒu duō dà？"" yuē wèi shí èr mǎ lì。"
english: "What would you rate the engine at? " "About12 horse power."

hanzi: 考验严峻的考验，如对耐心或信念的考验；磨练
pinyin: kǎo yàn yán jùn de kǎo yàn， rú duì nài xīn huò xìn niàn de kǎo yàn； mò liàn
english: A severe test, as of patience or belief; a trial.

hanzi: 国王和王后陛下今天将为新桥通车典礼剪彩。
pinyin: guó wáng huò wáng hòu bì xià jīn tiān jiàng wèi xīn qiáo tōng jū diǎn lǐ jiǎn cǎi。
english: Their Majesty will open the new bridge today.

hanzi: 和睦，友好，友善国家间友好和平的关系；友谊
pinyin: hé mù， yǒu hǎo， yǒu shàn guó jiā jiàn yǒu hǎo hé píng de guān xi； yǒu yì
english: Peaceful relations, as between nations; friendship.

hanzi: 由於双方都不肯妥协, 谈判陷入僵局.
pinyin: yóu yū shuāng fāng dōu bù kěn tuǒ xié,  tán pàn xiàn rù jiāng jú.
english: The negotiations had reached an impasse, with both sides refusing to compromise.

hanzi: 我们应当本着既往不咎的原则重新合伙。
pinyin: wǒ men yīng dāng běn zhe jì wàng bù jiù de yuán zé chóng xīn hé huǒ。
english: We should let bygones be bygones and try to get along with each other.

hanzi: 我建议，作为可行的策略、首要事务先行。
pinyin: wǒ jiàn yì， zuò wéi kě xíng de cè lu:è、 shǒu yào shì wù xiān xíng。
english: I favor as a practical policy the putting of first things first.

hanzi: 这幅画衬在素墙上就更加（格外）好看了.
pinyin: zhè fú huà chèn zài sù qiáng shàng jiù gèng jiā（ gé wài） hǎo kàn le.
english: The picture may be seen to (its best) advantage against a plain wall.

hanzi: 电影胶片从卷轴滑出缠绕在放映机上了.
pinyin: diàn yǐng jiāo piàn zòng juàn zhòu huá chū chán rǎo zài fàng yìng jī shàng le.
english: The film flew off the spool and wound itself round the projector.

hanzi: 货物船舶、飞机或其它交通工具运载的货物
pinyin: huò wù chuán bó、 fēi jī huò qí tā jiāo tōng gōng jù yùn zài de huò wù
english: The freight carried by a ship, an aircraft, or another vehicle.

hanzi: 货损有没有可能是因粗暴装卸而引起的呢？
pinyin: huò sǔn yǒu méi yǒu kě néng shì yīn cū bào zhuāng xiè ér yǐn qǐ de ne？
english: Can it be possible that the damage is caused by rough handling?

hanzi: 多麽耸人听闻的事! 具备连续剧的一切要素.
pinyin: duō mó sǒng rén tìng wén de shì!  jù bèi lián xù jù de yī qiè yào sù.
english: What a sensational story! It has all the elements of a soap opera.

hanzi: 我建议，作为可行的策略、首要事务先行。
pinyin: wǒ jiàn yì， zuò wéi kě xíng de cè lu:è、 shǒu yào shì wù xiān xíng。
english: I favor as a practical policy the putting of first things first.

hanzi: 藉新技术即能从废弃物中回收可用之物。
pinyin: jiè xīn jì shù jí néng zòng fèi qì wù zhòng huí shōu kě yòng zhī wù。
english: New techniques make it possible to recover usable things from waste.

hanzi: 我们能够指望这样的好天气再持续一段时间吗?
pinyin: wǒ men néng gòu zhǐ wàng zhè yàng de hào tiān qì zài chí xù yī duàn shí jiān ma?
english: Can we hope for a continuance of this fine weather?

hanzi: 请各位将酒杯斟满, 向新娘、 新郎祝酒!
pinyin: qǐng gè wèi jiàng jiǔ bēi zhēn mǎn,  xiàng xīn niáng、  xīn láng zhù jiǔ!
english: Please charge your glasses and drink a toast to the bride and groom!

hanzi: 排泄的，排除的引起腹泻，尤指肠泻的；净肠的
pinyin: pái xiè de， pái chú de yǐn qǐ fù xiè， yóu zhǐ cháng xiè de； jìng cháng de
english: Causing evacuation, especially of the bowels; purgative.

hanzi: 这次踢赢之后，曼彻斯特联队升入了甲级。
pinyin: zhè cì tī yíng zhī hòu， màn chè sī tè lián duì shēng rù le jiǎ jí。
english: After this win, Manchester United was promoted to the First Division.

hanzi: 曼彻斯特联队在一场友谊比赛中击败了凯尔特队。
pinyin: màn chè sī tè lián duì zài yī chǎng yǒu yì bǐ sài zhòng jī bài le kǎi ěr tè duì。
english: Manchester United beat Celtic in a friendly.

hanzi: 哎呀，不要这样死要面子啦，告诉我真心话吧！
pinyin: āi yā， bù yào zhè yàng sǐ yào miàn zi la， gào su wǒ zhēn xīn huà ba！
english: Oh, don't be so respectable! Tell me what you really feel.

hanzi: 顶点的在顶点或者最高点的；头的正上方的
pinyin: dǐng diǎn de zài dǐng diǎn huò zhě zuì gāo diǎn de； tou de zhèng shàng fāng de
english: Situated at the vertex or highest point; directly overhead.

hanzi: ＂入境时，我的提包在海关受到了检查。＂
pinyin: ＂ rù jìng shí， wǒ de tí bāo zài hǎi guān shòu dào le jiǎn chá。＂
english: My suitcases were examined at the Customs when I entered the country.

hanzi: 他们的儿子出世後他送给她一枚表示永恒的戒指.
pinyin: tā men de ér zi chū shì後 tā sòng jǐ tā yī méi biǎo shì yǒng héng de jiè zhi.
english: He gave her an eternity ring when their son was born.

hanzi: ｀别发愁了,＇她边说边用手臂搂住他的肩膀.
pinyin: ｀ biè fā chóu le,＇ tā biān shuō biān yòng shǒu bei lǒu zhù tā de jiān bǎng.
english: Don't worry,' she said, putting an arm round his shoulder.

hanzi: 破绽，失效可能导致其无效的法律文件的漏洞
pinyin: pò zhàn， shī xiào kě néng dǎo zhì qí wú xiào de fǎ lu:4 wén jiàn de lòu dòng
english: A defect in a legal document that can render it invalid.

hanzi: 手表有三根指针－－秒针，分针和时针。
pinyin: shǒu biǎo yǒu sān gēn zhǐ zhēn－－ miǎo zhēn， fèn zhēn huò shí zhēn。
english: A watch have three hand--the second hand, minute hand and hour hand.

hanzi: 这些用人（对我来说）帮不上忙反而是累赘.
pinyin: zhè xie yòng rén（ duì wǒ lái shuō） bāng bù shàng máng fǎn ér shì lèi zhuì.
english: The servants were more of a hindrance than a help (to me).

hanzi: 有人送你到边境, 然後你就得自己走了.
pinyin: yǒu rén sòng nǐ dào biān jìng,  rán後 nǐ jiù de zì jǐ zǒu le.
english: You will be accompanied as far as the border; thereafter you must find your own way.

hanzi: 他虽说又愚蠢又吝啬，但他有幽默的长处。
pinyin: tā suī shuō yòu yú chǔn yòu lìn sè， dàn tā yǒu yōu mò de cháng chù。
english: He may be stupid and mean, but his one saving grace is his humour.

hanzi: 财政管理对资金、银行业、投资和信贷的管理
pinyin: cái zhèng guǎn lǐ duì zī jīn、 yín háng yè、 tóu zī huò xìn dài de guǎn lǐ
english: The management of money, banking, investments, and credit.

hanzi: 这对於设计新市中心是个最佳的反面教材。
pinyin: zhè duì yū shè jì xīn shì zhōng xīn shì gè zuì jiā de fǎn miàn jiào cái。
english: It is a classic example of how not to design a new city centre.

hanzi: 放射性材料贮存在防辐射的特殊容器内.
pinyin: fàng shè xìng cái liào zhù cún zài fáng fú shè de tè shū róng qì nèi.
english: The radioactive material is stored in a special radiation-proof container.

hanzi: 醒目的引人注意的和给人深刻印象的；引人注目的
pinyin: Xǐng mù de yǐn rén zhù yì de huò jǐ rén shēn kè yìn xiàng de； yǐn rén zhù mù de
english: Attracting and holding the attention; striking.

hanzi: 在克丽丝汀欺骗了他後，比尔评估一下现状。
pinyin: zài kè lì sī tīng qī piàn le tā後， Bǐ ěr píng gū yī xià xiàn zhuàng。
english: Bill take stock of the situation after Christine cheat on him.

hanzi: 那栋旧房子荒凉空洞地伫立着，像一堆废墟。
pinyin: nà dòng jiù fáng zi huāng liáng kōng dòng de zhù lì zhuó， xiàng yī duī fèi xū。
english: The old house stood gaunt and empty, a complete ruin.

hanzi: 管理，统治在一个政治单位里权力的行使；统治
pinyin: guǎn lǐ， tǒng zhì zài yī gè zhèng zhì dān wèi lǐ quán lì de xíng shǐ； tǒng zhì
english: Exercise of authority in a political unit; rule.

hanzi: 放射性材料贮存在防辐射的特殊容器内.
pinyin: fàng shè xìng cái liào zhù cún zài fáng fú shè de tè shū róng qì nèi.
english: The radioactive material is stored in a special radiation-proof container.

hanzi: 我们的边防战士在敌人猛烈进攻下巍然不动。
pinyin: wǒ men de biān fáng zhàn shì zài dí rén měng liè jìn gōng xià wēi rán bù dòng。
english: Our frontier guards held up under fierce enemy attack.

hanzi: 多麽耸人听闻的事! 具备连续剧的一切要素.
pinyin: duō mó sǒng rén tìng wén de shì!  jù bèi lián xù jù de yī qiè yào sù.
english: What a sensational story! It has all the elements of a soap opera.

hanzi: 由於全体演员的出色表演, 那出戏才获得成功.
pinyin: yóu yū quán tǐ yǎn yuán de chū sè biǎo yǎn,  nà chū xì cái huò dé chéng gōng.
english: The play succeeded thanks to fine acting by all the cast.

hanzi: 塔斯曼尼亚岛是以其发现者塔斯曼的名字命名的.
pinyin: tǎ sī màn ní yà dǎo shì yǐ qí fā xiàn zhě tǎ sī màn de míng zi mìng míng de.
english: Tasmania was named after its discoverer, A. J. Tasman.

hanzi: 古代的庇护特权转移到了基督教的教堂。
pinyin: gǔ dài de bì hù tè quán zhuǎn yí dào le Jī dū jiào de jiào táng。
english: The ancient privilege of sanctuary was transferred to the Christian temple.

hanzi: 我们双方都作些让步以弥合价格差距怎么样？
pinyin: wǒ men shuāng fāng dōu zuò xiē ràng bù yǐ mí hé jià gé chā jù zěn me yàng？
english: How about meeting each other halfway to fill the price gap?

hanzi: 罗马帝国在全盛时期几乎占据了整个欧洲。
pinyin: Luó mǎ dì guó zài quán shèng shí qī jī hū zhàn jù le zhěng gè ōu zhōu。
english: At its zenith the Roman Empire covered almost the whole of Europe.

hanzi: 你要是到商店去，可以给我捎些香烟来吗？
pinyin: nǐ yào shì dào shāng diàn qù， kě yǐ jǐ wǒ shāo xiē xiāng yān lái ma？
english: If you're going to the shops, could you bring me back some cigarettes?

hanzi: 救济人员在（向生还者）分发紧急配给品.
pinyin: jiù jì rén yuán zài（ xiàng shēng huán zhě） fēn fā jǐn jí pèi jǐ pǐn.
english: Relief workers were handing out emergency rations (to the survivors).

hanzi: 这一切都是如此；但这件事的重要性如何呢，老爷？
pinyin: zhè yī qiè dōu shì rú cǐ； dàn zhè jiàn shì de zhòng yào xìng rú hé ne， lǎo ye？
english: All this is so; but what of this, my lord?

hanzi: 壁身体部位、器官或腔的外表面。常用复数
pinyin: bì shēn tǐ bù wèi、 qì guān huò qiāng de wài biǎo miàn。 cháng yòng fù shù
english: A wall of a body part, organ, or cavity. Often used in the plural.

hanzi: 专制如同或被专制者统治；绝对权力或权威
pinyin: zhuān zhì rú tóng huò bèi zhuān zhì zhě tǒng zhì； jué duì quán lì huò quán wēi
english: Rule by or as if by a despot; absolute power or authority.

hanzi: 只有他一人直言不讳地表示反对关闭医院。
pinyin: zhǐ yǒu tā yī rén zhí yán bù huì de biǎo shì fǎn duì guān bì yī yuàn。
english: He is the only one to speak out against the closure of the hospital.

hanzi: 名牌记有名字的牌或匾，如挂在办公室门上
pinyin: míng pái jì yǒu míng zì de pái huò pián， rú guà zài bàn gōng shì mén shàng
english: A plate or plaque, as on an office door, inscribed with a name.

hanzi: 这两个定义可以合成一个呢, 还是必须分开?
pinyin: zhè liǎng gè dìng yì kě yǐ hé chéng yī gè ne,  hái shì bì xū fēn kāi?
english: Can these two definitions be conflated, or must they be kept separate?

hanzi: 正在建造的核电站预计在五年後投产.
pinyin: zhèng zài jiàn zào de hé diàn zhàn yù jì zài wǔ nián後 tóu chǎn.
english: The nuclear plant now being built is expected to be commissioned in five years' time.

hanzi: 无知的孩子们有时会嘲笑乞丐和无家可归的人。
pinyin: wú zhī de hái zi men yǒu shí kuài cháo xiào qǐ gài huò wú jiā kě guī de rén。
english: Ignorant children sometimes laugh at beggars and tramps.

hanzi: 确认确认他人的存在、有效性、权威或权力
pinyin: què rèn què rèn tā rén de cún zài、 yǒu xiào xìng、 quán wēi huò quán lì
english: Recognition of another's existence, validity, authority, or right.

hanzi: 那律师装上笔尖；摊开纸张，准备缮写。
pinyin: nà lu:4 shī zhuāng shàng bǐ jiān； tān kāi zhǐ zhāng， zhǔn bèi shàn xiě。
english: The lawyer nib his pen, spread out his paper, and prepared to write.

hanzi: 长期罢工损失巨大致使该公司一蹶不振.
pinyin: cháng qī bà gōng sǔn shī jù dà zhì shǐ gāi gōng sī yī jué bù zhèn.
english: The long and costly strike proved to be the last nail in the company's coffin.

hanzi: 养老金的多少取决於为公司服务年限的长短.
pinyin: yǎng lǎo jīn de duō shao qǔ jué yū wèi gōng sī fú wù nián xiàn de cháng duǎn.
english: Size of pension depends on length of service with the company.

hanzi: 别再让我们蒙在鼓里了, 结局究竟怎麽样?
pinyin: biè zài ràng wǒ men měng zài gǔ lǐ le,  jié jú jiū jìng zěn mó yàng?
english: Don't keep us in suspense any longer -- what happens at the end of the story?

hanzi: 她要买店里最好的水果而（跟店主）讨价还价.
pinyin: tā yào mǎi diàn lǐ zuì hǎo de shuǐ guǒ ér（ gēn diàn zhǔ） tǎo jie huán jie.
english: She dickered (with the shopkeeper) for the best fruit.

hanzi: 随着选举临近，党组织的活动也如火如荼。
pinyin: suí zhe xuǎn jǔ lín jìn， dǎng zǔ zhī de huó dòng yě rú huǒ rú tú。
english: The party organization is moving into top gear as the election approaches.

hanzi: 工资固定又无晋升机会遏制了雇员的积极性.
pinyin: gōng zī gù dìng yòu wú jìn shēng jī huì è zhì le gù yuán de jī jí xìng.
english: Fixed wages and lack of promotion act as a disincentive to employees.

hanzi: 这部电影是先拍摄画面的, 音乐是後加上的.
pinyin: zhè bù diàn yǐng shì xiān pāi shè huà miàn de,  yīn yuè shì後 jiā shàng de.
english: The film was made first and the music was added as an afterthought.

hanzi: 肆意地作出粗暴的行为；纵情享受最新时尚
pinyin: sì yì de zuò chū cū bào de xíng wéi； zòng qíng xiǎng shòu zuì xīn shí shàng
english: Indulged in outrageous behavior; indulged in all the latest fads.

hanzi: 他身上的一处处伤痕证明他曾受到严刑拷打。
pinyin: tā shēn shàng de yī chù chù shāng hén zhèng míng tā zēng shòu dào yán xíng kǎo dǎ。
english: His scars bore witness to the torture he had suffered.

hanzi: 她的卧室是这座嘈杂房屋中一个难得的安静之处。
pinyin: tā de wò shì shì zhè zuò cáo zá fáng wū zhòng yī gè nán dé de ān jìng zhī chù。
english: Her bedroom is an oasis of calm in the noisy house.

hanzi: 放荡不羁的人行动没有道德约束的人；放荡的人
pinyin: fàng dàng bù jī de rén xíng dòng méi yǒu dào dé yuē shù de rén； fàng dàng de rén
english: One who acts without moral restraint; a dissolute person.

hanzi: 她的追求者几乎是争先恐后向她献殷勤。
pinyin: tā de zhuī qiú zhě jī hū shì zhēng xiān kǒng hòu xiàng tā xiàn yīn qín。
english: Her admirers almost fell over each other with offers of hospitality.

hanzi: 内涵一个名辞里固有的含义和暗含意思的总和
pinyin: nèi hán yī gè míng cí lǐ gù yǒu de hán yì huò àn hán yì sī de zǒng hé
english: The sum of meanings and corresponding implications inherent in a term.

hanzi: 思考，推理便运智力的行为过程；思考或推理
pinyin: sī kǎo， tuī lǐ pián yùn zhì lì de xíng wéi guò chéng； sī kǎo huò tuī lǐ
english: The act or process of using the intellect; thinking or reasoning.

hanzi: 某女士已被提名任董事职务[任命为新董事].
pinyin: mǒu nu:3 shì yǐ bèi tí míng rèn dǒng shì zhí wù[ rèn mìng wèi xīn dǒng shì].
english: Ms X has been named for the directorship/named as the new director.

hanzi: 衷心祝愿鸿运高照，美满姻缘，天长地久。
pinyin: zhōng xīn zhù yuàn hóng yùn gāo zhào， měi mǎn yīn yuán， Tiān cháng de jiǔ。
english: May this day be start of long happy prosperous life for you both.

hanzi: 把混合物煮至沸腾，然後再用文火煮十分钟。
pinyin: bǎ hùn hé wù zhǔ zhì fèi téng， rán後 zài yòng wén huǒ zhǔ shí fēn zhōng。
english: Bring the mixture to the boil, then let it simmer for ten minutes.

hanzi: 享乐主义者喜爱豪华奢侈生活的人；享乐主义者
pinyin: xiǎng lè zhǔ yì zhě xǐ ài háo huá shē chǐ shēng huó de rén； xiǎng lè zhǔ yì zhě
english: A devotee to sensuous and luxurious living; an epicure.

hanzi: 这个地区的犯罪率、 发病率、 失业率等很高.
pinyin: zhè gè dì qū de fàn zuì shuài、  fā bìng lu:4、  shī yè lu:4 děng hěn gāo.
english: This area has a high incidence of crime, disease, unemployment, etc.

hanzi: 我们进行质量检验时，有缺陷的产品均予剔除。
pinyin: wǒ men jìn xíng zhì liàng jiǎn yàn shí， yǒu quē xiàn de chǎn pǐn jūn yǔ tī chú。
english: Imperfect articles are rejected by our quality control.

hanzi: 政府为他颁赠勋章，以表彰他的卓著功绩。
pinyin: zhèng fǔ wèi tā bān zèng xūn zhāng， yǐ biǎo zhāng tā de zhuó著 gōng jī。
english: The government recognized his outstanding service by give him a medal.

hanzi: 这个贫穷的母亲怅惘地回忆她已经逝去的青春。
pinyin: zhè gè pín qióng de mǔ qīn chàng wǎng de huí yì tā yǐ jīng shì qù de qīng chūn。
english: The poor mother has wistful reminiscences of her lost youth.

hanzi: 她在危难时总是很冷静、 镇定如常、 泰然自若.
pinyin: tā zài wēi nàn shí zǒng shì hěn lěng jìng、  zhèn dìng rú cháng、  tài rán zì ruò.
english: She always stays cool, calm and collected in a crisis.

hanzi: 她在危难时总是很冷静、 镇定如常、 泰然自若.
pinyin: tā zài wēi nàn shí zǒng shì hěn lěng jìng、  zhèn dìng rú cháng、  tài rán zì ruò.
english: She always stays cool, calm and collected in a crisis.

hanzi: 她是办公室的新人, 她有什麽需要就多帮帮忙.
pinyin: tā shì bàn gōng shì de xīn rén,  tā yǒu shí mó xū yào jiù duō bāng bāng máng.
english: She's the new girl in the office, so give her any help she needs.

hanzi: 灵巧的在设计和功能方面巧妙而复杂的；精巧的

english: The laws apply to everyone irrespective of race, creed or colour.

hanzi: 两口子争得够呛，弄得咱们一晚上没眨眼皮。

hanzi: 在预订时交付定金是一般的[普遍遵守的]惯例.
pinyin: zài yù dìng shí jiāo fù dìng jīn shì yì bān de[ pǔ biàn zūn shǒu de] guàn lì.
english: It is accepted/standard practice to pay a deposit with one's order.

pinyin: yǒu xiē shī rén， rú jì cí huò xuě lái， xiě de shì làng màn zhǔ yì de shī gē。
english: Such poets as Keats and Shelley wrote Romantic poetry.

pinyin: zhè jiàn yī fu shì chún yáng máo de， hái shì yáng máo yù ní lóng hùn fǎng de ？

pinyin: wǒ shì zhuān zhǐ yǒng jiǔ jū mín ér yán,  yǐ biè yū lín shí fǎng kè.
english: I refer specifically to permanent residents, in contradistinction to temporary visitors.

hanzi: 狭航道一个狭窄的，从海岸通往内地的航道；海峡
pinyin: xiá háng dào yī gè xiá zhǎi de， zòng hǎi àn tōng wàng nèi dì de háng dào； hǎi xiá

english: Taxpayer: what will happen if the two companies establish equity joint venture?

pinyin: " zài lái yī bēi ma？"" zūn mìng， bǐ cǐ gàn yī bēi，" wǔ zhǎng huí dá shuō。
english: "Have another glass? ""With you, hob and nob, " returned the sergeant.

pinyin: liè děng gǒu yī zhòng bèi shì wéi dī liè de huò bù shòu huān yíng de gǒu； zá zhòng gǒu
english: A dog considered to be inferior or undesirable; a mongrel.

hanzi: 看到一个乞丐跨进一辆闪亮的奔驰轿车我惊愕不已。
pinyin: kàn dào yī gè qǐ gài kuà jìn yī liàng shǎn liàng de bēn chí jiào chē wǒ jīng è bù yǐ。
english: I am amazed to see a beggar step into a shiny Mercedes.

hanzi: 二等兵琼斯（因勇敢）被授予维多利亚十字勋章.
pinyin: èr děng bīng qióng sī（ yīn yǒng gǎn） bèi shòu yǔ wéi Duō lì yà shí zì xūn zhāng.
english: Private Jones was awarded the Victoria Cross (for his gallantry).

hanzi: 他在辩论中的策略是先直接抨击政府的政策。

hanzi: 该珠宝公司不过是进行非法的钻石交易的幌子。

hanzi: 人们通常认为基督时代是从耶稣出世开始算起的。

english: The Christian age is usually reckoned from the birth of Christ.

hanzi: 公司发布了新闻稿以期遏止对其股票的投机活动.
pinyin: gōng sī fā bù le xīn wén gǎo yǐ qī è zhǐ duì qí gǔ piào de tóu jī huó dòng.
english: The company issued a press release to try to stop speculationin its shares.

hanzi: 富孀，是惟一可以一流的价钱出售的二手货色。
pinyin: fù shuāng， shì wéi yī kě yǐ yī liú de jià qian chū shòu de èr shǒu huò shǎi。
english: Rich widows are the only secondhand goods that sell at first-class prices.

hanzi: 矿渣诸如砂砾或矿渣等物质，可从中提取金属
pinyin: kuàng zhā zhū rú shā lì huò kuàng zhā děng wù zhì， kě cóng zhōng tí qǔ jīn shǔ
english: Material, such as gravel or slag, from which metal is extracted in mining.

hanzi: 文人，学者被作为一个群体看待的受过教育的人；文人
pinyin: wén rén， xué zhě bèi zuò wéi yī gè qún tǐ kàn dài de shòu guò jiào yù de rén； wén rén
english: Educated people considered as a group; the literati.

hanzi: 尖尾长艇大小及形状与该划艇相似的船；捕鲸船
pinyin: jiān wěi zhǎng tǐng dà xiǎo jí xíng zhuàng yù gāi huà tǐng xiāng sì de chuán； bǔ jīng chuán
english: A boat similar to such a rowboat in size and shape; a whaler.

hanzi: 这使他产生了奇怪的、 基於人类固有之本能的强烈欲望.
pinyin: zhè shǐ tā chǎn shēng le qí guài de、  jī yū rén lèi gù yǒu zhī běn néng de qiáng liè yù wàng.
english: It aroused strange primeval yearnings in him.

hanzi: 这些问题揭发後, 有几个大臣辞职了.
pinyin: zhè xie wèn tí jiē fā後,  yǒu jǐ ge dà chén cí zhí le.
english: As a result of these exposures (ie facts being made known to the public) several ministers resigned from the government.

hanzi: 裂缝土地表面上深的、陡峭的缝隙；深渊或峡谷
pinyin: liè fèng tǔ dì biǎo miàn shàng shēn de、 dǒu qiào de fèng xì； shēn yuān huò xiá gǔ
english: A deep, steep-sided opening in the earth's surface; an abyss or a gorge.

hanzi: 往日激情将熄的余烬仍可从他的文章中看出来。
pinyin: wǎng rì jī qíng jiàng xī de yú jìn réng kě zòng tā de wén zhāng zhòng kàn chū lai。
english: The dying embers of a former passion can still be seen in his article.

hanzi: 这些问题揭发後, 有几个大臣辞职了.
pinyin: zhè xie wèn tí jiē fā後,  yǒu jǐ ge dà chén cí zhí le.
english: As a result of these exposures (ie facts being made known to the public) several ministers resigned from the government.

hanzi: 这些袋子难於搬运, 倒不是因为重而是体积太大.
pinyin: zhè xie dài zi nàn yū bān yùn,  dào bú shì yīn wèi zhòng ér shì tǐ jī tài dà.
english: It's not their weight that makes these sacks hard to carry, it's their bulk.

hanzi: 天主教徒透过告解以获得赦罪[净化灵魂].
pinyin: tiān zhǔ jiào tú tòu guò gào xiè yǐ huò dé shè zuì[ jìng huà líng hún].
english: Catholics go to confession to be purged of sin/purge (away) their sin/purge their souls of sin.

hanzi: 由於炸弹过早爆炸, （恐怖分子的）阴谋未能得逞.
pinyin: yóu yū zhà dàn guò zǎo bào zhà, （ kǒng bù fèn zǐ de） yīn móu wèi néng dé chěng.
english: The plot backfired (on the terrorist) when the bomb exploded too soon.

hanzi: 次要矿山甬道矿井中连接两条大隧道的小巷道
pinyin: cì yào kuàng shān yǒng dào kuàng jǐng zhòng lián jiē liǎng tiáo dà suì dào de xiǎo xiàng dào
english: A secondary mine passageway between two main shafts or tunnels.

hanzi: 主题，范围一个题目、课题或学术兴趣或专业领域
pinyin: zhǔ tí， fàn wéi yī gè tí mù、 kè tí huò xué shù xìng qu huò zhuān yè lǐng yù
english: A topic, a subject, or an area of academic interest or specialization.

hanzi: 玛丽的父亲动手术后需要长期在疗养院休养。
pinyin: Mǎ lì de fù qīn dòng shǒu zhú hòu xū yào cháng qī zài liáo yǎng yuàn xiū yǎng。
english: Mary's father had to stay in a rest home for a long time after his operation.

hanzi: 社会主义的政策有利於在煤炭工业中推行公有制.
pinyin: shè huì zhǔ yì de zhèng cè yǒu lì yū zài méi tàn gōng yè zhòng tuī xíng gōng yǒu zhì.
english: Socialist policy favours public ownership of the coal industry.

hanzi: 姜、 肉豆蔻、 肉桂、 胡椒、 丁香都是常用的香料.
pinyin: jiāng、  ròu dòu蔻、  ròu guì、  hú jiāo、  dīng xiāng dōu shì cháng yòng de xiāng liào.
english: Ginger, nutmeg, cinnamon, pepper and cloves are common spices.

hanzi: 他批评以前的同事, 并非出於气愤而是为他惋惜.
pinyin: tā pī píng yǐ qián de tóng shì,  bìng fēi chū yū qì fèn ér shì wèi tā wǎn xī.
english: It was more in sorrow than in anger that he criticized his former colleague.

hanzi: 这个宝石的价格十分昂贵－－简直是个天文数字。
pinyin: zhè gè bǎo shí de jià gé shí fēn áng guì－－ jiǎn zhí shì gè tiān wén shù zì。
english: The price of this gem is expensive -- as much so as astronomical figures.

hanzi: 在连续的场景中使用同样的道具以确保前後衔接.
pinyin: zài lián xù de chǎng jǐng zhòng shǐ yòng tóng yàng de dào jù yǐ què bǎo qián後 xián jiē.
english: Continuity is ensured by using the same props in successive scenes.

hanzi: 他在干一个有收益的副业－－－－向游客出售明信片。
pinyin: tā zài gàn yī gè yǒu shōu yì de fù yè－－－－ xiàng yóu kè chū shòu míng xìn piàn。
english: He runs a profitable sideline selling postcard to tourist.

hanzi: 你什麽也不用做--只管轻松愉快地享受旅游的乐趣.
pinyin: nǐ shí mó yě bù yòng zuò-- zhǐ guǎn qīng sōng yú kuài de xiǎng shòu lu:3 yóu de lè qù.
english: You don't have to do anything just lie back and enjoy the journey.

hanzi: 他在干一个有收益的副业－－－－向游客出售明信片。
pinyin: tā zài gàn yī gè yǒu shōu yì de fù yè－－－－ xiàng yóu kè chū shòu míng xìn piàn。
english: He runs a profitable sideline selling postcard to tourist.

hanzi: 花花公子在服饰和举止方面极其文雅的人；纨绔子弟
pinyin: huā huā gōng zi zài fú shì huò jǔ zhǐ fāng miàn jí qí wén yǎ de rén； wán绔 zǐ dì
english: A man who affects extreme elegance in clothes and manners; a fop.

hanzi: 这个老战犯终于被人从他在国外的藏匿处查获。
pinyin: zhè gè lǎo zhàn fàn zhōng yú bèi rén zòng tā zài guó wài de cáng nì chù chá huò。
english: The old war criminal is at last smoked out from his hiding place abroad.

hanzi: 我的秤准确无误，太太。可是你称过你的小儿子了吗？
pinyin: wǒ de chèng zhǔn què wú wù， tài tai。 kě shì nǐ chèng guò nǐ de xiǎo ér zi le ma？
english: My scales are all right, madam. Have you weighted your little boy?

hanzi: 我们得把申请书仔细筛选一下以甄别优劣.
pinyin: wǒ men de bǎ shēn qǐng shū zǐ xì shāi xuǎn yī xià yǐ zhēn biè yōu liè.
english: We have to sift through the application forms very carefully to separate the wheat from the chaff.

hanzi: 天主教徒透过告解以获得赦罪[净化灵魂].
pinyin: tiān zhǔ jiào tú tòu guò gào xiè yǐ huò dé shè zuì[ jìng huà líng hún].
english: Catholics go to confession to be purged of sin/purge (away) their sin/purge their souls of sin.

hanzi: 她的经历很悲惨, 我们都深受感动[我们都很伤心].
pinyin: tā de jīng lì hěn bēi cǎn,  wǒ men dōu shēn shòu gǎn dòng[ wǒ men dōu hěn shāng xīn].
english: Her tragic story touched us all deeply/touched our hearts with sorrow.

hanzi: 那椅子太破旧了，无法修理：架子好几个地方坏了。
pinyin: nà yǐ zi tài pò jiù le， wú fǎ xiū lǐ： jià zi hǎo jǐ gè dì fang huài le。
english: That chair is too far gone to repair: the frame is broken in several places.

hanzi: 妻子，夫人通过结婚而与一个男人结合的女人；女性配偶
pinyin: qī zi， fū ren tōng guò jié hūn ér yù yī gè nán rén jié hé de nu:3 rén； nu:3 xìng pèi ǒu
english: A woman joined to a man in marriage; a female spouse.

hanzi: 他们在会议前争吵起来, 经劝说最後言归於好.
pinyin: tā men zài huì yì qián zhēng chǎo qǐ lai,  jīng quàn shuō zuì後 yán guī yū hào.
english: They exchanged angry words before the meeting but were finally persuaded to agree.

hanzi: 在连续的场景中使用同样的道具以确保前後衔接.
pinyin: zài lián xù de chǎng jǐng zhòng shǐ yòng tóng yàng de dào jù yǐ què bǎo qián後 xián jiē.
english: Continuity is ensured by using the same props in successive scenes.

hanzi: 公司被迫裁员, 恐怕我是其中之一（冗员）.
pinyin: gōng sī bèi pò cái yuán,  kǒng pà wǒ shì qí zhōng zhī yī（ rǒng yuán）.
english: The company is being forced to reduce staff and I fear I'm a likely candidate (for redundancy).

hanzi: 汇编指编辑好的一套数据、一篇报道或一部选集
pinyin: huì biān zhǐ biān jí hǎo de yī tào shù jù、 yī piān bào dào huò yī bù xuǎn jí
english: Something, such as a set of data, a report, or an anthology, that is compiled.

hanzi: 时髦，是逃亡自庸俗而又惟恐被？上的假斯文。
pinyin: shí máo， shì táo wáng zì yōng sú ér yòu wéi kǒng bèi？ shàng de jià sī wén。
english: Fashion is gentility running away from vulgarity, and afraid of being overtake.

hanzi: 儿时，上天向我们撒谎；往后，我们又朝天撒谎。
pinyin: er shí， shàng tiān xiàng wǒ men sā huǎng； wǎng hòu， wǒ men yòu cháo tiān sā huǎng。
english: Heaven lie about us in our infancy-and we lie about heaven later on.

hanzi: 感染力蔓延扩散的倾向，如学说、影响或情绪等
pinyin: gǎn rǎn lì màn yán kuò sàn de qīng xiàng， rú xué shuō、 yǐng xiǎng huò qíng xù děng
english: The tendency to spread, as of a doctrine, influence, or emotional state.

hanzi: 大学的任务是训练学生以从事各种适合的工作吗？
pinyin: dà xué de rèn wu shì xùn liàn xué sheng yǐ cóng shì gè zhǒng shì hé de gōng zuò ma？
english: Is it the business of the universities to train students for suitable jobs?

hanzi: 黎明前，这个负伤的男人被神秘地带出了庄园宅邸。
pinyin: lí míng qián， zhè gè fù shāng de nán rén bèi shén mì dì dài chū le zhuāng yuán zhái dǐ。
english: Before dawn the wounded man is spirited away from the house.

hanzi: 在字（词）处理技术中，书信和其它文献的主要部分。
pinyin: zài zì（ cí） chǔ lǐ jì shù zhòng， shū xìn huò qí tā wén xiàn de zhǔ yào bù fen。
english: In word processing, the main text of a letter or other document.

hanzi: 对於执行死刑, 赞成与反对的双方都有强有力的论据.
pinyin: duì yū zhí xíng sǐ xíng,  zàn chéng yù fǎn duì de shuāng fāng dōu yǒu qiáng yǒu lì de lùn jù.
english: There are strong arguments for and against capital punishment.

hanzi: 那艘油轮遇难後，对同类型的油轮都进行了检验。
pinyin: nà sōu yóu lún yù nàn後， duì tóng lèi xíng de yóu lún dōu jìn xíng le jiǎn yàn。
english: After the disaster, tests were carried out on the tanker's sister vessels.

hanzi: 同事同行、职员或学院教工的同僚之一；同事
pinyin: tóng shì tóng xíng、 zhí yuán huò xué yuàn jiào gōng de tóng liáo zhī yī； tóng shì
english: A fellow member of a profession, a staff, or an academic faculty; an associate.

hanzi: 新建的发电厂能够满足我们对廉价能源的需求吗?
pinyin: Xīn jiàn de fā diàn chǎng néng gòu mǎn zú wǒ men duì lián jià néng yuán de xū qiú ma?
english: Will the new power-station be able to supply our cheap energy requirements?

hanzi: 多配偶（制）同时拥有一个以上配偶的状况或做法
pinyin: duō pèi ǒu（ zhì） tóng shí yōng yǒu yī gè yǐ shàng pèi ǒu de zhuàng kuàng huò zuò fǎ
english: The condition or practice of having more than one spouse at one time.

hanzi: 当其他人走了之后，玛丽留下来，将家具放回原处。
pinyin: dàng qí tā rén zǒu le zhī hòu， Mǎ lì liú xià lái， jiàng jiā jù fàng huí yuán chù。
english: When the others had gone, Mary remained and put back the furniture.

hanzi: 在市中心和飞机场之间有往返的穿梭运行班车。
pinyin: zài shì zhōng xīn huò fēi jī chǎng zhī jiān yǒu wǎng fǎn de chuān suō yùn xíng bān chē。
english: There is a shuttle service between the city center and the air station.

hanzi: 游行者打著横幅, 上有大字｀禁止使用核武器＇.
pinyin: yóu xíng zhě dǎ著 hèng fú,  shàng yǒu dà zì｀ jìn zhǐ shǐ yòng hé wǔ qì＇.
english: The marchers carried banners with the words `No Nuclear Weapons' in large letters.

hanzi: 有多少受训的飞行员没有通过上次考核而被淘汰？
pinyin: yǒu duō shao shòu xùn de fēi xíng yuán méi yǒu tōng guò shàng cì kǎo hé ér bèi táo tài？
english: How many pilots in training were washed out in the last examination?

hanzi: 有多少受训的飞行员没有通过上次考核而被淘汰？
pinyin: yǒu duō shao shòu xùn de fēi xíng yuán méi yǒu tōng guò shàng cì kǎo hé ér bèi táo tài？
english: How many pilots in training were washed out in the last examination?

hanzi: 蜂蜜水水和蜂蜜的混合物，混合物发酵时变成蜂蜜酒
pinyin: fēng mì shuǐ shuǐ huò fēng mì de hùn hé wù， hùn hé wù fā jiào shí biàn chéng fēng mì jiǔ
english: A mixture of water and honey that becomes mead when fermented.

hanzi: 惊奇的，诧异的感觉或表达敬畏、钦佩、吃惊或惊奇的
pinyin: jīng qí de， chà yì de gǎn jué huò biǎo dá jìng wèi、 qīn pèi、 chī jīng huò jīng qí de
english: Feeling or expressing awe, admiration, amazement, or surprise.

hanzi: 解放运动为某一个团体谋求平等权利的运动；解放
pinyin: jiě fàng yùn dòng wèi mǒu yī gè tuán tǐ móu qiú píng děng quán lì de yùn dòng； jiě fàng
english: A movement that seeks to achieve equal rights for a group; liberation.

hanzi: "没问题，"有人答道，"快点，宇宙飞船正等着呢。"
pinyin: " mò wèn tí，" yǒu rén dá dào，" kuài diǎn， yǔ zhòu fēi chuán zhèng děng zhuó ne。"
english: "That's all right, " someone said. "Quickly, the spaceship is waiting."

hanzi: ｀你有什麽宠物吗?＇｀有, 我有三只兔子和一只乌龟.＇
pinyin: ｀ nǐ yǒu shí mó chǒng wù ma?＇｀ yǒu,  wǒ yǒu sān zhǐ tù zi huò yī zhǐ wū guī.＇
english: `Have you got any pets?' `Yes, I've got three rabbits and a tortoise.'

hanzi: 当我告诉他那个消息时我自己不知不觉地哽咽起来。
pinyin: dàng wǒ gào su tā nèi gè xiāo xi shí wǒ zì jǐ bù zhī bù jué de gěng yè qǐ lai。
english: I couldn't account for the lump in my throat when I told him the news.

hanzi: 平民的，普通的大众人民的，与大众人民有关的；普通的
pinyin: píng mín de， pǔ tōng de dà zhòng rén mín de， yù dà zhòng rén mín yǒu guān de； pǔ tōng de
english: Of or associated with the great masses of people; common.

hanzi: 那麽说是你把金属线穿过那个小孔的了, 真灵巧!
pinyin: nà mó shuō shì nǐ bǎ jīn shǔ xiàn chuān guò nèi gè xiǎo kǒng de le,  zhēn líng qiǎo!
english: So you fitted that wire through that little hole there: that's very ingenious!

hanzi: 讣闻死亡后发表的通告，有时附有死者简要传记
pinyin: fù wén sǐ wáng hòu fā biǎo de tōng gào， yǒu shí fù yǒu sǐ zhě jiǎn yào zhuàn jì
english: A published notice of a death, sometimes with a brief biography of the deceased.

hanzi: 水上体育活动驾舟、游泳或其它与水有关的运动的技术
pinyin: shuǐ shàng tǐ yù huó dòng jià zhōu、 yóu yǒng huò qí tā yù shuǐ yǒu guān de yùn dòng de jì shù
english: Skill in boating, swimming, or other water-related sports.

hanzi: 他企图藉赌博增加收入，却陷入了更深的困境。
pinyin: tā qǐ tú jiè dǔ bó zēng jiā shōu rù， què xiàn rù le gèng shēn de kùn jìng。
english: He tried to increase his income by gambling only to plunge more deeply into the mire.

hanzi: 链，带系在表或手镯上以防其丢失的小链子或带子
pinyin: liàn， dài xì zài biǎo huò shǒu zhuó shàng yǐ fáng qí diū shī de xiǎo liàn zi huò dài zi
english: A small chain or band attached to a watch or bracelet to prevent loss.

hanzi: 一个频带的上下界频率之差，单位用赫兹表示。
pinyin: yī gè pín dài de shàng xià jiè pín lu:4 zhī cī， dān wèi yòng hè zī biǎo shì。
english: The difference, expressed in Hertz, between the two limiting frequencies of a band.

hanzi: 真不凑巧，当马戏团来到我们镇上时戴维得了麻疹。
pinyin: zhēn bù còu qiǎo， dàng mǎ xì tuán lái dào wǒ men zhèn shàng shí Dài wéi dé le má zhěn。
english: It was too bad David had measles when the circus came to our town.

hanzi: 我们的本周报纸要闻回顾由《时代》周刊编辑主持.
pinyin: wǒ men de běn zhōu bào zhǐ yào wén huí gù yóu《 shí dài》 zhōu kān biān jí zhǔ chí.
english: Our review of this week's papers is presented by the editor of The Times'.

hanzi: 软骨性的有软骨组织结构的；坚固、坚韧而又有弹性的
pinyin: ruǎn gǔ xìng de yǒu ruǎn gǔ zǔ zhī jié gòu de； jiān gù、 jiān rèn ér yòu yǒu tán xìng de
english: Having the texture of cartilage; firm and tough, yet flexible.

hanzi: 她量出一定量的面粉、黄油和糖，开始拌做糕饼。
pinyin: tā liàng chū yī dìng liàng de miàn fěn、 huáng yóu huò táng， kāi shǐ bàn zuò gāo bǐng。
english: She measured out the flour, butter, and sugar and started to mix a cake.

hanzi: 我不打算放弃我的假日来迁就你, 你不听也得听!
pinyin: wǒ bù dǎ suàn fàng qì wǒ de jià rì lái qiān jiù nǐ,  nǐ bù tìng yě de tìng!
english: I'm not giving up my holiday to suit you, so you can put that in your pipe and smoke it!

hanzi: 史密斯先生将出任阿根廷大使的命令已经下达。
pinyin: shǐ mì sī xiān sheng jiàng chū rèn ē gēn tíng dà shǐ de mìng lìng yǐ jīng xià dá。
english: The decree has gone forth that Mr.Smith is to be the new ambassador to Argentina.

hanzi: 小的隐居处所狭小、简陋的住所，比如隐士的山洞或棚屋
pinyin: xiǎo de yǐn jū chù suǒ xiá xiǎo、 jiǎn lòu de zhù suǒ， bǐ rú yǐn shì de shān dòng huò péng wū
english: A small, humble abode, such as a hermit's cave or hut.

hanzi: 想起自己坎坷的一生，他不由仰天长叹。
pinyin: xiǎng qǐ zì jǐ kǎn kě de yī shēng， tā bù yóu yǎng tiān zhǎng tàn。
english: He could not but look up to the sky and sigh deeply when his lifetime of frustrations passed through his mind.

hanzi: 飞机上升到这样高度时，飞行员昏厥了片刻时间。
pinyin: fēi jī shàng shēng dào zhè yàng gāo dù shí， fēi xíng yuán hūn jué le piàn kè shí jiān。
english: The pilot blacked out for a moment upon reaching such a high altitude.

hanzi: 解放运动为某一个团体谋求平等权利的运动；解放
pinyin: jiě fàng yùn dòng wèi mǒu yī gè tuán tǐ móu qiú píng děng quán lì de yùn dòng； jiě fàng
english: A movement that seeks to achieve equal rights for a group; liberation.

hanzi: 他小心翼翼地往后探身终于拿到了橱顶的那支笔。
pinyin: tā xiǎo xīn yì yì de wǎng hòu tàn shēn zhōng yú ná dào le chú dǐng de nà zhī bǐ。
english: He reached back carefully and got the pen on the very top of the cupboard.

hanzi: ＂我现在还不需要这些文献，但我还是要感谢你。＂
pinyin: ＂ wǒ xiàn zài huán bù xū yào zhè xie wén xiàn， dàn wǒ hái shì yào gǎn xiè nǐ。＂
english: I don't need the literature at present. Thank you very much all the same.

hanzi: 长寿饮食法的饮食主要是含胚芽和麸的谷物及豆类。
pinyin: cháng shòu yǐn shí fǎ de yǐn shí zhǔ yào shì hán pēi yá huò fū de gǔ wù jí dòu lèi。
english: Macrobiotic adhere to a diet consist primarily of whole grains and bean.

hanzi: [谚]与狗同眠的人必然惹一身跳蚤；同坏人为伍必然吃亏。
pinyin: [ yàn] yù gǒu tóng mián de rén bì rán rě yī shēn tiào zǎo； tóng huài rén wèi wǔ bì rán chī kuī。
english: He that lies down with dogs must rise up with fleas.

hanzi: 她工作努力从而提高了自己的声誉[为学校增添了荣誉].
pinyin: tā gōng zuò nǔ lì cóng ér tí gāo le zì jǐ de shēng yú[ wèi xué xiào zēng tiān le róng yù].
english: Her hard work redounds to her credit/to the honour of the school.

hanzi: 性虐待狂为寻求性满足而打别人或被别人打的人
pinyin: xìng nu:è dài kuáng wèi xún qiú xìng mǎn zú ér dǎ bié rén huò bèi bié rén dǎ dí rén
english: One who seeks sexual gratification in beating or being beaten by another person.

hanzi: 我整天都在照料四个小孩, 确实已筋疲力尽了!
pinyin: wǒ zhěng tiān dōu zài zhào liào sì gè xiǎo hái,  què shí yǐ jīn pí lì jìn le!
english: I've been looking after four young children all day and I really am at the end of my tether!

hanzi: 联合王国包括英格兰、 威尔士、 苏格兰、 北爱尔兰.
pinyin: lián hé wáng guó bāo kuò yīng gé lán、  wēi ěr shì、  sū gé lán、  běi ài ěr lán.
english: The United Kingdom takes in England, Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland.

hanzi: 他说他受过折磨拷打, 从他身上的伤疤看来倒也可信.
pinyin: tā shuō tā shòu guò zhé mo kǎo dǎ,  zòng tā shēn shàng de shāng bā kàn lai dào yě kě xìn.
english: The scars on his body lent colour to his claim that he had been tortured.

hanzi: 生物芯片用有机分子而非硅或锗制造的计算机芯片
pinyin: shēng wù xīn piàn yòng yǒu jī fèn zǐ ér fēi guī huò zhě zhì zào de jì suàn jī xīn piàn
english: A computer chip made from organic molecules rather than silicon or germanium.

hanzi: 工作完成後她获得赞誉, 但筹备期间的苦活儿全是他干的.
pinyin: gōng zuò wán chéng後 tā huò dé zàn yù,  dàn chóu bèi qī jiān de kǔ huór quán shì tā gàn de.
english: She got the praise for the job but he did all the spadework.

hanzi: 贵方所订购货物之其余部分, 一俟我方进货即可供应.
pinyin: guì fāng suǒ dìng gòu huò wù zhī qí yú bù fen,  yī sì wǒ fāng jìn huò jí kě gōng yìng.
english: The balance of your order will be supplied when we receive fresh stock.

hanzi: 那个芭蕾舞女演员在下台之前（向观众）行屈膝礼.
pinyin: nèi gè bā lěi wǔ nu:3 yǎn yuán zài xià tái zhī qián（ xiàng guān zhòng） xìng qū xī lǐ.
english: The ballerina bobbed a curtsy (to the audience) before leaving the stage.

hanzi: ｀你把剪刀放在哪儿了?＇｀我把它放（回）到抽屉里了.＇
pinyin: ｀ nǐ bǎ jiǎn dāo fàng zài nǎ r le?＇｀ wǒ bǎ tā fàng（ huí） dào chōu ti lǐ le.＇
english: `Where did you put the scissors?' `I put them (back) in the drawer.'

hanzi: 加重；加剧；恶化加重恶化的行为或被加重、恶化的状态
pinyin: jiā zhòng； jiā jù； è huà jiā zhòng è huà de xíng wéi huò bèi jiā zhòng、 è huà de zhuàng tài
english: The act of aggravating or the state of being aggravated.

hanzi: 哦！对了！我为什么不到学校的就业咨询处去查询一下呢。
pinyin: ó！ duì le！ wǒ wèi shén me bù dào xué xiào de jiù yè zī xún chù qù chá xún yī xià ne。
english: Oh, well why do not I check out the campus employment office?

hanzi: 风势已减弱了、 温度已下降了、 水平面已降低了很多.
pinyin: fēng shì yǐ jiǎn ruò le、  wēn dù yǐ xià jiàng le、  shuǐ píng miàn yǐ jiàng dī le hěn duō.
english: The wind, temperature, water level, etc has dropped considerably.

hanzi: 这孩子把关在笼里的鸟儿放出来，鸟儿吱吱叫着飞走了。
pinyin: zhè hái zi bǎ guān zài lóng lǐ de niǎo er fàng chū lái， niǎo er zī zī jiào zhuó fēi zǒu le。
english: The boy set his caged bird loose, and it flew away chirping.

hanzi: 辩论者；争辩者从事或喜欢争辩、辩论或驳斥的人
pinyin: biàn lùn zhě； zhēng biàn zhě cóng shì huò xǐ huan zhēng biàn、 biàn lùn huò bó chì de rén
english: A person engaged in or inclined to controversy, argument, or refutation.

hanzi: 两极是相通的嘛——当牙鳕把自己的尾巴放进口里时说。
pinyin: liǎng jí shì xiāng tōng de ma—— dàng yá xuě bǎ zì jǐ de wěi ba fàng jìn kǒu lǐ shí shuō。
english: Extremes meet, as the whiting said with its tail in its mouth.

hanzi: 檐槽把雨水从房顶排走的水槽，装在屋檐边或檐下
pinyin: yán cáo bǎ yǔ shuǐ zòng fáng dǐng pǎi zǒu de shuǐ cáo， zhuāng zài wū yán biān huò yán xià
english: A trough fixed under or along the eaves for draining rainwater from a roof.

hanzi: 迪克要么刻苦学习，要么根本不学，从不走中间路线。
pinyin: Dí kè yào me kè kǔ xué xí， yào me gēn běn bù xué， cóng bù zǒu zhōng jiān lù xiàn。
english: Dick either studies very hard or not at all, never anything in between.

hanzi: 论点，主旨，主题标题当中显示出来的主题、论点或题材
pinyin: lùn diǎn， zhǔ zhǐ， zhǔ tí biāo tí dāng zhōng xiǎn shì chū lai de zhǔ tí、 lùn diǎn huò tí cái
english: A theme, an argument, or a subject indicated in a title.

hanzi: 他本是国王的幸臣, 一朝失宠众人无不感到意外.
pinyin: tā běn shì guó wáng de xìng chén,  yī cháo shī chǒng zhòng rén wú bù gǎn dào yì wài.
english: He had been the king's favourite, and his sudden fall from grace surprised everyone.

hanzi: 较大的，全面的比平均范围、宽度或容量大的；广泛的
pinyin: jiào dà de， quán miàn de bì píng jūn fàn wéi、 kuān dù huò róng liàng dà de； guǎng fàn de
english: Of greater than average scope, breadth, or capacity; comprehensive.

hanzi: 殉教行为，是无德无能者可以一举成名的惟一途径。
pinyin: xùn jiào xíng wéi， shì wú dé wú néng zhě kě yǐ yī jǔ chéng míng de wéi yī tú jìng。
english: Martyrdom is the only way in which a man can become famous without ability.

hanzi: 按季收付的款项按季度发放或收到的津贴、工资或付款
pinyin: àn jì shōu fù de kuǎn xiàng àn jì dù fā fàng huò shōu dào de jīn tiē、 gōng zī huò fù kuǎn
english: A monetary allowance, wage, or payment made or received quarterly.

hanzi: 经济萧条时期，有好几百万的失业者在街头游荡。
pinyin: jīng jì xiāo tiáo shí qī， yǒu hǎo jǐ bǎi wàn de shī yè zhě zài jiē tóu yóu dàng。
english: During the depression, millions of the unemployed wandered around in the streets.

hanzi: 他们把通货膨胀大幅度增长归咎于石油价格的上涨。
pinyin: tā men bǎ tōng huò péng zhàng dà fú dù zēng zhǎng guī jiù yú shí yóu jià gé de shàng zhǎng。
english: They blamed the rise in oil prices for the big increase in inflation.

hanzi: 很难判定这两件工艺品孰优孰劣，它们都很好看。
pinyin: hěn nàn pàn dìng zhè liǎng jiàn gōng yì pǐn shú yōu shú liè， tā men dōu hěn hǎo kàn。
english: It's hard to judge between the tow handicraft articles; they're both charming.

hanzi: 所有的家畜都赶到厩里，因此我们几乎不会蒙受损失。
pinyin: suǒ yǒu de jiā chù dōu gǎn dào jiù lǐ， yīn cǐ wǒ men jī hū bù kuài méng shòu sǔn shī。
english: All the cattle had been moved into stalls and we stood to lose little.

hanzi: “我们或许再也不能在湖里游泳了。＂－－“为什么不能呢？＂
pinyin: “ wǒ men huò xǔ zài yě bù néng zài hú lǐ yóu yǒng le。＂－－“ wèi shén me bù néng ne？＂
english: "We may never swim in the lake again." --- "Why not?"

hanzi: 他断断续续地同评论家们口诛笔伐，使得肝火旺盛。
pinyin: tā duàn duàn xù xù de tóng píng lùn jiā men kǒu zhū bǐ fá， shǐ de gān huǒ wàng shèng。
english: He kept the adrenalin flowing with off-and-on feuds with his critics.

hanzi: 这些建议已向我们作了传达，既简明扼要，又很有说服力。
pinyin: zhè xie jiàn yì yǐ xiàng wǒ men zuò le chuán dá， jì jiǎn míng è yào， yòu hěn yǒu shuō fú lì。
english: The proposals were put to us very briefly and forcibly.

hanzi: 罗杰是一个极有教养的：他总是体贴入微并彬彬有礼。
pinyin: luó jié shì yī gè jí yǒu jiào yǎng de： tā zǒng shì tǐ tiē rù wēi bìng bīn bīn yǒu lǐ。
english: Roger is every inch a gentleman: he's always thoughtful and courteous.

hanzi: 固有的作为一种基本成份或典型特征而存在的；内在的
pinyin: gù yǒu de zuò wéi yī zhòng jī běn chéng fèn huò diǎn xíng tè zhēng ér cún zài de； nèi zài de
english: Existing as an essential constituent or characteristic; intrinsic.

hanzi: 没想到（老实的）他居然在三天内犯了三次抢劫罪。
pinyin: mò xiǎng dào（ lǎo shí de） tā jū rán zài sān tiān nèi fàn le sān cì qiāng jié zuì。
english: I didn't expect that he should have committed three robberies in as many days.

hanzi: 该电影明星以自己的名义努力募款帮助洪涝灾民。
pinyin: gāi diàn yǐng míng xīng yǐ zì jǐ de míng yì nǔ lì mù kuǎn bāng zhù hóng lào zāi mín。
english: The film star lent his name to the efforts to raise money to help the flood victims.

hanzi: 过去这些年来，用蒸馏法制取淡水成本一直很高。
pinyin: guò qu zhè xie nián lái， yòng zhēng liù fǎ zhì qǔ dàn shuǐ chéng běn yī zhí hěn gāo。
english: In the past, obtaining fresh water by distillation has always been too expensive.

hanzi: 我们必须使承包者遵照他们的预算办事（不许超支）.
pinyin: wǒ men bì xū shǐ chéng bāo zhě zūn zhào tā men de yù suàn bàn shì（ bù xǔ chāo zhī）.
english: We must hold the contractors to (ie not allow them to exceed) their estimates.

hanzi: 内脏尤指心脏、肝脏和肺等动物的内脏或内部器官
pinyin: nèi zàng yóu zhǐ xīn zàng、 gān zàng huò fèi děng dòng wù de nèi zàng huò nèi bù qì guān
english: An animal's viscera or internal organs, especially the heart, liver, and lungs.

hanzi: 殊品，完人，绝代佳人卓越无比的完美事物或美人；完人
pinyin: shū pǐn， wán rén， jué dài jiā rén zhuó yuè wú bǐ de wán měi shì wù huò měi rén； wán rén
english: A person or thing of unsurpassed excellence or beauty; a paragon.

hanzi: 在两个派别之间实现和平；毫无意义；没有达到定额
pinyin: zài liǎng gè pài bié zhī jiān shí xiàn hé píng； háo wú yì yì； méi yǒu dá dào dìng é
english: Made peace between the two factions; not making sense; didn't make the quota.

hanzi: 从动物我们得到像羊毛、丝、皮革、与毛皮这样的材料。
pinyin: zòng dòng wù wǒ men dé dào xiàng yáng máo、 sī、 pí gé、 yù máo pí zhè yàng de cái liào。
english: From animals we get such materials as wool, silk, leather and furs.

hanzi: 在这张地图上公路与铁路（彼此）相交共有多少次?
pinyin: zài zhè zhāng dì tú shàng gōng lù yù tiě lù（ bǐ cǐ） xiāng jiāo gòng yǒu duō shao cì?
english: How many times do the road and railway intersect (with one another) on this map?

hanzi: 向往的目标具有强烈、执著的宗教信仰的目标和抱负
pinyin: xiàng wǎng de mù biāo jù yǒu qiáng liè、 zhí著 de zōng jiào xìn yǎng de mù biāo huò bào fù
english: A goal to which adherents of a religious faith or practice fervently aspire.

hanzi: 设想在脑海中构想的事物；概念、计划、设计或思想
pinyin: shè xiǎng zài nǎo hǎi zhòng gòu xiǎng de shì wù； gài niàn、 jì huà、 shè jì huò sī xiǎng
english: Something conceived in the mind; a concept, plan, design, idea, or thought.

hanzi: 高尚的，有教养的品味和举止优雅的；有文化的；有修养的
pinyin: gāo shàng de， yǒu jiào yǎng de pǐn wèi huò jǔ zhǐ yōu yǎ de； yǒu wén huà de； yǒu xiū yǎng de
english: Marked by refinement in taste and manners; cultured; polished.

hanzi: 国外游客都想访问一下缆车的终点站——渔民之埠。
pinyin: guó wài yóu kè dōu xiǎng fǎng wèn yī xià lǎn chē de zhōng diǎn zhàn—— yú mín zhī bù。
english: Fisherman's Wharf, a place all foreigners want to see, is at the end of the ride.

hanzi: 珍妮站在他面前，脸色苍白，略微有些颤动，一言不发。
pinyin: zhēn nī zhàn zài tā miàn qián， liǎn sè cāng bái， lu:è wēi yǒu xiē zhàn dòng， yī yán bù fà。
english: Jennie stood before him, pale, trembling a little, and silent.

hanzi: 女士们、 先生们: 请别堵住通道. 谢谢诸位大力协助.
pinyin: nu:3 shì men、  xiān sheng men:  qǐng biè dǔ zhù tōng dào.  xiè xie zhū wèi dà lì xié zhù.
english: Please clear the gangways, ladies and gentlemen. Thank you for your co-operation.

hanzi: 开始执行一项危险的使命；她大学毕业后展开新生活
pinyin: kāi shǐ zhí xíng yí xiàng wēi xiǎn de shǐ mìng； tā dà xué bì yè hòu zhǎn kāi xīn shēng huó
english: Launch forth on a dangerous mission; launched out on her own after college.

hanzi: 看见那小孩挑着那么重的担子，使她大动怜悯之心。
pinyin: kàn jiàn nà xiǎo hái tiǎo zhuó nà me zhòng de dàn zi， shǐ tā dà dòng lián mǐn zhī xīn。
english: The sight of the little boy carrying such a heavy load touched her to the quick.

hanzi: 逐渐越轨从初始的路线、模式、方式或目的的逐渐偏离
pinyin: zhú jiàn yuè guǐ zòng chū shǐ de lù xiàn、 mó shì、 fāng shì huò mù dì de zhú jiàn piān lí
english: A gradual deviation from an original course, model, method, or intention.

hanzi: 他们把通货膨胀大幅度增长归咎于石油价格的上涨。
pinyin: tā men bǎ tōng huò péng zhàng dà fú dù zēng zhǎng guī jiù yú shí yóu jià gé de shàng zhǎng。
english: They blamed the rise in oil prices for the big increase in inflation.

hanzi: 他一旦下了决心就毫不动摇[无法使他改变（意见）].
pinyin: tā yī dàn xià le jué xīn jiù háo bú dòng yáo[ wú fǎ shǐ tā gǎi biàn（ yì jiàn）].
english: Once he's made up his mind, he never budges/you can never budge him (from his opinion).

hanzi: 监察者防止浪费、丢失或不法行为的监察或防护者
pinyin: jiān chá zhě fáng zhǐ làng fèi、 diū shī huò bù fǎ xíng wéi de jiān chá huò fáng hù zhě
english: One who serves as a guardian or protector against waste, loss, or illegal practices.

hanzi: 保养为保证正常的运行，状况，和修缮状况所做的保养
pinyin: bǎo yǎng wèi bǎo zhèng zhèng cháng de yùn xíng， zhuàng kuàng， huò xiū shàn zhuàng kuàng suǒ zuò de bǎo yǎng
english: Maintenance in proper operation, condition, and repair.

hanzi: 内脏的，位于内脏的与内脏有关的、位于内脏的或影响内脏的
pinyin: nèi zàng de， wèi yú nèi zàng de yù nèi zàng yǒu guān de、 wèi yú nèi zàng de huò yǐng xiǎng nèi zàng de
english: Relating to, situated in, or affecting the viscera.

hanzi: 经过了这麽多年, 你想消除你们之间的分歧谈何容易.
pinyin: jīng guò le zhè mó duō nián,  nǐ xiǎng xiāo chú nǐ men zhī jiān de fēn qí tán hé róng yì.
english: It will be difficult for you to smooth over your differences after so many years.

hanzi: 终止于衰竭是“死亡”，但“圆满”却终止于无穷。
pinyin: zhōng zhǐ yú shuāi jié shì“ sǐ wáng”， dàn“ yuán mǎn” què zhōng zhǐ yú wú qióng。
english: That which ends in exhaustion is death, but the perfect ending is in the endless.

hanzi: 杂志一种载有专论、小说、图片或其他内容的期刊
pinyin: zá zhì yī zhòng zài yǒu zhuān lùn、 xiǎo shuō、 tú piàn huò qí tā nèi róng de qī kān
english: A periodical containing a collection of articles, stories, pictures, or other features.

hanzi: ＂我们在渡口等了三个多小时，还是不见船的影子。＂
pinyin: ＂ wǒ men zài dù kǒu děng le sān gè duō xiǎo shí， hái shì bù jiàn chuán de yǐng zi。＂
english: "We waited more than three hours at the ferry, but no sign of a boat was seen."

hanzi: 该地区的农民不得不在这块贫瘠的土地上挣扎谋生。
pinyin: gāi dì qū de nóng mín bù dé bù zài zhè kuài pín jí de tǔ dì shàng zhēng zhá móu shēng。
english: The farmers in this area have to struggle to wrest a living from the infertile soil.

hanzi: 自给自足的不依靠别人的帮助、关心或资助的；自力更生的
pinyin: zì jǐ zì zú de bù yī kào bié rén de bāng zhù、 guān xīn huò zī zhù de； zì lì gèng shēng de
english: Not relying on others for support, care, or funds; self-supporting.

hanzi: 选拔委员会选中那位稳健、有保守倾向的候选人。
pinyin: xuǎn bá wěi yuán huì xuǎn zhòng nà wèi wěn jiàn、 yǒu bǎo shǒu qīng xiàng de hòu xuǎn rén。
english: The selection committee plumped for the safe, conservatively inclined candidate.

hanzi: 作为一名医生，詹姆斯必须了解医学的最新发展动态。
pinyin: zuò wéi yī míng yī shēng， zhān mǔ sī bì xū liǎo jiě yī xué de zuì xīn fā zhǎn dòng tài。
english: As a doctor James has to keep track of the latest developments in medicine.

hanzi: 昨晚我酒喝得太多真是自讨苦吃, 现在头疼得很厉害!
pinyin: zuó wǎn wǒ jiǔ hè de tài duō zhēn shì zì tǎo kǔ jí,  xiàn zài tóu téng de hěn lì hai!
english: I'm paying the penalty for drinking too much last night; I've got a dreadful headache!

hanzi: 肥缺能带来优势，如利益或威望的职位、任命或地位
pinyin: féi quē néng dài lái yōu shì， rú lì yì huò wēi wàng de zhí wèi、 rèn mìng huò dì wèi
english: A position, an appointment, or a rank giving advancement, as of profit or prestige.

hanzi: 他不安的神色引发了谣传说他与警方发生了某些纠葛。
pinyin: tā bù ān de shén sè yǐn fā le yáo chuán shuō tā yù jǐng fāng fā shēng le mǒu xiē jiū gé。
english: His upset looking gave rise to rumors that he had got in trouble with police.

hanzi: 暗号为通过岗哨而必须给出的秘密记号或口令；暗语
pinyin: àn hào wèi tōng guò gǎng shào ér bì xū jǐ chū de mì mì jì hao huò kǒu lìng； àn yǔ
english: A secret sign or signal to be given to a sentry in order to obtain passage; a password.

hanzi: 资产阶级在马克思的理论中，所有者阶层的一员；资本家
pinyin: zī chǎn jiē jí zài Mǎ kè sī de lǐ lùn zhòng， suǒ yǒu zhē jiē céng de yī yuán； zī běn jiā
english: In Marxist theory, a member of the property-owning class; a capitalist.

hanzi: 老化；熟化；陈化使具有老年特点和特征的人工过程
pinyin: lǎo huà； shú huà； chén huà shǐ jù yǒu lǎo nián tè diǎn huò tè zhēng de rén gōng guò chéng
english: An artificial process for imparting the characteristics and properties of age.

hanzi: 这种病有两种情况: 第一, 由高血压引起; 第二....
pinyin: zhè zhǒng bìng yǒu liǎng zhòng qíng kuàng:  dì yī,  yóu gāo xuè yā yǐn qǐ;  dì èr....
english: The illness can develop in two ways: firstly, in cases of high blood pressure and secondly...

hanzi: 我们无能为力, 只好不安地坐　等候宣布结果.
pinyin: wǒ men wú néng wèi lì,  zhǐ hǎo bù ān de zuò　 děng hòu xuān bù jié guǒ.
english: There was nothing more we could do, so we just had to sit and sweat it out until the result was announced.

hanzi: 你到伦敦来的目的是为了要看望家人还是为了公事？
pinyin: nǐ dào lún dūn lái de mù dì shì wèi le yào kàn wàng jiā rén hái shì wèi le gōng shì？
english: Did you come to London for the purpose of seeing your family, or for business purposes?

hanzi: 他想让我接受贿赂--我但愿我决不至於做出这种低级的事.
pinyin: tā xiǎng ràng wǒ jiē shòu huì lù-- wǒ dàn yuàn wǒ jué bù zhì yū zuò chū zhè zhǒng dī jí de shì.
english: He tried to make me accept a bribe I hope I would never stoop so low.

hanzi: 我们把硬币一掷（如以此法决定某事）, 落下後是漫面朝上.
pinyin: wǒ men bǎ yìng bì yī zhì（ rú yǐ cǐ fǎ jué dìng mǒu shì）,  luò xià後 shì màn miàn cháo shàng.
english: We tossed a coin (eg to decide sth by chance) and it came down heads.

hanzi: 我应该先审慎打探一下这家公司的底细, 然後您再签字.
pinyin: wǒ yīng gāi xiān shěn shèn dǎ tàn yī xià zhè jiā gōng sī de dǐ xì,  rán後 nín zài qiān zì.
english: I should make a few discreet enquires about the firm before you sign anything.

hanzi: 消耗量就是以每小时加仑表示的所耗费的燃料总数。
pinyin: xiāo hào liàng jiù shì yǐ měi xiǎo shí jiā lún biǎo shì de suǒ hào fèi de rán liào zǒng shù。
english: Consumption is the total amount of fuel consumed expressed in gallons per hour.

hanzi: 他想让我接受贿赂--我但愿我决不至於做出这种低级的事.
pinyin: tā xiǎng ràng wǒ jiē shòu huì lù-- wǒ dàn yuàn wǒ jué bù zhì yū zuò chū zhè zhǒng dī jí de shì.
english: He tried to make me accept a bribe I hope I would never stoop so low.

hanzi: 在我们办公室里可以看到有某种（令人不寒而栗的）不安迹象.
pinyin: zài wǒ men bàn gōng shì lǐ kě yǐ kàn dào yǒu mǒu zhǒng（ lìng rén bù hán ér lì de） bù ān jī xiàng.
english: You can see signs of (a creeping) malaise in our office.

hanzi: 战俘营中骇人听闻的生活惨状外人是很难完全体验到的.
pinyin: zhàn fú yíng zhòng hài rén tìng wén de shēng huó cǎn zhuàng wài rén shì hěn nàn wán quán tǐ yàn dào de.
english: It's hard to appreciate the full horror of life in a prison camp.

hanzi: 健康尤指身体或心智的健康；免受疾病或反常影响的
pinyin: jiàn kāng yóu zhǐ shēn tǐ huò xīn zhì de jiàn kāng； miǎn shòu jí bìng huò fǎn cháng yǐng xiǎng de
english: Soundness, especially of body or mind; freedom from disease or abnormality.

hanzi: 我们来抛硬币决定谁先走吧，你是要正面还是要反面？
pinyin: wǒ men lái pāo yìng bì jué dìng shéi xiān zǒu ba， nǐ shì yào zhèng miàn hái shì yào fǎn miàn？
english: Let's flip a coin to decide who should go first - do you want heads or tails?

hanzi: 信不信由你，并非我不爱玛丽，而是我更爱我的国家。
pinyin: xìn bù xìn yóu nǐ， bìng fēi wǒ bù ài Mǎ lì， ér shì wǒ gèng ài wǒ de guó jiā。
english: Believe it or not, not that I don't love Mary, but that I love my country (all the) more.

hanzi: 我父亲小酌之後，就变得开朗可亲些，话也说得多了。
pinyin: wǒ fù qīn xiǎo zhuó zhī後， jiù biàn de kāi lǎng kě qīn xiē， huà yě shuō de duō le。
english: My father expanded a little when he have have a drink, and start to talk more freely.

hanzi: 他们须通过齐膝的烂泥和堆积物, 磕磕绊绊来到遇难者身旁.
pinyin: tā men xū tōng guò qí xī de làn ní huò duī jī wù,  kē kē bàn bàn lái dào yù nán zhě shēn páng.
english: They had to wade knee-deep through mud and debris to reach the victims.

hanzi: 这种病有两种情况: 第一, 由高血压引起; 第二....
pinyin: zhè zhǒng bìng yǒu liǎng zhòng qíng kuàng:  dì yī,  yóu gāo xuè yā yǐn qǐ;  dì èr....
english: The illness can develop in two ways: firstly, in cases of high blood pressure and secondly...

hanzi: 他可不轻易夸奖人, 所以他要是说｀好＇, 他一定认为真好.
pinyin: tā kě bù qīng yì kuā jiǎng rén,  suǒ yǐ tā yào shì shuō｀ hào＇,  tā yī dìng rèn wéi zhēn hào.
english: He isn't one to ladle out praise, so when he says Good', he means it.

hanzi: 由於受感染的风险很大，无菌注射针的使用受到了重视。
pinyin: yóu yū shòu gǎn rǎn de fēng xiǎn hěn dà， wú jùn zhù shè zhēn de shǐ yòng shòu dào le zhòng shì。
english: The high risk of infection put a premium on the use of sterile needle.

hanzi: （芭蕾）跳跃在跳跃中能跳到某一高度的能力，如在芭蕾舞中
pinyin: （ bā lěi） tiào yuè zài tiào yuè zhòng néng tiào dào mǒu yī gāo dù de néng lì， rú zài bā lěi wǔ zhòng
english: The ability to achieve height in a jump, as in ballet.

hanzi: 他知道他们正忙着收庄稼，他不妨和他们－块儿去干。
pinyin: tā zhī dào tā men zhèng máng zhuó shōu zhuāng jia， tā bù fāng huò tā men－ kuài er qù gàn。
english: He knew they were busy betting in the harvest. He might as well go and join them.

hanzi: 他给一些为报纸专栏｀写＇文章的体育界名人做捉刀人.
pinyin: tā jǐ yī xiē wèi bào zhǐ zhuān lán｀ xiě＇ wén zhāng de tǐ yù jiè míng rén zuò zhuō dāo rén.
english: He ghosts for a number of sports personalities who `write' newspaper columns.

hanzi: 矛盾，不相符不符合或不一致，如在事实和宣称之间；差异
pinyin: máo dùn， bù xiāng fú bù fú hé huò bù yī zhì， rú zài shì shí huò xuān chēng zhī jiān； chā yì
english: Divergence or disagreement, as between facts or claims; difference.

hanzi: 矛盾，不相符不符合或不一致，如在事实和宣称之间；差异
pinyin: máo dùn， bù xiāng fú bù fú hé huò bù yī zhì， rú zài shì shí huò xuān chēng zhī jiān； chā yì
english: Divergence or disagreement, as between facts or claims; difference.

hanzi: ＂如果他不努力，他将永远也不会实现有所成就的抱负。＂
pinyin: ＂ rú guǒ tā bù nǔ lì， tā jiàng yǒng yuǎn yě bù kuài shí xiàn yǒu suǒ chéng jiù de bào fù。＂
english: "If he's lazy, he'll never fulfil his ambition to achieve anything."

hanzi: 他才是个真正的君子：而对挑衅他能竭力忍着不动怒。
pinyin: tā cái shì gè zhēn zhèng de jūn zi： ér duì tiǎo xìn tā néng jié lì rěn zhuó bù dòng nù。
english: He was a real gentleman: he managed to control his temper despite the provocation.

hanzi: 即使在国家被击败之後，游击队仍在山里与入侵者抗战。
pinyin: jí shǐ zài guó jiā bèi jī bài zhī後， yóu jī duì réng zài shān lǐ yù rù qīn zhě kàng zhàn。
english: Even after the country is defeated, partisan fight the invader in the hill.

hanzi: 我们一见到那旅店昏暗肮脏, 心里就很不痛快.
pinyin: wǒ men yī xiàn dào nà lu:3 diàn hūn àn āng zāng,  xīn lǐ jiù hěn bù tòng kuai.
english: Our first sight of the dingy little hotel did not inspire us with much confidence/inspire much confidence in us.

hanzi: 我的病是气喘和水肿，还有无可救药的是七十五（岁）。
pinyin: wǒ de bìng shì qì chuǎn huò shuǐ zhǒng， hái yǒu wú kě jiù yào de shì qī shí wǔ（ suì）。
english: My disease is an asthma and a dropout and, what is less curable, seventy- five.

hanzi: 我头脑[记忆]里（完全）是一片空白--连一个答案也想不出.
pinyin: wǒ tóu nǎo[ jì yì] lǐ（ wán quán） shì yī piàn kòng bái-- lián yī gè dá àn yě xiǎng bù chū.
english: My mind/memory was a (complete) blank I couldn't think of a single answer.

hanzi: 市长一个城市、城镇、自治市或城市联合体的政府首脑
pinyin: shì zhǎng yī gè chéng shì、 chéng zhèn、 zì zhì shì huò chéng shì lián hé tǐ de zhèng fǔ shǒu nǎo
english: The head of government of a city, town, borough, or municipal corporation.

hanzi: 我倒是想要一套新的立体声音响器材, 可是没这笔钱（买）.
pinyin: wǒ dào shì xiǎng yào yī tào xīn de lì tǐ shēng yīn xiǎng qì cái,  kě shì mò zhè bǐ qián（ mǎi）.
english: I'd like a new stereo, but I haven't got the wherewithal (to buy it).

hanzi: 正方形是二维的（平面的）, 而正六面体则是三维的（立体的）.
pinyin: zhèng fāng xíng shì èr wéi de（ píng miàn de）,  ér zhèng liù miàn tǐ zé shì sān wéi de（ lì tǐ de）.
english: A square is two-dimensional and a cube is three-dimensional.

hanzi: 门杜萨一生享有极高的声誉。穷人和富人都崇敬他。
pinyin: mén dù sà yī shēng xiǎng yǒu jí gāo de shēng yú。 qióng rén huò fù rén dōu chóng jìng tā。
english: In his day, Mendoza enjoyed tremendous popularity. He was adored by rich and poor alike.

hanzi: 我出身於工人阶级, 在上流社会中感到很不自在.
pinyin: wǒ chū shēn yū gōng rén jiē jí,  zài shàng liú shè huì zhòng gǎn dào hěn bù zì zài.
english: With my working-class background I feel like a fish out of water among these high-society people.

hanzi: 帆下桁从桅杆上伸出的长杆，用来支撑或伸展帆的下端
pinyin: fān xià héng zòng wéi gǎn shàng shēn chū de zhǎng gǎn， yòng lái zhī chēng huò shēn zhǎn fān de xià duān
english: A long spar extending from a mast to hold or extend the foot of a sail.

hanzi: 破坏，违犯，不履行破坏或违反一法规、法律责任或一誓言
pinyin: pò huài， wéi fàn， bù lu:3 xíng pò huài huò wéi fǎn yī fǎ guī、 fǎ lu:4 zé rèn huò yī shì yán
english: A violation or infraction, as of a law, a legal obligation, or a promise.

hanzi: 制造歧视妇女和少数民族的人为障碍；人为的经济繁荣
pinyin: zhì zào qí shì fù nu:3 huò shǎo shù mín zú de rén wéi zhàng ài； rén wéi de jīng jì fán róng
english: Set up artificial barriers against women and minorities; an artificial economic boom.

hanzi: "你他妈的是谁？"他粗暴地问道。"你为何在这儿闲荡？"
pinyin: " nǐ tā mā de shì shéi？" tā cū bào de wèn dào。" nǐ wèi hé zài zhèr xián dàng？"
english: "And who the devil may you be?" he asked truculently. "What are you doing, hanging about here? "

hanzi: 警方的程序规章定立後, 遗留下许多难以处理的灰色区域.
pinyin: jǐng fāng de chéng xù guī zhāng dìng lì後,  yí liú xià xǔ duō nán yǐ chǔ lǐ de huī sè qū yù.
english: When the rules for police procedure were laid down, a lot of grey areas remained.

hanzi: 联键音栓连接两个风琴键盘使之能够同时演奏的装置
pinyin: lián jiàn yīn shuān lián jiē liǎng gè fēng qín jiàn pán shǐ zhī néng gòu tóng shí yǎn zòu de zhuāng zhì
english: A device connecting two organ keyboards so that they may be played together.

hanzi: ｀他说: 　我要来.　＇在间接引语中变成｀他说他要来.＇
pinyin: ｀ tā shuō: 　 wǒ yào lái.　＇ zài jiàn jiē yǐn yǔ zhòng biàn chéng｀ tā shuō tā yào lái.＇
english: In indirect speech, `He said, ``I will come''' becomes `He said he would come.'

hanzi: 他在短短的一生中, 从小偷小摸到杀人, 什麽罪都犯过.
pinyin: tā zài duǎn duǎn de yī shēng zhòng,  cóng xiǎo tōu xiǎo mó dào shā rén,  shí mó zuì dōu fàn guò.
english: In his short life he had run the entire gamut of crime, from petty theft to murder.

hanzi: 是我看错了，还是这些确实是你们在那个花盆里栽的兰花？
pinyin: shì wǒ kàn cuò le， hái shì zhè xie què shí shì nǐ men zài nèi gè huā pén lǐ zāi de lán huā？
english: Do my eyes deceive me, or are those real orchids you have growing in that pot?

hanzi: 曼密苹果这种树的果实，具有质密有汁的果肉和有毒性的种子
pinyin: màn mì píng guǒ zhè zhǒng shù de guǒ shí， jù yǒu zhì mì yǒu zhī de guǒ ròu huò yǒu dú xìng de zhǒng zi
english: The fruit of this tree, having firm juicy flesh and toxic seeds.

hanzi: 这个国家连年战争元气尽失後, 已开始慢慢恢复正常状态.
pinyin: zhè gè guó jiā lián nián zhàn zhēng yuán qì jìn shī後,  yǐ kāi shǐ màn màn huī fù zhèng cháng zhuàng tài.
english: The country, prostrate after years of war, began slowly to recover.

hanzi: （曲轴的）半径曲柄、凸轮或类似机器部件形成的圆的半径
pinyin: （ qū zhóu de） bàn jìng qǔ bǐng、 tū lún huò lèi sì jī qì bù jiàn xíng chéng de yuán de bàn jìng
english: The radius of a circle described by a crank, cam, or similar machine part.

hanzi: 麦麸由谷糠和营养物质调成的混合物，用以饲养牲畜和家禽
pinyin: mài fū yóu yù kāng huò yíng yǎng wù zhì tiáo chéng de hùn hé wù， yòng yǐ sì yǎng shēng chù huò jiā qín
english: A mixture of ground grain and nutrients fed to livestock and fowl.

hanzi: ＂这一家人在遭到不幸的车祸前，日子过得太平安宁。＂
pinyin: ＂ zhè yī jiā rén zài zāo dào bù xìng de chē huò qián， rì zi guò de tài píng ān níng。＂
english: The family had lived in peace and tranquillity before the unfortunate traffic accident.

hanzi: 【谚】欢笑，整个世界伴你欢笑。哭泣，只有你独自向隅而泣。
pinyin: 【 yàn】 huān xiào， zhěng gè shì jiè bàn nǐ huān xiào。 kū qì， zhǐ yǒu nǐ dú zì xiàng yú ér qì。
english: Laugh, and the world laughs with you; Weep, and you weep alone.

hanzi: 你能帮助我们募集款项，救济因水灾而无家可归的人吗？
pinyin: nǐ néng bāng zhù wǒ men mù jí kuǎn xiàng， jiù jì yīn shuǐ zāi ér wú jiā kě guī de rén ma？
english: Can I enlist your help in collecting money for the people made homeless by the flood?

hanzi: 别让托尼盛气凌人地对待你，你为何不更多地显示威力呢？
pinyin: biè ràng tuō ní shèng qì líng rén de duì dài nǐ， nǐ wèi hé bù gèng duō de xiǎn shì wēi lì ne？
english: Don't let Tony walk all over you like that; why don't you assert yourself more?

hanzi: 让每一个渴望名声的人捡他自己（喜欢）的式样的内裤去吧。
pinyin: ràng měi yī gè kě wàng míng shēng de rén jiǎn tā zì jǐ（ xǐ huan） de shì yàng de nèi kù qù ba。
english: Let every man who pants for fame select his own style of pants and go ahead.

hanzi: 冒昧，放肆放肆地傲慢或令人不愉快的行为或语言；厚颜无耻
pinyin: mào mèi， fàng sì fàng sì de ào màn huò lìng rén bù yú kuài de xíng wéi huò yǔ yán； hòu yán wú chǐ
english: Behavior or language that is boldly arrogant or offensive; effrontery.

hanzi: 在樱花完全绽放的时候，经常容易遇到阴天或多风天。
pinyin: zài yīng huā wán quán zhàn fàng de shí hou， jīng cháng róng yì yù dào yīn tiān huò duō fēng tiān。
english: It is apt to get either cloudy or windy when the cherry blossom are in full bloom.

hanzi: 金银线镶边衣物的装饰必镶边，如流通带、饰带或金属珠子
pinyin: jīn yín xiàn xiāng biān yì wù de zhuāng shì bì xiāng biān， rú liú tōng dài、 shì dài huò jīn shǔ zhū zi
english: Ornamental trimming for a garment, as braid, lace, or metallic beads.

hanzi: 那两个赛跑选手竞争激烈－－在赛程中一直不相上下。
pinyin: nà liǎng gè sài pǎo xuǎn shǒu jìng zhēng jī liè－－ zài sài chéng zhòng yī zhí bù xiàng shàng xià。
english: The two runners contested the race closely it was nip and tuck all the way.

hanzi: 与新来乍到者不同，对那些工作多年的雇员将予以优待。
pinyin: yù xīn lái zhà dào zhě bù tóng， duì nà xiē gōng zuò duō nián de gù yuán jiàng yǔ yǐ yōu dài。
english: Employee who has worked here for many years will be given preference over newcomer.

hanzi: 五十位国家元首参加了女王的加冕典礼，向女王表示敬意。
pinyin: wǔ shí wèi guó jiā yuán shǒu cān jiā le nu:3 wáng de jiā miǎn diǎn lǐ， xiàng nu:3 wáng biǎo shì jìng yì。
